title: Sandpearl Clearwater FL
review: Excellent service and staff. Professional and very welcoming. Open doors for you all day. Willing to do what ever asked of them. I will be returning. I found a new vacation spot for me and my family. Kid friendly as well. Lots to do for kids

title: Outstanding Clearwater Beach Hotel
review: We have stayed at this hotel 6 or 7 times and it never disappoints. Traditional elegance, comfortable rooms, great pool and beach, and first class customer service. Located in the heart of Clearwater Beach with easy walking or free shuttle to most shops and restaurants.

title: Best hotel in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  We know how important a loyal guest is and are delighted to have you as one and continue to live up to your expectations. We are here if you need anything and will be awaiting your next visit.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Birthday Stay!
review: Spacious lobby and piano playing in a very warm and welcoming area. Very attractive large bedrooms and bathrooms. Fabulous pool and located on the beach unlike many hotels along the beach we definitely chose the best hotel. Close to all bars, restaurants and  marina.Caretta on the Gulf for dinner was one of our best meals. Buffet breakfast also excellent and good value. Lunches in Tate Island Grill superb and service particularly good from all staff and staff serving drinks poolside. The only staff we found poor and unfriendly were located in the coffee shop in the lobby. Think they may have been Eastern European or one was. Gym small but ok for gentle workout. Nice touch was the firepit by Tate Island Grill and also patio heaters as we had few unusually cool nights. We had to call out their engineer to fix Netflix on our TV. He was so efficient and sorted everything very promptly and professionally. Highly recommended this hotel. …

title: Watch out, they will fee you to death at this place!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for sharing your recent stay with us on Trip Advisor. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our stunning pool and beach front access. We are very fortunate to have our hotel located just steps away from all of the amazing attractions and restaurants / bars Clearwater Beach has to offer. Thank you again for calling us the best hotel on the beach and your recommendation. Safe travels home and we will be looking forward to your next visit with us.   Many Thanks,   Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Got stuck with a hanicap room, supposed to be a luxury vacation.
review: I am writing this about our stay in March 2019.  This is a highly overrated hotel.  We paid about $6,000 for a week stay.  We were given a handicap room, which is fine if you need it.  Fortunately we did not.  It was very uncomfortable.    We spoke to the front desk.  They said oh well, we're full!  Asked to speak with management no response, they were busy. More or less to bad, we need to make money this week off your back. We couldn't get the sliding door open to go to the balcony, guess the room wasn't used much.   Maintenance was responsive, Glad we were there to help the hotel know when to fix their door!.   The pool police were quite weird.  We sat and watched them off our handicap balcony.  Pretty aggressive bunch.  With the hotels new atittude don't recommend.

title: Awesome Getaway to St. Pete Beach
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.    I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us in March.  March is our highest rated time of the year so a stay during that time can be expensive.  I am sorry that we were not able to move rooms.  We do our best to accommodate requests like that but sometimes due to occupancy levels and room supply it is not possible.  I am very sorry.    We do have security around the pool but this is nothing new as we have had that during prime times of the year.  The purpose of the security team is to make sure that anyone around the pool is a registered guest and to escort non guests off property.  We want to make sure that our valued guests get priority around the pool and the security team is there to make sure that happens in a friendly and courteous manner.  Again, thank you for your review.  We hope to see you again.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Very disappointed
review: From the moment we pulled up to the front drive until we departed we were treated royally. Each and every staff member I came in contact with were eager to please and we were made to feel at home. A few associates provided exemplary service during our stay Kaci from the Front Desk was very personable, answered several questions and always acknowledged us as we were walking by the desk. Lyndsey from the coffee bar area was very upbeat and accommodating especially since everyone has different tastes when it comes to Starbucks in the morning. The very nice woman who greets and hold the door open at the front drive sorry I didn’t get her name but I always tried to say hello to her first was so kind as well and always had the biggest smile on. Jordan Shears the Front Office Manager…

title: 1st class hotel  on the beach
review: Dear Guest,  What a fantastic review! Thank you so much for taking the time to highlight some of our team members that had a positive impact on your stay. It sounds like you found just what you were looking for on Clearwater Beach and I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our pool facilities as well. Our Gulf Front views are stunning and our private beach allows our guests to order food / drink items right to their beach loungers. I will be sure to share your wonderful review with our associates as a motivational tool and we will continue to provide the service. We will be looking forward to your next stay with us at the Sandpearl. Safe travels home.   All the Best,   Jordan Shears Front Office Manager

title: another fantastic visit.
review: We were very disappointed with the employees.  My wife and I never felt welcome.  The employees at the pool were barely friendly, must not need tips.  They definitely don't follow the 6 foot rule, heck the 1 foot.  That was our first and last stay.  The one valet was a real hustler I wish I could remember his name.

title: Beautiful resort
review: My daughter and her family asked me to join them  I drove from Orlando to see them and it was the best time ever, beautiful resort, great front desk greeting, room is so clean and the view is amazing  I got the breakfast bar deal too It’s more pricey than Daytona Beach resorts but it’s so worth it I recommend this beautiful resort to anyone who enjoy good time

title: Coffee & Drinks
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your recent review you uploaded on Trip Advisor. I am delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed the gulf views and beautiful beach front access. We appreciate your kind words about the arrival experience as well as your recommendation.   Until Next Time, Jordan Shears

title: Sandpearl Hotel customer service
review: Great hotel. Probably the best experience in Clearwater. Great service, great location and a very enjoyable time. Certainly will come back as all the personnel are helpful and engaging and make you feel most welcome.

title: Sandpearl family holiday
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your kind words regarding the Sandpearl Resort. It sounds like you really enjoyed your experience with us just how guests should. We invite all guests into our hotel  to personalize your relaxing getaway. Come back and see us for another great stay.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears

title: First Class
review: Currently staying at Sandpearl and have reported 4 times issues with room to no avail. Asked to speak to manager on last occasion and told that they were busy. Still no efforts made to resolve issues. Makes to a really frustrating and disappointing experience. So far...no good. Would not recommend.

title: Over zealous security guy left a bad taste in my mouth
review: We arrived and were impressed by the property. Room was lovely and large for our family. Staff in kids club were kind and friendly. We ordered drinks on the beach the first night and watched the beautiful sunset.   Family were coming to visit the next day so my husband went along to Walgreens (don’t go to the liquor store next to Clearsky, it’s a rip off) to get a few beers.   I had one sitting in the sun and the security guy gave us a right mouthful. I was totally unaware that it was a problem and if he’d simply said that it wasn’t allowed I would have stopped. It was one beer not a cooler (the rest were in the room). He immediately put my husband’s hackles up because of the way he spoke to me and my husband argued back to him that he was rude.   It’s a shame as I really like…

title: NICE BUT ROOM FOR IMPROVEMENT
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review.  I am happy to hear that you were impressed with our property and the staff at our kids club, Camp Ridley.  I am sorry for the way your husband was treated at our pool.  We do not allow outside alcoholic beverages around our pool but we could have been more tactful with how we handled that situation.  We hope that you enjoyed the rest of your stay and you decide to come and stay with us again.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Clean, Quiet, Great Food and Private beach area. What else could you want?
review: The hotel definitely needs updating.  The piano in the lobby was the first thing we noticed that made us think we were staying at the wrong place.  Terrible music and kind of depressing.  The room was nice but was in desperate need of updating.  The furniture looked old, tv small and walls needed repaired and painted.  We paid a lot of money for a gulf front room and when we checked in they tried to give us a different room (first one that was smaller, then 2nd one that was not gulf front).  Kitchen was nice but there was not enough utensils or plates.  The beach chairs were nice and the staff at the beach and pool were great.  The pool was freezing...way too cold to swim.  They said it was heated when we booked and it clearly was not.  One hot tub was not working at all and the…

title: Check your Invoice when leaving
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Sandpearl.  I am glad you enjoyed our pool and beach and the team that works there.    I am sorry you did not like the look and feel of the resort.  We normally get great comments on the player piano in the lobby.  The resort is a classical Floridian style resort and meant to be a place where you can relax, refresh and rejuvenate.  I believe that you probably prefer more modern, contemporary style of resort.  If you choose not to come back to the Sandpearl I suggest you try our sister property Opal Sands located 1 mile south of us.  Your stay with us was during one of the slowest times of the year from us so we did have a couple of projects going on the that week.  The construction you mentioned was due to replacing our boardwalk that leads to our private beach.  That project is done and it looks great.  We were also updating and improving our pool filtration system which did have an impact on the pool temperature for a couple days.  That project is complete now as well and the pool is at a very comfortable 82 degrees.  I am very sorry that your stay did not live up to your expectations however we certainly hope you decide to give us another try.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beware of Cancellation policy
review: Clean, Quiet, Great Food and Private beach area. What else could you want? Everyone at the Sandpearl was friendly and professional. The room was clean. The food at the on-site Tate's Grill was excellent. The view of the sunsets over the Gulf of Mexico was amazing.

title: Fabulous Resort
review: This resort is definitely first class and very beautiful. The lobby is gorgeous with a piano playing familiar relaxing music. All employees I met were so friendly, helpful, and professional, especially Dorimor and Jordan at the front desk and Christita at the door. The location is perfect (walking distance to great restaurants) and the beach is the best! The restaurant by the pool served great lunches too. My room was very comfortable and spotlessly cleaned. I really like the turn down service. The fitness center is adequate for a good workout. The one thing that needs to be improved is the water temperature in the pool. It is too cold. Overall, I had a great vacation at the Sandpearl.

title: Weekend Wedding Anniversary
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review regarding your recent stay with us. We are delighted to hear that some of our team members were able to have a positive impact on the stay; We like to create lasting memories with our guests that they can remember. It also sounds like you were able to enjoy the Sandpearl and the local attractions that Clearwater Beach has to offer. We will look forward to your next stay with us and safe travels home.   Until Next Time,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Amazing Stay
review: A/C was cold, water was hot. Great location right on the beach. Staff was great especially Michael the consergie. Got us tickets to a sold out show that made our weekend. Lots of things are within walking distance. No microwaves in rooms and not a great value. Doors slam loudly. We were on the 3rd floor where they had a reception and the next day could still smell the seafood that was served.

title: Expect to pay another $100 per night when you get there!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  For the most part it sounds as though you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am glad to hear that Micheal, our Lead Concierge was able to help you get tickets to a sold out show.  I am also happy to see that you were able to take advantage of several of the things that Clearwater Beach has to offer.  While we don't have microwaves in all of our guestrooms (only one and two bedroom suites) we do have them available on every floor in the vending area for all guests to use.  I am very sorry about the loud slamming doors.  We do have door closers on guestroom doors to limit the noise.  I will walk and check to see if any need replaced or adjusted.  Again, thank you for your review.  We appreciate it.  We hope to see you in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: BEAUTIFUL Resort!
review: Hotel is in great shape. We booked a city view suite and was upgraded for my 40th birthday and received gulf view. One bedroom suite is large and clean. Staff is wonderful especially Kenny at Valet service and bill on the beach.  Everything is close in waking distance which is a huge plus. Paid $25 for parking per night which is the going average rate at most resorts. I am against the whole resort fee, however with they said most hotels charge that now. Hot tubs need work as when we were there one was freezing and other one was just warm, and jets barely worked. Pool is very beautiful and well maintained. We paid for beach umbrella and thought the rate was fair as most hotels charge for all day rentals. I do appreciate the fact that the staff keeps on eye for non resort guests…

title: Luxurious!
review: Champagne at check in set the tone for the getaway! The Pool ambience and service was spot on. Amenities at the seashore also attentive. Dinner and breakfast at Caretta on the Gulf was superb.  This rivals it's sister property to the south on the beach.

title: Everyone was very nice!
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your kind words regarding your recent stay with us. I would agree with you that the champagne toast at arrival is a great way to kick off the vacation. It sounds like you were also able to enjoy the pool and beachfront access. We look forward to your next visit in the future.   Warm & Sunny Regards,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Perfection
review: I have no complaints. We stayed in a two bedroom suite that was like an apartment. We had plenty of space and a great view of the beach! I loved the bar at the pool and the location was great! We walked to dinner and local bars at night. The customer service is the best you could ask for. I was very impressed with everyone from check in to check out. It’s worth the money to stay there and I would definitely recommend it!

title: Excellent service in Beachfront hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to hear that you had great experiences at both our restaurants and down by the pool. It sounds like you enjoyed most of everything that Clearwater Beach has for you to enjoy. Thank you for you review and we hope to have you stay with us again at the Sandpearl.   Warm & Sunny Regards,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Awesome setting
review: We had a wonderful stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  The attention to detail and hospitality is superb with mimosas at check-in to turn down service at night.  I loved the pool and beach as well.  Pool service was fantastic and attentive.  Clearwater is a wonderful clean beach with white sand and beautiful views.  I can't recommend this hotel highly enough!  We loved it.

title: Clearwater Gem
review: Great hotel and hospitality. Stayed in a 1br suite and was enough space and great layout . Pool is amazing, could have been warmer . Beach access is key and poolside food is better than FRENCHYs . Would def stay there again and Recommend it

title: Beautiful property!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the rating and review from your recent stay with us at the Sandpearl. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the pool as well as the service at our Tate's restaurant. Come back and see us for another great stay.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Excellent service at the Sandpearl
review: No complaints... beautiful property, gorgeous pool & beach, well appointed room with lovely view (we booked partial coastal view), wonderful service from the valet to the champagne server, bellboy, restaurant and bar. Delicious food in the 2 restaurants on the premises- we had light dinner at the bar with an amazing sunset and breakfast buffet with everything imaginable fresh and beautifully presented.

title: Anniversary get away
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your trip with us at the Sandpearl. I would agree with you the sunsets on clearwater beach are amazing as they are always different each night. Thank you for mentioning our team members as well. I am glad they were able to have a positive impact on your stay.   All the Best ,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Just beautiful
review: We have found our new favorite spot in Clearwater! The customer service was truly spectacular from the friendly lobby greeters to the pool employees. Very clean and beautiful.  The rooms were lovely.  Views were  You will not be disappointed!

title: Holiday
review: This hotel is fantastic with lovely staff the delightful Debbie greeted us with a cold glass of bubbles and when we checked in we were told we had been upgraded to sea view and the view was amazing white sand and beautiful sea rooms were lovely as well but never got tired of the view from our balcony.  Clear water is stunning lovely bars and restaurants and such friendly people we did not eat much in the hotel as the Ckearsky restaurant next door to the hotel was fantastic  I can’t wait to come back to this hotel  Only one downside is if you want an umbrella on the beach (sun beds are free ) the umbrella will cost you $29 a day Just stay round the pool all free and towels are like very nice  I would definitely recommend this hotel

title: Luxurious, elegant hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review on Trip Advisor. We are delighted to hear that our team member Debbie was able to have a positive impact on your stay. We appreciate you taking the time and telling us about your experience as well as your feedback. We love reading reviews like yours and our so happy we were able to celebrate the holiday with you. We look forward to your next visit in the future and safe travels home.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Perfect hotel in stunning location
review: The Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater is an excellent place to relax and enjoy beautiful Florida. The pool as well as the restaurant , pool bar as well as the fire pit next to it  are beautiful, the hotel’s beach very well kept. Needless to say, the service was fabulous as always.  A hair salon however would be recommendable and a big improvement. We’ll be back shortly

title: Susie's Opinion
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing a bit of your experience with us from your recent stay. It sounds like you really got to enjoy the restaurants, pool, and the firepits on the beach. We appreciate your feedback as well, come back and see us.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Anniversary Trip
review: We arrived at the Sandpearl on Saturday 14th September as part of our 25th Wedding Anniversary celebrations. We were delighted to find out on arrival that we had bene upgraded to Ocean View rooms having only booked City View rooms - what a result!. The check-in was made even more sweet after a glass of complimentary champagne from the delightful Debbie.  The rooms were wonderful, spacious and clean, with every extra we wanted - dressing gown, slippers, iron, fridge, safe etc. And the view - WOW! Looking out to the Gulf and the white sands was amazing.  Valet parking was also the cheapest we had experienced in our 3 hotel stay.  The location is great - directly onto the main street for bars and restaurants, only a 10 min walk to Pier 60.  Food and drinks are more expensive than…

title: Excellent
review: Marta, the concierge, was wonderful and so helpful!! Debbie who provides mimosas when arriving was amazing and fun.  Beautiful resort, amazing beach and truly amazing customer service!   Beds were very comfortable.

title: Amazing birthday weekend!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review from your recent stay with us. We love reading reviews like yours it really shows the impact we can have on our guests. Thank you for mentioning some of our team members as well I will be sure to share your kind words with them.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Bummer! =( Happy Anniversary surprise only done H.A...
review: I have read tons of reviews on Trip Advisor but never written one-until now!! Just returned from a fantastic weekend celebrating my 50th bday at the Sandpearl. This hotel is first class! The property is stunning and on an absolutely beautiful beach. The grounds are immaculate and the service top-notch! Every staff member we encountered went above and beyond for every need or request. Everyone is super friendly and the service is unlike any other hotel I have visited. I poured over reviews before booking this hotel and I definitely made the right choice! Don't hesitate to book-this place is just fantastic!! Already can't wait to return!! Thank you Sandpearl for making my 50th one to remember!

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us from your recent stay. It sounds like you got to enjoy the Sandpearl as it was intended to be enjoyed, lots of relaxing time on our beautiful beach. We appreciate you mentioning our team members as well and I am delighted to hear that they were able to go above and beyond for you. We will be looking forward to your next trip.   Many Thanks,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Another great week at the Sandpearl
review: On July 23 of this year I phoned the Sandpearl and spoke to the concierge to request something special be sent to a pair of upcoming guests. My parents were to travel there on Sept 12 for their 60th wedding anniversary. I'm one of 5 children and we're scattered about the country and we thought it might be a nice idea to have some goodies sent to their hotel room as celebration of the wonderful event from the kids. The concierge offered me a chocolate covered strawberries and prosecco solution for $48. Great! I asked that "Happy Anniversary Mom and Dad! We love you! - Love, The Kids" be added as a sentiment. Super and done...I was satisfied as were my siblings when I reported the plan. Fast forward to the event...yesterday. My mother texted me a photo (attached) of what was…

title: Excellent service all around
review: Nice touches from the hotel staff.  Being walked to the desk (after a very late arrival) by the front door attendant & offered champagne.  Excellent poolside staff, wonderful desk staff that allowed a room upgrade, late check out and great food + service at restaurant!  Will stay here again when we return to Clearwater!

title: Amazing...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review; we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Sandpearl. We really appreciate you sharing a bit of your experience with us and mentioning our wonderful team members. We hope you come back and see us for another vacation.  All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Great Property on the Beach
review: I cant recommend this hotel highly enough.  It is absolutely amazing . From the 1st minute you arrive till you leave you'll be in absolute bliss the rooms are gorgeous,  always cleaned to the highest level . Staff from front door, front desk , pool staff , restaurant etc are so friendly, so helpful & so pleasant.  It certainly makes a change from some hotels I've stayed in . The Sandpearl is just one of the hotels that you will NEED to return to year after year after year ... it's truly a superb hotel & I cant wait to visit again

title: Customer Service at its Finest!
review: Dear Guest,  Wow! Thank you so much for your review regarding your recent visit to the Sandpearl. We love hearing reviews like yours and will continue to provide the service. We really appreciate the recommendation and for mentioning our great team members. It sounds like you truly had a wonderful time and we are looking forward to seeing you again in the future.   Many Thanks,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Great stay excellent service
review: Enjoyed staying at the Sandpearl on a weekend getaway to Clearwater Beach. The hotel is an upscale property complete with bellhops, concierge, valet parking and a spa. Location wise it is perfectly nestled into the heart of the beach. The pier is just the other side of the hotel and across the street on the inland side is the Aquarium and marina. Pool was fantastic along with the excellent service.   Only item to be aware of is that there is a facility fee charged daily, but it does include parking. Only other item is that with all the services there is a lot of tipping involved everywhere you go on property. Not a negative just something to be aware of. I can't wait to go back.

title: Satisfying weekend getaway
review: We normally vacation south of the border but stayed stateside due to continuing Zika concerns. Having never been to the area, we weren't quite sure what to expect. We were pleasantly surprised. The hotel was clean, the staff were extremely courteous, the pool was great, and the white sand beach was even better. The pool was perfect for adults and kids alike. And, what we really liked was the smaller size of this resort.  We has a Gulf Front Junior King Suite. The price of the rooms are definitely much higher than we are used to. They were nice but not $499/night +$29 resort fee nice. Other than the price, the other "problem" we encountered was lax housekeeping. Garbages weren't emptied, toilet paper wasn't refilled, and the expansive terrace and outdoor furniture was full of…

title: Stunning
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review regarding our resort. We are delighted to hear that our staff was helpful and courteous providing a positive impact on your stay. It sounds like you were able to enjoy the pool and beach amenities under the sun. That sounds like a very relaxing afternoon especially with the Tate's pool and beach bar steps away from our loungers. We really appreciate your feedback as well and apologize about some of the housekeeping comments. I will be passing your information to our departments so we can better improve our services. Thank you again and we hope you decide to stay at the Sandpearl in the future.  All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: worst hotel ever
review: Having has a hectic week in universal, Orlando, we were hoping to relax. This was the right place! The hotel itself was absolutely stunning, the staff were polite and friendly, loads for the kids to do, everything was pristine and clean and the location made this an absolutely amazing experience! Wish we had longer there!

title: Always fantastic!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us from your recent visit. We really appreciate you taking the time to write your review. Come and see us again for more of the same.  Until Next Time,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manger

title: Awesome!
review: The worst customer service I've ever received from hotels! Fist of all, not even once they made my request accurate.  I ask for tea, they would bring coffee. I ask for 4 sugar and cream, they will bring one. I asked for a rob, they brought me towels, and so one. SECOND OF ALL, when we were enjoying the pool, huge things from the palm tree fell off on my father's head. I went to the manager, and that young rude man didn't even say that he is sorry. All he said was somebody will call me. Call me and do what?- was my reaction. I was planning to have a good time with toddlers and my parents, but instead got horrible customer service and falling things from the palm trees.  the worst thing was the manager's reaction. it seemed like that happens there pretty often and he doesn't even…

title: Great Vacation
review: We loved our recent stay here.  From the checkin to the rooms, the food, and staff, we have very few complaints.  Great for adults and kids alike.  If I had to really get granular-maybe the pancakes at the breakfast buffet-those we subpar at best.  Also there doesn't seem to be vacuuming during room service daily which I thought was kind of gross, but we're a pretty clean family so it wasn't a big deal.  When the rain came, the hotel opened ball rooms and set up movies, games and food for free when they definitely didn't have to.  Our family of four had a great time and plan to return in the future.

title: So far I am not impressed
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review regarding your recent visit to the Sandpearl. We are delighted to hear that the ballroom helped alleviate the fact that is was raining and provided a fun activity for you and your family to enjoy. Your comments regarding your stay are very important to us and I will be sharing your feedback to the necessary departments. Come see us again for another family trip.  All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manger

title: Beautiful Place to Stay
review: So far I am not impressed!  The first room we were given at first glance looked fine until I went into the bathroom. There I saw hair in the clean tub, dark stains on the tub surface and a disgusting area of black mold on the ceiling over the Tub.  We called the front desk and told them about the issue. We were told that nothing is available to change to. So we went down stairs to the front desk and were told the same thing. We showed the employee at the desk the photos of the room, and magically  several rooms suddenly became available! Enter second room... a junior suite with a beautiful view of the gulf. It’s a nice size and it’s clean.  Well sort of clean. The toilet seat has a giant crack in it, and the light fixture over the bar area is hanging out of the wall.  So it’s…

title: Expensive stay
review: Dear Guest, Please accept our apology for the Housekeeping and Maintenance issues you experienced in your rooms.  As you are aware, we have spoken to the respective departments and addressed the area of concerns.  These issues should not have happened in the first place.  You are correct in saying that we are embarrassed as this is not the normal standards that we upkeep.  We hope that you enjoy the rest of your stay with us.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great Family Vacation!
review: This is a beautiful resort with lovely amenities, but the staff are what make this place really outstanding. The bellhops, the valet staff, the ladies opening the front doors, the concierge, the champagne ladies, etc....everyone was very professional, friendly, and helpful.  The shuttle service was great since it rain every day of our stay.  We were upgraded, and our room overlooked the pool and the beautiful beach.

title: Perfect location for relaxing after a frantic visit to Orlando
review: We chose this resort because of its location with access right on the beach so we could relax for a week after our trip to the parks in Orlando. The beach is stunning (and incredibly clean) and the pool area was beautiful. The hotel was high spec - we had a junior suite with a balcony overlooking both the beach and the pool. There was also a good size fridge in the room for storing your own drinks. The staff were very friendly and helpful from the moment we arrived - the welcome glass of champagne was a lovely touch. The hotel is also a fantastic location for a wide-range of restaurants, bars, cafes and shops all within a few minutes walk. The harbour where all the boat trips start from is a 10 min walk and other attractions, such as the Clearwater Aquarium are very close by…

title: Our summer go to for 8 yrs straight!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review from you recent trip with us. It sounds like you were able to relax and unwind at our pool and beach after your busy Orlando vacation. I am also delighted to hear that you found our staff helpful and friendly while you were staying with us. We appreciate your feedback as well so thank you for sharing. It is nice being right on the beach and so close to all of the attraction Clearwater Beach has to offer. We hope you decide to come back and stay with us again.  Until Next Time,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Excellent hotel with a couple of gripes.
review: Location, price, ambiance... everything about Sandpearl always is a great trip for our family!  The rooms are clean and spacious. Service is good. Hard to find anything to complain about. We have recommended to multiple friends who all thank us for this wonderful resort:)

title: Great facilities and a bit of Old World charm
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recommendation and sharing a bit of your experience with us. We look forward to your next visit.   Many Thanks,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Solid Family Resort
review: Stayed here for 9 nights after doing the theme parks in Orlando. Had a family room with three double beds (one was a sofa bed) Spacious room for all of us even though my sons are teenagers now. Very pleased with the hotel in general. Reception area clean, light and airy. Would definitely recommend this hotel. However there were a couple of things that were not brilliant. Firstly beds and parasols around the pool were in the price we paid but unfortunately the parasols on the beach for the beds had to be paid for. For a family of 4 to rent 2 parasols a day for 9 days it worked out an extra $450 to our bill. This was on top of the $25 per family per night resort fee. We thought this was just too expensive as our holiday itself was not cheap. I was not surprised to see that the…

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: The two bedroom suite was just what I needed. Spacious and with all the right touches. The resort is responsive to your needs. Each staff member was delightful..from the pool side wait staff , beach set up, and front desk. A bit pricey but I’m ok with that since the overall experience is lovely. Will return in the winter...

title: Amazing experience
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind words regarding your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the room and that our dedicated staff were there for you. Come back and see us in the winter and enjoy our 70 degree weather.   Warm & Sunny Regards,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Best Vacation Ever
review: Had a girls weekend at the Sandpearl and had such a great time we have decided to make it an annual trip. Lovely experience from beginning to end...  Delicious mimosas at check in, Mark was our bellman and was so friendly and went the extra mile to kick our vacation off right. Meals at the Grille were delicious and Jasmine and Makenzie were fantastic waitresses and were very attentive throughout our multiple trips to the pool and the beachside cabanas, and Jordan made us some delicious drinks at the bar. Phil found us the perfect beachside loungers and remembered to save them for us In the afternoons. The security guard Matthew greeted us everywhere around the resort. The concierge arranged standing paddle board tours with Luis and it was an absolutely magical…

title: Excellent, better than last stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your kind words regarding our resort. It sounds like you had a lovely girls weekend. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the mimosas at check in and the meals at our restaurants. We love reading reviews like yours and will continue to provide the service for all of our guests. We do appreciate you mentioning our team members and I am so glad they had a positive impact on your stay.   Until Next Time,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Amazing trip!
review: The service is second to none. Truly feels like a home away from home. From the security guard to the room attendants to the pool help, everyone made us feel special. One of them even passed ball with my son when he noticed him in the pool alone.

title: First time and it exceeded my expectations!!!!
review: First time I’ve ever done a review like this and this was our first time ever in Clearwater but this place was awesome,awesome location on the beach,great things for my boys to do(ping pong,bags,and the swimming pool,(I loved the movie night for the kids by the pool)and a great added touch is the s’mores on the beach,and kudos to Jordan at the bar,he was fantastic and very accommodating,we took some amazing pictures of the beach and sunsets,and I love how close we were to many shops and restaurants,we will definitely be back with hopefully a little less rain but as my header said this place exceeded my expectations and I had high expectations coming into our trip.Thank you to everyone at sand pearl resort you left my boys and myself lasting memories!!!

title: Summer vacation at the Sandpearl Tesort in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review regarding your recent visit with us. We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy the ping pong tables and corn hole game by the pool with your boys. It sounds like you had an awesome time and I am pleased to hear that we were able to create a lasting memory for you. Thank you for also recognizing one of our team members Jordan, we love to see our staff making a positive impact on your stay.   Until Next Time,  Jordan Shears . Front Office Manager

title: Best place we have stayed at so far.
review: This was our first time staying at the Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater & it was absolutely the BEST! Upon arrival the valet greeted us & check in was great. Our rooms as well as the resort were immaculate & that continued for our 5 day stay. The champagne/mimosas were a wonderful added touch which I loved. The staff around the pool & resort were awesome & really put in their time to make the resort welcoming & kept up. Our room was a 2 Queen bed with a gulf view (room 414) & I must say I’d want that EXACT room again as the view was amazing of the pier & pool area. And if you are traveling with kids as we had our 21/2 yr old granddaughter, the activities center was awesome. The recreation area with games was great as well. Definitely will be returning to the Sandpearl Resort!

title: Great resort but some serious shortcomings
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for calling the Sandpearl the BEST. We love reading reviews like yours as it gives our team motivation in continuing to provide the service. It sounds like you really enjoyed the champagne at check in as well as close to everything the resort has to offer. I am so delighted you and your family had a great stay with us. Come back and see us for more of the same.  Cheers,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Lovely place!
review: Kids friendly, great staff, very clean rooms and restrooms throughout the whole resort, great restaurants on site. Very nice and clean pool even though sometimes a bit overcrowded but it was not an issue for my kids. Would definitely recommend and will come back.

title: “Beautiful resort on Florida’s Gulf Coast!”
review: When I first arrived at the resort, I was amazed with how beautiful it was. It was my first time visiting a Florida beach and I chose Clearwater Beach for its white sand and sunny weather. I loved how the hotel was directly on the beach and that the restaurants at the resort provided a beautiful view of the gulf. Our hotel room was clean and comfortable and it had a balcony that overlooked the beach and the city. I especially enjoyed that the resort was close to the city and offered a shuttle service to the pier. For the days that we stayed there, the weather was sunny and we enjoyed watching the sun set over the gulf. I loved that there was an automated baby grand piano that played music throughout the day, adding to the elegance of the property. The lobby was beautiful and the…

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your vacation with us at the Sandpearl. Thank you for your awesome rating and review. We share reviews like yours to our team members as a motivational tool. We strive on creating lasting memories with our guests by giving them the best experience possible while vacationing with us. It sounds like you were able to enjoy close to everything clearwater beach has to offer. I hope we can host your next trip in the future.  Cheers,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl Resort
review: Just spent 6 nights here. Room was well sized, very clean, bed comfy. Great to have locked minibar AND separate fridge for your own drinks etc. Pool area was good right next to beautiful beach. Hotel is in quite a good location for a few restaurants and shops. I would recommend.

title: Amazing Location!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us at the Sandpearl. It sounds like you were able to enjoy the resort and the fun attractions in the surrounding area. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to see you again in the future.  Many Thanks,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl Clearwater, Fl
review: Sandpearl Resort was an awesome property! The amenities, niceness of staff and overall experience was excellent. the outdoor pool and access to the beach was great! I would def recommend to anyone who is looking to visit the area!

title: Another Amazing Family Vacation
review: I can't say enough good things about this resort. Everything from the location of the resort to the employees is perfect. This visit I got to enjoy the spa! This is the perfect environment to relax and enjoy your family. The pool is incredible. The beach is beautiful. They have sand toys and pool rafts that you can borrow and the resort plans activities for kids- my 8 year old met a ton of friends! I also have a 1 year old who absolutely loved the sand and water. I can't wait to go back!

title: Amazing Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your kind review. We are very appreciative of the compliments which we use as inspiration to keep providing the service. It sounds like you had a great time at the spa and taking a stroll around our beautiful beach. Thank you again for sharing your experiences and we look forward to your next visit.  Cheers,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Outstanding Service
review: Just back from a great stay in this fantastic new hotel. Swift, welcoming check in with water & procecco on arrival. Rooms HUGE & spotless. Extremely central with shops, pubs & restaurants within 5min walk. Soft white sand RIGHT outside your hotel. Sunset & sunrise should NOT be missed. We used sunbed 2 days not realising we were being charged as they asked our young daughter to sign & put room rate in on day 1 but after explaining this it was IMMEDIATELY taken off. THANK YOU VERY MUCH. Cooler providing ice cold water by the pool along with lots of white fluffy towels each day was lovely. We hired a car 1 night & parked accross the road, perfectly safe & saved us 25 dollars parking. LOVED this hotel we will definately be back. Thank you staff.

title: Great location but questionable cleanliness
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us about your recent stay at the Sandpearl . We appreciate your kind words about our staff as they work diligently to assist all of our guests. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful beach as well as the welcome champagne toast. We can't wait for you to return and take care of you again!   Warm & Sunny Regards,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: The Shine is off the Apple
review: I can’t say enough about our recent stay at the Sandpearl. The valet, front desk, housekeeping and waitstaff were all friendly and attentive. The amenities and location were amazing! We had an overall exceptional experience and are already planning to return.

title: Perfect place for family beach trip
review: We loved staying at the Sandpearl.  We took our 10 year old granddaughter and had a great time.  Everyone was friendly and helpful.  They even have beach toys you can borrow.  The hotel was right on the beach and the pool area was very nice. Our room was nice,everything was clean and well kept.  We looked out on the beach from our balcony.  Great place for kids.

title: Fantastic!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your compliments and the rating regarding our resort. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed yourself here at the Sandpearl. It sounds like you were able to enjoy our beautiful beach and pool areas as well. We hope you decide to stay with us again in the future.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic Resort
review: We just got home from a lovely vacation at the Sand Pearl. We were treated by friendly valet staff. Upon check-in we were offered a delicious mimosa to put us all in a great vacation mood. Greg from valet brought our luggage to the room and was very friendly and knowledgeable. He gave us great suggestions on restaurants to eat on the island! We loved The Bait House and would have never stumbled upon this little gem of it wasn’t for Greg! We had a two lovely days by the swimming pool and beach. Make sure to get down to the pool fairly early to get chairs but also make sure not to leave for long periods of time or they will put signs on your chairs with a time period. If you don’t return, they will give them up to guests that are actually at the pool and wanting to use them, which…

title: Only place I would stay in Clearwater!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review regarding our resort. We are delighted to hear that our team member Greg was able to provide you with a warm welcome and excellent restaurant recommendation. We are so fortunate to have such a great location on Clearwater Beach and it sounds like you were able to enjoy our pool and beach areas. We look forward to your next visit and we will be here to continue to provide the service.  All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Overall Excellent
review: We are definitely coming back to the Sandpearl! The staff is so friendly and so helpful. Matthew in Security is wonderful. Marta in the Concierge Department was so helpful and kind. Mike the shuttle driver was great. We had the opportunity to meet Jeremy the Assistant General Manager and was super nice. When I say everyone you meet is friendly and kind I’m not kidding. The rooms are very nice. The pool is amazing. The restaurants are wonderful, great food.

title: Quick get away!
review: Hotel was amazing! Great location , wonderful staff , they are a class act ! Only downside was housekeeping. We were only there for 3 nights and 2 days we had to both call & go to front desk to have out room made up & replenished with the normal stuff you get.  They made up for it , but when you are spending that kind of money this should never happen. Other then that .,, we loved it & will go back

title: Amazing resort and location.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us as one of our valued guests. We appreciate your feedback as it is very important to us. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.   Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Excellent
review: We have stayed at Sandpearl four years in a row now.  The facilities and experience cannot be topped.  There isn't a better pool in Clearwater (zero entry pool with comfortable, padded chairs), the grounds are beautiful, and the beach is right outside the gate and includes the use of lounge chairs out there as well.  That may not seem like a big deal, but when you like to switch back and and forth between the beach and the pool, it's nice to know there will be a spot for you, and that you can exchange out your towels for fresh ones.  There are also pool/beach toys for the kids.  Not having to "plan" for the pool/beach day is part of what makes Sandpearl the place it is.  You just show up, and have fun.  I'm serious.  We wore our swimsuit and sandals each day and brought nothing…

title: Amazing Stay but be prepared to pay!!!  Housekeeping needs help!!
review: Dear Guest,  Wow! What a great review thank you so much for being one of our guests and coming back to see us year after year. Thank you for also mentioning our wonderful team members, we love what we do. Reviews like yours really reflects what we strive to do at the Sandpearl and that is to create lasting memories with our guests and there family. We look forward to your next visit and thank you again.  Warm & Sunny Regards,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful hotel, great rooms, excellent service
review: This resort is well run and well maintained with its own private beach. Everything is easily accessible. Excellent view of Gulf. Pool is really nice and clean with a relaxed vibe. Staff are polite and friendly.

title: Definitive Beach Getaway
review: From the personal greetings, the recommendations, the exquisite customer service covering all aspects.. to the gorgeous accommodations and location.  It’s simply one of the best beach resorts anywhere.

title: Charging More, Getting Less and Less
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing a bit of your experience with us. We will continue to provide the service and look forward to your next visit.   Warm and Sunny Regards,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: June14th summer 19
review: This is a beautiful resort and nice place to visit however having stayed here multiple years now, we see they charge for more and provide less each year. Parking is $25, resort fee is $30. A few years ago each beach chair had a head canopy but they changed the beach chairs and now charge for an umbrella. WiFi service is extremely slow.

title: Excellent Vacation
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review as well as your repeat business.  You are correct about the prices as we have a resort fee of $29 and Valet Parking is $25.  These fees have been in place since the hotel opened.  I am also confused as to your comment regarding our beach chairs.  The chairs that we have currently are exactly the same types of chairs that we have had for 9 years.  To my knowledge we have never had a beach chair with a canopy on the beach however we do have some of those chairs around the pool.  Beach chairs are part of the resort fee however if you would like to rent an umbrella for the day there is a fee for that.  Again, thank you for your review.  if you would like to speak personally about your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Enjoyable stay, would stay again
review: We had a wonderful stay at the Sandpearl in Clearwater Florida.  The hotel was beautiful and beach was lovely.  Pool staff & Tate grill by the pool was great.  My only wish would be for another pool for adults only😄

title: Sundown at the Sandpearl!
review: My Husband and I and our two kids spent 6 lovely nights at the Sandpearl Resort. We paid a little more for a Gulf front junior Suite which was definitely worth the money. The bathroom was lovely and big with a shower and bath which had shuttered windows which opened up to the rest of the room. Our view of the pool and the beach was fabulous and we saw amazing sunsets from the balcony. It has a great pool which was warm and the kids can watch movies every night in the pool weather permitting. Buffet breakfast is great at the hotel with kids eating free. They also toast nightly smores around the fire pit which is a really lovely thing to do with the kids, sitting on the beach under the stars! I want to mention in particular the housekeeping and security guard at nighttime. I'm…

title: Had a Great Time but SandPearl Needs to "Up Their Game"
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your trip with us at the Sandpearl. I would agree with you the sunsets on clearwater beach are amazing as they are always different each night. Thank you for mentioning our housekeeping and security team members. I am glad they were able to positively impact your stay. It was our pleasure to host your family vacation and I hope your son is feeling better as well.   Until Next Time,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful!
review: The SandPearl definitely has some nice amenities but fell far short of a luxury resort, IMHO. We've stayed at much nicer resorts for half the price. Overall, I think SandPearl needs to up their game.  LOCATION: Location is definitely what this place has going for it. It is situated right on the beach and has the trolley, the pier, the marina, convenience stores, and plenty of yummy restaurants within a short walk. Grade: A+  BEACH: The beach is expansive and has sand like fine white sugar. Great for building sand castles. The water is really warm, so you can float and play for hours. Grade: A+  BEACH LOUNGERS: The SandPearl beach chairs are 150 yards off the water and stacked in tight rows with no shade. What's the point? You are not near the water and you broil while being…

title: If you like a ton of kids, from babies to teens, this is your place, and for a hefty price!
review: Thank you very much for your very thorough review of the Sandpearl Resort.  We are happy to see that you enjoyed many aspects of the resort such as the beach and location.  In your review you commented on a couple of items that I would like to explain.  The loungers are set back from the water approximately 50 yards.  The reason for this is that the location of our chairs on the beach is on our private property.  The area in front of our beach is public.  In the area where our chairs are you can eat and drink whatever you like while you cannot do this on the public beach. Plus we have servers that bring items to you upon your request.  We do have a very active pool.  It is the centerpiece to our entire resort.  With this said it is common for people who are not guests to try to sneak in.  There is no preventing this other than what we are already doing by having our Pool Security Team keep out non-guests.  The reason there are locks on the gates is to keep non-guests our of the pool so carrying your room key is necessary.  I am very sorry to hear that you experienced poor service while around the pool and in Housekeeping.  We are reviewing your comments with those areas.  Again, thank you for your review.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay with us please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Expensive, but worth every cent
review: This resort is relaxing and luxurious. I stayed here earlier this year and was not disappointed. Upon arrival, the valet was polite, courteous, and made me feel very special. They took your luggage and assisted you with everything. Checking in was very quick and simple. Then, we went to our room. It had a large balcony, where you could sit and lounge. The grill is more than amazing. Though my order was mixed up, the waiter quickly solved the problem and provided a delicious smoothie free of charge. I love the beach and the cabanas are lovely. The beds are soft and comfortable, and the rooms themselves are spacious. Overall, my experience was splendid!

title: Nice
review: Very very nice , from the interior lobby, beautifully decorated, the sandcastles, pool, nightlife outdoor  bars, with a beautiful sunset views.  Lovely shops, what else could a Chicagoland gal ask for, white sandy beaches

title: Beautiful Resort!!
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and its location. We are very fortunate to have such a pristine beach and our sunsets every night. Safe travels back to Chicago.   Cheers,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Relaxing -perfect
review: Stunning Sandpearl Resort has luxurious rooms, an upscale restaurant and a fabulous pool with an outdoor restaurant on the sand. You'll never want to leave the resort. If you do, there are many shops and restaurants to check out.

title: Great Service, beautiful beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us at our resort. We hope you come back for more of the same.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears Front Office Manager

title: Best Resort i have stayed in
review: Rooms overlooking water. Breakfast poolside, lunch poolside, hung out most of day - David poolside manager 5 star service.  Dinner in lower level restaurant overlooking ocean. Great service. Spa. Close walking distance to indoor surfing for kids, Pirate ship adventure, ice cream shoppes. Pier. Amazing sunsets. Relaxing west coast vacation for all of us.

title: Leisure
review: This hotel is very elegant and old world feel. The lobby and art work are exquisite. The whole place is just upscale to the best. The pools to the beach are beautifully landscaped and everything is clean and the staff is friendly, accommodating, and full service. The rooms are huge. I love the location and history of the place displayed on the way to their upscale formal dinning. There is a grand piano playing to add ambience in the lobby on the waiting area for the restaurant. Sunday brunch was $39 with the greatest layout of foods to enjoy. Just and amazing stay.

title: Amazing Resort!
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy you found our pool and beach to be beautiful and our rooms to be comfortable. We love hearing reviews like yours and will continue to provide the service.   Until Next Time,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Cosseted & calm once more
review: My wife and I first discovered the Sandpearl 2 years ago when we had dinner there. Vowing to return to stay there, we did so on Memorial Day weekend visiting relatives. The Sandpearl is a luxurious Resort, with spectacular views, beautiful rooms, accommodating staff, and delicious food. Everyone that works there is pleasant, courteous, and professional. The beaches are amazing with an abundance of chairs and umbrellas, as well as the pool area. They are both very comfortable with bar and food service.  We had a wonderful stay there and will be returning at least once a year.

title: Wonderful Staycation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the rating and review about the Sandpearl. We appreciate you taking the time and telling us about your experience and for mentioning our team members. We try to give all of our guests the best experience while vacationing with us. Thank you again for being one of our valued guests and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Many Thanks,  Jordan Shears  Front Desk Manager

title: Great location - directly on the beach.
review: We’ve stayed at the Sandpearl a few times over the last 9 years- 1st trip in a large suite for 7 of us, last year our first trip as a couple without my son & girlfriend  We made the mistake of booking another Opal hotel, which was ok but not the Sandpearl. Opal were great and got us transferred over. This was a special vacation for our 35th wedding Anniversary, and once we moved ‘home’ and into a gorgeous gulf front suite, we ended up extending our stay to make up for a rough start elsewhere.  What makes us return annually? Cleanliness, comfort, great staff( professional, courteous, efficient, friendly) beautiful sparkling clean pool and beach, and great restaurants.  It has it all- position is fab also  I’m getting excited for our next stay, June 19th onwards. And that says it…

title: The wedding
review: Sand Pearl comfortably sits on the Gulf of Mexico south of Tampa.  Beautifully positioned over looking the Gulf, a view you won’t want to forget. Activities up and down the strip with shopping, eating, dinning or just to have drink. Hospitality at the highest standard. You will be greeted at the front entry to make sure your luggage makes it to your room and vehicle parked under the hotel safe and sound. Outdoor pool, drinking and eating and never leave the water or your chaise lounge. You pick the spot at the pool you want the the stewards do the rest. Perfect spot to party, have a family reunion or even a wedding. Planners are available and very professional.

title: Great Anniversary weekend
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and rating regarding our resort. We are so happy you enjoyed our beautiful beach and the activities around the hotel. Congratulations to the newlyweds and thank you again for the recommendation.  Cheers,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: This hotel is truly top of the line!
review: My husband and I had a great anniversary weekend, we truly enjoyed the stay from the clean rooms to the beautiful beach and excellent customer service. We also enjoyed both restaurants and the fact that while at the beach you can order food and drinks. Amazing time.

title: Great service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us and happy anniversary. I am glad to hear you enjoyed the beautiful rooms as well as the customer service. We hope we are able to celebrate more anniversaries with you for years to come.   Best Wishes,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful beach and facility
review: Took a 5-day spring break trip with 2 teenagers and we could not have asked for a better hotel.  The staff working both the beach and pool were AMAZING!  Food was fresh and delicious - drinks were always ice cold.  Can't say enough about this place - we will definitely be back next year!

title: Awesome Place
review: My daughter had her wedding here, everything was awesome, the food was great and the staff was awesome, I recommend this place without hesitation.  My family will cherish the memories for years to come.

title: Great anniversary trip!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make a review regarding your stay with us. We are delighted you enjoyed yourselves and hope you decide to come relax with us again. Congratulations on the newlyweds it was our pleasure to host such a special event for your family. Thank you again for the recommendation!  Best Wishes,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Florida family holiday
review: From the moment we arrived, May 4, 2019, we knew we had made a good decision for out trip. We arrived around 8:30pm and found out our room was not going to be ready. They put us in the presidential suite for the first night and it was amazing.They also gave us a voucher for dinner in the restaurant there at the resort which was incredible! The next day when we changed rooms, we were upgraded to a gulf view room instead of the city view that we had booked. I feel like this was nice way to compensate for our trouble of having to move. The restaurant on the property by the pool was a great place for lunch. My favorite was the ceviche and guacamole, but the hamburger, quesadilla and cuban sandwich were also delicious. Service around the pool was great!  Location was perfect for…

title: Bad customer service
review: Dear Guest,  Happy Anniversary, we are so happy that you picked the Sandpearl to celebrate. I agree with you, the quesadilla and cuban sandwich down at our Tate Island Grille are both delicious. Thank you for your kind words about our resort and we look forward to having you back with us in the future.   Best Regards,  Jordan Shears Front Office Manager

title: Great long weekend Trip
review: There is a lot to like about this hotel, and it is a shame that it was let down on issues that management should be able to address.   POSITIVES 1) location is excellent within Clearwater. 2) beach is exquisite. 3) The hotel was helpful in making sure some lost items from another hotel were delivered to us. 4)The front desk and repair team were helpful.   NEGATIVES 1) Pool decorum. Spending time by the pool was challenging with a full hotel. Basically the pool is not big enough when the hotel is full. Also standards around the pool are not what they should be. One family was eating their lunch in the pool (not next to it). Swimming past a taco was a step too far. The resort staff were still bringing drinks etc when this was happening. 2) Beach charges. Every morning there was a…

title: Beautiful way to spend an anniversary!
review: My husband and I recently spent our 15th anniversary at the Sandpearl Resort.  Check in was a breeze, our room was on the 7th floor, overlooking the gulf, and we had an amazing time.  We spent several hours walking the beach, lounging in the hammocks, and enjoying the resort.  We spent some time at the spa and really enjoyed Samantha, who checked us in to our services and helped us upgrade our massages, as well as our therapists - Evita and Shanteria.  The massages were wonderful and the couple's suite was beautifully decorated - we didn't want to leave!  We received a quick tour of the property from the spa manager, Taylor, which was very helpful and answered all of our questions regarding the resort and the activities and amenities.  Our only complaint was the lovebug…

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review from your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. Congratulations on your 15th anniversary we are so happy you choose to spend it with us. It sounds like you had a great time at the spa and taking a stroll on our beautiful beach as well. Thank you for also mentioning Samantha, Evita, Shanteria, and Taylor, who all deserve the recognition. We hope you choose to come back and spend some more time relaxing on the beach in the future.   Best Wishes,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Stunning hotel and beach
review: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights which was perfect. Our city view room was actually on the side of the building so we had partial ocean view which was great. We had a balcony but looked like some rooms didn’t. The beds were very comfortable and room was clean. While at the pool or beach we felt like we were in the Caribbean. Such a beautiful property and service for drinks and food on beach was great. Didn’t like that a security guy kept coming around while at the beach on Sandpearl property asking us if the bag we had was a cooler and what was in it. We ate at restaurant by pool for lunch and food was very good. One day service was great and the next not so much. Overall this is the place to stay. Next time I would not rent a car. Paid $25/day for it to sit in garage.…

title: Return to Sandpearl
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the rating and your review. I am delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy our beautiful pools and beach. We are happy to hear you found the service to be great as well, we are so lucky to be able to work in this environment. Thank you again for sharing your experiences and we look forward to your next visit.   Cheers,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: This hotel aspires to being top rated, but falls short. Some good, enough bad to make it average.
review: We have just returned form a trip to Sandpeal resort, we had such a fab time the hotel is amazing and the beach and pool were great such a lovely relaxing family stay could not recommend enough. Hotel rooms we great size and staff were really helpful.

title: Great conference hotel or family getaway
review: Getting to this hotel from Tampa airport is an easy 20-30 mind drive. The reception is friendly and offers water or champagne free in the late afternoon.  The staff are friendly and efficient.  The conference space was okay but the acoustics poor.  Similarly the food was average to good.  Thanks rooms are modern and the toiletries are nest with a pleasant scent and high quality.  Right on the beach with long walks possible.

title: Excellent excellent excellent
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy you found our rooms to be pleasant and the staff to be helpful. We also appreciate you feedback so we can improve on our services. I do hope you enjoyed the experience and you were able to relax and feel refreshed by your time here on property.   All the Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: HIGHLIGHT OF THE HOLIDAY
review: Ted at the front desk was the start of what has turned out to be our best visit yet. They never disappoint but continue improving what’s already great year after year. Wouldn’t stay anywhere else even if it were free! #SANDPEARL YEARLY

title: Caretta Dining 👍👍
review: Dear Guest,  We are always happy to read comments like yours and we thank you for coming back to see us. Not only is it wonderful to hear about your visit and your desire to return, but we especially appreciate your kind words about our staff. Thank you again!   Best Regards,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: If you want to take it a little higher
review: What can I say that hasnt already been said. Fantastic location with the best sunset view over the Gulf of Mexico. Brilliant service throughout this beautiful hotel. Shuttle bus was very handy too moving us around the area. Plus the giant inflatable screen at night beside the pool showing Star Wars was brilliant for the children (and me!!)  We will return for a longer stay next time, Thank you.

title: Beautiful Resort
review: My wife and I picked the Sandpeal Resort for our honeymoon and we were very pleased. We stayed in a Junior King Suite and found it was plenty of room for 2 people for 5 days. The rooom was clean and had two new LG TV's. All of the staff were very friendly and very helpful with any questions or needs we had. The experience was awesome all around from the pool area, included beach chairs on your private section of beach, firepit, and multiple areas on the lobby level to take in the beautiful sunsets. The 8.5 hour trip was definitely worth it.

title: Good resort in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Congratulations and thank you so much for your review. We are glad that you chose to stay with us for such a special occasion. We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed our resort, especially the amazing sunset views that were are so fortunate to see everyday. Our staff at the Sandpearl are dedicated to making every guests stay memorable so thank you for mentioning them as well.      Best Wishes,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: High hopes - but too expensive
review: Nice resort located in front of the beach. First time in a US beach resort. Some points disappointed me a bit: number of chars in the pool do not accommodate all guest. You need to wake up early and secure your chair. The beach is beautiful. White and thin sand and large beach. The sea is calm but a bit cold (perhaps April is not the warmest season). Big disadvantage is that you have to pay for an umbrella in the beach (~$25-40 / day) - all hotels around the world provide it for free. This was a big surprise and frustration for one of the best and most expensive resorts in Clearwater. Hotel staff compensates some of the cons. They are very kind and supportive.

title: There are always things wrong, but the things that are right keep us coming back
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at our resort as one of our valued guests. We appreciate your kind words about our staff as they work diligently to assist you. Your feedback is very important to us and we hope you choose to stay with us again.    Best,  Jordan Shears  Front Office Manager

title: Still the best in Clearwater Beach
review: Had really high hopes as the rate per night was ~$700 for base room (Bay View 455). The resort has good elements and overall we enjoyed our stay, but value for money fell way short. It felt like a 4star experience at 5star pricing. The room was small and felt a bit dated as did some parts of the pool area. The $29 beach umbrella fee and the $6 s’mores charge felt like a rip off. On the plus side the $23 breakfast buffet with kids eating free felt very fair and the beach is as nice as advertised. The Beach bar with live music is in a great spot, although the food was just average.

title: Excellent!
review: Excellent resort. My pleasure to write this review. From moment of check in amazing staff. You are greeted with a mimosa  Gorgeous lobby!  Rooms wow! Spacious and super clean. I was in a bedroom suite. Really spacious and beautiful  We will be back for sure. This resort is super family orientated

title: TOP NOTCH
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review, we are very happy you enjoyed your stay, we love to hear you will be back for sure. We are here looking forward to when you do return!  All the Best,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel at perfect beach location
review: This exceptionally classy resort certainly gives you the "wow" factor.  The employees...ALL of them we came in contact with were the kindest, respectful, and most helpful of any resort we've stayed at.  This resort is immaculate.  We stayed in a Gulf front Jr. Suite and the view was gorgeous!  The classy Mercedes shuttle drove us many places we needed to go and that was so handy.  The restaurant food is top notch ...a must do dinner there should be required...When we return next year there will be no other place to even look at ...for the SANDPEARL is a winner hands down.   Thank you for a great stay SANDPEARL!!!

title: Just what we were looking for!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind review. We are very appreciative of the compliments which we will use as inspiration to keep providing the service. We can't wait for you to return and take care of you again!

title: Paradise
review: The Sandpearl is a wonderful resort on Clearwater beach with the perfect beach location, direct beach access, nice pool, a wonderful lobby, very chic and clean rooms.   The hotel could be fantastic if it’s not the price/offer ratio that leaves a bad taste. It’s the same rip-off method that you’ll find anywhere in Clearwater. First, be prepared for room rates between 400-500 USD per night, then additional „amenity/resort“ fees of another 30 USD/day. This does not even include the sunbeds with umbrellas for which they charge additional 30 USD/day. Breakfast is also not included in that price.

title: Another Amazing Visit
review: We are in the middle of a stay at the Sandpearl and I just have to take a moment to rave about how fantastic it is. Everything is top notch and the staff really go out of their way to ensure an amazing experience.   We were here for our honeymoon and returned this year for our 5th anniversary. The front desk staff left us chocolate covered strawberries which was a very nice touch.   The view of the sunset from our balcony was unbeatable and we loved being able to hear the live music from Tate’s while we enjoyed the view from our room.   We were upgraded to a Gulf Front Junior Suite and the room was absolutely beautiful.   The beach is a wonderful white sand. Chairs are free, but you do need to pay to rent umbrellas. However, it’s worth it because then your spot is saved all day…

title: Amazing vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to make this informative and complimentary review. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us and you recommending the resort to others. Happy Anniversary, we look forward to seeing you again, but hopefully before your 10 year!  Best Wishes,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Friendly staff, beautiful rooms, a great relaxing stay
review: We just returned from 4 amazing nights at the Sandpearl.  Service at Tates and the pool was outstanding.  We have to give a shout-out to Elaine and Bobby who took care of us at the pool and Dillon and Emanuel (sp) at Tate’s, Cody at the pool went out of his way to find us the perfect chairs daily.  Food and drinks were great too... delicious pina coladas and many other drinks, burgers, wings etc!! We have absolutely no complaints about our trip and hope to visit again soon!! Loved the mimosas at check in.

title: Full of Children + Poor Service = No Return
review: Dear Guest,  It sounds like you had an excellent time down at our pool and beach, I'm jealous! Thank you for mentioning all of the great staff members down there who work so hard to take care of all of our guests. We hope you visit again soon as well!  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great Hotel-Know what you are buying
review: My husband and myself stayed in a king beachfront room on the fifth floor.  The room was clean with plenty of room.  Very nice room.  Every experience from the spa, beach, Carettas on the Gulf was excellent.  Our second time to come to Clearwater.  More people in general in the area but the stay was perfect.

title: Never again....
review: Traveled to Clearwater for Spring Break with multiple families.  We stayed at Opal Sands year before and loved it.  Decided to try Sand pearl as it is supposedly nicer and has a beach directly in front of the hotel.  Hotel was nice, beach was great, and Clearwater is awesome but unfortunately it was overshadowed by the horrible treatment by the hotel staff.  We booked a double queen/full room because of two kids.  How we’ve, we were placed in a king only and offered a cot.  When we requested another one because two kids, we were told they only had an air mattress.  We were told they over booked and just said sorry.  Offered no concessions.  Such a bad experience, we will not go back to Clearwater again.....

title: Family vaca
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review.  Please accept my apologies for the issue you had regarding your room type.  I am not sure what exactly happened in your case, however we do our best to accommodate all guests requests and reservations.    Besides the room accommodation issue we hope that the rest of the Sandpearl experience was to your liking.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Our 3rd time Staying here! Love it!
