review: Wonderful resort right on the beach. Large beach with white sand. Lots of shopping and restaurants within walking distant. The hotel does a great job of making sure only registered guest are using the pool and facilities.

title: Wonderful- if you have kids
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the compliments and the rating, we are delighted you enjoyed yourself here at the resort. We hope you are able to come back for another family vacation!  All the Best,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel
review: Love the perfect location, the beautiful beach and pool and service is amazing - both at the hotel restaurants and on the beach/at the pool. We were here for Spring Break, so a lot of young families with little kids, but that is to be expected. Will definitely come back, the best place to stay in Clearwater Beach! Some people complain about the resort fee, but that is anywhere. It’s worth it here!

title: BEAUTY and the BEAST
review: BEAUTY- This is a conflicted review. Let me start by saying the Hotel, Lobby, and STAFF were outstanding. They were more than adequately staffed from the front door to the beach. The hotel itself was beautiful. The location was on an epic sugar white sand beach, with a perfect sunset view nightly.   NEUTRAL- We chose mainly because of the walk in pool near the beach and two large hot tubs to relax. If you have children 2 - 12 years old, this is your resort!! We are an adult couple. The pool was dominated from 10am to sunset by very young children end to end, primarily being watched from chairs. BOTH hot tubs were occupied all day by very young kids with squirts guns and water wings. There is no haven for adults without kids. The pricey restaurant was populated by kids at 9pm…

title: Excellent Resort Hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Sandpearl Resort.  We are happy to hear that you found the hotel, lobby and staff outstanding.  Thank you!  In your review you mention the amount of children that we have around the resort.  While we cater to all valued guests we are indeed a family oriented resort.  We were recognized this year by Travel and Leisure magazine as one of the Top 50 Family Resorts in the World.  We should have however done a better job at making sure that the kids around the pool were not being a nuisance to others.  I will speak to the Pool and Beach team regarding your comments.  I am sorry that you did not like the view from your room.  There are some rooms with the views that you mention however we price them accordingly when compared to Gulf View or Gulf Front rooms.  Some people prefer to pay a little less and dont mind the view as they will not be in their room that often.  Also, in the loading dock area is where the compactor, smoker and recycling bin are located.  Trust me that there are no health concerns in that area as the compactor is totally sealed and contained and the recycling bin is for cardboard products only.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  We hope that you decide to come and stay with us should your vacation plans in the future include Clearwater Beach.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: #1 Hotel on the #1 Beach
review: We had a fantastic stay at the Sandpearl.  Our room was a "city view", however it was on the side of the hotel and you could see the ocean from the balcony, which was nice.  The pool area was excellent, and the beach was beautiful.  While you do have the usual issues with "towel savers" for the lounge chairs, the staff is always willing to find you space. Service was truly 5 stars all around, from the staff greeting you at the front door, to the pool and beach attendants, to the bartenders.    There is an additional charge for parking, through you really don't need a car here (we had one only because we were driving across the state afterwards).  Much of the town is walking distance (with many nice restaurants nearby), and you can always get an Uber if you don't feel like making…

title: Lovely hotel in the heart of Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your stay experience with us here on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the service from all of the staff, it is great to know they are living up to standards. We hope you come back soon for another fantastic stay.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Be aware of partial sea view rooms
review: We LOVE the Sandpearl.  This trip was our 5th spring break at the Sandpearl and it keeps getting better.  The rooms have always been exceptional and now the staff has caught up.  It's not the cheapest place but well worth the money spent.  Be sure to enjoy the extras including poolside movies after sunset.  TIP:  Many "beach" hotels in Florida are not actually on the beach.  A road runs between the hotel and beach so watch out.  That is not an issue with the Sandpearl.

title: A bit of paradise
review: This was our second year in a row to stay at the Sandpearl. The location is perfect. We love the pool and beach area along with Tate’s Grill. An easy drive to Clearwater and Tampa.  Rooms have a wonderful view and balconies. Hotel service is amazing.

title: Wonderful experience all around
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for coming back we appreciate your time here and taking this review. We love to keep hearing about our returning guests who help make this place so special. We will be looking forward to year three!  All the Best,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Family trip
review: My husband, son and I stayed at the resort for three nights, four days from March 18 to March 21, 2019 while we were in the area for a few college visits.  We selected the resort at the recommendation of a friend, with everything being right on the property including pool, beach, spa, dining, etc.  We had a wonderful visit, upon check in we were upgraded to a suite which made the stay very enjoyable for us and our teenage son.  The hotel was beautifully appointed and the service was excellent.  The beds were quite comfortable and dinner at Caretta's was outstanding.  Service all around was exceptional, from the valet to front desk check-in, housekeeping and waitstaff. I was not aware of the other properties owned by the Sandpearl and hope to check out another in the very near…

title: Valet Damage-delay in reimbursement
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience here on Trip Advisor. We appreciate the compliments and love hearing you plan to return. We hope you decided to explore other Opal Collection properties as well, there are many beautiful locations to enjoy!  All the Best,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Resort
review: We love our stay here! Wonderful staff, wonderful location. Georgeous beach, the view from our suite was magnificent  The rooms were well maintained, very clean. All staff were very attentive, courteous. We will be back!

title: Still Excellent!
review: I've stayed at the Sandpearl many times while visiting Clearwater Beach for Phillies Spring Training.  It is always an excellent experience.  The staff is attentive and friendly from check in to check out.  The rooms are well appointed and the complimentary bottled water is a nice, although insignificant, touch.  Excellent wifi throughout the property.  The resort-style pool is beautiful (and filled with families during spring break).  We had good experiences at the bar and restaurants while at the property.  Ask for a room with a view as some overlook the street/driveway.

title: Great place to hang out with friends!
review: Dear Guest,  We are happy to hear you like to stay with us during Phillies Spring Training. We know it is March when we start seeing all the Phillies hats and Jerseys walking around enjoying Clearwater Beach. Thank you for sharing your experience with us here, we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Best hotel in Clearwater Beach, but expensive. A fair review!
review: Every time we come here it’s fun and relaxing. Live music, sunsets, firepit...  what could be better!  We’ve been coming here for years and the staff are consistently friendly and helpful. It’s our go to place when we have out of town visitors and it’s everyone’s Fave.

title: Luxurious Resort With Outstanding Service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the resort, we are happy to hear you love spending time here. We are always happy to host so come back and enjoy the property again.  All the Best,  Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Our summer break
review: Let me start by saying that this is our 4th or 5th time staying at the Sandpearl and we maintain that it is the best hotel in Clearwater Beach. The location is superb, the view facing the gulf is amazing, the grounds are stunning, and there are wonderful activities for guests of all ages. Most of the staff is excellent (special thanks to Stephan who is a server at breakfast, and the lovely woman in the lobby during champagne hour - sorry I did not catch her name). There are a few things that could be improved - such as new furniture by the pool/on the beach, and more staff service on the pool/beach. On one of our beach days we had to wait a very long time for service and for food/drink. A 'pie in the sky' wish would be for an adults-only pool added (or maybe even an adults-only…

title: Luxury Resort
review: This is a luxurious resort.  When you check in, you are offered a glass of champagne or a mimosa which is available to guests every day.  Piano music plays in the lobby 24 hours a day.  There's always a worker to open the door to the lobby and greets you with a big smile and a good word.  Valet parking is very efficient.  The rooms are very, very clean and very nice.

title: Good & bad
review: Dear Guest,  We are happy you stayed with us and enjoyed yourself. Thank you so much for the kind words and the review, we hope to have you back again soon!  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Overzealous Pool Security
review: Checked in March, 10 2019 5 day stay..... writing this review from the hotel, good location, friendly family setting, good dining, now the BAD, our coastal view is of an expansive roof with several large exhaust fans, a behind the scenes parking lot with a garbage dumpster ..... that STINKS. Today my 80 year old father ( we booked 2 rooms at over $500 a night ) asked for a cushion for his balcony chair and was told “ sorry - we’re booked to capacity, we don’t have any...... when I said booked to capacity - I’ve been in the parking garage ( $25 a day ) it was full on Sunday and practically empty today and Monday ..... I was told by the front desk .... well many of our customers arrive by bus....... hahahahahhahahaha what ?.??? There’s NOT ONE BUS HERE - at all .... this is a $700…

title: Long weekend in paradise
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad to hear that you think the resort has good dining and is family friendly.  Thank you.  Regarding the negative portions of your review, I am very sorry that we did not bring a pillow to your father.  I am not really sure what that was about but I will look into it.  We most certainly should have been able to provide that simple request.  You also mentioned the occupancy and the belief that the hotel was not full.  I can guarantee you that we were very full during your stay as you were with us in the middle of our Spring Break season.  We do a lot of business with MLB Spring Training teams and fans and many of them arrive on charter buses.  I believe that is what was meant regarding the amount of cars in our garage.  Again, thank you for your review.  We hope that you decide to come and visit us again during your next visit to Clearwater Beach.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: WIFE WASN'T HAPPY
review: We've been staying at the Sandpearl all week and have really been enjoying our stay...until yesterday. Let me state that its very nice to see the hotel enforcing rules, as too many times hotels are afraid to offend guests, the result being rules not followed and a poor experience. This is a case a pool security guard taking his job a little too serious. First we saw him checking on un-supervised kids in the hot tub. Great!! On an earlier trip to the Phillies Spring Training we purchased a Lemonaide. Later we filled the cup with ice water and brought it to the pool. I was simply walking around the pool area when the security guard (will omit his name as he was only doing his job) stopped me and told me we're not allowed to bring in "cups" from outside the resort. He said it was a…

title: Phillies Spring Training
review: Booked through the Philadelphia Phillies, great hotel right on the beach with every amenity you could want. Walking distance to several restuarants both casual and upscale. All of the Staff were excellent.

title: Wow! This Resort is OUTSTANDING!
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your time and review, thank you for sharing a bit of your experience here at Sandpearl.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Get Away
review: I accompanied my husband on a business conference at this resort. I was blown away! Everything from the room, the service, the food, the view, the beach, the pool, the grounds and the spa were spectacular!!! I was not really expecting it. I can't say enough about this resort. The shower was the best shower ever. LOL, I want to come back to take a shower. The hotel is immaculate as well. I highly recommend this resort, you will not be disappointed. I hope to return one day.

title: Spring Break
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you got to enjoy the resort while your husband was occupied in meetings, you two will have to return and relax together. Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts about your stay, we are very pleased to hear them.   All the Best,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel for a great vacation
review: Had 3 nights at Sandpearl  Not our first time to Sandpearl and We Will return. We been there multiple times New Years and Thanksgiving also great      Great front staff on arrival Valet and Bellman  Makes it very easy and check in staff also.    I have had issues at there restaurant mostly breakfast server almost arguing with you over my choice to order off menu and they wanting me to do buffet instead same server next time I tell hostess anyone but him  , and if you want room service call them don’t fill out door tag .   I do recommend dinner reservation and dinner is great and server also    I should also say that many come in for breakfast and different servers and have a great experience to be fair to Sandpearl     The Pool and staff work hard to make it a great experience…

title: Beautiful beach location but beware!!
review: The hotel was beautiful. The hotel is right on the beach. I had never been to Clearwater and was surprised by the beautiful sand!!  We were so excited and got up early to get a chair on the beach to be told the chairs were only rented to you by the hotel for $30.00. My belief is when your spending $600 a night for a room the chair on the beach they promote might come with the price.  They do have a pretty fire pit which they do s’mores for the kids in the evening. The sunsets in the beach are beautiful as you are facing west. The room was not cleaned daily, not sure if they just overlooked us. They do have a problem with locals getting into the pool area and the poop bathrooms. There were times I had to wait 15 minutes in the bathroom for the kids to get out of the stalls who…

title: Sandpearl resort Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for the review. We are happy you enjoyed the property overall despite some of your comments. We hope you choose to return and stay with us again.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful resort
review: All staff is not only helpful but they do in a very positive attitude. The resort is amazing. The spa has is very tranquil my daughter and I had hot stone massages and they were the best massages we have ever had.  Staying at the Sandperal is worth every dime.  We will definitely be returning.

title: An actual resort!!!
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate the acknowledgment of our positive attitudes, we are happy to have guests here to enjoy the property and our company. Thank you for the note, we look forward to seeing you in the future.  All the best,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Some rough spots
review: Spacious, clean rooms.  Excellent staff.  Very family friendly.  Lots of activities for kids.  Nightly fire pit with s’mores.  Excellent service poolside.  We were there to visit the aquarium, and wish we had more time at the resort.

title: Incredible family hotel
review: We stayed here for 4 days after 8 days hitting the Orlando theme parks for 12-14 hours each day. Was such a relaxing way to end our stay in Florida before heading to NYC. The staff were so helpful and friendly. The beach front location is fabulous so kids could go and come as they pleased. Rooms were luxurious, very spacious and balcony overlooking the pool/sea really put you in holiday mode! The fire pit for s’mores also amazing for the kids at the end of the day. Would love to return.

title: Amazing Reaort with a 4 Star Staff
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review, we certainly are an incredible family hotel. We are happy to hear you would love to return which we will be anticipating!  All the best,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Very Nice
review: This resort may be located in a small area of Florida but it feels like a Four Seasons!  My family stayed in room 768 and it was super big, luxurious, and more than we could have asked for!  But as nice as it was, we actually loved being out of it more...this resort was gorgeous and so fun!!  We were at the beach every day and had a reserved spot thanks to Rylan, this guy went above and beyond making sure our family had a front row and all the lounge chairs/umbrellas we needed. Once we relaxed and wanted a cocktail...Bobby took over and had a pitcher of the BEST margaritas delivered to us within minutes. I’ve traveled to some of the best resorts in the world and the employees of the Sandpearl never missed the mark, NOT ONCE. They were absolutely amazing!!  It would be terrible…

title: Sandpearl: Luxury Resort
review: Dear Guest,  We are so delighted you enjoyed the property as well as the staff so much. It means a lot to have our guests praise the hard work the friendly staff put in everyday and only gives us the inspiration to continue to provide more. We will see you again.  Until Next Time,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Really good place to stay with a few errors
review: Stayed at the property a couple of weeks ago as we hosted a conference there.  It is right on the beach - not too big - very nice stay.  The hotel staff was very helpful. Although I did not ge a King room as requested, the rooms was very nice - overall, very good stay and we would return.

title: No better place to be
review: This was a long weekend to escape the cold and dreary winter in Chicago and you couldn’t pick a better place for an escape. The SandPearl is without question a five-star, a-plus Resort. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel comfortable and that goes from the valets to hospitality to the wait staff. Everyone is professional and courteous and quick to want to please the guests. Pay the extra money for a gulf front view and you will not be disappointed. The view is tremendous!  The resort has its own private section of beach with attendants to take care of chairs, cabanas, towels, umbrellas and wait service. Clearwater Beach is a destination all its own and when you stay at the SandPearl, you will not want to leave!!

title: Extra charge
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the review! We agree, there is no better place to be. We look forward to your return.  Cheers,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Excellent
review: Just x2 what you planned to pay. Be aware.  There is at least 100 $ a day of charges that are not show in listing. Nice rooms but we had to fight for them.  Just makes the whole experience less. Would not recommend.

title: Relaxing Stay
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you liked the rooms.  In addition to the daily room rate there are 13% taxes applied by the county and state, a $29 Resort Fee and a $25 Valet Parking fee.  If a car is not needed for your stay, we suggest people utilize Uber or a taxi from the airport to save on this fee as there are many things within walking distance of the resort.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Good food and meeting space
review: A wonderful stay from beginning to end! Perfect location on Clearwater! Walk right from hotel to pool to beach. Beach really is as amazing as they say it is. Hotel staff always had a smile on their face willing to help and make us feel relaxed and welcome. We stayed in the 1 bedroom double queen suite. Just enough space for our family of 5 which includes 2 teenagers. The hotel was spotless- pool, beach and lobby. We ordered in room service and they unfortunately got the order wrong. They kindly took the entire order off the room charge. Very generous. We ate lunch and dinner at the pool bar and had many drinks served to us on the beach. Service was excellent and the food and drinks were as expected!   My only suggestion: I’d love to see a better space to get quick snacks…

title: wonderful!
review: stayed here over weekend for a conference.  the hotel, grounds and conference facilities are top notch.  the staff was helpful.  the food (presumably catered by the hotel for the conference goers) was very good.  unfortunately, didn't get to use the pool or beach, but looked very appealing.  would definitely return to this hotel if my travels took me to clearwater beach again.  about 40 min by taxi from TPA airport.  the hotel gym is well equipped and open 24 hours.

title: Friendliest staff in Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate you taking the time to make a review of our resort. We are delighted you were here able to enjoy your conference and would like to return, next time all for pleasure :)  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Quality resort through and through!
review: Impressed by the facilities and the helpful staff.  If we return to the area, it would be my choice for lodging.  The resort restaurants are great and it is also in walking distance to a number of other good restaurants.

title: Wedding
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the kind review, we are happy to help and serve all of our gracious guests. We will be looking forward to seeing you very soon!  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Wonderfule weekend getaway
review: From the greeting at the door to the team members you meet through the resort the service is top notch. The facility is well maintained and offers just the right amount of amenities. Healthy food too!

title: Beautiful hotel and amazing staff!
review: This hotel is beautiful.   Right on the beach.  Nice comfy rooms.   Staff is excellent and made us feel so special.  Great food.  Shower and bed is great.  View of beach from room and sunset is amazing.  I would highly recommend this hotel

title: Sand Pearl Resort is Amazing!
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you found the resort to be amazing. Thank you for your recommendation, we will see you soon!  Cheers,  Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl Revisited
review: This is my first time to stay at the Sand Pearl Resort and I must say that I am very impressed.  From the moment we got out of our taxi the staff super friendly.  Front desk check in was smooth and they offered us champagne, mimosas or bottled water as we arrived. I have never been to a resort where EVERY staff member is friendly, courteous and happy to help you.  The resort is immaculate.  The pool area is very lovely.  I was treated like a Queen by Kyle and Bobby who who work in Tate’s restaurant and serve the pool area.  They gave me great suggestions on food and cocktails.  Our room was perfect.  The bed and pillows comfy and they provide bottled water which I appreciate. The housekeepers were also very kind and friendly. Thank you for such a great time at your resort and…

title: Great resort feel
review: Dear Guest,   We are delighted you chose to stay with us as much as we are that you left impressed. It is our goal to have all guests arrive and feel the same way throughout the stay. Thank you for mentioning Kyle and Bobby, they absolutely deserve mentioning! We hope to see you again soon.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Perfect Getway - couples or families!
review: We have stayed at the Sandpearl a couple of times a year for the past few years. Its consistency of quality and friendliness has never waivered. It’s beautiful, immaculate, and sits on a perfect spot on the beach. Both the pool bar and restaurant bar have great atmosphere and great menus. Shopping and other restaurants are within easy walking distance, plus there’s a free shuttle provided for longer jaunts. The Sandpearl is a classy place to stay and is extremely family friendly at the same time. We’ve stayed here as just a couple and other times have brought our grown kids and their families. Perfect venue for both. You wont regret it!

title: Will absolutely return to sandpearl !!!!
review: Game room Cody Grace Alexis how can I ever thank you for the best time with my grandsons !!! You so care about kids and were so fun and helpful !! Thanks !! Restaurant best halibut I ever had in my life and I'm 70. ! Welcoming staff front  desk !! Chantal Joe  chef and other nice omelet chef and Paul Heather Susan all priceless for our morning breakfasts You all went over and above to help me with my boys. Food was awesome !!

title: Escape from the cold weekend
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for remembering and recognizing the staff members who took care of you. It means a lot to see their names posted and will only encourage us to keep doing our jobs better and better.  Until next time,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Live in Luxury during your stay
review: We had a great weekend stay at Sandpearl.  We arrived Friday evening and were greeted with smiles and an upgrade to a partial view king suite (we had booked a partial gulf view king room).  It was a lovely surprise and started the weekend of on the perfect note.  We sipped our glass of champagne on the balcony and then headed across the street for dinner at Clear Sky Cafe.  Sat. We awoke to sun so picked up fruit at the market place at the hotel and set out on a walk.  The beach is wide and soft.  This time of the year it was not crowded.  We spent the day at the beach, the young lady working the beach was great.  Turiah was friendly, efficient and made sure everyone on the beach was well taken care of.   All though All of the staff was great, she was a stand out.  All though…

title: Great winter weekend getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this lovely review. It sounds like you had a great escape and were able to enjoy a nice time of year here. We look forward to seeing you return again for another escape.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: This Resort does everything right.  From the minute you pull up to the entrance to leaving they are super service oriented.  They serve champagne throughout the day complimentary.  The pool is amazing as are the 2 hot tubs.  the Tate Grill has great food (loved the wings as claimed) and the SPA was truly relaxing.  We had a few small issues that were resolved at warp speed when raised.  I would highly recommend this resort and cant wait to return!!!

title: Welcome to Paradise!!
review: The Sandpearl Resort at Clearwater Beach is a wonderful spot for everyone to enjoy. I visited with my two adult sons and our five year old Jack Russell Terrier for five days in January to escape from the cold in Nee York. We were warmly welcomed as soon as we arrived. Check in was a breeze and we found our two rooms to be very clean and well furnished with a beautiful view of the ocean from our balcony. The private beach was our favorite spot with the white sugar sand. The restaurant at the resort, Caretta on the Golf, was exquisite and the food was delicious. Everything at Sandpearl was the best and I will definitely be returning!!

title: Amazing
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the great review! We are always happy to hear our guests can escape the cold and enjoy our warm welcome. I am very pleased you found your room clean and well furnished, we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Self Playing Piano and Sancastle if the hotel BIG HIT with my 5 year old
review: The resort was amazing.  Staff are so friendly. Tate Grill servers remember you and your order everyday. Resort and rooms were very clean. Cant say enough good things about our experience there. Can’t wait to go back.

title: Everything you need in 1 location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the 5 star review, we are pleased to serve you and are happy to here about your experience. We will be looking forward to your return.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Amazing Resort
review: I traveled with my 5 year old son over Martin Luther King weekend. LOVED this resort.  The staff was great as well as the amenities. Weather was chilly but we made the best of it.  From the minute we got there I received a glass of champagne and my son  a bucket and shovel what a surprise!  One amazing bonus is the step stool in the room.  might sound like a small thing but as a single mom with a 5 year old was a BLESSING!!!! Our last night we ate at Caretta and food was amazing they treated my son as a PERSON didn't ignore him was totally impressed.  We cannot wait to go back and hope for better weather to enjoy more of the pool and beach. One problem we did incur was we only received turn down service 1 of the 3 nights was a little disappointed as we pay the $29 per night…

title: Winter Vacation
review: Love the Sandpearl. Perfectly situated on he quieter portion of the Best Beach in America (yes, white sands). Sandpearl combines personal service on level of a boutique hotel and professionalism found in larger establishments. Sunset bonfires on each are perfect endings to any day; enjoyed with your favorite libation. The casual Restaurant/outside barn is situated in Gulf and services an array of beachy treats. Try the grouper sandwich... too good! Light live music makes the 4 pm cocktail hour perfect. The Spa is lovely and I enjoyed one of the best massages ever. Manu-pedi techs are friendly and skilled. Oceanside Restaurant is another that offers breakfast, brunch, lunch and dinners. Lovely upscale settings. Sandpearl’s location is a short walk to lots of fun restaurants,…

title: Beautiful View
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind review, it sounds like you enjoyed the resort just as it should be enjoyed. We are happy to hear you found the service to be both personal and professional, we are lucky to have the freedom to work in this environment. Thank you again for sharing about your stay, we hope to see you again very soon!  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Winter getaway
review: This hotel is in a great location. You can walk to shops and restaurants. We had a beautiful ocean view. Junior suites are roomy and comfortable. Staff is helpful and friendly....housekeeping does a great job but really everyone from the valet to the service poolside do an outstanding job of making you feel welcome!

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the compliments within this informative review. We appreciate hearing you had a good time and everyone was doing an outstanding job. We look forward to seeing you again when you return!  Cheers,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Awesome Stay!
review: Couldn’t believe how awesome this place was from the first second we walked in and handed the keys to the Valet  it was nothing but relaxation for the five days we were there staff was excellent room was excellent dining was excellent we will definitely be coming back thank you for the great experience. It was everything we hoped for and more for our first time in Florida

title: Gorgeous beachfront resort!
review: Traveled with family of 6. Two grown college aged daughters and their boyfriends. Resort is high end and maticulous. Great location right on the beach with pool and close to shops and restaurants. Can walk to everything! Expensive but worth it, if you can afford it.

title: Family wedding
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the review! We are delighted the resort fit you and your family's needs and you all were able to have a great time. We hope to see you again soon in the near future.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great Vacation
review: From the door person, Tate Bar & Grill personal, cleaning ladies & the turn down bed ladies( Cassandra) our entire family was treated amazing, would recommend & hope to come back again. GREATJOB all around

title: Excellent Stay
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you had a great time here with us at Sandpearl! Thank you for taking the time to post a review about the stay, we love the feedback. We also thank you for the recommendation and look forward to when you return.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: A good visit
review: My husband and I just had a great getaway at the Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater this week!  This resort is within walking distance of restaurants and many attractions.  We rented a car for the week...but only took it out one day!  The facility is beautiful and well taken care of.  The staff were friendly and very accommodating.

title: Great resort, great service--beware of Northside rooms!
review: My husband and I had the privilege of staying at the Sandpearl for his annual sales convention. The grounds are meticulously kept, the staff is friendly and the rooms are well appointed. We were grossly disappointed with our first room, however, on the 4th floor's north side over looking and smelling the dumpsters (room 421). We were able to change to room 619, 2 stories higher and one room closer to the beach. Better view and smell! I highly recommend this hotel; just be careful which room you get. Also highly recommend the smoking Bleu burger at Tate's grill, poolside! (I added white cheddar.) Their basket of fries will easily feed 2-3 adults. (Picture shows basket half empty with plenty left to go around.) Sunset beach view taken by the elevators.

title: Beautiful resort with top notch service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your thoughtful review, we appreciate the high score despite your issues with the room view so thank you for the honesty. I am happy you enjoyed the time you spent here and hopefully you can come back to enjoy some more.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Always as expected. Perfect!
review: Went here for a wedding. Staff is extremely attentive and friendly from the moment we arrived, handing out drinks at the reception desk. Wait staff at the pool and the restaurants also bend over backwards. Room was immaculate. Was upgraded to suite which had washer and dryer and kitchenette. Food at the wedding raised the bar for wedding food. Great resort. Only. What I’ve was I had a partial water view and the noise of the outdoor AC unit was so loud couldn’t enjoy sitting on the balcony or opening doors for fresh air so ask for room away from AC unit.

title: Too much missing
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you were here enjoying a wedding party and found the staff friendly and attentive. I am happy the room was immaculate to you and we are proud of the kitchen for always providing amazing food for the restaurants and catered parties.  Thank you again,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Best resort in town
review: This is our go-to 3-day excursion from a family week in Tampa, FL area. We love it so much that we keep returning.  Can’t beat the location.  Staff is too nice, if that’s possible.  Poolside food is very good.

title: My home away from home.
review: 5. Specifically Wendy Deblinger she is a true asset to your organization and a consummate professional. Wendy never misses an opportunity to enhance your stay. Congratulations Ms. Deblinger and thank you.

title: Very nice beach beach hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much, we are very lucky to have Wendy. I am happy you know her and she has been able to have such a great impact on you and your time here at the hotel.  Best Regards,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Nice place but watch for hidden costs
review: The hotel is nice and the service is very good, but the food quality (breakfast & pool) is not very good. If you don't eat here, this is a very nice hotel with a great beach location. They have Keurig coffee makers and a fridge in each room which is very convenient.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We are happy you like the hotel and thought the service was nice. I apologize that the quality of food was not up to your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay, we always appreciate any and all feedback.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Diva
review: My Dad and I stayed there Dec. 10-12 and enjoyed the stay. The weather didn’t cooperate (cool and windy) so we ended up spending more time indoors then we had hoped. The three star rating is for the additional charges we had to pay. The hotel “deal” on Trip Advisor said $188 per night. Well, that’s where it starts. We upgraded the room to a $234 per night option. We ended up paying over $700 for a two night stay. There is no parking at the hotel so you have to pay either valet or walk a couple blocks to a garage(and pay there). Resort fees, valet, and taxes inflate the bill a little too much. Will find a different place the next time in Clearwater.

title: Mr John Scott
review: Awesome accommodations and service!! The location on Clearwater beach can’t be beat. My wife and I had a great stay! It’s little pricey but well worth it. The staff was friendly and attentive! They even served champagne every day for a few hours down in the lobby!

title: Best Thanksgiving Buffet ever!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience here on Trip Advisor. We are happy you had a great stay and thought the price was worth it. We are always pleased when our guests are happy with their stay and hope you come back and enjoy again.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: First Time in Florida Couple Trip
review: This place had such an incredible ambiance and an extended list of marvelous edibles! Tried a little bit of nearly half of what was available and wished I had a bigger appetite so I could have enjoyed even more! Everything was superb, from the Staff to the view of Clearwater beach!

title: Can't wait to go back
review: Dear Guest,  I feel the same way! Thank you for sharing how pleased you were with our buffet and hope you return to enjoy it again. We will keep providing the food and ambiance to enjoy.  Until next time,  Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Nice and friendly
review: This was a spot on choice for a first time Florida trip with my husband -- a late anniversary travel for us.    I have never been here so my hubby surprised me with a couple trip for our anniversary. He planned the whole trip and I picked this hotel-- really an awesome choice!   The location was superb-- close to a lot of places like restaurants, bars,  convenience stores and tourist spots. It also has its nice front beach area to walk and lounge. The pool is also clean and pleasant (we did not have time to use it though). Our room was nice, spacious and clean. love the smell of their soaps and lotion --I usually bring my own because I do not always enjoy hotel soaps but I really liked the ones that they have here. The restaurant has a very elegant design-- we had a breakfast…

title: Paradise !
review: We arrived at the Sandpearl for a 4-NIGHT stay  after a very stressful week and felt like we had arrived in Paradise.  We had a gorgeous suite overlooking the beautiful pool and exquisite beach.  From the moment we arrived, we felt like a King & Queen starting with the warm, wonderful welcome with a glass of  champagne.  The Front Desk staff registered us in a fast & very friendly way and Bellman, Greg assisted us with our luggage and explained all the amenities of our room and the hotel.  He was wonderful and we were lucky enough to have his assistance again at check-out and he gave us some airport pointers which proved to be extremely helpful.  The resort is AMAZING and we felt we had no reason to leave at all during our stay.  We had every breakfast & all but one dinner at…

title: A lovely place right on the beach, but beware the extras
review: Dear Guest,  We agree this is a paradise that once you arrive you don't need to leave. Thank you for complimenting the staff especially Greg, Michael and CiCi. We look forward to seeing you again.  Until next time, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: A family beach stay at a great hotel
review: Stayed here for 3 nights following a week in Orlando. The resort is lovely - very clean,  staff were really friendly and attentive and it has great facilities like a Starbucks, a fabulous pool, fire pits, outdoor hot spa and beach loungers. Of course all this comes at a cost and the almost $30 a night tax (which means you get pool towels, wi-if and beach loungers for ‘free’), felt a little steep to us, especially when you consider you also have to pay $25 a night for valet parking. So for three nights that worked out at an extra $170, even before you include any bar bills! So it’s fair to say staying here is a bit of a treat and should be looked on that way as it definitely isn’t cheap. Having said all that we throughly enjoyed our stay and our room was great. It really is a…

title: Beach stay after Disney madness
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay after your week in Orlando. Thank you for the compliments about your stay and the recommendation. We hope you decide to treat yourself again.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Another great stay at Sandpearl
review: We stayed here for a week in mid-November and what a truly great time we had. The hotel really is superb, the rooms are large, very comfortable and extremely well maintained by the housekeeping team. We had a city view room (not a gulf view) but the view was still outstanding. The hotel staff are extremely pleasant, hardworking and very helpful - top class service. We loved the pool area and the Tate Island Grill beach bar is a tremendous place to sample a little drink and a bite to eat while relaxing around the hotel pool. The grill staff are very good also - Elaine was particularly pleasant. The Beach though is just sensational. We had a buffet breakfast and Sunday brunch buffet in the hotel - great quality food (if a little pricey) not too be missed. Lots of good quality…

title: Truly Outstanding Service
review: My wife and I just stayed for 4 nights over the Thanksgiving holiday. This was our first visit back to the Sandpearl in about two years, though we have been regular visitors since the property opened.  We were struck by just how attentive the service was.  Everywhere — car valets, front door, bellmen, front desk, beach bar, activities desk — smiling employees were greeting us and focused on helping make our stay the best possible.  Our room fridge seemed a tad warmer than expected and less than a half-hour later a new fridge was installed and on the job.  My guess is there is new ownership or property management since we last visited — I feel I have always been treated well at the Sandpearl but have never felt the need to rave about it before.  The beach is always terrific in…

title: Wonderful stay
review: We spent 4 nights in mid November and were very happy with the studio, heated pool for kids, beach toys and sand quality. Everyone was very accomodating and pleasant. We did not see or hear any noise around the pool or in the lobby. I would definitely book another stay at this hotel.

title: Not worth it
review: Dear Guest,  We are pleased you had a wonderful stay, thank you for sharing with us. It sounds like you were able to have a relaxing get away during a slower time of the year. We hope to see you again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Disappointing Experience
review: I didnt mind the daily 25 dollar fee to valet park(your only option), the daily 30 dollar resort fee, the 25 fee to rent chairs/umbrellas, the extra charge to order pool side and even the 5 bucks for s’mores but if you are going to charge all of the fees, then you have to deliver. Our room was not cleaned until 5 pm, I made a request to the concierge for my wife’s birthday and they forgot about the order. Finally, after staying at resort for 4 days, I asked for a late check out and they refused.  I wouldn’t recommend this place to family or friends, many other options out there than this place.

title: fun and relaxing
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am very sorry to hear that the resort did not live up to your expectations.  We normally clean all rooms between 9am and 430pm and have Turndown Service between 530 and 830.  My apologies if that did not occur.  I am also very sorry that we did not deliver on your request for your wifes birthday.  We handled many requests like that each and every day so I am not sure what happened this instance.  Regarding, your request for a late checkout, we do our best to accommodate when possible but due to occupancy or room type issues, those requests are not always possible.  Again, my apologies.  If you would like to speak regarding your stay, please feel free to reach out to me directly as the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Hotel has gone downhill wouldn't go back
review: Second time to this hotel, first trip fabulous, second awful and won't be returning.  Find out if there are any conferences on before booking your stay as the pool turns into a Vegas style pool party by 1pm.  Adults all getting drunk around the pool. One family brought their own stereo - Thought we were in Magaluff!  Our son who was 2 didnt want to swim due to feeling unsettled and the loudness.  Not great for a family with a young child!  Staff particularly round the pool mostly rude and unhelpful bar a couple. Staff were heard bad mouthing their jobs. Really inappropriate around customers.  Also, staff didnt have a clue about allergies and quite unhelpful, not knowing what to do when it comes to assisting us.  We had to tell the Manager what to do asking to speak to the Head…

title: Outstanding! Superb!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am sorry to hear that your second experience was not the same as your first.    At certain times of the year we do have more conferences than at other times.  Regardless of this, we have a Security Guard around the pool that should be monitoring the volume and behavior of the guests using the pool.  Also, portable speakers are not permitted around the pool.  This will be addressed with our Security Team.  We normally get rave reviews regarding our pool and beach staff.  I am not sure why this day was different.  I will speak with the area manager regarding your comments.  My apologies.  We certainly hope that you change your mind and stay with us again as you have experienced what a true Sandpearl experience is.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Fantastic Resort
review: We stayed at Sandpearl resort in August 2018. The hotel was beautiful and pool was awesome! Room was clean and customer service was okay. We stayed with kids with food allergies and they only had a microwave near ice maker. It was bit inconvenient. However the hotel is in great location and close to nice restaurants. The beach was little far from the hotel but the beach was beautiful. Hotel shuttle service was great! Shuttle driver was very nice and helpful. Only thing that we did not like was that the resort fee doesn’t cover beach chairs and umbrellas. Other than that, we had so much fun at the pool and had a great time. We definitely recommend this hotel and can’t wait to go back!

title: Outstanding
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make a review of your stay. We are delighted you enjoyed yourselves and hope you decide to come and relax with us as soon as you can. Thank you again for the recommendation!  Until next time.  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: We LOVE the Sandpearl Resort!!
review: This is a great location and a very well maintained site. We arrived and was greeted with excellent staff and a glass of champagne. Our room had a fantastic view and was extremely clean and very well maintained. The pool was the best, it was very relaxing. The area was also very nice and safe with lots of options to go out to eat or play. I would definitely return.

title: Nice but pricey
review: Hotel is nice with good services for generally friendly staff. Pool area is nice also for kids, without being a water park. Pool bar is decent priced for a nice hotel. On the downside and more in the details the pool could be cleaned for sand etc before 9-10am (otherwise a clean pool) and the additional charge of 25-30 USD for a umbrella at the otherwise complimentary sun beds at the beach is ridicules when you pay around USD 400 per night incl. resort fee. No need for that wind up.

title: Overdo honeymoon
review: Dear Guest.  Thank you for the honest feedback, we appreciate you taking the time to constructively criticize our operation. We are happy you found the resort to be nice and we hope you choose to stay with us again when you can.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Perfect 10!
review: We were looking for a place close to a large airport, had resort qualities, warm climate and in the United States.  The hotel was spotless and staff was super friendly.   It was a quick ride from the airport. We were there in October and the temperature was in the 80s. The beach was clean, private and sand was amazing. The shops and restaurants in town were all within walking distance.  It wasn’t cheap but the place was perfect.

title: I want to come back!
review: Dear Guest,  We are happy we fit your criteria and lived up to your expectations. October is a great time to come, the weather usually is warm like you experienced but not overwhelmingly humid. Thank you again for the review and compliments, we hope to see you soon.  Best Regards,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great all around
review: Beautiful location and impeccable service in every department equals a perfect choice!  Our stay began at the front desk where Courtney was super helpful! Kathy, breakfast buffet server, and other staff served perfectly and presented enticing and delicious food!  Dave, resort pool staff will help you select the perfect spot for just the right amount of sun desired!  All of the valet staff was prompt and professional. Eric, Bell staff was patient and helpful with our bags and “stuff”. This really is a perfect choice for a Clearwater Beach stay!!

title: Sandpearl resort
review: We are stunned by this grand hotel demonstrating classic decor and restrained elegance. On an amazing and oversized ocean front property. Every detail is perfect, the ocean amazing and amenities over the top. Service is impeccable. Come enjoy

title: Excellent Hotel, Poor customer service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind review. We are lucky to have such a nice property to work at which makes serving you and other guests so natural. We hope you choose to come and stay with us again very soon.   Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Best Beach Vacation Ever
review: The positives from this hotel are many. Its a beautiful hotel with fantastic views.  The rooms are clean, good sized and the facilities are excellent.  The food is good and the staff were friendly and helpful. Felt sorry for the Valet Parking staff running for cars in the heat.  The Hotel Minibus is also extremely handy for short trips in the Clearwater area.  The down side for me was the ridiculous policy of charging $100 a day for incidentals.We went on the third week of our visit after 2 weeks at the parks and I had $1000 left on my prepaid card. At checkin they took $100 from my card for incidental charges which I didnt mind.  However AT NO TIME did the staff say this was actually $100 PER DAY.  I realised after they taken $400 from me. Spoke to the staff who couldnt have…

title: Sandpearl
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your nice comments about the positive aspects of your stay with us.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our resort, pool and beach and food and beverage.  We do place a hold each day for incidentals.  This is not a charge and the hold is released once charges clear.  It is simply to guarantee payment funds are available.  This is normal for hotels and resorts.  Regardless, the Front Desk team should have mentioned this during the check in process.  My apologies.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  We certainly hope that you choose to come and stay with us during your next visit to Florida.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great blend of upscale and casual
review: On the recommendation of two coworkers, I booked a four day stay at this beautiful resort. From the moment we arrived we felt pampered and valued. Our room was clean, well-stocked, and tastefully decorated. The pool area seemed nice, but we came for the beach! The chairs and umbrellas are set a bit away from the shore, but we had a marvelous view across the horizon. Around 9:00 am on our third day, a pod of dolphin entertained us for over an hour-just feet from the shore.   The food in all three restaurants was delicious and reasonably priced. I can’t think of a reason to venture off the resort except maybe to nip over to CVS to buy a couple of bottles of wine (don’t buy a corkscrew-your room has one).   Our next visit (and there will be plenty of nexts) will include at least…

title: Perfect in so many ways
review: We went for a quick weekend and we picked the perfect hotel! From the moment we walked in we were treated w/a  complementary glass of champagne. We had a group of 6 and a few rooms between us. At the drink desk/registration Ted helped us coordinate rooms near to each other and completely met our needs (there were 6 of us from NY we had lots of requests)! Near each other, not across but next to each other, beach side view if possible, close to the elevator..etc! This very professional young Man has it all under control. Ted was our first impression of the sandpearl (besides the champagne and we set off to our rooms saying -he is going to make sure we have a good time and our expectations are met!  We were correct, at certain points he cane to visit us while we were dining…

title: Book here!!
review: Hello Ladies,  Thank you so much for the review, it was very nice meeting all of you. I am happy we were able to make the time you had here memorable and that you all had a good time together. You know where to find us when you are looking for another girls getaway weekend.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Brilliant
review: On Friday afternoon my husband and I decided to leave town for the weekend and sink our toes in the sand. We got a last minute flight from Dallas and came to Clearwater and the staff at Sandpearl truly made this such a memorable stay! From the ladies at the door, Ted at the desk, Taniah at Tates...to Bobby delivering our delicious drinks and food on the beach... we never felt rushed, and always felt welcomed! Thank you for the hospitality and your ability to pay attention to the details that matter so much! We were able to escape our stressful jobs and lifestyles for a weekend and refuel! We will definitely be back!

title: Great Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind words. We are happy you decided to stay with us on your spur of the moment trip and couldn't be happier you were pleased with the experience. We appreciate the names mention as well and will be looking forward to your next booking.  Best regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Overnight Reprieve
review: My family and I went to the restaurant at the hotel. We are staying at the sister resort Opal sands. The dinner was just amazing the service we received from Eric was point on point! I had the ahi tuna and let me say it was a peace of art! The flavors on the plate were just brilliant! Thank you chef! The deserts were delicious and again brilliant.

title: Girls weekend at the beach
review: This is a beautiful resort on a perfect beach! We very much enjoyed our stay.  My mother,  sister and I met there for a long weekend. Perfect sunny weather to enjoy the pool and beach! The only trouble we had was repeatedly asking for 3 cups, coffee pods, towels etc. rather than two and our room seemed to be skipped for general housekeeping (picking up towels, etc) and several lightbulbs were out.  The hotel comped a breakfast for us for these issues which was appreciated.

title: Great Hotel & Fantastic Staff ...but
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review here on Trip Advisor. We certainly appreciate all types of feedback as it helps us manage our operation more successfully. I apologize for the issues you encountered, but thank you again for the review.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: pearl of the gulf area
review: The hotel & staff are fantastic. What i don't understand is the overpriced resort charges. Basically you get a bottle of water for 27+ dollars a day. They wanted us to pay extra for a beach umbrella, which i thought was a rip off. We had daily pool towels, a small fitness suite, and a nightly 'turn down' service - any top European hotel would supply this for free. The charge of 25 dollars a day for valet parking was ok, however, there was no self park option which again stank of a rip off. How about free coffee around the pool ??  On the flip side - the staff are great, nothing was too much trouble, always smiling and always helpful. We decided on the Sandpearl as we thought it was the premium hotel on the island, however, the Hyatt Regency comes out on top because of their self…

title: Beautiful place but could use some slight improvements
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the thoughtful review. I apologize you have found other options you like better due to some standard resort fee and valet parking charges we have here at our property. I hope you change your mind and do decide to return to our resort, however if you don't thank you for staying with us and supplying this review.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: birthday paradise weekend
review: Great view of the gulf, outstanding service make this a pearl of the area. The pool is beautiful, right next to the gulf. Rooms are nicely appointed. I highly recommend this hotel in Clearwater Beach Area

title: If you want a serene hotel - look elsewhere
review: If you are looking for a quiet serene hotel to enjoy, I would highly recommend that you stay somewhere besides the Sandpearl Resort.  While all hotels can have issues, the way in which they are dealt with is what separates a great resort from a hotel.  The challenges I experienced included the rooms not being ready at check-in, the phones not working while staying there, I cut my hand on a staple sticking out of the desk chair and the best was that the windows are single pane which means the band playing across the street was louder than my television at full volume at 9:30 at night on a Wednesday. And the "Evening Supervisor" who I had to walk down to talk to (since there were no phones) wanted me to understand that there is nothing she could do because there were a few…

title: Super hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  I am very sorry to hear that we were not able to immediately get you into your room at Check in.  We do our best to accommodate those requests however getting guests into their room prior than the 4pm arrival is not possible at times.  I also apologize for the maintenance and Housekeeping issues you experienced.  We should have done a better job at managing the noise coming from the restaurant across the street.  We have a good relationship with them and we should have simply walked over and asked them to turn the music down.  I am not sure why that didn't happen.  The local code calls for reduced noise after 10pm, not 930 however I am sure that they would have adjusted their volume.  Again, I am sorry that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  We hope you give us another opportunity in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Pure luxury
review: This was our 2nd visit to the Sandpearl and didn’t disappoint. The rooms are very well maintained. Breakfast you were spoilt for choice. The pool area is excellent and the cafe on the beach was superb, the quality of food was delicious.  The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 was the taxes they were expensive. I’m sure it would put people off going sadly

title: Sandpearl Resort - Fantastic
review: Sandpearl is a beautiful resort with excellent service . Right on a white sandy beach (sea not so good )  Lots of hidden costs resort fee ??? And valet parking a bit expensive .. But in a great location lots of bars n shops just outside hotel . Staff are lovely here too you dont have to get off your sunlounger for a drink if you dont want to staff will bring it to you . Room was fantastic

title: Amazing Brunch
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you found our resort beautiful and enjoyed the local area.   Although not cheap, we hope you found the stay worth the price.  We hope to see you again.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great Vacation
review: My husband and I have not had a resort vacation in years. This place is incredible, the service started out 5 star from the moment we arrived. The pool is wonderful. The beach is gorgeous. Great restaurants too! Yes, we will be back.

title: Not Quite 5 Stars
review: Overall, we had an amazing trip to Clearwater Beach this past weekend (9/13-9/16). We are seasoned travelers and love luxury resorts with quality food, beautiful beaches and good service. We typically go to all inclusive resorts in the Caribbean and Mexico, but decided to give Clearwater a try. I’ll list out the pros and cons of this resorts as well as Clearwater in general.   Pros: We picked this resort over the less expensive hotels in Clearwater mainly because this is one of the only resorts actually on the beach. It seemed the other resorts you had to walk across a road to get to the beach. Not a dealbreaker, but having direct access to the beach was a huge bonus.   The service at this resort was top notch and the reason I would consider coming back. From the servers in the…

title: Good location, but....
review: I went here with my family for vacation and business. Even that I book it in advance and they promise me  2 bedroom in my booking, they just gave me one bedroom room on the day I arrived. Nice, one but for a family  of 4 is not the way I will expected  to pass my vacation sleeping in a spare small bed. Besides of that, beware, no self  parking on place you need to look for one  nearby, in the premises just valet parking. The location is close to the action, restaurants bars, shopping , the beach and aquarium. Good pool but nothing extraordinary.

title: Girls trip
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your honest feedback regarding your recent stay. I am sorry to hear about the issue with your accommodation. We will look into what may have happened. We are happy to hear that you are pleased with our location and pool. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next stay.  Regards,

title: Great times at a great place!
review: Wonderful time celebrating our Mom’s 60th birthday in style. Loved the texting feature and interacting via text. Special thanks to the concierge and poolside staff. Would recommend this resort and would visit again!

title: Disappointed us on our wedding day
review: Every time I think about this I just want to cry! This is why it has taken me 2 months to write a review! After spending nearly 2000 dollars on a suite for 2 nights this hotel severely  disappointed us! We chose this hotel as our wedding was being performed outside the hotel on the beach out front. At check in our room wasn’t ready! We were not early for check in but we had to wait for nearly an hour after arrival as the suite wasn’t ready! We had pre booked dinner through the concierge at the hotel restaurant in advance of arriving! Our wedding was being performed at 7.30 so we booked dinner for 9pm (we had 2 kids with us). On arrival at the restaurant they proceeded to tell us we hadn’t booked! We showed the confirmation that we had booked a table as we had an email from…

title: Great resort hotel!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  We appreciate the feedback.  I am sorry we were not able to get you in the room at the time of your arrival.  We do our best to get our guests in their rooms as soon as possible.  I am sorry that we were not able to accommodate.    I am also very sorry for the issue you experienced on your wedding day.  I know how special that day can be and I apologize that we made things more complicated.  I am not sure what happened with your dinner reservation but I have spoken to our restaurant management regarding situations such as this.  I appears we could have handled things better.  Again, my apologies.  I am hoping that the rest of your stay was better.  We hope you come and visit us in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Tropical getaway in Florida
review: Our family stayed in June and loved it. We had rooms facing inland and over looking the street and the hotel across from us. Our rooms, although a bit smaller than our normal condo, were very nice and well appointed. The room service was very good and tended to our every request. We loved the location, being right on a great part of the beach, and close to many good restaurants so you do not have to drive. We did not eat at the main restaurant but did eat at the bar restaurant a couple times during the day it was good. Full bar with wait staff providing service to the beach chairs immediatly behind the hotel. The pool area is very nice and typically not too crowded. The palms and waterfall make for a pleasant setting.  I highly recommend the Ckear Sky Cafe next door for…

title: Over the top, Incredible and amazing!
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay here at Sandpearl and also that you intend on returning. It sounds like you were able to take advantage of our amenities and spend some quality time here. We are looking forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: If you want a serene luxury resort, look elsewhere
review: The location was tropical and everything about the resort was stellar! What a great place to have an end of the summer business meeting. The wonderful experience began upon arrival and continued with every staff person that we met.

title: Fabulous stay at a beautiful resort
review: This was our first visit to the Sandpearl Resort and it did not disappoint. The rooms are beautiful, and the service was excellent. We had free mimosas upon arrival, and the lobby was just gorgeous. The staff was very good, nothing was too much for them. I want to point out in particular, Ryan M., the manager at the Tate Island Grill. He was very personable, and made sure we got a free dessert for our 25th wedding anniversary celebration. He also went the extra mile and got us reservations at another restaurant and through his phone call, we were treated like royalty at that restaurant, Marina Cantina. It really is the small things that add up, and Ryan added  lot to our stay. We would definitely stay at The Sand Pearl again. And a huge shout out to Ryan. Thanks for making our…

title: Family Vacation
review: Dear Guest,   We are delighted we did not let you down in regards to your first experience. Thank you for sharing your experience with one of our Tate's Managers, Ryan is new to the team and based upon your feedback it sounds like he is fitting right in with the culture. I sincerely appreciate you taking the time to review your stay, we look forward to your next visit.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Lovely location and good service.
review: The facility itself was remarkable kept, very clean and family friendly. Unfortunately,even after three specific requests for rooms close to each other, at booking we were told to call a week out and did. And then again at check in...we were not even on the same floor...very disappointed. The cost to rent beach chairs and umbrellas is expensive with families if multiple umbrellas are required for children and should be part of the resort fees. Beach service was available but slow. Perhaps due to the fact that the resort automatically adds an 18% upcharge on all bills! No incentive to hustle. I have no problem with the added fees if servers are doing their job..some just don't. Pretty location but service not resort quality

title: Stunning
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad to hear that you found our resort well kept, clean and family friendly.  I am sorry we could not accommodate your requests for having the rooms close to each other.  We normally try our best to accommodate these requests however some days are more difficult than others due to arrivals and departures and occupancy levels.    Regarding the fee for umbrellas on the beach, this is something that we implemented to control usage and availability.  Previously we did not charge a fee for umbrellas and we had issues with guests reserving chairs on the beach as well as the pool and then there would be no chairs left for other guests while some families had both locations.  Once we implemented this policy that issue went away and availability opened up.  I am very sorry the service on the beach was slow on the day that you were with us.  Again, thank you for taking the time to visit us.  We hope you decide to come and stay with us in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful beachfront hotel
review: Sent a request for a ocean view via Facebook and had a great room. Lovely spot on the beach and nice food in the beach bar. My only complaint was charging for umbrellas on the beach especially as the pool can get very busy.

title: Not as luxurious as I thought it would be
review: Pool is VERY crowded/ loud. They pack the chairs in like sardines. The pool is not near big enough for # of guests. No adult area at pool.Rooms are standard, not luxurious if that is what you are expecting. Not worth the price.. similar to a Marriott. Beach chairs and umbrellas are very far away from the beach. Beds are hard despite a mattress pad, sheets are starchy. Valet parking is mandatory for a hefty fee and there is a hefty daily resort fee.

title: Great for a trip with kids!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review.    You are correct in saying that the pool can get very crowded during certain times of the year.  The summer months of June and July are normally the months with the highest amount of guests staying with us and chair availability can become an issue.  We do have people monitoring the pool chairs and making sure that only registered guests of the resort are using our pool as well as making sure that guests are not reserving chairs all day long without actually using the chairs.  Regarding the location of the beach chairs, they are about 100 feet from the water.  The reason for this is that we own a portion of the beach in front of the resort however not all the way to the water line.  Our front row of chairs are on our property line and therefore we are permitted to sell Food and Beverage on our private beach.  Again, thank you for your review.  We appreciate the feedback.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel
review: This was my second visit to the resort and this time I came with a group of girls.  We are low key which is good because this is much more of a family resort compared to my last visit.  There were kids/families everywhere.  It wasn't uncommon to have a child start up a conversation with us and we actually enjoyed it, knowing we had 0 responsibilities!  It was a long walk to the ocean and the sand was blazing hot!  Even the area around the pool was burning our feet.  The birds were aggressive if you left food out for even a second near the pool. With that said, the rooms were great, the resort clean and the location perfect!  We really enjoyed ourselves, but would probably choose something more adult for a next trip.  If you're traveling with kids...this is great!

title: Weekend Getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to make a review about your recent Sandpearl experience. It sounds like you were able to enjoy yourselves despite a couple of items you mentioned. Thank you again for the feedback, we hope to have you back again soon.  Best Wishes, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Can’t wait to return!
review: We spent the last two nights of our honeymoon here and the hotel is absolutely stunning. The staff are exceptional here and welcoming from the moment you arrive and we felt so well looked after. They are all so friendly and polite.  The hotel very generously upgraded our room and the room was absolutely unbelievable! Never stayed in such a well equipped and luxury hotel. It was bigger than our flat at home! 😀 views were stunning too.  Lovely cocktails by the pool too...enjoyed those a bit much he he! Really tasty.  Just perhaps as a small pointer (may be an unreasonable point) but one day we went to the beach rather than the pool as there weren’t any beds left by the pool and we thought it was maybe a bit of a shame that umbrellas by the pool were free but if you used the…

title: Beautiful property, outstanding service
review: We spent a long weekend here in a Gulf View King room. We arrived very early, and were surprised that our room was already available. We were in the room by 9:40 am! I had requested an early check-in but was expecting early afternoon, not first thing in the morning. Mimosas from the front desk in hand, we were off to our fourth floor room. The view was stunning, looking south. We could see the pool, the beach, and the Gulf beyond. After settling in, we met our friends on the beach and enjoyed the day on comfy lounges (free for guests) plus umbrella (an extra $29.50 per day with tax) set up by Martin, who was very pleasant and helpful. They mark down on a map who has which spots, so there's never an argument over chairs. Elaine, our server for the day, was the BEST! She made…

title: Pre and post wedding events
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your valuable time in providing a 5 star review of our resort. We appreiciate you mentioning our staff by name, which provided exceptional service. They will definitely be praised accordingly. It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed our restaurants along with other amenities. It is our pleasure to serve you with a welcome beverage and accommodate your requests. Thank you so much for your generous words and thoughtful insight about the Sandpearl Resort. We anxiously look forward to serving you again.  Yours in hospitality,

title: Lovely resort
review: A quite magnificent position -walk out on to the beach and views of the setting sun. The room where the events were held was fine as well. BUT there seemed to be no easy way of getting from the reception area or worse still, in the dark, getting back to it! And the reception staff had, it seemed, no notion that any such event was happening or where! Various guests left literally and metaphorically in the dark....

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl.  I am glad to hear that you like our location on Clearwater Beach.    I am sorry for the confusion on getting from one location of the hotel to the other.  We normally communicate to our entire team the daily activities and locations of events.  I am not sure exactly what happened during your visit with us.  My apologies.  We hope you decide to come and spend more time with us in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Kills me to only give 2 ⭐️
review: My husband and I recently stayed here for a local wedding. The rooms were spacious and clean. Loved the beds.  Our room was not quiet so tidy the first day missing items to make our coffee, forgot to turn down our beds and no chocolate.  Second night much improved. Friendly and accommodating staff.  We were double charged valet parking but they removed it as soon as I notified them. Restaurant and bar were good. Enjoyed the breakfast buffet. Will definitely return.

title: Great Beach
review: My family and I stayed at the Sandpearl Resort recently and had a wonderful time.   We used the hotel provided car service, which was in line with other Tampa car services. The driver was informative and courteous and delivered us to the hotel in good time. Once at the hotel, we were greeted at the from desk with a staff member offering complimentary mimosas.   Our room had a great view of the ocean and was very spacious. I did not give a five star rating due to some house keeping issues, nothing serious, but enough to be annoying.   The hotel restaurants were very good. Tate’s Island Grill, a beach/pool restaurant, was great for what it was. Carreras was very good and very well priced. Our service was great at both.   We typically go to Atlantis in the Bahamas for family…

title: our go to spot
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your time in completing a high rating of our resort. It is nice to hear that you enjoyed many of our amenities and our dining outlets. I agree that Carettas is well priced and provides great service. Thank you for your constructive feedback regarding our housekeeping services. I am sorry there were issues and that there was an annoyance. We certainly thank you for staying with us and are pleased to know that you would come back.  Kind regards,

title: Beach dinner tate‘s
review: We have stayed at this hotel twice. My son lives in Tampa and this is the go to spot for us. The staff are over the top. The first stay we got to check in at 11 and begin our fun weekend. The second time they upgraded us to a suite. We stayed with our son and family. The children love the pool and all the games. We always enjoy the evening by the beach with a campfire smores and evening chats with other guests. The hotel is where we will be staying again, hopefully with more family.

title: A little disappointed
