review: Dear Guest,  It is fantastic to hear that we are your "go to spot". We all definitely try to go above and beyond for our guests and strive to exceed all expectations. It's a pleasure to know that you plan on staying again with your family. We look forward to serving you.  Kind regards,

title: Great location
review: Great place to visit on any night for a casual dinner on the beach. Salads , burgers, quesadillas etc. Great service , watching the sunset, Hearing the ocean . It does not get any better. Great place for tourist and locals .

title: Stunning hotel and location
review: Great hotel right on the clearwater beach. Good sized rooms and great views. Good pool and stunning sunsets right on the beach. Only downside it’s a room only hotel and whilst food it on site, it’s not cheap. There’s a Starbucks in the foyer, but breakfast for a family of 4 of croissants and drinks will be $30.  Service is excellent but you’ll get stung by the $29 per night resort tax and nothing you get for the money helps make up for that cost.

title: A Well Kept Secret....
review: Dear Guest,  Thank your for your time to submit a 5 star rating for the Sandpearl Resort. We are certainly thankful for your patronage and its nice to hear that your view was great. Our resort fee of $29 does have multiple amenities used to accommodate our guests, such as a complimentary shuttle and WFI. Thank you again for your kind words about your stay, and we look forward to your future stay.  Yours in hospitality,

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Our second stay here and we are already planning on returning.   Truly a well kept secret if you’re willing to go a bit higher end.   The hotel is very well cared for and thoughtfully executed from the colors to the service.   They actually even provide a corkscrew in every room knowing that it can easily come in handy for those times you’re having wine cocktails!  Seriously.... a hotel that still provides turndown Service and chocolate every evening deserves a closer look.

title: Relaxing stay and top service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind acknowledgments of our property. We strive to pay attention to the finer details that make your stay pleasurable. Thank you for your future plans to stay with us and we hope to earn a perfect rating from your next review.  Yours in hospitality,

title: Unfortunately I chose to stay here for my Bday...BIG MISTAKE
review: Myself, my husband and our 2 children 10 & 6 stayed for a week at the end of July early August 2018 after 10 days at Disney & Universal & it was wonderful, just what we needed. The room was beautiful, we upgraded to a sea view which was worth it, very clean, modern, maid service & fresh towells daily. Great choice of restaurants, nice pool & on the most breathtaking beach. The staff were all friendly & helpful. We visited the local aquarium which was really lovely and a few local restaurants which were all good. We were even lucky enough to see 2 dolphins playing by the pier which is a short walk from the hotel. An overall lovely relaxing week and we hope to return on our next USA trip!

title: Two stellar visits in the past -- but third time was not the charm
review: We have visited Sandpearl twice in the past two years and had fantastic experiences -- beautiful suites, great service, etc. We traveled last week for our third visit and, unfortunately, this one fell somewhat flat in comparison to past experiences.  We booked a 1BR suite as usual but, by bad luck, seem to have landed ourselves in a bit of a trouble-filled room. I did complain to management about the multitude of issues we had and they were responsive to fixing them, so it doesn't seem quite fair to "ding" them too much here, but it still deserves mention. None of the issues were disastrous (things like multiple burned out lightbulbs and some dirty kitchenware) but they did reflect a basic lack of care/oversight that isn't becoming of a hotel of this caliber.   (One very…

title: Outstanding accommodations!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your time in completing the 4 star rating of the Sandpearl Resort. I am sorry to hear about some of the issues that you encountered during your recent stay. Apologies for your room issues upon arrival as we work hard to assure every room is up to par. I am glad to hear that they were addressed accordingly. We do try to implement the policy that any chair that is vacant for at least an hour, we remove and hold their belongings. We strive to accommodate every guest as the chairs are a priority. Thank you for your constructive feedback as it is certainly valuable. Your patronage is appreciated and we are happy to hear that you plan to return.  Yours in hospitality,

title: BEAUTIFUL CLEAN HOTEL, EXCELLENT STAFF but DEAL -  NOT on private beach
review: Absolutely gorgeous! Clean. Great location.Great staff. Shops and restaurants within walking distance. Beach towels and chairs provided. Very relaxing. Family oriented. Offered us a cocktail upon check-in.

title: Oh My Goodness, what a GEM!
review: Dear Guest,  It's nice to hear that you enjoyed your welcome champagne upon check in. Thank you for your perfect rating of the Sandpearl Resort. We look forward to your next stay.  Kind regards,

title: Great Holiday Resort
review: The pool is beautiful, rooms are clean and nice, staff is amazingly friendly and overall we had a nice time BUT... please be aware that Sandpearl is NOT on a private beach!  It looks like it is!  But is not at all.  There is quite a distance from hotel to water.  Their  " private beach" is a portion with yellow chairs and umbrellas set way too far from beach/water.  You can barely see the water because the rest of the beach in front of you is public and there are so many people, umbrellas and chairs!    I was so very disappointed.  In fact not many of the hotel guests use the yellow lounge chairs and umbrellas because it is so far from water.  You might as well go buy a chair and umbrella at CVS ( right across the street) so that you can set them as close to the water as you…

title: Just Absolutely Beautiful!
review: This place is so incredibly beautiful! The staff go out of their way to please you with most any request you have. The grounds are meticulously kept, the pool was cool and refreshing, the beach directly in front of the hotel was reserved for customers only, the rooms are spacious and very comfortable. I highly recommend getting a partial or full view of the gulf side! The rooms have porches with rockers and side tables for relaxing and taking in the views. This is very family friendly hotel.  They give beach toys out each day for kids to play with along with popcicles. You can enjoy food and drinks on the property, or go across the street to the liquor store for your own mixing. We did not rent a car, just used Uber. There is NO NEED for a car. Walk to dinner, shopping, beach,…

title: Amazing place
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your Beautiful review from your recent stay with us! We are so happy to hear that your stay was pleasurable. We often strive to accommodate families with a wide variety of activities. We also have a complimentary shuttle available per request, as that could help in not needing a car during your stay.  Yours in hospitality,

title: Best time ever
review: We got married at the sand pearl absolutely amazing ! Service was amazing food WOW..... we had a family emergency (my dad) during our ceremony the jumped in took care of him . We have stayed there several times rooms are spacious ,food great , and the pool spa and beach area absolutely stunning .... wish they had a day pass to eat drink use the pool and beach I would be there at least once a week ..... we have had amazing service every time exceptional experience with every penny !

title: Great location
review: Dear Guest,  We are thankful for your time in completing a review of your past stay with us. We WOW our guests as much as possible. It's great to hear that your father was well taken care of. We thank you for enjoying our outlets often as your are a local patron.  Yours in hospitality,

title: Beautiful resort but the rest fails
review: My husband and I stayed at the resort for my high school reunion.   We and my friends had a blast and were completely taken care of by the resort and its fantastic staff/colleagues.   We spent most of the weekend at the hotel.  We all were very happy there.  A huge, special shout out to Sarah from Philly in Carretta's.  She made our stay extra special, memorable, and enjoyable.   We will he back for sure....and look forward to seeing Sarah again.

title: Exquisite
review: Our room was 605, king jr suite.  Lovely, although the safe was a tight fit for my purse.  But what a lovely place from time of arrival.  Valet parking only, but the luggage is delivered to your room.  At check-in you are offered champagne.  I had requested a bottle of champagne delivered to room with chocolate covered strawberries for my husband.  All was there, although, the champagne was hidden in the mini fridge.  The entire staff was delightful, and attentive.  From the drink delivery at pool cabana, and beach cabana- Kyle, and Makenzie were great. The recreation desk manager was helpful, when we approached him about the broken safe in cabana #5.  Russell in the main dining room very knowledgeable, but when listening to the other staff members, we could tell that they all…

title: Nice enough, but very busy
review: We stayed here for 4 nights and very much enjoyed our stay. The room was nice, but had enough issues to make us rethink our next stay. The door to the balcony whistled everytime the wind blew, housekeeping only did turn down service (or would knock at 7AM trying to clean), and thier was alot of water damage in the bathroom. With that said the bed, livignroom and tv system was very nice. Overall teh room was average to above average. The pool however was extremely busy, with little to no chair space.   The beach is world class, but the resort charges $30 to use the umbrella! You can't find shade at the pool and they charge you for it at the beach. Very disappointed in that after the rates and fees they were paid.   Food and drinks were very good and were not overly priced (for…

title: Hotel is lovely but service was mostly terrible
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad to hear that you liked our pool and beach as well as the Food and Beverage offerings.    I apologize for your issues you experienced with Housekeeping.  Our Room Attendants work from 830am to 430pm.  They should knock on the door each morning to find out if guests are occupying the rooms if there is not a Do Not Disturb sign.  They should have went back to the room however to service the room if the room was occupied during their first stop.  My apologies if that did not happen.  Again, thank you for your review of the Sandpearl.  We hope that you give us another chance and visit us in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Disappointing stay
review: We stayed 4 nights at the resort with our 3 children ages 5, 9 and 14.  The 14 yr old also brought a friend.  We booked a 1 Bedroom Suite and later added a King room to the reservation to accommodate the two teenage girls.  We requested that the rooms be near or adjoining.   Three other families were also traveling with us under separate reservations, kids ranging in ages from 3 to 9.   The hotel is nice and the location is great, right on the gorgeous beach.  Rooms were a good size and well appointed.  Check in was smooth with gifts for the kids and mimosas for the adults.    Pool area was nice altho a little small for the size of the hotel.  There was a chronic shortage of pool chairs (only ~ 150 for the entire resort).  Some fun perks for the kids - free popsicles by the…

title: Great resort for events
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your high rating of a 4 from your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. We certainly appreciate your time in completing the review. We thank you for mentioning how well appointed our rooms are and that you had a great vacation. Glad to hear as well that you and your family enjoyed our check in process. We strive to exceed every guests expectations and apologize that we couldn't meet your standards. Your comments are certainly taken seriously and we will have them addressed accordingly. We hope that you chose to stay with us again. We would be delighted to serve you!

title: Lovely beachfront property!
review: 2 Bedroom suite is perfect for families and the location is the best in Clearwater.  The pool is beachside so it is easy to go back and forth and there are delicious drinks and snacks at the bar on the beach.

title: Great location
review: Just checked in.  Our room faces the Gulf as well as the pool so the views are spectacular.  It’s a little too crowded and too many little ones running around for us to say we would come back for some R&R.  Great spot to bring the family.

title: Just about a perfect stay!
review: Rented two rooms for a family vacation, I have to say this is one of the better resorts we have stayed in. Staff was very accommodating, entire resort was clean, cool was perfect especially for small children. And the beach was not crowded at all. Only negative is the nightly Resort and parking fee which came to about 60 bucks a night additional. But.. great Resort and would definitely stay here again

title: Plan on returning! Best vacation ever!
review: Can’t say enough how wonderful SandPearl Resort is! We hope to return possibly next summer(2019). I’m writing this review late, but better late than never. Our daughters age 7 & 9 loved the pool especially when they had movies on the big screen by the pool. We went to Clearwater to visit the Clearwater Marine Hospital and was conviently close to the hotel. The only thing I can think of that I wasn’t made aware of very clearly is that the only parking was valet parking and the charge of the valet parking was automatically charged to our account daily. Other than that, very happy with our stay!

title: Special Experience
review: This is a standout property. The staff were consistently in a good mood and provided great service. The food was outstanding, and the beach was beautiful. Looking forward to staying here again. Highly recommend.

title: Disappointing
review: We stayed her in April 2018 after a week at Disney and was really looking forward to unwinding. On arrival we were shown to a room that upon first impressions was very good with an amazing view or the entire beach however as we opened the doors to go out on the balcony we were hit with what a can only describe as a "roar" from the garage fume extractors on top of the roof. When we complained and asked if there were other rooms available we were shown to a room on a lower floor nearer the garage roof and obviously even noisier we were then shown a 3rd room that the manager admitted overlooked a lively and sometimes noisy restaurant/bar. By this time we just wanted to unpack which we did. The hotel itself is clean and well positioned right on Clearwater beach. After going out one…

title: Relaxing Week after Disney
review: Dear Guest, I am very sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your stay.  I apologize that you did not like the room assignments and we were not able to accommodate you with a better option.  I am also very sorry to hear that we left your door open while returning your laundry.  I will speak to the Housekeeping Department about this as this is a very serious security concern.  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review of your trip.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: I want to give it a 5 star rating....
review: Our family of 5 (3 kids ages 7,5,2) spent a week in a suite after a week of a Disney and the theme parks.  We booked vi Virgin and got inclusive valet parking (which I think you would need).  The suite was spacious (a master room with king bed and en suite), a room with a lounge, Kitchen area and dining table and another bedroom with 2 queen sized beds. Large Jacuzzi bath in the main room which the kids found to be a great novelty. Great powerful air conditioning unlike many hotel rooms.   3 separate balconies with nice views over the pool and the beach  We were at the Sandpearl over the 4th July holiday so it was pretty busy the whole time. When we left on the Monday it was Much much more quiet.   We split our time between the pool and the libel beach. Sun loungers have towels…

title: GULF FRONT ROOMS
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for detailed review of your stay. It sounds like you and your family lived up to all the Sandpearl and Clearwater Beach has to offer. Thank you again for sharing your experience here on Trip Advisor, we will be looking forward to your next visit.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Best ever sunset bar 🌅
review: I really, really wanted to give this hotel a 5 star rating, but I just can't. For the most part it was wonderful. The lobby is beautiful and the pool area is spectacular. The rooms were wonderful as well. They were very spacious and while our balcony didn't directly face the beach we could see both the beach and the bay from it. We looked down on a restaurant which actually was sort of fun if you like to people watch. Many of the Hotel employees were just great. Carlitta from the Philippines who worked the front door particularly comes to mind, but there were others behind the front desk and out by the pool. So why not a 5 star rating? well because of a couple drawbacks. On the first morning I woke to the anticipation of early morning coffee on the balcony. I went to make coffee…

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: I stayed in a suite at the Sandpearl.  There were 5 of us on a girls trip.  The suite was perfect.  It included a room with 2 queen beds, a room with a king size bed, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room and 3 balconies.  The hotel is beautiful.  It was easy to get food and drinks while at the pool.  It took a little longer on the beach.  The staff was really friendly.

title: Satisfied customer
review: Dear Guest,  It sounds like you and your friends enjoyed the 2 Bedroom Gulf Front Suite, perfect for a group that size. We are very happy you all enjoyed yourselves and were able to relax and enjoy the Sandpearl as it was intended to be enjoyed. Start planning your next trip!  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great place for a wedding!
review: Great service, Spectacular Views, Tremendous amenities Excellent food especially the breakfast buffet Great Customer service every attendant pays attention to detail Room sizes were above average, Very clean and well maintained.

title: Another Amazing stay
review: Dear Guest,  I am very pleased you were satisfied with your stay. I love the simple review which still is very informative. Thank you for the compliments, we certainly appreciate them. See you soon.  Many Thanks,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: The only disappointment of a wonderful week in Florida.
review: My best childhood friend had her wedding here this past weekend. What a wonderful place. The food was terrific and the staff was very attentive. The hotel is right on the beach and the pool is nice and big.  The best part about it is that it's within walking distance of tons of shops and restaurant and the Hulk Hogan store!! Pretty pricey for a family to stay though.

title: Loved it
review: Brought my husband and kids here for a brief 4 day, 3 night stay and we loved it so much...already looking at returning next year.  The service all over the property was wonderful.  The food and drinks were delicious. Just cant say anything bad about this hotel.  We had a total rain out on our last day and the resort staff went to work keeping our kids occupied. Great for any group!!

title: Wonderful Resort
review: Dear Guest,  It is great to hear that you are already planning a return visit! Thank you for the compliments on the service, food and beverage as well as our ability to keep your children entertained with the lousy weather. We will be looking forward to having you back at the resort.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Girls' Getaway
review: Hooked our stay based on TripAdvisor reviews.  Thank you - most definitely did not disappoint.   Arrived at 3:00, our room wasn’t ready...so we headed to Tate Grill.  We ate here Each day for lunch.  The frozen rum runner - delish!  The veggie quesadilla and turkey Club wrap - also a do not miss! When we went to our room, I realized I messed up.  King bed, no couch and there are 3 of us.  Called front desk - Mgr Moved us, no questions asked. Rooms are nice- we had the street view, so no balcony.   I will say, drying bathing suits is not easy.  I really only have one complaint.  The refrigerator is in a wood cabinet.  Given its Florida - the condensation is eating the bottom of the cabinet and wreaks of mold.   We couldn’t use drawers as it really stunk. (Room 553) The grounds,…

title: Gorgeous resort
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and your research through Trip Advisor did not disappoint. It is great we were able to accommodate your family with the extra bed in a different room type as well. Thank you as always for the kind review, we will look forward to seeing you in the future.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Average
review: 7 friends went to this resort for a long weekend (Friday to Monday in late June 2018.)  Our first impression was the kindness of the staff when entering the lobby of the building.  Chantel greeted us with a glass of mimosa.  The rooms (city view/double) were very nice and cleaned twice a day by the housekeeping department.  The pool and the beach were very nice and the staff around these areas were very helpful with towels and setting up an umbrella.  We ate at the grill in the pool area(I believe it's called Tate's) and food was very good.  We visited Clear-sky Cafe (I believe owned by Sandpearl) 2x for breakfast as well as lunch.  Delicious food.  The location of this hotel is very close to shops and food, which was nice since guests could walk to nearby shops.  Always this…

title: Dated and Not Worth the 5 Star Price
review: Yes. Excellent location steps from the beach. However, for the price you pay at the Sandpearl, you should have a 5 star experience. As in most of Florida's beachfront resorts, the Sandpearl is dated and in dire need of a total makeover. Dark granite, dated decor, no beach feel. I'm sure the Opal down the street is in better condition, but you will not have the beautiful, expansive beach steps away. Service was good....the only high point of my expensive room. The whole Opal chain is in need of a good updating.

title: Above and Beyond
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  We are happy to hear that you like our location and found our service good.  I am sorry to hear that you do not like the feel of our resort.  We feel that our décor is classical Floridian.  While there are newer hotels with a more modern feel, we prefer the classical relaxed feel the Sandpearl offers.  If you prefer newer more contemporary hotels there are other great options on Clearwater Beach.  Again, thank you for your response.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS!!!!!!
review: We celebrated my wife's birthday with several family members and our 4 month old grand daughter.  The resort went out of their way to ensure that we had a fabulous experience.  The staff at the Sand Pearl are very cordial and very accommodating.  The rooms are very well appointed and quite comfortable.  The resort is very child friendly and there were a large number of families using the pool area, which got quite crowded with a full house.    We rented a cabana for two days and the wait staff from Tate's were outstanding.  They come by regularly to ensure that you have what you need.  The food and drinks from Tate's was excellent.  The Cabana's have a ceiling fan and a TV which gives you a break from the sun and the TV was good to entertain the little one.    We had dinner two…

title: Wedding in Paradise!
review: Dear Guest,   I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Sandpearl Resort! I also am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the service that was provided during your visit. I hope to see you in the future!   Many Thanks,  Kara Masters Front Office Manager

title: First Class Everything
review: We spent last week at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa for our 25th wedding anniversary and it was absolutely amazing!!!! Sandpearl is definitely a step above the rest. Every staff member we met was exceptionally professional and accommodating. They made you feel welcome and willing to accommodate you in any way possible. Even before our arrival the concierge set up transportation from the airport, made reservations at Caretta's (Sandpearl's restaurant), and booked our paddle boarding excursion. They were extremely helpful and efficient with responding to emails.  On check in, we arrived earlier than expected from the airport and our room was available and ready! We also enjoyed our complimentary mimosas made by the sweetest lady. When we entered our room it was fresh and extremely…

title: Amazing massage
review: The Sandpearl is gorgeous resort. I was not able to stay because no vacancies were available. However, I did book massages for myself and friends. The massage itself and massage therapist were fantastic, however other than a steam room and jacuzzi there are no other amenities available, which was a little disappointing.

title: No streaming home security monitoring on Nest cameras
review: Dear Guest,   I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your massage from the Spa here at the Sandpearl Resort. I do appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the future!  Many Thanks,   Kara Masters Front Office Supervisor

title: Beautiful place with excellent service
review: Those folks who depend on home security camera connections, check before you book at Sandpearl.  I have two cameras at home with Nest that work well and got only a still shot every 10 seconds on my iPad Pro and Apple 7 phone at the Sandpearl and could not use the microphone.  I performed a speed test in the hotel and found the download speed to be 10 Mbps.  At home, it's 250 download; 12 upload.  I checked with the hotel office and they confirmed their own download speed test of 10 Mbps.  They said the large amount of users cut down the speed.  However, when I got up briefly at 4 AM, I did another speed test and also got 10 Mbps download.  This speed did not interfere with Wi Fi phone calls but did sometimes timeout some internet sites.  If you depend on the use of streaming…

title: Amazing
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your email regarding your recent stay with us.  Our current wifi system has a 500 meg circuit and a download speed of 10 Mpbs which is adequate to stream movies.  I am not sure what your home system requirements are.  We have not had any other complaints regarding this since we upgraded our system this past year.  I am sorry it did not work for you however.    I do wish that you were able to relax and enjoy other aspects of your stay with us.  We hope that you decide to come back and join us again.  Thank you, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Yeah. You’re gonna want to do this.
review: The Pearl has an enormous beachfront on a beautiful white sand beach, so the setting is second to none. This is a very well-appointed resort that is also compact so it's easy to get around. What makes this worthy of 5/5 is the people. The service was phenomenal from top to bottom. All resort employees we encountered were kind and quick to serve.  Location: Very good. As I mentioned the beach front is superb. Just walk through the gate from the pool and you're on it! Beach chairs set out for you. Umbrellas for a fee. Valet parking only, though. So if you have a car factor that in. But there are a TON of restaurants and activities within walking distance so you really don't need a car. An easy Uber ride to and from TPA.  Rooms: Solid. Very clean and well appointed. Showers were…

title: Just as beautiful as a Caribbean resort
review: I am so glad I chose this place. I could not decide between here or the Opal Sands. We were upgraded to the gulf front junior suite.  The suite was HUGE! Much more spacious that I anticipated. We loved the jacuzzi tub in the room.  The room itself immaculate and spotless. If I really had to press hard to complain it would be the bugs on the porch.  Otherwise the room was close to perfect for a couple.  The staff at the front desk gracious and kind.  The woman that served our mimosas was a wonderful woman from Belgium.  My husband left his wallet at the coffee shop in the lobby. They managed to find us in the gym.  Impressive.  I would certainly go back here. The staff is top notch.  The restaurant on site Caretta on the Gulf? Food was on par with any fine dining restaurant. We…

title: Looking forward to our next trip already!
review: Dear Guest,  I am also glad you chose this place and were satisfied with the facility and the service you received. I am happy you were able to be upgraded and enjoyed the Jr. Suite as well as your interactions with our staff. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Already planning next visit!
review: This was our first time visiting Clearwater and the Sandpearl and we were beyond happy. The service was extraordinary; everyone we met went out of their way to make us feel welcome. From the moment we walked in to smiles and mimosas, to the excellent beach and restaurant/drink service (shout out to Anthony, Jake, Bobby and Alex specifically), we felt like the most specials guests! Jose at the concierge desk was ‘more than elegant’ (as he kindly referred to our attire one evening) and helpful. The rooms were were spacious and clean. Beautiful grounds and views of sunset with lots of family-friendly activities, located north of the pier so it was quiet yet close enough to walk anywhere. We cannot wait to return again for another trip!

title: Do We Really Have to Leave? (AKA "Soul Therapy")
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind review, it means a lot for you to share that you are already looking forward to your next trip. We appreciate the nice comments about the service received and thank you for the name mentions of Anthony, Jake, Bobby, Alex and Jose. We will be here awaiting your return.  Warm Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Amazing service
review: My wife and I visited the Sandpearl the first week of June to celebrate our 29th wedding anniversary.  This was our first visit to the Sandpearl, but I can say without a doubt, it will not be our last!  From the moment we walked in the door and were greeted with the offer of Champaign or a mimosa, I knew we were going to have a wonderful time.  I had requested an early check in as our flight landed in Tampa at 11am.  Sure enough, they had our room ready and we were checked in in less than 2 minutes and on our way to our room.  Not only that, but we had a very nice card and a small plate of chocolate covered strawberries waiting for us, a very nice and appreciated touch! We stayed in a Gulf Front Jr. King suite.  What a beautiful room (I have attached a couple of pictures taken…

title: Mother daughter getaway
review: Great location on the beach. Beautiful hotel with outstanding service. 30 minute Uber ride from Tampa airport. Perfect for our Mother Daugter get away. We stayed in junior suite on a lower floor which had a huge balcony. Comparable to a Ritz Carleton.

title: Beautiful resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing this review of your recent getaway. I am happy to here you had an enjoyable time together relaxing at the resort. Please come join us again for another similar experience.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Excellent stay
review: We really enjoyed our stay here. It is located right on the beach, and it’s pool is wonderful. They provided towels, beach chairs, even boogie boards. Movies at the pool every evening, a great restaurant for breakfast (or any meal) right across the street, easy walk to shops, restaurants, Pier 60. And the resort staff were wonderful. Very helpful, with turn-down service and valet parking (not that we needed it, but it was required). Beautifully maintained. Friendly coffee shop staff, too! Important for those early mornings!

title: The Best Spa Experience Ever ❤️
review: Dear Guest,  You are absolutely right about the early mornings so I am glad the staff was friendly with you as they always are. Thank you for sharing your feedback here on trip advisor, we are delighted you had a pleasant experience with us and look forward to your next stay.  Warm Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Hidden fees and price gouging makes this resort a poor choice
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl in June 2018 with Virgin Holidays and we had the best time. We came as a family of three with a young toddler. We stayed in a city view one bedroom king suite and it provided more than enough space for our small family. The hotel amenities are great, the pool is superb with the lagoon style pool, the shallow area is perfect for small toddlers to splash around in. The cocktails and food at Tate's Grille is great and waited to your sun lounger.  Location is great too, right on the beach with the most amazing sunsets and at the top of the north beach with everything within walking distance on the beach. I would recommend Clear Sky Cafe next door or Beach Shanty Cafe, a 5 min walk, for breakfasts. There's also a convenient CVS across the street. Overall I…

title: Great disappointment!
review: I planned a fun long weekend with my adult daughters and sister. I chose the Sandpearl for its “reputation” and beautiful beach location. Are you kidding me? The prices are inflated , the rooms dated, housekeeping terrible, in fact we were skipped one day, someone’s dirty underwear was left in a drawer and the turn down service was non existent. There was some brights spots including the sun: beach and pool attendants. The outdoor bartenders were resistant to change the TV channel to see the eventual historic Triple Crown Winner despite our patronage at the pool and beach.  The pool was not clean, the jacuzzi unsanitary and the overall atmosphere chaotic. Lastly, a resort fee ??? And valet as only choice for parking??? Overall, a total ripoff and not deserving of its reputation.

title: Terrible stay, very sad.
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review.  I am very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I will share you comments with our Executive Housekeeper regarding the cleanliness of your room.  I will also speak with the pool and beach manager regarding the comments on the cleanliness of the pool.  Again, I am very sorry for the issues you experienced.  We truly wish that you give us another chance to enjoy the true Sandpearl experience.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: The nicest place to stay in Clearwater!
review: Stayed here with family of 8 for 7 days this June.  From the very start the trip went south.  We were called a few weeks ahead of time yo say we were upgraded but sadly our rooms were mixed up at check-in so they had to "move things around".  Sadly we were put in a room that overlooked the sandpearl loading dock and dump.  We were woken every morning to workers loading the trash compactor, delivery vehicles coming and going, and the sweet soothing hum of the resorts HVAC system.  On top of it the sandopearl's signature restaurant has place their meat smoker/grille directly next to their dumpster which runs all day - thus we could never leave our room door open for more than 5 minutes as the room would fill with BBQ smoker stench.  Housekeeping was subpar, and we are yet to get…

title: Overrated
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I am very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay.  I am very sorry for the confusion on your room type as well.  We do our best to accommodate upgrades but sometimes things happen which prevent upgrades from being possible to happen.  I am sorry about your Housekeeping experience.  I will share you comments with our Executive Housekeeper.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your experience please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager.

title: Great location on the beach
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sandpearl from 6/2-6/5 for our 6th wedding anniversary and it was spectacular!!! Check in wasn’t until 4pm, but we arrived early and they let us check in at 2:30 which was fantastic! We were on the 5th floor in a partial gulf view king room and even though we didn’t have the FULL gulf view (those rooms cost extra) it was still quite a view!!! This has been hands down the nicest place we have stayed and one of the best experiences. The front desk girl, Sarah, texted me occasionally to ask how our stay was going and if there was anything she could do. She was the best! She let me know that the Sandpearl offers complimentary shuttle rides to venues around Clearwater so we took that to the aquarium and I just texted when we were ready to come back and…

title: Great Hotel even Better Service!
review: My family and I stayed there during Memorial Day weekend. As soon as arrived we were warmly greeted by Heather at the front desk! She was pleasant, friendly, and smiled to no end! Our room wasn’t ready since we arrived early so, we dropped our bags off in the valet area, and were texted when our room was ready. In the beautiful lobby we were also warmly greeted us by Chantal! Let me tell you about Chantal....She has the spirit of God in her! She is like my long lost auntie! She took care of us Everytime we saw her! Chantal kept our glasses filled with champagne, and conversed with us like she was family! At times, we would just walk over to her just to talk! Her service is impeccable! We stayed in the one bedroom gulf-view room on the 7th floor! I highly recommend that room! We…

title: Great property, but any room other than full ocean view is bad
review: Dear Pamela W  Thank you for leaving the Sandpearl Resort such a lovely review! Chantal is always a favorite of our many guests, I am sure it has something to do with the endless Champagne she pours. I am glad you were able to book one of our Gulf View rooms, the views from these rooms are amazing! We look forward to welcoming you back to the Sandpearl soon.  Kind Regards  Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent Service!
review: Was really looking forward to this hotel, as it came highly recommended by a close friend, as well as the high review on this site.  Overall, the property is very nice, but there is some serious mis-information about the room views.  Two caveats - I'm kind of comparing this vacation to a vacation we took last year where we stayed at the Tween Waters Inn on Captiva Island, FL.  Obviously very different areas since Captiva/Sanibel have a building height restriction and the area is much more low key. Also, we stayed over Mother's Day weekend, and if that wasn't the case, maybe the hotel could've gotten us a full ocean view room a lot easier.    So, back to my actual review - upon entering the hotel, it is super nice.  We get to our room and we are immediately disappointed.  Room is…

title: Weekend get away
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort.  I am happy to hear that you liked several aspects of our resort including our staff, the spa and restaurants.  I am very sorry to hear you did not like the views from our north and south facing rooms.  You are correct in saying that those views are not direct Gulf View rooms and overlook other parts of Clearwater Beach.  The direct Gulf View Rooms do have our premium views and come with a premium price.  In your review you also compared Clearwater Beach to Sanibel and Captiva.  As you stated both areas are very different and it depends on what you are looking for in a vacation when you choose a destination.  Captiva is a much more secluded area with a more tropical feel where Clearwater Beach has more things to do within walking distance.  Both beaches are very nice but Clearwater Beach definitely has the better beach experience.  Again, thank you for your review.  We appreciate the feedback.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Business Trip
review: I took my niece to the Sandpearl over Memorial Day weekend.  The hotel is beautiful however the staff is what made the difference for me.  I travel a lot and they made us feel like we were in particular special to them.  Brittany M. responded to my emails ahead of time working to accommodate our desires.  She was awesome and attentive!  Kaci greeted us as if she was looking forward to hosting us.  Jose went above and beyond at the concierge desk to take care of our luggage, flag down the shuttle service and offer us waters while we waited.  There were so many others just didn't catch their names.  My 16 year old niece had the time of her life and felt very special!  Thank you!

title: Very nice for a 4-star hotel
review: The dated décor and a few minor issues is made for by a very attentive, friendly staff and a beautiful beach. They are definitely due for a complete renovation and need a "real" fitness center other than that very nice place to go if you have a young family.

title: Such a pretty hotel
review: Dear avaynstein  Thank you for sharing this feedback regarding your recent stay. I am glad to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and attentive!   We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Kind Regards  Scott S  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful stay . . . again
review: From in and outside a pretty hotel, everything is super maintained and clean. Nice pool, awesome view at the white sand beach. Reserved area with sunbeds for customers of the hotel. Super location.  Good breakfast buffet or a la carte, quality of the restaurants was also very good. Loved our stay here and would go back here.

title: Love this place
review: Dear  icrazydees1983  Thank you for leaving the Sandpearl this great review! The private beach in front of the Resort is definitely a great bonus for our guests and I am glad that you were able to make full use of this. We hope to welcome you back again soon!   Kind Regards  Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful stay at the Sandpearl
review: Our second time was magic again.  On beach location, modern rooms , great food.  Lots of kids and welcoming atmosphere.  Great location.  On site restaurants are best in Clearwater!  Ask for ocean view room.

title: Mother/Daughter Getaway
review: This is a beautiful and opulent resort.   The service is exceptional.  We were scheduled to arrive at the resort around midnight.  However, due to a flight delay we did not arrive until after 4 am.  Upon our arrival at the resort a gentleman approached our vehicle and let us know they had been waiting for us.  He took our luggage out of the vehicle and once getting our room assignment he took it to our room and turned down the air for us.  The resort is clean, large and offers everything you need.  The pool area is beautiful.  Plenty of loungers with cushions, some with canopies or umbrellas.  There is a large jacuzzi and towel service is included in the daily resort fee.  I highly recommend staying here.

title: Best Luxury Family Beach Getaway!
review: Dear Tammy S  Thank you for taking a moment to write such a wonderful review! We of course look forward to welcoming all our guests to the hotel whatever time they may arrive. We especially know after a long day travelling how great it is to be met by a smiling face and a warm welcome and I am glad to hear this was your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Sandpearl soon.  Kind Regards  Scott S  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great pool and beach, nice accommodations
review: Well worth the money!  Great location and the place is kept up well.  Private beach is great for the family.  Management here is second to none, even compared to its sister resort--Opal Sands located less than a mile away.

title: Amazing Vacation
review: Dear styxx2018  Thank you so much for leaving the Sandpearl this great review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your time here with us and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Kind Regards  Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Love this hitel
review: Travelled with my family including a toddler. The hotel is very nice and rooms are clean and well maintained. Staff is very professional. The pool area is great, especially the zero entry side that is very shallow for toddlers to play. The beach area was great, really soft sand, nice chairs and umbrellas and the water was calm in the mornings. Hotel is an easy walk to restaurants and shops in the area. There is even a playground a few blocks away.

title: Nice Place and Great Location
review: I have stayed here a few times for conferences and the hotel is perfect.  The rooms are nice, over look the sunset into the gulf.  The staff is great, always welcoming and accommodating (greet you with cold champagne).  The beach is world class.  Great workout room and pool.  Plus, you can walk to a million places from here.  Great spot.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear KYTwinTraveler   Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us such a great review. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed all the amenities the resort had to offer and found time to explore the surrounding area!   We look forward to welcoming you back for your next conference or vacation.   Kind Regards  Scott  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Anniversary trip!
review: Great hotel superb facilities,pool and beach very good highly recommended,best hotel in Clearwater ,food and breakfast buffet very good and close to other bars on the beach only slight negative is parking fee and resort fee but overall good.

title: The Best Hotel in Clearwater
review: Dear tommywelsh  Thank you for your review of Sandpearl Resort! As you mentioned the Resort's location is definitely hard to beat and we are glad you got to explore the surrounding area. We hope to see you again soon!   Kind Regards  Scott  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Resort
review: We are here now and loving this resort.  The service has been excellent with ever encounter we’ve had so far. The weather has been hit or miss but we enjoy the pool and beach and run into our comfortable room when it rains. The balcony stays dry and has cute rocking chairs. We are gulf front suite and the view is amazing. The drinks and food at Tate’s are delicious, trying the fine dining tonight. We were even surprised with a anniversary gift of yummy chocolate covered strawberries.  Good location to walk anywhere too.  First trip without kids in 10 years glad we picked this place.

title: Impressive Resort
review: Right upon entrance the Sandpearl Resort welcomes you with a glass of champagne in the spacious, lavishly decorated lobby. The decor is classical, the paintings are wonderful, the staff is all politeness and smiles. You get the idea that this is mostly likely a Five Star resort. And it is.  The exquisite interior design, the layout and cleanliness of public places are so customer-friendly that it's cozy to be in the big lobby, it's pleasant to relax by - or in - the huge pool, it's cool to stand and take pictures near those fantastic waterfalls, you feel welcome in its restaurants, they have multiple shops on the premises, and their spa is ready for you. And just be sure to wear those high-tech polarized glasses when you are on their vast white beach with bright-yellow cabanas…

title: There's a reason we return every year.
review: Dear irina g  Thank you for your wonderful review of the Sandpearl! We really are lucky to work in such a beautiful environment and to have such an amazing beach directly in front of us. Please feel free to come back and visit the property anytime and we do hope you choose to stay with us in the future. I will pass your compliments on to Ted, he is always happy to show people around the Resort and I am glad to hear you found him to be so friendly and professional.   Kind Regards Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Miserable experience
review: We come in May each year for sun and beach getaway and will continue to do so.  Can't beat the facility, location and great service.  We got upgraded to a suite this year which made our stay even more enjoyable.  So many friendly service people such as Lydia at the front entrance.  Pool and service people there are the center piece of our stay.  We order snacks (recommend the grouper nuggets or corn/black bean spread on pita bread) and frozen drinks (recommend rum runner or Sandpearl Sunset) and hang poolside and walk the beach daily.  Can't beat the location on the beach.  We don't ever need to rent a car as we walk to everywhere from here.  Always clean comfortable room.  Carretta's is pricey without being exceptional  and we prefer other dining options.  Sandpearl is perfect…

title: Great Stay! Amazing Service!
review: Dear LBlion  Thank you for taking a moment to leave a review. We are so glad that you once again chose the Sandpearl Resort for your annual vacation. A large percentage of our guests are return visitors who choose to return year after year for the reasons you outlined!   We look forward to welcoming you back next year.   Kind Regards Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wedding
review: My parents stayed at the Sandpearl Resort on Clearwater Beach, FL over the Mother's Day weekend (a gift from her sons) and unfortunately had a very negative experience. When they came down to the restaurant for dinner wearing business attire (in which they had made reservations), the host informed them that they could not be seated because my mother was wearing "open toe shoes." In fact, she was wearing a nice dress with heals that happend to be open toe. However, they were informed "Sorry..you cant come in" by the host and their reservations were cancelled. My parents were so upset that they had to walk down the street to look for a place to eat dinner because the beach resort they were staying at wouldnt allow them to eat in their restaurant bc she didnt have closed toed heels…

title: The Spa! Clay is amazing !
review: I had reflexology on my feet and hands , and a 30 minute scalp massage done by Clay at the Spa at the sandpearl resort was ... amazing! He truly listens to you if you have any special needs or requests, and makes you feel completely pampered like It’s all about you for that 50(or however long) minutes!  He is so personable, and will totally talk to you the whole time if you want to talk, or will let you drift off to la la land ! He really knows his stuff about health, and how massages really affect our body specifically . He it patient and professional yet totally down to earth!

title: 4 1/2 almost 5
review: Dear rousseaunicole   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! I will pass your comments along to Clay and I am sure he will be thrilled to hear you enjoyed your treatment so much. We look forward to your next Spa visit!   Kind Regards Scott Simpson Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Mr
review: Beautiful lobby and view as you come in. Champagne greeting. Upgraded  to a junior king sweet without asking. Room and view were excellent with gulf view.  Staff was nice. Restaurant food in the hotel was very good.  Had a great dinner and sunset at Caretta. Other restaurants within walking distance.  Check out Fusion  cigar lounge (short walk on Mandalay) if you like cigars. Beach was great. The only slight drawback was that the pool was a little small for the amount of people.  Overall, would highly recommend.  We will return.

title: Amazing Family Vacation, Will definitely be returning!
review: Dear tcassano8  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review. Caretta on the Gulf certainly does offer one of the best sunset views found anywhere on Clearwater Beach and I am glad you were able to explore some of the many other options in the area. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Kind Regards Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Incredible
review: Nice place to stay high class enjoyed it workers were good and friendly and helpful definitely go back there again definitely a kid place the restaurant we had brunch awesome the cooks are very good where's a good place to eat dinner brunch breakfast won't be disappointed

title: Loved it!
review: We’ve enjoyed our stay here with no complaints.  Amenities are wonderful and the view from our balcony provided spectacular sunsets.  It is a family oriented resort so keep that in mind,  Staff were friendly and attentive.  Oh, and did I mention the beach?  It is one of the best I’ve ever seen.   Also, the location is prime and within walking distance of several restaurants, businesses and entertainment.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Dave F   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I am glad you were able to enjoy all the resort had to offer including our award winning beach and the many great restaurants that surround the hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Kind Regards Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Lovely mini-moon vacation
review: We stayed here recently for a weeks holiday. Great location for the beach and restaurants and excellent room and hotel quality. It's quite upmarket and you do pay for it, but the attention to detail is with it. Staff at all levels are really nice and helpful. Toiletries each day were very nice and made for a really nice stay. Only things to mention were that we did seem to have a room over the bi collection area which was noisy at times, there was a wedding one night and music was loud until midnight and the lighting could be better in the bathrooms/ These are just a few points to mention, but did not impact massively.

title: Elegant Resort on the beautiful Clearwater beach
review: Dear Alison S   Thank you for taking a moment to reflect on your recent stay. I am glad to hear you found our staff so friendly and helpful, everyone that works here at Sandpearl takes great pride in what they do. I also appreciate your feedback regarding the slight noise issues and the lighting in the bathrooms, we will definitely keep this in mind as we look to continually improve the resort.   Kind Regards Scott Simpson Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Resort, Fantastic Service!
review: What a wonderful hotel. We were greeted by the most lovely gentleman named Rodrick to check us in another offer us a glass of champagne. The entrance to the hotel is bright, clean and absolutely beautifully decorated - Its very grand and classy, Our room was nice and had a Caribbean feel but was slightly small but was still a lovely place to lay you head. Clearwater beach is very beautiful and we had the lovely view of it from our balcony.

title: Fabulous
review: We stayed in a junior queen suite. Gulf view.   Room was fabulous.    Staff always nice acccomodating and pleasant.    Fabulous views.    Very relaxing and enjoyable.   Will definitely go back    Highly recommend     While it is pricey.  It is worth the money. I recommend doing valet parking.   Our housekeeping staff was impeccable and always respectful.   The breakfast buffet was fantastic.

title: Beauty on a beautiful beach
review: Dear Holly W   Thank you so much for leaving us such a great review! The Junior Suites are amazing rooms offering sweeping views and I am glad you found everything else at the resort so incredible. I will pass your kind words on to the Housekeeping team. We hope to see you again soon!  Kind Regards Scott Simpson Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful vacation spot
review: This is a top notch hotel. Exceptional customer service. The beaches in Clearwater are awesome. Like powder. Definitely going back!!! The rooms are nice. The location is great. You can walk to many shops and restaurants. The pool is great for families. Just loved everything!

title: Amazing
review: Dear Vanessa F   Thank you for writing such a wonderful review about your time here at the Sandpearl. The beaches of Clearwater are always voted amongst the best in the world and we are lucky to have them right on our doorstep! We hope that you find time to come back and visit us (and our powdery beaches) again soon.   Kind Regards Scott Simpson Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Bad Customer Service
review: We stayed at Sandpearl for a week in late March and had a fabulous vacation. We traveled over Easter/spring break so the hotel was at capacity, but it never felt "out of control" crowded. We stayed in a suite (it was myself, my husband, and our 2 1/2 year old daughter), and it felt very roomy and comfortable. We were able to have our daughter sleep in a separate room (without getting a 2-bedroom), the bathroom was extremely spacious and nice, and we had a full kitchen. While we did not ever cook meals, it was great to have the fridge, microwave, dishwasher, etc. The room also has a washer/dryer in the bathroom, and they regularly restock it with detergent, which was very convenient since we were there a full week. We also had two balconies with a good view of the beach, even…

title: Awesome! Top Notch! Mother/Daughter Getaway!
review: Just got back from the resort and all I can say is that this place is top notch. From check in to check out the service and friendliness of the staff is unbelievable. Special shout out to Elaine on the beach/pool bar service! She deserves the Employee of the Year award that was given to her! Steve was great on the beach in the morning to help you get your day set up! Buffet breakfast was awesome. The resort is in a great location and offers a shuttle service up and down the Clearwater Beach. Came to the resort for a long mother/daughter getaway. Will come back with the entire family next year!

title: Beautiful
review: Dear KitKat61  We are so glad you enjoyed your time here at the Sandpearl. Thank you for your kind words about the many great aspects of your stay and especially for your shout out to Elaine, she really is a star! We are looking forward to welcoming the full family next year and making that vacation a truly memorable one for all of you.  Kind Regards  Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Lovely resort
review: Great beach location and beautiful facilities. Price reflects this. Staff were very friendly and made the experience more pleasant. Also offers beds in prime beach location for hotel guests only. Free public WiFi also

title: 4 Star Experience - 5 Star Prices
review: Dear Michaela B  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at the Sandpearl and thank you for leaving such a wonderful review. We pride ourselves on the friendliness and helpfulness of our staff and so it was great to see that this was your experience. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!   Kind Regards Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Not very friendly
review: The resort was perfect except that the pool was not heated.  It was too cold for  us to swim in. All the young kids were in the hot tub.  I mentioned it several times and the staff ignored me. Otherwise the resort was five stars.  We swam at the still cool but better than the pool beach.  My son would not participate because he only likes pools it was in the 70’s per the staff.

title: Perfectly situated
review: Lovely hotel right on the beach. We were allocated a huge room with  2 double and one sofa bed, with balcony. We overlooked a side street (city view) which was quite noisy until about 1am but didn’t disturb the children who were exhausted from playing on the superb white sands and in the pool. Pool toys are available to borrow and some evenings you can watch a film from the pool! Close proximity to shops, marina and pier. Staff were all very pleasant and welcoming. Superb breakfast. The resort charges a fee which covers internet access, papers, free sun beds on beach ( charge of $25 for sunshade) and for parking ($25 per night ). There are also additional taxes which put up the price. All of which we were aware of, some were not and were a bit shocked to say the least! I think …

title: Beautiful
review: Dear stroppymare  Thank you for your great review of the Sandpearl! The film we show at the pool is always popular and I am glad you and your family where able to enjoy this. Thank you also for your kind words regarding the staff here at the Resort, we certainly do enjoy what we do! We look forward to welcoming you and the family back again soon.  Kind Regards Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing, family friendly resort
review: Gorgeous hotel with elegant old Florida touches. Came here for business and was impressed with the services offered. Restaurants were wonderful and the hotel is situated right on the beach...perfect. there are actvities for families as well such as smores by campfire, pool and the beach. This is a definite place to return to.

title: Fantastic property right on the beach
review: Dear el4321  Thank you for taking the time to leave a great review! I am glad we were able to make your business trip so enjoyable. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Kind Regards Scott Simpson  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing!
review: We absolutely loved the Sandpearl. Great location near plenty of restaurants and shopping, and obviously being right on the beach is perfect. Could not ask for a better sand.   One of the things that really separates this resort from others is the staff. Kaci was great at check in, answering every question we could have. Manning, the bellhop was very friendly as well, making sure we were comfortable and knew about everything we needed to in the room. You could tell all the employees there really cared about our experience and took pride in their work. I was surprised at the number of times employees there remembered us by name.   We were there with a 4 and 2 year old and they loved the beach and pool, and the beach toys they offered to guests. The s’mores at night were a hit as…

title: Excellent Hotel -- Beautiful property
review: We had a couple of days to spend in Clearwater over the Easter Weekend, so we decided to get a great hotel -- The SandPearl Resort.  Service starts from the moment you arrive -- you walk in and they offer Champagne and mimosas, or just plain water.  They were nice enough to give an early check-in, which let us easily make a jet-skit appointment with some time to spare before so we could get some lunch.  The only bad things about the resort -- you are required to rent bicycles -- it would be nice if there were available gratis -- considering that there are few paths around, and the chances of keeping them for a whole day are minimal.  Secondly, the City of Clearwater has completely messed up traffic patterns on and off the beach -- it can take over an hour on busy weekend days to…

title: Have the Potential to be Great
review: Dear Guest,    Thank you for taking the time to make a review of your recent stay. We are delighted you found the hotel beautiful and enjoyed your stay overall. It is our peak time which is why the beach is so busy. We hope that didn't take away from your experience. Otherwise, we hope you come join us again in the near future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Excellent.
review: We stayed at Sandpearl over a long weekend in March. The property is beautiful and in an excellent location (has white sand beach right in front of hotel, within walking distance to all exciting restaurants in Clearwater). The property is generally well-kept and is 5-Star. The beach is amazing.  However, the service is more like a 2-Star hotel. At check-in, the lady helping us was extremely lazy when answering our questions. Housekeeping was also sub-par. For example, we had asked for the sheets to be changed 4x over the phone on 3 different days and it never got changed during our entire stay. Our son spilled chocolate milk on it and we had to sleep on that the entire stay. When housekeeping delivered our son's crib, he asked for a tip!   The pool is nice, but a bit small. All…

title: Four star service? NO. Trapped in an elevator.
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am happy to hear that you found our resort beautiful and in excellent condition.  I am very sorry for the issue you experienced at Check-in as well as with Housekeeping.  You should not have had to call multiple times for the sheets to be changed.  Also, our associates are trained NOT to ask for tips while providing service.  This is the first time that I am hearing about his happening.  If you find it appropriate, please reach out to me at the resort so that I can get more information from you.  I hope that you decide to come back and visit us again, perhaps during a non-peak time.  I am confident that you will have a better experience.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Don't miss the Sandpearl!
review: Expensive but worth it.. Great property..........Check out all the offers and enjoy the extras.  It may be expensive but the customer service is beyond excellent.  I hope you enjoy your trip and visit. Thanks

title: Love This Place!
review: I returned for a four-night second visit a few weeks ago and, never leaving the property (other than to walk on the beach), I thoroughly enjoyed every minute of it.  The lobby is beautiful, the other common areas and the grounds are lovely, and my room was gorgeous.  This is one of the few places in the world where I will spring for a junior suite, because of the room itself and the view.  I had all of my meals at the Sandpearl, enjoying room service (consistently excellent), Tate's (consistently very good) and Caretta's (outstanding Sunday brunch and great dinner).  (Although I could have done without my waiter continually addressing me as "My Lady" throughout dinner.  I think he thought he was being flattering and charming.  Not so much...I am 53 and definitively non-royal.) …

title: Still great but not quite what it use to be!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us here on Trip Advisor. It sounds like you did have a pleasant stay aside from a few service points which I do apologize for. I am however happy to hear you have intentions on returning to stay with us again in the future and we hope you do.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Very nice, large, busy resort
review: We have been going to Sandpearl ever since it opened like 2008. We love the hotel the pool area and the beautiful white sand beach. We were visiting with friends over Presidents day minor glitch when checking in they had overbooked so one of our rooms we could not get in till next day! Not a real big deal they ended up upgrading us to oceanside Which was fine with us but still an inconvenience.They have very good maid service as we found our rooms spotless every day. Lots of fun stuff to do went on fishing trip caught seven different kinds of fish and restaurant The Baithouse cooked them up for us afterward. The Frenchys are all good eating places. Frenchys saltwater has 5$burger and beer every Monday . Great burger! Lots of shops and places to buy souvenirs nearby.Clearsky cafe…

title: Sandpearl Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out this review and share your recent experience. We are happy you continue to choose to stay with us at Sandpearl and hope you continue to do so in the future. It sounds like you have gotten quite familiar with the local area which is nice. Thank you again for the feedback.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful resort!
review: I just returned form a four night stay at Sandpearl with my husband, 14 year old son and 12 year old daughter. We spent the few days before at Universal so this was planned to be the more relaxing part of our trip. The property is beautiful. Lovely large lobby with a Starbucks like "Marketplace" adjacent selling Coffee, smoothies, bottle juices, beer, cheese, and snacks. We stayed in room 369, a gulf front junior suite on the third floor. It was a very comfortable room for the four of us. While the view from the third floor includes the roof of the beach side restaurant, a nice bonus was that this room is one of just a few on the property that has a large terrance (11 x 11 maybe) instead of a balcony. It serves as an additional living space.   One thing to note that is simply a…

title: Amazing hotel!
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for 5 nights last week, I wish we could have stayed longer!   The hotel is beautiful, when you check in they offer free champagne or mimosas, such a nice touch.  Every single person we encountered that worked for the hotel was friendly, helpful.  They have an ambassador, Chantal, who was such a nice person.  One day she was handing out the champagne, other days she was greeting guests coming in and out of the hotel, she was awesome!   We splurged for an oceanfront junior suite and would not do it any other way.   It was nice to have the seating area, and the balcony was directly facing the beach/sunset.  You could see the water from the shower!!   One of the nicest hotels we have stayed it.   Can't wait to go back again!!

title: Service is outstanding!!!!
review: Dear Guest,  It sounds like you were able to enjoy an excellent stay here at Sandpearl. I agree the junior suite is the way to go, they are great rooms. Thank you for mentioning Chantal our ambassador, she is everyone's best friend. Thank you so much for sharing your experience here, we look forward to your return.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Lots to do and GREAT location!
review: Staff is very attentive and the drinks are perfect. Great beach and perfect for the family to relax. The activities for the kids are perfect to keep them out of my hair. Haha!!!  The rooms, grounds, and facilities are very clean. I spent 6 hours pool side in the cushioned lounge chairs and never was uncomfortable or without drink. Tremendous!!!!  Great place.

title: Lovely resort, mediocre service.
review: Dear Guest,  I am very pleased to hear you were able to relax so comfortable by our pool. We are here to offer that service and so thank you for the feedback that we are executing this. We will be looking forward to your next stay so we can repeat the experience.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Lovely Long Weekend Getaway on the Beach
review: This resort was perfect for our family of six. Ages 17, 15, 12 and 9 and activities for each age. The location right on the beach makes this resort one of the best in Clearwater, their beach attendants were so helpful setting up chairs; there were many toys available frisbees, footballs, volleyballs, sand toys, shovels, you are a very short walk either beachside or roadside to the pier where huge inflatables, a park and at sunset vendors are located. We enjoyed sitting around the fire pits that were on the beach at the hotel also. Highly recommend this hotel for its location and upscale service! Also the rooms were amazing!

title: Spring break
review: We spent three days at the SandPearl in early March and hated to leave. We were welcomed with champagne and spectacular views. Our room was spacious, resort-like, remarkably clean and comfortable for our family of four.   The pool area was beautiful, and also very clean. Service was attentive but not obtrusive. Beautiful cabanas were available daily to rent for added shade and privacy. Each of the staff members that we encountered on property were friendly and very helpful. Access to the vast expanse of award-winning beach was easy and convenient.   This hotel is located in a very commercial district, within easy walking distance to anything we wanted. That said, the resort is well appointed and provided all that we needed on site.   Definitely recommend.

title: Do Do Not Recommend if you expect good service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the thoughtful review. We certainly appreciate the feedback and are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and found the staff to be friendly and helpful. Thank you very much for the recommendation, we hope to see you again soon.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Service does not match the price point
review: Sandpearl Resort  Clearwater FL  566164045  This resort has potential except most of the staff lacks basic consumer service skills. My family is here right now and it’s a struggle every day. If you have a request or question that they don’t have a script or policy for, this is Not the place to stay. Let’s start at check in. We arrived on a Sunday at 2:15pm. 2 of my family members caught a terrible flu and were vomiting and had the diarrhea. I asked for help to get into a room ASAP and the attendant told me they were in the final touches cleaning our room so it should be soon and she put us on the priority list and informed the manager of our needs who was working on it. An hour later, my family in dire need of being anyplace other than a hotel lobby - I checked on our room and…

title: Such a lovely hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I am very sorry for the issues that occurred during your check in.  I hope that the sickness did not last long and your family was able to enjoy the rest of their stay.  I am sorry that we could not get you in the room more quickly.  On busy days it can be difficult to get people in their preferred room type due to availability.  It sounds as though something additional could have been done however.  I am sorry to hear that you did not find out service up to par around the pool as well.  Service throughout the resort is normally something that we get great reviews on.  I apologize for it being a different story in your case.  Again, thank you for your response.    Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Lacking Service Quality
review: A four day stay with poor service on each day.  Amazingly, it was like a comedy of errors.  Hard to imagine consistency with poor service.  It started upon our arrival when the bellman did not assist with taking our luggage out of the car.  Did not open the hotel doors.  That evening the restaurant forgot our appetizer order and ended up comp'ing our drinks. The spa re-scheduled one of our appointments without consulting us.  It was apparent that they were trying to schedule more clients into the space, so moved one of our appointments to an earlier time.  Bathroom/hotel room amenities were not reliably replenished. On our second visit to the hotel restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf, we were told that there were no more tables at 9 PM and that we could eat at the bar.  As I turned…

title: This hotel was the perfect relaxing getaway- except for the beds
review: This place was great from the moment you walk in!  The smell they have pumping in the lobby is like none other.  The resort was clean, everyone was so very friendly and our room was everything we could have imagined.  The balcony, although VERY tiny, did provide a great view of the beach and watching Ridley ring the bell at sunset.  THe pool and beach area were busy, but very peaceful.  This hotel is very pricey, but worth it if you book ahead of time.  The beds were the only thing my girlfriend and I didn't really enjoy.  They could use a comforter and a softer bed in general.  VERY firm.  Two tvs in the suite was a big plus.  I look forward to staying here again soon, but will request a mattress pad and more blankets.

title: Spring Break Heaven
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the thoughtful review. We burn an ocean mist & sea salt scented candle made by Nest Fragrances. These candles burn within the lobby of all Opal Collection hotels and resorts which I like as well. Thank you again for your feedback, we will be looking forward to your return.   Best Regards,  Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Nice cozy resort
review: This hotel is quite fantastic!  Champagne upon check in, lots of smiles and assurances, kids club is fun with great games and activities, gorgeous location on my favorite beach of all time.  White sand, clean, and a private beach for the hotel guests.  While I would love to give this place a 5, I can see the front line people striving for perfection, the follow through of service on the back end isn’t 100%.  We’ll be back, for sure, it’s sort of a sentimental place to visit, with it’s 100+ year old bell on location that has been rung at sun set every night, all these years, from the hotel that sat here before the Sandpearl was built.  We have 5 children aged 7 to 17 and memories of bringing our oldest to this area has captured our hearts.  This hotel is the best place here!  A…

title: Lovely Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the review, we are pleased you find the hotel to be fantastic. We appreciate the feedback and I can reassure you we are constantly striving to be 100% both front and back of the house. We are delighted you have made many memories here and we want nothing more than to have the opportunity to help you make many more.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Warm weather getaway
review: I was here for business.  This appears to be a nice family resort hotel or would be good for even just adults.  The staff was very nice--I was greeted with a mimosa!   The rooms are superior.  Nice touches throughout the stay with turndown service which seems small until you don't get it on the last night (my fault--they stopped by but I was in the shower) and you miss the lights, chocolate, cards, and music.    My one complaint was my view was very third string.  I was a late attendee to this conference and maybe that's all that was available. But I was on the third floor which made for easy walking up and down the stairs but I was facing away from the water so I looked out over the roof.    The common areas were nice and they do a nice job celebrating sunset.  Some cool…

title: Problems with Leaking Bathtub
review: We stayed at Sandpearl Resort the last week of February in 2018. It is a beautiful resort with a great pool. Unfortunately, our room had a bathtub that leaked water into the room next to our bed our first night, leaving the carpet soaked. We immediately notified Sandpearl Resport of the problem, and they said they would fix it by the next morning. They said they did not have any other rooms available for us to switch to at the time. The second day, the bathtub leaked again, adding even more water to the saturated floor. We notified the staff again of the problem, and by the third day the leak was fixed. Unfortunately, the carpet remained soaked for 5 days of our 6 day stay. This left a very musty, mildew smell and was not pleasant to be around at a high end resort. We were very…

title: Excellent Stay!!!!!!!!
