review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am happy to hear that you think our resort is beautiful and our pool is great.    I am very sorry to hear about the leak that occurred in your bathroom.  We do our best to react as quickly as possible when these issues occur.  I am sorry it took a couple of days to correct the issue.  If you would like to contact me directly at the resort to discuss, I would be happy to talk to you about the issue.  Again, thank you for staying with us.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great Room and Service
review: Having visited this area many times,  this was our first time at The Sandpearl.    Outstanding, superb and beyond our expectations.  Well worth the trip from the person at the front door, to the housekeeping you cannot get better service, attention and feel like your important throughout your stay.  Every area of this resort is superb,  we cannot say enough about the employees who could not have been more respectful, pleasant and would do anything for you.  We had a 6th floor room facing the ocean, view was spectacular, very clean and constantly serviced with water and other amenities. We generally do not do buffets but their breakfast buffet was outstanding.  Way beyond anything we have ever had,  There is just not enough space to comment on all aspects of the resort,. …

title: Spa couples message
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for giving everyone the advice to try it, we will hold your promise of them not being disappointed true. We have an amazing staff so thank you for recognizing that as well. We are happy you made it to the Sandpearl after spending time at other hotels in the area so we hope you continue to return to Sandpearl.  With Pleasure, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Outside bar overlooking the beach is the best sunset spot in Clearwater Beach.
review: We went to the Sandpearl for a few days of R&R. The hotel didn't disappoint. Our room was spacious and welcoming. We paid for a partial ocean view. The partial view ended up being a 3/4 ocean view which was great. The pool was comfortable and the beach expansive. Our only concern was the additional costs at the beach for an umbrella. We paid a daily resort fee in addition to our hotel charge. We thought that it covered all the outside fees; it doesn't. Otherwise, a great stay.

title: First class stay at the Sandpearl Resort
review: Our family stayed here Feb 18-21 for a quick family getaway from the cold. I booked us a small oceanfront suite. From the check in to our departure, everything was very pleasant. The customer service and attention to detail here is comparable to a Ritz Carlton.   We rented a vehicle and didn't use it. The hotel is in a great location on the beach and everything is within walking distance. The beach is wide and beautiful. The resort has plenty of beach chairs and like you would expect from a nice resort, you get food and beverage service on the beach. They also do smores nightly at the fire pit.   The pool exceeded our expectations. While the pool is not huge, it is spacious enough and the hotel offers a good variety of pool toys. The pool bar had excellent food. Best I have had…

title: Good experience
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the high recommendation. We certainly appreciate the positive feedback and like knowing our guests are being taken care of. We are happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to your return.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Right on the beach. Large pool. Easy walk to many bars,and restaraunts. Fitness center good; not great. (Could be larger and have more weights). Good service; gave us extended checkout even beyond the late checkout time.

title: Very Luxurious Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate your time in posting your thoughts on our resort and are happy you had a good experience with us. We hope to see you soon.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: perfect location for quick beach getaway!
review: The Sandpearl was a lovely hotel with great facilities and very helpful staff. I don’t like lifts and was put on the 5th floor with the only staircase being a very hot, out of the way set of stairs. We went straight back to the front desk and were helped by a manager who for the very next morning had arranged a move for us (as the night before was completely booked up for Presidents weekend). The room was serviced as soon as the previous occupants checked out which meant straight after breakfast we were able to go straight to the new room for the next 4nights. Pool very nice and the beach was gorgeous, very clean and a good system in place for the private beds/umbrellas etc. Not too keen on Mandalay Avenue itself but maybe that’s because we had just come from Fifth Avenue,…

title: Above and Beyond Excellence
review: We booked this hotel last minute due to a flight cancellation.  Lucky us!!  Upon entering, guests are greeted with smiles and champagne.  EVERY single staff member was polite, cheerful and helpful.  The resort is absolutely elegant and beautiful as are the rooms. Rooms are virtually "spotless".   Breakfast buffet was a bit expensive but just delicious and offered a large variety of items.  We did not eat at the restaurants other than breakfast so I cannot comment on the other dining.  I really enjoyed the Nest bathroom amenities and the fact that they serve Starbucks in the lobby at a little quaint coffee place.  Outside offers a fabulous pool heated year round, 2 hot tubs, fire pits, hammocks, games, bar, open air restaurant, etc.  Beach food and drink service is also provided…

title: Perfect Getaway for Family
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you made the last minute booking here with us at Sandpearl. Thank you for the kind words about our staff and the compliments of our property and amenities. We do our very best to offer all of our guests a pleasant experience and it starts with our people, thank you for recognizing that. We hope to see you soon.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Super place; Super value compared to other FL beach resorts
review: I stayed here in a 1 bedroom suite with my family (kids 3 & 5) It was extremely convenient. The hotel was much nicer than I expected and the service was excellent. The room was clean, the service was great, our rooms were turned over twice a day. A bonus is that the suite comes with a full kitchen (although we did not cook, it was convenient to keep drinks and serve snacks) Also keep in mind, there is no proper grocery store in Clearwater Beach, you would need to go to Clearwater. The suite also had a washer dryer, which was great because I was able to pack light which is hard when traveling with kids (they supply detergent too)  The staff was very professional and eager to help in anyway. They supplied a bucket and shovel for our children upon arrival which was really nice. And…

title: Beautiful Resort, But...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the detailed review and compliments of the resort and your stay. We are very pleased you enjoyed it and are thankful for the additional information you have shared with future guests. We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to your next stay.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great But Not Perfect
review: This might have been our 7th or 8th trip in 10 years.  We love the place, and we have been for both business and pleasure.  It's real value in that it is about 60% of the prices for Aqualina and Breakers (our favorites on the opposite coast), and about 95% of the amenities.  Western afternoon sun and west coast resort, so that works out great!  Great dining, bars, and rooms.  Shopping could be a little better, but we almost never left the resort.  Only suggestion would be to update the sofa bed in the suites, as they are a little in need of repair.  That was an odd and minor thing, though.  This place is really great!

title: Spectacular for work event
review: About 60 of us came here for a private work function event that was held on the gulf lawn.  We were celebrating our 70th company anniversary. The food and service was excellent. We had tables on the gulf lawn, live music and a buffet.  Was thoroughly impressed with the service and set up.

title: Champagne upon checkin...!!!
review: Dear Guest,  We are very happy you enjoyed your event you had here on our Gulf Lawn. We do our best every day to provide our guests with excellent service and when we know we are delivering we are only inspired to continue to do so. I appreciate the review and hope to see you soon.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Business and Pleasure
review: We spent the night of February 6,2018 at the Sand Pearl.  Chantelle was very welcoming with our complimentary glasses of champagne.  It was a fun opportunity for me to speak French with her during our check in process.  Every employee we met at the resort was wonderful and very accommodating. The overall service was impressive.  From someone like myself in the service industry I was very impressed.  Thanks again, from James, Jan and Clayton (Canada) Merci encore un fois, Chantelle !!

title: Perfect Getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind words and review of your recent stay. We take pride in what we do and always love to hear any feedback especially when it is positive. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your return.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Superb property, felt pampered
review: The hotel staff were very good, answered every question I had. The pool bar and grille had the beat burger in town and drinks were ok. The only problem with the room was on fourth floor just above the restaurant and you could smell all the food cooking when you were on the outside balcony . I would stay there again.

title: Surprisingly Upscale
review: We had a four night stay at this resort while I attended a conference at the same place. It was an upscale facility with a very accommodating staff and superb amenities.  The food at Cabretta’s was absolutely delicious. Their beachside Tate’s Island Grill was our favorite.

title: Definition of Superb Customer Service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the nice review of your recent stay at the resort. We are very happy you enjoyed the staff and our amenities, we look forward to seeing you soon.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Becareful of Credit Card Fraud
review: The Sandpearl is the place to go in Clearwater Beach.  From the moment we arrived everything was perfect, including the Mimosa and champagne we received at check in.  We arrived on a Saturday evening to find that we had received a complimentary upgrade to a gulf front one-bedroom suite (I had mentioned while making reservation that we were celebrating our 25-year wedding anniversary).  When we arrived in room we had chocolate covered strawberries with a note congratulating us.  The room was beautiful.  Full western view of the gulf, overlooking the pool area.  Full kitchen (dishwasher, full-sized fridge with icemaker, microwave, Keurig coffee maker), separate bedroom with king sized bed, separate balcony.  Even a washer and dryer.     Sunday was rainy and cool most of the day. …

title: Best brunch ever!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts on your recent stay. We are thrilled you found the property to be of your liking and our staff treated you so kindly as they should. Thank you for choosing to celebrate your anniversary here, congratulations as well and please do come back with your family!  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Roadtrip
review: I recently had a credit card fraud situation at the Sandpearl. When I noticed my credit was billed for a room charge for a reservation I did not make, I contacted the Sandpearl to let them know that there was  something wrong. Calling over the weekend did not help as the manager on duty was limited to the information she could see in their system and would make a note for the accounting department to contact me on Monday since the department is closed over the weekend. After not hearing back from anyone on Monday I called the accounting department directly. After giving the female agent the rundown on what happened, she quickly and simply said that the reservation was made by a third party company called TUI and that I would have to call them directly to dispute the charge. She…

title: Can't Get Enough!
review: From the moment we arrived we felt like royalty.  We were greeted with a glass of champagne upon check in and were informed of all the amenities available to us.  The resort is beautiful and has a private beach.  The restaurants offer great food and drinks at standard resort pricing.  If you want to save a little cash you are walking distance from many other options.  Pier 60 is a short walk and there are tons of activities for everyone to enjoy.  The staff was amazing as was the service they provided.  We visited in November and were fortunate to have wonderful weather.  We cannot wait to go back!

title: beautiful resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with. It is wonderful and exciting to hear you had a memorable time and good weather during your stay.   We hope you can visit us again!  Sincerely,  Brittney Moore

title: Outstanding service!
review: I stayed at the Sandpearl for the NHL all star game , The staff was amazing and couldn't do enough for you and everyone walk around with a smile. This is the 10th time I stayed at this resort and have never been disappointed. if you want a resort where you can have a great time with your family I highly recommend the Sandpearl for your next stay

title: Mr. Grumpy Business Traveller
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a fantastic review. We are delighted to hear you once again enjoyed your stay with us.   We look forward to another great stay next time you visit.   Sincerely, Brittney Moore

title: Beautiful resort!
review: The concierge and front desk staff were wonderful!  We were greeted with smiling faces the moment we arrived. Our friends got engaged and the staff assisted with the surprise. The concierge put rose petals and champagne in their room.  We had a nice dinner at the restaurant in the hotel to celebrate.

title: Beautiful views, friendly staff!
review: We were visiting Clearwater for the day, and one of our party always wanted to see the Sand Pearl. She was not disappointed. From the moment you walk into the lobby, the view is incredible. The staff could not have been friendlier or more accommodating. Thank you Alex for taking the time to give us a mini tour. The rooms are beautiful and we are already planning when we will be booking our weekend getaway! Also, great food and service at the Tate Island Grill, thanks Nicki!

title: Perfection
review: Dear Guest,  We are very happy you decided to come and visit our property and were escorted by Alex. Thank you for the compliments and of course we are now looking forward to having you stay with us. See you soon.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Excellent experience at the Sandpearl
review: The Sandpearl is perfection...from  welcome to checkout.  Location, Service, Amenities, THE VIEW.    We ate at Caretta's on the Gulf which is their restaurant, which was equally as superb.   I wish I could return monthly!

title: Perfect getaway
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you found our resort to be what you consider perfection. We do our very best to always offer that to all of our guests and are quite happy you received that. Come back and see us again soon!  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great resort
review: Superior service, super clean rooms, nice restaurant - all things considered, a first class stay with the Sandpearl Resort!  Ted and Brittany at the front desk - exceptional service! Thanks very much!  Alex

title: Nice resort on a great beach
review: Went during the off-season, January (and it was a bit cold) so not very crowded and hardly anyone at the pool and beach... had it all to ourselves.  Great pool, expansive white sand beach and wonderful view from our room balcony, beach side (a suite with two queen beds and a pull out couch).  Internet was fast and staff was very friendly.  No free breakfast, but many restaurants waling distance from hotel.  The valet was not necessary, we found street parking every night.  The garage across the street was cheaper than we were told by the hotel staff... fyi.  Only complaint we had about the room was that the bathroom had a large "window" to the room that only closed with shutters, no glass.  It was not private enough for us, a family, so we tried to use an extra bed sheet and…

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind comments about our resort and staff members. I am sorry to hear the Junior suite bathroom shutters did not suit your privacy needs as a family perhaps next time you visit you could try a different room type as the junior suite is the only room type that has the shutters.   We look forward to hosting you in the near future.   Warm regards, Brittney Moore

title: Wonderful place, great people & service
review: Spent 4 nights in January 18 at the Sandpearl.  Very nice resort with comfortable room, partial view of beach.  Weather was cold so we didn't get to experience pool or beach( although we were still charged the $25/day resort fee). Staff was very polite and accommodating and hotel was well maintained. Just be aware, this is an expensive stay.

title: Luxurious and relaxing
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. The resort fee is many amenities our guests get to do and use during their stay not a fee for our pool or beach.  I am sorry to hear the weather did not cooperate during your stay, hopefully you will get to visit us again when the weather is nicer.   We truly hope to host you again.   Sincerely, Brittney Moore

title: Great friends great times
review: The room was spacious with coffee & bottled water provided. Internet connection was fast.   What really sets Sandpearl apart are the employees. Everyone was nice and appeared to enjoy their jobs.   The meals at all business functions was great and I was especially pleased with their breakfast buffet.

title: Fantastic resort, gorgeous beach
review: We had a fantastic two nights at this resort. The beach is beautiful as well as the property, pool, and landscaping. Unfortunately, the weather didn't allow us to use the pool, the adjacent grill and hotel lobby where a nice place to spend a relaxing day. The breakfast buffet, and restaurant we're top notch. Couldn't ask for a better stay, short of the weather.

title: 10/10 Recommend for Anyone Vacationing in Florida
review: Dear Guest,  Despite the weather I am very happy you found the resort satisfying. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay and share the kind words about our property. We greatly appreciate that.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful resort with great service
review: I have been coming to Sandpearl Resort with my family for about 5 years now, and it is the only place that I want to stay when I am in Clearwater Beach. They treat you with the best hospitality from the moment you step onto the resort. Wonderful amenities and absolutely beautiful beach. Great food and above and beyond friendly staff. Huge shout out to Steve, Adam, Bill, Melvin, and Elaine on the staff, and a big thank you to Front Desk Manager Ted Palmer who went above and beyond to make our stay exceptional. Would highly recommend this resort!!!

title: Stunning location with old world charm and hospitality
review: Dear Melvin Family,  You are too kind, thank you so much for the compliments and for staying with us again. I hope you all had a great time celebrating your birthday! We look forward to having you all back again.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl Resort - Your Next Vacation Destination
review: Rooms are beautiful. Appreciate the in room amenities. Nest soaps, shampoos, etc are the best. They give you plenty of linens and the sheets are good quality. The staff bend over backwards to help. Grounds are beautiful. Pool was warm like bath water. Well manicured. Beach in front is nice with beautiful white sand. Love the little touches. Serving multiple glass of complementary champagne waiting for our room to be ready was fabulous.

title: Very nice,
review: This is a first class hotel. Greeted with a glass of champagne when checking in. Rooms very good size with upscale touches, as I would expect at the price. There beach front is beautiful  huge soft white "sugar sand." While all that part of the Gulf Coast has this, in front of the Sandpearl it was not crowded. Attractive pool area. Get a room with a balcony that lets you see the ocean. A room facing the street would be a disappointment.  Relatively pleasantly surprised at the price for breakfast and lunch. Not cheap, but not as much as I would have thought. $29/day "resort fee" is just another way of charging you more - I didn't like that "game" they played with pricing. Some minor snags they should have caught - at breakfast coffee cups were smeared with lipstick, the in-room…

title: 2nd visit in 7 years and still maintains quality
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review, we do appreciate your honest feedback as it only helps us better serve you. I apologize for the some of the details we failed to execute as we should. Otherwise I am glad to hear you would come back and stay, we hope you chose to in the near future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: The Best of the Best
review: This was our 2nd visit after 7 years and another great stay.  Last time we came with no children and this time had a 7 year old and 16 year old with us so it was good to experience what the hotel had to offer for the kids.  We arrived at the hotel about 1.30am after a delayed flight and after an efficient check-in were delighted to be be greeted in our room with a card and a large plate of cheese, fruit and crackers which was more than welcome after a long journey!  The hotel has a Starbucks on site which also serves small breakfast items such as bagels, youghurt, porridge etc. It opens at 6am which is great for me as an early riser and somewhere I could do some work on the laptop with plenty of table space and power sockets nearby. The Wi-Fi at the resort is excellent - fast,…

title: Did it again
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind review, it sounds like you and your family enjoyed your stay. I'm happy to hear despite the cooler weather you were able to still get out and make the best of the time here. We look forward to your next visit.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great Family Vacation on the Beach
review: We have been going to the Sandpearl for the last 5 years for our pre-christmas vacation. Everything is 5-star! The service is excellent! Everything about this place is top notch.  From the welcome to the goodbye you will not find a better place to stay in Clearwater Beach.

title: Clearwater Luxury at it's finest
review: We really loved this beautiful hotel - service was excellent from being welcomed at the front door every time we walked in to the complimentary mimosa at check-in to the luxurious bath robes, towels and linens to the housekeeping service and so on. Location is fantastic - just far enough away from Pier 60 to feel like you are on your own private beach but within a 5-10 minute walk to the pier, marina and great restaurants.  Our 2 Queen city view room included a couch and my family of 4 (including two teenagers) had plenty of room.  We were on the side of the building so we were able to view both the bay and the gulf from our balcony.  I thought for the quality, the price was reasonable (I did book at 30% off for 3 or more days).  Because of the time of the year, we did not need…

title: Absolutely great family vacation— again!
review: Dear Guest,  We certainly do appreciate this detailed review, I am very pleased you loved our hotel. Thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you soon in the near future.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: great Christmas
review: Our 6th ( at least?) time to the Sandpearl. Family of five we were joined with three other couples in our family— all had double rooms and we booked a one-bedroom suite. Our stay was absolutely lovely  and we were treated well from beginning to end with one exception. The food was delicious, with a shout-out to Alex, Bobby and Alejandro at Tate’s grille, as well as Morgan, Marstellar (sp?) Sony, Joe and The Matre D’ (who’s name we believe is Paul) from Carettas on the gulf.  Gene, mike, Chantal and especially CC at the concierge desk did everything from assist us making reservations to storing our luggage and the housekeeping staff this time around ( Mariana) were great. Thank you for the shuttle service to dinner for our party of 11! Thanks Gene for taking our family photos!…

title: 4 nights at Sandpearl
review: Dear Guest,  Wow! What a review, thank you so much. It means a lot for you to have had such a great overall stay and for you to remember the names of associates who assisted you. We are delighted you had a great Christmas break and we surely look forward to seeing you again.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Winter 2017
review: My husband and I stay here for 3 days over Christmas. Our room was great, with gulf and pool view.  I thought it was  nice, when our bed was turned down Christmas eve, they left a Christmas ornament, I thought this was a nice touch. The beach was beautiful. Tate Island Grill was excellent the service on the beach was great.  We are planning on returning next Christmas.  The location is the best.

title: Absolutely top notch hotel
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our visit and especially the pool area including the beach. Everything was pristine and clean. We were treated like royalty.  We went to the hotel’s restaurant one evening and there was a very rude lady sitting at the bar using horrible language for everybody to hear including families with small children. The waitress came over and apologized and then the manager came over and comped our meal for the inconvenience. We were very impressed with the maître d’ and all the employees who made our vacation very special. So we are already planning our next trip thank you so much.

title: Beautiful room
review: Dear Guest,  I am pleased you enjoyed your visit and thank you for the compliment about the cleanliness. We do our best to treat all of our guests as royalty because you are the reason we are here. I am also happy to hear you were pleased with your dining experience and our teams resolution to the problem.   Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: My favorite Clearwater beach spot
review: We originally booked a partial gulf view room but the hotel had a sale so we swapped to a gulf-front suite for less than the original price.  What a bargain!  It was a true gulf-front room with the most enormous balcony from where we watched the sunset every evening.  The bed was extremely comfortable, the bathroom enormous and we had a separate seating area too.  The in-room refrigerator was the perfect size for some fruit and wine.  From check-in to check-out we had no complaints, valet parking worked seamlessly, service on the beach was first-class (particular mention to Steve) and food from Tate Island Grill was excellent (thanks Elaine).  The only issue was the seagulls on the beach - something does need to be done about them as they are a nuisance.  A small price to pay…

title: Will never stop wanting to come back to this hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for this detailed review. We appreciate the praise for the specific associates and of your stay. Our apologies for the local seagulls as well, we hope they didn't spoil too much of your peace. We will see you soon!  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: High Expectations!
review: I’ve been hanging out at the Sandpearl for years but recently stayed there in room 516 which was awesome. The kids loved the pool and hot tubs and the food was very good. I loved poolside drinks and Grouper sandwiches as well as sushi dinners at Caretta on the Gulf restaurant. Try it out today.

title: Nice Resort has enough business so Service isn’t a priority
review: My Father recommended I stay at the Sand Pearl since I was passing through Clearwater. It started out well enough over the phone with Brittany holding our two adjoining rooms for our late check-in at midnight. James, the overnight attendant, was nice enough to grant us a later check out time. The rooms were very nice and the mattress and towels were amazing. However, we had a room facing the bar across the street with a band cranking their PA for the entire city of Clearwater to hear. We called downstairs and James informed us that they are well within the law and they can play as loud as they want until 1AM. He went on to add that there isn’t anything the hotel can do.  When I took a shower, there were dried boogers stuck on the back of the tub (I am not making this up) that…

title: Gorgeous, well appointed hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  I appreciate the feedback.  I am very sorry for the Housekeeping issues you experienced as well as the service issue.  You mentioned that you felt that our team didn't care about letting you down.  I am very sorry to hear that.  We take much pride in having happy, friendly, smiley associates who are empathetic to guest issues.  I am not sure what happened in your case but I will look into it.  If you would like to speak personally, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  We hope that you decide to give us another chance during your next visit to Clearwater.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Excellent stay at 5 star ⭐️ resort
review: We had a beautiful king suite.  The bed was extremely comfortable with plenty of comfy pillows.  Huge jacuzzi tub was the highlight for me since I love baths and it was a chilly weekend in FL.  The staff is friendly and efficient, room service was quick, and there is a cafe serving Starbucks on the premises.  Due to the chilly weather, we didn't really use the pool or beach, but the hotel itself was very nice.  The spa looked really great but I didn't use it this time.  The only complaint, as with many folks here, is the $25/day "resort fee".  I would rather the room cost $25 more than charge a separate fee.  It just seems petty.  I don't mind the $25/day valet fee because those guys really hustle and are very much on top of things.  But when I'm already paying a premium for a…

title: Great on the beach Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your experience about the Sandpearl resort, we are delighted to hear you enjoyed most of our facilities. I am sorry to hear you are dissatisfied about the resort fee, we will pass along your message.   We hope to be able to serve you again soon.   Sincerely, Brittney Moore

title: 5 days at the sandpearl
review: Loved this wonderful hotel!  Beautiful hotel, excellent room, wonderful pool & right on a private beach. The chairs by the pool were those found only at high end resorts.  The staff was attentive but didn’t hover.  Booking with no knowledge of the area, I found it to be a great location!  I enjoyed getting a text from staff checking to see that all our needs were being met. I stayed in November with my husband & 18 year old daughter & each of us loved this hotel!  💕 I highly recommend it and will definitely stay here again if we return to Clearwater!

title: Top notch resort hotel!
review: Having done quite a bit of traveling, I’m willing to say this is now among my favorite hotels!  We were greeted as welcome guests, and offered refreshments (lovely glass of champagne) immediately. Every single member of the staff throughout our stay was professional, yet extremely friendly and helpful.  The room was quite large and very comfortable, as was the bathroom, which is stocked with large fluffy towels.  Our original 5th floor room had a gulf view, but unfortunately the hotel dumpsters were directly below the balcony. Since it’s “low season” and the hotel was not fully booked, we mentioned our view to the front desk and were very graciously accommodated with a beautiful pool and gulf view. It scores quite a few points with me when an establishment chooses public…

title: Jose the concierge is the best and makes this hotel
review: Dear Guest,  It is our pleasure to have you add us to your list of favorite hotels. I am happy our staff treated you very well and we were able to get you into a more suitable room. Thank you for the compliments and the review, we hope to see you soon.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Overall pretty good but not perfect
review: Jose at the concierge makes this hotel the best and most amazing experience. If it was up to me I would make him the owner he does his job with love I swear if I come back I would stay here just for him anyways this place is great to relax ask Jose for places and what to do where to go and what to eat

title: Not as good as it used to be
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for recognizing Jose for making your stay the amazing experience it was. I hope you did enjoy other areas of the hotel but again thank you for the compliments of our concierge Jose. We hope to see you again.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful Resort!
review: We stayed at SandPearl resort for 4 nights in early October, 3 kids and 2 adults.  The location is excellent, can walk to many restaurants and shops.  The lobby is nicely decorated, and the pool is nice.  They have cornhole and ping pong set up by the pool which the kids liked.  The rooms were nice and clean.  We got a suite with a kitchen and the kitchen could have been a little better stocked, as we did try to have a couple meals in the room.  The disposal under the kitchen sink broke while we were there and started leaking water on the kitchen floor, but to their credit they did fix it quickly.  A few downsides.  Sometimes the valet guys seemed to not have their act together. One time they couldn't find my vehicle and after about 20 minutes located it in the hotel's employee…

title: Good service, good food, but not a 5 star facility
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl to attend a wedding at a nearby yacht club. We were very pleased with the service and friendliness throughout our stay. We were pleasantly surprised with an upgrade to a suite at checkin. And, while breakfasts were the only meals we had there, the food and breakfast buffet was very good. I also enjoyed a massage at the spa. The let down for us was the facility. The hotel and spa seemed to have a tired look as if the paint and maintenance wasn’t quite up to par. The bar area was reminiscent of a Holiday inn. I make a comparison to the Don Cesar, which is close by. It is immaculate and exceedingly well maintained and has an elegance the Sandpearl lacks. I feel the Sandpearl strives to be elevated, but just misses the mark.

title: Beautiful Hotel, Beautiful Location
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to offer a review of your stay. We appreciate the feedback always and are happy the staff were friendly and you did enjoy the overall experience.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Better Than Ever
review: We stayed here 3 days in October.  It was our first time at this hotel.  The room was a little small for a suite, but was updated and very clean.  We brought food and had everything we needed for meals in the room - refrigerator, stove, microwave, coffee maker (K-cup).  The view from the balcony was beautiful with wonderful sunsets over the ocean.  The room also overlooked the pool and grounds, and every night there seemed to be some type of function such as a wedding, but it was actually enjoyable as we could sit on the balcony and listen to the music.  The check in staff and valet were ok, professionable but not overly welcoming as I would expect in a luxury resort.  Although the champagne at check in is a great touch.  Suggestion to the hotel though - have something for the…

title: Girl’s Trip 2017
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy we did not let you down and you can't wait to return. You will have to so your girls can get the sparkling apple cider which is our non-alcoholic offering upon check in, I am sorry we didn't offer that to you. Otherwise it sounds like you had a relaxing and enjoyable experience just as you should. We hope to see you again soon.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl 5 star resort that misses on Service
review: My wife and I have been going to the Sandpearl for six years now.  The first visits in 2012 and 2013 were pretty phenomenal.  The rooms and the grounds were immaculate.  We were out on the beach one day and an executive of the resort was out picking up cigarette butts.  It was incredible to watch.  2014 was just ok and 2015 was a bust.  The beach area was not taken care of.  The rooms were still clean but carpets in the halls were worn and not overly clean.  We both got the impression that the staff could care less if we were there or not.  It was bad enough that we had to talk ourselves into going back in 2016.  We were glad that we did as things had improved dramatically.  This year (2017) was phenomenal!  The resort was spotless and so well taken care of.  Our room was as…

title: Amazing Girl's Trip
review: Spent 4 days and 3 nights at the Sandpearl for our annual Girl's Trip. This year we were celebrating our 40th birthdays! The Sandpearl pampered us and made this trip extra special. They delivered chocolate covered strawberries and prosecco to the room on the house for the occasion. Anything we requested was quickly brought to our room. The front desk desk was so friendly and nice. They even got us into our room early when we arrived before check-in. The concierge gave us great dining tips. The staff at the pool and beach were wonderful and fun too. They would set up our chairs and towels for our entire group each day and give us tips as to the best chairs depending on how much sun or shade we wanted that day. Elaine took great care of us as far as food/drink went at the pool and…

title: Beware - Overrated
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write this thoughtful review, we sincerely appreciate all of the feedback and compliments. It sounds like you and all the girls had quite an enjoyable weekend and were able to experience the resort as it was intended to be. Thank you again for the recommendation and all the kind words, we will be looking forward to you and all yours next trip.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Gorgeous Resort
review: We cannot understand why this place is rated so highly here - but we suspect much of it is from the past, because the Sandpearl is going downhill fast. They clearly have significant top down management issues. There are far better options on Clearwater Beach. We planned a 3 week vacation and booked three different hotels. All three were from an article we read online ranking the top 10 resorts in Florida. The first two resorts were amazing - the Sandpearl simply does not belong.   First the good.  The beach/location is world class (and we've travelled the world). Mind you every location on Clearwater is worldclass. The rooms are comfortable and very clean.   The bad. The pool is freezing cold. We're cold water divers and are used to very cold water, but this pool is rediculous.…

title: Hotel lost reservation and our room
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.    I am very sorry for the temperature of the pool during your stay.  We have a Geo-Thermal heated pool, and while it is good for the environment when it breaks down it takes a few days longer to get repaired.  While this is not the first time it has had issues with temperature (it is perhaps the third in 10 years) the inappropriate statement made by one of our associates is not correct, it does not break down every year at this time.  I am also sorry about the interactions with our Valet Department.  I will share your comments with our Front Office Management Team.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay with us, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort
review: Gorgeous property. The staff went out of their way to make sure our stay was memorable. Everyone from the greaters who opened the front door to the towel/activity people were very gracious. Carettas Reatauant was amazing. It was our anniversary and Nate, our waiter, went above and beyond to make our meal special.  The sunsets from our balcony were amazing. I highly recommend the Sandpearl Resort.

title: Very nice hotel on the beach
review: Stayed for a second time recently.  First was with a small conference and for various reasons didn't write a review.  This is a very nice property.  Had a suite with full kitchen, had a plan with free breakfast every day.  Great view of this beautiful beach from our balconies, even with quite a few kids there over the holiday weekend was quiet.  Beach is wonderful and broad.  Staff is extremely helpful, noticed no regular coffee for the coffeemaker one morning and they delivered a number of packs within about 10 minutes.  Small beach restaurant was good, big restaurant was very good.  A number of good options for eating within walking distance.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: 2nd visit
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy you have come back to stay with us after being here for a different experience at your conference. It is great you were able to enjoy some peace around the resort and found our staff to be very helpful. That is very good news you would stay here again, we hope you do.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Fun family vacation
review: This was my second visit to this hotel and i found a nicer experience than the first it was quieter as it was a mid week visit and the staff apeared to be more attentive this time and i was given a nicer room on level 3 ,it was nice to be greeted by chantel the hotel ambassador and given a cool drink pool and beach are nice , my only complaint is this $25 plus state tax valet parking fee which i find excessive but over all a pleasent stay

title: Best getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review of your recent stay, I am pleased you felt like you received more attention and we were able to upgrade your room. We will be looking forward to your third visit.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous!
review: Our stay started off with some hiccups, but ended up being lovely overall. We were greeted with champagne (alcoholic for parents and non alcoholic for the little one) and a beach bucket and shovel, which was a very nice touch. Our suite was gorgeous and very clean and spacious. Unfortunately, it directly overlooked an extremely loud festival with rock music that blared all afternoon and late into the night. We could loudly hear every word and it sounded like the rock band was literally in our room. Had it been an adults only trip this wouldn't have been a problem, but with our 3 year old in tow noise made nap time and bed time extremely challenging. We called and asked to be moved because we had requested a quiet room, but were told sorry no other rooms were available and…

title: Not what we expected...disappointing!
review: Here for 6 nights to rest after visiting the Disney parks in Orlando. This hotel is in a great location and beach is beautiful. The valet/restaurant/bar/beach staff are brilliant and very helpful and friendly. However we are left disappointed with the hotel. Our room is dated and in need of modernisation, we have found sheets stained and we were unable to leave the balcony door open due to the noise of the extractor fans. The swimming pool heater has broken down and the pool is freezing. Very disappointing for our little girl. The hotel lobby and main restaurant are also really really cold luckily there are lots of restaurants near by. We had to go to a local shop and buy jumpers!  We are left disappointed with the hotel so much so that we have decided to leave earlier than…

title: Not great
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I am very sorry that you were not happy with your stay.  During your stay we did experience a cold spell and it does take a bit of time to get the public space back to normal.  I am sorry that this occurred during your stay.  Also during that time we experienced issues with our pool heater.  As a LEED Certified hotel we have a Geo-Thermal pool which is great for our environment however when it breaks down, it takes a few days to get the necessary parts to repair it.  The pool has been repaired and is currently back to its normal temperature.  I am also sorry for the Housekeeping issues you experienced and will review your comments with our Executive Housekeeper.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: An amazing hotel in an amazing place
review: We had booked this hotel for 6 nights to relax after having stayed at Four Seasons Resort Orlando for 6 nights as part of our Disney trip. Unfortunately this hotel did not meet our expectations. The hotel lobby, restaurants and corridors were freezing and they could not change the temperatures that seemed to be set centrally. The kids club was not in the best of conditions and seemed out of action.   The hotel staff we met were great. We cut short our stay to 4 nights and decided to head back to Orlando. The staff at reception did not even ask why would we cut our stay short and if everything was ok!!!!

title: Perfect spot on the beach
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I am very sorry that we failed to live up to your expectations.  During the time you were here, we experienced a cold spell and it does take a little bit of time to get the temperature adjusted in our public space but we should have acted proactively.  I am also sorry about the condition of the Kids Club during your stay.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay with us, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Large Corporate Event
review: This hotel is lovely, from the minute you pull upside you know your in for something special. All staff are so friendly and cant do enough for you.   We had a really good day lazing around on the beach, your staff member who works between the bar and beach deserves a special mention ( i wish i could remember his name ) he doesnt stop and nothing is too much for him. Watching the sunset on the beach is also a must We are already planning our next trip to Sandpearl and just hope it can be longer than a weekend next time.

title: Luxury At Its Finest
review: From the minute you arrive, the highly trained and friendly staff has you feeling like you are their most important guest.  Upon entering I was greeted with a mimosa as I admired the expansive view of the pool and Gulf of Mexico from the beautiful lobby.  My room was large, clean, and the bed was super comfortable.  As I was here on business, I was unable to enjoy the spa and fitness center which over look the gulf.  There are endless ways to entertain yourself with life-size chess and corn hole games on the activities lawn, the pool, great restaurants, and of course the beach.  If I could give more stars I would, due to their staff which anticipated your every need before you had them.  Looking forward to returning for pleasure next time.

title: Wonderful, relaxing stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for the kind review. We are very happy you felt appreciated and comfortable here due to the care of our wonderful team. Hopefully next time you do get to relax a bit more and enjoy the resort with a different experience.  Always, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Splurged and worth every penny!
review: The Sandpearl is located directly on the fantastic Clearwater beach. The hotel is excellent, well maintained with friendly, helpful staff. Our rooms were large and housekeeping would visit during the early evening and leave chocolates on the bed, turn down your bed, draw the curtains and put a light on for when you returned which was a nice touch. We had a bay view room but would pay the extra and have a sea view room when we return as the views from the hotel of the beach/sea are simply out of this world. Pool area is lovely, beds are close together but as it wasn't packed out when we were there this didn't cause any issues. The beds round the pool are some of the comfiest we have come across. Fire pit on the beach on an evening is a pleasant way to round off an evening. The…

title: Beautiful Beach - Beautiful Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for this thoughtful review and the compliments about the hotel and our staff. I am very pleased you were able to enjoy many aspects of our resort while enjoying the sunsets and the beach. We hope you are able to return and enjoy it all over again soon.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Another great trip to the Sandpearl
review: We absolutely loved how spoiled we were! We had a room on the 6th floor facing the gulf. The room was clean and lovely.  My only complaint is the weird ‘window shutters’ in the bathroom above the bathtub that open up to the room.  Even closed, it felt like you still weren’t completely private. But it wouldn’t change my rating...just a nuance of mine. Wonderful housekeepers who seemed to always be on our floor and cheerful. Never had I been to a hotel that even left the makeup mirror on at turn-down service. (I guess they knew I needed to wash my face!)  Every day, the front doors were opened for us, we were greeted with happy people, concerned about our comfort (not over the top), offered cold bottles of water and mimosas.  The pool area is well maintained and beautiful, plenty…

title: Great Location - Great Pool - Clean!
review: We visit Clearwater Beach at least once a year, and when we do, we stay at The SandPearl.  We love the Rooms, Staff, Service and Food.   The location is one of the best in the area.  Everything is within walking distance from this resort.

title: Beach, sun and fun
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted you love to visit here and you choose to stay with us here at Sandpearl. I am very pleased you have enjoyed the rooms, our staff as well as the service and food. We will be looking forward to your next stay.  Best Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Amazing!
review: Fantastic location, wonderful service throughout the resort & excellent on-site restaurant.  Room was spacious, well decorated, clean and modern.  Great choice for a family vacation.  Downsides were a $25 charge for the use of beach umbrellas & the ubiquitous resort fee ( if not for the beach umbrella then for what?).  Had a great experience though & highly recommend.

title: Sand pearl
review: Dear Guest,  I am pleased you had a great experience and we do thank you for the recommendation. It sounds like you and your family were able to truly enjoy what we have to offer here at Sandpearl. We will be looking forward to your next visit.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Best Resort to stay in Clearwater Beach
review: This the place to be if you want to be treated lIke royalty. You are going to have to search hard to be treated any better. Food,staff,rooms, all amazing! You will want for nothing. Highly recommend this hotel for your Clearwater stay. And the beach! flour like sand as you see in the Caribbean. Don't  pass up an opportunity to treat yourself to a stay at this amazing hotel.

title: Pleasantly surprised by this resort
review: Five of my girlfriends and I chose this resort for a weekend getaway/girls trip months ago.  We chose the location in part for the direct flight out of our city, and reasonable cost to do so.  We were able to find a suite, an adjoining room that included a king bedroom with attached kitchen and dining and living room, with adjoining double queen bedroom.  For the shared price it fit our budget.  None of us really had any experience with the resort but had read some nice reviews online.    Upon arriving we were greeted with glasses of champagne, a nice touch.  The only other time I received a welcome drink was in Mexico at an all inclusive resort.  Check in was seamless and easy.  Our rooms were as described, clean, and the beds were very comfortable.  We found the pool and pool…

title: Top notch resort
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to hear you and your girlfriends had a pleasant stay and that we were able to met your expectations.   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We hope to host you again.  Sincerely, Brittney Moore

title: High end resort - treat you like you are very special
review: This resort is amazing, and the only bad part is we had to leave!!! The amenities are so nice from the spa to the pools to the exercise classes, this resort offers it all!! We stayed from the end of September to the first of October. The rooms were so spacious and cozy, the view from the balcony was to die for !! The spa was incredible, I would suggest everyone to go at least once, I got my first massage there and it was incredible! From the complimentary champaign at check in to the point you check out this hotel truely treats each guests every need ! It is expensive to stay here, but unlike other expensive hotels you can truely tell where the money is going. I am counting down the days till we can come back!!

title: beautiful resort in a great place
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are thrilled to hear you had an amazing experience with us!   We hope to see you again in the near future.   Sincerely, Brittney Moore

title: Amazing beach stop after Disney - beautiful beach
review: This is more like a high end Caribbean resort. The service is impeccable, and friendly in lobby, around the resort and the pool area. Plenty of chairs and towels - very kid friendly.  Rooms were very, very nice, with all the amenities.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Beautiful resort beautiful beach
review: From the moment you enter the sandpearl resort, you are surrounded by elegance. From the complimentary champagne at check in, to the friendly staff, the beautiful decor, and gorgeous beach. On top of that, it’s kid friendly. My kids, 3 and 5, loved the shovels and buckets they received as well as the activity desk where they could get inner tubes, rafts, etc. I highly recommend this resort for families.

title: Another fantastic stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. It is exciting to hear you and your family were able to enjoy all the amenities the Sandpearl has to offer.   Thank you for staying and we hope to see you again.   Sincerely, Brittney Moore

title: Awesome 5 Day Stay,
review: Had another fantastic stay at the Sandpearl.  This place has the best location and beach in Clearwater.  The hotel is beautiful.  The rooms are spacious.  The views are fantastic.  But what sets the Sandpearl apart for me, is the service and the employees.  From the second you walk up to entrance, until you leave, you are treated like royalty.  Lydia is fantastic at the front door.  So helpful and always polite and charming.  Steve and his protégé, Pablo, on the beach getting your towels and chairs and umbrellas and just making sure you are comfortable.  They are absolute studs.  and then there are the beach servers.  Those people work hard, but they are always smiling.  Kudos to turiah, Elaine and bobby for the fantastic service.  Those cats put on the miles in that hot sun…

title: Beach gem
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are delighted to hear you had a fantastic stay. As we pride ourselves on our employees and service it is thrilling to hear this is one of the reasons you keep coming back.   We certainly hope to see you again in the near future.   Sincerely, Brittney Moore

title: Birthday Suprise
review: Just got home from five nights at the hotel. Loved every minute of it. Have no complaints at all.  Employees were great, rooms perfect, food was good. Beach was fabulous!  And you can't beat the sunsets.

title: Not worth the money. Quality going down.
review: My husband and I have stayed here several times before. We stay here for special occasions. The hotel is beautiful and has a breathtaking view of the gulf. This time, however, we felt the hotel is no longer worth the amount of money we paid and the quality is going down.  Upon arriving, I needed a tissue and found no tissue box in the bathroom (no big deal). However, when I went to get toilet paper to use instead of a tissue, I noticed the floor area around toilet was dirty. Later in the day, when I went to hang up my towel after showering, the towel bar broke off. I went to use the microwave located in the ice room. The microwave was dirty and the area itself smelled like garbage. Later in the day, I walked passed the area again and a man commented that the smell was pungent.…

title: Dirty Rooms Barking dogs
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  I am very sorry for the issues you experienced and that we did not deliver the experience that you have received in the past.  I can tell you that service is our number 1 priority and is as important today as the day we opened.  I have spoken to our Executive Housekeeper regarding your comments to find out why and how these issues occurred.  They have been addressed and corrected with the team.  I also apologize for the Maintenance issue with the lock.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay with us please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: A Clearwater gem
review: Returned here after having a positive stay unfortunately this was not the case this time. On arrival I parked my car out front as we did not have a booking, I was approached by a valet who asked if I had a reservation and demanded my car keys I explained I do not want Valet parking until I have booked a room, he made it very clear to me he was in charge and if I do not give him the keys I have to move the car. Nice way to be greeted. Made our reservation and went to our room, we had only been in the room 5 minutes when we could hear what sounded like a large dog barking, I understand it is a pet friendly hotel but not all guests want that. Pet friendly hotels should put guests with pets in one part of the hotel and guests who do not wish to be near pets away from them. We went…

title: Would definitely stay here again!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the resort.  My apologies for the issues you experienced during your stay.    Regarding the valet experience, it sounds as though that could have been handled better however we do require that we hold onto all keys in case of emergency situations and cars need to be moved quickly.  There would not have been a fee for that as long as you returned within several minutes.  While we do allow certain pets that meet the requirements, barking dogs are normally not permitted and handled on a case by case basis.  During the time you were there we did relax some of our normal requirements due to local guests staying with us due to the recent Hurricane that knocked out power to most of the area.  We allowed larger than normal pets.  Business was not normal during the time you were with us.  I will address your Housekeeping concerns as well with the Executive Housekeeper.  Thank you for letting us know.  Again, thank you for the feedback.  I appreciate you taking the time.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: They say never go back - think again
review: I love this hotel and restaurant. I have been coming here for years and love the fire pit in the back of the hotel on the beach. It is absolutely lovely and the Pina Colada is hands down the best as well as the fish tacos. The staff is fantastic as well as the experience.

title: Amazing Grounds and Staff
review: We got the Gulf Front Jr Suite and were able to receive an early check in as a room was ready. We were prepared to leave our bags and go explore, but another staff member at the desk found a room and we were good to go! Even though it wasn't check in time, we were still offered a welcome glass of champagne. Every staff member we saw the entire time always greeted us with a smile and a hello even just in passing. The view from the room was so beautiful. We overlooked the pool and the beach and I spent many happy nights reading with my kindle on the balcony. Amazing sunset views too, I cant remember if it was every night but there were evening movie showings at the pool, and if your room is angled right, you can watch from your balcony. I caught the end of Space Jam from the…

title: Best sunset location; Great services for family; Beautiful soft white flour sand; Nice Room
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for posting this review of your stay. It sounds like you had a wonderful stay, I am very pleased you were treated with such care by our staff. Every guest is just as important as the other and I am very happy you enjoyed your stay here at the resort. We look forward to seeing you back at the resort.  With Pleasure, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Don't stay here if you want a cheap holiday !
review: We booked Golf Front Room and was upgraded to Golf Front suite. It's totally worth it for the view and better layout of the room. I have checked all nearby hotels and Sandpearl has the most reasonable price for sea view rooms.   I requested for higher floor and early check-in via Opal Experience before arrival and they have made ready for everything. So really recommend using the online Opal Experience.   The property is very well maintained and locates close to everything, yet with a small distance for quiteness. Perfect for us as a family. The reception upon arrival is so warm and welcoming! The lady (I think her name is Megan) checked me in with a big sincere smile and was quick and clear on all information. The lady serving champagne stepped away for a second while we walked…

title: Beautiful restful location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your feedback, I do sincerely apologize for the two out of the ordinary behaviors from the staff which are off putting. I can assure you this is not our standard. With that said I am very happy we made you feel warm and welcome during your stay here and I hope you do return in the future.  With Pleasure, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: This is what we all,long for…
review: We have just come back from a 8 day stay in this hotel. The staff are all really lovely and really helpful, rooms good, hotel foyer beautiful, gorgeous beach, good location. However!   You have to pay for the umbrellas on the beach, and you have to pay 29 dollars a day resort fees, 25 dollars a day for car parking. This is all on top of a holiday you have already paid for! Just leaves a bad taste in your mouth , money all the time.  And your bank card is taken on checking in, they charge to the card each day without telling you. I didn't like this.  The pool area needs a revamp looks very tired, and the pads on the beds were ripped and marked I know it's the end of the season but surely as paying customers we should have the same standards of the facilities as customers at the…

title: Wonderful Family Beach Vacation
review: This hotel is first rate for not only accommodations, but for the staff.  From the time we pulled into the hotel to check in through check out the service was above and beyond.  I traveled to this hotel over labor day with my wife and two kids (3.5 year olds).  Prior to my arrival, I wondered if the hotel would be to "stuffy" for two young children.  The resort was extremely family friendly from the sand toys and body boards they provided to take to the beach to the beach balls and that they provided for the pool.  They had numerous scheduled activities for my young children including nightly s'mores, kids movies by the pool and a gigantic slip and slide on the lawn.  While my young kids were entertained, their was plenty to do for older kids and adults alike.  Bags, Giant lawn…

title: Very $$$ Nice view.
review: Dear Guest,  I am thrilled you found your accommodations and our staff to be first rate. I also appreciate you taking the time to share your experience here with us. It sounds like you and your family were able to enjoy your vacation the way you had planned. We are happy you had a fun time and look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Pricey but very nice
review: The hotel was very expensive. I booked for the view. I got a side view of the water & a view of the pool. Didin't enjoy watching the couple make out in the Adults only hot tub. Guess they thought that meant no one can see us......  You can walk to the pier & other restaurant's. It just wasn't my favorite resort and I have stayed at a few.....

title: Hotel not the same as per previous visits
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review.  We appreciate the feedback.  I am sorry for the issues related to the conduct of our other guests.  We normally control those things.  I am sorry that this wasn't one of your favorite resorts.  Thank you for giving us a try.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful getaway
review: I really love a good value...the Sandpearl in my opinion is not a good value.  However I can't fault anything about our stay.  From the minute I arrived until the sad moment I left...every person and experience was spot on.  We were a group of 6 ladies, and stayed in 2 rooms.  4 of us stayed in a double queen bedroom (not a great view, but spacious)and the other 2 women stayed in a double queen.  Comfy beds.  We had a fridge, stove, coffee pot.  The double queen had a coffee pot and a small fridge.  The beach, the pool and all of that great.  My one criticism is that they charge for an umbrella on the beach.  For as much as we paid to stay here that was annoying.  Gorgeous pool area, this beach is perfect.  Lots of restaurants close by.  We all enjoyed Cork & Brew to the north…

title: Service issues
review: Hotel is quite nice, albeit a little tired looking, but don't let this put you off, as the views and sunset are amazing and the hotel is well situated on Clearwater beech. Arrived after a 4 night stay in Hard Rock Hotel Orlando, not ordinarily our cup of tea, but it served a purpose and was above my expectations of all I had imagined it would be. Have been here at Sandpearl 2 nights and will be here for another 2 nights. Firstly they tried to palm us off onto a partial view room after paying for a gulf view room, got over that and they were obliging, blaming the agent for the booking error. No intro or explanation of hotel facilities, no breakfast will be serviced here between x & x, just here's your keys, your in room ... and off you go.  The 1st night all went ok, turn down…

title: Overbooked by the Pool
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl Resort.  Please accept my apology for the Housekeeping and service issues you experienced while staying with us.  I understand that you spoke with the Front Office regarding your concerns and I hope that the rest of your stay was better.  If you would like to speak to me personally, please feel free to contact me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz

title: Classy and Elegant
review: This was one of my favourite hotels and we returned after a 2/3 year absence. the location on the beach is as good as it ever was and the welcome glass of Prosecco a nice touch BUT the hotel appears to have packed sun loungers in around the pool so closely that you will get to know your neighbouring sunbathers very well. Also despite the usual requests to not reserve loungers people are up early putting towels out and the hotel does nothing to monitor this. It was hard to swim at all in the pool with so much overloading on poolside.   The cocktails are great but expect a wait for someone to come and take your order.

title: Second time at the sandpearl, I'm so torn
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you consider our resort one of your favorites.    We do try to control our guests from reserving pool chairs early in the morning.  We place cards on pool chairs that our team sees being unoccupied. The cards inform the guests that if they notice the guests have not returned in one hour that we will move their items to the Activities Desk.  As you can imagine this is not always appreciated by all guests however we do attempt to tactfully handle the situation.  Again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again on your next trip to Florida's Gulf Coast.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Clearwater Gem
review: We have just returned from a 4 night stay at the Sandpearl as part of our honeymoon trip to Florida. First of all, the hotel has so many positives, but I must warn you that there is a price tag attached to that 5* status! When we first arrived, we drove up to the lobby and our car was taken care of by a helpful valet. We hadn't realised that the hotel is valet-only parking, which was a nice touch, but we didn't known this prior to our arrival. This costs $25 per day, which is not included in the resort fee, plus valet workers required tipping, so be prepared.  We were greeted with a complimentary mimosa in the most exquisite marble lobby, and there was piano playing, which set a perfect ambience. We were so excited as it gave off such a sense of class straight away. The bell boy…

title: Amazing place, awesome service
review: The Sandpearl is absolutely amazing from the time you pull up to the time you leave. Chantal welcomes you with champagne as you check in, they will keep your bags while you wait for check in so you can enjoy the beach and resort all day (both before check in and after check out). The resort is gorgeous, the beach is fabulous complete with fantastic beach wait service. Everyone has a smile on their face and goes out of their way with service. It's not a cheap vacation but we sure got the most for our money. Would highly recommend to anyone!

title: Family holiday
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy you got to see and enjoy all of our smiling faces, we love coming to work here at the Sandpearl. Thank you for the compliments of the staff especially Chantal, our resort ambassador. Thank you for the recommendation.   Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Elegant and Wonderful Resort
review: Summer vacation with family in this exceptional hotel. Beautiful location right on the glorious beach. Great pool and service with a nice grill for lunch. Suite of rooms ideal for a family of four with everything you need.

title: Service has taken a dive
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the simple yet thoughtful review. We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and we hope you return for another stay.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic Resort in perfect location
review: I came down to Sandpearl Resort with my brother from NYC for a 3 night stay after a long week conferencing in Tampa- first trip just us since I had my son that we have got to travel alone. It was the perfect spot for us- me the beach bum and he loves the gym. Wonderful, elegant resort and it is clear to us why they are ranked one of best 10 hotels in Florida.  Service was outstanding. Logan at the beach needs a promotion and raise. He is just gets customer service, is super knowledgeable about the beach and water, sun position etc- Warning- I might poach him to come and work for us in NYC- he has not seen snow so he will be back fast!  Bill the waiter on the beach was also amazing. He was always available and checking in on us and making sure we were ok. Super friendly and…

title: Amazing hotel
review: Staff is incredibly friendly and the location is amazing!  Beautiful pool and perfect, white sand beach is right there!!!  Being at northern end of island a big plus.  Beach is significantly less crowded than hotel strip on southern part of island. Both restaurants are excellent.    We are very glad we stayed here and highly recommend it!!

title: Great stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review of amazing. I am also glad you stayed here and thank you for the recommendation. We look forward to your return.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl Resort! - A Gem In a Sea of Mediocrity - A Must Go!
review: Stayed 4 nights at the end of our 18 night holiday for a welcome rest after being in NY and Orlando.  This is a really good hotel with friendly staff and very good service.  Upgraded on arrival to gulf view king room for additional $50 per night. Additional bed they supplied for my teenage son was poor. Very lumpy, springs showing and creaked every time he moved. In hindsight we should have opted for a double queen room but couldn't face packing up to move. As other reviewers have said the loungers by the pool are too close together and we also witnessed the large American family who saved 8 poolside loungers at 8am one day and then disappeared to the aquarium until 3pm. So selfish and hotel really need to address this. Food at Tates by the pool was excellent for lunch, drinks…

title: Awesome Family Vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at Sandpearl. We are pleased you found the staff friendly and professional. We do our best to stay surrounded by positive and hard working people. Thank you for the recommendation, please come back soon.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Lovely Beach Hotel
review: Long ago, you donned your best suit and boarded an airplane that was a flying luxurious event!  Champagne, table cloth meals and linen napkins....  air travel back then was an experience.   Well I'm sorry to say that you might never fly again like that but staying at this hotel is like the old days of staying at a resort!  The staff - always pleasant and accommodating and that's just the beginning. The hotel you can tell is meticulously planned, designed, built and kept.   From the minute you enter a beautifully appointed lobby with the sound of a baby grand piano...  (there is one actually there but the sound is piped in) to the well appointed decor and vistas of the pool and beach beyond.   Each room is likewise well appointed and colorfully decorated.   Turn down service at…

title: Wonderful Getaway
review: We enjoyed our recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  The rooms were spacious, well-appointed and we had wonderful views.  The white sandy beach area was fantastic and reserved for hotel guests only so it was not overcrowded like so many other places.  The staff was friendly and attentive.  My only complaint . . . too many guests come down and reserved chairs by the pool early in the morning then never return until mid-afternoon.  There is a policy in place against this practice but it is not enforced. Two days in a row we saw families take 6-8 pool loungers in prime areas and never return until 3:00pm.  One group . . . a family of 8+ had chairs in the front row of the pool then left to go to the aquarium and a boat ride planning to return hours later and reclaim their spot. …

Dear Guest,  I am very happy you had a wonderful getaway here at Sandpearl Resort. Thank you for the compliments about the rooms and our staff, we work very hard. I understand the frustration with the chairs at the pool and will address this accordingly.   We look forward to your return, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic resort
review: Great hotel, great beach (you can find sand dollars and big shells at the sand bar), and the best kid entertainment (they provide buckets,shovels, boogie boards, goggles, and any other toy you can think of- which kept me from having to buy toys!)

title: Gorgeous Place
review: Dear Guest,  It sounds like your family had a great time out at the pool and beach. We have a great atmosphere for kids and families and we are happy yours had an enjoyable time here.  Please come back soon, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: We Love This Place!
review: Visited for one night as an Anniversary treat. Loved the pool area and plenty of beds and bar by the pool. Only steps onto the white sandy beach and into the ocean. The only downside to our stay was the incoming storm Emily the following day which meant we left this hotel earlier than planned! Plenty of bars and restaurants just outside the hotel which are well priced and always popular. You will enjoy a visit to this hotel!

title: Excellent service
review: Excellent service.  Lost my wallet in the lobby but it was returned to me intact by the concierge.  There was an issue with the room they gave us but once I brought it to their attention they gave us a new room. No complaints, just expensive.

title: Definently changed & quality has gone down over past few years
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy you were pleased with the service especially with your missing property. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us here at Sandpearl and we hope you do return again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Amazing hotel with fabulous service
review: Since about 2012, whenever there was something to celebrate, we would take our family to Sandpearl. Beautiful, elegent, upscale treatment , perfect for a staycation. It became a tradition, and our children looked forward to going and would forfeit a birthday party for a relaxing family time at the Sandpearl. Even on a rainy day, it was amazing. Once the rain persisted so much so, that the hotel opened up a ballroom, put a movie screen in it, popcorn machine and games so that the families had an alterative. It was perfect. After our stay last week, I realized that those times are probably gone. Everyone was "nice" but the professionalism was lacking.  For the first time I felt that management didn't appreciate the amount of money that families were paying to stay at this resort.…

title: Great stay at Sandpearl with kids
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am so sorry to hear that you think that we have changed over the years.  That is very disappointing to hear.  We continue to strive to exceed our guests expectations and try to do the little things that make a difference such as having an alternative room for kids games on rainy days.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your experiences with us please feel free to reach out to me at the resort.  I would love to get more feedback from you.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: They Are Theives
