review: We stayed at Sandpearl following two weeks at Disney so that we could recharge before going back to normality.  The hotel is beautiful and absolutely spotless. The team provide an excellent service and were all very friendly. The management team were always visible ensuring that the hotel was running smoothly which I thought was commendable.   The room was spacious and comfortable, we had a bay view room which nice although the beach was so beautiful I would have liked a view of it. Nevertheless it was still beautiful. The housekeepers do a fabulous job at keeping the rooms clean and tidy. Our little boy could not wait for the turn down service so he could get his chocolate!!   The breakfast buffet was lovely and the young man who makes the omelettes was the standout employee.…

title: 1st Class Resort Accommodations and Service
review: We had yet another delightful experience at The Sandpearl this past weekend. The resort is situated directly on Clearwater Beach and the views are unsurpassed. Friendly valet greet you as you arrive and helpful bellman make you feel right at home. The resort's lobby welcomes you with beautiful views of the Gulf of Mexico, sugar white sandy beaches and tall, happy palm trees. Every resort team member smiled at us from the cocktail server to the housekeeping staff. In my book, happy employees equal a well cared for hotel. We loved our experience; sunbathing poolside with delicious chairside lunch, to drinks and dinner at Tate's and watching incredible sunsets from the fire pit as we roasted marshmallows. We will be back!

title: Quick weekend
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the wonderful description of your experience here at the resort. I am very happy your interactions with our staff were all pleasant and we made you feel at home. We can't wait for you to come back.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: A few things to know before you go
review: We booked a last second trip. The hotel is fantastic. We booked the 1 bedroom suite with an ocean view. Fantastic views of the sunset and of course nothing like waking up to the ocean. Full kitchen. Full size refrigerator with stove and oven. We had Lunch at Tate's, where we had the grouper sandwiches. Both were tasty. My drink of choice this weekend was Painkiller. 💖💖💖 Gorgeous beach and it's just great to be able to walk out with the kids. Good pool as well. Didn't feel overcrowded to us but we live here in Florida. For breakfast, we went down to Caretta's. There was a choice of A la carte or the buffet breakfast. Staff were super friendly. Chef on duty made delicious omelettes and waffles. All in all, it was a great weekend for us. Beautiful, clean room, good restaurants…

title: Beer convention
review: Dear Guest,  I am so happy you decided to book your last minute trip here to Sandpearl. It sounds like you really did enjoy the property which is wonderful. Thank you for taking the time to fill out this review and share the experience you had here.  With Pleasure, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: A perfect beach vacation
review: Overall, we had a great time at the Sandpearl. The property is beautiful and in the perfect location. We had a one bedroom suite, which was perfect for our family of four. Housekeeping was great about replenishing towels, bottled water, and even laundry detergent for the washer. The breakfast buffet at Carrettas was fabulous too! What impressed me the most though was the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff. The concierge and shuttle service especially!  They activity desk by the pool also great with providing towels and toys for the kids.  However, if you want seats at the pool, you better be there early. Like before 9am. This was frustrating, as there was a lot of seat saving going on. People will put towels out early and leave. The resort says they remove stuff left…

title: Best spot on the beach
review: Best service and spot on the beach .  We visited a few other hotels and Sandpearl was the nicest, cleanest and very nice staff.  The pool did get pretty busy but I understand the hotel was full so that is to be expected.  We stayed on yellow chairs on the beach with drink service it was great!  Water was 86 degrees ! Beautiful .

title: Absolutely amazing Stay!
review: Dear Guest,  I agree, we do have the best service and spot on the beach. Thank you for acknowledging this as well as our staff and the cleanliness of the property. Please come back and stay with us again.  With Pleasure, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Stay at Sand Pearl to make your Clearwater stay special
review: This was the best trip and stay we have ever had! We were there for 4 nights in September of 2016 and are returning this month. 5 star service. Pool service excellent- food was excellent, fresh and cooked to order. We have zero complaints about Sandpearl Resort and can not wait to return. Our room was so clean- as I am a clean freak about hotels. Our beds were turned down each night with a chocolate that was really good! Every staff member greeted us every time we crossed paths. CC at the concierge desk was fantastic!

title: Family luxury with access to town
review: Dear Guest,  I am overjoyed with your opinion of the resort. I am certainly pleased you were happy with the cleanliness of the room and property and that all staff were friendly in passing. Thank you for the mention of CC our excellent concierge as well.  Many Thanks Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Another beautiful stay...
review: We stayed hear last summer for a few days beach time after our visit to Disney. Sand Pearl is a fantastic hotel in every way. Great staff, everyone so friendly, stunning location and without doubt the best hotel in Clearwater. Great holiday atmosphere around the pool, top poolside bar. Lovely restaurant overlooking sea (highly recommend the fillet steak, so good I had it every night of our stay), a great hotel for families. Doubt we would have had the same experience of Clearwater had we stayed somewhere different, as there is not that much to see and do. Would recommend a couple of hours fishing off the pier if you are into that kind of thing - it was a memorable experience for me raking in a nice fish, dolphins swimming past the pier and the a pelican waiting by my fish…

title: The best time
review: This hotel was perfection....from the complimentary champagne and valet parking on arrival to the stunning view of the ocean from our balcony. The children loved watching movies under the stars from the pool. The hotel is spotlessly clean and rooms are serviced twice daily. The dining experience in the main room was beautiful. We enjoyed a generous buffet- where the children ate for free. Walking onto the beach to enjoy the sunsets made this a very special trip. Would love to visit again.

title: Best Vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay here, we do strive for perfection and are very happy we have achieved that for you. Please do come stay again, we would love to have you back.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Business Trip
review: I cannot say enough about how wonderful this resort is. Impeccably clean, beautiful surroundings , private beach and most of all the exceptional team here. Especially Kathryn from the front desk. We were supposed to check out today our flight was cancelled. She accommodated us quickly and knowing how upset I due to our flight situation she sent a sweet gift to my room for my birthday. The food and service  in both restaurants was exceptional. The concierge team was top notch. If I could give this hotel 10 stars I would! Our room  faced the gulf of Mexico and the views were stunning. Thank you for making our hard earned vacation so special !

title: Not worth the drive
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind review of your stay and recognizing Kathryn for taking great care of you. We do know you work hard to enjoy your vacation and we are more than pleased we were able to make your stay so great. We look forward to your next stay.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Poor customer satisfaction
review: We stayed here for a conference. The hotel is beautiful. The views of the beach from the lobby is gorgeous. The staff was really polite and friendly. The conference included meals and snacks and everything was delicious. If we needed anything they would have it for us. The rooms were great spacious, comfortable beds, bathrooms were very clean. We were able to enjoy the pool and beach area. I would love to come here again with my family. It was close to everything.

title: Had a great time
review: We just got back from a five day trip to The Sandpearl. We took our two children, ages 6 and 2, and we all had a blast. We loved Clearwater Beach and I can't imagine finding a better hotel with such great access to the beach (no roads to cross; chairs already out there). I do find in general that the more expensive the hotel, the less amenities that seem to be included, so I'm not upset that umbrellas at the beach were an additional fee. We got late night room service one night and they were very helpful finding something our kids would eat (i.e. adding off the menu meatballs to pasta). The pool was perfect for us. There are multiple areas that are 3-3.5 ft deep so I felt like people were really spread out even though it's a busy pool. I thought the poolside service was good,…

title: Nice resort, but lacking in areas.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the extensive feedback, we do appreciate it. I am glad everyone was friendly and you felt the service was excellent, we do always strive for this. Again I am very glad you enjoyed yourself and we look forward to your next stay.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Service is slipping
review: We enjoyed out stay at the sand pearl for the most part, the resort is fairly clean and the employees are very friendly with an exception of a few. The private beach was definitely a plus! The food was great but enjoying the pool was difficult in some way with a security guard by the name of Melvin. He runs the pool area like a nazi camp and is very difficult to deal with, hard to enjoy anything when you're being hassled on vacation.

title: Sandpearl charges 29 resort fee!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad to hear that you found our resort clean and our staff friendly.  I am also glad to hear that you enjoyed our private beach.  You mentioned your pool experience and compared it to a Nazi camp. While I think that the comparison is a bit extreme I would like to get more specific information from you regarding what occurred.  We do our absolute best to guarantee that only registered guests of the hotel use our pool and it is our security guard by the pools job to make sure that others do not take seats from our in-house guests.  If you would like to reach out to me at the resort to talk about this I would appreciate it.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Service
review: We stayed here with family and friends over July 4.  I am not going to bore you with all of the issues that we experienced, but will touch upon the worst.  First off, I love The Sandpearl.  We have stayed here numerous times, too many to count.  I honestly have to say that this one may be our last.  First off, we received a call that our room was ready. I went to get our room key.  Walked to the door of the room only to see a sign that said "housekeeping please make up the room." I am thinking to myself okay maybe the people left the sign on the door.  I put the key in, it worked, and to my horror, walked into a room that was someone else's room!! I went downstairs to the front desk, only to have the girl at the desk apologize slightly as she is scurrying around trying to get…

title: Very Nice Resort
review: This resort is very nice and I would say we we got a 4.5 star experience but paid for a 5.0 star hotel.  Rooms - very nice, large, nice bathroom  Food - nice but pricey.  I would recommend taking the shuttle to great local restaurants as well.  Service - very good overall.  The shuttle service is fantastic as well as the pool side service.  The maid service was a little slow and we called because our room and not been serviced by 4 PM and we had to shower with towels that were left on the floor after they failed to deliver new towels and coffee within an hour.  Activities - I think they could do a better job of promoting and organizing activities for kids and family.  We tried to got the Smore's on the beach but that was kind of lame.  Pool- very nice but needs to be bigger for…

title: Alil Fun in the Sun
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recommendation to our hotel and your compliments on the service especially the pool and shuttle which you mention. Thank you also for the feedback on the housekeeping and activities areas, we will strive to improve these.   Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Gorgeous resort, but not quite excellent!
review: This was our second time visiting the Sand Pearl Resort. It's a very luxurious resort and is within walking distance to quaint shops and dining. The Bellman and valet staff are very friendly and professional. The gulf views from any room are nice. Gulffront room not absolutely needed. In some ways it doesn't measure up across the board. The room service can be improved. The room cleaning staff can stand some improvement. You have to pay extra for umbrellas on the private beach. You'd think at almost $400/nt, restore fee included, that atleast the umbrellas would be free, and maybe charge for the cabanas. On another note, the breakfast was very good with great options. Just don't eat outside as the birds can become quite harassing. Great stay overall, however.

title: Quality Resort that falls a little short of Excellent
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy you had an overall great stay for some fun in the sun. Thank you for the feedback both good and bad. We do hope you choose to come stay with us again.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great service and location with luxury accommodations
review: Our family stayed here for 3 nights and loved it. Unfortunately, the weather during our stay was mostly rainy, but we did get some breaks in the afternoon to get to the pool and beach. Of course, the resort can't help the weather and this wasn't typical Florida weather as there was a tropical system off the coast.  The resort is beautiful, clean and full of friendly, smiling employees. Check in was very smooth and they gave us mimosas at check in! Nice touch!   Drinks by the pool and food Tate's are very good for those lazy pool/beach days.  We only ate at Caretta once for breakfast and it was wonderful! I have separate reviews for both of these dining options.  The room was large, with a large closet, 6 large and 3 smaller drawers, mini fridge and large bathroom with glass…

title: Sisters Trip
review: The hotel and beach are immaculate. The rooms and view are amazing! Great shopping & restaurants within walking distance to the hotel. This was our second year in a row to stay at the Sandpearl and it was just as great as the first time in 2016!

title: Great service occasionally let down by facilities.
review: Dear Guest,  We are very happy you have come back for a second year in a row and enjoyed it just as much. We are looking forward to visit number three!  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous everything!
review: The Sandpearl is a beautiful resort with great staff and attentive service.  Like any resort, your experience may vary based on the room assignment.  I stayed two nights at the Sandpearl arriving from California.  My room 667 the first night was located right over an adjacent bar and nightclub which played very loud thumping bass music with screaming patrons until the curfew at 1:30 AM.  When I called to address the issue, they were apologetic but couldn't change anything about the noise.  I suppose somebody has to get the noisy hotel room over the bar, just wish it wasn't me.  The next day at my request they moved me to a quieter room overlooking the valet driveway.  Having had a rough night and early morning (especially with 3 hour jet lag), I was hopeful the hotel might go a…

title: Coastal view is dumpster view
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for posting this review as it is always important to understand where we may improve. I do apologize the room you had booked was unfortunately close to the nearby bars and I am sorry we couldn't have made up for that how you describe. I am happy a majority of our staff did go the extra mile for you and I hope these let downs do not deter you from staying on property another time.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Family vacation
review: We stayed five nights at Sandpearl, and can't say enough positive things about it.  Everything has been better than imagined, from the time we pulled up in our rental and were greeted with smiles and genuine cheer to the time we pulled out. The staff is superb, and they go above and beyond. The location of Sandpearl is great, and within walking distance to just about anything you want or need.  A large CVS is right down Mandalay Ave for anything practical you need.  Fabulous eateries with a beachy laid-back vibe are up and down Mandalay on both sides of the street, along with surf, clothes, and ice cream shops. The private beach is gorgeous, and was never crowded during our stay here.  Each day, we slept in and slept well. My husband and I enjoyed coffee on our balcony…

title: A true pearl on Clearwater Breach
review: My wife and I spent three very enjoyable days at this first rate hotel on Clearwater beach which has its own private stretch of pure white sand to enjoy. The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful, especially the Concierge Jose who recommended some wonderful nearby restaurants and even went to the trouble of phoning and booking us a table. The only thing the staff had no say in was the weather, were we should of had glorious Florida sunshine we had Florida rain, but looking on the bright side at least the rain in Florida is warm!

title: First Class Service, High Quality Resort, Great Location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you kindly for your review of your stay on our property. I do appreciate the comments about our helpful and friendly staff and thank you for mentioning the concierge Jose. Our apologies about the rain, unfortunately our rain dance did not work.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great!
review: I've never been to a resort with such good service, except maybe at a Disney Resort.  Staff is outstanding.  Hotel is top notch, grade A.  Very luxurious, clean and tidy.  The decor and construction of the resort are rich and second to none.  Nice linens, updated decor.  Beds are comfortable due mainly to having a mattress topper (mattress itself nothing to write home about).  They provide a turn-down service in the evening with chocolates for the room which is a nice perk.  Staff are plentiful, very courteous, formal, and always buzzing around keeping the resort in tip-top shape and presentable.  Can't beat the location on the beach.  No road between hotel and beach like many hotels further down.  There is a public beach access beside the resort, but they didn't seem to…

title: Small pool
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your thorough review of your stay. We work very hard to maintain our property and keep up our culture of service, we do appreciate the recognition. Please come back again.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Can't wait to go back
review: Sandpearl resort was amazing!  Albeit a bit expensive but honestly the customer service was impeccable.  The resort is simply beautiful and has lots to offer.  The food at Tates bar and grill offers a fantastic view of the beach /ocean and has terrific food and beverages !!! I highly recommend and I hope to return in the future!!!

title: Return visit not as good as the first one :(
review: We loved this property so much two years ago that we returned again this year.  Unfortunately, our stay was not as great this time, and we will probably not return.   The property is beautiful.  We had a lovely room with a pool view.  I was impressed with details such as stool for the kids in the bathroom so that they can reach the sink.... The pool is really nice and the food and drinks at the pool bar was amazing. We had room service a few times, and that was good as well. The kids loved movies by the pool and the kids camp.  They also loved making s'mores every night.  The valet guys were amazing.   One minor issue for us is that they don't have a guest laundry room.  This is normally not a big deal, but we were traveling with two small kids for two weeks, so we needed a…

title: Love this hotel, hate it at weekends
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your second visit to the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed yourself enough the first time to come back for a second.  I am sorry to hear that your second visit did not live up to the standards of your first visit.  In your review you commented on public laundry facilities.  We do have one and two bedroom units that have built in washer and dryers in each guestroom.  If you decide to stay with us again you might want to consider that option for the convenience.    I am very sorry to hear about your negative experience with the birds around the pool.  We do several things to try to keep away the black birds and the seagulls including string the pool, ultrasonic speakers, squawk boxes, etc unfortunately due to our location directly on the beach the birds sometimes are very difficult to control.  I will speak to our Pool Manager to discuss how we handle situations such as yours.  I will also speak with our Spa Manager about your comments and focus on retraining the associates in our locker rooms.  We normally get very high praises for the friendliness of our team so your feedback was concerning.  We will discuss your comments and be more aware.  Again, thank you for the time you took to complete the review.  We certainly hope that you change your mind and decide to give the Sandpearl Resort another chance.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: "It's all about CC"
review: My husband and I have just returned from our third 14 day visit to this hotel we both love the hotel but are not sure we will be returning. We love everything about this hotel from walking into the lobby and looking out over the gulf it is quite spectacular to watching sunsets from the fire pit they are so chilled. The bedrooms are spacious, with large comfortable beds, everything we look for in a hotel.  However the reason we may not return is the weekends by the pool, I may sound like a killjoy but I go on holiday to relax, read books and have nice meals and nights out. Monday to Thursdays are perfect by the pool, nice and relaxing, quiet music and kids having fun. Weekends are carnage.......we were there Memorial weekend and the Saturday was worse than Vegas. The hotel has 5…

title: Family friendly, luxury resort
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  Also, thank you very much for joining us for you third time!  We appreciate the repeat business.  I am very happy to hear that you love our resort but sorry to hear about the noise issues you experienced on Memorial Day Weekend.  Memorial Day Weekend is perhaps the busiest weekend of the year.  With that said we do have systems in place to control the guests around the pool.  It appears that we need to reinforce them better however.  First of all, only registered guests are allowed to use the pool.  Although it might have appeared that guests who were not staying here were with them, we check everyone around the pool to make sure that they are staying with us.  We have a Security Guard who checks all names of people who do not have wristbands. Also, guests are not permitted to bring their own coolers or alcoholic drinks to the pool.  This is policed as well.  On that particular day, I personally noticed that there were several people around the pool using their own portable Bluetooth speakers and playing their own music.  I had a conversation with the management team and reinforced our policy on them.  Amplified music around the pool of any sort is strictly forbidden.  I am sorry that one day exceptions were made that should not have been.  The vision for our pool area is to be a place to relax and unwind.  It is not a party pool, so again I apologize this happened.  I most definitely hope that you reconsider and decide to stay with us again.  You are correct in saying that there are many new hotels that are opening around Clearwater Beach however none of them have the pool and beach experience that we offer.    Again, thank you for the review.  We hope to see you next year.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Perfect resort especially for families!!!!!!
review: We are currently at the Sandpearl and it is truly an amazing hotel. The hotel itself is elegant yet comfortable and the grounds are clean and beautiful. But, the thing that sets this hotel in a class by itself is their attention to detail and how they anticipate  their guest needs. After the valet parks your car there is no need to ever get it out again  because the hotel has a complementary shuttle that will take and pick you up anywhere on the beach. This makes it nice knowing you can have a cocktail and still be safe.  But, I must say and really the reason I feel the need to write this review is the Sandpearl has a hidden gem tucked away in the corner of the lobby at the concierge desk. Her name is CC.  Not only is CC a bright shining star when we come down for the day but…

title: 16th time at the sandpearl
review: The resort is great- can't fault the surroundings. Feels like home when we come back. The only fault is the service seems to have dipped in the past few years since opal took over- staff aren't as friendly - service is no longer bespoke (exception of the valet guys)We visit around three times a year from the U.K. 1 week to 2 weeks at a time since our first stay in 2010. I would think staying at the hotel so much that we would be noticed/remembered for coming back time and time again....we are currently staying at the resort for the next few nights so hopefully this improves- would be a shame for us to have to try a different resort during our next stay.

title: Girls trip
review: Dear Guest,  I want to thank you for making a review of your current stay here at Sandpearl. We do take pride in hosting so many loyal guests throughout the years and apologize we haven't done this for you. I do hope this doesn't completely affect your opinion of the Sandpearl, if you would please reach out to me at (727) 441-2425 I would be happy to change this.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Perfect tropical getaway
review: It's a nice resort and very family friendly. I went as mini reunion with my college roommates. It was just ok for us. We stayed in a one bedroom suite and it was nice and big but definitely not cheap - maybe $750+ a night. We are the breakfast buffet and sat on the terrace and that was nice. Just not sure it was worth the value for us.

title: Back again and amazing again!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am sorry to hear that you thought our resort was just "OK".  We pride ourselves in providing exceptional service and creating lasting memories.  My apologies.    You are correct in that the resort is definitely not a cheap place.  We feel that the experience you receive and the memories you create as well as the beauty of the resort and the beach create a great value for the price of our rooms however.  Again, thank you for your review.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Gorgeous hotel on the inside
review: Stayed here for 3 nights. The resort & staff are wonderful. Would stay here again and wished we had stayed an extra night. CLEAN, beautiful, relaxing, great service. We arrived on Memorial Day and it was really busy. Tues -Thurs was much slower. Recommend staying during the week and not the weekend as it will be even more relaxing, especially by the pool. We enjoyed Caretta's breakfast buffet and Tate's for afternoon snacks or dinner. Food was always good. On site we enjoyed the beach chairs (which are free). You do have to pay a small fee for umbrellas or cabanas. We never did. We just used the chairs and went inside the resort if we needed a break from the sun. There are definitely enough activities (besides the pool/beach) for everyone in the family without leaving the…

title: Gorgeous beach!
review: Was in town for business when she I could have stayed longer. Beach was nice, nice restaurant, fun area.  Hotel rooms were very nice, beds ok, clean hotel. Walking distance to area shops or they have a shuttle.

title: First time in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,   We do have a gorgeous beach and it is not uncommon for our guests to want to stay longer. It sounds like you were able to enjoy the resort and the surrounding area which is wonderful. Please come back and stay with us again.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Stunning resort
review: This is our first time in Clearwater, but looks like it will be a good one. The room is spacious with a balcony facing the Gulf. Has a larger refrigerator and bathroom. If you need to make popcorn there is a microwave next to the ice machine! We ate at the fine dining restaurant in the hotel and it was very good, even had one of my favorite wines on their list ( Caymus )

title: Wonderful Stay
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy to hear you have been able to enjoy your spacious room facing the gulf. Also great to hear you enjoy the Caymus wine, excellent choice! Thank you again for the review.  Regards, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Best Weekend Getaway!!!!!
review: Everything about the Sandpearl resort from check-in to the well appointed rooms to the beautifully groomed beach made this a wonderful place to stay on a recent business trip. Staff was friendly and helpful, and delicious room service breakfast was the perfect way to start a busy day!

title: Some things are 5 star, some, not so much
review: I returned home from our trip, and waited a few days to write this review, as we had several issues and I wanted to see how they were handled.  Let me begin my saying that the resort is stunning. Your first impression upon entering is breathtaking. The employees are all friendly and genuine. Pool area is lovely even with the number of people who place towels on chairs and never return. Our vacation was restful and relaxing, exactly what we wanted.  We had two major issues during our stay that were ongoing for the entire week. Early in the week, Elliott was kind enough to put a credit on our room for our trouble. When I returned home, I sent the General Manager a letter regarding our trouble.  He responded quickly and professionally with and apology and an explanation along with…

title: Great Trip
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed most aspects of your stay.  As I mentioned in the letter to you, I am very sorry for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  We have corrected those issues so they do not occur again.  I hope you change your mind and decide to give us another chance in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Very nice
review: My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our experience at the Sandpearl. The staff was very nice and helpful in every experience we had. The resort facilities are top notch and the beach was beautiful. Yes, there are things like the umbrellas at the beach that have an additional charge; but we just planned that into our budget and expected it. Both our spa experience and dining experiences were superb. We like to go to different places and explore for most of our vacations; but we have already talked about a return trip to this resort.

title: Two Nights w Family
review: Dear Guest,  I am very happy you enjoyed your experience at the Sandpearl especially the fact our staff was nice and helpful. Thank you for the nice comments about the spa and dining experiences you had. We look forward to your return.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Luxury
review: Excellent resort right on the beach. Nice pool area and the service was very attentive. Very nice bar area .lastly the rooms are newly remodeled and very well appointed. We had dinner at the restaurant and the food and service was excellent

title: Beautiful views, excellent hotel staff, quiet rooms
review: We loved our 4 day stay at Sandpearl. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. The room (2 queen size beds) was fine for our family of 4 and the room was quiet even on weekend nights. Once you get to the resort, you really don't have to ever leave. Food, activities, and even beach rafts are available. We did walk down Mandalay Rd for two dinners but for the most part we just stayed near the hotel. If you plan to do the same, I'd advise taking a taxi to and from the airport because it will save you on car rental fees and parking fees. We only used our rental car twice--driving to and from the hotel.  The hotel is very family friendly. :)  The hotel has an environmentally friendly mission that I appreciated very much. I'm not sure that others did, though, as people seemed…

title: Just what we've been looking for.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out this thorough review. We are absolutely a family friendly hotel and I am pleased you found that to be true. Our staff works very hard and we always do our best to be friendly and helpful with all of our guests. Your advice all rings true to potential guests so thank you for that. We look forward to serving you during your next stay.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic setting
review: The staff at Sandpearl Resort are all top notch, helpful, polite, anticipates your needs, friendly. Our room was perfect, very large, balcony overlooking the pool, beach, and ocean.  Tate's, the casual dining venue, was very nice, food was great, servers were wonderful.  The more formal dining experience, Caretta,  was billed as the only four star dining in Clearwater, and we found it lacking.  Reservations were suggested, so we made sure to make reservations after breakfast.  When we returned that evening to be seated, we were told that dining outside was "first come, first serve" ,  and then when we said alright, we would eat inside, the hostess said she would "check" and see if there was anything available.  So why did we have to have reservations, if we couldn't sit where we…

title: Disappointed
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your thorough review and compliments of the staff. The feedback you have provided will be very beneficial to us improving our guest experience here. We do hope you return to stay again with us in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Bring your own bath towels!!
review: Spent a few nights here for leisure.  Setting is fantastic, we ate out at a nice small selection of restaurants nearby rather than eating in the hotel. Room was a good size with ample space to enjoy. We had sea view which really made the difference especially at sunset!

title: Terrible service-overpriced
review: Room rate of $549, no housekeeping, be prepared to make your own beds! room for 3 people, pillows only for 2.express breakfast menu picked up but not delivered. When manager is involved tray does not have coffee cups, bread but no preserves. Disaster for the price. Horrible service, overpriced

title: Very nice place on the beach in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.    I am very sorry to hear about the issues you experienced regarding Housekeeping.  I am assuming that you did not receive Housekeeping service at all during your stay?  If so, that is very odd and I do apologize.    I am also sorry for the issue with your In Room Dining experience.  If you would like to contact me directly at the resort please do not hesitate to do so.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Babymoon
review: The hotel is on a really beautiful beach! The rooms were all very comfortable-the beds were comfortable with crisp, clean sheets. I even like that they put a little wrapper around the remote control that says the remote was sanitized. Nice little extra touch…The shower was great the water was soft with strong pressure. All in all a really solid hotel.  Also has a cute little gift shop with dresses and sundry things to buy as well.   The pool is nice but is not that big. We spent all of our time on the beach which is really the main attraction here.  Such a big expansive stretch of powdery white sand!  The food at the outdoor café was good and a great place to get drinks and just look at the amazing view!  Staff were all very professional and delighted to help you.  Definitely…

title: A Wonderful Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review and recommendation. It sounds like you were able to enjoy all aspects of the resort which makes me happy. I am glad you found our staff professional as well.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Super Nice hotel for beach get-away
review: Very pretty resort. Be prepared to pay for everything (resort fee, umbrellas at beach, high room service charges) but is worth it. Great pool- read a bunch of reviews about not getting seating at pool but never saw it completely packed. May be worse in summer months. Has a courtesy shuttle that was awesome since the only option is to valet. I was really impressed with how quiet the rooms are- barely heard anything. Only ate at beachside grill for lunch and pool service one day- but was good. We would definitely come back here. Seems like a good place for couples and families overall.

title: First Class
review: Very nice and few can compare to this property. Higher price, but you get what you pay for in service, cleanliness, location and quality.  One of the best pools I have seen with great beach chairs with good service. Walking distance to pier and restaurants.

title: Be careful
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for the kind review. We strive to be the best in service, cleanliness, quality and we are have a very fortunate location. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Unique!!!!
review: Loved loved loved this hotel due to very family friendly!!!  BUT... be very careful.. we almost were scammed into giving our credit card information over the phone.  We had recently stayed and ordered room service for breakfast one morning.. about an hour later we received a call stating they charged the wrong amount for breakfast and we can take care of this over the phone just give us your credit card info.. The person knew our names and exactly what we had ordered for breakfast. Thankfully my husband trusted his gut & said he would just go down to the front desk and speak with them. The man on the line said ok and gave us his name to ask for him. Once we went down to the front desk the people said they have no one by that name and your room was charged the correct amount.…

title: Perfect Hotel for a Beachfront Getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay at the our property. I do apologize about the incident that did occur but am happy we were able to still create an experience you would like to come back for.   Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Short stay
review: Such a besutiful resort and confortable rooms! Very quiet, very friendly staff! Excelent food! Excelent pool! Excelent beach in front! It is really unique and exclusive! You felt really that you are in paradise! If you have a chance dont hesitate to go!!!

title: Awesome in every way
review: I was skeptical because i had read one year old reviews before arriving. I was pleasantly surprised... beautiful property, over the top friendly and accommodating staff, great food, very clean room (743, suite with full kitchen and large jacuzzi tub) Nice bed and sheets. Kyle at poolside went above and beyond! Thank you all so much for a lovely 5 day getaway. By the way... I'm very particular about where i stay! I will revisit this nice place. As we wandered down the street, we noticed the other hotels we had considered were across the street from the beach... instead of being on the beach, like the Sandpearl. The area was So clean, litter free! Enjoyable walk to many shops restaurants a park and a pier. When i called to get more details on the room she immediately e mailed…

title: Nice Hotel but
review: Dear Guest,  It sounds like you had a wonderful stay here at Sandpearl, we do look forward to your return in the future. I am pleased you found our staff accommodating and friendly as well.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Holiday
review: We arrived at noon and our room was ready.  The room is a nice size and clean.  I like that they had a mini bar and a refrig for your use, We arrived Sunday and the pool was crowded but the resort cleared out on Monday.  Didn't have any problem finding chairs together.  The beach is very wide and the resort only owns 25 feet of the beach so the chairs are far from the water, chairs are comped but you have to pay for an umbrella,  All the staff was very friendly.  I cant say anything negative about the hotel, just didn't like the area.  Don't forget your room key you need it to get back in resort from the beach.

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to get you into your room early.  In your review you mentioned that the resort only owns 25 feet of beach.  I wanted to correct that statement for guests who have not bee to the resort before.  The Sandpearl owns the beach directly in front of the resort.  Our private beach is 700 feet wide and 190 feet long.  There is an 20 yard area of beach between our private beach and the water line.  On our Private beach you are permitted to eat and drink.  On the public beach, no alcoholic drinks are permitted plus we cannot serve food on that area.  Again, thank you very much for taking the time to write a review.  I appreciate it.  Regard, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Amazing....just amazing
review: Luxuorious...beautiful... All staff very helpful. We stayed here for the second week of our holiday and it was everything and more that we could wish for. The pool was lovely...right down to flowing on to the most amazing beach which had fire pits etc Every evening the room staff came round to see if we needed anything else plus to give us a weather forecast for the next day oh and some chocolates..

title: Amazing Breakfast
review: We did not stay in the hotel but went to have breakfast with family. The buffet is absolutely amazing and surprizingly affordable. Incredible view and very nice interior. The Waiters are a little snobby though.

title: Don't waste your money here.  Find a resort that appreciates your business.
review: Dear Guest,  We are happy you came in and enjoyed our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf for breakfast. I apologize if you felt the waiters were a little snobby, there is no excuse for that. I hope you come back and join us in the restaurant again and maybe spend a few nights in one of our rooms.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Avoid during Spring Break (around Easter)
review: Plenty of other nice hotels that will treat you with respect and appreciate your business.  Avoid this resort!  Location is the best part of the hotel.  Front desk staff was rude and unhelpful when we checked in.  The room we were given was not comparable to the others in our group.  We had no balcony, no view, small room, and stuck right above the valet station listening to them throughout.  Bell hop was the only friendly staff person we encountered.  Room was disappointing for the price paid.   Found out afterwards we could have had a room with a fold out couch for our son instead of having a rollaway (for $35 a night).  We were given no explanation of the ammenities that were included or not included for our "resort fee".  Would have been nice to know what we were paying for.…

title: Great place with kids, beautiful beach
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  I am sorry to hear that you found out Front Desk Staff rude and unhelpful.  We normally get very high praises for them so I am not sure what happened with your experience.  I am also sorry that you did not like your room view or location.  We offer many different room views and room layouts, all priced accordingly.  I am not sure what was booked but I am sorry to hear that you were not happy with yours.    In your review you mention a charge of $35 for a rollaway.  We do offer rollaways for guests to use for extra guests however there is not a charge for this.  I am not sure what fee you are referring to.  I am also sorry that we did not follow up with you during your stay.  I will make sure that we are being more responsive.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great place.
review: I stayed at the Sandpearl the week before Easter, spring break for public schools in Northern Virginia. It is a very crowded time for the hotel, and the quality of the stay was greatly reduced. This hotel’s public spaces cannot accommodate the guests comfortably at 100% occupancy.  My biggest problem was the pool, which is why I picked this hotel. It is a nice pool, but it is too small for the number of rooms this hotel has. As a result, the lounge chairs are packed like sardines and there are not enough umbrellas. So, if you want a chair with an umbrella, you have to get up at 7 in the morning, go downstairs, and grab your chairs, especially because this is what everyone else is doing. If you are late, then the only chairs remaining are without umbrellas. Every chair needs to…

title: Our 7th Wedding Anniversary
review: Every year for the past few years my husband and I stay on Clearwater Beach for our anniversary. First time staying at the SandPearl Resort. Amazing customer service - the best so far on the beach. From the Valet service, the Front desk staff, the spa attendants, and house keepers. All the staff we encountered very professional and courteous. If you want a first class vacation- look no further. We will definitely be back.

title: Thank you Courtney!
review: Dear Guest,  I am glad you have made it to the Sandpearl after the last few years elsewhere on the beach. We try our best to be professional and courteous and we are happy we were able to deliver. Thank you for the kind words we look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Anniversary Trip
review: My wife and I stayed at the Sandpearl Resort April 2017. We celebrated our 7th wedding anniversary. Courtney ( at the check  in counter) set the standard if great customer service. She walked me through the amenities the resort had to offer and accommodated my needs to ensure my anniversary would be memorable.   She represented the Sandpearl in a professional and passonate way. Thank you courtney for all you do!

title: Great Resort! -- Tough competition for pool chairs and umbrellas
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your anniversary here at Sandpearl. I am very pleased Courtney offered you great guest service, I am also not surprised she is a great example of how our employees act.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: The Perfect Place for a Wedding or Vacation
review: We reserved a waterfront room and upon our arrival we were told that we had been upgraded to a corner suite. The room was amazing as was our entire experience at this beautiful hotel. Beach was beautiful, service great, Tate's was a fun hangout along with the firepit. The hotel's location was within walking distance to many things. We will likely be returning.

title: Rude
review: Walking the beach on our last night in Clearwater and found this lively bar. Walked in to ensure non residents were ok to come in and told brusquely to find a table and we would be served. 45 minutes later and trying to catch the eye of several servers gave up. Rude.

title: Amazing!!
review: Dear Guest, Please accept my apology for the experience you had at our restaurant.  We normally receive great reviews from our guests regarding Tate's.  I am not sure what happened that evening but it is definitely not the norm.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Another perfect stay
review: Perfect resort.  We love the private beach with food and drink service. We booked 5 nights, we wished we booked longer.  Food was great. Our 6 and 3 year old are so much the whole time.   Staff was awesome. Staff we didn't meet knew our name. The free kids at the tasty breakfast buffet at Carettas was a great value.   Best hotel/resort in clear water.   Can't wait till next year.

title: Great service but pricey
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for joining us by spending some time at the Sandpearl and for the nice review as well. I am happy you have been able to enjoy all of the things that make the Sandpearl so wonderful.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Great Family Resort
review: Hands down, the best resort in Clearwater.  Little details make the difference. Fresh daily covers for cushioned pool loungers, plenty of servers by the pool, two kinds of fire pits, better-than-most resort food, and peaceful laid back vibe just far enough from the pier.  If you don't like  resort charges, tipping and paying to be pampered, then you should chose another place. This is where you go when you can afford to be carefree.

title: Highly recommended
review: This is our second stay, first time we had our two young boys with us, both times were very enjoyable. Staff is friendly and courteous, and the location can't be beat. Reward yourself by staying here.

title: Beautiful resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the high recommendation. We are glad you have come to stay with us and made the choice to return again, we hope this trend continues. Thank you again for letting us know the staff was friendly and courteous, we take great pride in this.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Beach Location
review: We always have a great time when we stay here, the rooms are clean and large, the spa is amazing, the pool areas are great, but the best part is the private beach, it's just gorgeous. They also have great programs for kids and a night camp (additional fee) so that parents can enjoy a romantic private dinner.

title: Fantastic hotel!
review: Dear Guest,  We are so glad you enjoy coming to the resort and you always have a great time. I see you have been able to utilize many areas of the resort which we always like to see. Thank you very much for the review.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful Wedding Venue!
review: Just spent a week at the Sandpearl and definitely enjoyed it. The entrance and lobby are beautiful as are the restaurant, pool and beach. We spent three days boating with friends who have a boat there and toured up and down every hotel beach  in the area. I really don't think any other place compares. Some of the hotel beaches seem to have rocks in the water, are very crowded and narrow or are even across the street from the hotel. The Sandpearl's beach is amazing with powdery white sand that is cleaned and raked daily.  The location of the Sandpearl was ideal for us. Every restaurant and shop we wanted to visit was within walking distance but it wasn't in the middle of the craziness of Pier 60. While the gulf view rooms are very nice the harbor views would be great too.  We had…

title: Awesome stay!!
review: Hotel is beautiful with direct private beach access.  The staff was great. Location close to many bars and restaurants.  Get a beachfront room the view is amazing ! Only complaint was our room was often not cleaned until after 4 pm.

title: Best resort in Clearwater but...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great review. We hope to see you here again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Definitely not the standard it claims or appears to be.
review: We have stayed here many times since they opened in 2008 and there is no place better. It is expensive for sure, but if you want to go first class no one compares, evidenced by the fact that if you stay during spring training, you see all the Phillies and many Yankees and Blue Jays! I disagree with the review that said pool was just OK! It is the most relaxing resort like beautiful pool I've ever seen outside of Hawaii. That reviewer was obviously someone who prefers the beach which I don't. Huge downside is the freezing lobby and hallways. Believe it or not it is such a deal breaker that it makes me want to go elsewhere. But the Hyatt is just as cold. I argued with them about it because there are vents from the hallways that make your room freezing that you can't close. At…

title: Great place but there are things you need to know
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the kind review and your loyalty as a guest here at Sandpearl. We do our best to provide quality service to our guests and keep them coming back every year. Our pool experience is very special here and I am glad you enjoy using it.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Pricey,
review: This is our second time at the Sandpearl, having first visited in 2014. Since then it has gone down hill. There are a few small things that add up to it definitely not being a five star resort and meaning we won't be recommending or coming back.  1. The beach umbrellas now come at a $30 a day charge, supposedly to help the resort to control them. If that was the case $5 would suffice or just better monitoring as most places manage to.  2. The new front office manager, man with a moustache, has definitely missed the customer service memo and is poorly suited to a customer facing role 3. We arrived to a $29 per day, per room (we have three) resort fee charge which we hadn't been told about. Turned out in the end that we had already paid this but we only found that out by ringing…

title: Nickel and dime
review: You pay for everything baby!  Valet, chairs, etc.  Would have expected a heated pool for the bunce we paid.  Room view lacking unless you like dumpsters, loading docks and HVAC systems.    Beautiful resort, friendly staff.  Good housekeeping.  Best beach in America according to my family.  Would do it again but would rob a bank beforehand 💲💲💲💲💲.

title: Beautiful place and great location...
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback about your recent stay at Sandpearl. I am pleased you thought the resort was beautiful and of course that the staff was friendly with you and your family.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer  Front Office Manager

title: Favorite Florida Beach Hotel
review: But be aware of what is included (and not included) in the resort fee.   My husband and I really enjoyed our stay at the resort. It's really close to some great restaurants, the grounds are wonderful with great amenities like hammocks and fire pits - not to mention the beautiful beach and convenient access. I know that resort fees are pretty standard in this area and my only advice would be to pay close attention to what is included. For example, beach umbrellas are not included and there is an extra fee for those. We learned that the hard way.

title: Won't Stay Anywhere Else
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and feedback about the resort. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope you return again in the future.  Many Thanks, Ted Palmer Front Office Manager

title: Great resort bad room
review: We have stayed here about 4 times (We have family in neighboring Tampa).  This hotel is the best.  This is THE ONLY place we will stay.  Every time we stay there, I love it a little more.  The entire staff is wonderful, from the people greeting you at the door to the front desk staff, the concierge as well as the staff in the restaurant.  The lobby is so wonderfully decorated with so much attention to detail.  It changes every time we are there!  It really is beachy and wonderful.  The rooms are beautiful.  We stayed in a Junior Suite our first visit and it spoiled us!  We absolutely love it!  The beds are so comfy, you can climb in, fall asleep and not move the entire night.  I can't think of a single time we've done that other than at the Sandpearl.  The pool is perfect, you…

title: Not impressed!
review: Came down from upstate NY to get some rays and swimming in after a long winter, found Sandpearl online, kind off pricey " $700. A night plus fee's" but looked nice. The place seems well kept and clean but as the center piece of the resort the pool was stone cold, I'd guess mid 60's, air temp in the 80's. Other guest said it had been like that for weeks, what a disappointment, when we wanted to leave they made us pay for the next night before letting us cancel. Not impressed! Never serviced room on last day........just the last straw.

title: $25 for a beach umbrella ??
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.    We are very sorry for the issue with the pool.  The pool pump motor stopped working last weekend and we have been working diligently on getting it repaired.  The new equipment will be here tomorrow, Friday, 3/31/17 and the pool will be fully heated on Saturday morning, 4/1/17.  The current water temperature in the pool is 77 and our geo-thermal system normally keeps it at a temperature of 82 degrees.  The issue with the pool temperature has only been for one week.  In the month of January, we had the pool closed for 3 weeks to completely re-do the pool, perhaps that is what the other guests were speaking about.    Again, thank you for your review. I am very sorry your vacation was hindered due to this issue.  We hope that you come to see us in the future.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Excellent Get-A-Way, again!
review: We are paying $1000/ night and this hotel is also charging $25 for a beach umbrella ? Are you kidding me?  How absurd.  It's too bad they are cheapening the hotel by doing things like that when their patrons are paying the rates that we are.

title: There Nothing I Didn't Like
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  Hopefully your stay was great with exception to the charges for the beach umbrellas.  The reason for the charges are to control the umbrellas on the beach.  Previously we did not charge for the umbrellas and guests would claim chairs and umbrellas on the pool deck as well as the beach.  We would have availability issues for all of  our guests due to guests claiming chairs in both locations.  When we started controlling and charging for the umbrellas those issues ended.  While I understand it seems like we are nickel and diming, it has been a good way to control the availability of chairs throughout the resort.  Again, thank you for the feedback.    Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Best Place We Have Ever Stayed
review: We visited the SandPearl in February over the holiday weekend with our three sons. We had a large suite with separate bedroom, as we have in the past. We've stayed here now three or four times and it continues to offer consistent, quality accommodations, terrific service, lovely atmosphere and great, relaxing options. Greeted by professional staff, champagne and smiling faces. We enjoyed the family activities this time around, including movies by the pool and special service by the beach. We appreciated the specific service provided at lunchtime while we were on the grounds, great bar service, terrific folks in the restaurant at breakfast time, our buddy from New York who made our omelets to perfection each day, and the concierge and shuttle services that were perfect accents to…

title: My New Favorite Beach Resort
review: Great food, Great Staff, Great View ... What's not to like. We just completed a 5 day stay and will certainly be returning. We loved the breakfast buffet. The staff at the SPA and at every level were excellent. Someone knows how to keep a large staff friendly, happy and helpful and it doesn't hurt that the beach is amazing. Lot's to do and see within walking distance and some very good restaurants within easy walking distance.

title: Unbelievable Hospitality
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your time in completing a perfect 5 review of our resort! We also thank you for the acknowledgment of how our staff treated you during your stay. We take tremendous pride in providing 5 diamond service for every guest. We hope to serve you soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Great place
review: From the moment we arrived at the Sandpearl Resort we were greeted with friendly service and smiling faces.  Amy (I think that's her name!) at the Front Desk was extremely pleasant.  Once we got to the room we noticed that the crib we requested wasn't in the room yet so we called down.  She said she would "get right on it"...5 minutes later we were getting ready to go out and check the place out when we got a phone call from her following up on the crib!  We loved that!  Manning was our bellman and he gave us the full rundown on the room, the resort, and the local restaurants and shops.  Very friendly and nice!    The whole resort was very clean, and the pool/beach area were perfect.  My wife and I were traveling with our 8 month old son for the 1st time so we were a little…

title: Loved everything about it!!!
review: Great food and a+ service! Top notch all the way around! The buffet is amazing and the staff is very friendly and helpful in all possible ways. The waffles and homemade whip cream is to die for. The view is pure tranquility. Pull up on the boat, eat and enjoy the view. Life is good!

title: Wow Just Wow!!
review: Dear Guest,  We sincerely thank you for your A+ review of our resort. It is our pleasure to help you relax and enjoy the atmosphere.   Thank you for choosing to stay with us, yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: great beach from hotel
review: We stayed here for 3 nights in January 2017.  The resort is right on the beach and has all the conveniences.  Breakfast was great with heaps of options.  Our room was clean and tidy.  The beach is lovely and, in my humble opinion, much nicer that Miami Beach (where we stayed for a few days a week before we stayed on this side of Florida).  The whole feel of Clearwater is great.  It is not built up and is a 'laid back' beach town.  If you know Queensland, Australia, then Clearwater Beach is like Noosa whereas Miami Beach is like Surfers Paradise.  The Resort is a short walk to the pier and also the marina.

title: Caretta Dining
review: We had the pleasure of having Sandra serve as our waitress while dining at your facility. She lends true meaning to the term "customer service." Her pleasant and helpful demeanor was refreshing since this was our first visit to Clearwater.   She was most helpful in making recommendations to ensure we had a pleasant experience while visiting the area.  She also went out of her way to make dinner reservations for us and had our beverages on the table before we were seated; she is efficiency at its best!  Request you share this feedback with her since she was truly exceptional.

title: Simply great resort with great service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your acknowledgement our Sandra's exceptional service! We certainly appreciate the great feedback and will absolutely make sure she is aware of the high praise. Thank you for your time in completing a review of your experience.   Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Wonderful experience
review: My wife and I spent three nights at the Sandpearl Resort. This was our second visit to this wonderful property.  Beach location is simply outstanding  - broad sandy beach excellent for walking or swimming. Lots of restaurants along the beach with out being "honky tonk".  Room service breakfast and dinner were excellent - delivered timely and well prepared.  After check-out , I discovered that Inhad left a business folder in the room.  The Housekeeping Department made sure I received it via FedEx within a day. I'll certainly be back.

title: Amazing Hotel and Resort
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for your time in completing a review of your stay. We are pleased to hear that your service from our different departments was up to par! We are excited that you will return and thank you for your patronage.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Wow...the Sandpearl gets it right!
review: Just returned from a long weekend at the Sandpearl!  Just perfect. The service was spot on, from the friendly services at check-in, to my morning starbucks, to the beach and pool service, the property, the beach, the pool... all just so very nice.  We had a gulf view room, it was large clean and quiet.  Not many children, mostly adults and everyone super friendly.  A really nice property that is doing it all right.  Thanks Sandpearl...I will be back real soon!

title: Florida Getaway relaxation!
review: Dear Guest,  We are certainly pleased that your experience during your stay was pleasurable. Our objective is to exceed your expectations and we hope we succeeded. Thank you for your visit with us!  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Great Resort
review: Great location, beautiful resort. Make sure when you book a Gulf view room that it's actually looking out towards the water and not the back alley. We paid the extra and got just that. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful - from the front desk to the servers.

title: AWESOME resort!!
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for your perfect 5 rating of your stay with us. I do apologize for the inconvenience of your room preference not being met. We thank you for the constructive feedback. Its great to hear that our service was extremely helpful and we look forward to your next visit.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Great friendly family resort
review: Just returned from the Sandpearl resort. Had a gulf view room simply beautiful. The entire resort come as advertised. Pool , beach area wonderful. Both areas offer beach chairs, umbrellas complements of the resort. Also food and drink service on the beach and at the pool..Within walking distance of several shops and restaurants The resort also has free shuttle service for a limited area.Free water in your room each day. The entire staff was very helpful and a joy to be around while on vacation. Super Breakfast buffet $23.00. a good value.Very comfortable rocking chairs on the balconys.

title: What a Great Getaway!
review: My wife and i stayed at the Sandpearl for the first time at end of February. I was looking for a great place for a long weekend. We arrived on Saturday morning and were greeted by about 4 smiling faces and a nice welcome drink. We arrived before check in but they had a room ready to go quickly. The room had a beautiful view of the gulf and pool and we were quite pleased.   The highlight of the hotel is the wonderful pool and beach area. You have your choice of where you want to hangout. Anything you need they get it. We had Bill who was a great server and hustled around with a great attitude. Such a fun place.   Just took and an Uber from the airport and everything is so close to the hotel no need to have a car. They do have a shuttle service if you don't want to walk there. We…

title: Last minute family vacation - FANTASTIC !!!  We will be back
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay with us! I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed the pool during your stay and all of the amenities we have to offer. I'm so happy to hear our team provided you with exceptional service throughout your stay and I will be sure to recognize Bill for going above and beyond. Thank you again and we look forward to serving you again in the future!  Yours in Hospitality, Marcel Sanchez

title: Best in Clearwater
review: We have never been to Clearwater beach but a friend at work recommended the area. I started doing research for resorts and came across Sandpearl resort. I traveled from North Jersey with my wife and two teenage girls. Thursday through yesterday ... my wife and kids are still thanking me for the trip and we all fell in love with Sandpearl. The place is absolutely gorgeous with breath taking views from every angle. We had a double queen room facing the street but great views of the bay side and very happy with the room. The staff there and everyone for that matter we so friendly and accommodating. The pool and beach area were immaculate and the sunsets were fantastic. We will definitely be coming back her again ...hopefully sooner than later. The restaurant at the hotel and all…

title: Great place
review: I took my partner and parents here in November and had a great time. It's a great place to stay in Clearwater, where I have generally found the quality of accommodation to be poor. Sandpearl is more expensive than most options in the area but it's certainly a high quality choice. The location is unbeatable, being right on the beachfront. My only complaint is that the hotel chargers more for guests to hire loungers on the beach. Quite unbelievable really that a hotel at this level is trying to raise revenue this way. I know it spoils many peoples very positive opinions of the hotel (after seeing several arguments on the beach) and this policy needs revisiting quickly. The rooms are very nice and comfortable, while service is great. Breakfast is average and isn't cheap. In…

title: Bay view is street view!
review: We just got back.  What a great place to stay.  The beach was beautiful the hotel was awesome and the staff was helpful.  Best place in clear water.  Only negative was the restaurant service can be slow....but hey....your at the beach right!!.  Very clean upscale place to stay.

title: Great on the outside, not the same inside.
review: Stayed at this hotel for two nights--outside was amazing! Awesome pool, look and feel to this place. The rooms were a great size and the staff were wonderful for the most part. The beds were okay, but we noticed it only had a ripped mattress pad and loose sheet on top--came off each night and was hard to sleep on. A few things we were disappointed in...the bathroom wasn't the cleanest and neither was behind the bed (I'm a sucker for beds being clean as anyone would be--dust and dirt lining the wall and bed skirt behind!!), the sink made noises when you turned it on, the bathtub was deep but had a bunch of chips all over in it and was dirty around the edges and in these chips, the AC unit was loud and made noises, the resort fee says it includes beach chairs, but be careful…

title: Gorgeous Hotel and Resort
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent response.  I appreciate you taking to time to complete the review.    I have reviewed your comments with the Executive Housekeeper and looked into the issues you mentioned.  I am very sorry for the cleanliness and condition of your room.  We have high standards and take pride in our appearance but we failed in your instance.  I am also sorry for the slow service you experienced at Tate's.    If you would like to speak personally regarding your experience please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful Resort
review: I loved this hotel. It was very elegant on the inside and lots to do on the outside. Walk the sugar white beaches during the day and sit by a fire at dusk.  The pool was inviting and the gym for really nice. We enjoyed their breakfast every morning. Great omelets! If you go to Clearwater Beach, FL, stay at the Sandpearl. You won't be disappointed.

title: Beautiful resort but could use some touch ups
review: Stayed four nights! Beautiful clean setting! Excellent professional polite service from the valet to the bellhop, the greeters, front desk, gift shop, concierge, and housekeeping staff!   Our only issue was communicating with housekeeping staff as to what we needed in the room- there was four of us checked in and we consistently kept only getting 3 towels and sometimes no wash clothes with showering morning and night since we had been in the beautiful pool, jacuzzi and ocean we could have used additional towels. The housekeeper didn't Speak good english to understand our linen needs but smiled and offered us chocolates.    They served complimentary drinks as we returned one evening a very nice touch! Staff greeted us as we left and returned.   Meals/ drinks at the bar onsite…

title: relaxing, beautiful, and unparalleled customer service
review: The property is absolutely beautiful and immaculately clean! The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Our room was very nice and clean. However there were a few issues with our stay the sofa bed mattress was completely finished and was extremely uncomfortable to sleep on, They need to be replaced immediately. The Christmas dinner buffet at the restaurant was extremely disappointing and had no Christmas themed food as well. Also quite a few people would put towels on chairs to reserve them but wouldn't come back for hours. Pool staff needs to keep a closer eye on this.

title: Gorgeous resort
review: For the last 4 years we have stayed at the Sandpearl during our yearly winter break you can't find  a more beautiful hotel,,the best service and the beach is gorgeous! Everyone is friendly and is there to please you.Best resort ever!

title: Still an amazing stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort. We certainly are appreciative of your repeat business. All of are staff are eager to serve and we train often to provide 5 diamond service. Thank you for mentioning us a the "best resort ever"!  Yours in hospitlaitly,  Marcel S.

title: Nice Beachfront Hotel - But Very Loud noise from the Street side
review: We returned to the Sandpearl for the first time in about 6 years in December 2016.  Just as before, our stay was great!  The resort is super clean, the staff is very friendly, and the food is great.  We had great weather during our time there and were able to sit outside in the evenings until late at the outdoor bar.  This still remains one of our favorite places!

title: Beautiful restaurant...inside & out!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for an amazing review of our property and amenities! We are glad to hear that you chose to stay with us again and are thankful that you were satisfied. We hope that you have many more opportunities to relax with us.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Very nice hotel but lots of hidden charges.
review: Nice resort - Nice beach - good service - But lots of noise if you stay on side facing the street - Bars next door party and play music until all hours so be sure you are up high and away. Did have an issue with someone coming in my room even when I requested no service - Management did nothing

title: Amazing Resort
review: Sandpearl is an AMAZING Resort.   Our first impression of the resort was the greeting from the valet staff.  They were very pleasant and made us feel immediately welcome. One of the guys was John and I was amazed that many days later when I walked out the front door he greeted me by my name. With all my travels that has never happened to me and it really impressed me. The front desk staff was very accommodating and actually upgraded us to a beautiful room. During our stay I spoke to them many times and each and every time they were informative and helpful and all the while were smiling and happy. This is a testament to their  supervisor Lauren. Since this was my first visit to Clearwater I had many questions and needed a lot of suggestions for restaurants etc. Michael the…

title: Great for a family event!
review: Dear Guest,  WOW! We are so thankful for your kind and positive words regarding your stay with us. We definitely look to exceed all of our guests expectations and it's fantastic that you  experienced such service. We pride ourselves in 5 diamond standards and we look forward to serving you again!  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: The Sandpearl Resort is really really nice !!!!!
review: We were at the Sandpearl Resort between Christmas and New Year.  We were attending a large family event and stayed several days. The resort is beautiful, offering pool, spa, restaurants, and outdoor bar and grill, and a gorgeous beach.   Our room was on the south side of the resort, so we found it to be very noisy at night and early mornings due to bar noise, and then morning trash and delivery trucks, but the room was spacious and well done.  The staff was very friendly and helpful and we can't wait to return next year!

title: Amazing
review: We had never stayed in Clearwater Beach before and we choose the Sandpearl because of the reviews we read.  Glad we did because it was outstanding.  The staff was just incredible and you could tell they really cared to make you stay enjoyable.  The location was great for restaurants and shopping.  The beach was outstanding.  Just a great place all around.

title: Quite a nice place
review: Friendly staff wonderful amenities and the room was very clean and comfortable. Upon Arrival we received a complimentary glass of mimosa and a hand painted sand bucket for our daughter. We were then comped a free upgrade to a large two room suite! I was very pleased with our entire stay . we will definitely be coming back and we will highly recommend this place to others!

title: Great location for business meeting
review: I have stayed in the Sand Pearl numerous times for business with my company. The staff is always very professional and courteous, the facilities are excellent and the beachfront property is beautiful.

title: Awesome resort.
review: My husband and I recently stayed here and it was one of the best places we've stayed at.  Courtney at the front desk upgraded us to a suite and was extremely friendly.  Mark took our suitcases to the suite and was above and beyond friendly.  It was a great way to be welcomed.  We stayed four nights and enjoyed every minute.  All the amenities were top notch.  Would highly recommend.

title: Really nice beach resort with great amenities and staff
review: Sandpearl is a wonderful place for either couples or families to enjoy a beach vacation.  It is as nice as some 5 star hotels, but not exorbitantly priced. The facility is new, spotlessly clean, has good amenities, very good to excellent food, and is quiet & peaceful at night. The beach is huge, fine sand, and flat, but a pool and 2 soaking pools are also there. Nice exercise room, attractive spa, children's program and meeting facilities, including small business center.
