Some one and 2 bedroom suites with full kitchens and queen pull-out couch. A surprising feature is a very good sushi bar in the lovely main restaurant.  Service was flawless!  I went for a meeting, but now would like to return with family. The only drawback, common to many West Coast FL  hotels, is the bridge…

title: Great servce, nice rooms
review: One of the better paces to stay on Clearwater Beach. The service is attentive. The rooms have plenty of space, the beds comfortble, and the room is clean. The lamps are a little dark thanks to the spiarl fluorscent bulbs.

title: Perfect
review: This hotel and resort is as near to perfect as you can find in the area. The room was comfortable and staff numerous and friendly. Plenty of storage space in living area and bathroom. HVAC system great as well as TV . The free Keurig coffee is another nice touch. Only small complaint was water could be hotter and tub a bit slippery.

title: Perfect Clearwater Beach Spot
review: My wife and I spent a week here while our daughter was at USF soccer camp. We fell in love and plan to make it an annual summer trip. Great, modern facilities. Great spa. Amazing beach and surprisingly good night life. The daily sunset parties are wonderful.

title: Great Resort!!
review: Visited on the weekend in February and although it was a bit chilly, the Resort experience was great. The people definitely made the difference. Especially Elaine who kept us well fed and liquored from the pool bar and Bruce who recommended that we go to the Sunday brunch that started at 11:30. Wow, very good recommendation. Sand pearl did a great job with our whole experience. We will be back

title: Christmas at Our Happy Place - With One Issue
review: We got married at the Sandpearl in 2013 and have come back each year around our anniversary for a visit. This year we moved to Florida and weren't going home for Christmas, so decided to head to the Sandpearl for 3 nights. Overall, we had a pretty good stay, but it wasn't nearly as perfect as our previous stays. The goods first.  At check in, Samantha at the front desk was genuine and welcoming. We'd requested the gulf front junior suite we'd had for our wedding weekend and were given that for our Christmas visit. Highly recommend the gulf front suites! And we still appreciate the champagne or mimosas at check in.  Upon arrival, luggage was brought to our room by Mark, one of Sandpearl's bellhops. He brought the suitcases quickly and was quite a character!  We enjoyed lunch  at…

title: Birthday Getaway
review: Stayed at The Sandpearl for five days (1/30/17) and loved it.  It's a beautiful place on a very pretty beach.  Walking distance to some nearby restaurants.  The staff is one of the best parts about it-each and every one of them made us feel welcome and at home.  We also saw one of the most beautiful sunsets we've ever seen from our balcony-and we've seen a few!  Highly recommended.

title: Amazing getaway to the sun and beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your great rating of our property. We certainly appreciate your kinds comments towards our staff. We all strive to provide the best service possible. We truly thank you for staying with us and look forward to serving you again.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Pools and pool area were closed - no notice given - still was charged $29 resort fee
review: Stayed weekend of 1/14/17.  This is one of the nicest hotel resorts in Clearwater beach.  Were it not for the issues with the pool area, I would give it an above-average rating.  But I feel that the hotel did a poor job of handling the pool closure.  This was not a one-day closure, but a longer-term project.  I was given no notice of the closure before my arrival.  Upon arrival I was advised of the closure and was told that another pool in the area was available for use.  At time of checkout I noticed a $29/day resort fee charged to me.  I inquired about waiver or reduction of the fee given that the pool area was closed and was told that this was not possible.  I don't think this is good customer service - the resort fee is a profit-center and most of the resort was out of…

title: Christmas Trip
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of your stay in Clearwater Beach.  Please accept my apologies for the pool closure.  The pool was closed from January 11th until February 1st for necessary updates and repairs.  We did communicate this on our website, emails and during the reservation process.  I am not sure how you booked but I apologize that you were not aware.  I understand how frustrating this experience can be when you expect to be able to relax poolside during your time in Florida.  Again, thank you for staying with us.  We hope you choose to come and see us again.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: The Best in Clearwater!!!
review: Loved the hotel and the setting. Good places to eat at the hotel. Friendly staff and very nice rooms. Located on a great beach. Nice town with good restaurants and shops. Definitely look forward to another visit soon.

title: To recommand
review: Dear Guest,  We are thankful for your recent review of your stay with us. Your kind words are truly appreciated! It's a pleasure to know that you enjoyed to areas amenities and our friendly staff. We look forward to serving you again!  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: We've stayed here numerous times in the past and have always had excellent service and accommodations...this trip was equally as wonderful. Lauren, at the front desk, went over and above to accommodate us and make us feel welcome and very special. This was a business trip for my husband (who's been deployed 18 months out of the last 2 years) and I tagged along to look at property for sale in the area. We made it a couples trip as well since we've been away from each other so much. Every member of the staff was terrific, the food was great and our room was fantastic.  Thank you, Lauren, for everything!  We will be back soon!

title: Arrived to a drained, under repair pool and all the noise associated with it.
review: The staff was, by far, the best part of our experience and I had a great spa treatment.  The beaches in that area are always amazing so can't go wrong there.  Otherwise, average to disappointing.  The carpet in our room had a sticky spot and we had to leave a towel over it.  The bedding was very average for what I would have expected.  The WORST part was that the pool was being repaired and we weren't informed of that until we checked in.  I consider that very, very bad business.  An ugly drained pool doesn't make for a nice view.  Compound that by the noise of concrete cutting and sanding that carried straight up to our balcony and could even be heard on the beach.  I'm not just talking about regular work day hours either.  6:00 p.m. on Friday night we were still listening to…

title: Lovely hotel on a pristine beach
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I was glad to hear that you enjoyed our team and had a great spa treatment.    I am very sorry to hear about the carpet in your room.  I have spoken to our Executive Housekeeper regarding it to make sure that we are catching these things during our daily cleaning.    I am also sorry for the inconvenience caused by having our pool closed.  We did our best to inform all guests of the pool closure by sending emails to pre-made reservations alerting them of the repairs, we posted information on our website, we alerted our reservation agents to address this and we alerted all of our third party booking organizations that our pool was going to be closed.  I am not sure how you booked but my apologies for you not getting the information.  The pool was closed for maintenance on January 10th and will re-open by Tuesday, January 31st at the latest  Again, my apologies for this issue.  I hope that you decide to join us again in the future.  I am sure that you will have a great time with us.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Went for a conference fell in love
review: I stayed 2 nights at this hotel for a business meeting, used room service and my husband took advantage of the gym facilities and beach.  Very nice hotel, attractive decor, very clean, on a gorgeous white beach.  Our room had a great wraparound balcony which looked right over the beach.  It was lovely but the room was a handicapped room and if you were in a wheelchair you could not have gotten over ledge onto the balcony.  I walk with a cane so I was able to enjoy the balcony.  Nice clean meeting rooms and pleasant decor.  Would return for more meetings or a vacation.  Good service.

title: Natty
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your time in completing a review of your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that your room was lovely. We appreciate you feedback in the noticing our attention to detail around the property. The ledge in the room is due to hurricane safety regulations and we do provide a ramp if needed.   Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to serving you soon.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Fantastic Resort on Clearwater Beach
review: the staff was great, the resort was clean, the property has great sun set views, my room had a nice porch to sit on and over looked the beautiful pool, the beach was amazing, the drinks were pricey but hey what do you expect!

title: Piece of heavan
review: Was here on this property on a business conference in January. Wonderful weather, awesome property and excellent view of spectacular sunsets from the beach front resort. The resort is a great place to experience and the staff have all been exceptional in service and attentiveness. Rooms were comfortable and clean. Would recommend this property to anyone staying in the Tampa Clearwater area.

title: Sandpearl is #1
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so very much for your positive review of our resort! We are pleased to know that your stay was exceptional. We also love our sunsets and are glad you enjoyed! We look forward to serving you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Excellent Getaway
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for our honeymoon. Our stay was perfect! We had a 1 bedroom suite with beautiful view of the Gulf!  The sand on the beach felt like talcum powder on your feet!  We were treated like royalty! Everyone was so nice!  The whole clearwater area was so beautiful!

title: Great weekend trip
review: Dear Guest,  Congratulations on the wedding! We are please that you chose us for a honeymoon destination. I am also very happy to hear of your wonderful experience in our resort. I hope our staff and accommodations have helped to create some long lasting memories. We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Warm Regards,  Elliot F.

title: Exceptional!
review: Right on the beach, with an extremely large pool, towel service, and two extremely large jacuzzi tubs. Very friendly and courteous staff. Van service around town if you don't feel like walking. Coffee shop in the hotel that serves Starbucks. On the beach restaurant. Pretty high end but very family friendly (we have three kids). Hit all the right points, and then some. We stayed in a junior suite. Absolutely worth it. Will stay there again.

title: Lovely hotel but no so good second time around
review: We have stayed here before so thought what better way to end 2 weeks in Orlando than a few days at the beach.  The hotel was just as we remembered, and so we settled into our lovely ocean view suite.  We were booked for 3 nights so enough to relax before flying home.  We had a nice few days but to be honest we got bored this round and on day 3 (departure day) the weather was awful - the storm was here! (not hotels fault of course) but this just meant lots of families hanging around the lobby. No where to get food unless you ordered room service, no where to get drinks.  They did set up one of the functions rooms and put a movie on a big screen and set up a games table etc but this was advertised anywhere ad it was only by over hearing another family we knew about it.  Wifi…

title: Great place
review: Very beautiful hotel with well kept grounds, pool and beach. We checked in early and checked out late with the kindness of the front desk staff. The Tate grill was perfect for our lunch and dinner needs. The beach helpers were always hustling to help guests with chairs and food or drinks. Fabulous service and fantastic place!! We will be back.

title: Great Hotel
review: I stayed at the Sandpearl Resort and I was 100% satisfied with their service. Everyone at the hotel was extremely generous and hard working. It was a plus that the hotel was right on the beach, so there was easy access and the view from the rooms were beautiful. The rooms were also beautiful. There was so much to do at the hotel and there was access to many stores and restaurants. One thing that wasn't great was it took over an hour for them to bring our baggage up.

title: New Year's Eve weekend
review: Lovely 5 star hotel over looking the sea , there are only two hotels overlooking the sea Hilton and the sand pearl resort the hotel rooms where lovely nice and clean and comfortable lovely balcony over looking the sea with two rocking chairs on it , on the premises there is a Starbuck coffee shop didn't have any meals in the hotel  as it looks very disappointing there is only two restaurant one overlooking the sea does lunch and and one inside does breakfast and dinner near the bar ,we had booked New Year's Eve dinner but it was just in an ordinary room just of the bar and they where charging $169 per person  and not many people where dressing up so we cancel this and book a nice restaurant called islands way grill which was a lot better and much nicer and plenty of…

title: Amazing Property
review: This isn't our first vacation to Clearwater Beach, but staying here sure makes it feel that way. We used to stay at a name brand down the street, which we liked, but this place makes that one seem like Motel 6.  The property is flawless and the customer service is incredible. You know how you always meet that one, really nice person at your hotel when you're on vacation.  That one person you go out of your way to tip or provide a great review on?  This place found those people and hired them all. Every single person is personable, but not overly intrusive, (which I think is a gift in the service industry).  We arrived late because our flight was delayed 6 hours. I called the Hotel to let them know and when we finally arrived at 2 AM a bellman named Rich was waiting for us, knew…

title: Expensive but good customer service
review: Two days cost about $870. I attended a wedding and the resort required two days. First person I met was the valet, he was awesome. Second the lady that checked me in, awesome and a former police officer named Mark brought my clothes up, he was fantastic. Pool looked cool and the location was clean. Room was clean but underwhelming for the expense. I find most Loft Hotels more appealing. Two glasses of orange juice was $10. I have stayed in the area many times for less than $200 and had the same experience. As a law enforcement officer the expense was way more than I can afford for an average trip. My suggestion just go to Hawaii!

title: Impeccable service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your response and constructive feedback regarding your stay with us. We certainly appreciate your patronage and hope that you choose to return. We offer an array of amenities that I hope you have an opportunity to enjoy. We thank you for noticing our staff by name.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Just like The Ritz
review: Stayed here Dec 26-30, 2016. The hotel is just the right size - not too large and not too small. The best thing about the hotel is its location on the beach. It is far enough away from the hustle and bustle of the public beach, yet still busy enough for great people watching. I love the beach service - the servers are ready to take your order and bring your food out to you. We had great weather all of the days but Friday when we checked out, but the kids activities desk did have the hotel ballrooms set up all day for kids. The location and service is the main reason to stay here!

title: Fantastic Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your recent perfect rating of the Sandpearl Resort! We are so pleased to hear that you frequently stay here. It's a pleasure to know that you enjoy our amenities and that you return because of our service!  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Holiday in the sunshine in December!
review: We did not stay at this hotel but checked-it out. Plush and all the bells and whistles of a quality property. We enjoyed the breakfast buffet, and excellent value considering it was less costly than the anemic buffet at the Hyatt Regency. (Also the food displays at the SeaPeal are at adult hight, not too low for little hands to reach)

title: SIMPLY FABULOUS!
review: My wife and I booked into this resort on the spur of the moment having checked it out on a day trip to the area.  We could have not been more pleased.  The standard of service given by all employees, valets, bellmen, receptionists, pool attendants and housekeeping was all one could wish for.  Our room looked out over the huge pool to the sparkling white sand beach and the Gulf and provided a great view of the Gulf sunsets.  We so much enjoyed taking all that in from our balcony complete with rocking chairs. The room was large, well furnished including a refrigerator, coffee maker and wide screen TV.  The king sized  bed was very comfortable.  The bathroom was equally large with top notch fittings, super thirsty towels and a luxurious bathrobe.  We were celebrating our 45th…

title: Best Customer Service in the World!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your time in completing a recent perfect 5 review of our property. It's fabulous that your room was to your liking and that your wedding anniversary was a pleasurable experience. We certainly strive to provide the best service possible, thank you for mentioning that your service was "all you could wish for".  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Weekend getaway
review: Simply the best facility, service and family experience you can get. Hands down every single thing was perfect. Courteous, helpful, mindful... we left feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. My oldest said on the way off the property "I miss it already". We will always come back to the Sandpearl!

title: Fantastic Resort!!!
review: Dear Guest,  We are so very pleased with your great review of the Sandpearl Resort! Thank you for your patronage and loyalty as guest of the property. We are happy that you continue to enjoy our amenities and that your family is able to make lasting memories here.  We look forward to serving you soon!  Marcel S.

title: Birthday Upgrade! Loved this resort!
review: Once in a while you have to break the routine. We used to go to the Ritz in Sarasota but prices are ridiculous.  We tried Sandpearl and it was a homerun. Lots of countries represented.  Beach is great.   Pool is beautiful.  Food is good.   Mayne not great but very good.   Service is a bit slow.   All good.

title: Beachfront Paradise!
review: I can't say enough about how much my family loved our stay at the Sandpearl.  When I booked the room I noted that it would be my 7 year old son's first trip to the beach and they responded by calling me in advance to get details so that they would have a special surprise ready for him when we checked in.  Beyond that we walked into the most beautiful hotel room we have ever stayed in and were greeted with chocolate covered strawberries and a personalized letter addressed to our son.  The hotel was amazing, the staff was very friendly and welcoming, and the location was perfect.  We will definitely return and recommend this hotel to anyone who needs a beach getaway!

title: Relaxing Oasis
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you so much for your recent review and are certainly pleased that you enjoyed your time with us. We take pride in providing lasting memories for all of our guests and families. We are happy that you were able to enjoy our lovely beach and the amenities we have to offer.  Thank you,  Marcel S.

title: Nice hotel but over priced.
review: The employees at the Sandpearl are professional, accommodating and pleasant. The front desk staff was so accommodating and the housekeeping was efficient and cleaned everything so nicely! We looked forward to the chocolate and quotes everyday.   The water is pristine and the beach welcomes you . Waking up the the sounds of the waves and seeing clear blue skies was just what we needed being from New York City. We never wanted to leave!   We visited the week before Christmas and we never had a problem finding a chair on the beach or by the pool, it was actually pretty quiet. We did notice that the closer it got to Dec 25th, the busier it became with families. At night there is so much to do within a few blocks but if you are interested in staying in, they sometimes have live…

title: Luxurious & Expensive
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind words regarding our property. It's great to know that your experience was outstanding! All of our associates strive to go above and beyond for every guest. We also appreciated you noticing our attention to details which make your stay more pleasurable. We thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to serving you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Nov 16 Sunset
review: The hotel was fine. Rooms were nice with comfy bed and big bathrooms. Pool nice & breakfast good (but expensive).   My main gripe for a 5* hotel is that, bar the spirits, everything in the mini bar was out of date. Not a week or two out of date, some of the items were over a year past their best before date!!

title: Family vacation
review: Every December my parents come from Idaho to visit me and we stay here and it is always such a good time. Amazing and helpful staff members. We had great service and the food was delicious! Overall amazing vacation and looking forward to next year.

title: Best service beware of coastal rooms
review: We stayed for 2 nights and enjoyed all the amenities the hotel offered. Great service throughout the hotel! But the rooms with the coastal view facing the north had a view of a roof of a building with air conditioning noise blaring when you opened the balcony door. We stayed on the 5th floor. We had 2 rooms 1 room the ac didn't work.

title: Amazing place
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review.  I am glad to hear that you liked our service as well as our amenities.  I am sorry to hear that you did not like the view from your coastal view room.  I am also sorry that you had issues with your air conditioning.  We take much pride and spend a lot of time on the maintenance of our property so I am sorry that issues occurred during your stay.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please do not hesitate to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Birthday party
review: We had my wife's company Christmas party here at this Resort over the weekend we absolutely had a blast. The food was awesome the staff was incredible mimosas at check-in you really can't ask for much better. The views of the beach and the sunset or awesome

title: Excellent choice for families...even picky ones.
review: Clean but dated rooms.  Fabulous amenities including a gorgeous pool, private beach area, sand toys and hot tubs.    The beach live music was a plus and the drinks were delicious!     Make sure to stake out your beach chair early, people claim the good spots at the crack of dawn!

title: Best on the Beach
review: This is a beautiful full service resort with a fine dining restaurant and a very attentive and friendly staff. Great location with other fun spots nearby. Gorgeous pool and beach area. The pool bar area offers creative cocktails and beautiful sunsets.

title: Great but.....
review: Dear Guest,  We are very appreciative of your kind words about our property. It's an honor that you consider our resort the "Best on the Beach". We thank you for taking the time in completing a review of your stay. We are anxious to serve you again.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Superior Service with Awe Inspiring Views
review: I visited the resort with my family after Thanksgiving. The resort is beautiful and the service great. However, beware of the extra charges for the sun loungers, parking ($25 daily) and guest daily charge. These really add to the cost of the holiday. However, as a special treat it's simply wonderful.

title: nice but does not stand apart in any way
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay with us. We are happy to hear that your stay was simply wonderful. We thank you for choosing to stay with us during your holiday. We look forward to providing you with great service again!  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Worth every penny.
review: I stayed at the Sandpearl Resort on December 5, 2016 with my cousin who was in Clearwater Beach on business.  From the moment we pulled up to the front door, the experience was outstanding to say the least. Lydia greeted us with such a genuine smile and exudes welcome with grace.  Travis Samuels assisted us at the front desk and was professional, engaging and a true example of the high level of customer service this resort delivers.  Nicki Menapace made me an outstanding coffee drink and was an absolute pleasure to know.  Her service was impeccable and her genuine, kind personality was terrific!  Christina Kertprotsombat and Cory King, the activities, pool/beach attendants were the best I've ever experienced!  Not only were they professional, they were eager to assist with…

title: Perfect
review: From the moment we arrived, the whole stay was perfect. Mannie, was friendly and he professionalism was refreshing in a world where few take pride in their job. I wish I could name all the others, but EVERY person on staff here went above and beyond. Our one bedroom condo was perfect, the view was breathtaking. Opal properties are always a step above.

title: Great location, lovely facilities, right on the Beach!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your pleasant review about our resort. We are truly grateful for your patronage and are pleased that your frequent Opal properties! Thank you for mentioning our staff that went above and beyond. We look forward to serving you again.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Great Escape
review: This is a beautiful beach side resort, with a great pool, fine dining, poolside service, an excellent spa and fun kids programs.   Easy walking or the "jolly trolley" to Clearwater Beach restaurants shopping and attractions.  Staff are wonderful too!

title: AMAZING!  Worth every penny!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your positive feedback regarding your stay with us! Your comments towards our staff are certainly appreciated. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed the surrounding area and our many amenities.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Amazing resort!!
review: The Sandpearl was a wonderful experience. The rooms ,views, staff. pool and beach were excellent. The sunset was spectacular. The location is convenient several restaurants close by no need to drive. Easier then going to Caribbean.

title: # 1 as Far as I am Concern
review: Just had 4 wonderful nights at the Sandpearl   From the time you pull up and the Great Front door staff and Valet greets you and within minutes your checking in.     Check in was quick and streamline  (Travis) greeted us with a smile went over all necessary check in paper work and gave us our keys     Room was perfect , everything clean and neat and working    Mannie brought our luggage up and through out our stay if he seen us and other guest he would reach out and ask if all was ok and if we needed anything     This is probably our 6 th trip to sand pearl  Hope to return in 2017 for another great stay    Thanks to all at Sandpearl it truly a great staff there that works together

title: Beautiful....
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your recent review! Here at the Sandpearl, our main priority is guest satisfaction and happiness and we are glad to hear all of our associates did all they could to make your experience top notch! We look forward to all of you future stays with us!   With Hospitality,  Nicki M.

title: Weekend getaway was awesome!
review: Stayed at this hotel with my Mum, Wife and 2 Girls 3&6, we stayed in a suite which was spacious and very well furnished. The pool was nice but the chairs were too close together and so took some of the shine off of the high quality of the hotel. Other than this, the hotel is in a beautiful spot, accessible to local attractions, located right on the beach with fantastic sunsets. A great place to stay for a long weekend.

title: Highly recommended
review: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time here at the Sandpearl with your family. We do agree that the hotel is located just perfectly on Clearwater beach where guests can relax as well as enjoy the attractions the area has to offer it's visitors. We hope you can come back and stay with us again soon!  With Hospitality, Nicki M.

title: Our 3rd visit!
review: First visit to this property for a quick getaway. Well appointed hotel on the beach close to all activities. We had a gulf front room with a great view of pool and beach. This area is quite touristy with more than enough Tshirt shops close by.  Food was very good at the beach/pool restaurant. Also had a great breakfast in the main restaurant. Fair priced and great quality. I would stay here again with no regrets.

title: Top 5 Star Resort on beautiful beach
review: We really enjoyed our romantic stay at the Sandpearl Resort. Our suite was spacious, tastefully furnished, clean and well equipped. Beds were very comfy and we enjoyed the nice inside sitting area as well as the cute little balcony overlooking the beautiful beach. Food was great and our days on the private beach a delight.

title: Went for a wedding
review: Dear Guest,  We very much appreciate your kind words regarding your past stay. We take tremendous pride in our property and we thank you for noticing our attention to details. We look forward to servicing you soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Caretta's
review: Nice hotel.  Great view and room was spacious.  For the area and price it was great for our family.  Liked the Starbucks in lobby.  Did not like that they charged for everything including the steamer for my wife's dress.  Breakfast buffet was great but expensive and pool restaurant was also enjoyable.   Bonus was champagne in lobby.

title: With kids and grandkids.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review of our resort. We are certainly pleased that your stay was enjoyable. We appreciate that you were able to utilize many of our amenities and we hope you can visit us again!  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Awesome Days at Sanpearl
review: My friends from out of state wanted to take us to a restaurant on the water so we chose Caretta's because we have been there a few times and liked it. The experience was AWFUL!!!   First of all the so called "Elixer" drink was supposed to be served in a pineapple, but was told they didn't have any, so they gave it to us in 2 large stemmed glasses. (ok...so what we thought).  When seated at our table, we ordered appetizers and they came at a reasonable time.  Then we waited over an HOUR to get our dinner, and there was only 5 other tables being served, so they were not busy!!   The server NEVER came to us and offered us any extra bread nor did she apologize for the delay!! She simply chose to stay away from us. We finally spotted her and called her over and asked where was our…

title: Does not dissapoint
review: This place is beautiful and they do a great job to welcome you and make you feel special.  We requested a ocean view and for not a lot an upcharge was applied and glad we did the view was amazing. The room and facilities were spectacular. They really thought of the details.  From relaxed dining to fine dining.  There is a nice beach bar and gas fire pit to enjoy the evening on the beach.   Would definitely recommend if you were going to drop a little extra cash this would be the place.  There is a $29 ammenities/service fee for wifi, bottle water etc.  Valet parking is mandatory for $25.  So there are a few extra charges which was the only negative.

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at the Sandpearl. We are so glad to hear your acknowledgement of the attention to detail the Sandpearl puts forward every day to please our guests staying here. The views from the hotel, especially towards the beach, really can't be beat and we hope you have the chance to come and stay with us again.   With Hospitality, Nicki M

title: Great vacation - Amazing Review
review: Stayed here for 2 nights as part of our honeymoon, after getting engaged here 2 years ago. To me this is pure luxury and the best hotel I've ever been to. Love and would love to return again one day.  Greeted with a glass of champagne and because it was a special occasion upgraded to a sea view room. WOW!

title: Great place for a break!
review: Dear Guest,   First of all, congratulations! Thank you for you reviewing your recent celebratory stay with us! We are delighted to hear that you were able to share great memories here at the Sandpearl, and hope for many more to come!  With Hospitality, Nicki M

title: Nice stay, but I think I'm done here.
review: We were the guests at the SandPearl resort for 5 nights during the fall of 2016.  It was off-peak time, so the rates were a little lower and the number of guests was down.  We received 1st class service from the entire staff at all times. We were met by the staff with glasses of champagne right after checking in.  The entire atmosphere of the hotel was very calming and when presented by the ocean view, it was an outstanding start to the vacation. We stayed in a double queen room that was facing the ocean.  We had a balcony which had an outstanding view of the resort amenities. The room was kept daily very clean with the maids providing a turn down service each evening.  The room had complementary coffee for each morning, hair dryer, safe for valuables, iron and a workstation for…

title: Family holiday
review: Stayed here for four nights in october before heading to disney nice enough hotel with good facilities ,food and drink is a little bit expensive for what it is , but its nice to have an on site coffee shop ,the veiw from my room over a roof wasn't the best , the pool area was busy and can imagine it must be packed in high season ,but the private beach area was fantastic ,with a nice night time open fire area ,the only thing i really didnt like was the daily valet parking fee of $25 , but over all a nice hotel

title: Amazing view!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for the taking the time to review your stay with us. We do agree that having a coffee shop onsite as well as private beach access is something to be celebrated at our beautiful property. We hoped you enjoyed your continued holiday in Disney and have the opportunity to stay with us again in the future.  With Hospitality, Nicki M

title: Bad check-in experience
review: I had the pleasure of being a guest in the Sandpearl hotel, for two nights, during our holiday in Clearwater - Florida! We had a warm welcome by the hotel stuff, that were always smiling to us, trying to make our stay more pleasant! The room was very clean, had a fresh-summery smell..with one of the most amazing views I.ve ever seen!  During our stay, we made dear memories..with unforgettable sunsets! I really hope to come back someday :)

title: Summer holiday at Sandpearl Resort
review: Dear Guest,   Our largest goal here at the Sandpearl is to assure guests feel welcomed and happy throughout their whole stay; we are so happy to hear that this service was provided to you! We do hope you can stay with us again in the future, continue to make more memories, and witness beautiful sunsets!   With Hospitality. Nicki M

title: There's Potential
review: We arrived Saturday evening a day later than booked as our flight from the UK had been delayed by 24 hrs.  In London I'd called the hotel to advise that we would be a day late but that we still wanted to stay the other night (booked 2).  On arrival we explained to the receptionist what had happened as she failed to initially find our booking. We found her very rude and unhelpful and at this point my partner went back to the car to find the booking reference number.  She then asked me a few times who I spoke with when I called as there were no notes on the booking from the advisor (she'd found it by this time but hadnt told us!) Her attitude really was that she didn't believe that I had made this call ... why would i make this up?  She didnt welcome us to the resort, break into…

title: Love the Sandpearl
review: This was our 3rd time here for a work retreat and it was fabulous! The food was amazing, the service was great,  pool was always super inviting and you can't beat the location on the beach. The staff was really wonderful. The rooms are very modern and clean. Great place for business gatherings, families and couples. Looking forward to going back!

title: Great location big rooms, still amateur level service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your choosing to stay with us. We are delighted to here that your stay was a success and that you are looking forward to coming back. Whatever your reason for staying, business or pleasure we are anxious to serve you again!  Yours in hospitlaltiy,  Marcel S.

title: New favorite
review: We were here for Mother's Day weekend and the property is great the rooms nice however the service such as room service, front desk help , full service restaurants left much to be desired. 5 star location, 3 star service. The pool food and service was a plus and run well.

title: Fabulous Hotel and Facilities.
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl.  I am glad to hear that you liked the property.  Please accept my apologies for the service you received throughout your stay.  If you would like to speak personally to give me more information please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Perfect
review: This hotel is my new favorite place to stay on Clearwater Beach.  I just wish they had an adults only section so I didn't have to listen to the screaming little brat in the room next door. Everything else was great.

title: Fun Girls' Trip
review: What a wonderful resort.  We wanted to make the most of the weekend and looked for a top-rated beach that was easy to get to.  Clearwater was just 30 minutes from the airport.  The added bonus was that Tripadvisor rated the beach as #1 in the USA.  The hotel was situated right on the beach and was luxurious.  The staff was attentive and helpful.  The hotel restaurant was excellent.  We went in April, the weather was perfect and the hotel was not too busy.  The beach was out of this world!  The only negative was that both days, at 4:00, the attendants began driving their ATV in and out of the chairs on the beach gathering up towels.  I was stunned.  They literally drove up and down the rows of chairs gathering up towels and piling them onto the back of the ATV. If there are…

title: Parents and kids loved it
review: Dear Guest,  We are so grateful for your recent stay with us and we thank you for your honest feedback regarding your visit. I do apologize the attendants you witnessed picking up towels were not as professional as you'd expect.  We are happy that you did overall enjoy your visit and we are certainly thankful for your patronage. We hope to serve you soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: What a lovely resort!!
review: Wonderful hotel. Nice staff and plenty to keep busy with at the hotel. We were always able to find a space at the pool, the rooms were nice, the location was great. We would go back,. Activities for the kids, fire pits and seating areas by the beach and plenty of places in walking distance to do other stuff.

title: A Perfect Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind words regarding your recent stay with us. I'm glad we were able to provide you and your family with lasting memories. Your ultimate satisfaction is our goal and we are certainly looking forward to serving you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Love this hotel
review: We just left our first stay here, a short 2 night 38th anniversary getaway. We sure hope it is not our last! We arrived around noon, after being greeted by the welcoming valet team and door greeter. I mentioned we were celebrating our 38th, did not request an upgrade but the gracious front desk young lady upgraded us from the least expensive coastal view room I had booked to a lovely, 3rd floor junior suite overlooking the pool and ocean! We also received Mimosas - what a great start!! We also received chocolate covered strawberries one evening at turn down, with chocolate writing saying Happy Anniversary. :)  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The pool, beach, hot tubs, poolside service from Tate's Grill, breakfast at Carettas on the Gulf - we recommend them all! We also enjoyed…

title: Beautiful resort but very uncomfortable stay
review: The resort is absolutely beautiful. The location is excellent. However, the rooms are not very comfortable. We are staying in a gulf view king room. The bed mattress is very uncomfortable and both my husband and I wake up every day with a headache and back ache which is very uncommon for us. Also, the fan in the bathroom does not work and you have to wait till the steam all goes away before you can get ready  after your shower. Also, the walls are so thin that you can hear your neighbours to the point that we are actually hearing the guy next door snoring. No exaggeration. Everything is wonderful here, except for the room. We have not had a good night's sleep since we got here. If we could, we would move to another hotel.

title: THIS HOTEL HAVE THE BEST LOCATION  ,   LOVE IT !!! ,!!!!!!!!!!!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.  I am very sorry that you did not like several aspects of your stay.  We are in the process of changing out our mattresses to a new type so perhaps during your next stay you will enjoy them more.  I am also assuming that you stayed in a room with a connecting door as there is more opportunity for noise issues.    If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Again, thank you for staying with us.  Regards, Eric Waltz

title: Great from start to finish !!
review: Beautiful hotel an a GREAT LOCATION  with a beach access is just steps from the pool ,nice  rooms we stay in a room with balcony  and a ocean view , very clean room , the only thing that seems that they were short on bell boys ( while it was 2 boys stand up out side by the doors ) we  wait for the bell boy for 20' after checking in   My husband was getting upset we were tired ,coming from WDW ( 5days) & all the walking , we wanted to relax &  the concierge offer to storage our suitcases in the mean time I HAVE TO REMINDED  to the front desk lady ..." How about  our welcoming glass of champagne  ???....so the young lady  apologized and brought our glass of champagne and we finished bringing the suitcases to our room . The hotel restaurant  " CARETTA "has great food , we eat the…

title: "Fabulous Sunsets!"
review: My wife and I booked a stay here awhile back and recently stayed for four nights. The service was top notch from the moment we met the bellman to check-in. The Hotel is very nice and I really liked the murals throughout the lobby. We really enjoyed our one bedroom suite. It was very clean and I liked how large the bathroom was. My only complaint would be some modifications to the kitchen. I cooked meals frequently and I wish there was a standard size garbage can; and I felt the kitchen utensils could be upgraded. Aside from that we loved our stay. We enjoyed the beach and our daughter just loved pool. We really couldn't get enough and the staff was very nice and professional. We would definitely stay here again!

title: Great weekend
review: Dear guest,   We appreciate you taking the time to review our property after your stay with us. Thank you for your constructive feedback about the aspect of your room you did not find pleasing. We will be addressing the issue and seeing what can be done for future stays.   The service standard at our hotel is of great importance to us and every department is staffed accordingly. We do hope you are able to come and experience our excellent staff and amenities again sometime soon!  With Hospitality, Marcel S.

title: Beautiful hotel but not so friendly service
review: the hotel and grounds are beautiful and the location is the best as it is right on the beach but the last couple of time we visited the staff in the dining area were not very friendly or accommodating. It was a hot day and we wanted to sit indoors but they refused to close them. We told them we were going to leave and they seemed fine with it. It's sad really that they could care less.

title: Dynamite
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  I am glad that you liked the resort overall with the exception of the service in the restaurant.  I am assuming you were referring to our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf and the door that leads from the restaurant to the balcony.  We could have easily accommodated your request if that was the case.  My apologies if that did not happen.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Excellent place to eat
review: excellent location right on the beach and just a nice 10min walk away from the Center. reception was more than helpful. The rooms were spotless I Would recommend this hotel to anyone going there. Breakfast is well worth the price.. Cant praise this hotel enough.10/10

title: Incredible
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel after your recent stay with us. We take pride in staffing all of our hotel with friendly, service oriented people and we are delighted to hear that our associates made your stay the best it could be. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!  With Hospitality,  Marcel S

title: Very disappointing stay
review: Didn't stay here, but stopped in for drinks one night with my wife and returned with our kids for Sunday AM breakfast. The atmosphere is grand and relaxing. We didn't eat at the Sunday brunch; we just ordered from the menu. Everything was excellent, especially my lox & bagel, which turned out to be a meal in itself.   The staff was professional and on top of things. Would like to stay here next time we go to the beach. Overall, much nicer than the Hilton that is a few blocks south.

title: Great stay at knights inn
review: The staff was helpful at where to go. And what to do in town  room was nice and clean every thing worked  service was great  staff was friendly well lit parking lot  price was good  knights inn Chattanooga tn. The best for the price

title: 20 years of living here and this is Best Hotel we've been to on Clearwater Beach
review: We came in for just two nights this week for our Anniversary. We got an upgrade to Ocean front king suite #868. Right from check in Courtney made our stay special, champagne and friendly staff abound. Excellent service. Room was wonderful, huge 800 sq ft. Very quiet .Two balconys- one was  from our bedroom. Both balconies had Adirondack rockers, fun and relaxing. Perfect views of Gulf. Big open kitchen with full size fridge.  Dryer and washer in suite .Garden jet tub and big shower. Two comfy couches , one in bedroom.  Tate Island grill by the pool had incredible Pork Nachos, good bar tender and service to pool was fast and efficient. Short walk to CVS, other stores too. Highly recommend SandPearl. Modern at its best. Looking forward to going back again. It's a great replacement…

title: Superb experience
review: Dear Guest,  Your kind words regarding your stay are truly appreciated! We thank you for mentioning Courtney and how all our staff provided excellent service. We are eager to serve you again and look forward to your next stay. Your consideration that we are the best hotel on Clearwater beach is what we strive for.  Thank you, yours in hospitality.  Marcel S.

title: Finally! A Resort that Lives Up to its Reputation!
review: Amazing suit room. High end everything and very reasonably priced. Huge bath. Good sized kitchen and living room. Pleasing master. All well appointed. Balcony looking out onto the gulf was very special.  Excellent service. Lovely bar area and reception area. Beach side restaurant was fun - small menu but perfect for our needs. Pool area very family friendly. Very much recommend a trip to the Sandpearl. I know I'm going back

title: best hotel ever
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review of our property. We are grateful for your patronage and are  please that your stay went very well! We are happy to know that you will return soon.  We look forward to serving you soon!  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Simply Amazing
review: I spent 2 nights here with my mom and sisters for a girls getaway to celebrate my mom's 60th birthday. We had a great time and spent our full second day by the pool only moving down a few chairs to find a little more shade. We had the breakfast buffet which was quite delicious and ate our other 2 meals poolside. Our server by the pool was Bill and he was super amazing and helpful! It is a fantastic resort: clean, comfortable (the pillows are awesome and I am a pillow snob that normally takes my pillow on a trip), and really quiet (except for the sliding door in the room above us)!

title: Wonderful!
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for your time in completing a review of the Sandpearl Resort. We are happy that you chose to celebrate your special occasion with us! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed many aspects of our property, from the pillows, the pool to our breakfast buffet. Thank you for mentioning Bill by name as we strive to provide excellent service.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: SandPearl
review: Everything is first class!  Customer service is stellar from the valet team to the front desk team to the housekeeping team.  Everyone was pleasant and helpful.  First impressions are key and it didn't hurt to be greated with a complimentary glass of champagne if you wanted to enjoy one.  The food was spectacular and well prepared.  The room was comfortable.  The setting was perfect for that picture perfect sunset.

title: Great holiday hotel on the beach
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort! We are pleased to know that your stay was "first class!" I agree that the sunsets are picture perfect and Im glad you had an opportunity to enjoy them. We look forward to serving you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Absolutely LOVE this place !!
review: This is a beautiful resort in a spectacular location right on the beach. All staff we encountered were friendly and very helpful. Rooms are clean and nicely appointed with balconies with views of the coast and/or the bay. Pool is small but nice. Pool side bar is conveniently with a good variety of food and beverages. They also offer outdoor seating to watch the amazing sunsets. Definitely recommend this resort

title: Excellent First Family Vacation!
review: We just returned from our first family vacation ( two adults and a two year old) that we spent at he Sandpearl Resort. We had originally booked at a different hotel but because of the superior customer service I received from the Sandpearl concierge (especially Jose) we decided to cancel that reservation and go to Sandpearl instead. It was the best decision we could have made. The excellent customer service continued from Amir at checkin to Mikah and Elaine at the pool and beach. It was a great week and we hope to be back again in the future.

title: Much better than our last visit!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort! We are excited that your experience was to your liking. We also agree that Jose, Amir, Mikah, and Elaine are fantastic! We are looking forward to serving you again!  Regards,  Marcel S>

title: Overpriced Disapointment
review: My husband and I were at the Sandpearl with our family over Labor Day weekend. We were traveling with our 12 month old and our family. The last time we were there (may 2016) our experience was sub par. We are frequent Sandpearl guests and were so disappointed.   I will say this time, the Sandpearl is back on track! A special thanks to GM Eric who took such great care of us. They went over and beyond to welcome us back and make sure we were having a great time! The Sandpearl is our go-to local getaway and we will definitely be back!!!

title: Best Hotel I've Ever Been To, PERIOD!!
review: Dear Guest,  Your patronage is certainly appreciated! We thank you for your time in completing a review of our resort. It's a pleasure to know that you will return to enjoy our amenities.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Amazing Resort
review: Beautiful property. Beautiful beach. But no different then the place down the road for $150/night. Paid almost $400/night to stay here and found that it was no different then the other hotels we have stayed at in Clearwater Beach for half the price. You can't beat the beautiful powdery sand Clearwater beaches in Florida but don't spend the extra money thinking your gonna get pampering or the royal treatment here. Used to spending a little extra, to get a little extra and usually have no problem doing so, but this is definitely the exception.

title: Best Hotel, Best Brunch, Best Staff!!!
review: We have booked a room at Hilton but after we got there and found out about major construction and no pool we had no choice besides to cancel our reservation and try to find another hotel at last minute with 2 small kids. We are so glad we found a room at Sandpearl! Of course it's not a cheap hotel BUT you pay for what you have! And at Sandpearl you will have the best service you can have at any other resort! Best Hotel + Best Sunday Brunch + Best Staff and Service!!!

title: The best hotel on Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review of our resort. We certainly are grateful that you consider The Sandpearl the best hotel! We train daily for exceptional service and we are glad that you experienced such service. We look forward to your next stay with us.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Superb Hotel, Superb Staff,  Superb Location.
review: This was our second visit to the Sandpearl and it most certainly will not be our last. It is everything you could want from a hotel on the beach, the staff are just the right mix of polite and friendly without being formal. The pool is just the right shade of blue with exactly the right number of palm trees. Our room was very clean and had all the amenities required, we went for the partial Gulf view, which as previous reviews have said, does look over the kitchens and refuse area, however this didn’t bother us as you still get a nice long view of the beach and ocean. If you think it would bother you, then pay the extra for a gulf view room.  I must also mention the food at the pool side Tate Island bar and grill- it is amazing, and I don't mean it’s amazing for hotel food, I…

title: Gorgeous!!
review: Dear Guest,  Your detailed and beautiful feed back is appreciated! We are so happy that you thoroughly enjoyed your visit. We pride ourselves in assuring all of our guest's make lasting memories. Attention to detail is vital for guest satisfaction and we thank you for noticing. We certainly look forward to serving you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: "Simply chilled"
review: We stayed at the sandpearl for 6 nights and it was nothing short of excellent, the staff were very helpful and friendly. the lobby and rooms are lovely, we had a gulf view room overlooking the beach and pool area which was superb, the sunsets from the room were amazing. The house keeping was top notch. The caretta on the gulf bar and restaurant was excellent, we enjoyed some nice meals. The location of the sandpearl is perfect, beach, shops, bars and restaurants are all nearby. i would recommend this hotel.

title: Relax, relax and relax some more
review: This was the end of our Orlando theme park holiday and this resort ticked all of those boxes for someone looking to just recharge those batteries.We selected a room with a ocean view and its worth every penny. The check in staff were excellent and made us feel like very welcome. The room was on the small side with two children but clean, elegantly decorated and a lovely large flat TV. The hotel grounds are very well maintained. The hotel restaurants are pricey but very good. The pool area was very very busy during our stay and finding a pool chair was difficult. Most of the time we were forced to use the beach facilities which are a quick stroll away. One downside is that you have to pay for the beach chairs ! which aren't cheap! they do offer beach service, which is very good.…

title: Perfect resort!
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for your recent review of our property. It's great news that you consider our resort "worth every penny." We do our best to please every guest, we are willing to go above and beyond, to assure our guests make beautiful memories. It's our pleasure to have served you and we look forward to your next visit.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Loved the View
review: Loved everything about this place. Very friendly and accommodating . Beautiful, fun, exciting, relaxing I can't wait to return you won't regret staying here! ❤️ loved it! Fun for families and the place is clean and the staff goes above and beyond to meme sure your happy!

title: wonderful resort
review: Dear Guest,  WOW Thank you! Your review is the type of feedback we hope to get. It's fantastic to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us. We hope to serve you again.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: A wonderful Experience!
review: We stayed four nights in September 2016.  The resort was not too crowded. Plenty of pool chairs to choose from.  Little disappointed that umbrellas and chairs on the beach come at an extra charge.  Our room was clean and comfortable with great views of the gulf.  Lots of great eating nearby and Carettas (sp) inside the hotel was very good for dinner and breakfast.

title: Phenomenal Clearwater Beach resort
review: White sands, gorgeous ocean views, luxurious appointed rooms, great amenities, courteous staff, this resort has it all!  My lovely bride and I visited here for a business conference in September 2016 and had an amazing experience.  We truly enjoyed the many relaxing aspects of this property: from the piano music in the lobby; to the ease of just walking down to the beach and enjoying ourselves (not having to worry about lugging down beach chairs or towels).   The staff were extremely accommodating and greeted us with an open door and chilled Prosecco!  The staff also helped throughout our trip with local recommendations as well as supplying us with items we forgot to pack, such as a toothbrush.   If you are looking for a stress free luxurious resort on Clearwater Beach, this is…

title: Stunning Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind comments regarding our resort. We are so happy that you consider our amenities luxurious and our staff courteous. It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and we eager to serve you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Loved it
review: This place was just beautiful, and the staff were so great! You can't beat the location! Clearwater beach is amazing! This resort is pretty large, and modern. The food was spot on. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Very Nice Hotel-Great Staff
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review of our resort. I agree that Clearwater beach is amazing! We definitely strive for all aspects of your resort to be top of the line, we thank you for mentioning that our food is spot on.  We look forward towards your next visit,  Marcel S.

title: Beautiful resort
review: Loved everything about this place. Polite and helpful staff. Rooms were great,very big. Children loved the pool and beach.Staff put on some trick or treating for all the kids. Recommended it to friends who loved the place too. Planning to return next year. Not cheap, but worth the money.

title: Very nice hotel
review: We visited Florida in August as part of our familymoon, we decided to visit Clearwater as a little treat away from the madness of Orlando after a trip to Busch Gardens in Tampa. On arrival we were met by a Valet who took the car away to be parked (there is a $25 pn fee for parking, there did not appear to be a lot of parking around the hotel). The staff were very friendly and we were warmly greeted.  On check in myself and my husband received a complimentary glass of prosecco and the children received a glass of sparkling apple juice and a bucket and spade, which we thought was a nice touch. After dropping our bags off at our room, which was a lovely size with 2 big double beds and a view of the marina, we headed down to have a look at the beach. The hotel is situated on the…

title: chilled chic
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent positive and constructive feedback on our resort. It's a pleasure to know that you were able to enjoy many aspects of our community and property. We thank you for deciding to stay with us for your familymoon and we look forward to serving you soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Great family vacation!
review: this hotel sits right on the beach and is close to all the bars & food in Clearwater.all rooms are a good size and  are clean and comfortable staff are all good and attentive. we did have a small issue with our 1st room which they did sort for us and we moved . the bars and restruarants nearby cater for all tastes and budgets. bar staff were some of the best we have ever come across quick attentive and always a cheery smile ! we were very surprised by the number of children in the hotel quess the USA  school holidays are different to uk. if you want a chic chilled hotel on the beach with good service then don't look at anything else

title: Second time
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your time in completing a review of The Sandpearl Resort! We strive and train for 5 diamond service and we are happy to know that you received such service. We thank you for chosing to stay with us and are looking forward towards your next visit.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Unusually excellent beach accomodations
review: We (2 adults + 2 children) stayed 8 nights.   This is a very nice resort. Located right on the beach and within walking distance to restaurants, shops, and Clearwater Beach main attractions.  Hotel is quite beautiful and well maintained.  Rooms are nice and very well equipped.  There´s a small fridge (besides the minibar) in the room which we found very convenient.  Food is quite good and staff is nice and helpful.   If anything not to like is that the pool area gets a bit crowded, but you can always hit the beach. Overall we had a great time and would highly recommend this resort.

title: Very nice and clean many hidden costs
review: Hotel over all is nice but there are a lot of hidden costs added to your bill that might not be so comparable to other resorts...like you will see 54$ of parking and amenity fees off the bat???? Do just add that to your bill. Not to mention their billing is all jacked up. Kind of a headache. Resort is nice but they charge you for just about everything they can...like a chair or umbrella!?!

title: Incredible beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your honest feedback regarding your recent stay. I do apologize that you feel our billing system and fees are an inconvenience. Our resort fee covers many amenities and I hope you were able to enjoy some of them during your stay. We know that parking in the area is limited and we are awaiting for a new garage to open in the area soon.   We certainly thank you for choosing to stay with us and anxiously are waiting to serve you again.  Regards Marcel S.

title: Well needed welcome home
review: My wife and I recently visited the Sandpearl for a business meeting earlier this summer. The location was ideal. The beach was pure "sugar sand," perhaps 50 yards wide and several miles long. Perfect for a morning or sunset walk. Not overly touristy. Plenty of amenities. Great beach or poolside dining. Fabulous sunsets.  We'd definitely go back next time we're in the area.

title: Its a resort and feel like you are taken care of
review: Dear Guest,  Your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort is much appreciated! I agree as I think our beach is pristine. It's a pleasure to know that you enjoyed the resort and that we were able to meet your business travel needs.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us!  Marcel S.

title: Great location, but the resort experience can be improved
review: After playing tourist at other places along the gulf coast and having mediocre service , we were happy to get back to our local stomping grounds of Clearwater beach. The staff at the sand pearl were friendly and attentive from the very beginning from the moment the valet whisked away my car after the long drive, to the check in welcoming us and handing us complimentary mimosas ! The rooms, view, beach and pool are the best on the beach. Great location, convenient to all the shopping and beachfront restaurants with live music that we frequent . Highly recommend!

title: Good hotel. Exceptional staff
review: Stayed here for 7 nights with husband and 12 year old. Room with 2 double beds. Modest size by US standards. Balcony with view over gulf. Room servicing excellent. Loved the lady who came round with her trolley every evening asking if we needed anything. Fantastic beach and sea great for swimming. Pool not huge but probably best available in Clearwater beach. Staff service exceptional at all times. 'Champagne' on arrival was a nice touch. Enjoyed celebrating hotels 9th birthday with cake and more champagne.Hotel in good location, not far from Pier 60. Fabulous wildlife on the beach - pipers, terns, pelicans, ospreys and dolphins most evenings. Good restaurants next to hotel - clear Sky and Frenchys (grouper sandwich is wonderful). Would definitely revisit the hotel and would…

title: Great Place to Stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review of our property. We are so happy that you were able to enjoy our celebrations for the Sandpearl's 9th anniversary. It's also pleasure to know that you consider our service as exceptional. I agree that our surrounding areas have plenty of aspects to be enjoyed. We certainly hope that you return soon!  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Great Location/Amenities
review: Wife and I stayed at Sandpearl Aug 18-25, 2016 and had a wonderful experience!  The greeting was great, room was clean and very nice.  The staff was always courteous and very respectful.  Being fitness oriented, I worked out and went for a run every morning.  The staff learned my name and told me to have a good run each time out and welcomed me back by name upon returning each time.  The pool and beach staff were great as well.  We are already planning our next trip back!

title: Stay there, don't eat there.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent stay and review of our resort. It's fantastic to hear that our staff was able to personalize your stay and that enjoyed our staff's interactions. I'm glad to hear that your room was also to your standards.  We hope you return soon,  Marcel S.

title: I would Walk 500 miles
review: Just came back from 3 nights stay. It was our 2nd time staying here so had a few expectations from our previous visit which were mostly met. Starting with Pros... Incredible location. This property is right on the beach, doesn't take you more than 10-20 yards to get to the private access beach. Great pool which is large enough that you never feel crowded. Plenty of chairs/tables available for us. Endless amenities for kids with tons of games/toys available to keep them entertained. Staff was extremely friendly and always available to assist. We did have a few issues with our room (1-bedroom bay-view suite with full kitchen) including sewer smell, malfunction Jacuzzi tub and very uncomfortable pull-out sofa in the living space. Filled out maintenance request on the 1st night but…

title: Great location
review: The Sandpearl is beautifully situated on a pristine stretch of flour like white sand & thankfully the weather was perfect whilst we were there. We had an ocean front queen suite which was perfect & clean.  My only gripe is the packed together sunbeds around the pool area, which if you wanted one in the shade you had to be down there by 8 am. I cannot understand guests who leave rubbish i.e. cups, wrappers etc around the place after them as there were plenty of bins provided & a favourite place to leave these items were under the sunbeds - very unsightly & not necessary. While this is not the hotels fault , it lets them down slightly in my opinion. The Tate grill served some great food & the staff here are particularly pleasant. The fire pit & hammocks were also a nice touch. …

title: Could do better, especially on the Eco front
review: Dear Guest,  Your recent review is certainly appreciated, and we thank you for choosing to stay with us. We agree that our beach is top notch and are glad you enjoyed it. We train often for our high quality of service and it's a pleasure to know that you were satisfied with your stay.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Great resort for vacation.
review: Nice room. Multi Recharger beside bed useful touch. We opted to overlook the bay not realising the sea views were so sort after   Negative points: Crack in sink and chip in bath. Blind in bathroom broken. We reported it twice before maintenance came round to check it. Couldn't replace it as made to measure and on order.  $22 plus tax for parking far too steep considering what you pay for the room. Also watch out for the guest levy for what you'd expect to be included.  All staff v friendly and helpful but took three days to track down tea for the drink machine in room and we had to keep swapping the decaf for proper coffee. Another guest said they'd run out of shower gel; we never saw any but just used the soap provided.  Bagging the sun loungers by the pool should be a new…

title: Great , luxury hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  I appreciate the feedback.    Please accept my apologies for the maintenance issues you had in your room.  That is definitely not acceptable and not our norm.  My apologies for the availability of the amenities in your bathroom as well.  This is the first time I am hearing of this so I am not sure if it was an inventory issue or a Room Attendant that missed it. Either way, I am sorry.   Regarding the eco-friendliness of our resort I was a bit confused by your comments.  The plastic cups that we use are made from plants, that is true.  It is also true that if they are left empty on the hot pool deck for an extended period of time they could become flimbsy due to the hot August Florida heat.  Regardless, we feel that the eco-friendliness is a better solution than common plastic and paper cups would not work for serving beverages.  The bags we use in the room should be replaced daily.  If that didn't happen I apologize.  Re-using the bags would not be a sanitary solution and would be frowned upon by many guests.  The Sandpearl Resort is a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) property.  At the time it was built it was the only hotel in the state of Florida and one of only a handful in the country.  Our focus on the environment is very strong and we do our best to balance our eco-responsibility as well as maintaining a high standard of service to all of our guests.  Again, I thank you for your feedback.    Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: AMAZING!!!!
review: This is a great location for a perfect relaxed vacation. Good food, great room, great service, great amenities. A bit expensive, especially the fact that they also charge you $25 per day for parking.  Wifi was a bit difficult to connect in the room.

title: Beautiful resort!
review: My husband and I stayed at The Sandpearl for two nights on a business trip.  The resort is beautiful and the service excellent. The grounds were well kept and our room was clean.  The hotel is within walking distance of many restaurants, bars, shopping, and the Pier. I enjoyed the complimentary glass of champagne on arrival and the nightly s'mores by the campfire.  They also offered assistance with sightseeing ventures and excursions.

title: Excellent customer service in the most beautiful setting
review: Dear Guest,  It's a pleasure to hear that your stay was up to your standards. We are happy to hear you enjoyed what the area has to offer and your complimentary glass of champagne. We hope that you return soon whether it is for business or pleasure.   Sincerely,  Marcel S.

title: Summer ttip
review: We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Sandpearl. The Resort was beautiful and the amenities met all our needs. Clearly customer service is a priority and we greatly appreciated the attentive staff.  The location was at the end of restaurants, shops and bars so they were easily accessed but it was quiet at the Resort.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We thank your for your time in completing a review of our property. It is so nice to know that your stay was excellent. We definitely strive for exceptional service with every guest. I'm happy to hear that you consider our staff attentive and that all of our amenities met your needs.   We are eager for your return!  Marcel S.

title: Sincerely expected more
review: This was our second stay at the hotel. From the moment you walk in the staff is very attentive.  My room was ready at noon and I was greeted with mimosas.  The hotel is clean, updated and just lovely all around. The pool is beautiful snd the food service and bar are great! The concierge was helpful and the bellman were nice and helped us with uber.  They provided a shuttle for us up and down Clearwater beach, My checkout was early compared to my flight, the attendant at the spa let us take showers before we left.  That was so helpful to us.  The workout room was clean and never busy. No complaints!  We will definitely be back.  Thanks for a great visit!

title: Dissapointed
review: The room was not very clean.  There was no wifi in our room.. Only had one microwave on the floor in the hall with the ice machine.. Had to walk to the other side of the hotel  to heat my bottles.. This was very annoying. The bathroom in the pool area was disgusting and smelled.. The pool area was not kept cleaned a lot of garbage left from guests..

title: Nice property, but....
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I appreciate the feedback.    I am sorry about your room not being cleaned correctly.  We normally take great pride in the cleanliness of our guestrooms and public space.  I am sorry we let you down.  For the convenience of our guests we added a microwave to each floor in the vending area and all of our 7th and 8th floor suites have microwaves in them.  I will also speak with our pool area manager regarding your comments.   If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay with us please do not hesitate to let me know by contacting me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Avoid this hotel
review: First time to Clearwater and the Sandpearl.  The hotel its self is beautiful.  The pool is very cramped and drinks are overpriced for there size.  Went next door to Frenchy's to get lunch and a drinks before heading back to the pool.  The beach is huge but not the best.  Probably won't return.

title: My Absolute Favorite
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for your high rating of our resort and for mentioning how beautiful it is. But are sorry to hear that you probably wont return. As we strive to meet all of our guests needs and go above and beyond to accommodate all of our guests. We hope that you can reconsider staying with us, as we strive to assure every guest is satisfied with their stay.   Thank you for your feed back!  Marcel S.

title: Wow! What a wonderful hotel!
review: Bad service,  I certanly never return, the pool and beach staff are so rude and must return to freindly and hospillaty service school.  There a lot of hotels, beach club and hotel around with good services.

title: Fabulous All Round
review: Recently stayed here for 3 nights and the hotel and staff were excellent. Great room and balcony overlooking the pool and beach. Food was excellent in the hotel as was the beach/pool side bistro. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Would I go back...you bet.

title: Fantastic setting
review: Dear Guest,  Your recent review of our resort is truly appreciated. We thank you for your great feedback! Our Food and Beverage department is happy to hear you food was up to par. We are eager for your return visit and hope to see you soon.   Thank you!  Marcel S.

title: Great Hotel on the Beach
review: We stayed for a week at this hotel after 2 weeks at Disney and was totally blown away by the setting , Clearwater beach is  the best beach I have ever been to the sand is white powder and the sunsets are amazing , sitting round the fire watching the sun go down is something I will never forget. The rooms are nice and big and well furnished and kept clean by the maids , the pool area is great and is well maintained although as other people have reported there is a smell by the toilets at the back of the bar so avoid getting a lounger in this area. The thing that disappoints with this hotel is the fact that on the beach if you want a parasol you have to pay for it and at around $25 it's a rip off , you also pay a daily resort fee again which I have no idea why as this should be…

title: Incredible Mother/Daughter Spa Day.
review: Dear Guest,  Your feedback is appreciated and certainly taken constructively. It's great to hear that your stay was pleasurable and that you able to make lasting memories. We are happy to know that you consider our resort a great place to stay. Thank you for completing a review and we look forward to your next stay.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Nearly perfect
review: This is a really nice hotel with great staff.  The rooms are well decorated and clean. The pool is large and accommodates a sizeable amount of guest.  The only issue I had was that the hotel did not have me booked in the view room i reserved. The recieved a discount on my room due to this inconvenience.
