Other than that, I have no complaints about the hotel or service.

title: In town for a wedding
review: The wedding we were attending was not at the hotel but many of the guests stayed here (February 2016) and we found it to be very nice.  We could not take advantage of the beach or pool because we had unusually cool weather but both looked very nice and wish we could have enjoyed the facilities more. Our room was not quite ready when we arrived and we were treated to champagne while we waited.  We were sorry it didn't take longer!   Rooms were comfortable and very clean.  It was an easy walk to restaurants and attractions.  We were a little disappointed in how the hotel nickel and dimed you for items that could have been included for the prices charged.  For that reason I don't know that this would be our first choice if we returned to the area.

title: Great place to stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review! We definitely are grateful for kind and constructive comments regarding your stay. I'm glad you were satisfied how comfortable and clean our rooms are. We often strive to exceed all of our guests expectations.  We hope to see you back soon!  Marcel S.

title: Pros and cons of our visit
review: Great resort directly on the white sand beaches of Clearwater.  Stayed in Gulf Front Junior Suite. Pay the extra $$ so you won't be disappointed. Great views of the beach and pool, and awesome sunsets. Short walk to Pier69, shopping, and restaurants. Housekeeping was excellent.Turndown service was provided. Bellman and valet service were prompt and helpful. Special shout out to Nate & Kenny (beach), David & Bobby (activities), and Paula (Tate's) A great experience overall. We will be back. Thank you.

title: It was... Fine
review: Dear Guest,  We are so please that you enjoyed your stay with us! We thank you for mentioning our staff by name and appreciate your time to review our property. We are eager to serve you upon your return!!  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Great resort hotel
review: First the good - the resort is beautiful and right on the beach which is also beautiful. The bathroom had a small stool which our daughter (6) loved. ;-) It was in walking distance to lots of shops and restaurants in the area.  Everyone on staff was very nice and friendly.   Our room was a king gulf view and was very clean and spacious.  The balcony had two small chairs and a small table and a view of the pool and a side view of the beach.    We were offered champagne at check in and our daughter got a small bucket and shovel.    The marketplace was small and a bit pricey but the Starbucks Coffee was basically the same price as a store and was great! Very friendly staff here as well! We ate at Tate's grill by the pool once.  Again, a bit pricey but so we're most of other places…

title: Pleasant hotel on a beautiful beach
review: I stayed at the Sandpearl for a conference held on the premises. While the hotel was certainly nice with a prime location on beautiful Clearwater Beach, I did not feel it was as luxurious as others describe it. The furnishings seemed kitschy to me and the room was very standard. I found my dealings with the staff to be mixed -- some were very helpful and friendly and others seemed like they were being bothered. Not a bad stay, but I would not pay their exorbitant rates if I had to go there for a personal trip.

title: Week family holiday
review: We've just concluded a weeks family (two adults and two boys of 16 & 13) holiday here. We travelled from UK and booked via Virgin. Hotel is certainly impressive and first appearances were good. Great lobby and welcome was good. Our room wasn't ready as we were early but it was soon turned around. The room was good - two queen sized beds and comfortable. The room was a little noisy - it faced towards Palm Pavillion and therefore overlooked what I guess we're kitchens as fans / extraction units were blowing all night.  The hotel is wonderfully located. The beach is amazing and the sea is wonderful. The water temp was around 30 degrees Celsius. Incredible. The sunsets are great too. A must see.  The hotel has some good facilities such as Tate Grill and Caretta. There's also a small…

title: An excellent hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay at the Sandpearl Resort. We also thank you for the wonderful feedback about our services and our staff, and it is well received. We are consistently looking for ways to improve experiences for our guests. We look forward to seeing you again soon on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.  Yours In Hospitality,  Jenna Stodghill Front Office Supervisor Sandpearl Resort

title: Worthy of your money
review: We stayed in the hotel for 12 nights in July. We had a room on the 6th floor with a side balcony with sea view and also partial harbour/Mandalay Ave view. The room was large, modern, well equipped and the beds very comfortable. The hotel pool was busy but well organised and the staff pleasant and security aware. My only complaint would be that the pool staff allowed large inflatable beds etc to be used, this did reduce enjoyment of the facility, however this is only a minor point. You pay for car valet parking and resort fee, services linked to these are first rate and the valet parking team were excellent. The provision of bottled water as part of the resort charge is a good idea.  Our room was kept very clean, our housekeeper was excellent and could not do enough for us. We…

title: Sandpearl review
review: Dear Guest,  It's fantastic that you consider the Sandpearl "an excellent hotel" after your 12 night stay. We thank you for positive and constructive feedback. We take tremendous pride in our service and strive to provide 5 diamond standards. We thank you so much for recommending our resort to others.  We look forward to your next visit.   Yours in hospitality, Marcel S.

title: 3 day relaxation honeymoon post orlando
review: Beautiful resort bang in the middle of Clearwater beach. Modern and clean, superb staff and resort. It's not the cheapest in Clearwater but not over expensive however you do pay for what you get. I would definitely recommend this place to others after orlando craziness and wish we had come before after a previous orlando visit!!!!

title: Review
review: Dear Guest,  It's an honor that you chose The Sandpearl Resort as your destination for your honeymoon! Thank you so much for your recommendation of our property. We always try to exceed our guests expectations and provide a relaxing atmosphere. We hope to see you soon.  Your in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Top class all the way
review: Terrible service! There are plenty of bad reviews about this place (read the Google reviews). The staff have an attitude (poor manager). I am not sure how they stay in business. Having traveled to many different places and stayed in many nice hotels, I have never had such a poor experience with a hotel. Do your research before you think about giving them your money.

title: Fun times
review: Absolutely stunning hotel beautifully furnished to a high standard It's where the old world meets new with fantastic facilities and breathtaking views  Staying in this hotel maybe on the expensive side but is well worth it you never have to leave   Dining experience was absolutely amazing and staff could not be more helpful or friendly  Highly recommend this hotel wonderful stay and absolutely flawless

title: Fabulous weekend
review: Dear Guest,  I'm am so happy to hear that you consider our resort "absolutely flawless"! Pleasing our guests is our ultimate goal. To know that we were able to meet your standards is great! Thank you for your time in submitting a review and we are anticipating your next visit.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Amazingly kid friendly!
review: We arrived on a Saturday to celebrate our son in law's birthday.  His family and ours had a wonderful time.  At check in, we were greeted with a choice of a Mimosa or Champagne.  Never encountered that before!  Since our rooms weren't ready, we changed into swimsuits and enjoyed the beautiful white sand beach and lovely pool.  Our grandkids had a blast in the  easy entry pool, and so did we.  There was a balloon man making hats in all kinds of shapes for the kids, a lady dressed as a mermaid who read a story in the pool and swam with the kids, someone dressed as a turtle who came at dusk and hung out by the pool, and a movies after dinner by the pool.    We ate at their casual grill outside and the food was reasonably priced and delicious.  They had a fire pit and offered…

title: Expensive and Busy
review: This is a nice hotel but I do have a few issues. We originally had a harbour view without a balcony, so we upgraded before our departure to have a balcony with a coastal view.  We were not informed that our room would be directly above the kitchen fans with views of the ocean plus garbage!  The noise was incredible and the smell was not nice at all.  We had to pay extra again to move to the other side of the corridor with a view of the pool.  Many other guests were also trying to move away from this side of the hotel, but I believe our room (413) was the worst of all as it was directly above the fans.  Our holiday paperwork advertised free bike rental and beach chairs, but on enquiring found it was only 1 bike per day per room, for our our family an extra 75 dollars per day was…

title: Nice resort but...
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review.  I am sorry to hear that your stay was below your expectations.  Please accept my apologies.  We do have several different views and pricing reflects the view type.  I hope that the last room you had was satisfactory.  The period of time you were there is perhaps our busiest time of the year.  July 4th is a very popular time in Clearwater and we have more guests on property at that time than any other time of the year.   If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Not Quite the Beach Stay I Wanted
review: The SandPearl is a pretty resort.  There are a few things that bothered me while we were there. The smell at the pool beside the pool restaurant (is really bad)!!!! I tried to avoid it but I smelled it every time we had to use the restroom at the pool.  I have no idea how people sit in the chairs right there.  I'm surprised they don't do something about this (I mentioned it to a friend who has been several times and she has noticed it too) so it wasn't a random thing.  The restroom at the pool is really dated and had a old feel as well as cracking grout all around the sink.  The resort needs more umbrellas at the pool the chairs with pull over shades don't provide enough shade.  I really wish they would vaccum the pool every day... For the size of the resort and crowd it needs…

title: Sandpearl is Excellent, with couple caveats.......
review: I'm leaving a detailed review, as I always appreciate others' details. For those who want short and sweet, know that all the rooms face the pool except for the most expensive suites (even if you're "gulf front"), and you can not hear the waves from the hotel. Resort food is not good for vegetarians.  Now into the long of it:  The room: We specifically requested a high floor before getting there, and booked the gulf front view. Our original room was on the lowest floor possible, on the corner, and all you could see were palm trees, pool traffic, and a sliver of the water (pic included). I was so disappointed. Courtney at the front desk remedied it within seconds, but I was annoyed that I had to ask, as I specifically wrote in asking for a high floor. We got moved up to the 6th…

title: Excellent
review: The San Pearl resort stayed here for a business conference or I should say for my wife's business conference.  first of all it's got a great location right on the beach in Clearwater.  beautiful grounds beautiful looking hotel it was my first time in Clearwater. staff were very friendly and helpful. Quick to get us checked in and get our bags into the room even though we were early. they accommodated us wonderfully. Used the workout facilities a few times and for a 4 diamond diamond hotel I was a little bit disappointed.  first of all some of the machines looked a little weary. One of the bikes had the strap on the left pedal missing. some of the TVs on the units didn't work and I noticed that one of the TVs on the wall was completely missing so in order to watch any TV you…

title: Absolute Perfection
review: I got back home yesterday from an exquisite week at the Sandpearl. This was my first time in Clearwater, though I have travelled to other places in Florida. I admit that I was a little skeptical after reading some of the other reviews....some of the the reviews had negative comments that almost made me switch where I was staying, but I am here to confirm: Sandpearl is the absolute BEST place I've ever stayed at in Florida, and I would recommend it to ANYONE staying in Florida, with NO hesitation.   The facilities? Second to none!  The building is breathtaking , the rooms are pure perfection , the art work is modern and super cool, the lobby is so spacious and beautiful the you will want to spend time relaxing there just as you will in your room! There are plenty of beautiful…

title: The Gulf is a great beach location
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your exceptionally kind words! The excellence that you have described in your review is exactly what we strive for here at the Sandpearl. I am so thrilled that we were able to go above and beyond for your stay. It would be an honor to serve you again in the future.   Sincerely,   Lauren C.

title: Another Exceptional Stay
review: Beautiful resort with an awesome pool and beach set up. Small gym with NO free weights, but enough to keep you going while on vacation. Location at Clearwater is perfect as you are in walking distance to excellent restaurants. The rooms were spacious and the beds were comfy. The reason they do not get a five star review is we wanted to upgrade to a bigger room and that's when the issues occurred. At the time of the upgrade all was well but the next day we were informed we would have to relocated to a different room every night of our stay. That was NOT the deal upon agreeing to the upgrade. As a result of the frequent moves we had a bag lost. The bag was eventually found but missing items. Wife had a spa treatment and she thought it was good, not the best she's had. Kids (age 4…

title: Great family trip
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for reviewing your stay with us. I am so sorry about the luggage mix up and thankful that we were able to retrieve it for you. I also want to apologize for the inconvenience that moving room to room caused you. In the future, we can assure you this wont be an issue. Please come stay with us again soon!   Best regards,   Lauren C.

title: Really great hotel
review: There are so many things fantastic about the Sandpearl - its cleanliness, room size, breakfast and that feeling of having landed somewhere really quite special. The lobby is really welcoming and the furnishings are very tasteful - I'd like to slip a couple of pieces into my hand luggage! Another enormous asset at the Sandpearl is the staff, especially a young lady called Lauren. We did have a few issues which she dealt with swiftly and treated us with respect and kindness. One thing I must point out and it isn't the Sandpearl at fault here, is that when you book a coastal view room, your agent doesn't tell you that you are going to be overlooking a huge bank of industrial fans which are extremely noisy. To get the true 'sea view' and in fact a 'pool view' you need to book a gulf…

title: Beautiful hotel overlooking Clearwater Beach
review: We treated ourselves to a two night stay here for my husbands retirement as we had wanted to stay here for many years. It is a great looking hotel and very luxurious and the staff are friendly. The room was at the front of the hotel with city views which was fine but a view of the beach would have been better. Very comftable beds, really clean bathrooms with a turn down service at night with chocolates on your pillow. The interior and exterior areas are styled beautifully. No problem in getting a subbed around the pool. The hotel has a private part of Clearwater beach and the sand here is like fine white powder. They have a few hammocks on the beach and at night camp fires with toasted marshmallows. We didn't ear at the hotel but found some good restaurants in Clearwater but the…

title: Wonderful visit
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. It sounds like we were able to kick off your husband's retirement just right! I do hope it was everything you wished for and much more. Please come stay with us again in the near future.    Yours Truly,   Lauren C.

title: Fabulous stay at the Sandpearl
review: The Sandpearl was a wonderful experience. The resort is beautiful and the staff is wonderful! It is pricey but I think the resort is worth it! We were in a king one bedroom on the 8th floor. The accommodations were top notch. We had a beautiful kitchen and sitting area as well as a balcony in the bedroom and living area.   The pool was a bit crowded however it's s resort in Florida in the summer it was to be expected. The drinks from the pool bar were delicious and we ate at the grill by the pool and the food was fantastic there too! All in all it was a wonderful trip. We would definitely stay there again.

title: Weekend getaway w the girls
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am so pleased we were able to provide you with a great summer beach experience. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to serving you in the future.   Yours in Service,   Lauren C.

title: Gorgeous hotel with perfect view
review: Absolutely loved it here! And I will be going back again. The view was perfect, the beach was beautiful, restaurants on the hotel grounds had delicious food. Staff was very friendly throughout the hotel. The spa staff was very friendly too, and did a great job!

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your stay at with us. It would be an honor to host you again! I am so pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed yourself here.   Sincerely,   Lauren C.

title: Luxury on the Beach
review: We are here for a few post-Disney relaxation days. First impressions were good, although a wait for the 4pm check in. No champagne offered until asked for.  Room is spacious as is bathroom. We do have a gripe with housekeeping - not serviced until past 4pm on day one (with no fresh glasses or new coffee pods provided) and day two I went back to room at 4pm and room had still not been serviced so I went looking for someone....it then happened promptly but again no fresh glasses or coffee. Clean towel had stains on it.  These gripes aside, the beach and pool area are great and family friendly. I've had two spa treatments both of which were excellent.  Choice of 2 restaurants and a Starbucks. Have eaten in three local restaurants - all good. Bit disappointed with local area but…

title: Thanksgiving weeknd
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. Post-Disney relaxation is definitely a trend here at The Sandpearl! I do hope we were able to provide you with as much refreshment and rest as needed after a long day at the parks. I sincerely apologize about the issues you endured with our housekeeping department during your stay. Please come back for another visit the next time you're in need of a relaxation haven.   Yours in service,   Lauren C.

title: WOW...! Not sure what else a family would want on vacation from a Resort.
review: Great hotel on the beach. Family friendly luxury. We stayed there for work meetings. Food was excellent. Friendly service. I wouldn't recommend Florida in July, but if clear water is your destination, this hotel is worth checking into. (Also great little organic diner a block away)

title: Ultimate Beach Resort
review: Second visit for my family and does NOT disappoint! Checked in early (noon), received cold mimosas (& cider for kids) at check in, our bags were delivered about 10 minutes after we made it to our room. Room was spotless, ocean view was amazing, room service was wonderful, pool was clean, staff was friendly, fire pit after sunset was relaxing, and chocolates with turn down service are a sweet end to the day.

title: Gorgeous full service resort, awesome location
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for continuing to patronize our resort. I am so very pleased hear that you had an impeccable stay with us! Please come visit us in the near future.   Yours in Service,   Lauren C.

title: Disappointed
review: My husband and I spent three nights at the Sandpearl and had a wonderful stay. Our room was good size, very clean and comfortable. We also never had an issue getting a beach umbrella, although I will say the pool filled up pretty quickly.  The beach was the cleanest, prettiest, softest sand I've ever felt. It was absolutely breathtaking.   The location is also perfect, walking distance to bars, restaurants etc.   My only gripe would be that the fridge in the room didn't get very cold. Not cold enough to keep a bottle of wine. My other complaint is the $29 fee for an umbrella. You already are paying for a daily resort fee, which is fine but I would think the use of an umbrella would be covered with that. Felt a little like we were being nickled and dimed. Especially as our first…

title: Sandpearl a Clearwater gem!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you kindly for your honest review. We definitely are happy you were pleased with your stay overall. We appreciate your constructive feedback regarding your stay and experience. Our resort fee covers many amenities for your enjoyment, I'm sorry you felt nickel and dimed.   We are glad that you enjoyed what Clearwater and our resort has to offer. We are anxious to serve you again.  Thank you,  Marcel S.

title: "Paradise"
review: I planned a 6 night trip to sand pearl back in January.  I had high expectations.  I booked an ocean front suite to accommodate family of four.    We checked in at 3:30 and was told room would be ready in 20 minutes.  At 4:30 our room was ready - I arrived at my ocean front suite facing a wall.  It was at minimum an ocean view if I faced my chair sideways which wasn't possible due to the narrow terraces.  I was told this was the room I  paid for and no other rooms were available.  I was ready to leave to go to the HyAtt.  I was Transferred to "supervisor" and left voice mail.  Called front desk again same response sent to voicemail - this soured my vacation and perception of the sand pearl.  Who transfers a guest twice to voicemail unacceptable.    After personally going to the…

title: 3 Day Stay
review: Came to Clearwater Beach for a family trip. The hotel is a little pricey, but not over the top. The service has been great, and it is a great hotel to just hangout. Fantastic beach access, and a wonderful pool. It is also central to the various shops.

title: Not Recommended
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. It would be an honor to serve you again in the future.   Best Regards,   Lauren C.

title: Expensive but beautiful
review: Setup family vacation to align with 4th of July celebration. The first decision was to attempt to go first class with car service through the concierge. The car did not show and called while we were at baggage claim to tell us they were at the resort to pick us up. Told us to take a taxi and they would pay for the cost. Then another driver called and said he was 20 minutes away but would be there. The late car service delayed arrival and made us late for the scheduled dolphin cruise. After a confusing call with the concierge who said we would be responsible for a "no-show" if the cruise could not be rescheduled we were rescheduled the following day. To my dismay the "no show" still showed on the bill. At checkout the desk staff said a manager would call....no call…

title: Disappointing
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review.  My apologies for not responding to you earlier.  I did want to confirm with you that we have been working on resolving the issues with your stay. As I believe you know by now, you were only charged for one of the visits for the Dophin Encounter.  There was not a "no-show" fee charged to you.  They charged the initial fee however did not charge you on the day that you actually attended the cruise.  Also, we are still working with the car service on getting your charges reversed.  Once we received word that this was taken care of we would have reached out to you and let you know.  Again, my apologies for this taking longer than it should have.  I am glad to see that you enjoyed other aspects of your stay and that Manning provided memorable service for you.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Wonderful
review: The hotel is stunning and spotlessly clean. It has the wow factor as soon as you enter. Everything you need in the room and more.Robes, mini bar, plenty of towels.  The pool area is beautiful but the sun beds get taken fairly quickly. The hotel is meters away from the most beautiful beach I've ever been to. The sea was warm it was just perfect. Can certainly see why it was voted best beach in America.  The small and only issue I had was that you have to pay a resort fee for things I think aren't a necessity. A glass of Champagne on the front desk for example which was lovely but I couldn't drink.  And also they only do valet parking so you can't just park your car yourself. I think you should have the option. Other than that it was a beautiful place and one I won't forget about…

title: Outstanding!
review: We have just spent our first day/night at The Sandpearl and I know this is the place for us! Every member of staff we have came across could not do enough for us. The facilities are incredible and the room is beautiful. We are not facing the pool but the view is still a great one. The food at Tate Island was very nice before we had a great nights sleep in extremely comfortable bed. Do not be put off by some comments it is marvellous here!

title: Great beach vacation!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind words regarding your stay with us! We look forward to serving you again in the future.   Best Wishes,   Lauren C.

title: Terrible service
review: We have wanted to visit the Sandpearl since it opened and finally had the opportunity over the Fourth of July weekend. It was well worth the wait!   The hotel is quite expensive but it is worth the price, especially if you have a Gulf-front room. The pool area, private beach and beach side casual restaurant made it so we never had to leave the resort (other than a few walks on the beach!). The service may not be up to the standards of the best hotels in major cities, but we really felt like everyone was pleasant and we did not need much beyond the basics. I mean, we are at the beach - there's not much to it. We only had breakfast and lunch at Caretta on lobby level, but have had dinner there in the past and it was wonderful.   Overall, definitely worth the price and the best…

title: Expensive, but nice hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We are so happy you were finally able to spend time with us. We certainly are glad that you enjoyed the holiday and were satisfied with our amenities. Our food and beverage team always strive to make every dining experience pleasurable. We thank you for your great feedback!  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Electrical Training
review: I come to this hotel since it opened and for the first time I saw a huge drop in service quality.  We had several unpleasant events and seams that no one cares about.  It is clear the hotel is understaffed and this could be the reason of the bad service.  Management must regroup or could loose the 5th star as well as the Preferred stamp.  We are leaving today with very bad impression...

title: Lovely hotel
review: This hotel is On the beach and close to shops and restaurants. Staff were great. Lovely glass of fizz on check-in. The room although didn't have a direct sea view, was airy and spotlessly clean. The only thing stopping giving this full marks was the restaurant. We had breakfast two mornings. Not being a fan of the Buffett we had a la carte. Service was painfully slow and the food was cold by the time it arrived. We also had dinner there one evening, it too was disappointing. The pool area was gorgeous. Pool was a lovely temperature and the sun beds were pure luxury.  Would definitely go back here.

title: Getting Ready for Our Third Visit!
review: It all started with the most magical sunset during conference three years ago.  After one night at the Sandpearl, my faith was restored in Florida beaches and I was determined to return.  The resort is elegant without being stuffy.    Last year my husband and I flew in for a long weekend of doing nothing but reading, exercising, ordering room service, and taking long walks on the beach.  We didn't need to deal with the stress of renting a car because the resort is located conveniently in Clearwater Beach.  There were plenty of restaurants within walking distance, not to mention the great options onsite.  It was a little North of most of the action, which left the beach just a little quieter.  It was so perfect that we are returning in August with our children for four days of…

title: Luxury hotel and our favorite!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your positive words regarding our resort. It's a pleasure to know that you were able to relax and have a stress free stay with us. We are certainly pleased to hear that you will be returning to endulge in our amenities again.  Thank you and we look forward to serving you soon,  Marcel S.

title: I didn't want to leave
review: Mr. Waltz upgraded us to room 802 which is a gulf front suite with breathtaking views. We are locals and love Sandpearl. Location is perfect as it is a little off the busy Pier 60 and right on the beach.  Thank you for another great stay! We will be back.

title: Beach trip
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review of our resort. It's fantastic that you will be back to visit us soon! It is always our pleasure to serve you and we certainly appreciate your repeat business.   Regards,  Marcel S.

title: excellent resort
review: We loved this hotel. The staff were very friendly and the location - right on the beach was fantastic. The beds in the room had the most comfortable mattresses and pillows I have experienced in a hotel. The balcony for our room was very big with nice furniture too.The food was good as was the service. The beachtender Steve was very attentive and gave excellent tips. We will return again.

title: Relaxing in luxury
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review and positive feed back regarding our resort. Our staff collectively strives to provide our guests with the best service possible. It's great to hear that you enjoyed many aspects of our resort. We certainly hope that you will return to utilize our amenities again.  Regards,  Marcel S.

title: Will not come back
review: Our family had incredibly relaxing two days with all our needs well taken care of at the Sandpearl. Breathtaking ocean view, large beautiful room with a couch and breathtaking ocean view, large balcony with chairs. The room was cleaned twice a day with chocolates on the pillow. Excellent pool-side restaurant and bar service, never left our chairs for two days except for a quick dip in the ocean. White powder sand on the beach. Very healthy food. Excellent breakfast buffet, free for kids. Will be back many times!

title: Very good spot
review: Dear Guest,  We honestly thank you for your great review of our resort. Your many kind words towards our staff, service, pool, and variety of amenities are certainly appreciated! It is so nice to hear that you will return many times.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: The Best place to visit and Stay!!
review: A lot of negative things about this place: dirty, smelly hotel and the room. The pool area is not taken care of, trash left by guests does not get cleaned up in time. Unnatentive and somewhat rude staff, they just don't seem to care about anything. The fact that you have to pay for pretty much everything, including beach chairs definitely does not make me feel welcomed and as a guest of the hotel. This place is way overpriced, and far from being a 4 star hotel.   The only good thing is its location, right on the beach.

title: Beautiful, 4 star, a bit pricey
review: The Sandpearl Resort is a 4 star property on a beautiful beach in Clearwater.  The lobby is beautiful and it was very nice to be greeted with champagne or mimosas! We stayed in a junior king suite, oceanfront.  The balcony was not real big - just enough for two chairs and small table.  The room was very clean and the hotel provided turndown service.  Valet parking is the only way to park there and it is expensive.  The pool was nice and had waitstaff service.   I would recommend the resort, assuming you are willing to spend $$$$.

title: Hotel in busy Clearwater
review: The hotel was the last in a row of hotels adjacent to the beach. Our car was valet parked (no choice). Entering the lobby the atmosphere was arctic! There was intense air conditioning. On registering we were offered a glass of champagne. At the side of the lobby was a self playing grand piano -very effective.  Our room was a disappointment. It was comfortable and spacious with 2 beds. We had booked a bay view room and yes we could just see the bay between the 2 hotels opposite. Our room was one of the very few rooms with no balcony. The safe was in a reasonable position.  We had booked and paid for our 2 night stay in advance which included the resort fee. Unfortunately they tried to charge this fee again. The resort fee ($29+tax) covered the champagne drink, fitness centre,…

title: One Very Nice Night
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl.  I appreciate you taking the time to write it.  I am glad that you like many aspects of the resort, thank you.  I am sorry about the issues you did not care for such as the temperature of the lobby and the view from your room.    If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to reach out to me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Fantastic resort
review: In for a night and while schedule didn't permit time to enjoy the amenities of this property, the stay was very nice and we will find time to return and enjoy the facility.  The atmosphere is quite nice as you are greeted by valet upon driving up to the property and all of the staff were very friendly through checkout.  The public areas were all nice without being overstated.  The hotel sits directly on the gulf beach and the beach itself is quite wide. The pool area looked very nice as well.  Our room was an even numbered room and thus, we overlooked the beach and pool (see picture).  The room was very spacious, clean, very comfortable and nicely furnished. Bath was nice sized with a deep tub.    Enjoyed a banquet in one of the ballrooms at the property and the food was well…

title: Very nice hotel
review: Dear Guest,  It's great that your stay with us was a pleasure! We take pride in every guest experience to be the best it can be no matter the length of their stay. We thank you for the time in completing a review and are eager to serve you in the future.  Thank you.  Marcel S.

title: excelent  Sunday brnch on the beach
review: We only had brunch there but it was such a lovely property right on the beach and impeccably maintained. The brunch was awesome.  The staff very attentive.  Especially Mark Higgins.  He kept our champagne glasses full and made sure we always had clean silverware.never had a dirty dish or fork on our table. The lack of 5 stars is for not having another red meat dish besides the carving station.  I thought the marinade or rub on that was really strong...   View on the deck is stunning and we were lucky enough to be seated there.  Would definitely go back.

title: Nice but very expensive
review: Dear Guest,   I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed yourself at our Caretta's Sunday brunch! We put forth every effort to uphold the 4 diamond standard that guests such as yourself expect. Please come back and dine with us again soon!   Sincerely,  Lauren C.

title: Stayed Here 3 Times and every time it was Great!!!
review: The hotel is very nice the service is good but you need to watch when you are at the pool, we had many discrepancies with our tabs. The waiters like to charge you 18 % and then also have you tip them 20% they never take off the original 18%. They are very slow at the pool also as far as service goes. The resort is nice but there is very little to do on the rest of the island for kids under 10 years old.

title: Fabulous just fabulous !
review: We stayed at the Sand Pearl 3 different times over the last 2 years We were pleasantly surprised every time from check in to valet to all the features and options of the resort.    Walking into the foyer, I was greeted with a sand sculptures we even watched one time they brought all the sand and built them in front of our eyes. This was such a beautiful work of art.  There were games in the lobby - chess and checkers. and very comfortable couches. The decor was absolutely beach front living and we loved it  Great place for families, you will not be disappointed I can't wait to do a staycation here!

title: Titled a Resort that's not a resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your such kind words regarding our resort. We truly appreciate your repeat business and loyalty to our property. It is our pleasure to serve you and look forward to serving you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Absolutely Outstanding!!!$
review: We are so very glad that we stayed at the Sandpearl!  This is a great hotel....super staff...outstanding restaurants.  We ate at the pool restaurant for lunch and the main dining area...Careta....for breakfast and dinner.  The beach is very clean and not crowded at all...we would definitely stay here again.

title: Perfect for families!
review: Dear Guest,  It is an absolute pleasure to know you enjoyed our restaurants. We take tremendous pride in our service and our ultimate goal is for your dining experience to be a joy! We thank you for the time in completing a review.   Thank you,  Marcel S.

title: Excellent Hotel and location in Clearwater
review: This resort is absolutely fantastic! We're in our early 30's with two kids aged 4 & under and we had a wonderful time. The kids get sand buckets when you check in, adults can get a glass of champagne when you walk in and the hotel grounds are one of the best on the beach! We loved everything from the comfortable chairs around the pool with fitted towels, to the Bon fire pits on the beach and the Bon fire tables around the deck at night. It's also super convenient having a Starbucks inside the hotel. We will definitely stay there again.

title: One word...superb.
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your time to complete a review of our resort. It's an absolute pleasure to know that you and your family enjoyed our amenities during your stay. The Sandpearl takes tremendous pride in our service and strive to exceed your expectation's.  Thank you and we look forward to serving you again!  Marcel s.

title: Don Cesar or Sandpearl?
review: Gulf View King Junior Suite, nice room and view. The only reason for 4 stars not 5 was because there were issue with the WiFi connectivity in both rooms #668 and #648. The Wifi is outsourced with no IT on site. Had to keep turning off wifi and reboot. The IT help desk ( 800 #) was some Internet provider that was very rude. I suggested to the Front desk upon check out that they needed a Secure Wifi connection and on site Server and router to eliminate this problem.

title: Brilliant hotel, brilliant location, great beach
review: Stay the Sandpearl at the end of May for 5 nights and really couldn't fault it at all. From the minute we arrived to when we left, the service was excellent, the rooms large, clean and comfortable and the beach was amazing. We arrived early in the morning at around 10am and, not expecting the room to be ready until mid afternoon, it was a bonus that it was ready for us to use and we could unpack straightaway. Topped off by a complimentary mimosa as we completed registration!   The hotel has a private beach in addition to the pool. The sunbeds and umbrellas by the pool are free, on a first come first serve basis. Personally I'm not a pool person, I much prefer the beach but the whole pool area looked fine and was heavily used by families wth small kids.  The beach was beautiful,…

title: Beauty on the Beach
review: The Sandpearl is an elegant beachfront property.  The rooms are very spacious and well-maintained.  The staff is exceptionally attentive. We were greeted at check-in with mimosas.  Every time we got the car from the valet, we were given bottled water.  We also had a pedicure and manicure at the spa.  The spa is also very well-maintained and attractive and staff was wonderful.  My only complaint with the Sandpearl is the outrageous and totally unnecessary $25 charge daily for valet parking.  The parking garage is directly underneath the hotel and could easily be self parking.  It seemed to me to be another way to bleed guests for money at this very expensive property.

title: Didn't want to leave!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us at the Sandpearl. I know the valet parking may seem like a dreaded extra expense, however, you may have noticed that parking on the island is extremely limited for all businesses.  We feel that you shouldn't have to spend valuable relaxation time searching high and low for a parking spot, when instead you could be sitting poolside with a tropical drink! We look forward to serving you in the future.   Yours in Service,   Lauren C.

title: A 5 star hotel but charge to hire umbrella outrageous!
review: Pushed the boat out on a two bed suite for the 'post Disney' leg of our Florida, family holiday. Gorgeous resort, settled in quickly and felt relaxed and comfortable there. Beautiful pool and beach, lovely accommodation. We loved the Tate Island Grill (my sons, 7 and 9 shared the grouper nuggets appetiser as a main course and highly recommend it!) Pretty expensive hotel, but worth it! Go on, treat yourself :)

title: Gorgeous Resort
review: Dear Guest,   Those grouper nuggets certainly are a guest favorite! I'm so pleased you had a lovely time at the resort and hope you decide to choose us as your resort destination in the future.   Warm Regards,   Lauren C.

title: Just the best!
review: Stayed here for two nights and I did not ant to leave. Everything is top of the chart. You can walk to restaurants or simply say on the property .... That's what I did. Yes it is expensive but you get what you pay for. I choose to stay here instead of going on a cruise and I am happy I did. Everyone is helpful and pleasant. They do it right!

title: AWESOME
review: Dear Guest,   Wow! I am thrilled we were able to accommodate you with such an excellent visit to our resort. Thank you so much for choosing the Sandpearl. Please come stay with us again in the future.   Sincerely,  Lauren C.

title: An amazing mini break in between Disney and Universal
review: We booked hotel through Virgin as a relaxing 4 night break between Disney hotel and universal hotel during 15 night Florida holiday. this was the right choice and hotel stay was completely relaxing and very enjoyable! This hotel was fantastic, rooms were excellent (2 adults, 2 children age 10 & 8). The staff were fantastic and the amenities were top notch. The pool, the pool bar & Grill the top quality restaurant on site were all very very good, the aspect and location made the hotel leading onto the white sands and blues sea. We had a very enjoyable stay and would definitely come back

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Guest,   I am so pleased that we could be so accommodating to you and your family. While they are a blast, I know those theme parks can really drain the energy out of you. I hope we were able to provide you with every bit of relaxation that you had hoped! We would be honored to serve you in the future.   Best Wishes,   Lauren C.

title: Outstanding experience at Sandpearl
review: We have just returned from a 2 week holiday in Florida - 7 nights at one of the Disney resorts, 4 nights at the outstanding Sandpearl Resort followed by a further 3 nights at the Hard Rock Hotel, Universal Studios. We are a family of 4 including a 10 year old and 8 year old.  Our primary reason for booking 4 nights at the Sandpearl Resort was to have some rest and relaxation in between the craziness of Orlando. It was the best decision we made out of the whole holiday!!  We arrived on the Saturday of Memorial Weekend so fully expected the resort to be busy which it was. However this did not affect our stay in the slightest. The hotel is set in beautiful surroundings and directly on Clearwater beach. It is simply beautiful!  We were so impressed with the service from all staff at…

title: Lovely Hotel BUT !!!!
review: Lovely hotel ..however upon our arrival, we asked where the car park was and was told gleefully by a valet that it was " Valet Parking Only Sir " @ $25 per day plus tax and no choice..not mentioned prior to booking !!. we were early for our room which was " not quite ready" ..we decided to wait in the lobby for our room to be made available ..we were offered storage for our luggage however our money, travel documents etc were in it so decided not to as the guaranteed check in was 4pm and our room was being " prioritized " ..many guests arrived and were checked in while we were waiting and offered their free champagne... we kept popping back to the front desk and were informed many times that the room was not quite ready and the check in would be 4pm. At 4.20pm a member of staff…

title: Another lovely stay
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you found our resort lovely.    I am very sorry for the issues you experienced with the room upgrade.  While the room type was an upgrade you should not have been put in that room knowing that the window was cracked (it has since been replaced).  You should have also received your complimentary champagne at check in as that is a normal standard for us.    Regarding the extra fees, we do our best to make sure that these fees are mentioned at the time of booking. I am not sure how you booked your reservation, perhaps it was through a third party.  My apologies for the misunderstanding.   If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Full Disclosure....ask what the up charge is (aka read your receipts)
review: Returned to The Sandpearl after staying for two weeks last June. The hotel is lovely, nice bars and restaurants. Especially like the chilled out atmosphere on the beach at the sandpit just before sunset.  One problem we do have is The Sandpearl charging for umbrellas on the beach, it's not the cheapest of hotels so to charge $25 (this is not included in the $29 hotel tax) for a beach umbrella is disgraceful, please scrap this charge!! With cases of skin cancer on the rise a beach umbrella is as much of a necessity as water!!! It's also $25 per day for Valet parking with no option to park up yourself so if you stay for a long period you can rack up quite a departure bill, so beware! We hope to return to this hotel for our summer holiday next year, It's lovely and quiet midweek…

title: Family fun in the sun!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for continuing to choose the Sandpearl as your resort destination! The fire pit at Tate's is one of my personal favorite spots for sunset views as well. I apologize about the extra umbrella charges but we do only have a limited amount to offer to our guests on property. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.   Yours in Service,   Lauren C.

title: Amazing stay
review: My father used to say if you have to ask how much you probably can't afford it.   There is truth to his sand pearl of wisdom but in a world of full disclosures I would have hoped for more of the fine print  on fees and up charges to be known during my stay and to not have had to rely on reading every receipt.       I will start with positives. The positives that stood on their own...beautifully appointed,  love the proximity to the beach and the option for poolside or beach under an umbrella with cold drinks served.  The rooms were standard, clean, comfy bed,  and exceptionally quiet especially with the number of children at the resort.  Given the class rating of this hotel I would say these positives do not differentiate this hotel for the Conde Nast traveller...it is what is…

title: Not what it used to be.
review: My husband and I have stayed at the sandpearl at least 20+ times. We stayed one night this past weekend as it was the first time we left our 8 month old daughter overnight. So this was a special occasion for us as new parents. I have to say this weekend was by far our worst experience.   First and foremost their front desk personnel could use a brush up on their service and overall hotel knowledge. It was the first time we weren't greeted with the sandpearl "experience" no champagne or beverage offered upon check in. No personality or enthusiasm.   So after we check in we go to the pool and since we didn't have a room yet, my husband gave the pool waiter our credit card. Not sure how it happened but in 6 short hours our card was run FIVE times which put FIVE holds on our card…

title: Amazing! Perfect location!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl.  I am VERY sorry for the issues you experienced.  As you know from your previous stays with us the items you mentioned are not normal and will be addressed.  I will personally speak with the Front Office team regarding the items you mentioned. I will also speak with them about using tact when addressing potentially embarrassing situations.  Again, I am very sorry for these issues.  I would like to speak to you to make sure that the billing issues have been addressed.  Please call me at the resort at your earliest convenience so that I may get your information and get everything straightened around ASAP.    Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great stay at Sandpearl
review: Stayed at the Sandpearl a week ago.  This place is excellent especially if you have children.  It offers everything you want in vacation.  Situated on the beach, near a lot of restaurants within walking distance, rooms were clean and spacious.  The views were spectacular. You get what you pay for! Definitely, would go back.   My only gripes would be the cost of valet for overnights - $25 is a little steep, but the valet service was good.  Also, the beach umbrellas should be included in the daily resort fee, not an additional $29/day.

title: Mixed feelings
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your kind comments about the Sandpearl. I am pleased to hear that you and your family had a wonderful time with us. Please come stay with us again soon!  Warm Wishes,   Lauren C.

title: Simply amazing! Great Location!
review: Stayed at the Sandpearl from 5/16-5/20.  The hotel is beautiful with a beautiful beach. Accommodations were perfect with the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in - almost as good as home.  Great view of the beach and sunset (when the clouds cooperated). Staff was very friendly and helpful - especially Steve and Andrew with the beach umbrellas.  Beach was one of the best I've been to.  A couple of minor quibbles: 1. Requested early arrival but our room was not ready when we arrived.  However, we were able to access our luggage, change and enjoy the beach.  We got a phone call when the room was ready.  While this was better than not going to the beach, it was not ideal.  I realize that these requests are not always able to be honored but I gave an accurate time of when we would…

title: Enjoyed my stay - nice beach!
review: Enjoyed my stay - nice beach - got an upgrade to ocean facing JR suite.  Liked coffee in room and balcony.  Beach is great and included towels and chairs on beach itself great.  Staff is very pleasant.  Beach is great for running and very wide with white sand and gentle waves.  Resort did nice job on outside dinner we had between pool and beach.  Resort itself is four star - nicer than many and should satisfy most.   Walking distance from resort offers many options for drinks and restaurant nearby was great for dinner and served very late.  All in all one of the nicer beach resorts in the USA.  Was here for business but would be very nice for families too!  Thanks for a great stay.

title: Fantastic resort right on the strip... classy place
review: Dear Guest,  It is a pleasure to hear you were satisfied with our resort during your stay. To consider The Sandpearl Resort "one of the nicer beach resorts in the USA" is an honor. Thank you so much for your time to provide us with such great feedback!  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: Never left the resort!
review: We stayed here about a year ago with a < 1 year old.  Fantastic place, great food, great beach.  Not a cheap over nighter... make sure to checkout the pool and get some poolside service from the bar.Gorgeous place!

title: First visit to flirida
review: Dear Guest,  We sincerely appreciate your positive comments towards our resort. We take pride in assuring your visit with us is the best it can be.  Thank you,  Marcel S.

title: Spring Break 2016
review: What a beautiful place. My two teenage daughters and I just got back from a great five day vacation. The gulf view room and balcony was amaculate. We split our time between beach days under the umbrella which is extra BTW, and the pool. The staff was great, especially Kyle,Elaine and Adam we will miss you. The only blemish was a end of the year school party which jammed the pool which 50 rowdy kids one afternoon. They really need an adult pool!

title: Annual Thanksgiving Tradition
review: Beginning in 2013, with my daughter moved to Florida, dinner at the Sand Pearl on Thanksgiving has become our annual tradition!  The beautiful restaurant, breathtaking sunset view of the golf, is not to be missed.  The service from every time at the restaurant, from the manager, right down to the bartenders and waitstaff, is impeccable.  While we were enjoying champagne on the deck after sunset, one of the waiters even brought my daughter a warm blanket from the dryer to keep warm. Truly five-star service!  We will be back every year! Even if she doesn't stay in Florida… We're going anyway!

title: WOW!
review: Dear Guest,  It's a pleasure to hear you enjoyed our restaurant during the Thanksgiving holiday! We're glad you had a chance to view the beautiful sunsets Clearewater beach has to offer. We thank you for the positive feedback, and look forward to serving you again soon.  Thank you,  Marcel S.

title: Luxury and relaxation
review: This place is beautiful, with over the top service, but I actually prefer a more casual atmosphere. My wife and I stayed 4 nights mid May 2016. I like being called "sir" occasionally, but after a while it  makes me slightly intimidated. All staff very friendly, great food on site. I believe this was my first time paying for a beach umbrella, even though I know it is not unusual. It's not outside my budget, I'm just always looking for a cheaper way out. I like how you can track your spending on the TV. Awesome beach and pool. I would stay here again now that I know what to expect

title: Sandpearl Disappoints
review: Dear Guest,  We are glad you had a pleasurable experience with us during your recent stay, and truly thank you for considering The Sandpearl Resort for your future visits.  Yours in hospitality,  Marcel S.

title: What a Beautiful Resort
review: When you check in prior to 1:00, you are given the option of being served a complimentary mimosa.  What a GREAT way to start a visit.  The room was lovely - but not unlike many other hotel rooms.  The breakfast buffet was well-stocked and the food was excellent.  The staff is gracious and efficient.  The pool/beach side bar is well staffed and the bar tender went above and beyond in keeping his customers satisfied. Our outdoor gatherings were interesting - but one does have to keep ones eyes on the seagulls!

title: Very Nice Resort Overall
review: Great pool and right by the beach.  A bit pricey to stay and definitely overpriced food but great location you're paying just as much for the hotel as for the location.  Overall staff was fairly friendly but not overly on a couple occasions.  Would stay again though as the hotel was clean newer and great location.

title: Beautiful but over priced
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing the Sandpearl. I hope you choose us as your resort destination in the future.   Best Regards,  Lauren C.

title: Nice hotel but the excessive pricing spoiled it
review: We stayed in the Sandpearl four nights in a one-bedroom King suite with bay view. I chose this resort because it was ranked by T&L as a great family resort in Florida. The building and beach are beautiful. I will say Clearwater Beach is much more urban than I expected. The upside is that there were lots of places to eat, walk and visit. The downside is it was a bit noisy and there were more people than I would've liked on a beach vacation. I booked a bay view room because frankly, Gulf view was a lot more expensive on an already steep bill, and I thought the bay would give us a lot of water to look at anyway. If we squinted past the high-rise condos and beyond the busy streets, we could see the bay and the town of Clearwater on the other side. Not a beautiful view like the Gulf…

title: 5 star price - 3 star service
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your response regarding the Sandpearl and what we have to offer. I apologize that you felt that we were nickel and diming you for everything throughout your stay, that is certainly not our intention. We do offer room packages that include some of the items you mentioned, making it easier to see an overview of your stay costs prior to arrival. It would be worth looking in to for your next visit! Our rates change on a daily basis, so keep checking back and I'm sure we will be able to accommodate you in the future at a much more comfortable rate. Thank you again for choosing the Sandpearl.   Best Wishes,   Lauren C.

title: Priced like a Ritz Carlton, but not a Ritz Carlton.
review: My wife and our two kids and the grandparents stayed here for three nights to finish off our visit to Florida. We thought it would be nice to unwind after 11 days of Disney. We are from the uk and We booked 2 coastal view rooms. To start with, this a nice hotel with good amenities and is in a great location right on Clearwater beach. The food is good and the rooms were of reasonable standard. The real problem for us was the price, the room rate was expensive as it was but to be charged the resort fee of $29 a day per room took the pleasure out of the stay. As we needed two rooms it totalled to $58 a day. Then you have non optional valet parking at a charge $25 a day meaning we had to pay in total an additional $250 just to be there. Being from the uk we have never heard of a…

title: Cold and calculating
review: Right on the beach but feels like it is 100 miles from the fun. Cold, sterile and money hungry, this place has no life and is expensive! There are many other places along the beach to have a more down to earth time.

title: Our Experience
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for completing a review.  I must admit though, I am confused by your comments as the Sandpearl is located within walking distance to everything Clearwater Beach has to offer.  We are a short 5 minute walk to Pier 60 which is the center of the beach.  We are located on the North end of Clearwater Beach which is typically more quieter and relaxed than mid or south beach but it is very accessible.  If you are looking for a hotel in the hustle and bustle of beach goers than you would probably prefer another location.    Thank you for your response.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Thank you, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Excellent Birthday and New Year's stay
review: I think a lot of the good reviews of this property must be from people that stayed in a gulf view room. We booked a Bay View and that was a big mistake. The room we were allocated overlooked a restaurant and busy road outside, as well as a shabby looking rooftop and all its air con units. Immediately asked for a room change but was told nothing available until 3 days later. Had we then fully appreciated how noisy the location was which made the balcony unusable we would have accepted the late room change. Also late night music. As it was we said we would stick with the view as did not want to up sticks half way through stay. - we should have moved. As the week progressed the view of the Bay began to disappear as the multi storey car park being built just across the road took…

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.  I appreciate your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear that you did not like the view from your room.  I know that most people prefer the view from the Gulf Front or Gulf View rooms over the city view rooms however some people prefer to sit on the balcony and enjoy the activity at night from the east facing rooms.  We do try to move rooms when availability permits however that is not always possible.  My apologies.  You car correct that there is a parking garage being built a block east of the resort.  That is scheduled to be completed in September.    If you would like to speak personally regarding your visit please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Again, thank you for the feedback.  Regards, Eric Waltz

title: Fantastic Sunday brunch
review: Our suite faced the ocean. We stayed there twice even though we now live in Tampa. We stayed there a couple of nights for my husband's birthday and then again for New Year's. The room was everything we needed and wanted. We opened the windows/doors to the balcony and fell asleep to the sounds of the waves. It was one of the best night's sleep we have had. Caretta's restaurant is first class. I highly recommend this hotel. There is another first class hotel in St Pete's but we very much prefer this one.

title: Beautiful resort in peaceful Clearwater
review: This hotel is full service for not only conferences but family vacation as well. Clean spacious rooms, friendly , accommodating staff. Restaurant, spa , poolside grill/bar, coffee café, gift shop, conference rooms and banquet rooms. CVS pharmacy in walking distance , local gelato ice cream, Pier 60 is close as well. Kid friendly hotel.

title: Beautiful Property, Friendly Staff
review: Hello Marta,  Thank you so much for staying with us! The Sandpearl Resort strives to assure your stay is pleasurable. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our amenities, and look forward to your next visit.

title: Phenomenal Experience and Service-Staff Is incredible-Immaculate and Gorgeous Grounds
review: My husband and I recently attended a meeting at the Sandpearl Resort and were impressed with both the location - right on the beach-, the helpful staff and the food.  We enjoyed several drinks at the indoor bar and had a lovely lunch overlooking the beach at the outdoor restaurant.  We had a junior suite which was nice and clean, albeit a bit small.  The bed was comfortable with nice linen, and the housekeeping folks were super nice.  My husband had a massage at the spa and was very pleased with his therapist Emily Barbarosa.  We did not have many room service meals, but it was okay.  We very much enjoyed our stay at this resort and would certainly return.  The staff truly cared about our comfort and assisted kindly with any request we had.  There is a beautiful pool and nice…

title: Pristine Serene and Everything in Between
review: Dear Julie,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am so pleased that we were able to fill your trip with enjoyment. Please come stay with us again soon so we can provide you with another relaxing, comfortable getaway

title: Nice place, excellent amenities, good food
review: I truly cannot say how amazing our 5 day stay was. Room 502 has a breathtaking view of the expansive beachfront. The staff is truly amazing, they are friendly, incredibly helpful, and they attend to your every need with enthusiasm.  The food in both restaurants is amazing! I had a child with me, and the poolside towel area has everything for use in the pool and at the beach...footballs, frisbees, inner tubes, snorkeling masks.  You can purchase suntan supplies and sunblock here as well if you forgot anything. They always have cold fruit water available and ice cream goodies for purchase. The sand is powder white, the pool and beach are amazing! There Re many beautiful areas to just sit and relax by outdoor fires, you can make s'mores at night over the bonfire close to the beach,…

title: Gorgeous on the Beach
review: I had a friend get married here in April and it was a gorgeous ceremony. From the minute you arrive the staff is welcoming and friendly. You are greeted at the front desk with campaign or mimosas. Our room was ready right away (we got there around 2:30), we were able to enjoy almost every corner of this hotel and everything was a pleasure. My husband loved the workout facility, the pool and hot tub were fantastic, the beach is right outside the gates to the pool, warm beach towels are always available . Food was delicious, we loved the wraps, french fries and chicken quesadillas from Tates Grill. Drinks were delicious. Worth every penny!

title: Such a beautiful place
review: I stayed here with my family for 3 nights after the mad early mornings and late nights of Disney parks and universal studio and we came here to relax the last 3 nights of being in the sun I honestly loved it the staff where so nice would come to this hotel again but for longer I couldn't stay a bad thing about it

title: Sunday Brunch
review: Fabulous place for Sunday Brunch, visited many times as we have a home here at the beach and when we are here from England it's one of our favourite restaurants also for dinner too, However the service yesterday wasn't as efficient as normal, I had to ask for more silverware and my plate to be taken away as it was brunch and wanted to then sit down again after bringing my dessert! Certainly would not stop me re visiting as i think it was a small hiccup from the staff! Well worth a visit if you are in the area!!

title: Stop in for late afternoon for beach snack
review: Nice ! .... we did not stay at the hotel ... just dropped in for a quick snack at the pool area .. no issues ... just nice relaxing area ~ everything was fresh ingredients ... the outdoor fire pit / sofa area looked very inviting

title: Perfect for all
review: Great hotel ,perfect location on the beach with all the trimmings ,walking distance to Pier 60 ,local restaurants and shops .Great Kids club with lots of activities ,evening  fire on the beach with Smores  and outdoor movies by the pool . Restaurant outstanding quality ,wine selection and of course service ,Starbucks coffee on site too .Wifi coverage is outstanding  Only downside parking is a charge as is the resort fee

title: Great beach resort for the family
review: Visited with a family of five with children ranging from 5 to 12.  We had been at Disney for four days and came to the beach after to unwind for a couple of days.  The entire experience at the Sandpearl was exceptional.  Rooms were large and well appointed.  Everything was immaculately clean -- lobby, rooms, pool area, etc.  Kids loved the pool and quick access to the beach.  The activity center by the pool had balls, boogie boards, sand toys, and whatever else they might need.  Food and drinks from Tate's (which has poolside service) were both good and reasonably priced.  The service was flawless throughout the resort as well.  There was always someone available (valet, concierge, waiter, etc.), but you never felt them hovering.  It was a true 5 star experience (and we didn't…

title: The BEST!
review: This was my second visit to the Sandpearl.  I had bragged to my boyfriend what a great time I had on the prior visit. Well this time they met and surpassed my expectations, from our bellman that gave us great tips on places to eat to the servers in the bar on the beach.  You cannot find a better place to stay in Clearwater.  The sand, the sunsets and the hotel are the finest in the United States! I seriously have traveled all over the world and have not found a more attentive staff than at the Sandpearl.

title: Sandpearl
review: First time there. But won't be my last. Great place. Clean beautiful lobby and rooms. Great pool & white sandy beaches. Hotel staff exceptional help especially concierge and check in desk ( can't remember her name sorry). Great restaurants. Good for families lots of activities.

title: Good decision to change
review: We initially stayed in another hotel at Clearwater Beach, but booked here after a very pleasant dinner at Caretta's, and a Short exploration of the pool area. Very friendly reception personnel, both when booking at 10 pm, and during our checkin the next day. The glass of champagne was such a nice welcome, after our unpleasant experience in the other, more expensive hotel. The pool area is wonderful: lots of place, with enough shade: trees, umbrella's and individual sunshades. Friendly, efficient staff and a nice choice of food and drink on the bar menu. I especially liked the piano music being played in the lobby. The fire pit on the beach, the fires on the terrace, enough tables in the bar area to enjoy the sunset while having a drink: it all contributed to a wonderful…

title: Worth The Money!
review: This resort is awesome! It's fresh, clean, and inviting. It definitely is not your typical Clearwater Beach hotel. It is a bit pricey, but the quality of the resort is worth the extra money if you can spare it. The staff is extremely pleasant. They take a personal interest in making you feel like a VIP. The breakfast is fantastic! The pool area is THE pool area to hang out at. Being steps off the beach is a rare find on Clearwater Beach. Being able to sip on a drink, then step onto the sand, then sit in a hammock, is incredible. They have fire pits at sunset and into the night. They have movies for the kids by the pool at night and have a bar steps away so you can relax and have a cocktail with your movie. I highly recommend this place, but bring your wallet and a stack of cash!…

title: Perfect Relaxing Break
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for 8 nights. The room was fantastic (Gulf View Junior Suite) and we woke in the morning enjoyed coffee on the balcony and twice watched dolphins swimming by. The hotel service was excellent and all staff were extremely helpful. The food on  the beach and in the room was of a really good quality. Only small issue was that housekeeping kept turning the AC down to 68 which for a brit was way too cold. We could walk to some of our favourite restaurants, Clear Sky, Bobby's Bistro and Pearly's Beach Eats.  The beach and service while in the Sandpearl area was fantastic but I recommend the long walk up to Caladesi Island to see the real natural beauty of Clearwater North Beach. You escape the crowds and to watch the sunset it is fantastic. Thanks to all at…

title: Underwhelming overall, but saved by certain staff members
review: Original room was disappointing. Floor 5. Had fruit fly infestation. Requested and was given a different room. One of the front desk staff apologized and graciously offered vouchers for a drink / entree / breakfast buffet, which was more than I was expecting and we were happy to start over.  New 4th floor room was okay, but bathtub was extensively chipped so it looked dirty; next door neighbors were very audible through the lock out doorway (I suspect this is a recurring problem for the hotel); wedding music was audible well into the evening (past 11 pm) on Saturday night, which must also be a routine complaint for guests on the 4th floor northern wing. View for a king gulf view was underwhelming for $400+ per night; more of a partial gulf view and full courtyard view.  We went…

title: Wonderful
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of your stay at the Sandpearl Resort on Clearwater Beach.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our pool and grounds as well as your dining experience at Tate Island Grill, our beachside restaurant.  I am also glad to see that our Front Desk was able to upgrade your room for you after check in.  In your review you  mentioned the condition of the bathtub.  My apologies for that.  I will personally inspect all of the tubs on the 4th floor northern wing to try to find what room you stayed in.  We take much pride in the condition and cleanliness of our resort so we will get that taken care of immediately.  I am also sorry for the noise from our wedding party on Saturday.  I will speak with our Evening Manager and make sure we do a better job at monitoring the noise level.    You also mentioned your breakfast experience.  I am not sure what happened but that is definitely not our norm.  My apologies for the wait for omelets as well as beverages.    We do have a resort fee which includes many of the things that you mentioned plus a few additional however you mentioned that you had to pay for increased bandwidth.  That is not the case at this hotel as all bandwidth is included in the resort fee charge.  I am not sure if perhaps you had this resort mistaken with another?  If you would like to speak personally regarding your experience please feel free to call me directly at the resort.  I appreciate your feedback.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Best Stay Yet!
review: This hotel is in my top 3 hotels worldwide. We had a fantastic suite (free upgrade) with an incredible view. The staff of the hotel is amazing, they truly treat you as a guest and make you feel home. It starts with the nice entrance and goes up to the service employees outside.  The hotel is clean, spacious and has a great location.  We definitely will return!

title: Wonderful stay!
review: Earlier review spoke of "turning the other way" regarding non guest--not accurate. The security is top notch and Melvin does not discriminate.  He checks everyone.  Even us!  lol.   We stayed this weekend for sugar sand festival.  The JR suite was fabulous!  Food and drinks super.  Service from Bobby at pool excellent!  Loved being here this weekend.  Even on spring break with kids all was amazing!  Coming back for Mother's Day!  Love this place everything is always over the top amazing!

title: Beautiful hotel/resort but with annoyances that may leave a return visit unlikely.
review: Beautiful resort. Our one major complaint is the lack of privacy/security measures at the pool. We saw several people who didn't belong to the hotel using the pool facility. When your guests are paying to stay at a resort, you should not "turn the other way" and accommodate people off the beach b/c they may use your restaurant. The amount of "extra" money you are making on some day trippers using your restaurant is lost in people who won't return to your resort. People who stay here don't want to support non hotel guests, that is not your consumer. Also, besides locking the gates into the pool area from the beach, you can stop charging $25 for beach umbrellas and more people would go to the beach and you would not have an overcrowded pool. Not sure if we will return to…

title: Beautiful hotel/resort, but with annoyances and gotchas that leave a return visit unlikely
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  In your review you mentioned a couple of things that I would like to address.  Regarding the security of the pool, we only allow hotel guests to use our pool.  We do not allow "day trippers".  We have a security guard working the pool deck on Thursdays thru Sundays to prevent this from happening.  I am not sure what day you were there but I am sorry for the confusion on this.  We also issue wrist bands that you get when you receive your pool towels and your name and room number are checked.  Also, we do have locks on our gates that require a room key to get access to the pool area.  Our beachside restaurant, Tate Island Grill, is opened to the public and we do our best to make sure that Tate's guests stay outside of the gated area.  Again, thank you for taking the time write the review.  If you would like to speak personally about your experience please contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: A Great Easter Family Experience
review: THE GOOD - This is a visually beautiful hotel. From pulling into the entrance to entering the lobby to finding your way to your room, it is clear you are staying at a very nice hotel. We had a Junior King Suite with Gulf View. The room (#404) was spacious and luxurious and had a great view of the beach and Gulf (not the pool). The beds were comfortable although the big pillows were not (the smaller pillows were fine). The TV was large with great picture quality. The pool area was great as well if you have kids or don't mind sharing a pool with kids. The bar in the Coretta was very nice, the drinks were well prepared, and the bartender was very attentive and accommodating.  THE BAD - 1) When we checked in, it took nearly 45 minutes for our bags to arrive at our room. We were…

title: Better last year but still an Amazing place to stay
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort Clearwater Beach.  We appreciate the feedback.  I am glad that you found our resort beautiful, clean, and service friendly.  In your review you mentioned several things that disappointed you.  First of all was the Bell Service.  45 minutes is way to long to wait for your luggage.  You are correct.  This is normally delivered within minutes of your arrival to your room.  I am not sure what happened but it is not the norm and definitely not acceptable.  My apologies.  Regarding the shutters, we do receive mixed reviews on these.  A majority of the people to like them as they allow the guest to relax in their tub should they choose and enjoy the view of the Gulf.  While the shutters do close, there is a privacy concern from some.  We will look into seeing if the is an option to attach locking mechanisms.  We charge for umbrellas on the beach not only for the additional revenue but for the guest satisfaction piece as well.
