We previously did not charge for umbrellas and guests would reserve chairs and umbrellas on the beach and the pool at the same time and therefore we would not have enough chairs and umbrellas for all guests.  Once we put a charge on the umbrellas this problem ended.  We hope you understand.  I am also very sorry to hear about your poor dining experience at Caretta on the Gulf.  I am not sure what happened but my apologies for failing to meet your expectations.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay with us please feel free to contact me directly as the resort.    Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: SPA!!!!
review: The Sandpearl is perfectly situated at the North end of Clearwater. Close enough to the noise and buzz of the town centre but far enough away to find some piece and quiet.  We visited at Easter and up until now every hotel I have ever visited at this time of year has been stretched to breaking point including a couple of Four Seasons Resort.  Despite being at close if not full to capacity this hotel delivered on every level.  -	Staff.  Everyone we engaged with was very friendly and helpful.  Valet service although a little pricey was excellent and my kids got too used to having their doors opened and closed for them every time we left or arrived at the hotel, nice little touch was the ice cold water on hand when leaving the hotel.  -	Pool.  Busy but we were always able to get a…

title: Room with a view
review: This was a beautiful memory from beginning to end! From the service from the valets to the young lady who holds open the huge front doors (all day!!) yes all day!!! To the reception,concierge,room service and carretta restaurant! We loved our beautiful ocean view suite from where sunrise to sunset the views were unspoilt! It was a wonderful 3 nights & perfect ending to our 2 weeks in Florida! I'd recommend it to all after hectic 10 nights in Orlando!! If there was one negative it wasn't the resort fee (honestly) it was the fact you are charged $29 for the use of an umbrella which are situated there anyway!! Please listen to your reviewers 'powers that be in sandpearl' and I am confident if this charge was eliminated the hotel would definitely be a 5 * rated in future!!

title: A simply wonderful time
review: Every aspect of this hotel was amazing..I had stayed previously in a similarly priced suite at the Four Seasons in Maui and frankly, this hotel was on the same level.    At a high end resort  you can expect to pay top dollar for amenities and this one was no difference, what made the difference to me was that everything seemed JUST right.  The person at the front desk was great, the lady at the Starbucks was personable, Paula at the bar by the beach was fun, and the valets always offered a water on the way.  We were on the top floor in a full apartment/suite which included a stackable washer/dryer, a dishwasher, a full refrigerator, a stove/oven and a VERY comfortable couch.  Every piece of furniture was in excellent condition and even the furniture on the small balcony was…

title: Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful!
review: This is the most wonderful hotel we have stayed at to date!  From arrival to departure, you don't have to lift a finger.  The staff is so accommodating and super friendly!  The pool and beach were beautiful and my children really enjoyed themselves.  The poolside food we ordered was delicious!  The room itself was immaculate with gorgeous front views of the ocean, perfect for watching a beautiful sunset!  We can't say enough about this hotel and we can't wait to return!  One word of advice: get your pool chairs early!  They are completely filled by 10-11am!

title: One of the nicest Resorts we have ever visited
review: My wife and I absolutely loved this resort. From the welcoming of the doormen, thru the lobby, to our beautiful gulf facing Jr suite. Everything was clean, new and bright. One of the nicest resort stays we have had. We stayed three nights and wished we had stayed longer. The sunsets over the gulf are spectacular. The Tate Island grill had very good food and drink with service to the beach and pool. We dined at Carettas one night and it rivaled any high end steak house. The staff throughout the resort was excellent, friendly and provided great service. The only things we were not happy with was the amount of children that overran the pool and pool area the entire day. The beach club seems to have a healthy membership and occupy the pool area early. And when you spend top dollar…

title: Breathing
review: My husband and I live in Tampa, so we occasionally pop over to the beach for a few days of relaxation. The Sandpearl is our favorite place whether we are taking friends, family, or just the two of us. There is no need for a car...park it and forget it. Walk to the pier. The rated restaurant, Caretta's is amazing. We crave the sushi, or the bone in rib steak, which is huge. The beachside bar is our favorite place to hang out (other than our balcony). There are also great restaurants next to the resort. The spa is good. The pool is huge with lots of chairs, but that seems the waste of time unless you are bringing kids along. Enjoy steel drums or other music beachside in the evenings. The service is with a smile. There is also very interesting historical value here. Worth reading…

title: Beautiful hotel, can't resolve error on bill
review: We had our second annual ladies weekend here and loved it. It's a great location and a beautiful hotel. However, we erroneously received something from room service and no one is responded to my request to remove the item from my bill. My friend called when we received it and was told we wouldn't be charged, but it was on our bill at checkout. I've since e-mailed the general manager three times (over the course of three weeks) and have not received a response. A poor ending to an otherwise great trip.

title: Nice amenities, best hotel on Clearwater
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Sandpearl Resort of our second annual ladies weekend.  I am glad that you had a great time.  Regarding your Room Service bill, please accept my apologies.  You mentioned that you sent me emails however I have never received any.  Please feel free to contact me directly at the resort so that I can get this corrected.  The phone number to the resort is 727-441-2425.  Thank you very much for staying with us again.  I look forward to speaking to you so that we may get this corrected.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Lovely views, clean grounds, comfortable beds
review: The Sandpearl is a very nice resort with great amenities. We saw some of the other hotels in the area, and the Sandpearl looked like the best option in Clearwater Beach. Staff was friendly for the most part (Jose in concierge went out of his way to help us which I really appreciated) and food at the Tate Island Grill and room service was very good. The hotel was also within walking distance to many stores and restaurants.   I had two issues with this resort. First, we stayed in a King JR Oceanfront Suite which had a strange shutter in the bathroom opening to the bedroom that wouldn't stay shut. I was traveling with family and this was very awkward since it provided no privacy in the bathroom. I don't know how the layout is in the other rooms, but if I were to stay there again I…

title: Girls trip
review: Aside from the hallways being overrun with unsupervised, screaming kids and pre-teens because of the spring break holiday, I was very pleased with the SandPearl. The bed perfectly suited my needs; firm, but still a little pleasant pillow-top. The pillows were not super flat, or uber-huge, either. The room was spotlessly clean. Only complaint would be that maintenance terribly needed to snake the shower drain (it was completely clogged and not draining). Everything seemed well taken care of, and the staff is very pleasant. There are umbrellas and beach chairs for your convenience, too. The pool looked fantastic, but again- too many children for me to enjoy it. Our view was impeccable!

title: 4 night trip
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I do apologize in regards to your shower drain being clogged. We do have someone in our Guest Service Center available 24 hours to assist with issues that need to be resolved. I am also happy to hear you were able to enjoy the umbrellas and chairs on our private beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel but a few opportunities
review: The hotel is beautiful with a great location. The staff was very nice and accommodating. Rooms were great (suite and regular room). The restaurants are both good and the beach staff was very attentive.  The opportunities were the inconsistency of housekeeping, let down with the shuttle service and an issue with the room.  Housekeeping: The rooms were not cleaned in the same manner every day. Little things like the number of towels, replacing wine glasses, not having regular turn down service and shower leaked so the rug was soaked and either was taken & not replaced or left soaking wet.  Shuttle service: We were here for our wedding and had asked if shuttle could take us two blocks at a specific time and confirmed three times. The shuttle was 15 minutes late, making us late for…

title: Great Place Service need a little work
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear our staff was nice and accommodating throughout your stay. In your review you mentioned the inconsistency with our housekeeping as well as the AC not working, and for that I am truly sorry. That is not up to our standards for the cleanliness of your room to not be cleaned in the same manner each day. I will certainly inform our Housekeeping and Engineering departments. I also apologize for the shuttle being 15 minutes late. As the shuttle is on a first come, first serve basis, it can be difficult to estimate the time of each drive as well as the traffic along Clearwater Beach. I am however happy to hear you enjoyed our restaurants as well as private beach area. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Lovely hotel but additional charges a rip off
review: I really want to love this place but, I never get a warm and fuzzy from the staff. I think they are trying to have RITZ style service but just don't have the training program. The hotel is very nice  and the food is very good. Some awesome views as well. Overall the best on the beach with one area of opportunity!

title: Spring Training Getaway
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort Clearwater Beach.  I appreciate your comments and am glad to hear that you enjoyed the beach and the food.  I am sorry that you feel our service is not up to your standards.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your experiences please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful
review: Lovely tranquil hotel with a gorgeous lobby and good facilities. Sun loungers by the pool were of a high standard but extremely packed in and close together. Reception was weak - we were early for check in and expected to wait. They said they would call us when the room was ready but failed to do so. No explanation of facilities was given either. Our room was very clean and well appointed but with disappointingly cheap and unappealing toiletries. Plenty of towels however and great housekeeping service. Coffee machine in the room but coffee pods and milk weren't replenished often enough so we weren't always able to use it. Picked this hotel due to it's beautiful beach location but an additional charge of $29 for a parasol for hotel guests was totally unacceptable. We stayed in…

title: expensive but nice!
review: The Sandpearl is a beautiful facility and with very friendly staff. The beach and pool are wonderful. There are lots of local amenities. We always felt very welcome and very safe everywhere we went.  Sadly, the Sandpearl adds on unavoidable surcharges like a "Resort Fee".  For the cost of the rooms, they would be better severed by just including the cost in the room charge.  The "Resort Fee" feels like the baggage fee charged by airlines.  For an upscale facility, this seems low-class.

title: Average Resort Hotel on Amazing Beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us at the Sandpearl and our staff was friendly and accommodating. I apologize you feel our Resort Fee is low scale. We do offer several amenities in our daily Resort Fee for our guests to use, and we do make it known upon booking the reservation. I am, however, happy to hear you were able to relax and enjoy our pool and beach area as that is truly the best way to enjoy your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Top Notch!
review: Firstly, this place has an amazing beach and great pool. Also great poolside service, well worth a visit for these items alone. However, the rooms are just a bit average, views are nice for beachside and there are balconies with chairs. For the price of the hotel room finishes just felt a bit cheap, it was very comfortable though-great sleep and good shower. Good location, walking distance to shops and restaurants. Staff are friendly and helpful, good on-site amenities.

title: Fantastic Family Vacation
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you liked so many things about our resort from our Pool and Beach and service around the resort.  I am sorry you did not like the finishes in the guestrooms.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write a review.    Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Spectacular resort, great location and you pay for that
review: We stayed at this hotel for 13 days over Christmas. The hotel is very nice and the location is fabulous. The sand on the beach was so soft and free from garbage. The hotel pool was a good temperature and the food service came around with regularity. The birds can be a nightmare though if food gets left laying around!!   We had a room with a gulf view and we are so glad we spent the little bit more to secure this. Having that beautiful view from the room really did help push this vacation to being one of favorites.

title: Lovely Hotel but the Street outside not great
review: This was a lovely hotel - not uber lovely. Staff were not that helpful always - rooms were nice but not amazing for the money. The street outside had really poor touristy shops that were tired and run down. Some nice restaurants closeby. Parking $25 / night a rip off

title: I came to check out how the place was, maybe stay a few nights..
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had a lovely time at our resort. I do apologize for the times you did not find our staff helpful. I also am sorry to hear you did not enjoy the shops around the beach. We do have our upscale gift shop Collections in our lobby level of the resort. Clearwater Beach began as a quaint town and has several historic memories that the locals still keep alive today. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Cannot say enough about this resort.
review: It was just totally disgusting the arrogance displayed by the staff to anyone who is not a paying customer, There was a homeless man walking by and I could hear, who I later found out was eric waltz, THE GENERAL MANAGER, Making disgusting remarks about how people with dreads are lower human beings then himself and the "working people" who are around him...(Funny they couldn't manage to do there job shortly after when he was no where to be found.)   But to top it all off, they're drivers DON'T know how to drive stick shift car, are rude, and refused to allow me to park it myself in there garage, until they failed to move a foot before killing the engine, then I came back from parking my car and my luggage was laying partially opened with a new driver there who said it was already…

title: Resort perfection
review: This place is pricey, but worth every dime.  From the moment we pulled up the staff was stellar.  The lobby is lovely, and we were offered a glass of champagne as we waited to complete the check-in process.  The room was very large and very nicely appointed, and with a spa-like very large bathroom which included a washer/dryer.  We were given all sorts of extras by the extremely attentive staff who seemed to know what I wanted or needed before I did.  Again, I cannot overestimate the staff, from the bell captain to the pool security to the poolside waitress and cabana boy, everyone was fantastic, with the possible exception of the bartender at the indoor restaurant who seemed to make an awful lot of noise behind the bar, though she was friendly and pleasant as she served us. …

title: Spa Day Girls Day
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you had such a fantastic stay with us and our staff was friendly and attentive. It sounds like you had such a relaxing time while you were dining at Tate Island Grill. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: We love the Sandpearl
review: Just returned from another wonderful getaway at the Sandpearl.  The beach is absolutely gorgeous, the location is great, and the resort is fantastic.  Everyone at the Sandpearl goes above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable.  From the servers by the pool or at the beach being extra attentive, to the concierge grabbing us umbrellas to walk to dinner with on a rainy evening, or housekeeping making sure everything was just right, the Sandpearl is an exceptional resort.  The spa is amazing, the restaurants are fantastic, and the rooms are great.  We can't wait to return.

title: Heaven on Earth!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had such a fantastic stay with us and our staff went above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable. Although I apologize for the rainy evening you encountered, I am glad to know our staff was there to assist making sure you had umbrellas for your dinner. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Awesome room with a view!
review: I've been vacationing in Clearwater for over 7 years and I was fortunate enough to experience the Sand Pearl resort for the first time this spring and it is, hands down, the best option for a stay in Clearwater. The décor is exquisite, the food is excellent, the place is immaculate, the rooms are spacious and the staff is overwhelmingly personable and accommodating. The pool is large enough to accommodate everyone during the busy season and the service extends onto the beach where you can eat and drink just as though you stayed on the hotel property. There was live music offered at happy hour that was centrally located in order to enjoy the music poolside, in the bar area, or even around the firepit on the beach. The resort also offers a separate bonfire area for kids and adults…

title: Lobby, restaurant and pool are all  spectacular !
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It seems like you had the perfect visit to the Sandpearl Resort and were able to experience all that we have to offer. From the outstanding service, beautiful décor and rooms, to the music by Tate Island Grill, bonfire and our dive in movie by the pool, your vacation sounds like it was the best visit to Clearwater Beach yet! We are very fortunate to be surrounded by several great restaurants and shops as you have experienced. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: No Bay View at ALL!
review: My wife had come to Florida for a wedding and decided to come down a few days early and make a mini-vacation out of it. We stayed at the Sandpearl Resort for a couple of days. First let me preface by saying that we have stayed at some pretty luxury style hotels before. One of them was the top ranked hotel in the United States by this site. When we arrived at the Sandpearl, we were greeted with valet parking which seems to be the norm and top hotels. We arrived to check in and we were upgraded automatically without any input from us. The room was spectacular with a full-size kitchen, a nice sitting area and view of the gulf, along with a large king bed and bathroom. In the words of my wife this was the nicest room that we have ever had and again we have stayed at top hotels. I…

title: Beach hotel that's about it
review: Arrival - used valet as parking seem to be an issue. The guys were great, service was really fast. Check in was, lack for a better word, boring and the front desk lady was very nervous. She was polite, courteous but lacked personality. She gave us no information on the hotel other then our room key and directions to the elevator.  I also watched as someone walked in off the street to look at ballroom space. The space was set up for meetings, so instead of saying "let me see if I can show you the space" with the understanding it's not set for a wedding, she turned and told her to make an appointment. When they asked about a beach wedding and even though it's not your job, you could take them on a short tour and invite them back a later date to meet the wedding coordinator. A…

title: Wedding at the Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review and comments regarding your visit to our resort.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed several aspects of the resort including service by Jose, Bill and others.  In your review you commented on several things including the service at the Front Desk, bedding and Chlorine in the pool.  I am very sorry that the Front Desk service was not welcoming and warm.  We pride ourselves on having friendly and professional service but in this case I am bothered to hear that didn't happen.  My apologies.    You also commented on the pillows and comforter.  We recently switched all the pillows in the resort to a new type and the feedback has not been positive so we are researching better and bigger pillows.  You also mentioned the comforter was not clean?  We have Duvets with Duvet inserts on all beds that are washed after every check out and every third day of a guest stay unless the guest would like it washed daily.   You also mentioned the chlorine level in the pool.  That also surprises me as we have a geo-thermal pool that utilizes ozone as we are a LEED certified hotel.  The amount of chlorine that we use is about 10% of the normal amount of chlorine required in a normal pool.  The hot tubs around the pool do utilize chlorine however as required by law.  Again, thank you for your feedback on your stay.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Conference at the Clearwater
review: The hotel was very nice, stayed 2 days. The weather was chilly when I arrived on Friday night, and Saturday was still chilly so the weddiing was held indoor. The place is beautiful and the room where the wedding was held was stunning, decorated with beautiful flowers. Sunday was a better day, weather wise, people were out enjoying the beach, walking sightseeing the surrounding area and beach. There were people having fun playing in the pool at the hotel. We had  brunch outside on the restaurant terrace and all the food was delicious. Room service late at night was quick and food was also very good.

title: Great stay on Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is great to hear that although the weather was a little chilly, you were able to enjoy the beautiful wedding ceremony. Our Sunday Brunch in Caretta on the Gulf is absolutely incredible and I am delighted to know you were able to enjoy it. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Very nice
review: The hotel is beautiful the people are so nice. It was chilly so we couldn't take advantage of the pool or beach as it was very windy, but we did walk the beach and it is just beautiful. Hotel has nice amenities and the spa is awesome. Had a work conference at the hotel and decided to stay an extra day to enjoy the resort and area. within walking distance to so many things.

title: Will not go again on Labor Day Weekend
review: This was my third stay at the Sandpearl and we took the family for my birthday.  Trying to find a chaise lounge at the pool was next to impossible.  We luckily found a chair every day, but saw people fighting over reserving chairs with the security officer.  For the price you pay, you expect to have a chair to relax.  To go out on the beach, you have to pay extra for the umbrellas.  I love this resort, but will stay away during busy holiday weekends.

title: Nice grounds and location, showers ran low on hot water
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is fantastic to hear you enjoyed your third stay with us, especially to celebrate your birthday! I do apologize for any inconveniences you experience or witnessed around the pool area. In regards to the pool chairs, we do not reserve any pool chairs as they are on a first come basis for our registered guests. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Top Notch Place to Stay
review: Perhaps THE most basic requirement of a hotel is a hot shower.  For me this hotel failed to deliver.  Both mornings I was here, the shower water temperature fluctuated between cool and warm, never reaching hot and never staying one temperature for more than a minute.  This is the sign of an aging property, so despite the nice grounds, location and staff, I would not stay here again.  The hotel is right on the beach, which is large and clean with plenty of chairs.  The rooms were in fact very nice with full sliding windows stepping out onto a balcony.  The staff had a champagne cocktail for me on arrival.  But the hot water...the hot water.

title: Tasteful luxury right on the beach
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.    During your stay we did encounter issues with a component of our hot water system.  It was repaired as quickly as possible and now works perfectly.  My apologies for the delay.  In your review you mentioned this is a sign of an aging property.  That is absolutely not the case as these types of issues happen in brand new construction as well.  Also, as the resort is only 7 years old I would not consider this to be an aging property.  Again, thank you for your review.  If you would like to speak regarding your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great hotel on Clearwater beach
review: Overall this is a great place to stay. The friendliness of the staff, the large pool, and the comfortable rooms are great. The sushi from the restaurant (say hi to Nana from Ghana) is out of this world, and it will keep us coming back...highly recommended!

title: worth the money
review: Although the lobby doors are strange, the friendly staff opens them up for you and you walk inside. The lobby is laid out wonderfully and gives a nice view of the water feature that flows into the spa fountain. Depending on where you are, check-in times vary and we got in around 3:30PM. Rooms with a balcony are very nicr and offer a wonderful view wherever your price range puts you. All in all it was a wonderful experience and I plan to return.

title: First class service and finishes
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to check you in prior to 4:00pm. We too feel as if our lobby is very warm and inviting and creates a relaxing atmosphere for all of our guests! We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful
review: Feels like a true resort and the staff is friendly. Beautiful pool and resort. Food and drinks a bit pricey but worth it for the luxurious feel. A nice escape. Only downside was the construction traffic to get there.

title: amazing
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you had such a great stay with us especially while relaxing around our gorgeous pool area. I do apologize for the construction taking place on your travels onto Clearwater Beach. Although it can make our travels longer, our city takes pride in bettering Clearwater and Clearwater Beach, and we are very excited for the updates on the roads. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: A Gem in Clearwater!
review: If you prepay, you can get 20% off your rate. This is a great hotel! Top notch all the way.. Beach, pool, beachside bar, workout room and spa. The front desk was delightful, as was everyone I talked to. The rooms were clean and very comfortable.

title: A paradise
review: Beautiful resort, full of all comforts. Our spacious and clean room, facing the ocean gave us a beautiful view of the sunset.  We enjoyed our lunches at the Tate Island Grill and the Marketplace was a great solution for our kid's snacks and breakfast. All the staff very friendly and helpful.  The pool has a lot of accessories available (noodles, floating rings and mats) that we could take to the beach too.  For the kids availability of camp and activities throughout the day. Our kids enjoyed the ping pong table, the s'mores by the campfire and the movie nights. The beach is well organized and continuos service from the Tate Island Grill with beverage and/or food is available. Another nice thing was the fruit flavored water available at the towel desk throughout the day.

title: Icky dirty
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your time here at the Sandpearl Resort. From Tate Island Grill and our Marketplace, to our beautiful pool area and nightly S’mores and movie, it appears you were able to enjoy all that our resort has to offer! We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Hotel with Player Piano
review: This place is the illusion of nice. But it os filthy dirty. This Picture is of the curtains on the lobby.  They are All Filthy like this. And the dust in this place is inexcusable. Stains on the lobby furniture too.  I don't know who hands put these stars but it is really overrated

title: Nice Hotel, but Expensive for what you get
review: Dear Guest, We have received your recent review.  Regarding the sheers in the lobby, you are correct that they are currently in unacceptable condition.  While we routinely clean all of our curtains, sheers, upholstery and carpeting the current sheers are beyond their life.  We ordered new sheers for this area several weeks ago and they are in the process of being made for us.  Should you decide to revisit us in a couple more weeks you will see the new ones in place.  As you can see from most all other reviews we take much pride in the cleanliness and condition of our resort.  We work effortlessly to make sure that we meet our guests expectations and in this one area we reacted to late on replacing the items.    If you would like to speak personally please contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Amazing beach
review: The Player Piano was a nice entry touch to the hotel.  Stayed at the Hilton  but did visit this hotel and had dinner.  The fine dining restaurant food was OK, waiter didn't know much about the menu or the wine.

title: Amazing Resort
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sandpearl Resort for 4 nights in September and absolutely loved everything about the resort!!  From the front desk staff to housekeeping, everyone went out of their way to make us feel welcome!!    We spent our days on the private beach at the resort and again the staff were great.  The food and beverage service is a nice touch - you do not have to leave the resort if you don't want to.    The Sandpearl is extremely clean and every detail is taken care of.  We had an oceanfront suite and the view was amazing!!     We plan on returning and staying at the Sandpearl Resort.

title: Impressive
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had such a fantastic stay and everyone was very welcoming from the front desk to our housekeeping team. Our private beach area is certainly the best way to relax and soak in some sun, and I am glad you were able to enjoy that. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous hotel, but don't ask for room service!
review: I was here for a conference and was quite delighted.   I rolled in by car at quite a late hour and was made to feel very welcome by the staff despite my, by then, disheveled appearance.   The champagne was a nice touch.   The room was large and had a classic feel to it.  A Keurig and a minibar with snacks means you don't have to leave your room if you're doing some work.  The good service carried over to housekeeping (one of my pet peeves is having to wait till 4 PM to have my room made up, and mine was made up during the morning meeting sessions) and room service, which was also prompt.  Unfortunately the weather was horrible, so between that and the meeting, I didn't take advantage of their outdoor spaces, but they looked great and it has a nice beach setting.  Their fitness…

title: Beautiful Rooms But A Few Gotchas
review: Check in is a breeze, and they greet you with champagne, definitely a plus. The rooms are spacious, with balconies with comfortable chairs which would be a perfect place to watch the sunset over the beach if it's not raining. The bath tub is nice and deep, and the bathroom itself is pleasant with a great long mirror and good lighting. There is also a make up mirror, and cotton wool and Q tips. The beach is right there, and a lovely one it is too. My only issue is room service. I ordered tomato soup and a cheese plate at 7:15 PM and was startled to find out that it would take an hour and 45 minutes. That really did not make me happy.

title: The absolute Best on the Gulf Coast
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear your arrival experience was warm and welcoming. I do apologize that our In Room Dining service did not meet our standards and took longer than anticipated for your dinner. I am, however, excited to hear you were able to partake in our breathtaking sunsets.  I would have to agree that the sunsets over the Gulf of Mexico are spectacular and such beautiful scenery. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: Nice gulf option that met our needs for a conference hotel
review: Upon check-in, I was given a king room from the booked double double which I appreciated.  My room did have a balcony, and did look out over 1/4 of the gulf along the beach, but it was on floor 6 directly above a floor 2 or 3 level with the HVAC directly below my room.  Bottom line, lots of noise and drowned out what would have been a good ocean view option. This was a work trip, if I had been on hoiday I would have asked to be switched to another room.

title: Feeling let down
review: Sand Pearl is a beautiful property on a beautiful stretch of beach with lots of pros and cons: We were met with champagne on arrival and staff was very nice. They told us they upgraded our room on checkin, but when we got to our room, we had two doubles instead of the requested King. Had to change rooms.  Pool area is gorgeous and pool desk provides lots of great towels. Jacuzzi is wonderful.  We were very disappointed with the service and policies of this property though.  While everything was kept clean, we felt that we were always being nickel and dimed for every extra. For instance, we paid a resort fee daily that was quite high, and included bikes. It turns out that you only get one bike per day, and if you want to ride together you've got to rent the other bike and it's…

title: Near Perfect
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent trip to the Sandpearl.  I am glad that you enjoyed your arrival experience as well as the your pool experience.  Thank you for your feedback regarding a couple of the "cons" of your trip.  I will speak with the Activities Team regarding your feedback on the rentals of bikes.  Regarding the s'mores, we do have a s'mores firepit that should be lit just prior to sunset each night.  If that did not occur I am very sorry.  I am not sure about the comment about the evening bonfire as that is not something we do here. I am also sorry about the timeliness of your Housekeeping services.  If you should stay with us in the future, you can request specific times to have your room cleaned so that this will not be an issue in the future.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Nice Hotel in Clearwater
review: This was a business trip but it felt like a great vacation.  The staff is super friendly,the place is clean, the food is great, the beach is fantastic.  I would recommend to come here for a great beach getaway and pampering

title: Grouper Bites @ the Pool
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you were able to enjoy your stay with us while in town on your business trip. It is also wonderful to hear the staff was friendly and our beach and food were fantastic. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Front Office Manager

title: You`re paying for a wonderful location and only a "good" hotel.
review: I chose this hotel for both it`s location and the quality of the rooms.I realise now the Sandpearl is an excellently marketed hotel in a fantastic location without the quality of rooms to back it up which is disappointing. Family of 4 staying in a One Bedroom Gulf Front Sunset Deluxe. The Hotel reception and communal areas are beautiful. However, what a disappointment we had when we got to our room. Best described as tired with scuff marks on walls etc and some dated looking furniture. It had not been cleaned to a high standard either as there were dirty marks on mirrors and doors etc. A bit of a come down after where we`d been staying in Orlando which was 100% 1st class (see other review). Stunning views of the beach however and a well equipped suite with a full kitchenette.…

title: A Precious Gem
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Sandpearl Resort, we always appreciate feedback about our work. I do agree we are in a wonderful location and again apologize for you concerns about some aspects of the service and specifics of your room. I hope you do reconsider the Sandpearl if you return to Clearwater Beach.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: nice hotel
review: Following the viewing of the movie 'Dolphin Tale 2' I knew we had to visit Clearwater. So to coincide with my husbands birthday we were pampered at the Sandpearl. Situated on an extremely clean, white, wide and long sandy beach made it perfect for an early morning stroll.  The heated pool was open early until late allowing us to maximise the days.  Its lifts were amazingly speedy and our room was kept spotless. The staff were very friendly and attentive. Our experience at the Caretta's restaurant was disappointing on the night of my husband's birthday, we had a waiter that was far to pushy, maybe trying to enhance the service charge. The $25 daily fee for what one expects to be included as a matter of course needs to be reviewed.  But can't wait to return.

title: Lovely weekend, beautiful room
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Sandpearl Resort. It is always nice to be pampered and I am happy we were able to do so for you. I am also glad you were able to utilize our pool facilities and you enjoyed the wonderful beach we have here. I do apologize for your experience in Caretta’s but we look forward to your return so we may change your opinion.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Paradise on the Beach
review: The hotel and location are very good.  What prevented the 5 star review is the well posted extra fees which included internet.  However, the internet was not working well which made it impossible to finish some business.  Additionally, the 25 dollar fee to use an umbrella that was next to the beach chairs we chose to sit at was not necessary.

title: Loved this hotel!!!
review: Overall, this is a fabulous hotel.  The atmosphere, the staff, and the beach are superb.  Loved the decor.  The spa was relaxing.  The beach is beautiful.  White pearl sand.  Great service at the pool and the beach. The food at the pool and beach is great.  With all these positives, my one and only criticism is with the concierge.  They weren't friendly, not helpful, and made you feel like you were a bother.  Plus, they told me that the hotel did not have a beach wheelchair and where I should rent one for $60/day.  Thank goodness I decided to wait a day before placing the order.  The hotel had one at the pool for hotel guests to use for free.  Clearly, the concierge did not know the hotel well.  The pool manager was great.  The pool and beach attendants were great.  So, even…

title: Top class hotel - and I'm a travel agent!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind words about your recent stay with us at Sandpearl Resort. I agree and think this is a fabulous hotel as well, I am very happy you were pleased with the atmosphere staff and our white sand beach. I do apologize for the miscommunication with the concierge but am very happy everything worked out for you and you will be back to see us in the future.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Wish I could stay longer!
review: My husband and I stayed here in September as part of our honeymoon.   As a travel agent I have been lucky enough to travel the world staying in many top class 5* hotels so sometimes my expectations are a little high!  This hotel did not disappoint and is one of the best I have ever stayed in.  I honestly can't fault a thing, top class, luxury, friendly helpful staff, fab location, beautiful beach, nice restaurant. Everything was brilliant.  The valet parking was great, just call down as you are leaving and your car is ready and waiting with bottled water on the car seats for you.   We were very lucky and got upgrade to a 1 bed beach front suite which was beautiful. I couldn't fault a thing.  All in all 5/5, not a bad word to say and would 100% love to return again one day! …

title: Awesome hotel
review: Dear Guest,  I am so happy you and your husband enjoyed your honeymoon here with us at Sandpearl Resort. I appreciate the kind words and am very pleased with the level of service you received from our staff as a whole. We take pride in what we offer here and look forward to having you stay with us in the future.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Lovely place, nice staff, lots of hidden charges
review: I was here for a 3 day business trip.  Although, I didn't get to lounge around and relax, my interactions with the staff was superb from check-in to check-out.  The room was very spacious and comfortable.  They have things to do for all ages, and the views were fabulous.  I just wished that I could have stayed a little longer after my meeting to totally enjoy the amenities.  One issue I have with the property is they claim to be a green property, or LEED.  However, even when I left my towel hanging up, each day they still took it for washing.  Just winder how much water they are conserving if they do this for everyone that hangs up their towels.  Other than that I couldn't find anything to complain about.

title: Fantastic Luxury Property
review: The Sandpearl in Clearwater is an incredible luxury resort.  We had a very large, two room suite with kitchen, large bathroom which includes a massage tub and a stand-up shower.  There are two small balconies overlooking a beautiful view of the ocean.   Unfortunately, the weather was cold so we could not really enjoy the pool or the beach.  From what we could tell, the pool and the large white sandy beach would have been fun.  The hotel staff was very friendly, the valet did a terrific job tending to our vehicle and our room was clean.  Housekeeping did a nice job and each evening asked if we needed anything.    You will not be disappointed should you choose to stay at this hotel.

title: Beautiful...but felt a bit nickel and dimed
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at Sandpearl Resort, we are always happy to hear about a satisfied guest. It is unfortunate the weather was a bit cooler and didn’t allow you to utilize our wonderful pool and beach however I am happy you were still able to enjoy your stay and your room was tended to efficiently by the housekeeping staff. We look forward to your return!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Always beautiful and serene
review: We arrived at the Sandpearl on New Year's Day, and it was as beautiful as all the reviews claim. The lobby is gorgeous, the rooms have high ceilings and are luxurious, and the pool and beach area is fabulous. The poolside food and service was also very good. However, I felt that as a luxury resort a few details were missing. It seems to me that for the price there could be more than two bottles of water available in the room. Other resorts we have stayed at include some juice, soda and snacks. Charging extra for yoga and exercise classes also seemed odd, seeing that you are already paying a resort fee. And the inclusion of 1 free bike rental for a family of 4 was just annoying. The food at Carettas was excellent, and our waiter was very good and friendly, as was the host.…

title: One of the best beachfront hotels!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us here at Sandpearl Resort. I am sorry you feel you were nickel and dimed during your stay but am pleased that you were happy with your room and the service you received. I hope you do come and enjoy yourselves with us again in the future.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Wonderful Stay
review: My boyfriend and I love this hotel. It is so beautiful and the views are amazing. We booked using a black friday special they had but otherwise the rooms are pricey. The pool is amazing and heated and all of the staff we encounter are always so friendly. Would recommend to anyone looking for a romantic place in Clearwater.

title: Spectacular stay with teens
review: We stayed at Sandpearl for three nights starting December 29.  We had great weather (82-84F and sunny) and spent a lot of time at the pool and the beach.  Our room had a spectacular ocean view and we got another room for our two teens that had a partial ocean view.  There were a lot of families with young children during the time we stayed at the Sandpearl.  Here's what we did and a few tips that you may find helpful:  Poolside:  Guests claim the loungers early, so when you wake up head down to the pool and reserve places for yourself and family members.  You do this by asking for towels and covers from the poolside service desk.  One of their folks will help you put your covers on the loungers you've selected.  Leave a book or flip flops on your loungers and head to breakfast. …

title: Excellent Beachfront Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind words about your recent stay with us at Sandpearl Resort. I also appreciate the helpful tips you have left behind for other travelers. I am very happy you enjoyed your holiday weekend which was a blast for everyone including the staff. Thank you for the high recommendation, we look forward to seeing you in the future.   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: A Real Surprise
review: We stayed here for 3 nights during our annual Florida vacation and had a wonderful stay. On check in we were assisted by the delightful Shelley who went above and beyond the call of duty and made this a stay we will never forget. The suite we were allocated was very spacious and well equipped with marvellous views all round. The overall feel and ambience of the hotel was just right, staff very helpful without being over the top. We enjoyed our stay so much that I called today and booked a 5 night stay for October 2016, can't wait to be back on the beach.

title: Top service, lovely facilities, breathtaking beach!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay. I am thrilled that you all chose the Sandpearl for your Florida vacation spot. It sounds like you had a memorable time which is something each staff member strives for. We look forward to seeing you again in October!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Classy Hotel, Jammed Beachfront
review: I will admit we went to this resort thinking it looked nice in the photos but that perhaps it didn't reflect the real look of the place. We were right. It was better.  Loved the Sandpearl.  We have stayed at many luxury hotels all over the world and the Sandpearl stood up to pretty much all of them. The best example I can give is that i think this resort measures up equally if not better than the Ritz in Naples.  It was that good.  Our gulf front room was flawless.  Staff was friendly, engaging and gave great service, without being "over the top" in a bad way.  The pool was beautiful.  Beachfront gorgeous.  Food at the pool and at the main restaurant was great. We didn't make a reservation for New Year's Eve because we just wanted to take it easy and we went to the lounge, got a…

title: Beautiful resort.
review: We are locals and stayed for a second time in 2 weeks at the Sandpearl. Absolutely a beautiful resort. It was decorated for Christmas, the tree in the lobby was beautifully decorated in gold. The details on the sand sculptor were amazing. We ate at the restaurant for breakfast on both visits and Edwin was our server and was very tentative. The brioche french toast was absolutely delicious. From the valet's, room service, bartenders, servers, front desk, turn down service, to everyone we met were so friendly and efficient. We loved the fire-pits on the beach as well as on the lobby level by the restaurant. We will return!

title: Worth the visit
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. It is always wonderful to see locals coming to stay with us, and we certainly appreciate the repeat business as well! I am so happy that each staff member you came into contact with was helpful and attentive to your needs. We want to make sure that each and every guest feels right at home. Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to your next visit to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Best resort in clearwater
review: We were in a 2 bedroom suite with excellent accommodations and views. Pool, access to gulf, bikes for beach and casual dining were wonderful. The negatives were the garbage disposal was broken and the shower/bath water never reached a hot temperature.

title: Top class
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. I am so glad that you had a wonderful time in your two-bedroom suite; those are some our most luxurious rooms that we have! I sincerely apologize about the maintenance issues that you were experiencing in your suite. Those issues are not something that is prone to happen and I am sorry that it had affected your stay. In the future, please do not hesitate to call our operator and have an engineer take a closer look at the disposal and shower temperature. We are here to help! Again, thank you for your review and I hope the next time you are in Clearwater Beach you choose the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Best Pool and Beach Combo
review: I stayed in Sandpearl for 2 or 3 days with my family and was blown away. There is so much to do there that we could have gone there for weeks and still had an array of things to do. Some of the things we did on our short trip was  ▪️Playing in the enormous pool. ▪️Paddle boarding on the ocean. ▪️Banana boat riding (an unstable inflatable boat that is toad around by a jet ski as you hang on for dear life). ▪️Amazing spa day. ▪️snorkeling in the vibrant ocean. As you can see there is truly an option for every one in the family. On top of that the hotel staff is very kind and the restaurant is fantastic. Sandpearl is great spot for a family vacation and I would go back in an instant.

title: Must Stay, Slightly Secluded, Great Dinner
review: This hotel is somewhat secluded, in the fact that it's far enough away from the current construction that you don't hear/see any of it.  It also has a great beachfront, with a short walk to the Gulf and neat little tiki bar near the pool with great views.  We stayed in a Gulf Front view...which, if you can afford the extra cost, has magnificent views of the Gulf or pool.  The food at the Caretta was pricey, but unbelievably good.  They have a great sushi bar, and the staff guided us towards gluten-free options.

title: Such an amazingly beautiful place!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am thrilled you enjoyed your Gulf Front accommodations. Your balcony was the perfect spot to watch our beautiful sunsets! I am also happy you were able to dine at Caretta and had a memorable dinner experience. Again, thank you for your review and we hope you make another visit to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Beautiful resort a must see
review: We were treated like kings and queens from the moment we arrived.  We were upgraded (without us asking) to an oceanfront suite.  So beautiful and clean.  Beds were comfortable, bathroom was clean, everything smelled good.  Chairs by the beach are free and plentiful.  Always employees around who are eager to help.  Wish we could go back!!!!!!

title: Superb hotel in a great location
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. I am so happy that each staff member were eager to help and always nearby as well. We want each and every guest to feel right at home when they stay with us. I hope you all make another visit to the Sandpearl in the near future!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Loved it!
review: We went for a special occasion and this resort and staff definitely can make it special. For this they upgraded my Inlaws to a beautiful room with a view. The sand was so soft and white with plenty of chairs and staff to accommodate your needs.

title: The best in its area
review: I stayed for 3 nice nights. The room is excellent, spacious, clean, and quite. The bed is OK but the blankets are aweful. The hotel only offers Valet Parking and it's for $22 a day and you have no other choice. Their WiFi is for free but it's not that great; it keeps disconnecting every few minutes. The hotel in general is great I would stay here again unless I find a better deal, the area is nice too but it totally shuts down at around 8 pm although it's a tourists area.

title: Great customer service
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad to hear that you loved the guestrooms.  I am sorry for the issues you had with the wireless.  I am not sure what the issue was as we just had the entire system upgraded.  My apologies.  I am also sorry you felt there was not enough to do in the local area.  Clearwater Beach is a relaxed beach community with many restaurants and bars open until well after midnight.   If you would like to speak personally regarding your visit, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: One of the best resorts in Southwest Florida
review: My husband and I had made reservations at a hotel near the SandPearl for our honeymoon and had a very bad experience at the other hotel. I was practically in tears when we started our search for a new hotel for the rest of our honeymoon. We happened upon the SandPearl. Giancarlo at the front desk of the SandPearl truly saved our honeymoon.  He was able to get us a room (with an amazing view and at a great price).  He gave us immediate check in and a wonderful breakfast the next day. This resort is top notch. The staff are so friendly and helpful. The food was wonderful, especially room service breakfast and the breakfast buffet. The views were beautiful!  The fire pit and bar are great places to hang out at sunset. It's not far from the pier, but there is so much to do at the…

title: Fabulous Resort
review: Dear Guest,    Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am thrilled that you and your husband were able to enjoy your honeymoon here and that Giancarlo at the Front Desk was accommodating and helpful. We want each and every guest to feel right at home and to be as comfortable as possible. I hope we see you and your husband back at the Sandpearl soon!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Best hotel on Clearwater Beach
review: What a treat to stay at the Sandpearl Resort, outstanding accommodations and five-star service.  The beach location is one of the best and everything about the resort was tremendous.  Enjoyed the restaurant which I will review separately.  Definitely recommend sitting around the firepit and watching the sunset.  I was not expecting this kind of luxury experience  in Clearwater - just superb!

title: Very Nice!
review: Stayed there last week for four days.  Upon check in they upgraded me to a king suite.  It was beautiful, spacious and clean.  I had two balconies.  I did not have ocean view but the view was still gorgeous day and night and it still provided me with water views.  They provided plenty to do and it was right on the beach.  Great location, within walking distance  to many stores and bars.

title: Great for families
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am thrilled that you enjoyed your bayside accommodations. Our resort is situated so centrally near all the attractions in the area which is very convenient. I hope you choose to come back and stay with us again!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: 5 days in heaven
review: Beautiful resort, great for families but if you are seeking relaxation, stay away. Kids dominate pool day and night. I don't enjoy dodging balls whizzing at me and this was a constant during the two days we were there. The beach is gorgeous and that is where we hung out. Valet service is super friendly when you check in and when you check out they totally ignore you. I guess they figure you are not going to tip them when you leave because you are probably out of money after staying at this high priced place. We live in Florida and there are so many better choices, we will not return here.

title: Great place to stay and relax
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.    While we are a very family friendly resort and were voted the second best family resort in the country by Travel and Leisure magazine we do cater to couples as well.  I am sorry you did not find your visit with us relaxing.  You are correct, the Sandpearl is most definitely not an inexpensive place to visit however we feel we are well worth the money due to the unique experience we create for our valued guests.  I am sorry to hear you will not be returning to us.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your experience please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great property but teeming with toddlers
review: My friend booked us into the Sandpearl Resort for a  5 day mini vacation.  The hotel was really beautiful and we were greeted at the front desk by a lovely lady named Shelley who welcomed us with a glass of champagne.  We went to our room and it was really well appointed, clean and comfortable.   The beds were extremely comfortable.  We spent one afternoon on the beach and were very impressed with the waitress who was bringing orders to the sunbathers.  How she carried all those drinks is beyond me.  She took our order and was back very quickly with it.  She was also very friendly.  There were some really nice touches that added to the quality of the hotel.  The room service hangers were really cute.  It was a nice printed card and it was hung by a nautical looking rope. …

title: Beautiful Resort, Excellent Service!
review: From the moment we pulled in, to the moment we drove away 6 days later, amazing service and an overall wonderful experience!  The valet, front desk, room service, housekeeping, pool waitstaff, pool/beach towel staff were all friendly, attentive, quick and personable. This is the first time I can say that ALL interactions with a hotel and associated restaurants were 100% awesome.  The room, 602 (Jr. Suite) was exactly what we had hoped for. It's a gulf front room with direct views of the gulf and a semi-private patio (only had to see the patio to our right). The room had 2 flat screen tv's, a sofabed and two very comfortable queen beds. The bathroom had a sizable glass surround shower and even had a nice soaking tub with plantation shutters that opened up to the room.  The room…

title: Champagne on arrival
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. I am so happy that you had such a memorable stay and each Sandpearl Team member was personable, attentive and quick. We strive to deliver 5 diamond service to each of our guests. It sounds like you greatly enjoyed your Gulf Front Junior Suite; those rooms have the perfect spot to watch the beautiful sunsets! I hope the next time you visit Clearwater Beach that you choose the Sandpearl Resort.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Always exceeds expectations
review: The Sandpearl is an excellent hotel with first class service.  The pool and beach are simply great.  The rooms are finely decorated with quality and style.  Recommend the hotel's breakfast buffet where children eat free with paying adults.  Check out the details on age limitations and numbers, but it is worth it if kids are along for the ride.  Other dining choices include:  Frenchy's Rockaway Grill which is located in the next building a short walk away either on the street or on the beach and another is the Palm Pavilion Beachside Grill & Bar which is a short walk across the municipal/beach parking lot.  Both restaurants have inside and outside dining.

title: BEST HOTEL I HAVE STAYED IN!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am very happy that you and your family had a memorable stay here and that each member of our Sandpearl Team delivered the best service possible. We want each guest to feel right at home. I hope you and your family make another trip to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: They up charge for everything
review: The Sandpearl is a commensurate win each and every stay. From their excellent appointments, spotless rooms, and gracious staff it is always a pleasure to stay with them. The beach is pristine, the pool warm and perfection. We have stayed here three years in a row and the rooms look brand new each time. There is immense care in this hotel in all things: property, presentation, and personal service, and it shows.

title: Treat Hotwire clients GREAT
review: My Daughter Lakota and I spent the Thanksgiving weekend at the Sandpearl, which I booked on Hotwire.  Now, when I travel, I like to book on short notice and for a bargain, not a penalty.    Now some Hotels never let you feel like you booked via Hotwire, and some Hotels NEVER LET YOU FORGET.   The Sandpearl treated us like valued guests, (as opposed to the Loews Don Cesar in St. Pete Beach) which treated us like crap because we booked on Hotwire and they never let us forget it.  When we checked in, there was a mistake in our reservation.  They only had us for one room, which made my 23 yr old daughter think, - OH GOD.  I have to share a room with my Dad? (I was not thrilled either) . The Hotel quickly sorted out the mistake and gave us great rooms on the fifth floor with partial…

title: Nice holiday weekend stay
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay! I am so thrilled that you and your daughter had a wonderful time here with us. I am also very happy that each staff member you came into contact with was helpful and accommodating to your needs. We want every guest to feel right at home! I hope you and your family make another trip to the Sandpearl in the near future.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Favorite Florida beach hotel
review: Prior to our departure I had read reviews so I knew what to expect during our 4-night stay at the Sandpearl over Thanksgiving weekend. Our experience at the Sandpearl was average, no more or no less than expected.  Plenty of chairs on the beach but paid $25+tax per day because I didn't want to get burnt. I didn't expect so much distance between the property and the ocean. Didn't sit at the pool because the chairs are crammed in with mostly shade and a ton of kids screaming.  Didn't go to any of the restaurants for breakfast or dinner, they were way to expensive, lunch seemed reasonable.  Went to Palm Pavillion, Hooters, Brown Boxer and Clear Skye Cafe which were pretty good and half the price. Our room faced the street which was adequate for us. Spacious high ceiling with the…

title: Post Disney R&R
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I apologize that you were unhappy with some of amenities during your stay. We want each and every guest to feel comfortable and right at home. In your review you mentioned being disappointed about the charge for beach umbrellas. In past reviews we have addressed this issue as it is a point of contention for some guests. The reason for this charge is due to giving the resort an opportunity to manage the availability of the chairs better. In the past we did not charge for beach chairs and some guests would reserve chairs on both the beach and the pool. This left no availability for many guests. We found the best means to control this was to place a minimal charge on these umbrellas. We currently charge less than other local hotels or the public beach umbrellas. I hope this clears things up. As for the children at the pool, we are a family friendly resort and were voted the #2 family resort in the country. If you would like to discuss any other part of your stay please do not hesitate to contact the resort. Again thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Beautifully clean, excellent service.
review: This was our fifth consecutive year staying at the Sandpearl for a beach vacation.  The Sandpearl isn't perfect-- rooms sometimes show a bit of wear and tear (e.g., scuffed furniture edges) and service is good but still not at the level I'd expect for this class of hotel-- but it has one of the loveliest beaches around.  Sand is sugar-soft and clean.  Small dunes separate the hotel from the beach and this section of the beach tends to be less crowded than do the areas further south, especially on weekdays.  We visited this year in the fall and found that, unlike in summer, we did not have to rush down to the beach in the morning in order to claim chairs in the row closest to the water.  I'd encourage the Sandpearl to consider being less stingy with towels and to think about…

title: Great resort right on the beach
review: Stayed for just one night but would love to come back for longer. Free champagne on arrival which always helps....We had a wonderful view of the beach/pier from our balcony and a very well appointed room.Definitely worth a repeat visit.

title: Great Gulfside hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay and accommodations. I hope you decide to stay at the Sandpearl longer next time!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Anniversary Getaway at Our Happy Place
review: We were impressed last trip to Clearwater, so the Sandpearl was again first choice.  As ever, we were pleased with the welcome and the ever helpful staff, particularly as we had been upgraded!  Our suite was huge, with gulf and “bay” (inland waterway) views.  The bed too was huge, comfortable and made up with nice linen.  I won't bore you with all the facilities of our rooms, but it was all new and clean.  The pool area can be crowded, and the loungers a bit squashed in, but it is a great spot to sit and sun.  The Clearwater beach is huge, with soft white sugar sand, and plenty of loungers with umbrellas and cabanas.  Sandpearl manages to avoid being just another large Gulfside hotel with a combination of excellent, well trained staff, attention to detail, cleanliness and…

title: Clearwater Beach's Finest Resort
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review. I am glad you decided to stay with us on your trip to Clearwater! I am very happy that you enjoyed your bayside accommodations. At night, the views from those rooms are spectacular with all the city lights. Our staff members strive to make each guest feel right at home so I am glad they did just that. I hope you and your family make another return to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Mostly Great
review: This was our third stay at the Sandpearl. We were married there on the beach in 2013 and have come back each year to celebrate our anniversary. It’s our happy place, and we look forward to returning each year.  The Sandpearl gets better and better with each visit. I reserved in the summer of this year for our stay in November and requested the room we stayed in for our wedding weekend - a gulf front junior suite - and Sandpearl staff made it happen. After two years, we weren’t sure if there would be a lot of wear and tear in the room, but everything still remained nearly perfect. We even noticed a new sofa sleeper! Hey, when you’re married at a place, you remember the details. :) The only thing that was wrong was the towel bar above the tub fell apart when I was taking the towel…

title: Great hotel in a great location
review: This was the perfect fall getaway for us.  The resort had a nice pool and it was right on the beach.  Everyone was very courteous and helpful.  Drinks and amenities were expensive, but no worse than other similar resorts.  There is a pier 1/2 mile away, and many shops and restaurants within that 1/2 mile as well.

title: A classic hotel with a contemporary, hip feel.
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your fall getaway with us. I am very happy that you enjoyed your accommodations and the amenities that we have here at property. I hope you make another trip to Clearwater Beach to visit us soon!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Great Hotel, Great Location
review: This classic hotel is worth staying at. The beach front property features a fantastic pool and top notch service. The main restaurant is so popular that non-guests of the property are always making reservations.   I was thoroughly impressed with the service and accommodations. Sadly, the hotel room was booked solid and we must have been last to the party as our room view featured the roof top and adjacent parking lot. They would not switch our room throughout our stay.   The shop by the main lobby is a dapper gents dream. The shirts are all designer labels and quite extravagant. I purchased an electric white gem which has become the #1 wear in my dress clothes rotation.

title: They made us feel like royalty
review: Dear Guest,    Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay. I am thrilled you had a memorable stay and were able to utilize all amenities we have to offer. Our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf, is top rated so I am happy you enjoyed your dinner there. Again, thank you for your review and we hope you stay with us again next time you are in Clearwater Beach!    Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Luxury Resort on Clearwater Beach
review: In my opinion, the Sandpearl is the nicest hotel from Clearwater down to St Pete Beach. But it is also the most expensive once you add in resort fees and taxes. It is family friendly, the amenities such as pool, restaurants, activities, fire pits, beach chairs etc are great.  Definitely a “resort” feel.  The beach is amazing and the location is great close to restaurants, shops etc. If you want more of a “luxury” feel I definitely recommend it. If you want to go “economy” there are other options that aren’t quite as nice but still get you right on the beach.

title: Really nice place and we liked it
review: We have stayed in numerous 4 starts hotels, and this is one of the few that we really like. Every part of the hotel building/ground is well designed, updated and clean. Our room is spacious and has very high ceiling, which I really liked. The location is right at the heart of Clearwater beach and closed to many restaurant, which is very convenient.   The only complaint I had was that we ran out of tissue papers just few hours after checked in. Apparently cleaning staff did not leave a full box of tissue papers in the bathroom, and she did not leave a spare one either. I didn't want someone to send a new box because It was 10 PM and that person could wake up my kids. Let's just say It wasn't a good feeling when I really need tissue papers and there was none, which begs the…

title: Nice Resort, Spa was not the best experience
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl. I am thrilled that you thoroughly enjoyed your vacation with us. As for the tissues, I sincerely apologize that there was not an extra box in your room. In the future, please feel free to dial 0 and request more tissues or anything that you are in need of. There is a houseman here all night to deliver anything that a guest requests. Next time you are in Clearwater Beach, we hope you choose the Sandpearl again!  Kind Regards,  Jenna

title: Nice Location
review: We recently went to Sand Pearl and booked the champagne and berries package and was upgraded to a coastal view, which was lovely. The lady who gave Champagne in the lobby was very nice, I believe her name was Deborah. I chose to get sparkling apple cider.   The room was nice, and our view looked like a post card but the balcony door controls the a/c unit and we did not close properly and had to have engineer explain to us how to restart the air when it is in balcony mode. I did call for extra water and the gentleman who sent it was not that friendly that evening.   The restaurant for breakfast was great and our waiter Robert was wonderful as well as the manager that morning. I can't recall her name, but she was middle aged Caucasian woman. It was lovely to eat a nice…

title: Beautiful seeting on the Gulf of Mexico
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Sandpearl. I am thrilled that you had a pleasurable check-in experience and that you enjoyed the amenities that this property has to offer. I apologize about the miscommunication regarding the spa appointment but I am confident that Maureen will take great care of you when you make your return. Again, thank you for your review and I hope you and your family make another trip to Clearwater Beach.  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Fancy, yet welcoming.
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl Resort this past weekend in celebration of my husband's 50th birthday.  The resort is beautiful and you couldn't ask for a better view.  We saw the dolphins swimming in the gulf each morning!  We experienced a few hiccups during our stay which is why my overall rating is only a 3.  We arrived hungry on Friday night, checked in in the hopes to drop off everything in the room and make it in time for a casual dinner by the beach.  We got to our room and the key did not work.  I left my husband standing by the door, went to the desk and got new keys which did not work either.  My husband then went down and requested a new room with keys that worked.  We happened to meet the bellman on the way to the new room where our keys did not work but he was able to…

title: " Beautiful Place for a Wedding Ceremony"
review: I stayed at the hotel for three nights. My niece was married at the hotel on the Gulf Lawn facing the beach. The weather was great and everything was set up perfectly. In addition, my wife and myself were very impressed with kindness of all the staff during our stay. My wife is handicapped and uses a wheel chair. The activity staff provided my wife with a beach wheel chair to use on the beach. We wished that we could of stayed a few more days and will come back again.

title: Nice location and reasonable.
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. I am so happy that you and your family enjoyed the accommodations that you were provided. Also, I am thrilled that each staff member went out of their way to make sure each of your family members was comfortable. We want each guest to feel right at home. I hope you make a return trip to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna K

title: Our Second Home
review: Nice location and reasonable.  As a four star hotel this is in a good beach location and perfectly acceptable. Rooms and service are good.Not overpriced and I felt the staff were actually trying to provide a service rather than the plastic service in so many places. As normal with my reports….the negatives…. The lower rooms on the northern side (AKA Partial sea view) are to be avoided unless you like a view of the rubbish area and sound of service fans. They really should screen or smarten this area.

title: Nice. Attentive. Comfy. Good shoe shine.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you reviewing your recent stay at the Sandpearl.
