I am glad that you enjoyed the beach location and that each staff member made sure you and your families were taken care of. We want each and every guest feel right at home. We hope you make another trip to Clearwater Beach!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Outstanding views and rooms
review: First Class hotel from the moment you pull up front. You are greeted by professionals from parking, to check in and getting into your room. Service is 5 star at any point in the Sands Pearl. A must have experience.

title: Beautiful Hotel / Spa Resort
review: I was at the hotel for a conference.  The service is exceptional - from the front desk staff to housekeeping.  I had all of my meals at the hotel and the food, even for our large group, was above average. My king room was a nice size the bathroom was bigger than most with exceptional products. I had a spa treatment (The Firm) and was very sorry I didn't have time to schedule a massage.  I would definitely consider coming back to this hotel for vacation in the future.

title: Great hotel in a great location - very good.
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing you recent conference stay with us.  I am glad the vacation was work with some play time as well! I am thrilled you enjoyed all outlets on property and that all staff members were helpful. We hope you plan a vacation with us in the new future!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Perfect for Wedding
review: The Sandpearl resort in Clearwater is an excellent hotel.   The staff are all very friendly, polite and engaging. The hotel is right on the beach so you if you book a gulf view you really are looking at uninterrupted views of the sand and sea, it's beautiful.   The sun loungers around the pool are a little too tightly packed and most are positioned so that you struggle to get a full days sun. In fact the sun doesn't hit the first sun loungers until 10.30 and not all of the pool area until around 11. (at least in October the sun will be higher at other times of the year). But the pool itself is very nice.  But really that doesn't matter as the beach is only a few steps away and that's in full sun.   You can go for a walk across the super fine soft sand, walk off breakfast and…

title: Great Family Getaway
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so happy that you had a memorable time with us. We indeed have the perfect location where we can enjoy the white sand beaches as well as multiple attractions in the nearby area. I am very glad to hear the staff members that you came into contact with were helpful to you and your family. We want to make sure each guest is taken care of! It sounds like you were able to enjoy all amenities that we have to offer on property. Again, I thank you for the review and I hope you and your family make  another visit to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Great family resort
review: Stayed at this resort for 2 nights.   This weekend affair included a Friday night bonfire, sunset beach ceremony on Saturday, and a Sunday brunch.   The hotel and rooms were nice, but not luxurious, especially for the price.  However, the wedding coordination/facilities and food were wonderful and recommended.

title: This place is heaven on earth!
review: My husband & I were fortunate enough to get to stay at The Sandpearl for a vacation after his last deployment.  The beach was just perfect!  The staff was very helpful and kind.  When I think of vacation spots to consider...this is always at the top of my list!  I hope to go back one day with my children.

title: Superb luxury hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for reviewing your stay. I am thrilled that you and your husband had a wonderful vacation and that all staff was helpful. We want each and every guest to feel right at home! I hope you will make a return to the Sandpearl with the rest of your family!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Anniversary  Beach Getaway
review: Sandpearl 5  Stayed at the Sandpearl for 4 nights and what a great 4 nights we had.   Arrived slightly early for check in around 1430 to the front of the hotel. All our bags taken care off, car also (only valet) and given champagne as part of their welcome. Staff immediately so friendly, opening doors and showing us about. A short wait and room was ready on the 4th floor over looking pool and the beach.   The room I just loved from the start, it's a good size with everything you need including fridge. Bathroom luxurious also. Real impression of luxury throughout the hotel.   The Pool area is great and never had a problem, the loungers are so comfy and padded which made lazying around even better. Used the pool service a lot, average price from what I've seen on this road trip…

title: Nanny assignment at Sandpearl Resort
review: Dear Guest.   Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay. I am so happy that you had a wonderful time with us and enjoyed all the amenities we have on property. The Gulf Front room that you had was the perfect spot to watch the incredible sunsets! Again, thank you for your review and I hope you visit again in the near future.   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Very good hotel right on the beach.
review: We really enjoyed our early anniversary staycation weekend at the Sandpearl.  Arrived early, figured we would hang by the pool while we waited for our room.  We were enjoying complementary mimosas in the lobby when we received a call from front desk letting us know that our room was ready.  Headed up and we were very pleased with the gulf front king suite.  View was perfect.  We enjoyed all of amenities at the resort.  Pool wait staff were very attentive. All of the staff were very helpful.  We dined at Caretta and had a great meal.  Our server, Christine, was terrific.    Great time...one of our favorite resorts in Pinellas county.  Better than a few further on the south end of the county that I'll not bother mentioning by name.

title: Beautiful place, friendly staff
review: I recommend this place to anyone. It's a great place to stay. Not the cheapest option but well worth the cost. Clean and modern, staff is very friendly and helpful, the pool is great, sunset is amazing from this place in your ocean view room or on the beach. I loved my stay here and will return soon.

title: Very much 'bling-bling' where true marketing of the hotel's values is totally missing
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing you recent stay at the Sandpearl. I am thrilled you had a memorable time here and that you were able to enjoy the breathtaking sunsets we are so lucky to see! We hope you make a return visit soon!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Good Hotel, superb service, extra costs everywhere
review: Style like an old Grand Hotel. Valet parking - piano music (played by a robot) - many staff buzzing around. Old and heavy furniture - little signs of modern architecture and comfy zones. The processes within the hotel were little harmonized nor marketed to their best. Examples: only two free services during the entire stay: complimentary internet (very slow) and a glass of champagne upon arrival...that glass served by the receptionist who need to organize glasses/drinks and leave other waiting guests standing in the line for long !  Why not giving a voucher for the bar straight?

title: Nice on the Surface
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort on Clearwater Beach.  I was happy to see that you were impressed with the resort and the grounds.    In your review you commented on the internet as well as the champagne upon arrival.  We did have a period of time when our internet was very weak and unacceptable.  We have recently upgraded our internet and the bandwidth is much improved.  Additionally, the champagne upon arrival is normally handled by our Lobby Ambassador however if she is not there the Front Desk Agents to handle this task.  I will share you feedback with the Front Office Manager.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  I appreciate it.   Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Relaxing Anniversary Mini Vacation
review: The Hotel itself is very nice, Rooms are spacious, bathroom as well. Staff is very friendly and the service is great. The agency booked a wrong room but the hotelstaff did a great effort to help. Beach is great Not so nice are the expensive costs extra. Valetparking, Tikibar, servicecharge. Turndown service out of 4nights, one night done. Towels changed everytime allthough we didn't put it on the floor, a nice gesture but not very enviromental. Waterfall is very loud.

title: love this resort
review: The Sandpearl is an amazing resort. There is so much to do if you want to. I went with friends to enjoy the beach and pool. It is a beautiful property. We bought s'mores kits and made s'mores at the fire pit. There are hammocks between the pool and the beach. It is located within walking distance to bars, restaurants and stores. Once you park you don't need your vehicle till you leave. It is a very relaxing resort for adults. There were also a lot of families around. It is a busy resort.

title: A corner of paradise
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am happy you were able to enjoy all the amenities we have on property such as the fire pits, hammocks, and pool and beach area. We indeed have the perfect location on Clearwater Beach being situated so closely to multiple outlets. We hope you visit the Sandpearl again soon!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Surprise How Amazing This Hotel Is
review: We had a wonderful vacation at the sandpearl ,this is a pearl of an hotel.The hotel is situated near to the centre of Clearwater and is easy to find. The room was well equipped and well maintained . We enjoyed the pool area which leads directly to the beach . The staff where very helpful and efficient .Food and drinks are served from grille near to the pool and are served  in a very relaxed atmosphere.

title: Best holiday ever
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for staying with us at the Sandpearl! I am thrilled you had a wonderful vacation and enjoyed the beautiful property we have here in Clearwater Beach. I am also happy to hear that each staff member you can into contact with was helpful; we want all guest to feel comfortable and right at home!  I hope you make another return to this “Corner of Paradise”!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Wonderful Relaxing Hotel!
review: I am pretty rational and logical about expectations in a hotel.  I consider things like time of year, whether conventions are taking place, the tier/category you are staying at, the quality of the peers in the immediate locale, and do not get overly emotional in my reviews.  So, with that as a backdrop...  I have stayed at the Vinoy on the other side of this part of the St. Pete peninsula.  I have been very happy without our stays at the Vinoy, and was hesitant to book anywhere else in that area.  However, we really needed to be more on the beach side of the area for what we needed to do, so I booked the Don Cesar at first, as it was the "nicest" hotel around when you ask the general populous.  Making a long story short, the Don Cesar was very booked and couldn't accommodate the…

title: Lovely hotel
review: stayed here 1 night while driving around florida, we originally booked another hotel but moved as soon as we realised it was a dump and what a great move it was the sandpearl met all our expectations and more. We drove up and the valet took our car and parked it yes its $25 a day but parking is scarse in clearwater. Went to reception to receive a nice warm welcome checking in was quick and easy. Room was clean and very nice we were on the 8th floor with a few of the beach. We went out for an evening meal to a place we new only to find it was closed for refurbishment, so we returned to hotel to ask the valet if he knew any where we could eat of site that was simlar he pointed us in the direction of the sister restaurant, very helpfull. We had a lovely sleep bed was very…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review you stay with us. I am glad that you enjoyed your room and that all staff members were helpful and efficient with whatever you needed. We want our guests to feel right at home! We hope you plan another trip to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Top Notch!
review: Stayed for 3 nights on a tour of Florida and this was by far the nicest place we stayed. Beautiful hotel, pool, rooms, everything. On check in the reception guy upgraded us to a larger room for free in which we had a balcony, 2 double beds and a sofa seating area.  The pool we found to be great, with waiter service and very reasonable prices and good food.  Good location on the beach, check out the brown boxer pub across the road, does a great and very cheap breakfast and is also great for drinks at night.  Best positive of all is the lovely woman who serves you with a complimentary glass of champagne a day on your way in! Real class yet not at all pretentious!

title: Great location, nice pool, fantastic beach
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your 3 night stay with us! I am so happy you were able to visit Clearwater Beach and your enjoyed your accommodations here. As for the woman who serves the champagne upon check-in, her name is Debbie and she is a wonderful asset to this resort. Again, thank you for your review and we hope you make another trip over to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,  Jenna

title: Family get away
review: Upon arrival we were greeted very well. Check in was fast. We received comp glass of champagne which was a nice touch.  The property is well maintained.  The pool is beautiful.  The room we had overlooked a roof and a partial view of the bay. We spent 2 nights as we were attending a wedding. After our first night we did not vacate the room early enough in the morning so our room was not made up. We brought a small amount of sand into the room and this was never vacuumed. We only had 1 roll of toilet paper and after that emptied we had to use tissue paper.   They had no extras in the room. As far as the wedding it was excellent. The facilities and food were great!  Nothing really bad except for the few minor things. I really disagree with the whole concept of a "Resort Fee". The…

title: Spectacular!
review: I have been to this property in particular about 10 times over the last 5 years and this was the best visit yet. Check in was a little bumpy but the rest of the trip definitely made up for it!   Check in:  The worst part of our trip was our check in experience. When we arrived our luggage was taken and tagged while we waited for our room. We arrived at the resort at approximately 12 noon. The front desk said they would call when the room was ready. Several times in the past they called our house phone, over 1,000 miles away in New York. Knowing this we made sure they had our cell phone numbers on file. 4:30 pm rolls around (Check in is at 4pm) and still no phone call. At that point I called the front desk to see if the room was ready. They said at 2pm they called and left a…

title: Great
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am sorry to hear that your check-in experience was not what you were expecting. Our front desk agents are usually very attentive to the guest so I apologize that they did not use the correct phone number after you had specifically reiterated. As for the remainder of your stay, I am thrilled to hear that all staff members were helpful and attentive. I agree, it definitely makes or breaks a vacation if the staff members are not pleasant. We look forward to your return to Clearwater Beach!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Pampered!
review: We went to Sandpearl in Mid July for a much needed vacation.It was perfect. The poolside restaurant-Tates-has great food and drinks. The service on the beach was great also. I will be going back next year for sure

title: Unbelievable service
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your vacation at the Sandpearl! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your dining experience at Tate Island Grille and that the staff was helpful. We look forward to having you back!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Great end to our holiday!
review: Paradise for Capt. Jack Sparrow was the Black Pearl.  For us, it was Sandpearl Resort. Not sure what more one could ask for, beautiful beaches, exemplary service, spectacular views, full spa services.  If there is a complaint, it is about food consistency and quality. One would expert better, hence four stars instead of five.

title: Loved every minute.
review: A stunning Hotel. Came thou the doors and was amazed by everything I saw. A huge lobby, pool and restaurants. The room was clean and well presented with a balcony that overlooked both the city and the beach and sea. The staff where very friendly and helpful. Booked a taxi to the airport and had to change the time and place of the taxi a few hours before pick up and they where more than happy to sort this for me at no extra charge. Would recommend this hotel to all a true 4 star hotel. Plus not to forget the amazing work and partnership they have with the Clearwater Marine Aquarium.

title: Wedding Anniversary!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for reviewing your vacation at the Sandpearl Resort. I am very happy to hear that you had an amazing time with us and the staff members were helpful to any requests you had. And you are correct, we do have a partnership with the Clearwater Marine Aquarium. They have an amazing rehabilitation center that helps so many animals and is truly a gem in the community. Again, thank you for your review and please come back to visit us in Clearwater!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Couldn't have had a better experience!
review: We got married at the Sandpearl last May and decided to come back and stay here for our anniversary. From the moment we walked into the hotel two years ago we knew we wanted to marry here and we wouldn't have wanted it anywhere else. Right on the beach, walking distance to restaurants, bars and shops.   We had an amazing wedding last year and  we knew we had to book to stay here for longer than just one night. On check in we were allocated a room that overlooked palm pavilion restaurant which is a little walk from the hotel. We were side on so got a view of the beach. Our room was large, king size bed, large bathroom, balcony with chairs and a table. It was what we expected and more. There is a twice a day housekeeping service. Some evenings we were getting ready and didn't…

title: Excellent Stay!!!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for returning to the Sandpearl for your first wedding anniversary! We are so happy to have you back and that all aspects of your stay were special and memorable. I am glad that you enjoyed your room accommodations as well. Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to your return in 2017!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Loved it!
review: Absolutely fantastic experience. The room was beautiful. The staff were extremely friendly and helped us out with everything we needed. I really couldn't fault this hotel whatsoever and highly recommend it to anyone. The hotel and pool were brilliant and right by the sea which was lovely.

title: Great location, good pool and beach
review: Had a lovely room looking towards the south, floor 6 I think, good size bathroom with 2 double beds.  Beautiful lobby area.  Great pool for young children as zero entry and slowly gets deeper.  Little crowed with sun loungers around the pool with loungers so preferred staying on the beach.  Really great for families. A bit busy at weekends so had to wear wrist bands, don't expect this at a premium hotel.

title: Beautiful spot for R&R
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. I am so happy you and your family enjoyed the pool and beach area as well as your room. I hope you choose the Sandpearl when you return to Clearwater Beach!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Pretty  hotel!
review: The Sandpearl is fantastic.  It's gorgeous and clean; the food is wonderful; the staff are very well-trained and treat customers like a priority (as all hotels should, but sadly not all do...); the fire pits are a great place to relax at the end of the evening; the views from the rooms are outstanding if you spring for a gulf front room (bay view is not so great, but you get what you pay for).  You really don't need to leave the resort at all if you don't want to. There are a couple minor things I would change, but none worth noting. We're going back for Thanksgiving and can't wait.

title: Lovely stay and so nearly a 5.
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review! We appreciate the kind words and are so happy each moment of your vacation was enjoyable and wonderful. I am glad you were able to enjoy everything we have on property. We look forward to your return during the Thanksgiving holiday!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: beautiful hotel
review: This is quite a nice 4 star hotel. The pool area and beach were very well kept, and the beach is powder white sand. Breakfast buffet was nice, but lunch was a bit slow with us being the only table there. Rooms were kept very clean, and staff was extremely friendly. Thanks for an enjoyable  stay!

title: Top-Notch Experience on Clearwater Beach!
review: The Sandpearl is a beautiful and modern hotel with top-notch service, a fabulous beach location, and an A+ restaurant.  For those interested, the hotel is right in the middle of the Clearwater beach action - the boardwalk is a very short walk up the beach.  If you walk the other direction down the beach, though, it quickly becomes quiet and peaceful....for those not so interested in the beach action.    If you want a fabulous meal - the hotel restaurant is top-notch.  There is indoor or outdoor seating with unobstructed views of the pool and ocean.  There are also great options for local beach fare - like Frenchy's and Palm Pavilion - within a short walk, if you're looking for the very casual beach experience.     We found the entire hotel team to be very professional and eager…

title: Lovely place, in absolutely stunning beach front location.
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your Labor Day Weekend vacation with us. I am thrilled that you had an enjoyable holiday weekend and you enjoyed the property. We indeed have the perfect spot on Clearwater Beach being located so central to all the vendors and attractions. Again, thank you for your review and please come back and visit the Sandpearl for your next vacation.   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Excellent!
review: From the moment we spotted this place we knew we had to book it. Spent 5 nights here late August 2015 and overall we found it to be a very positive experience. Everyone is friendly and helpful, bubbles on arrival is nice, the place is very clean and food we had from the beach/pool bar was lovely. The pool is excellent and pool bar service is brilliant. We booked a gulf view and that's what we got. The beds were comfy and the room spacious and well maintained.  What I was alittle annoyed about is the resort fee 25USD + tax, which you have to pay on top of an already relatively high nightly rate. Now I knew about it before hand, but the fee, is supposed to cover newspapers, the sunbeds on the beach, WiFi and half a dozen other things we couldn't use. And if all the services…

title: Fantastic Weekend
review: Dear Guest,    Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at the Sandpearl. I am so happy you enjoyed your accommodations and each member of the staff was helpful. Your gulf view room was the perfect spot to watch the sunsets! As for the Wi-Fi network, I apologize you were unable to connect to our network. We are in the process of upgrading of network to be able to withhold the larger amount of guests we have. In addition, there are Ethernet cords in the desk drawers and we also have a 24 hour business center on the lobby level to use at your convenience. I am glad you had an enjoyable vacation and we hope to see you and your family return!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Funtastick fabulous dining adventure
review: Had a great time here.  Will be back.  The food at the property restaurant is five star!  The view of the sun setting while you dine, can't be beat!  The beach is clean and expansive.  Service from employees and the genuine friendliness is a welcome surprise!

title: Expensive Hotel in Clearwater.  Missing the wow factor
review: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights in August.  There is no self parking option and valet parking is $20 per night.  The valets are really quick and helpful - they walked my daughter to the car one evening when she accidentally left her phone in the car.    Check in was friendly and efficient - we were offered champagne on check in.  Other people seem to love this, but I thought it was odd.  I've just checked in, I have lots of luggage, two teenagers in tow, all my booking documents, passports etc and you want to give me a glass of champagne??  What am I suppose to do with all my things, just pop them down on the floor in the lobby while I sip champagne?   All I want to do is see my room and unpack!   A better idea would be to offer a welcome evening each evening for new…

title: Overall would recommend
review: My family had two conjoining rooms and saw some of the same concerns others have mentioned with house keeping. Beds were not always made, towels weren't replaced, coffee cups weren't replaced, soaps weren't replaced, etc. When we would call for these items they were promptly delivered to our rooms. We were on the south side of the hotel on the 4th floor. We could hear music at night from the clear sky cafe next door.   The pool was full of kids with flotation devices which the hotel provided at the activities desk. They had noodles, boogey boards, sand shovels, buckets, etc. that was great for our kids. The beach was beautifully kept and not extremely busy as we saw on the public areas.  The staff at Tate's grill were fantastic. My niece has a peanut allergy and all the staff…

title: Beautiful hotel..... good for families with small children
review: Dear Guest,  	 Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I apologize that your room was not cleaned all the days you were here. The housekeeping staff is usually very prompt and thorough with that. As for the rest of your stay, I am happy that the staff was accommodating to your child’s food allergy and enjoyed the pool and beach area. I hope you and your family come back to visit the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Best property in Clearwater Beach, hands down!
review: The hotel was beautiful, definitely a 5 star!!  We were served mimosas when we arrived to check in.  The lobby and pool area were both gorgeous and rooms were spacious and tastefully decorated.  We had a gulf front room with a balcony, which was wonderful!  The only downfall was that this hotel caters to families so there were a lot of small children.  I didn't expect so many kids since we weren't at Disney or Universal.  I have a teenager but she didn't want to swim with all of the little kids in the pool.  However, if you like the beach, the beach is clean, the sand if white and soft and fluffy.  The water in the Gulf was warm and full of fish.  It was a tropical paradise!

title: Spectacular In Every Respect!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl for your family’s vacation! I am so happy that you enjoyed your Gulf Front accommodations; you had the perfect spot to watch all the incredible sunsets we have here! Thank you for reviewing your stay and I hope the next time your family are in Clearwater you choose the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Dirty, Dusty, Rude
review: I travel with my family more than most. We usually stay at Marriott because we can count of them being clean. The Sand Pearl was a dusty dirty mess. When I asked for a new room that wouldn't help me and were insulted when I pointed it out. No manager to talk to? the restaurant was overpriced and my wife found a hair in her salad. We left after first night. Don't believe the pictures of their web-site. Horrible experience.

title: 'Sweeter' second time around.
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I apologize for the issues you experienced with dust and dirt in your room.  We normally receive praise for the cleanliness and condition of our guestrooms, as you can see from other reviews, but this time we disappointed.  For that I am very sorry.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your experience please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Very Nice Stay
review: Visited for 8 nights mid August after falling in love with this place last summer!  I think I literally counted down the days until I walked back through the lobby this year! Even before our stay, I had been in contact several times to query a few things and found thes service impeccable, nothing was to much trouble for Eric Waltz when I had to amend the booking a few times!  We checked in easily and were told we would need to wait an hour for our room, we were early, so no problem, but then very unexpectedly we were offered a 'Junior suite'- wow! What a lovely gesture and what a room it turned out to be! It really put the 'icing on the cake' and made our stay so special....  The room had totally uninterrupted views of the beach and gulf, a breathtaking view. Last year we stayed…

title: Luxury resort, stunning location.
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind words about your recent stay at the Sandpearl! I am glad to hear that you returned this year and had such a memorable experience. I am happy that you liked the Gulf Front accommodations; you had the perfect spot to watch the breathtaking sunsets we are so lucky to have here! Also I am so glad that each staff member was helpful and made sure that all of your needs were taken care of. Again, that you for taking the time to review your stay and we look forward to seeing you back at the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Total rest after two weeks in Disney
review: The staff was excellent, refreshing and the front desk manager was helpful and accommodating. The location was perfect, close to the beach and within walking distance of a number of restaurants. Spectacular sunsets! Overall the hotel is pretty clean. Our room was O.K., clean with a nice view of the pool setting and the ocean.The balconies are nice, but close together. (And, you might want to ask for a room on a higher floor, the pool area can get a little noisy) The drinks at Tates were a little pricey and somewhat watered-down. You can buy wine and beer just across the street from the resort driveway.  The food at Tate's was O.K.

title: Not impressed
review: I stayed here with 3 family members prepaid for 4 days. Initial impression was how rude the reception staff were on check in . The room booked was so depressing I had to upgrade even though this was not the lowest grade . First evening I went to sit on a stall in reception when it tipped up and I hit my ankle on a cast iron table. I was in a lot of pain and had to ice my foot for a while . The night manager came out to ask me to sign a accident firm which I did. I pointed out how dangerous this was and a child could have been seriously injured.  Needless to say I could not play tennis or walk too far for the rest of the trip and still painful over a week later.  I asked to speak to the hotel manager when I saw the stall still in reception and Ted told me he was the hotel manager…

title: Great Clearwater Beach Hotel!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of your time at the Sandpearl.  I am very sorry that you injured yourself while sitting in our lobby.  I hope that your leg and foot are better now.  The person whom you speak of, Ted, is the PM Resort Manager.  I will follow up with him regarding your comments.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please don't hesitate to reach out to me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel, superb views, right on Clearwater Beach
review: The location of the hotel is prime, it has a beautiful view. Staff is very friendly, cleanliness is superb. Great value. The pool is beautiful and clean, the beach is seconds away from the pool and the water was so nice and warm. Spa was clean and friendly staff, great experience. I love this resort and will definitely be back. The Caretta restaurant is where I would recommend going, they have excellent food. There is a $19/pp buffet for breakfast, absolutely delicious. Tate's food isn't as great, its more of the lower cost bar type of food.

title: One of the best Florida Gulf Coast resorts
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Sandpearl. I am very happy that you enjoyed all amenities that we have on property and that each member of staff were helpful and friendly. Please return soon to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Fantastic hotel right on the beach
review: We live in the area and usually just go to the beach for the day.  We decided to stay for a couple nights to celebrate our birthdays and we chose the Sandpearl.  What a fabulous  place!  We originally booked a King room on the Gulf, and when we arrived were upgraded to a suite, with full kitchen, two balconies, washer/dryer.  We had a great dinner at the restaurant, but had to ask for a nice table by the window, even though it wasn't busy, we had a reservation and had told them in advance we were celebrating.  They quickly gave us a better table and we saw the sunset from our table.    Rooms are nice, but beware the balconies are right next to each other, good thing we went after the schools were back in session, so there weren't people right next to us, it would have been…

title: Recovery at the sandpearl
review: Although we had dined at the Sand Pearl prior, this was our first stay at the resort for a period of almost 2 weeks. My mother had heart surgery and we were recovering at the Sandpearl until she was strong enough to make the journey home. Clean, stately, excellent customer service from top to bottom. From the Valet crew, to a Champagne greeting which we all needed - the service was 5 star. Utmost, the housekeeping staff made every effort to make us comfortable - I wish I could name them all. Large, Comfortable Contemporary  touches - clean big bathrooms, large fridge,enough coffee and tea on the keurig to make us all happy. Beautiful balcony overlooking the pool and ocean was priceless. The dining room and "kathy" our daily waitress, made us feel right at home, well attended to…

title: Perfect Location!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your taking the time to review your stay with us. I am very happy that you and your mother were comfortable during your two week stay and during the recovery as well. We want each and every guest to feel comfortable during their stay and I am thrilled that each staff member ensured that you and your mother had a relaxing visit. Again, thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your return for the follow-up!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Amazing hotel - on par with Secrets The Vine - Mexico
review: The Sandpearl resort was fantastic!  Stayed here two days in Aug, which is tricky with the rain season, but lucky us..all sunshine!  Upon check in, which took maybe 5 minutes with a welcome mimosa, the view through the lobby is excellent. .straight shot to the Gulf.  The grounds are very nice, the rooms are a very nice size, especially just for the two of us. Bathroom size was nice as well. Our room was king size, Gulf front with balcony... it was just right.  Slight down point..room walls are thin, so you may experience some neighborly noise..but all in all, not too bad.  Steve who handles the umbrella and chairs situation on the beach was solid making sure all wad well with our setup. Tates grill comes by about every 20min or so to check if you need any refreshments and Kyle…

title: Beach chair bar/food service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review for review of your stay here in August. I am very happy to hear that your gulf front room accommodated your needs; you had the perfect spot to watch the incredible sunsets! It sounds like you had a wonderful time with us and we look forward to your return in the near future!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Fantastic stay!
review: We just stayed for a very short trip - Monday morning - Wednesday early afternoon. But we will be back!  Immediately when you walk in you can tell it's going to be a great visit. The check-in was smooth. Check in isn't until 4, but since we arrived early (11), we were promised a call when our room was ready. We were treated to a delicious mimosa and were directed to a place to change before our dip in the pool. ***TIP They don't have lockers or a dedicated place, just a unisex bathroom, but it fits the bill. If you have a lot to change into, it's best to be prepared with a pool/beach bag, either as a carry on, or checked so you can access your clothes easily. ******  We walked down to the pool area and scouted some lovely chairs right by the entrance to the pool. We were offered…

title: Family Vacation - Doesn't Get Much Better....
review: We had 9 of stay at the hotel along with another family of 14. We have stayed at numerous high end hotels, and the Sandpearl was right up there with the best of them.  Best elements.......  * Location - right on a beautiful beautiful slice of Clearwater Beach -it's a quite part of           the beach with soft white sand and easy waves * Property Quality - the hotel itself is in great shape with a luxury lobby, nice       furnishings,   a baby grand and consistently clean * Rooms - nice size, cleaned 2x a day with modern furnishings, a coffee maker, water bottles etc... Pool - lagoon style pool shaped like a butterfly allowing for 2x the chairs you would fit on a standard rectangle. Pool was cleaned daily with great lunch/drink service. We never had to wait for then a few…

title: BEAUTIFUL!!
review: Ok - we stayed here 4 days during the rainy part of July. It didn't matter - it's so beautiful & great food everywhere we ate!! I read all the reviews & DO NOT LISTEN to the ppl giving this place anything less than 5 stars. They are not ppl I want to know. There is nothing bad you could say about this place. It's beyond nice! So elegant & clean. It's such a beautiful resort - rooms were great! Def worth the extra $$ for a gulf view IMO. ALSO it's the only place on the beach where the chairs are free for resort guests.

title: stressful and would not recommend to anyone...
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your kind words about your stay with us at the Sandpearl. I am so happy that you were able to enjoy your time here and did not let the weather rain on your parade! I am glad you enjoyed every outlet we had here on property and I hope you return soon!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Declined within one year
review: My room first of all was so tiny for 3 people. we had only two beds, so we upgraded for $30 extra a night just so i would have a bed. I had to do some work on my laptop, and it being a macbook air (a good laptop) i would have thought the full bars of wifi at the hotel would work. Oh how i was wrong! The wifi took around two minuets to load a single page, was constantly buffering videos on youtube, netflix ect...  every 20 seconds for 3 minuets in 240p (which is terrible, so much so that you cannot even see the screen because of the blurriness...) I tried using it on my phone, it worked a bit better but still was terrible. I tried to install an app on my phone, and it took an hour for it to even start loading it. I am disappointed as that has ruined my holiday as i needed to hand…

title: The Best of Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.   I am very sorry for the internet issues you experienced.  I know how frustrating it is when you have work to do and the internet service is not up to standard.  We are in the process of totally upgrading our wireless internet throughout the property and when complete, the service will be excellent.  I am sorry it was below standards during your visit however.  Again, thank you for the review.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: The Sandpearl Is Awesome
review: We stayed here for 3 nights after leaving Orlando for a few days with my family.  We were renewing our vows on Honeymoon Island and this resort appeared to be one of the best in Clearwater.  When we walked in, the ambience was amazing!  The rooms are very spacious and they were so accomodating.  For our 2nd honeymoon, we received champagne, fruit, acknowledgements and lots of flexibility.    The next time I go to Clearwater, I will stay again.

title: Sandpearl is the jewel of the West...
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you were given great service upon check-in and that you enjoyed the accommodations as well. While being situated directly on the white sand beaches and being walking distance from restaurants and attractions, we are indeed lucky to have the perfect location! Again, I thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your return to Clearwater Beach!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Incredible property - amazing beach....amazing food!  It is my home away from home - the place I go to breathe....it's wonderful.  Everyone should spend at least one night of the life at the Sandpearl.  It rocks....truly.

title: Expensive, But Great Hotel!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind words about the Sandpearl; they are truly appreciated! I am thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay. We want each guest to feel comfortable and right at home! I hope you will stay with us again in the future!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Fantastic Resort
review: Truly a wonderful experience, lovely rooms, fabulous staff, and I have high expectations! We came from a bad experience at a hotel down the road and everyone went out of their way to find us last minute accommodations and make us feel welcome. Truly fabulous!

title: Great hotel with wonderful service
review: The staff is friendly.  The rooms are beautiful and clean.  The pool is a good size, but it would be nice to have a section for adults only.  There a lot of footballs and balls being thrown around, which caused us to guard our drinks and not be able to relax.  The beach is very wide.  The drinks poolside are not the usual watered down resort drinks.  They are very good.

title: brilliant hotel
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl Resort for your beach vacation! I am very glad you enjoyed the poolside service and drinks. As for the pool, I apologize that you were not able to relax due to footballs being thrown. I will pass along this information to the security department so that there is a better handle on the activity going down by the pool. Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to your return!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Incredible luxurious hotel
review: this is a lovely hotel right on the beach with a fab pool. The service is brilliant, very friendly and helpful, nothing is to much trouble. The beach is great you could sit on it all day watching for dolphins. The pool movie night each night for kids is a brill idea, they can bob about in the pool watching a movie and you can grab a beer. The food at the Tate Grill is nice and not over priced. we didn't eat at the other restaurants in the hotel so I cant comment about them. There are plenty of restaurants around Clearwater. One we visited several times is at the end of the harbour behind a fishing shop (you go through the fishing shop to get to it). t you want a night chillin looking at the water eating good food and drinking good beer I would say try here (sorry i cant remember…

title: Excellent hotel and service!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review on the Sandpearl Resort. I am very happy that you were delivered fabulous service and all employees were helpful during your stay. We are very lucky to be located directly on the beach with a perfect view for watching the dolphins and sunset! I hope you choose the Sandpearl again for your vacation destination!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Great Hotel
review: Beautiful hotel that is sure to make you feel right at home. The moment you park your car, you are greeted with friendly staff, and a luxurious lobby. A special thank you to Kyndall at check in who took the time to explain everything we needed to know down to the restaurants and convenience stores that were close by. All our prior requests were met and check in was a breeze. We booked the junior suite, directly overlooking the beautiful ocean. The suite was extremely spacious for a family of 4 (2 adults & 2 children) with a pull out sofa at the end of the room. The bathroom was wonderful with a shower/garden tub combination, and plenty of closet space. I especially appreciated the "sanitized" TV remotes.The best thing about this resort was the kids club. Even though we had to…

title: Beach Wedding
review: I stayed here for a few nights for a wedding. From the moment I pulled up this place was beautiful! Great location easy access to stores and restaurants. There's a great restaurant across the street.   The rooms were great. We stayed in a regular double room. Some of the other guests had two bedroom suites. They look like apartments with full kitchens and dining room tables. Everything is very modern.  They offer free bike rentals and with the cost of those rooms take advantage. I had a great 10 mile bike ride.   There was several weddings going at once, they really know how to pack them in.  The food at the wedding was good. Definitely would stay again.

title: Sandpearl in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,   I am so glad you enjoyed your accommodations while visiting for a wedding! We indeed have the perfect location to local attractions and restaurants. Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl and we hope you return in the near future!  Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Quiet and Relaxing...Great for Business and Families
review: Family friendly resort that cuts corners. New had a gulf front room, but we were on the right side so our view was actually blocked by the other part of the hotel (not sure how that is considered ocean front). The balconies are tight and have no privacy (you can literally high five your neighbor). We kept running out of TP (housekeeping was not that good at restocking it). The sheets were good the first few nights, then when they changed it on the third night they felt like saw dust. I don't know why the hotel would charge us $340 dollars per night and give us old ratty sheets. On the positive side, the activities desk was great, liked interacting with everyone there (very helpful and friendly). The food was really good! Especially enjoyed the room service breakfast. Overall,…

title: Dissapointed
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I was pleased that you enjoyed our Activities Desk and the staff as well as the food throughout the resort.  Thank you!  I am very sorry for the Housekeeping issues you experienced. I will speak with the Executive Housekeeper about the condition of the sheets to make sure that we are not keeping sheets too long.  Thank you for the feedback.  I will also speak to her about the stocking of amenities in the guestroom.  Again, thank you for the feedback.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Excellent, Amazing, Relaxing, Luxurious,
review: Use the valet, hrough it is not free. The service is unique in that it friendly, courteous, professional and caring. The grounds are very well kept. The pool and beach are prime. The rooms are a bit small but well laid out. Lighting is good, bedding is clean and comfortable. Bathroom is spacious and clean. Balcony is small but workable. If you want quiet and relaxing and still be close to the action it is worth it.

title: What you'd expect from a Resort
review: My husband and I stayed at this resort back in June for one night as we're St. Pete locals and just wanted to get away for our 2yr Anniversary. From the moment you pull in you are treated like royals, everyone is super friendly and I love the complimentary champagne or sparkling juice for me as I was 5mths pregnant! The resort is beautiful and well maintained. They accommodated us coming early and staying late the next day to enjoy the pool and make the most of our stay! It really gave me the feeling that I was on vacation and shouldn't have a worry in the world. Clearwater Beach is great and you can walk to so much stuff, this is the perfect location on the North side of the beach away from where a lot of the public parking is, however if you want to do the more…

title: Amazing place
review: Dear Guest,   I am so glad to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your stay! We are always happy to welcome locals to our property! It looks like you were able to relax and enjoy all the amenities the property has to offer; we want our guests to feel right at home! As for the mattress, I apologize that you were unable to get a good nights’ rest. I will pass along the message to the housekeeping manager. Also, when you make your next reservation, make sure to let the reservationist know that you had issues with the mattress so that they are able to accommodate you in the best way possible. We look forward to seeing you soon!   Kind Regards,   Jenna

title: Wonderful Beach Hotel
review: Service was top notch. Pool, beach, restaurants, and the location is second to none. Spent ALOT of money but knew that going in. Nice to splurge once in awhile. Weather was kind of rainy for a few days which isn't typical but we made the best of it. I love how you can bill everything to the room. Never have to bring your wallet anywhere. Be careful though, the pool and beachside service automatically includes gratuity. I didnt realize the first day and gave the waiter $10 extra and he didnt say anything which is kind of shady if you ask me.

title: Great family vacation
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad to hear that you received such excellent service at all the outlets that the resort has to offer. We always strive for 5 diamond service. I hope you come back to the Sandpearl in the near future!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Best of the best 😍😍
review: The Sandpearl is a wonderful beach hotel.  The location couldn't be better.  The hotel is located directly on a beautiful white sand beach.  The sunsets are often incredible.  Our family has stayed in both a suite and standard guest rooms.  The suite had everything our family needed - full kitchen, large living room with lots of seating, separate dining room, two bathrooms, washer and dryer, storage room, and 2 balconies.  We all wished we could move in permanently.  For a get away for 2, the standard room was quite spacious.  We like that there is a small refrigerator to keep beverages cool or store leftovers.  We love the food at Tate's but find it filling and often have leftovers.  All the rooms we have stayed in have been clean.  We have had the experience others have…

title: Terrific!
review: First time in Clearwater and I am so glad we chose the Sandpearl.  The hotel is gorgeous and clean, clean, clean. We arrived into TPA at midnight.  The car service arranged by the hotel (Ambassador Limo) was awesome and when we arrived we were checked in quickly and found that our room (including the sofa bed) was all ready for us to hit the sack.   I LOVE the beds at this hotel.  I guess I prefer a firmer mattress because usually at luxury hotels with soft beds I end up with a sore back in the morning.  These were super comfortable for me.    We had a queen/queen oceanfront junior suite and it was plenty of space for me and two kids.  The view from the balcony is gorgeous and truly is a full gulf view.  Room was super clean, housekeeping was terrific and we enjoyed the little…

title: Beautiful location
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for all your kind words about your stay at the Sandpearl. I am thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your Gulf Front rooms; you had the perfect spot to watch the incredible sunsets! I am also happy that you appreciated the little touches that us staff members take pride in doing for the guests such as the chocolates during the nightly turn down service. I hope your children enjoyed the dolphin tale movie that was sent up by the front desk; their attentiveness to detail will be recognized!   In your review you mentioned being disappointed about the charge for beach umbrellas. In past reviews we have addressed this issue as it is a point of contention for some guests. The reason for this charge is due to giving the resort an opportunity to manage the availability of the chairs better. In the past we did not charge for beach chairs and some guests would reserve chairs on both the beach and the pool. This left no availability for many guests. We found the best means to control this was to place a minimal charge on these umbrellas. We currently charge less than other local hotels or the public beach umbrellas.   As for the Wi-Fi network, I apologize you were unable to connect to our network. We are in the process of upgrading of network to be able to withhold the larger amount of guests we have. In addition, there are Ethernet cords in the desk drawers and we also have a 24 hour business center on the lobby level to use at your convenience. I hope this clears things up.   Again, thank you for the review and I look forward to seeing you and your family at the Sandpearl soon!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Family vacation
review: Wonderful poolside and beach front resort, nicest on Clearwater. Excellent food and nice rooms. Highly recommend, would be great for weddings and romantic get a ways. Staff was friendly and attentive.

title: Amazing Beachfront Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review of your experience at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad you enjoyed your accommodations and the restaurants that we have here on property. You are correct; the Sandpearl is great for weddings and romantic get-a-ways! Please come back and visit us all at the Sandpearl again!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Disappointed
review: My husband and I take our family on vacation every year. We stayed at the sandpearl resort in Clearwater fl, this year .I've never felt the need to write a review. But I feel I want to warn others, the beach is great, but the staff at the hotel was extremely unfriendly and by far the rudest I've ever encountered. Our trip was ruined by the staff. We will never.stay here again.

title: great wkd getaway
review: the resort was fantastic, great amenities, not too overwhelmingly big, more like a boutique hotel, very trendy feel to it.  The service from start to finish was outstanding!  Lots of activities going on for the kids as well.  Good food and drinks at the restaurants onsite! Will definitely return!

title: Elegant
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl Resort for your weekend getaway. I am so glad you enjoyed everything our property has to offer. We indeed have many activities for children and adults as well! Thank you for the review and we look forward to your return.  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Family vacation
review: We spent our family vacation this year at the Sandpearl. We had Room 372 a Gulf Front Junior suite. This is a corner room and the balcony was outstanding. I'm a Florida native and have been on many beach vacations, this balcony was by far the most impressive I've ever had. Outfitted with two lounge chairs, and two regular chairs, it overlooked the pool and the beach. The third floor view just above the palm trees was spectacular. Watching the sun sink into the ocean from your own humongous balcony, stellar. This alone was worth the pricy cost of the room. We had 2 TVs and a small fridge. The bathroom was large and the tub was huge. From it you could see the TV, and the view of the ocean. Awesome. A/C was excellent as well. The staff throughout the resort were friendly and…

title: Satisfactory stay for mega bucks
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at the Sandpearl. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your gulf front accommodation; you certainly had the perfect spot to watch the incredible sunsets! I am glad that you were able to utilize all the amenities we have on property.   As for the Wi-Fi network, I apologize you were unable to connect to our network. We are changing the company we use in the coming months to be able to accommodate the larger amount of guests we have. In addition, there are Ethernet cords in the desk drawers and we also have a 24 hour business center on the lobby level to use at your convenience.   Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to your return to the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Great Vacation to Sandpearl
review: Our family of four stayed here for 5 nights in a gulf view room. The view was beautiful, but we really weren't in our room that often to enjoy it so I think I would have been ok booking one of the the less expensive bay view rooms.  Several mornings, we ate at the breakfast buffet there at the hotel. We kept coming back for the made-to-order omelets and delicious waffles!  The kids loved the firepits on the beach and making S'mores in the evenings.  Most days we split our time between the beach and pool. Our first day we paid for an umbrella rental through the hotel. In our case, we really did not feel like we got good use out of the rental. The chairs set way back from the water, and the kids ended up playing in the water most of the time and then were ready to go to the pool.…

title: Worth a stay, but there are a few things to consider...
review: I love Clearwater Beach... I visit as often as I can. As a result, I've stayed at most of the hotels along the beach. The Sandpearl has been on my "to stay" list for several years, but I always chose other hotels when planning trips simply because of the cost factor. I decided this time, I was going to splurge and go for the Sandpearl.  I chose a bay view room (the "cheapest" option), which turned out to be great for me, because I loved the views of the bridge and the city, especially at night. My room (king with a balcony on a high floor) was tucked into a corner and felt like a retreat. The corner windows and double balconies were fantastic. For as sumptuous as the hotel is... I was really disappointed with the bed. The mattress was almost ridiculously uncomfortable, but the…

title: Florida Trip
review: Dear Guest,   First of all I would like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay here at the Sandpearl. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the bayside accommodations. I agree, the view at night can be quite beautiful with all the city lights. I am also glad that you were able to utilize some of the amenities we have here on.  In your review you commented on the kid friendliness of the resort. You are correct, our resort is very kid friendly and we aim to create memories for families and hopefully have them return year after year. We have recently been recognized by Travel and Leisure Magazine as the second best Family Resort in the country!   With this said, we also cater to individuals who want to relax and enjoy each other’s company. We have great personal cabanas to choose from as well as a world class spa. Our 4-diamond restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf is the perfect date night destination.  You also mentioned the Wifi. I apologize you were unable to connect to our network. We are changing the company we use in the coming months to be able to withhold the larger amount of guests we have. In addition, there are Ethernet cords in the desk drawers and we also have a 24 hour business center on the lobby level to use at your convenience.   Again, thank you for your review and we hope you return to the Sandpearl.   Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Pleasant surprise!
review: The Sandpearl Hotel is a beautiful resort, with fantastic views over the Gulf of Mexico.  It is situated on the beach, with good access.  We had an absolutely fantastic reception on arrival.  The staff are extremely polite and helpful.  When shown to our room, the bell man insisted that we wait until 18:12 before leaving as the view of the surrendering sun was amazing.  He was not wrong, absolutely fantastic. The pool was a good size, with plenty of beds.  The pool is patrolled by a pool man who keeps everybody in check and helps out with additional information. This was an absolutely fantastic hotel and look forward to my return.

title: Beautiful "resort" that fails at the basics
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your kind words about your stay here at the Sandpearl. I am so happy you were able to enjoy the beautiful sunset views we are so lucky to have a front row seat for I am glad the staff was very polite and helpful as well, we strive to make each guest feel right at home. Please come back and visit us again!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: ROACH MOTEL . . . Disappointing
review: Stayed for three nights in July and was pleasantly surprised. Our room was nice and clean with nice bay views. Gulf views come at a premium and in my opinion not worth it as you still have wide water views and can see the sunrise from your balcony and the sunset from the beach instead.  Our room was a two room apartment (2 balconies) with full kitchen, dining area and tv room with a queen sofabed. The bedroom was large as was the bathroom with shower and bathtub and washer/dryer combo. The only minus was that the room only has one toilet which is placed in the bathroom without any partitioning.  The hotel also has a nice restaurant Caretta, a small sundries shop with Starbucks, and a poolside restaurant for lunch and snacks. The breakfast buffet at Caretta was really nice (for a…

title: Great location and beautiful beachfront amenities.
review: We have visited here multiple times with family and friends. The location close to Hwy 60 is nice. The service will is good. The poolside cabanas are nice and so is the poolside bar and grill. You can also sneak out to a nearby place like Frenchy's. We definitely will return.

title: Classy, romantic getaway destination!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your loyalty to the Sandpearl Resort! We greatly appreciate your business and are happy to be the host of you and your family’s vacation. I am glad that you all enjoyed your time in Clearwater and we look forward to seeing you again soon!   Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Overpriced
review: Elegant, beautifully furnished hotel on the Gulf of Mexico with white sand beach and turquoise water, large swimming pool and awesome spa treatments available. Terrace restaurant overlooking the pool and beach is great for watching the sunset. Friendly, attentive staff and delicious food! The best setting in Florida for an anniversary getaway, beach wedding or family vacation.

title: Amazing time at the Sandpearl
review: Dear guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your previous stay with us at the Sandpearl. I am so happy that you enjoyed our elegant resort that we are so lucky to have directly on the Gulf of Mexico. I am glad you had a great experience here and we look forward to your next return to Clearwater Beach!   Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Wonderful Vacation!
review: Terribly overpriced, while the Hotel is very elegant rooms are quite small.  The water in the beach is nothing but clear; I was a bit disappointed by this so, I decided to go to a different beach.  The Hotel charges you a night's stay if you decide to check out early and if you take your car there is  a $20 for parking per night!!! I would not recommended this Hotel unless you are only staying within the property, however; if this is your first time in Florida you will want to go and walk around. Leaving was the right choice since I will truly enjoy myself in another true clear beach!!!

title: Great Stay
review: Spent 5 days, 4 nights here.  Had a fantastic time.  Upon check-in they upgraded our room to a suite for free!  Very clean, great staff, good food, great pool and beach.  The spa was fantastic too!  Almost everything we did was within walking distance too.

title: Just Perfect
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing you recent stay here at the Sandpearl! I am thrilled you were able to be upgraded to a suite and that you enjoyed your accommodations. We are lucky that we are in such close proximity to so many attractions here on Clearwater Beach! We hope to see you back here at the Sandpearl in the near future!   Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Fantastic beach setting BUT...
review: The entire experience staying at the Sandpearl was spectacular. From the moment we arrived everything went seamlessly. We were greeted with Champagne and our room was ready 3 hours early! The service was awesome and the Concierge Michael was always available to help. (Thank you Michael!)   For those who read online reviews, I spent a few minutes the night before reading the few negative reviews to see what i may want to look out for. DO NOT worry about them. I think those people either have astronomical expectations, need a hug or had a bad day. If the hotel is booked, there are a few rooms that may not have the best view, but if you ask nicely, they will do everything they can to accommodate your requests.   The food was great, the location is perfect, the rooms were clean, the…

title: Average
review: Dear Guest,   I am so happy to hear that your entire stay at the Sandpearl was spectacular. We strive for the best service and I am glad that every team member at this resort made that possible. Michael has been with us for a long time and I will let him know that you appreciated his help. I really appreciate all your kind thoughts about the Sandpearl and we look forward to hosting your next vacation very soon! Thank you again for taking the time to review your stay.  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Top of the line .... EVERYTHING! We loved it & so did our Teenagers!
review: Me and my husband stayed at this hotel for a week at the end of May (Memorial Day weekend to be precise) and had a great week relaxing on the gorgeous Clearwater Beach!  The setting of the hotel is great directly on the beach and on the main strip in Clearwater Beach so easy access to bars and restaurants outside the hotel.  We had a Gulf View room which had fantastic views cross the pool and the beach so we could watch the sunset each day from our small balcony. The rooms were very nice, clean and very spacious. The bathroom was large and comfortable and the beds were like clouds!   The food offering at breakfast was great all you would want from a breakfast buffet as well as an A la Carte option. We ate at the beach bar on a couple of days and the food and service was great.…

title: AMAZING RESORT WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICE
review: My mom surprised me with a two night stay here for my 40th birthday.  It was she & I, my sister and my best friend.  Resort is absolutely beautiful.  The front check in was amazing.  It was the most friendly lady who checked us in.  We had just booked a standard room for the 4 of us & she upgraded us to a 2 bedroom ocean front suite.  We went up to the suite which was GORGEOUS & had three balconies overlooking the ocean.  My friend was making some coffee in the Keurig & we needed some more sweetener so we called down to have some brought up.  They showed up with a bag full of sweetener, more Kcups and bottles of water.  About 30 seconds later, the door knocks again and they had brought a beautiful plate of chocolate covered strawberries with Happy Birthday written in chocolate. …

title: Wonderful Vacation
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your review of the Sandpearl! I am happy you and your family were able to celebrate your special day here. We try to make every guest feel special and I am glad that all staff members went out of their way to make sure you were taken care of. I am delighted you enjoyed your two bedroom condo and your birthday dinner at Caretta on the Gulf. We look forward to hosting your next special event here at the Sandpearl!   Kind Regards,  Jenna K.

title: Upscale hotel...very impressive!!
review: We arrived last Sunday at 11:00am and they had our room ready within 40 minutes.  We had a room overlooking the bay.  The room was very clean.  The resort is beautiful.  The pool was fantastic.  We were at the pool most of the time.  The Grill by the pool serves great food and the staff works very hard.  All the employees were very nice and went above and beyond, especially the staff at the Grill.  The location is perfect. Everything we did was within walking distance.  You can walk out the front and everything you need is along the area.  We went to Pier 60 to watch the street performers which is a must-do in Clearwater.  We also went on the Dolphin Encounter tour and saw dolphins and then they took us to a small island to swim and snorkel.   Overall, the resort is a beautiful…

title: Wonderful Resort!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your review of the Sandpearl Resort. I am so delighted that you were able to enjoy your room early in the day and were satisfied with the bayside accommodations. I will also pass along that the Tate Island Grill staff were very helpful and accommodating to you and your family. Debbie, our lobby ambassador, works very hard to make sure each guest feels right at home and I am happy you had the chance to meet her! We look forward to your next visit here at the Sandpearl!  Kind Regards,  Jenna K.

title: Nice resort, but over priced
review: We stayed here for 5 days and i did my research on different hotels before booking this one. This hotel is above and beyond what i expected. Wonderful staff and everyone is there for whatever you need. We stayed in the gulf front room 640 with wonderful views. The $20 a day valet fee is well worth it. No worries on parking and unpacking the car they do everything for you. After driving 19 hours its nice to pull up and be greeted like royalty and have an easy check in and just walk up to the room without lugging anything and within 5 min having our stuff brought up and unloaded.  I was fine with the extra charges. I love that they have everything you need for the kids also. They could go get pool toys so no need to pack any of it. So much to do on the resort property itself.…

title: The BEST hotel in Clearwater
review: This hotel was amazing.  Very clean, courteous service and within walking distance of virtually everything you would like to do in Clearwater.  The pool is very clean and hosts a variety of kid friendly activities.  We loved all the "beach activities" including on site corn hole, volleyball, and other sports.  Definitely a must see and must stay at hotel. We will definitely be going back

title: Second visit and still impressed
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you describing us as the best hotel in Clearwater; we like to think so too! I am happy that you were able to enjoy the fun games that the activities department puts together. Our location is very central in the fact that we are close to so many outlets on Clearwater Beach. I hope to see you back here at the Sandpearl again!   Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Comfortable and service
review: I was just as impressed on my second visit to Sandpearl. The staff was always friendly, beach/pool servers attentive and food was great. We ate at Tate's and really enjoyed the casual atmosphere. We went to Carretta on the Gulf for drinks after dinner. The band and crowd was definitely a fun group!

title: Great Family Vacation, Expensive but Great Service
review: Dear Guest,   I am delighted that you have chosen to make a return to the Sandpearl Resort! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed both restaurants that we have on property and that you enjoyed the band as well. We look forward to having you back at the resort for another visit!   Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Lovely family vacation!
review: I contemplated booking this hotel, but went for it due to its location in Clearwater and its beach front access.  It didn't disappoint .  Everything from the staff, to the casual yet elegant style (reminiscent of Tommy Bahamma) the Sandpearl was a win win.  Set on a gorgeous beach the hotel is not massive and hard to get around.  It offeres everything you would like or need on a beach vacation.  Beach rentals, sports rentals, excellent beach and pool service.  The hotel restaurants are excellent as well.  The location could not be better as everything in Clearwater beach is walking distance.  Lots of hidden charges like most hotels these days, resort fees, valet fees, etc but it's a great find.  We will definitely be back.

title: Sandpearl is a wonderful experience
review: This was the second time I visited and stayed at the Sandpearl resort. I have to say it was top notch. Great location with everything in walking distance and great service at the hotel. There are so many options for breakfast, lunch and dinners around the hotel.

title: No room for improvement!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for returning to the Sandpearl Resort. We are so thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed your stay here! We are also happy that you were able to eat at both outlets, Caretta on the Gulf and Tate Island Grill and thoroughly enjoyed them. We hope to see you back at the Sandpearl for your 3rd visit!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Gorgeous beach and hotel
review: Without designing your own resort to fit your every need, you couldn't get much closer than the Sandpearl. From the moment we stepped into the lobby and wre offered champagne until the morning we checked out, we were treated by every employee with a smile, a polite greeting, and unmatched service. The location was perfect and the beach was amazing. The food was wonderful, the coffee hot and the beach chairs were actually comfortable. The valet not only offered us water when he pulled up our car, he offered us advice on restaurants and where the best ice cream could be had. The pool was crowded but the beach was only steps away when we wanted a little surf and quiet. Do yourself a favor and add this resort to your list of  "must stays". Definitely worth five stars!!

title: Summer 2015
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind words about your stay at the Sandpearl. We are so thrilled that every aspect of your vacation was enjoyable and all outlets of the resort were helpful and accommodating! We look forward to your next visit with us at the Sandpearl Resort!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Unacceptable bay view rooms
review: The hotel is beautiful, charming, cozy and elegant.  Pros: The beach is fantastic, one of the nicest in Florida. White sands, warm water with no currents and small waves. Location of the hotel is perfect, near the pier and close to restaurants. The hotel is very clean, really well kept. Hotel has many nice perks, like a Starbucks cafeteria, a pool bar, wi-fi. Cons: Food was not great. It was nice to see they had organic and healthy options but quality was lower than expected, especially after paying a high price. No self parking, add $50 per night for valet, resort fees and tips.

title: A few unexpected drawbacks
review: Did not expect so many little kiddos! The pool is packed with yelling,  screaming, and regularly scheduled crying. Balls flying everywhere in the pool.  It's not a calm relaxing place.  Thought this place would be more adult and couldn't have been more wrong!     It's a nice place for sure but very expensive too!  #Room 568 was an ocean front junior suite. Right on the corner of the building next to the service ally.  Every morning while enjoying coffee out on the balcony a steady stream of very noisy delivery trucks made the rounds along with the busy landscapers with all the power tools.   It was super busy every morning for hours and kinda ruined the whole relaxing morning balcony routine.  Although evenings were just fine with beautiful sunsets.  Just be aware that the…

title: Wonderful experience
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay at the Sandpearl.  I am glad that you found parts of your stay to meet your expectations however there were other issues that I am truly sorry you experienced.  While we are a very family friendly resort we do our best to make sure that the throwing of footballs and other activities like that in the pool are controlled it appears we could have done a better job during your stay.  I will speak with our Activities Manager regarding this.    Regarding the noise from the streets, we normally do not have those issues on that side of the building.  We have spoken to all of our vendors to make sure they are not making deliveries prior to 9am.  We have also spoken to the city regarding the time they make their runs and this should not happen prior to 9am as well.  If it was prior to that time, I am very sorry.  We will look into it.  Again, thank  you for your review.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: A wonderful long weekend.
review: Stayed here for three nights.  Great experience.  Nice pool and beach access.  Food and drink was delicious.  Staff is super nice and attentive.  The price is a bit high but worth the stay.  Very kid friendly.  Fire pits on the beach. Smores. Nigh movies in the pool.  Will come back.

title: Amazing anniversay, amazing resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl while you visited Clearwater Beach! We work hard to make sure every guest is able to enjoy every department of the hotel. I am happy you were able to enjoy the s’mores by the fire pit and the movies in the pool; they are some of our nightly traditions! We look forward to your next visit at the Sandpearl!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: very good beach hotel
review: Friends and I visited the Sandpearl for a wedding this past weekend. Everything was lovely, from the helpful staff to the beautiful grounds. My favorite, however, was pina coladas with rum floaters by the pool.

title: The Spa at the Sandpearl
review: I recently booked spa service at the Sandpearl Spa on my birthday and was told I could not use the pool or sit on their chairs at the beach because I didn't have a room.  I live in Tampa and didn't need a room. I think if you are a paying guest at their spa for the day then you should certainly be able to enjoy the pool or beach. I was told I could only visit the restaurant. Ridiculous!

title: Great Stay!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for visiting the Spa at the Sandpearl Resort.  You are correct in that only over night guests are entitled to use the pool and beach.
