Due to seating availability we restrict pool and beach usage to only guests staying with us.  While you live close we do have many people drive from Tampa to stay with us for a quick vacation.    Since the review was referring to the hotel and you didn't stay with us, I would be interested in hearing about the services performed at the Spa to make sure we met your expectations.  If you have any questions please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Nice Place
review: This place is just beautiful! Rooms were very clean. We were on the 5th floor with an ocean front view and it did not disappoint! The staff was wonderful. When we got there they offered drinks and gave the kids sand pails. Everyone we encountered, from the valet, pool, restaurants, maids, desks, and beyond were very friendly and helpful. My 3 year old slipped on the concrete and hit his head and an attentive staff member got him ice and a Popsicle(which immediately cured him) right away.   I was pleasantly surprised at how kid friendly the resort was. They had a balloon artist, who was great with the kids. Later, her sister came out as a mermaid for mermaid story time. Also great. They had movies and s'mores at night, which was mostly rained out while we were there. Also, life…

title: Great Family Hotel
review: Dear Guest,   I am so happy that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. We also appreciate your kind words regarding all staff members; they work hard and really try to accommodate and make sure each guest feels right at home. I’m sorry to hear that your son slipped but am glad that he is okay and was treated quickly. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay and we hope to see you and your family back at the Sandpearl!  Kind Regards,   Jenna K.

title: Fabulous stay and wedding!
review: The Sandpearl is a nice place, but it's very expensive to stay there. I would call it it an above-average 3.5 star hotel.  Rooms are nice...above average design. Modern furnishings.   The beach is close-it's right there. It's a big beach...it takes a while to walk all the way to the ocean-but that's a good thing. It will take that much longer for the beach to get eroded by storms etc.   There is a resort fee of $25 a day. A much-needed beach umbrella is not included in the fee. It really needs to be. You need to have one because it's hot, hot, hot. When you get to the beach in the morning-see Steve. He's a great guy, and he'll set you up with chairs and umbrellas. Be sure to tip him well! He works hard and has a great attitude.  We checked out Astronomy Night on Friday. Don't…

title: Stunning hotel and location
review: lovely hotel and staff had special treatment as birthday!  always crowded by pool sunbeds are always full  lots of add on costs  for hotel services and activities beware of room location promised by tour op of bay view ended up overlooking air conditioned units

title: Worth a visit
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel during your birthday celebration. I do apologize if the room type you had booked was not up to standard. Next time you stay with us please contact me directly and I will make sure you receive the correct room type. We appreciate the positive words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: True Escape
review: My husband and I have just returned from a 14 night stay at the Sandpearl, great location, on an amazing beach. Friendly, helpful staff throughout, nothing ever seemed to be a problem to them.  We never ate at the Sandpearl, there are lots of eateries round about, our favourite being the Clearsky Cafe.  Only thing with staying 14 nights is you get charged $25 per night resort charge ($28 with taxes) and $20 dollars per night Valet parking ($21.40 with taxes) which does add quite a bit on to your holiday, my husband managed to get a couple of nights valet parking for free through emailing the hotel, but you need to pay the resort charge, we found it to be a bit of a rip off to be honest. Won't stop us returning though!! Already looking forward to returning, hopefully next year.

title: Business pleasure
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It was so wonderful to meet you both during your two week stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed the property and our staff was helpful and friendly. The weather was certainly on our side during your stay, and I am very delighted you were able to enjoy all that Clearwater Beach has to offer. We greatly appreciate the positive feedback and are already looking forward to your next visit!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Location is perfect!
review: I am a local and The Sandpearl is my favorite hotel in the area.  I have stayed previously on a girls' weekend, but stayed this time for my anniversary.  The pool chairs are the best with individual shade.  The restaurant there is worth the price...amazing food.  I stayed in a gulf front and a side room...both were great and even the side facing view had views of the gulf.

title: Great family vacation!
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl Resort June 8-June 13. My 4 and 7 year old loved the pool and beach front. The resort is absolutely beautiful. Michael at the concierge desk was incredibly helpful and provided great service. First time visit to Florida - we will definitely return to stay at the Sandpearl Resort.

title: Beautiful Resort-Great Service!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had a marvelous stay with us and your children enjoyed our pool and beach area. Michael is certainly an asset to our Concierge team and is always there for any recommendations or traveling needs. Next time you are at the Sandpearl, be sure to check out our award winning children’s camp, Camp Ridley. We thank you again for the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox

title: Fantastic hotel, really great location
review: Had an amazing four days at the Sandpearl with three girlfriends in June 2015! From check-in, all service was perfect, including the valets, towel counter employees, housekeeping, and beach and restaurant service! The hotel itself is beautiful and the rooms are nice. Even the shower curtains looked brand new. My only complaint is that the beach umbrellas are a little pricy and sun protection really is necessary. The beach is also somewhat crowded, but the area just in front of the resort is mostly Sandpearl guests only, so it is less so. Even with many people, it is a fun, family friendly atmosphere, so that's not really a complaint. We LOVED the Sandpearl. Highly recommend!!

title: Didn't want to leave
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had a wonderful girl’s weekend with us beginning from the moment you arrived. Our Valet, Housekeeping and Pool & Beach team are just a few of examples of why our team members truly make the Sandpearl experience great. I am also happy to hear you were able to enjoy our pool and beach area. I would have to agree that having our private beach area makes the days more relaxing and enjoyable! We thank you again for your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Perfect Family Vacation in June
review: Ok so I'll start with the positives and then move on to the need to knows that go with coming here.  The hotel is stunning, truly beautiful and also very well maintained and looked after.   The staff are a huge credit to the hotel, from valets, check in desk, to the poolside attendants.  The pool is great, the sun beds are brilliant and have little flags to get service from the poolside attendants for drinks and food etc.  There is also a beach that you have access to but be aware, extra fees apply for getting an umbrella out there.  There's lots to do in and around the hotel and within short distances as well, including many different places to eat.  Food at the hotel is well priced considering this is not the norm. Breakfast is well worth trying here, kids eat free and there…

title: Nice Hotel, with spectacular views!!
review: We stayed at Sandpearl Resort June 7th through June 12th, the weather was beautiful and the beach was amazing.  A manatee came up close to shoreline and swam around,saw lots of starfish and fish swimming in ocean!!  The resort is nice, but could use a few updates to meet the four diamond rating it gets, staff was extremely friendly and helpful!!  Some of the extra costs along with the resort fee that you already pay was a little disappointing, but not a huge deal.

title: Doesn't get any better then this in West Central Florida!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear the weather was perfect and you enjoyed your stay with us at the beginning of June.  What a neat experience to be able to say you swam with a manatee! It is very rare that a manatee will come to the shoreline, and I am excited you were able to encounter one during your visit. I do apologize if there were items around our resort that needed updating. If you would like to reach out to me directly I would be more than happy to pass along which items are in need of updating to our Director of Engineering. We certainly appreciate the positive words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous Boutique Style Resort
review: We were so fortunate to get to experience this resort. After traveling the Caribbean and Mexico, We have not got to experience service like this since being at the 5 star resorts in the Riviera Maya. It is just phenomenal! Kudos to all the employees that work here. From the moment we pulled up with the valet guys, till the day we left, it was nonstop. Everyone was extremely polite, respectful, and helpful. The grounds and buildings are spotless and just aesthetically pleasing. Beautiful sunsets. Beautiful beach. Top quality lounges. Awesome food. And they have a top rated, sea and beach view restaurant. Rooms are spotlessly clean, large, with large bathrooms. Deep soaking tub. Flat screen t.v.  Fridg. Keurig coffee maker. WINE GLASSES. Cork screw. Full bar cabinet. Extremely…

title: Excellent
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us beginning with our valet team when you first arrived to our resort. It is also great to hear you were able to take full advantage of our pool and beach area. I will have to agree that having the flag on all of our chairs is the perfect touch to enjoying a relaxing day! As you mentioned, we are very fortunate to be in the heart of Clearwater Beach and to be surrounded by wonderful restaurants and shops. We certainly appreciate all of the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox

title: Beautiful classy hotel
review: This resort was superb. It was clean, beautiful and had phenomenal service. The view from our balcony was awesome and the beach in front of the resort was clean and stunning. We were very pleased with our experience and would totally stay there again. We do not have kids yet but this resort had a lot of kid friendly options that would be great for families.

title: 'Elegant, great location"
review: Stayed here with another couple for a winter getaway. Beautiful inside and out. We were greeted with a glass of champagne as soon as we entered the lobby. The hotel was decorated for the Christmas season. A huge sand sculpture of a winter scene was amazing! Must visit this hotel!

title: Sandpearl Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had a wonderful winter getaway starting from the moment you arrived with your champagne welcome toast! The holidays are my favorite time around the Sandpearl Resort. As you saw, not only is the lobby area decorated beautifully but we also have an incredible winter wonderland sculpture made out of sand. Thank you again for your kind words and we hope to welcome you back to the Sandpearl!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Best in Clearwater Beach
review: Sandpearl has 253 rooms and is one of the destination hotels in Clearwater/St. Petersburg. This is an upscale place for couples and families. We were welcomed with champagne - enjoyed the beach and pool later. Yes, such a nice weekend getaway.

title: Hope they keep up the good work best hotel on Clearwater beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your visit with us during your previous trip to Clearwater Beach. Our welcome champagne toast is truly one of a kind and the best way to start a relaxing vacation. It is great to hear you also enjoyed all of the amenities we have to offer around the resort. We certainly appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: "Beautiful"
review: Stayed here on our Honeymoon. ..it was beautiful. ..Very clean...staff is very nice and professional. ...the pool area is very nice...The restaurants and bars are excellent. ...Rooms are very nice and comfortable. ...when traveling to Clearwater Beach this is definitely the best choice!

title: Always a great stay
review: We spent another great week at the Sandpearl and enjoyed every minute of it. To a person, this staff is the best I have seen. They all go out of their way to make their guests feel welcome. The hotel was fully booked while we were there and even so, the service was great and we never felt crowded. My only wish is that they would not charge a rental fee for beach umbrellas since there is a daily resort fee that you pay. We like pool time, but we also like beach time, but need the shade of an umbrella for the kids. Spending a daily rental for an umbrella that we only used for several hours seems a bit unfair. Aside from that, love the place!

title: Terrible View, Good Service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is so wonderful to hear you had another excellent stay with us at the Sandpearl Resort and the service was great. We truly believe we have the best guests, like you, which make our employees truly enjoy each day of work! We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Such a relaxing gorgeous place to unwind!
review: Please be aware that when you're booking a "coastal view" you will probably have an actual view of a parking lot and garbage-filled dumpsters. Yes, to your far left, there will be a view of the beach. However, the predominant view is of garbage, and the predominant sound is a loud whooshing of the loading docks below. It's really an awful bait and switch. The offer to "upgrade me" to an actual ocean front view for $75/night was not a satisfactory solve. The grounds and service were lovely, but I won't be staying here again.

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you found our grounds and service lovely.   I am sorry that you wont be staying with us again.  You are correct that there are a handful of rooms that have views that are not as great as others.  That is the reason for the price difference from view types.  Each of our views however do offer a unique experience and water is seen from every room whether it is the Gulf for Clearwater Bay.  If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to let me know by contacting me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: FABULOUSLY WONDERFUL!!!
review: Gorgeous hotel, great service, amazing Beach!!  Movie nights at the pool, marshmallow roasting on the beach.  Beachfront restaurant.  We stayed in a suite and it was so spacious!  Kitchenette, fridge, double beach view balcony.  All very nicely done.  Walking distance to restaurants and on the beach.  Will go here again!!

title: Good hotel, but not exceptional
review: We came in for a long weekend trip away from the cold weather where we live. Since we were traveling with a one-year-old, we had called ahead on our way in to get on the waiting list for early check-in. We were told we were on the waiting list, but arrived to find that we were not and made to wait more than an hour before the room was finally available.   Room service is just OK. The crabcakes were definitely not from scratch (frozen). The food at the hotel is only slightly above average, and you're better off venturing out of the hotel for dining.  Housekeeping did not do a thorough job. Trash was left on the ground a couple of times when we returned.   The beach and pool area are nice, and the service is not bad, but it's the little things that made our experience and this…

title: Great Resort, with a very minor issue
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort on Clearwater Beach.  I am glad that you enjoyed our pool and beach experience.  In your review you mentioned our check in time.  I am very sorry that there was some confusion regarding trying to get you in your room prior to our 4pm check in time.  We do our best to accommodate all requests but sometimes that is not possible.  My apologies.  I am also very sorry that your Room Service experience was just OK.  I can promise you that our Crab Cakes are made fresh and to order in house and are never frozen.    I am very sorry that your Housekeeping was not up to your expectations.  We take much pride in our resort cleanliness as well as that of our guestrooms so I apologize that we let you down.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Disappointing Birthday Week End
review: We stayed at Sandpearl for a week in May.  We had a one bedroom suite.  The resort is truly amazing.  Clean, comfortable, accommodating.... The rooms are very clean - which is my main priority.  We also had a nicely equipped kitchen, a huge bathroom, two balconies, a washer/dryer in the bathroom, and great TV channels (my husband was impressed with the number of sports channels).  The bed is very comfortable.  I was very impressed with the hotel staff.  Everyone was truly amazing, all the valet guys are amazing and Kevin at the Tate Island Grill was so nice (all the Tate servers, really)!  Our kids loved the pool, Riley Kids Camp, and all the kids activities (complementary ice cream, glitter tattoos, stargazing, mermaid in the pool, balloons, movies by the pool every night,…

title: Top Notch
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found our one bedroom suite comfortable and clean. Our one bedroom suites are the perfect size for weekend getaway with the family. From the spacious rooms and full size kitchens, to the gorgeous views, you certainly cannot beat our suites! It is also wonderful to hear what a great time you had at Tate Island Grill. I am glad you enjoyed having Kevin as your server.   In your review you did mention the one downfall of your stay was your dining experience in Caretta on the Gulf. Let me first apologize for this incident. You should have not been made to feel that way and I am truly sorry. Our chefs are extremely understanding when it comes to food allergies and will do everything in their power to make our guests happy. We will use this as a learning tool to prevent this from happening in the future.   Our award winning Camp Ridley certainly offers a fun array of activities for our young guests to partake in. Whether it may be the life size chess game, games in the pool, or our mermaid bedtime story, there are things to do for kids of all ages. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Expectations exceeded
review: I have to admit I had high expectations for this resort.  I was disappointed.  The room was a double facing the bay.  It had a balcony with no chairs and barely enough room to sit even if I had chairs.  We ventured down to the pool area which was very crowded.  What surprised me was the "drinkers" partying by the cafe/bar.  They were in the pool with their aluminum beer bottles having a grand old time while toddlers swam around them.  The private beach described on the website is private except there is no water.  If you want the water you have to wade through the people at the public beach in front of the private beach.  It's just sand.  We made the most of it, had dinner, and went to bed.  The next morning we went back to the crowded pool and watched as two adult men wrestled…

title: Great hotel, not worth the price we paid
review: We stayed at the Sand Pearl with my six year old son in March. My review is from the standpoint of paying about $700 per night (with fees included) for an ocean front suite. Overall we had a great time, would I go back paying this much for a room, definitely not. If we could get a less expensive rate, absolutely.  We arrived early and our room wasn't ready. They took our number and said they would call, and they did. We grabbed lunch while we waited (offsite). We took our luggage to another desk to be held while we waited. We returned to the front desk, I told them we got a call that our room was ready - okay, what's your name? Here's your keys, thanks, that was it. Why am I including this experience in my review? No one asked us if it was our first time there, no one gave us an…

title: Over-rated
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort for your trip to Clearwater Beach.  I also appreciate you taking the time to share your review.   It sounds like you stayed in one of our Junior Suites.   Our Junior Suites are one of the most sought after room types, due to their location and intimate size.  However we do offer many different room types at a more economical rate that you may enjoy as well.   I apologize for any confusion there might have been about the pool chairs.  Our staff servicing the pool area work extremely hard to ensure that everyone has the ability to relax and enjoy the pool and beach.  I’m glad you mentioned how outstanding the staff was by the pool.  I know they appreciate your kind words.  I’m sorry to hear you found the staff unhelpful regarding activities in the resort.  For future visits, make sure to visit our friendly concierge staff for information pertaining to the Sandpearl and the surrounding area.    Again, I want to thank you for taking the time to write a review and I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future!

title: beach beauty
review: Pros:  Right on white sand beach Nice front desk personnel  Nice bay view 2q bedroom Live singer in grille by pool Free internet Cons:  1 shampoo, conditioner, 2soaps for 4 adults room (till you discover & order more) No fan in shower Water power not strong (not picky, but takes more shower time!)  2 beach chairs free, but umbrella $26!!! (Yea.. You're in florida!)  Resort chairs soooo far from beach, yet public umbrellas right on Grille restaurant by beach nice, but plan on VERY SLOW service Main dining & breakfast restaurant great food but again VERY LONG TIME to be seated as the front host runs to find a table, then goes back to make sure it's available!! (Walkie talkie guys!)  No balcony in our room 641, or clothes line!! (Really? So how can we dry our swimsuits??)  Bike…

title: Great place to stay!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent trip to Clearwater Beach and your stay at the Sandpearl.  I am glad that you found our beach, Front Desk personnel, guestroom and live music nice.  Please accept my apology for the issues that you did not find adequate.  In your review you commented on the beach chairs being to far from the water while the public chairs that you can rent are closer to the water.  The reason for this is because our chairs are on our private beach.  While we do not own the whole beach we own about 2/3 of the beach in front of the resort.  Since we own it we are allowed to serve food and beverage on the beach.  The umbrellas that are closer to the water are not permitted to sell food and beverage.  Please accept my apology on the delayed service you experienced there.  If you would like to speak personally regarding you stay please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Nice hotel in Clearwater
review: this is a great destination on beautiful Clearwater beach. great amenities and very high standards. parking is extra but they do have limited stay , so I don't blame them.  great restaurant and beach atmosphere.

title: Best place ever!
review: Amazing service! Steve on the beach is wonderful! Tate Grill is a great place for poolside cocktails! Beautiful pool and cozy rooms! If you are looking to splurge and treat yourself right...this is the best place ever!

title: Great stay with a tremendous staff!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort and for taking the time to share your review.  I’m glad to hear you had a wonderful experience while staying with us.  We truly have a top notch staff that strives to exceed all expectations and I’m glad to hear Steve made a lasting impression on your stay.  I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

title: Beautiful Hotel, pity about the hidden extras !!
review: This was an awesome place to stay with nice accommodations and a wonderful staff who all were extremely service minded.  Even though this stay was during a holiday and fully booked, it never seemed too crowded at any time during my visit.  My only complaint is that our bed was the equivalent to a cardboard box in that the mattress was way too firm for us.  I still give this a 5 star review because that was the only thing that I found wrong and it was minimal in comparison to the other aspects that could have been less than desirable.    Unlike other reviews I have read, the walls are not paper thin and I love the way the sliding glass doors of the balcony hold off ALL of the sound of the pool occupants.  I am extremely sound sensitive and was very pleased as to how quiet the…

title: Clean and Friendly staff
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort and for taking the time to share you kind words about our resort.  We enjoy receiving feedback about how well our staff is performing and how well appointed and spacious our rooms are in the resort.  It sounds like you were able to enjoy time out on the balcony but were able to close off the outside world at night so that you could enjoy a restful night.   We take great pride in our beautiful resort and want each and every guest to leave with lasting memories.  I hope to welcome you back in the future!

title: Great stay! Definitely want to return with my kids!
review: My wife and I spent the first 3 nights of our recent trip to Florida in the Sandpearl Resort. First of all, may I say that this hotel is top class with regards to location (right on the beach), room was fantastic with a massive king size comfortable bed. Our balcony faced the ocean/pool area and was ideal for Sunset time. Staff were friendly and helpful. We were delighted with our choice of hotel until we realised that there were some hidden extra fees which we thought were a little O.T.T. considering how much we were paying to stay there initially. Valet Parking only - $20 a night, Resort Tax - $25 a night, Umbrellas on the beach - $25 a day. I ended up paying $200 extra at check out which I thought was outrageous and I expressed my opinion but may as well have been talking to…

title: Nickel and diming soured trip to otherwise beautiful resort
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sandpearl Resort over Memorial Day weekend to celebrate our babymoon (I am 7 months pregnant). The resort has the potential to be a 5 star vacation destination but I would only give it 3 stars at best because of all of the extra fees and the inflexible staff, which made the experience less relaxing and enjoyable than it could have been. The rooms are pricey enough (we paid over $500 a night, even with a special rate), so we felt put out at being nickel and dimed at every step. First, there is no way to park a car at the resort without paying daily valet fees. There are no self parking options, despite the fact that the hotel has a garage. Then there is a daily resort fee tacked on to the room rate, which covers some, but not all, of the amenities.…

title: Nice boutique hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl.  I am sorry that your stay did not live up to your expectations.  In your review you commented on several things that you thought were negative so I would like to try to explain things.  You are correct regarding the parking, there is a $20 fee per night for parking your car in our garage.  As you might have noticed, parking on Clearwater Beach is very limited.  We also have very limited parking at the resort.  We Valet all cars to make sure that we maximize all parking spots and we still run short on parking spots on a regular basis.  I would suggest that next time you can get a taxi from the airport as you really do not need a car while you are with us as there are many things to do in the local area that are within walking distance.    We also do charge for umbrellas on the beach.  The reason for this charge is to guarantee that guests do not reserve chairs on the pool deck and the beach.  Previously there was not a charge for umbrellas on the beach and we continuously ran out of chairs on the beach and the pool deck.  By charging for the umbrellas we severely reduced this issue from occurring.  In your review you mentioned that your husband serves in the military.  Please thank him for his service from us.  We do quite a bit to show respect for our military troops.  We actually have 10 military families staying with us this week as part of the Troop Rewards Program where we give military families an all expense paid trip to the Sandpearl for 5 days and 4 nights.  We do this twice a year and this is our third year of doing this.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write the review.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay, please do not hesitate to let me know by contacting me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Just Beautiful
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for a business conference. The staff, from the check-in, concierge, pool/beach-side, and the snack store were all friendly and accommodating. The view is wonderful and the rooms were larger than I anticipated. The food was excellent each day we were there (the hotel served our group lunch) and the beach was perfect.  I would recommend this as a place to stay.

title: Spring Fling with Tampa Friends
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing you kind words about your stay during your recent business trip.  I’m glad to hear every staff member you encountered was friendly and accommodating.  We have a wonderful staff that strives to make everyone feel welcome from the moment they walk through our main doors.   I’m delighted to hear you enjoyed your luncheon that our banquet staff prepared.   I know they appreciate your kind feedback.   I hope you have the chance to stay with us in the future!

title: Back to The Sandpearl
review: Beautiful hotel and resort and the staff are amazingly friendly and accommodating.  I will say it is on the pricey side for drinks and food but that was expected.  The pool gets very busy on the weekends so sometimes hard to find chairs, etc.  Great resort

title: Good but not great
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl after a week at the Disney Yacht Club, Orlando, and unfortunately the Sandpearl suffered slightly in comparison. Our room was fine, with plenty of space but, having paid a £50+ per night surcharge for a coastal view room, the view was, to say the least, disappointing as between our room and the coast, the view consisted of a couple of car parks and the hotel's delivery dock and rubbish area. To the hotel's credit they did offer us an alternative room, but the view was no better, and then gave us a complementary upgrade to a Gulf view room for our last three nights.   The hotel is ideally situated at the end of Clearwater Beach's main street and the views of the famed sunsets from the Gulf view rooms were spectacular while the beach, although not…

title: Is this real life?
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort and for taking the time to write a review.   I’m sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your view from the accommodation that was booked.  We do offer different views on our property, and it sounds like you were able to enjoy an accommodation facing the Gulf for the last three nights of your stay.   I’m glad you mentioned how exceptional our staff was while you were staying with us.  They truly work hard and strive to exceed all expectations. I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our resort.

title: Gorgeous - Perfect
review: There aren't words. Perfection. We've decided to make our trip to the Sandpearl an annually  recurring one and begin a new family vacation tradition. The service is superb, we love the Tate Island Grill. The pool, unbelievable- specifically we loved the zero entry for our little one and the amazing pool service. There are also lengthy ledges in the water to sit on along the perimeter of the pool that my daughter loved walking along. Need something? Just raise the flag on your chair and a server will be right over. I had vegan options for food and they were also willing to adjust any items to cater to my needs. There is a bucket of pool and beach toys for kiddos which meant less stuff to cart around for us. Movies by the pool at night was wonderful, a great way to enjoy being…

title: Perfect getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl as your annual trip destination.  I appreciate your kind words and your review speaks volumes for how we cater to all of our guests needs.  I’m glad you were able to spend some quality family time by our pool and beach area.  I’m glad you mentioned the movie, we show nightly.  We feel it adds a special experience for those families that want to sit around the pool and relax at the end of the night together.   I’m glad you mentioned the service you received at Tate Island Grill.  The crew there works extremely hard to service not only the restaurant but the pool and beach area as well.   I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back!

title: Beautiful Resort, a little pricey
review: I recently stayed at the Hilton down the road for three nights and there is no comparison to the Sandpearl.  This felt like an oasis.  The first impression of the Hotel is the lobby.  It is so elegant, large, clean with a piano playing at all times.  The rooms are very nicely done.  The bathroom I wish I had in my house.  The pool area is beautiful, there is a zero entry pool with padded lounge chairs, so comfy.  The palm trees makes it feel as if your in a tropical paradise.  Every evening the turn down service would leave some chocolates, cloths the curtains and replenish the water bottles.  Evening time they would have a fire pit on the beach, gas firepits on the balconies, and movies for the kids near the pool.  This hotel was wonderful, I absolutely loved it.  I would…

title: Exceeded all of my expectations!
review: My son and I stayed here over the weekend and were extremely impressed with the entire experience.  From the front desk staff to the staff throughout the resort, everyone went above and beyond to ensure that all of our needs were met.  The property is beautifully situated on Clearwater Beach and both the beach and pool were meticulously maintained.  An added bonus was that we were able to see several weddings that played out at multiple locations on the property.  What an amazing place to get married!  Upon the recommendation of the Concierge, we ate at the main restaurant on the property and it did not disappoint - the food was fantastic.  My son even commented that the waitress who served us was the nicest server he had ever met.    We found this hotel by reading Trip Advisor…

title: Room & hotel was lovely, staff was helpful
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort and for taking the time to write a review.   I’m glad you had such an enjoyable experience staying with us.  Our staff strives to make each and every guest feel welcomed and pampered.  Our location is loved by all since our property sits right along the beach and close to many restaurants.  However I am delighted to hear you were able to dine at our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf.  They certainly do not disappoint.   I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our resort!

title: Unbelievably Amazing!
review: The hotel is very nice.  Stayed a week and found our room to be clean and well appointed.  Grounds are lovely and well maintained.  Staff was helpful.  We were here for Easter week and it was very crowded.  In fact the pool was almost unbearable.  Stayed on the beach a lot which is gorgeous.  Activity staff was great with the kids and there were a lot of fun activities.  Poolside movies, juggling lessons, ping pong and so on.  That was a lot of fun for our son.  Enjoyed the poolside restaurant for lunch, but again it was crowded. Location is walking distance to many nice restaurants. We would come again, but not during vacation week.

title: Wonderful family vacation
review: “Room & Hotel…” Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl for you family vacation and for also taking the time to write a review.   I’m glad you were pleased with your accommodations and the grounds around the resort.  That speaks volumes about our hardworking housekeeping and engineering staff.  Both departments work extremely hard to keep the resort looking clean and beautiful.   Spring break is one of our busiest times and I’m sorry to hear that you were unable to use the pool area as much as you would have liked.  However I’m glad to hear you found enjoyment on our private beach just feet away from our pool.   I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming your family back to our resort.

title: This hotel doesn't disappoint!
review: We just left the one of the most impressive places I've ever stayed!  The customer service and accommodations were over the top! Starting with the valet parking, the staff members are friendly and helpful when parking or retrieving your car.  The doorman (woman) greeted you each time you entered or exited the resort.  The front desk staff spoke each time you walked by on the way to the gift shop or coffee bar.  Each and every staff member you pass in the resort acknowledge you with a smile or a hello.  The rooms are spacious and perfectly clean.  The beds are comfortable and the bedding is top of the line.  Nightly turn-down service included chocolates on the bed, with the next days weather report noted on a card, and the dirty towels retrieved and trash emptied.  The pool area…

title: Best vacation we've had in a long time!
review: This hotel is top notch. It sits right on the beach, which a nice pool and all the hotel amenities you want.  The decor is beautiful and the staff was excellent: very attentive, friendly and helpful. We loved the village area where we would just walk around and pick a restaurant to try. The retail owners were all so friendly and personable.  All I can say is that this was a top vacation for mom and dad AND the kids!  We definitely will be going back!

title: Perfect vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort and for taking the time to share your kind words.   We take great pride in our resort and I am glad you were able to enjoy its beauty.  We certainly have a top notch staff that is always ready to offer outstanding service.  Our location is so ideal for those who want to enjoy the day relaxing around our pool and then take a stroll into town for the various activities Clearwater Beach has to offer.  I’m delighted to hear this trip was one of your top vacations.  I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our resort for another top vacation!

title: Beautiful resort
review: The sandpearl is a beautiful hotel.  The pool was the perfect place to lounge during the day and the pool bar/restaurant served delicious food and drinks.  Hotel personnel were extremely accommodating and made my trip memorable.  The ocean temperature was 88 degrees and we loved it.  There are great restaurants close by.  Walk to the peer for evening entertainment.  Can't say enough about this hotel.  Have returned time after time for an relaxing get-away.

title: Ahhhh-mazing!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort and for taking the time to share your kind words.  You are absolutely correct when speaking of our pool and beach area.  It is so easy to pick a comfy pool chair, sit down and relax the day away.  I’m glad to hear our hotel staff made you feel extra special while you were staying with us.   I’m glad you mentioned how close we are to many fabulous restaurants and entertainment.  We are conveniently located right along the beach but close enough to other activities in the area.  I hope you continue to choose the Sandpearl Resort as your hotel of choice when visiting Clearwater Beach.

title: So glad we chose Sandpearl!
review: Beautiful setting Common areas are stunning Food was excellent Service was impeccable Rooms are very clean It is a very special hotel  Family friendly and the beach is simply stunning My only criticism are the extra charges for resort and parking as this is a top end hotel in terms of price  Best hotel in Clearwater ! Back this October

title: Beautiful, spacious, romantic and fantastic staff.....
review: My wife and I have been going to the SandPearl about 2x per year since 2012. We have had unbelievable experiences and wonderful time at the SandPearl. My family, 3 twenty-something kids and my parents spend a week in June 2013 and everyone had the best time... even 3 twenty-somethings. We were upgraded to the Presidential Suite and were thoroughly surprised and blessed for the upgrade. The Spa, Caretta's on the Gulf, the Little Tug dolphin tour (had a school of 8 dolphins play with us), and just relaxing at the pool or the beach, it is always a fantastic time. The staff are wonderful, and one time, Mike at the tour desk, brought a basket with wine and cheese, to bring with us on a sunset cruise on a schooner. We are returning for a short weekend in May (16th-18th) and are so…

title: disappointing...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl resort, time after time for your trips to Clearwater Beach.  This says a lot about our staff and our resort when we have guests who only choose to stay with us.  It sounds like you’ve been able to have several memorable experiences with us and I hope this continues for future stays.  It sounds like we will be seeing you again very soon!  I hope you have a safe trip back to Clearwater Beach!

title: Beyond Impressed!
review: the good... location, Michael the concierge, common areas nice. the bad.... overly expensive and in some sleazy ways.... $25 daily resort fee.  extra charge for umbrella at beach.  cannot bring lounge chairs close to water's edge.  fee for smores, etc.   when paying $900/night, one should be treated to a beach umbrella w/ a couple of graham crackers and a marshmallow.  c'mon.  constantly charging guests comes across as tacky, regardless of how nice the surroundings are. in addition, turn down service was non-existent and house keeping was spotty.  our 'gulf front' view was actually a view of the other side of the hotel w/ a bit of the ocean off to the right) I think this hotel/resort could ---- and should---- do better.

title: Slice of heaven
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I appreciate your feedback and am glad that you found Michael our Lead Concierge helpful.  He is a great asset to us.  I am sorry that you felt that your stay did not have the value for the amount of money that you paid.  You are correct in that it is definitely not an inexpensive place to stay but we do feel that we offer a unique experience and will create memories for families that will keep them coming back.  I am also sorry that your Housekeeping experience was not up to our normal standards.  We normally pride ourselves on the cleanliness of our guestrooms.  Again, thank you for the review.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay, please do not hesitate to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Stopped in for a drink, what a pleasant setting.
review: My whole family absolutely fell in love with this resort!  The location is perfect.  The private resort area on the beach is so convenient!  The pool is gorgeous.  I was truly in paradise.  Not to mention that the staff is extremely friendly, professional and accommodating.  I will certainly be staying at the Sandpearl again!

title: What a perfect little resort!
review: If you're planning to be in the Clearwater area, the only real top star option is the lovely Sandpearl. We recently spent four nights there and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. It's a small resort but perfectly sized and felt intimate. The pool area is great and very family-friendly and you are steps from a BEAUTIFUL white sand beach. They have a nice fire pit in the evenings and show kid's movies by the pool in the evenings. For the adults, they have a "Sunset Special" at the restaurant, where you can get $8 flutes of Veuve Cliquot until the sun goes down, which you will have a perfect view of. We felt like the food was very good and reasonable - don't book your breakfast with your room rate! It's actually cheaper to pay as you go. The rooms are clean and very comfortable and the…

title: Really Impressive!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at the Sandpearl and for taking the time to share your kind words.  It’s so nice to hear that you had such a top notch experience.  We are a very family friendly resort and try to carter to those families that choose to stay with us.  We make sure we have toys available at the pool, we have s’mores at night, Camp Ridley, and we top it off with a children’s movie at sunset.  It’s always great to hear how wonderful our property is but it means a lot when we receive rave reviews about our staff.  They work extremely hard and I know they appreciate the feedback.  I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

title: Nice hotel, bad food
review: The first thing that strikes you about this hotel is the size. It massive! Once inside the main entrance you hear the beautiful tone of a self playing grand piano, from this moment on it kind of stays the same standard. The rooms are perfect. Spacious  and really well equipped. The hotel is RIGHT on the beach which is huge so no worries about finding a space. The hotel has an amazing restaurant down at beach level which if you go at sunset time is an especially nice place to be. They have a fire pit on the beach which makes for beautiful sunset viewing! Only downside is we heard the people next door have sex which would sunset the walls are quite thin, bar that it's perfect!

title: Great Beach, Nice pool
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl Resort and for taking the time to write a review.  I’m glad you found our self-playing piano so charming.  The piano always draws a crowd of onlookers.   We take great pride in our resort and we do set high standards, not only for the physical property but the service provided as well.   It sounds like you had an wonderful time down by the pool, whether it was dining at Tate’s Island Grill or enjoying the beautiful sunset.   I hope to welcome you back in the future.

title: "Fell A Star Short"
review: My husband comes here for work once a year and this is my 4th time coming with him.  I love this hotel, free wifi (even by the pool area) nice spa, beds are very comfortable, super kid friendly, etc.  my only complaint is that this year the food wasn't good at all!! Maybe they have a new chef or new management but whatever it is I really hope they fix it.

title: Beautiful Resort
review: I stayed here for a short business trip and although it was business, I felt like it was a vacation.  The staff was beyond courteous and the property is gorgeous!  The beachfront is beautiful and it is located in a prime area within walking distance to shops and restaurants.  The restaurant in the hotel is excellent and the staff there was also very friendly.  Can't wait to go back!

title: robin
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I’m glad we were able to exceed your expectations for a business trip.  It’s so easy to relax once you arrive at our property.  We have some of the most spectacular views paired with luxurious amenities, which makes all of our guests feel pampered.    I’m glad to hear you were able to have a superb dinner at Caretta of the Gulf.  We will pass your kind words along to the staff.   Maybe in the future you will be able to stay for pleasure.

title: Really Nice Place
review: Wonderful resort! Beautiful-huge beach. I love the fact that I really don't need a car when staying here. There is lots to do in the area-most places have live music. Great little wine bars,and restaurants(Frenchy's next door) within walking distance. I like the fact that it is an upscale resort-yet everything about it is comfortable-and casual. From the moment you walk into the lobby-and are offered a glass of champagne-to the nightly ringing of the bell at sunset-everything about this place makes you feel relaxed and special. I usually stay in one of the suites-wonderful double vanity bathrooms, large deep soaking tub, walk in shower...and stackable washer/dryers-and a wonderful kitchen area. The staff is friendly-the food is very good-and they will serve you on the beach:)…

title: Sandpearl Resort Clearwater, Spring Break, Family Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl while visiting Clearwater Beach.  We are very fortunate to sit right along the pristine, white sandy beach and to also be surrounded by a variety of restaurants and entertainment.  Our guests tend to love our location because of this.   We pride ourselves on instilling a warm and welcoming ambience and this begins the moment you walk through our main doors.  We believe each guest should receive exceptional service throughout their stay and our staff strives to exceed all expectations.   It sounds like you thoroughly enjoyed your time in one of our suites.  Our suites are very spacious and great for families who are looking for a little more room to relax.   I look forward to welcoming you back to our resort in the future.

title: A very good high end hotel.
review: Stayed on our first vacation night with wife and 3 teenage kids.  Amazing room, spent most of our time on the beach. Every staff member friendly and polite. Can't wait to come back. Is the perfect Florida beach vacation spot.

title: Perfect Paradise!!!
review: My teenage son and I spent 5 days here in March (looking at colleges).  It was truly a perfect Paradise.The setting and amenities make it paradise, the across-the-board outstanding staff makes it perfect.  SETTING/AMENITIES/ROOMS: Clearwater Beach, on the Gulf.  (I highly recommend flying into PIE, not Tampa.) (We rented a car because college visits, but you don't need one if your goal is just to enjoy the beach.)   The hotel is gulf front.  There is a large gorgeous pool that faces the gulf.  It's beautifully landscaped and maintained, very enjoyable even when full, even at night.  There are towels and chairs and umbrellas available to you for no cost.  I recommend getting there early though b/c many people claim groups of chairs.  The rule is that you lose your spot after an…

title: Romantic getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl for your visit to Clearwater Beach.  It sounds like you truly had an amazing experience here from the moment you arrived to the moment you left.   We are very proud of our LEED Certification and we continue to play an active role in our community.   We take great pride in our property and believe we provide a unique experience for our guests.  We strive to provide exceptional customer service to each guest we meet.  I will make sure your kind words are passed along to our hardworking staff.   We appreciate you taking the time to share your review regarding our hardworking staff and our beautiful resort. I hope to see you again in the near future.

title: Beautiful resort, great family spot
review: Cannot say anything negative about this place. The food, service, rooms and atmosphere are excellent. Sitting out by the fire and  watching the sunset was awesome.. The ocean is right at there door step and the white sand on the beach is beautiful. This my second time there and will always be coming back.

title: Spring Break 2015
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing the Sandpearl for both of your trips to Clearwater!  I’m thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much that you returned for a second trip.  Each staff member takes great pride in what they do and that translates into exceptional service, which keeps our guests returning year after year.  I hope to welcome you back in the future.

title: Third Trip was not a charm, unfortunate that the attention to guests has gone downhill
review: We just arrived home from 6 days at the Sandpearl.  We had a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom Gulf front suite and I can't recommend it highly enough if you are traveling with kids.  Plenty of room to stretch out and phenomenal views of the Gulf.    While there was the normal pool chair shuffle in the AM, it wasn't difficult to get poolside chairs as long as you didn't sleep in until 10.  Beach chairs are a bit easier to come by because they are assigned when you get to the beach and cost extra (they should let you know this a check in).  The pool side and beach service were excellent.  The servers were constantly coming around.  The sunsets while dining at Tate's were gorgeous.  We left the property one day to eat at another beach side restaurant and ended up waiting over an hour for sub…

title: Wonderful family hotel
review: We returned to this hotel after our first visit 3 months ago.  Its managed very well.  Reasons for nor giving 5 star:  restaurant service is slow, pool is not large enough and room service is not very good.  But everything else is just the way its supposed to be.  Location is perfect, right in the town nearby restaurants.

title: Over rated and overpriced
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  It means a lot to us that you have chosen to stay with us on more than one occasion.  This also means we are providing quality service to our guests, which has them returning year after year.  We are very lucky to sit right along the beach and to be surrounded by many fabulous restaurants and shops.  I hope to welcome you back in the future.

title: Excellent Resort
review: Despite booking a year ahead and requesting adjoining rooms with services we were given two rooms a long way apart with side views of the carparks, the laundry loading area, rubbish bins and an overwhelming smell of cooking food. It was impossible to sit on the balconies because of the smell and the noise from the extractors.  despite the high price everything was loaded as an extra from parking, water, kids clubs, chairs, etc.  the pool was not as dipicted on the web (clever photography).  Never ever would we recommend this hotel

title: My Favorite Beach Resort!
review: Dear Guest, Thank  you for taking the time to write your review of the Sandpearl.  Please accept my apologies for not being able to accommodate your request for connecting rooms.  We do our best to accommodate all requests but during busy times it is difficult.  I do see that we were able to put you on the same floor  and 8 rooms apart.    If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great Property, Super 8 Service
review: I love almost everything about this hotel.  It has all the amenities you could want, in a fantastic location within walking distance to everything you could need.  The rooms are stunning.  We stayed in a 2 room suite, perfect for a family, though a huge splurge.  The view was fantastic.  We enjoyed the spa, in room dining, beach service, Tate Island Grill, s'mores with the family and so much more.  Our every need was covered.  My only complaint would be Caretta on the Gulf.  I know many people like it but I can't get past the pretentious nature of the restaurant.  It doesn't have the same upscale but friendly vibe as the rest of the resort.  All in all though, it is a fantastic resort we plan to visit again.

title: Beautiful Resort & Spa
review: Absolutely gorgeous resort!  While we did not stay at the resort we spent the day at the spa which was fabulous.  It has a couples area hot tub which is rare and a steam room which is a must for me. We spent the night for dinner at Carretta which had a gorgeous view of the ocean and is hands down the best of 10 or so restaurants I've been to in Clearwater while on vacation.  Even if you can't afford the high room rates it's well worth a day trip to the spa & restaurant.  Will be back for sure!

title: Great getaway!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent visit with us. I am so happy to hear you were able to enjoy a day in our award winning Spa. Our couple’s hot tub certainly is one of a kind and I believe one of the most relaxing areas of our resort. You also mentioned you spent an evening in Caretta on the Gulf for dinner. Our signature restaurant not only serves some of the best food on Clearwater Beach, but you really cannot beat the gorgeous sunset views from the balcony. We certainly appreciate the positive words and look forward to welcoming your return!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great Clearwater location and very nice rooms but beach chairs too far from water
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sandpearl from March 24 - 27 for a much needed vacation from work and cold weather. We were looking for a hotel with superior service and amenities so we could truly relax, and that is exactly what we got with the Sandpearl.  Upon checking into the hotel and leaving our car with valet, we were created at the front desk by Kristin. She was incredibly friendly and helpful with our questions, and her offer of a mimosa was exactly what I needed. When we got to our room, a Gulf Front Junior King Suite (Room 503),  the first thing we saw was a view of the gulf and it was breathtaking! The balcony had 2 rocking chairs which we used every morning and every night.  We ate lunch every day at the pool restaurant (Tate's Grill).  The pool side service is…

title: There is no better place than Sandpearl Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had such a great getaway beginning from the moment you arrived. I am especially happy to hear you were taken great care of at the Front Desk by Kristin and were able to enjoy a delicious mimosa on the way to your Gulf Front Junior Suite room. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed dining at Tate Island Grill and had excellent service from Dennis and Kenny. As you mentioned the sunsets on Clearwater Beach are certainly breathtaking and something everyone needs to see while visiting Clearwater Beach. I am very happy you were able to experience one during your time with us! We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Best in Clearwater!!
review: I went to the Sandpearl for 3 days with a friend. We just wanted to relax on the beach. The rooms were great (clean, well appointed and pleasant). There are some annoying up charges for resort fees and to rent a cabana etc.. My biggest complaint and what will keep me from coming back is the beach chair location. I like to sit in a covered chair close to the beach, but the hotel's chair options cost money and are very far from the beach (as some reviewers show.) I ended up laying by the pool instead. The wifi in the room was extremely slow if that is import an to you. Everything else about the hotel was top notch. We had the room service several times and it was great!

title: Beyond Perfection!
review: I spend a decent amount of time in hotels annually, mostly professionally but also personally, and this is my first-ever Trip Advisor review. My third stay at The Sandpearl was quite possibly the best stay I have had at a hotel, ever. It's a magical place that has a simple yet beautiful elegance. The team at this hotel is the best I have ever encountered. You can tell that it is their second home and they're so proud of the property. That energy reflects in how they welcome guests with every smile, how the rooms are maintained, how they go out of their way to accommodate even the smallest request,  how you see executive staff in suits nonchalantly picking up the smallest piece of debris on the pristine private beach area, etc. It's worth every cent, and can even be somewhat…

title: adequate
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Sandpearl for your visit to Clearwater Beach.  We also appreciate you taking the time to share your kind words.  I certainly agree with you when you say we are very proud of our property.  Every staff member at the Sandpearl strives to go above and beyond to achieve the guests needs.  We truly believe we offer a unique experience for our guests.  I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our resort.

title: Splendid Gulf coast hotel
review: this was our first time staying here. [needed something near St Petersburg, where I was meeting friends later in the week]. this was ok. the staff tried hard, they were very pleasant. if a Ritz Carlton is an A resort, and a Four Seasons is an A+ resort, the Sandpearl is a solid C.  the restaurants are mediocre; foam pillows on the beds were uncomfortable; the room décor was tedious; and charging  for beach umbrellas was annoying. the gym was small, but the Starbucks next to he gym was great. but there was a great view of the gulf outside my room; sun is great; and mediocre food in the restaurants meant it was easy to stick to my diet.

title: Wonderful Stay - Everything I expected and more
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I appreciate the feedback.  I am sorry that you felt that our resort did not live up to your expectations.  We normally get very good reviews on the items that you mentioned however in this case we fell short.  We take much pride in the comfortability of our guestrooms and beds as well as the relaxed yet elegant layout of our public space and guestroom décor.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please feel free to reach out to me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz

title: Just not worth the money
review: In a nutshell, this is my most favourite  beachside hotel I have ever stayed in.  On arrival we were greeted by the valet parking attendant and our car and luggage were swiftly dealt with.  The hotel had a clean, luxurious and tranquil feel to it.  The staff are extremely polite and helpful, couldn't do enough for us, even housekeeping were very chatty and a pleasure to talk to.   The room was decorated to the standard I would expect from a 5* resort and the beds super comfy.  Double sinks in the bathroom and the bathroom itself was spacious compared to most bathrooms in other hotels.  A good nights sleep was had by all of us. We had a gulf View room which overlooks the pool/ beach and Gulf partial view of the Pier 60.  Amazing view.  Gulf view room is an absolute must.   All…

title: Let's be real
review: If you're about to drop 2200 a night on a place don't do it here. If you're used to eating horse meat and saw dust for dinner you'll love the room service. The rooms are about as good as you're local holiday Inn. Everything is over priced. And I mean everything. Ran up a 500 dollar bill at the bar for 2 rounds of 5 drinks and a quesadilla that wasn't as good as what you're 10 year old sister would make you with a microwave... seriously. On the outside it might look clean and classy but in reality, it's dirty bro. I don't care who you are, if you're coming for spring break and chasing tail, or bringing your family for a nice getaway vacation, if you have extra $ for a "nice" hotel, don't spend your money here. And anyone that tells you its nice here and the food is good doesn't…

title: Beautiful Resort... but pricey!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Sandpearl.    To be quite honest, your review was very confusing for me.  You mentioned that you didn't like the room you were in and with the amount you stated you spent, that would put you in our premiere room, our 2 bedroom Sunset Deluxe.  This room is 1,685 square feet with views that are directly on the beach.  The room has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a full kitchen, an oversized Jacuzzi tub, 3 separate balconies and able to accommodate 8 to 10 people.  It is beautifully decorated with Florida based artwork, tile floors and marble counter tops throughout the kitchen and bathrooms.    You also mentioned the quality of our food, specifically the quesadillas.  We normally get raving reviews regarding our food quality and offerings.  Hopefully you were able to try more than just the quesadillas while you were with us.  Again, thank you for your review.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Quick trip
review: We were a family of 5 and stayed in a gulf front king bed with a sleeper sofa room/suite. The concierge was accommodating and the valet carried our bags right up to our room. Check-in was a breeze. The resort is very clean! That is so important to me! Our room was very clean with a small balcony with two rockers. It was perfect for late night cocktails or early morning cups of coffee. I am SOOO glad we paid for the gulf front room. Worth every penny. The bathroom is large with plenty of towels for my family. We have NO issues what-so-ever. Takes Island Grill has great food and the staff is very sweet and quick! You do get 2 chairs on the beach, but pay extra for an umbrella. Thats weird- but not a deal breaker. We paid $839 per night for 4 nights. While I would not say the…

title: Lovely property on a pristine beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you had such a wonderful stay from the moment you arrived. I am also happy to hear you enjoyed the layout and view of your Junior Suite. Our Gulf Front Junior Suites do offer a breath taking views of the Gulf of Mexico, and the balcony certainly makes it relaxing for an evening cocktail or a morning coffee. Here at the Sandpearl Resort we do have plenty of amenities not just for adults but for kids as well. I am very glad your children were able to indulge in our games and activities around the pool and beach area. We appreciate the positive words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic resort! Luxurious and family friendly
review: Beautiful resort, room, food and drinks right in the Gulf. White sand , great drinks served to your beach chair. Centrally located to pier, restaurants, shops. Plenty to do or just sit back. Private parking, Starbucks coffee, champaign upon reception.

title: Very nice but little extra charges annoying
review: This is a very nice hotel as one would expect for the price.  First the goods: The food and spa were great. The maid service/porters/concierge were great. The room was nicely appointed. The beach is very wide and beautiful.  The resort is incredibly decorated.  The not so nice: $30 to rent a beach umbrella and chairs in addition to the resort fee and $500-$600 a night to stay?  The pool is beautiful but shallow, 3.5 feet deep for most of it, 5 ft deep at one spot at the drain.  Many, many kids at the pool yelling and screaming and just being kids.  If you are looking for peace and quiet you'll have to go out to the beach.

title: Perfect!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and our housekeepers, concierge and bellmen team provided you with excellent service throughout your visit. In your review you mentioned that you felt our pool was too shallow and loud during the day. As we are a family friendly resort, we do have many families and children that stay with us during the months of Spring Break. We certainly want all of our guests to feel relaxed while lounging by the pool, and I do apologize you were unable to feel that way. We do have our Security team located throughout the pool deck to ensure a safe and fun environment for all. Thank you again for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Good, not superb
review: My husband and I absolutely loved teverything about this hotel.  The room, decor, atmosphere, pool, beach(you can walk for miles and the beach was very clean!), fire pit, and restaurants were simply perfect!  The staff was very friendly and accommodating; once you were at the hotel you did not need a car--you can walk to all the restaurants and shops-they were all within a block or two of the hotel.  The hotel was very clean.  The restaurant by the pool had great food--the best blackened fish sandwich in the area!  We also had heavy appetizers at the main restaurant which were excellent.  We travel quite a bit all over the world so we are picky about our hotels--Sandpearl was a perfect 10 for us!  We cannot wait to go back-especially loved sunset by the firepit on the beach with…

title: Clearwater gem
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you had such an excellent stay with us from the décor, pool, fire pits and restaurants. Our pool and beach restaurant, Tate Island Grill, not only has some of the best grouper sandwiches, but also offers the perfect spot to watch a beautiful Clearwater Beach sunset! In your review you mentioned the location of our property. We are very lucky to be located in the heart of Clearwater Beach with so many great restaurants and shops all within walking distance. We thank you again for the positive words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Hotel seems to have gone downhill for a "luxury" hotel.
review: This resort has great beach front property and nice rooms.  But it lacks in restaurants.  Needs more variety.  The small things count.  The coffee maker in our room was full of black flecks that defied attempts to rinse it clean. And our safe was inoperable.  The room was freezing when we arrived, and when we adjusted it to keep the sleeping area comfortable the bathroom remained freezing. A vent blew directly in the bathroom and no matter how high we adjusted the temp of the room we froze in the bath area.  Also, the hotel has cards saying they are green and will only launder towels left on the floor; but every time we hung our bath towels on the hooks to reuse, they were taken.  But the beds are very comfortable and the staff is very welcoming and helpful.  The pool is very…

title: Loved this resort!
review: The hotel has a perfect location with the beach right out the back door.  The pool is amazing as well.  The rooms are very nice, and the staff is wonderful.  There are restaurants and bars all within an easy walk, but the hotel restaurants are great, too.  It's definitely a place I will return!

title: Perfect place for family or girlfriend beach getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at the Sandpearl and for sharing your kind words.  We are situated along the beautiful Clearwater Beach and we are surrounded by many interesting restaurants and store fronts.  We take great pride in our resort and want each guest to have a wonderful experience.  I hope to see you in the future.

title: Hotel had a fantastic position on the beach
review: Although by no means a "boutique" hotel (do those exist in downtown Clearwater?), the Sandpearl does a great job of making the hotel feel charming and intimate, with all the luxuries of a big hotel.  Think full amenity spa; great pool; comfortable pool chairs, charming outside grill for lunch or drinks; 2 whirlpools; easy access to the pristine beach; beach lounge couches; attentive staff; outstanding restaurant. The location also cannot be beat -- a few hundred feet down from the pier and beautiful white sand as far as the eye can see.  If you are a runner like me, the beach is ideal.  While there were lots of families there, we were there for a girls getaway and the place was great.  We had the Presidential Suite and it was awesome!  Highly recommend it for a splurge.  The…

title: Despite a little hiccup a great place to stay. I'd come back.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at the Sandpearl and for taking the time to write a review.  We are very fortunate to sit along the beautiful and pristine Clearwater Beach.  We want all of our guests to feel like they are at home and that truly begins in our lobby and that same warm and inviting ambience continues throughout the resort.  I’m delighted to hear you had such a wonderful time visiting us that you plan on staying with us again! See you in the future!

title: WoW!!!!
review: The Sand Pearl is an unique luxury hotel. The location of the hotel is perfect.  Excellent restaurants, bars and shopping were just steps down the street and the beautiful beach was right out the back door.

title: gorgeous resort
review: My husband and I had a fabulous time at the SandPearl in January 2015.   The resort itself is very stylish, clean, spacious and inviting.  The rooms are also lovely; we were upgraded to a large room with very high ceilings, a sitting area and a balcony.   The common areas are also luxurious with many comfortable sitting areas, overlooking an infinity pool (for decor only) and the pool area and beyond that, the beach and ocean.  The pool area is gorgeous and clean, with two hot tubs, comfortable chairs, food/drink service, etc.  We spent many hours there and it was heavenly.  The beach beyond the hotel is also gorgeous and there are chairs/umbrellas there as well.  There is also a fire pit surrounded by Adirondack chairs which is a nice place to watch the gorgeous sunset.  The…

title: Great beach stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at the Sandpearl and for taking the time to write a review.  We pride ourselves on instilling a warm and welcoming ambience.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your time around our private pool area and were able to take in our beautiful sunsets while cozying up around our fire pit.   Caretta on Gulf does a fabulous job with their menu and I’m delighted you were able to indulge in our nicely appointed Sunday Brunch.   I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future!

title: Week of holidays
review: I stayed at the Sandpearl Resort for my sister's wedding in February 2015. The hotel is beautiful, clean, and has a very friendly staff. They started my visit off right with a complimentary mimosa. :) Since we were there for a wedding, the bridal party rented a cabana at the pool- so much fun! We also used the hotel bar one evening and enjoyed drinks on the patio by their fireplaces.   The hotel room had all the normal stuff, just done to a much higher quality. The finishes were elegant and high end. Beds were so comfortable and they had very nice cribs for children.   If you are there for an event or looking for an event location I would highly recommend the Sandpearl. The outdoor and indoor locations all had great views and were perfect for entertaining a crowd. The only…

title: Amazing
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your kind words.  I am delighted to hear that your sister chose the Sandpearl as her wedding venue.  It sounds like you were able to fully take advantage of our poolside amenities and restaurant, Tate Island Grill.  We have a spectacular Sales and Catering team, who produce wonderful events.  We certainly do appreciate your kind words regarding our resort.   I hope to see you again in the future.

title: 5 ways the Sandpearl is slipping
review: This is the first time we have been to Clearwater Florida and we were very happy with our choice to stay at this hotel. Definatly worth the money to spend staying on the water view side. Staff our awesome and even though the weather was unusually cool while we were here the beach was amazing to run on every day. Such a great location and so easy to travel around to see other places with a car. Spa services were a bit pricey but nicely appointed. For hotel gyms it was pretty good, enough to make a workout out of and open all the time. Breakfast buffet was the best we have ever been to in all our travels around the world. Thank you Sandpearl we will look forward to coming back to your new hotel you are building near by.

title: Worth every penny!
review: My wife and I brought our daughter here for a 4 day stay in December.  We were upgraded to a gulf view King bed junior suite.  The room was amazing.  The hotel was clean and nicely appointed.  The staff was very knowledgable and polite.  My wife and I used the spa for a massage and it was fantastic.  They have a co ed hot tub off the private locker rooms and we really enjoyed spending time in there after our massages. Carretta's on the Gulf was great.  We were concerned that they had only 1 formal restaurant but the menu was so diverse that we tried something new everyday. Tate's by the gulf was the perfect beach/pool front dining option.  They guys from the bar brought the beers and food right to the beach! I would suggest you wait till the hotel offers a online special.  If…

title: Only Average
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your family getaway.  It sounds like you had a very enjoyable experience.
