I’m glad you were able to take some personal time by indulging in our award winning spa.  I’m delighted to hear you were able to enjoy several delicious meals right here on our property.  I’m thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful time and that you already planned a future stay.  I hope you continue to return year after year.

title: Unexpected Treasure!
review: Stayed here for 6 days and it was ok. I had a bay side room which overlooked the front of the hotel. Not really a view but the sun rise was lovely to see. I just feel that the hotel was a bit tired overall. When I arrived the fridge was not in a good order so I advised the front desk and they did fix it 2 days later. Behind the cupboard was really quite dirty and despite advising the front desk nothing was done about it during my stay. Not a major problem with where it was but it would have been nice if it had been sorted. The soap dish in the bathroom was peeling and the towel rail had 2 long screws sticking out which just shows a lack of attention to detail I think. The room wasn't serviced on day one of my stay and I'm not quite sure why. When I did have it serviced the…

title: Our Happy Place
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  Thank you for staying with us.  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed the morning view, breakfast and our great location.    Please accept my sincere apology for the condition of your room from both a Housekeeping and Engineering perspective.  We take great pride in keeping our resort clean and well maintained and it appears that we have many opportunities in the room that you stayed in.  I am very sorry.  If you would like to contact me at the resort to review your stay, please feel free to do so.  Again, thank you for staying with us.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Sandpearl Hotel is hidden treasurer
review: Traveled here for business and was pleasantly surprised with this mini resort!  It's not a part of any of the big hotel chains, but the attention to details and their environmental mission really impressed me.  The hotel sits on a perfect beach front location  and is a short stroll from great local restaurants.  My room was ocean front and the view from my balcony was amazing.  The decor was updated beautifully and had a very comfortable bed.  The large soaking tub in the bathroom had shutters that could be opened to enjoy a view into the living space.  I was very impressed with the friendly service and mimosa at check in.  They did everything to make you feel like you were at a 5 star.  The pool area was lovely and the beach firepits are a really nice touch!  I was able to…

title: Top Shelf
review: Top Quality Resort, from the time of check in to experiencing all Sand Pearl had to offer, Top Shelf. Return visit is in order. Price may reference experience. But I have to say above a 5 star or Top Shelf. Close to all the area has to offer: Beach, Pier and very nice Restaurants

title: Fantastic
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had a top shelf stay beginning from the moment you checked in. We praise ourselves on serving our guests to the best of our ability and I am glad to hear that is how you felt. Your positive feedback truly means a lot to us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Luxury - great location
review: Pricey, but a great place.  Great pool, beach....  We went here for a week and it was our favorite place to vacation.  We have two teenage boys and they were able to just walk around town on their own because of the location.  You can't help but kick back and relax here.

title: Unbeatable place to relax
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is great to hear your family was truly able to relax and unwind during your weeklong vacation at the Sandpearl Resort. The location of our resort is prime due to the many things to do and see just within walking distance. I am also happy to hear you enjoyed our pool and beach area as that is the best place to watch the beautiful sunset or have a delicious meal at Tate Island Grill. We certainly appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to welcoming your return!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: First but not last
review: Lovely hotel, located on the beautiful beach. Just bring your wallet and expect to pay big! We had 3 milk shakes in the beach bar, the bill came to 56 dollars!!! Everything though is very nice. Good service all around. The rooms are excellent and very comfortable.

title: Very Nice
review: Really enjoyed my stay.  The junior suites are worth the upgrade and loved the view of the white sand beaches from the upper floors.  The food is amazing, must try the sushi.  The decor is lovely.  The service was very good.  I will most certainly stay here again on my next trip to this area.

title: True Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your upgrade to one of our Gulf Front Junior Suites. Our Junior Suites offer breathtaking views of the Gulf of Mexico and are slightly larger than our traditional rooms which let our guests feel a little more at home. Caretta on the Gulf is our wonderful signature restaurant offering delicious array of food from American favorites to Seafood and Sushi. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great Hotel
review: We have traveled to Clearwater Beach for business many times a year for the last several years and usually stay at the Hilton. On those many occasions we have ventured up the to the Sandpearl Resort for a wonderfully relaxing spa service.  The valet team does an excellent job of setting the tone for Sandpearl. They are professional, competent and efficient...but friendly. Somehow they manage to exude a more relaxed confidence than rushed mayhem we often encounter.  The coffee shop and restaurants have excellent food and staff. We ate and drank very well. Catered meals were well planned and timing seemed effortless for serving beautiful, appropriately hot/cold dishes.  My only real negative for the entire experience was that coffee seemed to be a hit or miss. The coffee in the…

title: First-rate hotel on a beautiful beach!
review: Dear Guest, First I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We do have an excellent valet staff, who works extremely hard and I know they will greatly appreciate your kind words.   I’m sorry to hear that Marketplace seemed a little understaffed in the morning and your concern has been noted by management.  As you know, everyone needs their first cup of coffee in the morning, and I’m glad to hear we were able to give you your coffee fix with a smile.   I’m glad you were able to steal a moment away from your business trip to enjoy our picture perfect sunset.  I hope to see you in the future on a non-business related vacation!

title: Beautiful Hotel...Service Mostly Hits with a Few Major Misses
review: Hotel was on the beach. The beach is beautiful. Hotel was pristine. Front desk was efficient. Staff was very polite and attentive.They acknowledged you walking down the halls. My room was nice but small. The Wifi was free and worked intermittently. Had an ocean view with a large balcony. The restaurant on the beach had a limited menu as the kitchen was under construction - had a really good burger. Had live music Saturday at the Bar. Nice lobby for sitting around with a Starbucks.

title: Amazing Christmas stay!
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for 4 nights as part of our honeymoon, over Christmas. We loved the hotel and the beach location was amazing! We ate in the restaurant on Christmas day and the buffet was incredible...every type of food you could wish for and very high quality. We enjoyed lazy days by the pool and the poolside bar/food service was fantastic. The sunsets were beautiful! Our room was gorgeous and there were lovely touches every day...from chocolate coated strawberries and a congratulations card on arrival, to the lovely Sandpearl bauble on Christmas eve! We didn't eat breakfast at the hotel but would definitely recommend the Clearsky café next door (also had an excellent evening meal here) and the Beach Shanty down the road. One small area for improvement: would have…

title: Amazing hotel for a perfect family holiday
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had a wonderful honeymoon with lasting memories from the moment you arrived. Our Christmas buffet certainly offers a variety of delicious food and great entertainment. I am happy you enjoyed your gorgeous room and chocolate covered strawberries. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Hugely Disappointed
review: We have just returned from a family holiday at Sandpearl to get away from the cold British winter.  I have to say I loved this hotel we felt really well looked after throughout our entire visit.  The team that work here are what makes the hotel so special and what would make us want to return.  The guy on reception was so lovely when we checked in. He upgraded our room to give us more room for our 18month old son and also gave us a bucket and spade which our son made lots of use of on the beach. My husband and I loved the champagne too!  The housekeeping team were fantastic always keeping us well stocked of English Tea, water and toiletries and were always so friendly.  The girl in Starbucks was fantastic and gave our son a hug when we left which was so sweet!  And finally the…

title: Best Hotel Evvveeeerr!!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for staying at the Sandpearl and taking the time to write a review.  I am delighted to hear that you were able to warm up in the sunshine while relaxing at our resort.  Our team works extremely hard to make sure every guest has a memorable experience.  It sounds like you and your husband were able to truly enjoy our world class spa.  I want to thank you again for staying with us and I hope you visit again in the future!

title: Wonderful
review: I've stayed in places from Motel 6 to the Ritz-Carlton and everything in between and I have to say, this resort is a complete mess.  Not only are the prices out of control, this hotel needs new management.  First when I booked my stay, they were offering a promotion. I needed to move the dates and asked if they could honor the promotion for the new dates and they refused. So I kept my original booking because the difference in the rates was ridiculous.  A week later I went on the web site and saw they were now offering the same promotion as my original booking. (A little annoyed because they could have made the adjustment on my booking but chose not to when now it is offered.)  I cancelled my original booking and rebooked what I needed. (I don't feel it is good Customer Service…

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Stayed at the Sandpearl Resort for 2 nights and loved it, it's a beautiful, clean hotel in a great location, situated right on the beach. There was 1 negative, we were out all day and came back to our not-cleaned room, when I went downstairs to let Reception know, they did recitify this by dropping 1 day of the resort fee. I highly recommend staying at the Sandpearl &I would definitely go back!

title: First class resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear you had a wonderful stay with us. We are grateful to be located in the heart of beautiful Clearwater Beach with plenty of great restaurants and shops within walking distance. I do apologize for the inconvenience of your room not being serviced for one of the days of your stay; however I am happy to hear we were able to rectify the situation. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice hotel, but the 1 star is for the room, booked through Virgin holidays
review: A recent business trip to Orlando gave us a reason to venture to the Gulf coast side of Florida for a few days prior. Sandpearl was chosen based on Trip Advisor recommendations....and once again, Trip Advisor reviewers paint a very accurate picture of what you can expect. My wife and I enjoyed our stay here thoroughly. Yes, the cost is high. Yes, the resort fee is unnecessary $25 per day. You'll find the same complaints at almost every high end resort in America. But.....Sandpearl truly delivers on a five star stay. The room (Jr Suite Gulf Front) was well appointed, immaculate, spacious, and offered an incredible view of the beach front. The bathroom offered a walk in shower and a roman tub. Two Flat screen TV's adorned the sitting area and bedroom. A small walkout area allowed…

title: Great service-a little dated decor
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you were able to venture over to the Sandpearl Resort while you were in Florida for business. We are proud to provide five star service to our guests and I am happy to hear that it exactly what you received. Our Gulf Front Junior Suites are very spacious, as you had described, and certainly offer breathtaking views of the Gulf of Mexico. We want our guests to feel truly relaxed and at home while they are staying with us and I am glad that is how you felt with the champagne, mimosas and our beach service. We certainly appreciate the positive words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great Stay
review: Great hotel, great amenities, some staff great too, BUT!    What is a bay view? We wanted to overlook the lights of the bay, not the night blackness of the gulf,  well, shown to the room, instant dislike, terrible decor, (one mans meat, etc etc, dark is the word here,  any hotel you have to have the light on during the day, needs brightening up) Anyway, the view of the bay, Hmm, well, lean out of the balcony, tilt over, look hard left, and there it is,  our actual main view was a horrid flat roof, and a tower block, not what i expected, or paid for,  i complained, the staff did their best, i was offered a gulf room--for an extra $220 a night 😳,  so, we stayed in the dark pit,    Would i stay here again?     No, ive stopped in better, for not as much money,     The 1 star is for…

title: Very Very Nice Hotel  - would stay again
review: The Sandpearl is a lovely property on a beautiful stretch of beach with great restaurants and very good service in Clearwater. We went as a family for 5 days over the holidays and could not get into the Don Ceasar in St. Pete so we tried this hotel. It did not disappoint. It is an upscale but laid back feel with beautiful facilities and had a beautiful pool and beach with chairs already laid out to sit in - and we were not charged for the beach loungers (which is great - they do charge at the Don) - but they do charge for the umbrella at The Sandpearl (which I find so annoying after traveling to so many resorts that would not dream of charging you for this, what's next, charging for towels?) but we did not want the umbrella since we wanted sun and heat being from Boston. Drinks…

title: Thank you
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at the Sandpearl and I appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  I am delighted to hear that you spent the Holiday’s with us!  As you know we had many activities for families and couples alike.  I’m glad to hear you plan on staying with us again.  We work extremely hard to keep our resort looking immaculate and we are dedicated to accommodating our guest’s needs. I hope you choose to stay with us in the future.

title: Thank You again, Sandpearl!
review: I visited the Sandpearl Resort on Clearwater Beach, Florida over the New Year for 2015.  The property was beautiful and I had a standard "bay view" room, which overlooked the front entrance.  The room was clean and nice.  We then "upgraded" rooms in order to have a balcony.  We were moved to a room which did have a balcony, and a partial ocean view but I felt the room itself needed some TLC.  Most of the fixtures in the bathroom were wiggly/broken and the WiFi did not work half the time.  The main restaurant was fabulous - great food and great staff.  Thumbs up for that.  The island grill on the beach was a nice place to grab food/drinks, however it would have been nice if they stayed open later than 10:00 PM to enjoy a few late night cocktails by the firepit.  The spa at the…

title: Great stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at the Sandpearl and taking the time to write a review.  I’m delighted to hear you were able to ring in the New Year with us!  Unfortunately it sounds like you were not informed of our New Year’s Celebration.  I do apologize that you were directed off our property to ring in the New Year.  I will also inform the engineering department of your concerns with the fixtures in your room.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your meals at both our restaurants, Caretta on the Gulf and Tate Island Grill.  I hope to see you again in the future.

title: Next time I think I'll try the Hyatt
review: I visit Clearwater beach semi-annually and have stayed at all the properties along the strip over the years.  Each time I am able to stay at the Sandpearl its an extra special treat.  I recently stayed in mid-December and once again i was not disappointed.  Its the little touches that make this property so spectacular:  - Beautifully decorated Christmas tree and other decor in the lobby.  Pianist playing Christmas music. - Christmas cookies and hot chocolate - complimentary  - The picture perfect view from our Gulf Front King Suite - HIGHLY Recommended.  I believe it was room 623? - Customer services from pool attendants, front desk staff, concierge, bell hops, valets, etc. - Food at the Tate  - high quality beach towels, pool chairs, beach cabanas, etc. - zero entry pool - my…

title: Beautiful but Needs Serious Customer Service Help
review: I chose to say average as this hotel is beautiful but is very high cost and the service simply was not good. I PREFER high end hotels and this hotel is definitely high end and beautiful. The beach is incredible and the room was nice (we had a one bedroom suite). We were there four nights and were unable to get a solid experience in regards to customer service in the entire hotel.   The guy that checked us in was not wearing a name badge and was quite short with us. We thought that was strange for someone that had a suite and was staying four days. I am aware that they were sold out so maybe they were understaffed and just unhappy, not sure but no excuse.  The concierge then insulted my wife and then later called her my daughter (should I be offended or grateful lol).   Twice I…

title: Disappointing -needs upgrades and watch your bill
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you enjoyed the beach and the beauty of the resort but I am sorry for the Customer Service issues that you experienced.  Our service is normally one of the reasons that people return time after time and it appears that we failed this time.  Please accept my apologies for these issues.  I will speak with the Front Office Manager regarding your feedback.  Again, thank you for taking the time.  If you would like to speak regarding these issues please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: 3rd visit to the Sandpearl
review: I really wanted to like the Sandpearl - it was a trip without kids and a real treat for us but we were really disappointed.  It is a beautiful beach and beautiful pool but given the cost and issues we confronted, I'd recommend looking elsewhere. I would not stay here again and would not recommend it.    Room - We booked a Coastal view room and it's not worth it -- we largely saw a parking lot and building tops from the 6th floor -- suggest either booking the bay view (least expensive room) or go for a gulf view/gulf front room.  We asked about moving rooms and it was New Years so booked - totally understandable. We did move to an upgrade the next day but it was a significant upcharge (we joined Opal for the option of an upgrade but at check out they said the upgrade was too many…

title: Quality Destination- Great Location
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent trip stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I am very sorry for the issues you experienced. Your stay with us should have been much better and memorable and for that I am truly sorry.  In your review you mentioned a couple of concerns with your guestroom.  Again, my apologies.  If you find it appropriate, I would appreciate it if you could contact me at the resort so that I can get some more information from you so that we can correct the issues in that room.  We take much pride in our resort and the items that you mentioned are not acceptable.  I also apologize for the issue with your shoes.  I would like to make that right with you.  Again, I would appreciate if you could contact me at the resort so that we could speak in person and I could correct the issues.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Upscale Resort with Great Staff
review: Dear all  Again for the third time we have had a great stay over the very busy Christmas period and the Hotel did a good job.  I feel the hotel is now getting a little tired and in MY opinion could do with some updating all around. Our room was looking tired even so very comfortable, the restaurants again in MY opinion could be updated and have the menus changed from my 3 visits specially the kids menus. I guess because we know Clearwater well and the kids are bored of the menu we went out rather than eat at the hotel. BUT the food is good and the service was very good as well.  Unfortunately there were a large bunch of guests that were not the nicest to be with and were rude to the staff, I expect the hotel know the group and will not be inviting them back I hope.  The…

title: Great place to be
review: Awsome place to break away and relax! They make sure you are taken care of! Good food and great drinks! I''m sure you won't regret! Kids have a fantastic time! Couples, family and teens love it! You can go for one day, one week or two, there is always something new to do or see!

title: One of my favorites
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. From the pool and beach area to Tate Island Grill and Caretta on the Gulf, it is wonderful to hear you had such a fantastic stay with us. Here at the Sandpearl Resort we strive to provide excellent service to all of our guests, and I am happy to hear that is how you felt throughout your visit. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: well worth a stay at this hotel
review: This place is wonderful.....the service is impeccable......food very good......beach, hotel pool,all very good and good for kids......4th time I've stayed here and plan to return.........for us it's one of our staples

title: 5 STAR + in every way!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear the service was impeccable and you enjoyed the food in our restaurants. Our resort, especially our pool and beach area, is a relaxing atmosphere for all ages and offers many amenities for kids and adults. We certainly appreciate your loyalty to us at the Sandpearl Resort and look forward to welcoming you back for your fifth stay!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: A Classy Place.
review: We had a girl's weekend and found a great deal on rooms here.  We were visiting off season so the hotel was not full.  This is a beautiful hotel which exceeded our expectations.   The rooms were large, even the basic ones.  Very clean and new (renovated?).  Huge bathroom.  Our room had a balcony but it was chilly so we didn't use it.  It looked small and just enough for two chairs.  This felt like a 4.5 star hotel, the lobby was grand and very well maintained.  Service was A+.    I subtracted a rating due to cost of wi-fi a hefty daily resort fee.  The rooms itself or very reasonable but when you add in the other two items, it can be a bit costly.  The bar at the pool was fun, they served drinks quickly.  The food was average but meet expectations.  The beach is a standout.  The…

title: I've given it a very good, because it doesn't deserve an average, but......
review: My wife and I arrived at the Sandpearl on Monday 24th November. Despite having an Iprefer card, we were told it was not possible to be upgraded until Sunday, and only to a similar room with a better view. Considering they were aware that this was a special birthday treat (I had mentioned it to Virgin and at check-in) for my wife, they could have made a bit of an effort. We weren’t even offered a drink. We declined the room change as for 3 days it wouldn’t have been worth it and when we got to the room discovered that it wouldn’t have been hard to provide us with a better view as we overlooked garbage cans and a noisy smelly extractor fan (I have posted pictures of these)!  At no point during the day did we get any direct sunlight on the balcony either. Through Virgin we had…

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for staying at the Sandpearl.  I am sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your room accommodations.  I do apologize that we did not have an upgrade available, we do try our best to acknowledge all special occasions.  I am delighted to hear that all the staff members you encountered were friendly.  We have some of the best employees here at the Sandpearl and their customer service plays a major part on why so many guests return to our resort.  It also sounds like you were able to enjoy the many tastes and sounds that Clearwater Beach has to offer.  I do hope we have a chance to welcome you back!

title: By Far the BEST experience EVER
review: We chose the sandpearl because it looked fantastic and it really did deliver.  The hotel itself is well equipped, the room we had was really spacious and a great balcony and the pool and beach were great facilities. The staff were fantastic and looked after us really well!  Whilst there were families there as well as couples, the hotel wasn't too chaotic, there was a great atmosphere and we loved our 10 days in Clearwater!

title: Great, relaxing beach vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you had a fantastic stay and the room you booked was spacious and enjoyable. One of the things I personally love about the Sandpearl is that it caters to all types of travelers, whether it may be families or a couple, business or pleasure. We certainly appreciate the positive words and look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: GRATITUDE TO THE SANDPEARL FOR THE SERENDIPITOUS UPGRADE
review: From the minute that you pull up and the Valet opens the door for you, to the smooth check-in with Shelley, and the complimentary Mimosa (choice of champagne or mimosa) served by LaTesha, to the incredible room, and spectacular view, and EVERTHING in between, this hotel knows how to make your stay at the hotel an experience that is by far the BEST! Everything was perfect! The food was delicious. The servers were discreet, and always knew when to clear and serve, My husband and I were honored to stay for two nights for my husband's company Christmas party and this visit was just as good if not better than last year. We are going to make sure that any relatives that want to visit stay at this awesome hotel. I have ONLY positive things to say and great memories. Thank you to…

title: Perfection
review: The Sandpearl is a lovely hotel - exquisite in the manner of the Broadmoor.  Staff is very friendly and professional; rooms are beautifully appointed, spacious, and comfortable with wonderful views; layout is thoughtful; and the location is perfect.  It is the only hotel that is directly on the beach, vs. across the street.  It is a premium, first class hotel.  Although the parking is valet only and is pricey, the staff is professional and courteous.  This is well worth the money.  The only complaint is that the bathrooms lack towel racks on which to hang wet bathroom towels to dry.  There are two small hooks on either side of the tub but they do not hold towels well.  The hotel encourages re-use of linens to be "green" yet by not offering towel racks, the towels cannot be…

title: PARADISE
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for staying at the Sandpearl.  I’m delighted to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful spacious accommodations, as well as our hardworking staff.  I’m glad you mentioned that our resort sits on our private beach which is serviced by our poolside restaurant Tate Island Grill.  I hope you return in the future.

title: THE BEST HOTEL IN CLEARWATER BEACH!
review: Had a superb 5 nights here to celebrate a family birthday. Great room and the facilities are superb. If I have one complaint it is that I could not use the steam room without booking a massage for which I was quoted $115 for 50 minutes. I really didn't want the massage just the steam but no, they wouldn't let me in. Boo. Spoiled a great time.

title: Gem Found on Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  We are honored you chose the Sandpearl Resort to celebrate a special family occasion. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your room accommodations as well as the facilities on property. Due to our limited space we do reserve our Spa amenities for guests who have appointments for the day. I do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused during your stay. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!   Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Lovely!!
review: This is by far the nicest hotel in clearwater beach. The rooms are very clean, the grounds, pool, gym and beach are also very clean! The staff is so incredibly nice and helpful! The rooms were truly amazing we had a kitchen suit with balconies! No words can truly describe how beautiful it was. I would recommend this hotel to everyone! This is in my top 3 favourite hotels. Truly an amazing place!

title: Great Beachside Resort
review: We were looking for a nice resort where the beach was the focus.  all we wanted was 4 days of sun and swimming.  We needed to get away and not have to do anything but relax and read.  This was a great resort!  Our first day was fabulous!  Lunch by the beach, a few hours in the pool then we headed to lounge chairs on the beach to get the late afternoon sun!  Drinks by a wonderful sunset and then a short walk for dinner.  Fabulous!   We got a ocean front room with a great view.  The amenities are very nice and so are the rooms.  Ocean front they only had 2 Queen rooms and we would have had to upgrade to a suite for a king.  We had a very good rate going off season, it is very pricey in season.  We walked along the beach and looked into other hotels.  This was by far the nicest! We…

title: Very Expensive, But, Beautiful
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. From a delicious lunch at Tate Island Grill to enjoying the beach and pool area, it truly sounds like you had quite the relaxing vacation! Our ocean front rooms offer gorgeous direct views of the Gulf of Mexico and I am very happy to hear you were able to experience it. One of the many perks of our location is that we are in the heart of Clearwater Beach, and with so many great options for restaurants and shopping you never have to leave the island. Again we thank you for the kind words and look forward to welcoming your return!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great View, Peaceful Too
review: We did not stay at this hotel, but, attended 2 days of wedding activities. The food and service left something to be desired.  Not up to the standard one should expect at such a pricey resort. The layout for the cocktail hour was not at all functional.  Trays of food came out at the very end of a very long and crowded hallway full of people.  The trays never made it half way down the hall, consequently, half the people never saw food, with the exception of the sushi bar located in the middle of the hall.   The main event was lovely, but, again, the food was only fair.

title: Best in Clearwater with a couple hiccups
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of your recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort.  While you did not stay at the resort, you did attend a banquet function that was held here.  Please accept my apology that you were not pleased with the event.  I will share your comments with the Catering Team.    If you get the chance to actually spend the night with us I am confident that your review would be much higher.  Hopefully you get that chance.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel, extra costs annoying
review: We had a lovely room facing the gulf  with beautiful views. The pool was huge and had plenty of seating. The staff was all very courteous and friendly. The site was very quiet and calm. A great place to relax.

title: On a wide white sandy beach
review: Sandpearl Resort sits right on a white sandy beach. The beach in front of the resort is wide with plenty of room for fun. Our room faced the gulf and had two queens and a pull-out sofa bed, a glassed-in shower and a bathtub.  Would like to give a special shout-out to "Young" (yes that's her first name) at the check-in desk. She was extremely pleasant and happy and made us smile after a long flight. Nice job and thank you to her.  They did room service twice daily. The good is good but not great, and there are plenty of restaurants within walking distance.   The ladies in our family had pedicures at the spa and rated them well.  FYI: Valet parking only. $20 per day.

title: Nice but hidden costs....
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. We are very fortunate to be located on such a beautiful beach and be surrounded by great local restaurants and shops. I am very happy to hear that Young made your check in experience memorable and even after a long day of traveling she made you smile. Our Spa is the best way to wind down and it is wonderful the ladies in your family were able to enjoy it together. Thank you again for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Affordable 'Ritz' Experience - a Gem on Clearwater Beach
review: Clean hotel with wonderfully polite staff. Rooms good with a comfy bed and great views. Gym is ridiculously bad. If you train at all then avoid, it has no free weights apart from a small light stack and a few machine weights. I joined a Gym over the road for 30 dollars for the week. Soooo much better.   Valet parking 20 dollars per day! Resort fee 25 dollars per day! For a free newspaper, coffee in room and use of the gym. I don't use any of then anyhow!   Would we come back to hotel.......No.

title: Fantastic!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you thought our hotel was clean and our staff was polite. Our views from all areas of the hotel are truly remarkable. My favorite view, for a Clearwater Beach sunset, is by our bonfire on our beach area! I do apologize our gym was not up to your standard. We are always looking for ways to enhance our guests stay and I will look into how we can update our gym facilities to include equipment meant for training. We greatly appreciate the feedback and hope you will give us another chance in the future.  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Had promise but...
review: When our family visits my parents in the Clearwater area my wife and I sometimes sneak away for a daycation at one of the nicer hotels in Tampa Sarasota, or Clearwater Beach. This is the first time we stayed at the Sandpearl Resort (an Opal property), and we were very impressed. The property is 6 years old on the old site of the Clearwater Beach Hotel (not to be confused with the "motel"). Having stayed at a couple other hotels on Clearwater Beach, including the Hayatt, we found the Sandpearl to be the most refined without being pretentious. The location on the north beach is away from the crowds and the building design and layout feels intimate and convenient.   We arrived early in the day, so I relaxed in the lobby while my wife went to the spa. The lobby was large with…

title: Very nice Hotel but just short of excellent
review: I would reiterate the numerous comments about this Hotel with regards the quality of the interior, the excellent spacious and comfortable rooms and not least it's grounds and location. The hotel staff were friendly bar none and overall I would recommend the hotel resort to others and would return there myself. You may have guessed that there is a caveat to this and there is. The room we booked was an "Ocean view" and this raised our expectation that we would enjoy great views over the beach and the ocean. The room was located on the opposite side of the hotel from the entrance to the hotel garage looking up the beach and yes we could see the ocean. The issue was that in the forground we overlooked the hotel garbage bins and some disused land that had various detritus left on it…

title: Ask before you book an event
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted you enjoyed your week long stay and the quality of the hotel was up to your liking. Based on your description of the location of your room, it seems you have booked one of our Coastal View rooms. Our Gulf View and Gulf Front rooms are our partial or direct facing views of the Gulf of Mexico, and are away from Mandalay Avenue. Next time you are planning you trip to Clearwater Beach, be sure to contact me directly so I may assist in booking your reservation. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: The best hotel ever
review: Staff was friendly, restaurants and catering were wonderful, gym is nice and clean, the pool is beautiful, the rooms are large and comfortable.  I enjoyed our stay but my impression is that the staff just had too much on their plate while we were there.  With one conference and 7 weddings in one weekend, it is no wonder. There were times when the restrooms hadn't been cleaned from the night before, the noise was high at night, etc.  It wasn't a deal breaker but I would certainly ask what else is booked or what the maximum bookings are if you are planning an event (particularly if you are the type that wants the details to be perfect just for you).

title: Wow
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay as well as the amenities we have to offer from our restaurants to our pool and gym facilities. I am very sorry for the presentation of our restrooms and the noise during the evening. We do have an associate of our Security team on property throughout the night that can handle any noise complaints when notified, and our housekeeping department has reviewed the procedures of making sure all of our public areas are monitored. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Very nice resort I'm a tough grader.
review: I've stayed at the Sandpearl multiple times and it is always a wonderful place for vacation. Right on beautiful Clearwater beach the location can't be beat. And the staff is AMAZING. They go the extra distance to make sure you feel special. The resort is very luxurious with a great pool and the food is awesome as well. Really it can't be beat by any other place in CWB. It's worth every penny!

title: Wonderful Place
review: My wife and I stayed the weekend at the Sandpearl.  We had other things scheduled, but after showing up at the Sandpearl, we canceled all of our plans, and stayed right where we were.   The resort sits on a gorgeous stretch of Clearwater Beach.  The sand is white powder, and is one of the best, most picturesque areas in the world.   The resort has beach CHAIRS set out for the use of their guests.  More on why chairs is capitalized in a bit... The pool is quite large and has many cabanas and lounge chairs for guests to relax on.   Both the beach and the pool have bar waiters mingling around, so refreshment is never difficult to find. The in hotel restaurant is excellent for anything you could want in a fine dining restaurant. My only complaint is the resort fee...  I don't mind…

title: Service "Above and Beyond"
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for staying at the Sandpearl.  I am thrilled to hear that upon your arrival our resort exceeded your expectations, enough to cancel your other plans.  Clearwater Beach is known for our beautiful white sand beaches and I am delighted to hear that you were able to take in the breathtaking views while relaxing on our private beach.  I am also delighted you were able to have an enjoyable experience at both of our restaurants, namely our pool side restaurant Tate Island Grill and our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf which is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  I appreciate your kind words and I look forward to your return.

title: AWESOME!
review: My family and I recently stayed at the Sandpearl Resort, 10/31/2014.  I have stayed there on many occasions and have never have been disappointed.  The Font Desk Staff make you feel welcome; enjoyed the glass of champagne!  We had a lovely 1-Bedroom Suite, #841, with views of the bay.  My only negative comment was the shower did have some mold around the bottom tiles.  The Pool service was top notch as was the food at Tate’s Bar & Grill.  After checking out, my son realized that he had left his phone charger in room.  The staff, Molly, went above and beyond to return it to us.  We really appreciated it Molly – thank you.  I would highly recommend this Property for any type  of get away.

title: Beautiful!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us.  I appreciate your kind words and I am delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful experience at the Sandpearl.  I’m glad you were able to relax by the pool and enjoy the fabulous service our poolside restaurant, Tate Island Grill has to offer.  I hope to see you again in the future.

title: Absolutely GORGEOUS!!!
review: Truly a resort as opposed to a hotel....  Every staff member encountered was extremely professional and friendly.. the grounds were gorgeous and well run...  even with the resort hosting 2 weddings on a single night, the staff did not did not miss a beat...  the breakfast buffet was awesome..  had dinner one night in the Caretta as well and it was extraordinary..  the fire pit on the beach....  simply amazing.. would highly recommend and WILL return

title: Not as good as past visits
review: The Sandpearl is my favorite place to vacation. My husband and I have been there many time staying in a standard gulf front room. They have always been extremely comfortable and well appointed. This year we brought along our teenage Niece and nephew and decided to upgrade to a suite. The view was spectacular and the bedroom was extremely comfortable. We were disappointed in the living room furniture which was like sitting on the floor. The couch practically ate you if you attempted to sit on it. The rest of our stay was top notch as always. We enjoyed the spa, the pool and great service from the pool attendants. We had a minor issue when having brunch at Caretta's. We didn't have a waiter attending to our table for the majority of our meal and we were given two free brunches.  …

title: Pearl in clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for returning to the Sandpearl, with your family.  We are always delighted to see familiar faces return year after year.  I understand the room you stayed in was not quite the perfect fit for you and your family, but I do hope you stay with us again.  When making future plans to stay with us, please utilize our reservation team so we can further assist you in finding the perfect room for you and your family.

title: Simply wonderful ....
review: Beautiful setting  excellent hotel best hospitality  Will be back !!  Fabulous hotel with beautiful rooms on the beach with excellent facilities. Great ambiance not pretentious and on the Doorstep of all clearwater amenities.

title: Best hotel on Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us.   I’m pleased to hear that you felt so welcomed while you were enjoying our beautiful property.   Our location is key for many of our guests who prefer taking a relaxing stroll while taking in all the excitement Clearwater Beach has to offer.  Thank you for your kind words and I hope you stay with us in the future!

title: Wonderful -wouldn't stay anywhere else at the beach
review: Sandpearl Resort was more than I had ever expected!  From the moment we entered we were met with the utmost respect and warm, inviting feeling.  Upon check in, we were asked "mimosa or wine"?  The staff is very professional, friendly and extremely accommodating.  The facility was beautiful, well designed and kept very neat and meticulous.  The rooms were beautiful, clean and very iniviting.  They offer turndown service, while offering a small bottle to 'freshen up' your pillow ... they did not 'presume' and take it upon themselves to spray but rather, leave that y sour option alleviating possibility of allergic reactions to perfumes.  Along with the spray was shell shaped chocolate.  The pool service was terrific offering covers for the chairs along with extra large towels. …

title: A pearl for sure
review: Very pleasantly surprised to find such a lovely resort on a beautiful soft white sand beach. This hotel has an excellent staff, the resort is well kept, felt very safe and friendly.  The sand is actually white and has shells!  Centrally located to walk into the town and car unnecessary.  The ride from the airport was about $50.  There was a bit of "nickel and diming" with reference to beach umbrellas and the daily resort fee; I find this annoying and would rather have these fees include upfront.

title: lovely and great restaurant
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your visit and the staff was excellent and friendly. The white sands of Clearwater Beach are soft and relaxing, and the shells are certainly unique. We are located in the heart of Clearwater Beach so we are very fortunate to be surrounded by great restaurants and activities. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Lovely resort with reservations
review: I went on a business trip here with my family and was pleasantly surprised by this lovely hotel.  Beach is fantastic.  But the real surprise was the fancy hotel restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf, which I suspect must be some of the best food in town.  Really great for a foody, and certainly worth the price.  If you are staying here, don't bother leaving the resort for a nice dinner.  The only thing I didn't like about this hotel was the "ghost" piano player in the lobby.  Really weird to have a piano playing new age/Muzak style piano all the time with no actual musician there.  I'd recommend they turn the machine off and hire a real jazz player once in awhile instead.

title: Amazing experience. ..
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you found our resort lovely and the beach fantastic. Our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf, serves delicious food and provides a great atmosphere no matter what the occasion may be! As you have mentioned we do have our self-playing piano that provides soothing music throughout the lobby. However, during the Holidays we have entertainers that come to provide live music. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Phenomenal Stay
review: Let me begin my saying that the Sandpearl is a lovely hotel and arguably the best place to stay on Clearwater Beach.  They are currently undergoing some renovation, which meant we were placed on the North side (coastal view), which gives you a lovely view of the beach and a not so lovely view and sound ( if you are on the balcony)  of many,many exhaust fans, running 24/7.  I understand that someone has to stay in these rooms.  We were just not happy to be chosen.  Other than that, the resort and staff are excellent.  Clearwater is not a culinary Mecca by any stretch, so the food at Sandpearl was generally very good and better than we could find on the street.  btw staying on the south side, you get to hear construction of the Sandpearl Residences next door.  So...good luck! Just…

title: First class hotel
review: We just got back from staying at the SandPearl Resort for 5 nights. When we checked in we were upgraded to a suite that overlooked the beach/pool that had a very large deck. Room was large, bed very comfortable and room was clean. I have to say that everyone that works for the Hotel was very friendly and went out of their way to greet you with a smile or say hello. Location on beach was perfect. You can walk to resturants and shops. We enjoyed it so much we rebooked to come back in February.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your five night stay at the Sandpearl, as well as an upgrade to one of our beautiful suites overlooking our pool and beach area. I am also happy to hear the staff you encountered was friendly and welcoming throughout your visit. We are very fortunate to be located in the heart of Clearwater Beach and surrounded by great local restaurants and shops all within walking distance! When you come back to visit us in February be sure to stop by our nightly fire pit for a gorgeous view of the sunset. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in February!   Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous beach setting
review: We love this hotel! Staff are excellent and the location fabulous. Decor is very classy. Right on the beautiful white sandy beach. Plenty of sun beds and excellent service around the pool. Restaurants and bars within easy walking distance.

title: They could do better
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had an excellent stay and the staff was helpful. Our pool area is a great way to relax and enjoy some gorgeous Florida weather, and I am delighted you were able to take advantage of this amenity during your time with us. We are fortunate to not only be located on the beautiful white sandy beach, but to also be surrounded by great local restaurants and shops all within walking distance. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing Beachfront Relaxing Resort
review: We had excellent hotel room overlooking pool and beach. Staff attentive. Didn't give 5 stars as long wait for food on the day we arrived. Had to send back as fries were cold and chicken under cooked. Would definately go back.

title: The pearl in the sun
review: FANTASTIC hotel I would highly recommend the sandpearl to anyone who is looking to go to clearwater beach is Awsome  Also there are loads of bars and restaurants especially the brown boxer pub Bar staff are so attentive especially Devon

title: Top Shelf, Great Location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you had a fantastic time at the Sandpearl. We are certainly located in a prime area surrounded by many local restaurants and shops all within a few steps away! I am happy to hear you received attentive service while you were with us, especially from Devon at the bar. Next time you are staying with us, be sure to stop by our bonfire at night for a relaxing spot to enjoy the sunsets. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox	 Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Stunning Views, Great Amenities, Dynamic Resort
review: Great for a long weekend. Ocean front room was amazing. Service was excellent..everyone spoke clear English and very polite. We had lunch 3 times while sitting at the pool and the food was great, service prompt. There are flags attached to your chair that you raise up to indicate that you want service. Pool and grounds were beautiful. The hotel is just the right size that you don't feel like you have to walk for miles to get anywhere. King room had plenty of space and a pull out sofa. Location of hotel is nice as you really don't need a car. Only negative was we could not access wifi in room for some reason.

title: Fantastic 5 star resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had a great long weekend stay and enjoyed the amazing views our Gulf Front rooms have to offer. I do apologize the Wi-Fi was not accessible from your room. We do work closely with our Wi-Fi support to pinpoint any issues and see what may be the problem. Tate Island Grill is a great restaurant to have a relaxing bite to eat while still enjoying the beautiful Florida weather and I have happy you were able to take advantage of it multiple times. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice place
review: i'll start by saying this was a business trip and was great for that purpose. the conference rooms and ballrooms were on par with other business venues i've attended. the catering was better than most and the staff was friendly and helpful.  the rooms were impressive. mine had 2 queens and was fairly large. although i didn't have a balcony, there was so much to do and i didn't miss it. the bathtub is gigantic, so of course i took advantage of that.   this resort is great for business, but also looks like it would be wonderful for families for couples. while we were there, we saw plenty of kids, a wedding, and a honeymooning couple. i will definitely be back.

title: First Class Facility and Staff
review: Spent 4 days here with my company on business. Very accommodating staff. There was one little hiccup that they resolved that they went way beyond my expectations. Immaculately clean and comfortable. Great beach and pool staff. Can't go wrong staying here.

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had a wonderful stay even if it was for a conference. I do apologize for the hiccup you experienced during your stay, but I am very happy we were able to rectify and resolve the issue. We certainly have a top notch pool area and unbeatable pool team that ensure all of our guests are having a relaxing and enjoyable time. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming your return in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Four weddings and no funeral
review: This is a beautiful resort…even the employees are easy on the eyes.  We booked the least expensive room because we hardly stay in the room during vacation anyway.  The room was large, the bathroom had lots of room for all of my hair and makeup items, and the beds were comfortable.  The only bad thing I have to say about the room is the location.  We were located on the side right next to a restaurant that had live music every night until about 11 or 12.  Even though the doors on the patio were heavy we could still hear the music at night.  Even my kids mentioned that they didn’t want to hear the music anymore!  The pool area and beach were always clean and well-staffed.  I loved that they would come around to take my drink or food order….I never had to get up for a thing!  The…

title: Beautiful Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had such a relaxing stay from the spacious room to the excellent service by the pool. I do apologize that the noise from the restaurant next door was a disturbance throughout the evening. Although we are not affiliated with the restaurants, we do have security on staff twenty four hours to assist with the noise level. I am glad you had a great day at the pool and were able to enjoy all of the amenities the activities desk has to offer such as the flavored water and games. Tate Island Grill is a great restaurant to enjoy a delicious meal while still having a beautiful view of the Gulf of Mexico and I am glad you were able to experience a tasty Pina Colada. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox

title: Great resort!!
review: We arrived on a Saturday with four weddings scheduled and thankfully no funerals. Even though it was quite crowded, the service was not lacking.  We have been coming here for stay cations ever since it opened. We had a perfect time. The food at the Tate grill was delicious and the Sunday brunch was the best around..better than the island way grill! We stayed here 2 years ago and were quite disappointed in the service.  We wanted to give it another try and we were glad we did. We will definitely be back.

title: Quick weekend getaway
review: Arrived around noon on Saturday realizing that check-in wasn’t until 4:00.  Was pleasantly surprised we were given complimentary upgrade to Junior Suite from a gulf-view room, but room wasn’t quite ready yet. Registration staff at check-in were great, and treated to complimentary glass of champagne! Stored our luggage with concierge, changed into our bathing suits and headed to the beach.   Had to pass the activities desk to get to the beach, and here is where we stopped to get our towels, and they also provide wristbands on the weekend to identify hotel guests.  Michael (very sweet and informative) from the activities desk escorted us to the beach and got us set up with our beach chairs.  Knowing that the SandPearl charges $25 per day extra for “shade” we opted not to rent an…

title: Fun staycation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had such a great weekend getaway to the Sandpearl and you enjoyed your upgrade. Our Gulf Front Junior Suites are beautiful rooms that offer a gorgeous view of the sunset, as you had the chance to witness. I do apologize the bedding in your room was not up to your standards and the AC unit was not working properly. I have ensured the appropriate departments of these issues so we may avoid this in the future. I am delighted you were able to enjoy the incredible Florida weather at our private beach area and Michael was there to offer great service and information. You did mention the sour cream was not brought out with the pulled pork nachos or after you requested it, and for that I apologize. I will inform our Food and Beverage team about this to ensure all proper items are brought out for each menu item, especially when requested for it. I am however very happy you received excellent and attentive service from Micah at Tate Island Grill.  We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Sadly about to check out
review: Even with construction going on we had fun. The rates could have been little less  with that in mind. The weather was perfect and the pool was clean and made new friends. My son had a blast and the staff was nice and friendly, had a wait at the outside bar just wanting to get soda’s as the bartender was busy talking to other customers. All and all was fun and would go back. The room were clean and nice, the view from our room was breath taking.

title: Poor Housekeeping Management; smell of rotten grease
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you had a fun “staycation” getaway. We have had perfect weather the past couple weeks which make the pool and beach area that much more enjoyable. It is wonderful to hear the staff was nice and friendly and your son had a great time as well. As we are just entering our slower season, we do offer promotions throughout the year through our Facebook page and website so be sure to check them out. Thank you again for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Loved the Sandpearl luxury
review: absolutely loved this hotel, and we like nice things!  Staff first class, so friendly and professional and nothing was too much trouble.  Our gulf facing room was faultless, turndown service and general housekeeping perfect with limitless towels.  I like the minibar and refrigerator touch.  Elevators speedy.  Pool service superb, never waited long from raising my little flag to server arriving.  Breakfast buffet first class with lots of choice.  Nice towels and mattress covers on sunbeds.  Would have liked a little more space between sunbeds but fully understand that this is to accommodate as many people round the pool as possible.  Gym was beautiful and did two classes with Lynn, water aerobics and beach boot camp, both good.  Tate island grill was nice, for a casual sunset…

title: Gorgeous resort, Gorgeous views!
review: So sad to leave today! We've had an amazing week! We've been staying in 2 queen Gulf front room. The staff have been friendly and helpful. We've only eaten at the grill here on the resort. The food was good. Just as all the other reviews on here the $$$ can add up quick, but if you're creative you can avoid spending so much. No microwave in the room but there's one next to the ice machine on our floor, and it was very clean. Too be extremely picky our biggest complaint had been mobile internet service. Whether using Wifi or 4G, it can be rather sketchy and slow. Especially at night or on rainy days... Basically when most people are in their rooms. Since it's their off season the grill closes early, that was kind of a bummer. Also, they've been busy with maintenence around the…

title: Amazing place, will be back
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you had an amazing week with us in one of our fabulous Gulf Front rooms. Having a microwave on each floor is certainly convenient for heating up any leftovers or creating a homemade meal. You did mention the Wi-Fi was rather slow while you were here and for that I apologize. We do have our Wi-Fi support company that we can contact when notified of any slow signals. They can help troubleshoot the signal and see what the issue with that connection may be. We have also been doing several renovation projects around the resort to keep up the outlook of our property. Some of these projects did result in a strong smell, as you have mentioned, and for that I am so sorry for. We do appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent resort & location
review: Like most other reviews say, this resort is hands-down fantastic. From the gorgeous setting, pleasant staff, clean rooms and grounds, this place has it all. The food is soooo good and their attention to entertainment for little kids was so impressive. The activities desk staff were always attentive and warm to my son, finding him a specific ball or pool float. We were so impressed with how NICE everyone was. The beach is GORGEOUS. Soft sand and perfect water. My son gathered quite the seashell collection. The resort's chairs are set quite a ways to the actual shoreline but no big deal.   Our suite was stunning, 8th floor ocean view. Well worth the extra cost, especially since the kids' earlier bedtime meant a nice wine and book on the balcony for my husband and I. The kitchen…

title: Very nice with the right room
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had such a fantastic time with us at the Sandpearl Resort. Our Activities department and kids club, Camp Ridley, provide top notch service when it comes to the children. From the toys for the pool and beach to the games in Camp Ridley, making sure the children have a great stay is a main priority. Our one and two bedroom suites our certainly spacious and enhance our relaxing atmosphere. We appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Pampered!
review: This resort and its location was beauliful & quiet just perfect. The resort itself was immaculately clean very professional staff. The beach and area is gorgeous. The best resort and hotel I have ever stay at and will be returning.

title: Beautiful setting, professional staff
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in a Mandalay suite. There is construction going on but it didn't affect us. The beach is gorgeous.  The staff is very professional, and there is a nice resort feel to the property.  October was a great month to be there.  Beach staff was friendly as were the valets and desk. Beach restaurant was good but not great.  Overall, a great property and we hope to come again.

title: Quiet, attentive staff, still great
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am so happy you had an enjoyable stay in one of our beautiful Mandalay suites. It is wonderful to hear every team member you encountered was professional and friendly from the valet and front desk, to our beach and activities team. We certainly are fortunate to be located on the gorgeous white sands of Clearwater Beach! Thank you again for your kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent!
review: Visited in early September, hotel was quiet, and undergoing some refurbishment and painting.  This did not spoil our enjoyment of stay, super check in, great rooms. was suprising quiet, but after speaking to staff, this time of year is always quiet.  Suited us down to the ground, tried a neck massage in Spa, was excellent if a little pricey, Had food at the beachside bar and grill, excellent food, in great atmosphere, unfortunately rained later in afternoon.  Having stayed at another big name hotel in Clearwater, this is the best by miles.

title: What an amazing place!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had a relaxing stay during our slower season. Our award winning Spa is a great way to unwind, and I am happy you were able to take advantage of our neck massage. Our beachside restaurant, Tate Island Grill, is not only a great place to grab lunch or dinner, but it is also the perfect place to watch a beautiful Clearwater Beach sunset. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Gulf of Mexico Views! Sunsets Like None Other! Powdery White Sand!
review: This resort was excellent! The location is perfect, there are plenty of bars and restaurants and shops within walking distance. We rented a car and used it only for transportation to and from the airport! There was no need to venture out any further! The resort itself was immaculately clean which is always the number one priority for me when traveling. In addition to that it was beautifully decorated and very well maintained and the staff was also excellent! The beach and pool area were both very impressive as well. We will definitely be coming back here! I do however have a couple negatives to list.... Resort fee $25/day, parking fee $20/day and on top of that it cost $25/day for an umbrella on the beach?!?!? You cannot spend the day on the beach without some shade and usually…

title: Very good hotel right on the waterfront
review: We had one night here after holidaying in Central Florida.  We wanted somewhere upscale, close to the beach and near to Tampa airport for our flight home the next day.  The Sandpearl definitely ticked all the boxes, this is a very nice hotel right on the white sands of Clearwater beach.  You just walk out of the back door of the hotel, through the pool area and you're on the seafront.    If you head out of the front door of the hotel you're on the main Clearwater strip, turn right and there's lots of bars and restaurants with Pier 60 about a 10 minute stroll away.  We ate at Clear Sky Cafe next door (to the right) which was delicious, really nice breakfasts in there!  We spent a bit extra on a Gulf Front Junior King Suite, and I would say it's well worth upgrading if you can. …

title: Beautiful beach, beautiful resort!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. Even though it was a short visit, I am delighted you enjoyed a relaxing evening at the Sandpearl Resort. I do apologize the food at Tate Island Grill was not up to your liking, but I am very happy to hear you enjoyed the Triple Cheese Quesadillas from our In Room Dining. We are very fortunate to not only be located on the beautiful white sand of Clearwater Beach, but to also be surrounded by great local restaurants and shops. I am happy to hear our Concierge team was helpful and able to fulfill you requests. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Awesome hotel
review: From the moment we arrived, it was a wonderful experience.  The staff was welcoming as we drove up to the front.  We checked in and I must say the front desk staff was so friendly and so helpful ( I also had a reservation for my elderly parents as well as for myself).  A big shout out to Shelley at the reception desk, so nice!   We were then asked if we would like Champagne orMimosa's , how fun is that after a long trip!  My parents room was perfect, they thought they were in heaven with the beautiful view of the gulf from their room.  Our suite was so nice, clean and updated.  I can't say enough about everyone that works at this resort, they could not have been nicer and more accommodating.  Restaurants were awesome too!!! Beautiful beach and pool!

title: Sandpearl Resort, Clearwater Beach Fl.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us starting from the moment you arrived. Shelley is one of our senior front desk agents and I am so glad she provided excellent service along with champagne and mimosas. Both of our restaurants, Caretta on the Gulf and Tate Island Grill, offer top of the line food, drinks and service and I am thrilled you were able to try them. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!    Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice with a few hitches
review: Stayed here for 9 idyllic days in September. Location is right on the best beach in Florida - best beach I've seen! 2 hours drive from Orlando. Room size was huge - could see the sea from your bath thanks to thoughtful shutters in the bathroom. Gym was pretty good and open 24/7 which suited us on our first day after arriving from Scotland as we used it at 6am! Didn't use the pool since the beach was spacious and Steve the beach man was very helpful - also giving useful local info for newcomers to Florida. Waiters were also useful giving local info - restaurant was fantastic - sushi very good. Poached eggs excellent at breakfast - go for the buffet - it kept is going all day which helped us cope with the US size portions at dinner! We usually shared a starter and a dessert as…

title: Great Spot for Girl's Trip
review: Spent 3 nights at the Sandpearl. Room was beautiful with a balcony facing the ocean. Room was always clean. Any staff I encountered had a huge welcoming smile on their faces. The Tate Grill made a great sandwich for lunch and all meals and cocktails had in the hotel restaurant, Caretta were fabulous. There was dancing on Friday and Saturday night which was fun. The only downsides and they are unavoidable- convention dorks in the pool, many townies coming into the bar to hit on vacationers, weddings galore. I think we saw 3 weddings with areas roped off and the entire hotel stopping to watch and listen. Not our thing, but it did not ruin our stay.  For Starbucks junkies (I travel with a bunch) there is an on site spot to fulfill that coffee urge. The spa is beautiful. Took about…

title: A very beautiful hotel.. There is a 'but' though!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us for a girl’s weekend. It is wonderful to hear you were welcomed by every staff member with a warm smile. It sounds like you ladies had a fun filled weekend and were able to enjoy all of our amenities from Tate Island Grill to our beautiful pool and beach area. We certainly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: special
review: We stated at the Sandpearl as the last few days of our honeymoon trip.  The the surroundings are beautiful and it's very close to all the amenities Clearwater has to offer, as well as being right on the beach, which we loved. The pool facilities and activities staff are wonderful, as was (in particular) the absolute gentleman who took our cases to our room for us and offered a bit of friendly conversation.  We did however find some aspects a little snooty, which, living in Central London, can take some doing.  As so many others have mentioned, the hidden charges of additional daily rates, valet parking when we didn't really want it and not even being entitled to an umbrella on the beach didn't really help us perpetuate the honeymoon feeling.  We thought about opting for room…

title: Great Birthday Weekend!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am happy you chose to spend the last few days of your honeymoon at the Sandpearl Resort, and received wonderful service from our activities and bellmen staff. In regards to our Resort Amenity Fee, we do inform all potential guests at the time of booking of this fee as well as upon check in. I do apologize if this information was not communicated to you properly. Celebrating a special time such as a honeymoon is something we strive to make an unforgettable experience. You mentioned we fell short of making you feel extra special during your stay and for that I am very sorry. We do appreciate the feedback and hope to welcome you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Is it worth it?
review: We went down to see if this is a good place for a destination wedding for my daughter. IT is a perfect place for the wedding(it will be here-already booked). From the moment you arrive you know it is special. The service was superior to any other place I have stayed. Everyone is friendly and helpful and smiling. They all seem interested in making your stay perfect. The rooms were large and comfortable. The food was fantastic. The pool area was great and of course the beach is amazing. It was quite warm when we stayed but the sand was not hot and even cool in the shade. The staff were gracious and accommodating allowing us extra time to tour the different areas available for the wedding. The event planner was extremely helpful even though she was due to leave for vacation. But…

title: Beautiful on Clearwater Beach
review: Thishotel is magnificent. Rooms are sparkling as well as the lobby. Pool area super comfortable, and the beach access is right there. You cannot go wrong! Fantastic beach cafe, Tate's Island Grill, is directly on the sand. Frenchy's is just down the beach too.

title: This one is easy
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay at the Sandpearl Resort. It sounds like you had a very relaxing time from lounging at the pool area to dining at Tate Island Grill. We appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Loved It!
review: This is an easy trip because the resort is short distance from the Tampa Airport (20 to 30 minute drive).  My business had a conference here and moved it from Longboat Key Club and Resort where we had the conference for several years.  These are both Opal owned resorts.  LBK is one of our favorite places to visit, but not set up super great for a business conference.  This resort I didn't like quite as much just as a couple or family visit, but it was set up much better for a small business conference.    This is a very large resort in the middle of Clearwater Beach.  It has a expansive, wide white sand beach.  There is a public pier / beach maybe a half mile south of the resort, but the beach wasn't too crowded because it is so large.  Pool is large, but I would assume with the…

title: Love this place for a relaxing time
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us for your conference and were able to utilize some of the amenities we have to offer. It is wonderful to hear of the great service and food you received in Caretta on the Gulf. We appreciate the kind words and hope to welcome you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Few misses
review: We spent our 25th anniversary here.  Loved the hotel.  Extremely nice.  Was given Champagne during check in.  Beach was fantastic.  No waves!  Rooms were super nice.  Very upscale hotel.  Service was excellent!  You don't need a vehicle because everything is within walking distance that you would need.  The Clear Sky Café is located across the street and I highly recommend it.  We will definitely be back here!

title: High End Resort Beachfront on Clearwater Beach
