review: My family and I have vacationed all over Clearwater Beach for over 20 years but it was our first time at this beautiful resort. When my husband asked me to book one of our usual hotels like the Hilton or Hyatt there prices were pretty high. I took a chance and looked at the Sandpearl website and got very lucky that they had an incredible internet special. This non refundable rate was significantly less then all the other Clearwater beachfront hotels. From the Valet who offered us ice cold waters on arrival to the front desk who gave us champagne and sparkling cider you could see the difference in the caliber resort. We arrived very early for our reservation but were told that we could use the pool and beach chairs while we waited for our room. The conceirge stored our luggage…

title: Hidden charges
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed your first stay at the Sandpearl Resort and received excellent service from our employees. One of the best things about our location is being able to walk to all of the great nearby restaurants and shops. I am so happy you were able to enjoy all of the amenities we have to offer from the games around the pool and private beach area, to the nightly s’mores and bonfire for a beautiful Gulf of Mexico sunset. Next time you make your way to Clearwater Beach, be sure to check out our resort website and Facebook page for special promotions. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Something has changed here...
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for ten days it is a lovely hotel and the staff were friendly and helpful.  Great location and good service.  One thing that I didn't like was when we were informed on checked-in  that there would be an extra $25 daily charge for use of the facilities, and on their private part of the beach there would be an extra $25 per day charge for an umbrella.  So if you want to stretch out on a shaded beach lounger be prepared to pay $50 on top of the room charge.  This is fine if you are only staying a couple of nights but for our stay it meant forking out an extra $450.  Maybe the hotel should consider a discount for patrons staying more than say three nights?

title: A nice place to stay in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had a lovely stay with friendly staff and good service. We do charge a daily $25 of Resort Fee which includes many of the amenities on the property. If you do wish to use an umbrella on the beach there is a charge for them, however all of our beach chairs and pool chairs are complimentary as well as the umbrellas around the pool deck. When you are planning your return trip to the Sandpearl Resort, please feel free to reach out to me directly to assist in making your reservation. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Gorgeous Resort! Grrrreat Location!!
review: We had the WORST restaurant service. Our kids had crackers for the hour they waited for dinner - which only arrived in a brown bag after complaining to 3 people. Managers are untrained at best. This place has gone downhill quick.

title: BEST place for a conference!!
review: Stayed here a full week while attending a conference also on site. Wow is all I can say. The service is very very attentive. The rooms are great and any extras I asked for they promptly responded to (more hangers, more coffee creamer). The valet parking guys were so helpful as was the concierge. The room was always clean, the staff all very very professional and willing to help. The room was quiet and comfortable and never issues with temp control or wifi. Bed very comfy also. I wish I could have stayed longer! They pool is lovely and they have beach chairs and fire pits and even have staff there to provide smores making supplies!! They have movie night at the pool! The spa is excellent = i had pedicure and deep tissue massage. Lovely. The staff that supported the conference…

title: Wonderful Place for a Vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you had such a delightful stay with us during your conference. It is also great to hear the service you received was very attentive from the Valet to the Concierge, and any request was fulfilled in prompt time. Our award winning Spa is certainly one of a kind, and I am glad you were able to take advantage of some services during your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing!
review: I have stayed at this property many times in the past and I just recently stayed again for a week long summer vacation.  I have read some of the reviews that criticize the service, or rooms, or the resort fee ... and I have to say I have never had a problem with this Resort ... ever.    Yes there is a resort fee and yes many hotels charge a resort fee.  I loved walking up to the resort desk and asking for two bicycles that were immediately brought out to me.  Biking in the area was a lot of fun and I had a good workout !  Yes there is Valet parking that you pay for and yes it costs money.  I found it very relaxing to simply get out of my car and not worry about a thing.  When I asked for my car it was brought to me within minutes.  I have read some reviews about people saying…

title: Lovely resort but disappointed with room
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your week long visit with us at the Sandpearl Resort. I am happy you took advantage of the bicycle rental included in the resort fee, as it is such a great way to see what Clearwater Beach has to offer! I am also delighted that every staff member was overly friendly and helpful during your stay. We truly appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: 2nd time here!
review: We stumbled across this hotel purely by chance.  We had checked into another well known hotel in the area, but due to the appalling condition of that hotel, we checked into the Sandpearl. We were greeted with a glass of champagne.  The staff were very welcoming and helpful.  The hotel is very well presented yet comfortable, There is an onsite spa, which is great to unwind in.  The spa is a little pricey, but the treatments are incredible and the spa itself is of a very high standard. Food at the hotel was very good and all of the facilities and amenities. I could not recommend this hotel more highly.  A great stay - we will be back!!

title: Wonderful
review: This hotel is top notch. The rooms have 9 foot ceilings making the suites feel even bigger.   I love our room.  We have a huge rub, walk in shower and two separate sinks.  Not to mention that the suite comes with a full kitchen and living space.    The lobby has friendly staff and a player piano.  It just feels top notch!

title: Very nice resort and friendly staff.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your suite. Our one and two bedroom suites offer beautiful views of either Mandalay Bay or the Gulf of Mexico and also come equipped with a full kitchen which can make vacations much more enjoyable. I am so happy to hear you encountered friendly staff in the lobby area and enjoyed our self-playing piano. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice stay, not quite as good as expected
review: Beautiful stay. Everyone was so nice and friendly. We walked every where we went to in Clearwater. Definitely will come back. Restaurants in hotel were good as well. First time staying in a resort so we were very pleased. A lot of things to do surrounding the area.

title: More Misses than Hits
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had such a beautiful first stay with us, and that everyone you encountered was friendly and nice. We are lucky to be located in Clearwater Beach with just a short walking distance to some great restaurants and excursions. We truly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Perfect dinner with a view
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for 2 nights during August.  We had booked a gulf view room and following check-in, reached our room which we were disappointed to find had tape with 'danger do not step on balcony' across the window - very concerning as we were travelling with a child. The room also did not smell very pleasant.  We went back to reception who apologised and explained there was building work being carried out. I personally think that this should have been explained before we were sent up to the room.  We were allocated another, without a Gulf View, which we accepted as the Hotel was apparently busy.  A disappointing start.  The Hotel itself is beautifully positioned on the beach and has a lovely pool although the sunbeds are shoe-horned in every available space.  The…

title: Wonderful Trip
review: I can not say enough good things about this hotel and my stay here. From the moment we walked in the door to the moment we left, we received such wonderful hospitality. Jeremy (Front Desk Director) checked and made sure that everything was satisfactory and went the extra mile to make our stay very memorable. The spa there is incredible, so even if you don't go to stay at the hotel I highly recommend at least a few treatments at the spa to experience this hotel.

title: Lovely first stay in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy you received such great hospitality from the moment you arrived at the Sandpearl. We are lucky to have Jeremy as our Front Office Director as he provides excellent service which you had the honor of receiving. I am glad you had a chance to experience a relaxing treatment in our award winning Spa. We truly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl. August 2014
review: My family and I spent two nights at the Sandpearl as a mini break during our annual trip to Florida. The check in was smooth and relatively fast, made all the more pleasant by complimentary mimosas for the adults and apple cider for the kids! The only disappointment was that despite being told that the hotel was quiet, there was no offer of an upgrade, which would have made our day given that the children hadn't previously stayed in a hotel. That aside, despite arriving well ahead of the advertised check in time we were able to get into our room and the luggage was brought straight up. The room was fine, ample size, with the added advantage of in room refrigerator and coffee making facilities. The bathroom was a bit on the small size, a bath and separate shower would've been…

title: Hotel Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. We are honored to have been the destination for your two night break during your annual Florida trip. The complimentary mimosas and apple ciders certainly are refreshing after a day of traveling. In regards to upgrades, many factors are taken into account especially the number of nights a guest is staying with us, as well as the bedding needed to accommodate the number of guests in the room. I do apologize we were not able to provide an upgrade for this stay. I am, however, happy we were able to check you into the room prior than our 4:00pm check in time so you could start to enjoy all of our amenities. It is wonderful your kids were able to enjoy our kids club, Camp Ridley, throughout the day to escape from the midday heat. We appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Paradise!
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for a week in August and overall had a fantastic time . The check in was efficient and quick and James the bellboy helped us to our room. We did actually change room , only as we were offered a free upgrade to a 1 bedroomed suite without a gulf view that we had paid for, so we were a bit hesitant , but when we saw suite and the view , we were amazed . The balcony was only out of action for one day , due to refurbishment , so no problem. The suite had all facilities you need , lovely and clean and enjoyed the little touches such as turn down service, sleep pillow spray and chocolates .  We did not eat at the hotel so cannot comment on that but did have drinks at the beach bar which was in a lovely setting for the beach and famous sunset .  The beach is…

title: Prefect Classy Family Resort
review: My family stayed here for a Labor Day Weekend "Staycation" coming over from Tampa, and we will without a doubt come back. To me, when it comes to upscale beach resorts, the differences are always in the small details. The view is always going to be great, but what does the resort do to make things special for the whole family? This resort excels at the small details. It's outstanding. Pricey for sure, but a prefect family resort with a whole lot of elegance and class.

title: Sand pearl management can you hear us
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent review on your most recent stay with us. We are happy you chose the Sandpearl Resort for your staycation from Tampa! Our resort certainly offers amenities to make it a great destination for a family vacation or a romantic getaway. We strive to provide five diamond services to every guest and exercise that in the small details. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back for another staycation!  Regards,  Molly Mattox   Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Stunning location
review: Second visit to sand pearl two days in, knock on our balcony door five floors up, by a workman on a cherry picker who had my wife's bikini in his hand who told us not to use the balcony as works were to be done went to front desk who were unhelpful we had to request another room which overlook the landscaping works being carried out to the pool nobody had been notified of any works until a board was erected in the foyer the sound of machinery was off putting when trying to relax around the pool

title: Great location, nice rooms, pricy
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review of the Sandpearl.  Please accept our apologies for the issues you experienced while a guest with us.  During the time you were here was one of the slower periods for us and we need to take those opportunities to keep our resort as pristine as possible.  We did indeed have several maintenance projects occurring during that time which included the exterior painting of our building as well as refurbishing the small lawn by our pool.  Again, my apologies for the disturbances.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Another excellent stay at Sandpearl
review: We had a fantastic 2 nights at the resort. Right on Clearwater beach and within easy walking distance of lots of restaurants, shops and local activities - particularly nice in the US where most locations involve driving. The hotel was stunning. Only slight let down was that our room was a bit noisy but this was not a major issue. Clear Sky cafe across the road does a fantastic breakfast if you haven't got it included in your room package.

title: These pictures don't do it justice.
review: Five girls and I came here for a bachelorette party weekend. We stayed in connected room. After parking our car for valet, the outstanding customer service started. Everyone was so helpful and accommodating (and we haven't stepped foot inside yet). When we got to the check out desk, we were asked if we would like champagne, mimosa or something that was non-alcoholic. Of course we went with the champagne themed drinks. The lobby is spectacular; it was decorated with great taste. Have you ever noticed that some homes in Florida look the same, as if the same decorator went to the same store to get the same items? Not this decorator. This was lobby was garnished with a beautiful design. Enough about the lobby and onto the rooms. We appreciated the lock on the mini-bar fridge and the…

title: Good stay, not quite as good as expected
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you ladies had a wonderful bachelorette weekend at the Sandpearl Resort from the champagne upon check in to our pool and private beach area. We certainly strive to provide the best customer service to our guests and I am so happy to hear that is exactly what you received throughout your stay. We truly appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: No response from General Manager?
review: We have just returned from 3 nights in a 1 bed mandalay suite with our 2 daughters. We had a lovely welcome on arrival with buckets for the girls and champagne for us. Our room had a lovely view over the bay & was spacious. However it lacked enough rails/hooks to hang towels to dry.  We are in Tates a number of times and enjoyed the food, the girls loved making s'mores and the dive in movie. However they were disappointed that they never received the chocolates as part of the evening turn down service, despite a phone call to guest services. It's a little thing, but important to a 6 year old. Also leaving only 2 500ml bottles of water for the resort fee for a family of 4 seemed a bit silly.  The main disappointment was the pool. It's far too small for the hotel, it was very…

title: Made Me Move Here
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you had a lovely welcome to the resort followed by champagne and buckets for your daughters. It is wonderful to hear your family enjoyed dining at Tate Island Grill and you were able to experience a night of S’more’s and our Dive in Movie. I do apologize the chocolate was missed during our nightly turndown service, especially after you had called to request some. We certainly appreciate the kind words and do hope you will give us another chance to win you back in the future.   Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Never again!
review: I wrote a review about our stay at this resort in December 2012.  I visited the Sand Pearl review page on Trip Advisor this morning in response to an email from Trip Advisor. I never noticed before, but it appears that the General Manager responded to most every review,with the exception of mine.  Maybe the Mr. Grumpy. Referred to in my review was, indeed, the general manager himself?  Who knows?  But it did remind me of the bad customer service that we were greeted with at our last stay.  As well as the mishap with our name being dropped (mysteriously) from the Christmas Brunch waiting list. As much as we enjoyed the ambiance and amenities at this resort, I am very hesitant to stay here in the future due to the service. My first stay was great.  I don't understand why the cold…

title: Wow.  Had to stay a second night.
review: We are spending August 18-25 in Orlando with a few days at Universal.  Turns out we are not a theme park family and we looked to head to Clearwater to check out the Clearwater Marine Aquarium.  We decided to splurge and stay at one of the nicest hotels in Clearwater Beach--the SandPearl.  The first night was spent in room 613, looking towards the north and overlooking the Gulf.   It was above their banquet halls and as a result, our balcony was very noisy due to the rooftop air conditioners.  However, the view was breathtaking.  The room was large and timelessly decorated with very nice furnishings.  The bathroom was large.  It came with a Keurig coffee maker and 2 bottles of water.  The mini bar was nicely stocked with a variety of items, which we did not use.  Loved our first…

title: Beautiful Hotel - a few bumps in the road though
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am glad you chose the Sandpearl Resort to enjoy some relaxation after your time in Orlando, not only for one night but for two! It is our goal to make every guest feel like a VIP and I am so happy to hear that is exactly how you felt during your stay with us from the front desk to our restaurant staff. We truly appreciate the kind words and hope to welcome you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful hotel!
review: Absolutely beautiful hotel and beach.  A few bumps, which we did address each item while at the hotel.  First the good:  Great location, beautiful facility and very well maintained.  Loved the beach and all the activities.  We made the decision to try out this hotel for a 'girls' night out on the beach.  Unfortunately arrived in the rain, so no beach that afternoon, but no big deal, plenty to look around and do at the hotel.  As mentioned in other posts, required to valet - which by the way we prefer.  The perk to using the valet is that they take your luggage and deliver to your room.  Well worth the nightly charge in my opinion since they handle all the beach 'stuff'!!  Great service and super friendly.  Great first impression.  Additionally at check-in mimosas or champagne -…

title: A 'Pearl' on the beach...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you chose the Sandpearl Resort for your girl’s night out on the beach! It is our pleasure to provide great service and it is wonderful to hear you encountered our super friendly staff too. Our beach fire and s’more’s is truly the best way to enjoy a beautiful Clearwater Beach sunset. I do apologize you were unable to utilize your balcony during your stay with us; however, I am glad you were able to enjoy a delicious breakfast in Caretta on the Gulf. We appreciate the kind words and hope you will give us a chance to win you back in the future.   Regards,  Molly Mattox  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous Vacation
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for a week after spending the first half of our holiday in Orlando visiting the theme parks so we were in need of relaxation and that is exactly what he got. We arrived at the hotel at lunchtime and were immediately greeted by the extremely friendly valet parking guys. We checked in but were told that our rooms weren't quite ready but this was not a problem particularly as I was given a glass of champagne by a very nice young lady. We had a leisurely lunch in the pool bar and had our first cocktails of the week served by the charming Marcel. We ate at the pool bar everyday during our stay and enjoyed every meal and service was always excellent. Once we had eaten our room was ready, we had a 2 bedroom gulf view suite which was absolutely beautiful, with…

title: just a great retreat
review: relaxing, best location on the beach, wonderful rooms, great service - a great place in the middle of a beautiful surrounding. Clearwater is one of the best beaches at the golf shores. Campfire, movies at the pool, cold ice water refreshing with strawberries and lemon - hammocks - nothing more to wish for an enjoyable stay

title: Fabulous break
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us from the wonderful room accommodation to the great service you received. We have to admit, that we believe Clearwater Beach is one of the best beaches in the world! We appreciate the kind words you have shared and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox	 Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful resort in a great location
review: We booked the Sandpearl for 3 nights to break up our stay in Kissimee.  We travelled as a family of 4 (2 adults and 2 boys 4 & 13), we chose a gulf/pool view room with 2 double beds.   Upon arrival we were greeted by valet who were very pleasant and offered to help with our bags. Valet parking is $20 per day which we found very reasonable for this standard of hotel and for people to complain you really don't want to see the price in London for valet parking!  Upon check in we were greeted by a friendly lady who ran through all our details and then after giving us our room keys, brought us a Mimosa each and drinks for our boys, a great way to start our stay.  The room was just as we expected and topped with a fabulous view and balcony with 2 chairs and table. There was a mini…

title: Nice resort, fun area, but not 100% sold
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had a fabulous break at the Sandpearl Resort beginning with our pleasant valet staff and friendly check in experience. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your room accommodations, as well as Tate Island Grill. Our pool area is truly one of a kind and I am so glad you were able to experience the amazing service our employees provide down there. It sounds like your family was able to utilize all of the amenities we have to offer here at the Sandpearl Resort! We appreciate all of your kind words and hope to welcome you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Resort on the beach
review: We recently stayed five nights at the Sandpearl resort and we were very happy with our choice of hotel and location. Within walking distance, there are many excellent restaurants and beach-type shops. Pier 60 and the Marina are only about a half mile away. And there are plenty of excursions a short drive away.  We had a room on the side of the building but could see both the gulf and the bay from our balcony. The room was quiet and did not feel cramped after 5 nights.  Both dining establishments are very good on site. We are at Caretta on the Gulf for breakfast every day (kids eat free from the buffet), and Tate Island Grill almost every day. The Tate Island Grill had super service and delicious food right on the beach and adjacent to the pool.   The pool is exquisite. Lagoon…

title: Wonderful Stay
review: We stayed for one evening at the Sandpearl. The Resort is beautiful & the service was impeccable. On arrival you are greeted with champagne. We were fortunate enough to stay in the Presidential Suite. We were amazed by the spaciousness & beauty of the room. The suite has a full kitchen, great room area with beautiful furnishings, dining room table, & a half bath. Every room including the master bedroom has floor to ceiling views of the pool & beach from a large balcony with rocking chairs & chaise lounges. The separate master bedroom & bath are equally spacious & comfortable. The jetted tub is a nice touch. The Resort is large & offers many things to enjoy. They have a spa/fitness, large pool with plenty of chaise lounges, outdoor bar/cafe, beach chairs/umbrellas & towels which…

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad you were able to see all the amenities we have to offer from the Spa and fitness center to our restaurants and kayaking tour. We truly appreciate the positive feedback and hope to welcome you back soon!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Before you book a room
review: My husband booked a 4 day, 3 night package. The hotel is lovely! The staff is a mix bag of nice people, and not so nice people but for the most part, the staff was genuinely nice. We stayed in a King gulf view room and it was wonderful. The ocean view is fantastic!  There is a daily resort fee but, it does include daily bottles of water, turn down service with chocolates, beach chairs, and beach towels for when you go to the beach.  There is valet parking only. The spa staff if nice and the amenities are great! I did a tapas style spa package that included a massage, facial, mani/pedi. I do not recommend this package- the mani/pedi was not good. My husband had a deep tissue massage, and facial and said it was worth the money. We did not try the restaurants on the property.…

title: Great location and very relaxing resort!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I apologize that some of our staff members you encountered were not providing service that was up to our standards. I am also sorry to hear that the services you received from the Spa were not to your liking. On your next visit please make sure to experience Tate Island Grill or Caretta on the Gulf for an incredible meal! We appreciate the kind words and looking forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great relaxing stay at a beautiful resort
review: Upon our arrival at the Sandpearl we were advised that we had been “upgraded” to a Junior Suite with a view of the gulf.  We are not fussy, so no problem giving up our King bed in exchange for a better view.  However, if you are considering booking the “Junior Suite” you should know that it was a two queen room, with a small sofa and two televisions less than 6 feet apart on the same wall (?).  The room reminded me very much of a room in a deluxe Disney resort not a luxury hotel.  The second odd thing about our “suite” was the shutters between the toilet/shower/tub area and the sleeping area which effectively removed any privacy at all for the toilet area!  This arrangement may not be appropriate for some families.  There were a couple of maintenance issues as well, the hall…

title: Nickel and dime
review: Agree with Luvgreece.  We were also appalled that umbrellas on the beach would be an add on charge.  "Complementary" beach chairs are available because you pay a $25 per day resort charge.  That is NOT complimentary.   No shaded chairs around pool if you aren't down to claim a chair by breakfast but most all chairs and shade go unused with just towels holding places.  That said, resort is very nice and folks friendly.  Out 2 bed room reserved 7 months in advance was not available and kids slept on floor and in roll away. Changing room mid stay was option but would mean checking out by 11 with no access to room or stuff until 4 and would have essentially meant loosing a day.  Kids chose to stay on floor.  No compensation offered for this inconvenience other than "upgrade" to this…

title: Can't wait to return!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  Please accept my apology for the issues you had regarding your room type.  We put much effort into making sure that the guests receive the correct room type. I am not sure what happened in your situation.  My apologies.  Regarding the umbrellas on the beach and the charge associated with them.  We do charge $25 to rent an umbrella on the beach and two chairs are included.  The reason for the charge is to make sure that other guests do not occupy both pool and beach umbrellas and possibly use neither.  Previously we had issues with people claiming both and the availability of chairs was more limited.  There are chairs without umbrellas on the beach that are included in the Resort Fee.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write a review. I appreciate it.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Stunning Hotel
review: We've just spent the most relaxed, luxurious 5 days at this gorgeous resort hotel. Spacious, comfortable rooms with top class bathroom products and coffee machine. A beautiful pool area with waiter service( You must try the ' Blue Pearl' signature cocktail by the pool near sunset.) Hammocks on the white powdery beach and a sunset to die for. The Sand Pearl has it all and more! Fantastic service and luxury surroundings, you won't be disappointed and I'm sure, like me, you'll be counting the days until you can return again.

title: Second visit--still good, but a little disappointed
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear the room was spacious and comfortable for your 5 day stay with us. We are happy to provide top class products in the rooms as well as the resort for our guests. Your kind words on the service you received here at the Sandpearl Resort are very much appreciated. We thank you again and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Family celebration of our 50th anniversary
review: Stayed here for 5 nights at the end of July.  The hotel is beautiful.  Our room was a “bay view” room, with a lovely view out towards Clearwater Marine Aquarium and the surrounding waterways, bridges and cityscape.  The room was big, with 2 queen beds and a nice bathroom.  My only complaint about the room was that our balcony was very small and didn’t have a table and chairs on it, but with the views from the beach and pool area, we didn’t miss sitting on our balcony too much.  The lobby and pool area are very nicely decorated and maintained.  Getting a sunbed isn’t a problem, and the pool staff are very proactive at clearing beds that have been left vacant for a period of time.  Tate Grill (poolside bar/café) is superb, drinks are expensive but the food is delicious, and the…

title: Our Favorite Hotel
review: A delightful , relaxing as well as fun resort ! Love the restaurant , spa and surrounding restaurants. ! Great for family or a romantic get a away ! We have visited over. 15 times over the years. Can't wait to go back

title: Sandpearl is one of my FAVS!!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am glad to hear you enjoyed the restaurant, spa and the neighboring restaurants. You are absolutely right! With the variety of amenities we have to offer here at the Sandpearl Resort, it makes it great for a family vacation or a romantic getaway. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Regards,  Molly Mattox  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Paradise on Clearwater Beach
review: I adore the Sandpearl. The Sandpearl's beautiful white beaches and gorgeous hotel are a yearly vacation spot for my family. The kids absolutely love it there. They offer lots of fun activities for the kids. We loved using the kids club while we enjoyed a parents night out. Service is top notch from the moment you drive up. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Amazing
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. Our Kid’s Club, Camp Ridley, was recently awarded one of the Top Ten Beach Resort Kids’ Clubs in the world by USA Today, so I am happy to hear your kids were able to enjoy camp while the parents had a night out. We are delighted you chose the Sandpearl Resort to spend your family vacation and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!   Regards,  Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Perfect!
review: As a board member for an ESPN Bowl, we stay here every June with sponsors, potential partners, friends and family.  You can't beat the location and there are a ton of places to go within walking distance.  It reminds me of a Ritz as far as the look and feel.  Great service, and a cool place for families to hang out and relax!  Spoil yourself and get a poolside cabana.  Check out Clear Sky cafe next door for the best breakfast on the beach.

title: Disappointing for Special Occasion
review: We had such a bittersweet experience... there were many wonderful things, but there were some big issues, too. I wouldn't recommend them for a major celebration. They were completely unreliable. First and foremost, the resort is gorgeous and the beach is fabulous (This is the "4-star" part.)  Also, I have never met housekeeping staff that were so genuine and helpful! Top notch.  Now on to the major misses: we thought that we had picked the BEST place for our family to meet for my parent's 50th wedding anniversary, but the disorganization and miscommunication was unbelievable.  Firstly, I wanted to surprise for my parents when they first arrived...how often do you have a 50th anniversary? On Day #4 of a 5-day stay, strawberries arrived. A minor inconvenience, but disappointing. …

title: Fantastic Beach front location!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you found our resort gorgeous and the beach fabulous as well as finding the Housekeeping Staff helpful.  I am very sorry for the service failures you experienced while staying with us.  I can promise you that is not the norm.  We handle special occasions on a daily basis and we are normally very good at seeing all special requests to completion.  I will speak with the 3 different departments that were mentioned and see what happened so we can learn from these issues.  Again, thank you for taking the time to respond with the review, I appreciate it.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Amazing stay ruined by poor customer service afterwards
review: We had been travelling for 3 weeks in Florida, and this was our third stop. After staying at The Breakers in Plam Beach and Hard Rock Hotel in Orlando it was great to come to a smaller hotel. This is a classic seaside hotel, very modern yet the old calssic style. Nice reception area, Starbucks, a small but great fitness center and a lovely pool area. Nice hammocks on the beach. The service was good, not great! We stayed in a room with coastal view and balcony.The room was nice and clean, but we were right above a giant fan of some kind and it was not possible to have the door open because of the noise. We also had cooking odors on the balcony....... Next time i will choose a beach front room. Clearwater is a nice, calming place and the hotel has a great location. A short walk to…

title: Great Clearwater Beach location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your recent stay with us. I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us at the Sandpearl Resort. We certainly are lucky to be in close proximity to several shops, restaurants and Pier 60. We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope you return to us on your next visit to Clearwater Beach!  Regards, Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Lovely hotel, great pool, beautiful beach
review: I recently traveled to Clearwater Beach and visited the beautiful Sandpearl.  Couldn't have asked for a better stay.  Everyone was so nice and the accommodations were some of the best I've seen.  Unfortunately, an error on my bill, a rude encounter with Mark in accounting and an unreturned phone call from Kaitlyn at the concierge desk ruined the overall experience.

title: very nice place to stay
review: Hotel personal ~~ everyone that we encountered was friendly and helpful ( nothing major needed)  Room~~ nice room ( 2 double beds) clean and comfortable   cleaning crew~~ did their job competently   would return

title: Watch your bill!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback from your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear how helpful and friendly every employee you encountered was. It is our pleasure to assist you during your stay with whatever you may need. We greatly appreciate your kind words and hope you return to us on your next visit to Clearwater Beach!  Regards, Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Ok, but worth the price?
review: I stayed here a few years ago and gave this hotel rave reviews. Stayed here again in June 2014 and still give the hotel rave reviews for beach access, pool, restaurants nearby, and overall hotel quality and staff friendliness. But with one caveat, watch your credit card bill after your stay! I had to call them about not one but two errant charges on my bill. Charges for parking a car did not have and honor bar charges which did not exist.

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about the errors on your bill following your departure. I am, however, happy to hear you enjoyed your second trip to the Sandpearl from the beach access and pool area, to our friendly staff. We appreciate your feedback and hope you return on your next visit to Clearwater Beach!  Regards, Molly Mattox Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Best place ever!
review: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a few nights and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves at the pool and attached bar. It's a nice hotel, beautiful view, decent rooms, courteous staff; however, it is expensive. We upgraded to a junior suite but I wouldn't do it again. Save your money and stay in a regular room with a pool/Gulf view. Weather permitting, you will be spending most of your time at the beach or pool anyways!  My issues with the Sandpearl are as follows- 1)You would think a junior suite would have a small microwave, it did not. 2)The side of the bathroom that faces the sleeping area is open but has the option to be closed off with shutters. It's a nice idea but I don't think it works well in reality. The shutters offer no bathroom privacy. 3)Movie night can be loud, depending…

title: Top Resort on Clearwater Beach
review: After researching various sites I settled on Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater beach for a weekend getaway with my wife for our 30th Wedding Anniversary!  It was a great decision!  We rented a Junior King Suite and was shocked by how nice and big it was when we entered the room.  It also had a huge deck over looking the pool and ocean.  The only thing that was missing was a microwave for warming up left over food but that was not a big deal.  I requested a DVD player to be hooked up in the room and they immediately followed through with that request.  I can't say enough great things about this hotel!  There were many eating and drinking options and the outside bar and grill had a live singer both afternoons and evenings.  We could not have asked for a better resort to stay in for…

title: The best resort on Clearwater beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. We are so happy you chose to spend your 30th Wedding Anniversary with us! I am delighted to hear that we were able to help make lasting memories while you celebrated such a special occasion. We look forward to welcoming you back and hope you return to us soon.    Regards, Lani Wood Rooms MIT

title: Wonderful stay
review: The sandpearl is the best place to stay on Clearwater beach. The beach and resort are top notch. The pool is an infinity pool which is great for kids and the beach is unbeatable. Food and drink service pool and beach side! Clearwater Beach is breath taking!! The food is outstanding at the sandpearl. Starbucks every morning at snack counter. They go out of their way for children. Movies by the pool and s'mores by the fire pits!!

title: Sandpearl Resort - Beautiful Beach, great staff, needs tweaking in a few areas.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so happy you felt that our resort is the best place to stay on Clearwater Beach. It is great to hear you enjoyed our food and drink service by the pool and all of our activities offered for adults and children to make lasting memories. We appreciate the kind words and hope you return to us on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.   Regards, Lani Wood  Rooms MIT

title: Lovely hotel and setting. But.....
review: First and foremost, the employees of the Sandpearl made this a wonderful place to stay.   Everyone was so friendly and helpful.  Everyone.   Check in, housekeeping, restaurant staff, beach staff, valet service, all very friendly.  Our room overlooked the pool and part of the beach.  It was very clean, the bathroom was a good size, and we had a balcony.  On our first morning, we decided to try the breakfast buffet.  I have had hosts tell us about a buffet and then seat us to wait for our server.  Here the host took the time to give us a tour of the buffet and made sure we saw it all.  We were not there for their large brunch, but we were happy with the offerings all the same.  We had dinner one night and it too was great.  Expensive, yes, but comparible in price to what we would…

title: Good resort, but not a great one
review: Everything at the Sandpearl is good, but not great. Some little things keep it from being top notch. The Coffee is terrible. It may say Starbucks Coffee in the lobby, but the dunkin donuts across the street is much better. The pool restaurant is tasty, and make some very good drinks, and they don't skimp on the booze, but the prices of both food and drinks is ludicrous. Over $50 for a chicken wrap, a shrimp salad and 2 drinks. Really? Higher-end dining is in short supply in the area, but stay away from the restaurants at the hotel unless you are yacht level wealthy. Overall, the service is very nice and professional. Everyone has a smile and is friendly. The housekeeping was dreadfully slow, but you can't really blame staff for that. Rooms were clean, but we did see quite a few…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us. I am sorry you felt that our coffee was not up to par and that the prices at Tate Island Grille were too high. I am happy to hear, however, that the service you received was nice and professional and that the drinks were very good. Our staff are ready and willing to assist you with anything you may need during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and hope you return on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.   Regards, Lani Wood Rooms MIT

title: Class hotel!
review: Stayed here in July and had an absolutely wonderful time.  Check in was a breeze and the gals were so inviting even offering us some champagne.  Bags were brought up quickly to the room.  Pool was wonderful lots of umbrellas and shade.  Beach was lovely and clean.  We had debated whether we should stay at the Hyatt or the Sandpearl glad we choose the Sandpearl as the beach was so much quieter and less crowded.  We stayed in a 3rd floor room and we had a huge balcony with loungers it was wonderful.  Pool service was quick and food decent.  Room service as well was good. Only negative is $30.00 for umbrella and two chairs seems a little over the top when you are already paying a resort fee.

title: Beautiful hotel on an excellent beach
review: Dear Guest,  I am so happy to hear that your stay with us in July was wonderful! I am glad you received your bags quickly after a warm welcome by our front desk staff. We are delighted you chose to stay at the Sandpearl and hope you return soon on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.  Regards, Lani Wood Rooms MIT

title: Best Hotel - 5 Star Experience
review: Wife and I started our long vacation at this beach side resort. Just spectacular! Beautifully appointed hotel and room. The location is perfect, right on the beach and the local area is great for walking, shopping dining, nightlife, etc... Service at this hotel was first rate, from the champagne at check-in to the valet guys at check out. Staff here exceeds expectations. The hotel management here provides a memorable stay with top quality guest service. Can't wait to stay here again.

title: Second time not so Great
review: Overall, the experience left me underwhelmed.  It boils down to service and value. I will start with the positives- resort directly on the beach, 90% of the staff courteous and friendly, great location to Pier and restaurants.  The opportunities- reserving of pool chairs ridiculous, the amount of kids and all their pool accessories left little to no room for adults ( there is no adult pool), and the level of inconsistency with hotel personnel on who gets free upgrades and who has to pay for them is shameful. While I was happy to upgrade 2 days into my 4 day trip, I was equally as unhappy to hear other patrons brag about upgrades for free. As a repeat customer and IPrefer member I assumed certain gestures would not come with a hassle. Not sure if this resort appreciates loyalty.

title: Will Definately Return
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you found  our beach nice and most of our staff courteous and friendly.    In your review you mentioned free upgrades.  We do our best to accommodate requests and upgrade whenever we can but based on requests and reservations sometimes it just isn't possible.  Please accept my apology.    If you would like to speak regarding your stay, please contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Nice resort but not worth the price tag
review: Our family stayed here for our summer vacation and it was a glorious stay !  This is a full service resort and the staff and amenities are amazing.  The hotel is clean, beautiful and I can tell it was carefully planned out when they built it. We stayed in a Junior suite with a beautiful view of the pool and Gulf.  The only thing I didn't care for was the shutters between the bathroom and bedroom. The shutters kept popping open and never really locked shut. It wouldn't be such a big deal if it were only my husband and I but we were rooming with our two older teens and the last thing you wanted was the shutters popping open as your getting out of the shower or using the bathroom. :)  The Sand Pearl has everything anyone could ever need. The Starbucks in the lobby was very…

title: Very nice 4-star place but not 4-star treatment
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear that you felt our staff and amenities were amazing. We are so happy that you chose the Sandpearl Resort to spend your family vacation and that your experience at the pool and the service provided to you throughout the hotel made your vacation special. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again!    Regards, Lani Wood  Rooms MIT

title: TO Much money for nothing
review: The Sandpearl is a beautiful resort and the beach is wonderful. But we were expecting more to be included for what we paid. The free bottle of water daily, wifi and in room keurig coffee maker (which I had to clean out to make it work properly) were nice but were the only things we used in the $25 per day resort fee. Beach umbrellas were not included in the resort fees. Valet parking was $20 per night (we never needed the car because everything is within walking distance). Housekeeping was decent but didn't come at all one day even though we were gone for 7 hours and put out the sign for them to come. There were a couple little things in the room that surprised me for a 4 diamond resort (eg. slow draining sink, no sugar for the coffee,  the menu for ordering movies never worked,…

title: This place is decent BUT......
review: Not the 5 star experience I was expecting. People reserve pool sunbeds at ridiculously early hours and don't turn up to occupy until noon meaning you get the seats with no umbrellas or not possible to get 4 seats together even if you are at the pool at 9.30 am! The staff are unconcerned by this and the majority of sunbeds are empty all morning (bar the nicely laid out towels). Also if you want to go on the beach because all the beds have been reserved you have to pay $25 plus tax for one beach umbrella (only 2 sunbeds per umbrella please!)..... Maybe my expectations were too high given the price paid but I would not go back. The cleaning in the suites was also questionable - grimy rim round bath and sand in bottom on arrival - yuk. I agree with previous reviews though that the…

title: Great weekend trip
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort Clearwater Beach.  Please accept my apology for the issues you experienced.  In your review you commented on our service seeming rehearsed.  Believe me, this is not how we train our associates.  We like to create a feeling of being at home and normally pride ourselves of being a very friendly, service oriented hotel.  I am sorry that you did not feel that was the case during your stay.  I will also speak to the manager at Tate's Island Grill about your comment on the server turning off the lights around you while you were still eating.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay with us please feel free to reach out to me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Not impressed with the Sandpearl.
review: We visited this resort to attend a friends wedding, and it was fantastic.  Prior to the trip we had never heard of this resort, and generally avoided Florida beaches.  The resort itself was very well kept, and had really nice furnishings inside.  Outside, the pool had a great layout with plenty of chairs and definitely felt very upscale.  We ate at each of the restaurants on-site and the food was great, across the board.  For lunch we ate outside at the bar by the pool, overlooking the beach and for the evening we ate at the more upscale restaurant.  The resort definitely had a very high end feel - and was a great deal across the Board for food, travel and accommodations.  We can't wait to return!

title: A little disappointed
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear your visit to the resort for your friend's wedding was a wonderful experience and that our property made an impression on you. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Regards, Lani Wood Rooms MIT

title: Friendly Luxury in Clearwater
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl in Clearwater at the end of June and I am sorry to say it was our first and last trip to the property.  It was very disappointing.  We stayed with a group of 15 family members (adults and children) on our annual family vacation.  We were very excited for our trip after reading all of the positive reviews of the property on TripAdvisor.  The property itself was fine.  We all had either 1 bedroom or 2 bedroom suites which was enough space for the families however, the property itself is starting to get a little worn down (carpets in the hallways needed to be replaced and walls should be painted).  Other than that, the rooms were spacious for our needs and the views were great.    The service at the property was sub-par throughout our stay.  Restaurant…

title: Nice Re$ort
review: My girlfriend and I took my two kids to Sandpearl at the end of June after a busy couple of days in Orlando. The resort is very nice with great service for the most part.  The convience of the pool and beach cannot be beat plus there are plenty of reaturants and shops very close to take advantage. Tate's is ok but very expensive for what you get.  We sellected this resort because of the advertised kids program which was great however costs $50 a kid per session ($25 for a second kid in the same family). My son loved it and wanted to go back multiple days.  We had our dnd sign up but a maid serviced our room anyway. I went to the room when she was there and she made up some story about someone telling her to do it. That was really the only negative.  If you book do it early and…

title: Beautiful location, treated like royalty
review: This was a wonderful place to visit with very friendly staff, plenty of amenities, and staff went out of their way to ensure I didn't have to.  The location was perfect near shops and downtown.  We had a great view of the pool area and beach.  The hotel's restaurants were also wonderful!

title: the view was Beautiful
review: we stayed here for our anniversary and it was wonderful, it is a full service resort, where everyone is so nice from the person who greets you at the door to the attendant's at the pool . Our room was beautiful as was the view to the pool and of course the amazing Clearwater beach!

title: Nice resort, great beach, mixed service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted you chose to share such a special occasion with us. We hope your anniversary was full of cherished moments and happy memories. We look forward to welcoming you back on your return to the resort!  Regards, Lani Wood Rooms MIT

title: Great! Could be so much more....
review: My friends & I spent this past weekend at the Sandpearl, where many of us have spent weekends before.  While past visits have been flawless, this one had some hiccups.  Issue with rooms, even though booked months ago, but we worked that out.  Service in the restaurant extremely lacking, resulting in us having to speak to a manager to get our server to offer us cocktails (at our bar tables!), and then taking almost 2 hours to get any of our food out to us, but the music was fun, and we made the best of it. Spa was relaxing and just what I needed.  Kudos to Nancy for my great facial!  Mark was our bellman when we checked in, and he was delightful, and patiently waited with us and kept us entertained while we sorted out our rooming issue.  Courtney did a great job of helping us…

title: Rejuvenating!!
review: Being first timers in Clearwater, my husband and I wanted to make sure that the hotel we will stay at is at great location, have great reviews and accessible to the major landmarks. So after a thorough review, I chose this for our babymoon and true enough, not only was my husband impressed with the hotel, but also very happy. I also chose this because of the pool and it's close proximity to the beach, although the major drawback is that the pool is mostly packed, I wish they had a bigger one or had other adult pools. The staff was commendable, from the valet staff, to the receptionists and the housekeeping. Both the housekeeping and the turndown service were good We only got to try Tate's poolside grill which served great virgin cocktails. It's accessibility to nearby…

title: great vacation with a couple cons
review: Dear Guest,  I am glad that your first time in Clearwater was a relaxing and rejuvenating experience. Our staff is happy to assist in making your stay as memorable as possible throughout your stay with us. We are delighted you chose the Sandpearl Resort for your babymoon and hope you return soon for more cherished memories!   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Stunning!
review: We searched high and low for a hotel that had everything we were looking for on the gulf. My husband and I have stayed at many a Four Seasons and other high end hotels and we wanted a place that had great amenities for us and the kids and was near Clearwater. We came to the Sandpearl in May and had a wonderful trip with just a couple of negatives. First, the positive. The condo style room we had is what we look for and it was wonderful. A large fully stocked kitchen, pull out sofa for the kids, our own giant master suite, all with gorgeous high end bedding and a washer dryer. We loved that we could eat breakfast in the room and head out for the day. We also loved eating by the pool (the spicy grouper sandwich was our fav) and the service was fantastic. The beach was pristine and…

title: Unbelievable!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your most recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you were happy with your condo style room and that it was what you were looking for. It sounds as though your vacation while at the resort was both adventurous and relaxing! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon on your next visit to the beach and hope we can exceed your expectations each visit.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Phenomenal Stay
review: We stayed at Sandpearl for three nights as a family and booked two rooms.  The place is absolutely beautiful.  Gorgeous landscaped grounds, pool, private beach, beautiful decor inside, very friendly and professional staff.  The only drawback was that we wished we could've had adjoining rooms and we wished we would've booked rooms with balconies.  At night they do turn down service and put chocolates on your bed, but we found that only one of our rooms received this service for some reason.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay and the beautiful surroundings and we wish we would've stayed in Clearwater the entire week!

title: Fantastic weekend!
review: My husband and I went to the Sandpearl for a kid-free weekend getaway.  We were pleasantly surprised upon check-in to learn we had been upgraded to a one bedroom suite.  Everything about the resort was great from the service, the rooms, to the pool and the beach area.  We ate one meal at the hotel (at the poolside bar and grill) and that even that was fantastic. A bit pricey but definitely worth the splurge! Make sure to take into account the valet fees, resort fees, etc as they so add up quickly. Hoping we will be back in the future to enjoy the resort again!

title: AMAZING!!!!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. I am happy that you had a relaxing getaway at the resort and were pleased with your accommodations upon arriving to your room. We are delighted you enjoyed your experience at the pool and beach as well as throughout the resort during your stay. It is our pleasure to assist in making your stay as pleasant as possible. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Just the relaxing vacation we wanted
review: We just returned and all we can say is amazing!!!!!! Everything from A to Z was wonderful. Our family can not wait to return. Our girls loved the pillow mist we received at night when returning to the room. They were convinced it put them to sleep (can a purchase a couple of boxes--lol) Thank you for a wonderful stay!!!!!!

title: Beautiful Family Vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. I am glad your experience was amazing and everything went wonderfully! I am so delighted we could help in creating cherished memories. We appreciate your feedback and hope you return to the Sandpearl Resort soon for more fun and relaxation.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent, you should try it
review: After a few hiccups upon arrival, we found that the Sandpearl was just what we were looking for--a relaxing, upscale resort on a great beach.  Our arrival was after 11 p.m. and although I had called ahead and said we would be arriving late, our bed was turned down but there was no bed made up for our daughter. When we moved the table to pull out the bed, we discovered some trash on the floor. (Other than that, the housekeeping was great and the room was very clean the rest of the week.) So we had to wait for linens for our sleepy little traveler (and she didn't receive a little bucket and shovel).  We had a one-bedroom suite on the 7th floor. Bay view was nice, no complaints. In fact, saw a great rainbow one day. We didn't spend a lot of time in the room so view didn't matter to…

title: Fabulous
review: I was here for a wedding, and could not have been more impressed.  Beautiful rooms with tall ceilings, great private beach, fire pit for the chilly evenings... This resort has all the 1920s glamour but with modern conveniences.  I saved a few dollars by staying at the Marriott nearby for part of the trip, but that was totally not worth it - after checking into the Sandpearl, I wished I had spent the extra money and stayed there the entire time.  The one irritating item was the "resort fee" they assessed at checkout - it was just a silly way of charging a higher rate.

title: Sandpearl Resort! Fantastic Service in a Fantastic Location, best hotel in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  I am happy to hear you were impressed with the property and service by our staff during your stay for a wedding at the resort. It is great to hear that your experience with us was memorable and that you would have liked to stay longer with us. We hope you return to us soon on your next visit to Clearwater Beach and we appreciate your feedback regarding your visit.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Gorgeous!!
review: The Sandpearl and Clearwater Beach have the best service of any vacation hands down.  We loved the staff, who was consistently 100% positive and was the icing on the cake of this beautiful resort.  We walked and drove around Clearwater and quickly realized we had the best location on the beach.  We had a family of 5 in the Junior Suite with a beautiful view of the pool a and the beach on the 5th floor.  The room was immaculate and it had an amazing bathroom.  Each morning and evening we enjoyed the balcony as well as the use of the pool and beach.  I searched all over Florida for the perfect mix of property, pool, beach and service, we were not disappointed.  We loved the towel service, icecream by the pool and smores at sunset.  This is a first class resort and we knew the…

title: A gem surrounded by trashy dumps.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. It is great to hear that our staff provided memorable service and were positive and helpful throughout your stay. I am happy that our housekeeping team kept your room immaculate and that our resort provided a fun mix of pool, beach, and service for you and your family to enjoy! We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Booked room 6 months in advance, only to be told it was unavailable at check-in.
review: We stayed at the sand pearl and we absolututely loved it. We loved how the beach was several steps away from the pool. It is such a beautiful hotel and the rooms are awesome. They prep your beds every day and they make the room look super nice. If you are in Clearwater, you should definitely stay there.

title: Nice resort, beautiful beach
review: The resort was very nice, very clean, in a great location.  The beach was beautiful and you can walk to many amenities.  The staff was polite and attentive.  Nightly activities including outdoor movies and cooking s'mores.  The only negative is how outrageously priced the food and drinks were.

title: Wonderful!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort. I am happy you felt the resort was clean and in a great location. We certainly are in close proximity to several shops and restaurants along Clearwater Beach. It is our pleasure to assist you and enhance your stay in any way we can while you are with us. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: A slice of paradise
review: Our second trip to Clearwater and Sandpearl. The best vacation both times. There is not one thing I could or would complain about. Love everything about the Sandpearl, great pool, great beach and everyone that works there are always pleasant!! Thanks Sandpearl for another great vacation!!

title: Best on the beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. We are delighted your second visit to the Sandpearl Resort was one of your best vacations! It is great to hear that our staff provided memorable service during your stay and you were pleased with our pool and private beach area. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic!!!
review: Just returned from a 3-day stay at the Sandpearl (just my husband and I).  We were offered champagne upon check-in, which was a nice touch!  Very friendly, very attentive staff.  Lots of families with kids at the resort and there appeared to be lots of good activities for kids throughout the day as well.    Room: Gulf view. Large space, very clean, bed was comfortable, balcony a little small, but has two nice rocking chairs.  Enjoyed sitting outside.  Gulf view is well worth the extra money, however I would also say that most of the other rooms (unless you face the road vs the beach) would be pretty good views as well.  The higher the floors, the better the views.  TIP:  Rooms are pretty close together, as it's a small property, so you do not have much privacy unless you shut…

title: Very good but not as perfect as I thought it would be.
review: Overall very nice!! For 5 stars I was a little surprised by a few little things. Pool was always cloudy. We have a pool at home and there is no need for this. Treatments should be done nightly on the  pool, as we know lots of people are probably peeing in this pool. Along with all the sunscreen. Mold in our shower. Again no need for this. All showers should be sprayed down with a bleaching solution after each guest checks out of room. Personally, I think $20. /day for valet parking is a bit much. On check out, there were a pile up of car "leaving" but going no where. Two of the employees were arguing with each other. Very unprofessional. We have a honda accord and I could see how guys loading car thought less of how they were shoving our belongings into our trunk side we were…

title: Wonderful Stay 1st Class Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort in June. In your review, you mentioned the cloudiness of the pool. Our cleaning staff uses a powerful sanitizer daily for the pool that is less harsh on the environment than chlorine and which does not leave residual chemicals in the water. Although sunscreen may accumulate throughout the day, the pool is sanitized daily for the safety and enjoyment of our guests.   It is certainly not Sandpearl's standard of customer service to have employees argue on the ramp. I have followed up with my valet staff and have addressed the issue. Thank you for your review and bringing your concerns to my attention.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood  Assistant Front Office Manager    Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Best in Clearwater
review: I am so happy with this resort, that I'm writing a review before I even leave.  My wife and I booked an 8 night stay with our 2 year old daughter.  We are in a suite with a full kitchen and washer and dryer.  We feel so at home here.  Everything is so convenient and the beach access is awesome.  You can tell that the employees are empowered to do whatever it takes to makes guests feel welcomed and pampered.  I want to especially call out two superb employees (Michelle and Jen) from Camp Ridley (kids camp.)  They have gone above and beyond to make my daughter love this place and that makes life easier for us parents.  We don't leave our daughter with anyone who is not a family member, but my wife is comfortable with Michelle and Jen.  This place is all class from top to bottom. …

title: My best hotel experience in clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  I am so happy to hear that you and your family are enjoying your stay with us. I am delighted that you feel at home here at the Sandpearl Resort and that our staff has made you feel pampered and welcomed during your stay. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Jen and Michelle from Camp Ridley. Thank you for your feedback regarding your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: just relaxing and lovely
review: My husband and I took my 87 year old grandma here for vacation (she lives an hour away). The staff was incredibly kind to her, and us too. The hotel is beautiful and classy, yet comfortable and casual. The food is fantastic, and the restaurant is a great place to watch the sunset. I'd go back!

title: Pearl in Clearwater
review: SandPearl is a great resort and Location , and from time you pull up to Front to Unload your Luggage and Let Valet take your Car , Check is easy and  short walk to the Room you have ask for     Once your in and ready beach is only a Elevator Ride away .Caretta , for dinner and lunch is great , Breakfast is so so , great looking Buffet if that what you want , I prefer to go in sit down and just relax pick off menu and not have to serve myself , But the wait staff will try to verbally beat you down to point of choosing the buffet over ordering , I ask my server on day two if management or chefs makes them do that , of course he would not tell me , But i thought it was aggravating and some humor also when he told me i could have save $1.50 if i went with Buffet my response was if…

title: I would not suggest you use them for an event.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am happy to hear that our staff took care of you at check-in and throughout your stay, so that everything went smoothly and you were able to begin enjoying your time at the resort right away. I am glad the service from Jason was memorable to you. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to him. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Noisy in some areas, service not all good
review: I made two trips, two hours each way, to this resort and spoke with no less than six people.  I planned a lovely Sweet Sixteen, prepaid my deposit, got my daughter excited about a party, and met locally with my engraver for invitations before a manager called to say all six people gave me incorrect information.  She didn't even apologize for their lack of knowledge. The closest she came was to say she is sorry to be the one to give me bad news that the guests can't use the pool.  I then spoke to the General Manager who said that also there is ALSO a policy that only five can use the beach....another rule even the last manager neglected to share. His big concession after all this was to say I could have all the guests on the beach....well BIG DEAL since it is a public beach.  It…

title: delightful!
review: Dear Guest, I wanted to take this opportunity to apologize for the initial confusion regarding the Sweet Sixteen event you wanted to have at our resort.  While we do have Sweet Sixteen, Bar Mitzvahs, Bat Mitzvahs, etc on a regular basis the issue came in regards to your desire to use our pool.  We have a very strict policy regarding this.  Pool use is only for registered guests who have overnight accommodations and the most any one room can have is 5 guests, therefore limiting the pool usage per room to a maximum of 5.  You wanted to have a party in which 20 teenagers and their accompanying chaperones would be around our pool.  Unfortunately, this we could not allow.  When we spoke I did tell you that I would make an exception and you could utilize the Gulf Lawn and our private beach but this was not acceptable.  Also, in your review you mentioned our beach and that is was public.  That is not factual however.  The beach in front of the Sandpearl is a private beach.  This allows us to restrict who utilizes it as well as allows us to sell food and beverage on the beach.    Again, I apologize for the initial confusion with the communication regarding your daughters special event.    Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful Property, Fine Quality Hotel.
review: This is an attractive hotel in a magnificent location overlooking the Gulf, however the 2 adjacent coast view rooms we were allocated on arrival were directly above the very noisy air con plant on the adjoining conference centre roof. The noise is so loud that the balconies were unusable and the patio doors had to be closed at all times. Due to the noise we asked to be moved and although it was eventually sorted out it was a very long and frustrating process, especially as many of the waiters were telling us how quiet the hotel was for the time of year. There is a good range of services although those not included in the $25 a day resort fee are expensive. On the positive side the pool is beautiful, the pool chairs are very comfortable and we found all the waiting staff to be…

title: Sweet Sandpearl
review: We have stayed at the Sandpearl many times even though we live locally. It is a beautiful resort on the the soft, white sand of Clearwater Beach. The rooms are very nicely appointed. The pool is very nice and the cabana and poolside bar service is excellent.   Tate's is the casual outdoor dining restaurant with very good food and wonderful drinks on the unbeatable sand with great views of the Gulf of Mexico. There is a nice firepit on the beach for night time ambience.  Fine dining is very good at Caretta's as well.  Life is very Sweet at the Sandpearl. Enjoy!!

title: Simply wonderful!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. We are delighted to hear you enjoy returning to us from your residence in Tampa. I am so happy our quality of food and service at our restaurants on property keep you coming back to us! We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Regards, Lani Wood  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice resort area
review: Stayed here twice now with the last time in May 2014. Fantastic location right on the beach. Rooms are good. Last time we stayed we were lucky enough to have a sea view room. Will definitely stay again.   Be aware that parking and resort fees do not come cheap though. One night cost an extra $49 - ouch!

title: Best beach resort in Florida
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. We are happy you were pleased with our location on Clearwater Beach and had view of the beautiful sunsets from your room. We hope your return again soon for more sunsets and ocean views!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful resort right on the beach with some flaws!
review: We just spent a long weekend here and had a great time with friends. The staff was very knowledgeable of the area and helped us whenever we needed it. The outdoor fire pit was on the fritz but that didn't stop the beautiful sunsets. The concierge was not that helpful but the valets were great and guided us to some prime spots during our stay. Very nice pool but get there early as the seats fill fast but there is plenty of overflow on the beach. Overall a great place to stay and walking distance from several attractions.

title: Beautiful
review: This hotel well exceeded our expectations.  Upon arrival, all staff members were very friendly. We were offered champagne mimosa's as we headed up to our room.  The bags were a bit late getting to our room, so if you can handle it, I recommend you take your own bags, especially if you want to enjoy the beach or pool quickly upon arrival.
