We had a "north view' room which was amazing.  The only thing is that we couldn't spend much time on the balcony because we were right over the A/C units that were very loud.  The pool area was gorgeous with upgraded lounge chairs (very comfortable).  The beachside café was so wonderful.  A full view of the beach while enjoying a sandwich and burger. The food was good and the service was friendly and relaxed.  The bar and restaurant were a bit…

title: Great getaway!
review: Dear Guest,  I am so happy to hear we exceeded your expectations on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. From the sunsets to the service at the pool bar, I am delighted to hear you enjoyed every bit. We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your stay with us and hope you return soon for another memorable vacation.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: A wonderful Hotel.
review: We decided to go there for a weekend and were not disappointed...beautiful & clean...right in the heart & action of Clearwater Beach!  The sunsets were beautiful right from the bar and grill right on the beach!  Pier 60 park is within walking distance!

title: Thoroughly enjoyable! Loved every minute!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you were not disappointed about your experience at the resort and that you enjoyed how beautiful and clean it was. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Can I please just live here?!
review: My wife and I have been holidaying every year at Clearwater Beach since 1990.  However, this was our first visit to the SandPearl Resort, and we hope, not the last.  The SandPearl is not the most recent addition to the Clearwater hotel community, but it is certainly, in our opinion, the best. Of all the attributes of the SandPearl, the attitude of the staff is the one that stands out the most in our minds.  Everyone of the staff, and we mean everyone, was welcoming, attentive, cheerful and accommodating.  We cannot praise them enough, they really helped to make our holiday the wonderful time it was. The Hotel itself was immaculate.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  The eating establishments within the Hotel were impeccable and very inviting, and the food served was of top…

title: One of the BEST Vacations!
review: We just returned from a 4-night stay at the Sandpearl.  My husband and I traveled with our 10 month old daughter (it was her first vacation!) along with four others.  From the moment we arrived our stay was wonderful.  While my father checked in, we sat in the lobby and enjoyed the view of the pool and Gulf.  Someone brought my daughter a sand bucket and shovel which was such a nice gesture.  Thank you! Our rooms were Gulf view (512 & 514) and we were very pleased with the beautiful view, accommodations, and service.  We requested a pack-and-play crib for our daughter and she slept very well in it.  We spent each day on the beach and rented umbrellas ($25 per day) for shade.  We loved having the option of ordering lunch/beverages on the beach from Tate Island Grill.  My group…

title: Luxury on the Gulf
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay with us. We are so happy your daughter got to spend her first vacation at the Sandpearl Resort! I am delighted to hear your stay was wonderful from the moment you arrived. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: the best hotel/resort on Clearwater Beach
review: This review is a bit late as I stayed at the Sandpearl earlier this year on a business related trip.  The Hotel is quite luxurious with a lot of original art on the main floor. a player piano and on site amenities along with an attentive, friendly and helpful staff.  It's about 30 minutes from the airport in non peak traffic time. Cab cost about $40 - $45.00 But there is also a shuttle option - need to advance book it though.   Rooms facing the north do look out over another flat roof with a/c units so it is best to get something facing the courtyard or the ocean. The rather large pool is real nice with some palm trees for shade and often crowded during peak times. In which case you want to arrive a little earlier. Many good restaurants within a 2 or 3 block walk along with many…

title: A good hotel for people who don't shower
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your stay with us. I am happy that our staff were attentive, helpful, and friendly to you, it is our pleasure to assist in any way. Our location certainly is close to several shops and restaurants along Clearwater Beach to provide plenty of options throughout your stay. We are delighted you enjoyed your time here and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Just perfect
review: This was our second stay at the Sandpearl. Everything about this resort is top notch. The decor of the place leads you to believe you are on a tropical island and it is one of the most beautiful I have ever stayed in. The rooms are very nice. The staff is excellent. The food at both the restaurant and beach side café are very good.  Pool area is beautiful although it is very hard to get a lounge on the weekend. We prefer the beach anyway and you will have a complimentary lounge in the white sand. The beach staff will bring the food and/or cocktails right to you.  We visit Florida often and have stayed in many hotels. This hotel and The LaPlaya in Naples are my favorites. You can't worry about cost when you stay at a luxury resort. You get what you pay for here.

title: Expense at the beach
review: We recently stayed at the Sand Pearl Resort Hotel at Clearwater Beach and on arrival it all looks really good but, the first room with a view they put us in had a wonderful view of the flat roof next door and all the A.C units. This was swiftly changed at our request. We were given good advice by the first concierge we spoke with but after that the others were too pre-occupied with important jobs at hand. The all round efficiency of the room staff was moderate considering it's a 5 star resort and the pool is very average as far as pools go in the States. The beach is on site and is superb with good beds and covers. The breakfast which obviously wasn't included was very expensive for the range of items on offer and personally i don't think lived up to it's billing. The rooms are…

title: Amazing view, amazing room, amazing staff
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I appreciate the feedback.  In your review you commented on our breakfast options, valet and concierge service.  It appears that we did not live up to your expectations and for that I am very sorry.  I will share your feedback with our team.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful Beach Resort
review: After travelling here from Orlando the night before I attempted to check-in. However my travel agents had mis-booked and the hotel had no record of my stay. To make matters worse, the hotel was fully booked for the night. At this point the lovely staff at the front desk could not have been more helpful, whilst they could not accommodate me, they called every hotel possible so that I was not homeless for the night.  After a not-so-great night elsewhere, I received a phone call from the front desk supervisor Courtney informing me she had a room ready for me. It was 11am and this was so kind as I was being checked out of the holiday inn (thankfully).  When I arrived I was made to feel as if I had arrived home. A delightfully quick check in and bell hop service had me situated in my…

title: It's worth it.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear that our staff were accommodating and made you feel as though you had arrived home. It is our pleasure to assist in any way possible to ensure you are taken care of and I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Corinne, Courtney, and Young. We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope you choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Clearwater Beach.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent Vacation..... We Will Return!
review: Stayed at the Sandpearl with my husband and absolutely loved it! Only reason for average room rating- thin walls, and was awoken many times by our neighbors. Visited the spa and had an amazing massage. It's located right on the beach with gorgeous views. Their restaurants were delicious. If you are looking for a beach stay with top notch service, this is the place!! Will definitely stay here again!

title: Terrific property in Clearwater, FL
review: The highlight of the stay here is the staff.  Fantastic attitude from everyone we interacted with, and a perfect balance of providing terrific service without being overly intrusive.  The facilities are high quality in every aspect that we encountered, from the pool, to the lounge chairs, to the restaurants, and the rooms.  We noticed absolutely no issues with the quality or condition of the facilities.  The food and service at the restaurant were excellent and the atmosphere at the pool was terrific.  This property is right on a beautiful beach and the views of the beach and ocean were as good as you can get in Clearwater.  Hard to do any better in the Tampa area.

title: Beautiful place
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear our staff provided you with exceptional service with great attitudes. It is our pleasure to be at your service should you need anything during your stay! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Sandpearl Resort and we hope you choose to stay with us again on your next visit to Clearwater.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Outstanding Vacation
review: This was our second stay at the Sandpearl.  What a beautiful place and friendly town. The staff is always helpful and friendly. Our room was kept very clean and stocked.  We stayed 6 days in a junior suite with a king bed.  Our view of the beach and pool from our balcony was beautiful.  The beach is beautiful and water so warm.  The pool at the Sandpearl is so pretty.  Nice to have a drink and lunch by the pool.  Love the poolside movies at night.  Can't wait for our next stay.

title: Nice but...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay with us. I am happy to hear our staff were helpful and friendly and that you were pleased with how your room was cleaned and stocked throughout your stay. It sounds as though you had a relaxing vacation at the resort! We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful sunsets!!!
review: For the past 4 days I have truly enjoyed this facility. The room was spacious and elegantly designed to fit our family of 4. The kitchen came with all the necessary items to cook meals in our room and the bathroom is enormous with a soaking tub, large tiled shower and two sinks. The washer and dryer were an added bonus! The staff is very friendly and helpful. They truly care about their customers. I would highly recommend this hotel, its location is perfect and near many great restaurants and family activities that are within walking distance. The previous complaints that I read before my travel are ridiculous. Read between the lines. These are the people who never be pleased with their hotel accommodations. The Sandpearl Resort is costly, but worth every penny. You will not be…

title: Could definitely get used to this..
review: This was our first stay at the Sandpearl, for a short get-away. We wished it had been for a long get-away! One could definitely get used to this beautiful resort and attentive service. We have been to Clearwater Beach a number of times and this was by far the nicest place we have stayed. It costs a bit more than many other places on the beach, but if you can afford the difference, it's worth it. I commented to my husband that it has spoiled us for staying anywhere else in Clearwater.   Besides the natural, fantastic setting of the resort, I think the thing that stood out most was the friendly and attentive service of all the employees. Everyone greets you with an enthusiastic smile and hello. Any request is met with a quick response. The resort is beautiful, clean and…

title: Nothing More to Say
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear our staff was attentive and enthusiastic in greeting you throughout your stay. I am glad you enjoyed your breakfast at our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf, as well as dining at our beachside grill!  Please accept my sincere apology for your delay in checking in. We do our best to get our early arrivals in before 4pm if there are rooms available before the guaranteed check-in time. Despite the delay, I am happy your stay was everything you had hoped it would be.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Family friendly luxury - down to Earth staff!
review: Our daughter and granddaughter came to visit from Poland. Our daughter booked a room in another hotel on the beach which was sub-standard in out opinion. We checked out the next day and went to the Sand Pearl.  As we walked drove up and stopped our car the level of service was incomparable to other hotels in the area. My comment to my family was "this is our home away from home".  We love the Sand Pearl, the service, amenities and personnel are fantastic.

title: First impression mean everything!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort. It is great to hear that our service was incomparable to other hotels you experienced in the area. I am so glad you felt like the Sandpearl was your home away from home and that you were pleased with the amenities offered. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Very shabby, terrible housekeeping
review: This was my first visit to the Sandpearl since the new hotel management and I must say I was impressed! I traveled with my mother and 9 month old son and we stayed for 4 nights. I wished it was longer because everything about our stay was perfect. The front desk staff was lovely, the housekeeping staff very patient and kind, the wait staff, pool staff, cafe, restaurant, etc...  all friendly and attentive. The grounds are just as well maintained as they were 4 years ago. I love that Camp Ridley still exists for the little ones. The pool staff provided my son with a baby sized beach ball that he LOVED and even gave me a popsicle for him to help soothe his gums from teething... it worked wonders! We stayed in the gulf view suite which is spacious and provided us with enough space…

title: Vacation Pardise!
review: The Sandpearl Resort is such an oasis from the busy Cleawater Beach that surrounds it. Its location and the fact that it is a big C shaped building facing the Gulf, keeps the atomspshere quiet and serene and just for it's guests.  The rooms are gorgeous and the food is crazy good with enough variety that one need go elsewhere always.  Of course the little Clearwater Beach town offers much to do as well right outside your door.   Staff is attentive, grounds and hotel are beautiful.  Can't go wrong!!

title: Amazing Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted you found our resort to be an oasis from the busy beach and had a relaxing and enjoyable time while you were here with us. I am happy you were pleased with the dining options at the resort and that our staff were attentive to you. It is our pleasure to assist you with whatever you may need throughout your stay. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Very Disappointed
review: Sandpearl Resort is one of my favorite places to stay at on Clearwater Beach.  The service is impecable.  Debi is the restaurant manager and has made our stay an amazing one with her exceptional service. The staff are experienced and professional.   The valet staff are top notch!  A special regognition to Kenny!  We accidently gave him $200, when we meant to give him $5.  He sought us out and returned the money realizing we made a mistake.  This type of honesty and professionalism is something you dont see everyday, but has been our continued experience at Sandpearl.   Thank you for your continued consistency is exemplifying exceptional customer service throughout.  My memories are lasting ones that keep us coming back for more:-) Rick & Susan

title: Amazing stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you received exceptional customer service throughout your stay by our staff in all departments of the resort. It is our pleasure to do what we can to make your stay with us as memorable and pleasant as possible. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Debi and Kenny. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon. We are delighted to have you return to us on your next visit to Clearwater Beach!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: A Resort with Tradition ...
review: After reading all the reviews and speaking with family members we were very excited to plan my husbands 60th surprise birthday party at this resort.  We booked one of the expensive corner suites for the weekend and upon check in found the closet full of dirty linens.  The staff came to remove the dirty linen within the hour.  There was no apology from management. Our daughter, who was traveling from abroad to surprise her father, had some items shipped to the hotel to take back with her, only to have them never appear - it seems they were checked in by staff but just disappeared!!  This issue was never resolved and phone calls were never returned. Next we booked 2 airport transfers with the concierge which were fine and also asked for a car service to take 9 of us to dinner - we…

title: lovely and luxury
review: Site of business conference and everything was quite agreeable.  Staff close to Ritz Carlton level of customer service (not quite there yet....I had to find pool side server) but accommodations were outstanding and my experience with the housekeeping staff was memorable! I was surprised at good catering quality- every business meal was well prepared and elegantly presented. Would definitely come back for personal visit

title: Not worthy of 5 star rating.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted that your experience with our housekeeping team was memorable and the accommodations in your room were outstanding. It is wonderful to hear that the meals prepared by our catering staff were of great quality for you. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful Destination Wedding Experience
review: This was our 3rd time staying at this resort.  The 1st time, about 3 years ago, was amazing, simply wonderful and perfect.  The 2nd time, just last year, was good but experienced some bad customer service.  After this last stay, just last week, I may not ever return.  Something has changed, I think it was bought by some other company or at least run by some new company (Opal?).  I would like to know who's brilliant idea it was to show a movie at night by the pool where the sound is so loud you cannot sleep or even watch TV without turning up the volume very loud.  I didn't know I booked a resort at a drive-in movie.  The activity sheet said they only show poolside movie's on the weekends but they played it on Monday night, Tuesday night, and Wednesday night and probably would…

title: Tate's beach bar is the bomb!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I am sorry that your stay did not live up to your previous visits.  In your review you commented on new ownership.  We do not have new ownership.  The current owners have proudly owned the resort for the past 3.5 years.  You also commented on the dive-in movies.  This is normally something that guests enjoy.  I have spoken to the pool managers to make sure that the volume is not too high, as it appears was the issue during your stay.  I am sorry for the inconvenience.  I also apologize for your issues at the Spa and with your transportation.  If you would like to speak personally regarding the experience please feel free to contact me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Perfect Hotel for a Perfect Vacation
review: My cousin got married on the property so our whole family took a vacation. I was floored by the level of customer service on the property. I had a wonderful experience dining in the restaurants and visiting the spa. We also took a yoga class. I traveled with my 16 month old son and they were very accommodating. Rooms were gorgeous. We loved the pool and the beachside hammocks. Highly recommended for a vacation or even a wedding destination!

title: This resort deserves a 10-star!!
review: This resort is top notch!!!  Everything gets a 5 star!!! Rooms are very clean, beds are comfortable, service by the entire hotel staff was also the best we've received overall compared to anywhere else (all the way from front desk crew, concierge, pool desk, restaurants, and staff working the beach). My husband and I both work in customer service so this is is something that is extremely important to us and can be hard to find these days. This resort is in the best location, all shops and great restaurants are within walking distance, no car needed. And after walking a mile down the beach, we learned that we also have the best beach front. It's private with chairs and umbrellas you can rent for the day, very clean, not crowded, and you get waited on. If we ever make it back to…

title: Amazing!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear that our staff worked efficiently to return your lost item to you as soon as possible. It is great to hear you were impressed with our customer service and that our staff provided you with the best service compared to anywhere else you have stayed. We greatly appreciate your feedback and kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Another Fab Stay!
review: My husband and I travel frequently and our last few trips were with our children, so we wanted a get-away for just the two of us.  We planned our trip pretty last minute and after reading reviews on Tripadvisor I had my heart set on The Sandpearl.  The resort itself was sold out, but we found ONE remaining 1 bedroom suite on VRBO.  I cancelled my stay at The Hyatt and booked it.   I am SO glad I did.   The resort is absolutely AMAZING.  From the champagne check-in to the incredible beach bar service, we had a wonderful time.   We never made it to the pool, because the service at the beach was so good, but the pool is gorgeous.   Tates Grill has delicious food and we ate lunch their twice.  It is right on the beach.  The resort is super clean and well maintained.  The Valet…

title: Best Resort Experience Yet!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so happy you chose to stay with us and that you had a pleasant dining experience with great service provided to you at our poolside restaurant, Tate Island Grill. I am delighted to hear you have plans to return to us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent
review: This is our 10th stay at this gorgeous hotel, which speaks for itself!! The location is right on the beach, where it never seems to get overcrowded- lovely for walking up to the pier which takes around 10 mins and is surrounded by children's activities.   The hotel itself has a very relaxed feel to it, and the staff are friendly. The only criticism I have is the pool bar.. We arrived twice at 8.45 for food, having been told by the hotel that they close at 10, and were confronted by disinterested staff who were apparently ready to close( although it was busy!) Overall though, a stunning resort! We will be back!!

title: You want to go to here!
review: 3 words: Service, service, service. We spent a week here with our 3 kids. From the moment we walked in, saw the gorgeous view, and they handed us mimosas, the stay was wonderful. The staff was incredibly attentive and helpful, courteous, the concierge was great, the pool lovely, and the proximity to the beach unbeatable. The restaurant on site, Carettas, was amazing. (The Tate Island Grill wasn't spectacular but was a great place for chicken fingers on the beach.) We had a king suite with a washer dryer right there in the room, a full kitchen, and plenty of space. We went to the spa and loved it. My husband declared it the best massage he'd ever had, and mine was also amazing. Make sure you leave time for the coed jacuzzi. Delightful stay from beginning to end.

title: Loved it - felt very pampered!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. It is wonderful to hear that our staff provided you with memorable service during your visit. I am delighted you had a great experience at our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf and received courteous and attentive service wherever you went. It is our pleasure to assist in any way possible. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: More Sand Than Pearl
review: Stayed at the Sandpearl for 5 nights with my husband and 3 kids.  Loved it!  Felt pampered from the second we walked in and were handed glasses of champagne and sparkling apple cider.    Rented the gulf front junior suite.  Awesome view.  We were on a lower floor (4th) and were not bothered by noise at all.  Could hear the ocean waves more than anything else.  Had enough room for the rollaway for child #3 without being crowded.  Room was well-appointed and very comfortable.  There was some paint peeling on the bathroom door but otherwise it was very well-kept and really clean.  Activities were abundant at the resort during our stay.  On Easter they had a nice sunrise service on the beach and then a ton of kids activities during the day - an egg hunt, cookie decorating, etc. …

title: Best beachfront property in town, beware of current construction on South side
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay with us. It is our pleasure to pamper you and your family during your vacation at the resort! I am happy you found abundant activities to enjoy on property and were provided excellent service from our housekeeping and concierge teams. I am so happy you chose to spend Easter with us and we hope you return soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: 4 stars for the Sandpearl
review: Beware of this hotel's bait and switch strategy on rooms!  When we arrived we were told that we had been "upgraded" but learned a short time later that the hotel gave away the room we booked and for which we paid a deposit!  The "upgrade" meant that but for my expressing my unhappiness, my teenage daughter would have had to sleep on a folding cot (instead of a real bed) - which they called a "rollaway."  The other option was a room with a view of the loading dock or a city street when we paid for a room with an ocean view.  Ultimately, the manager agreed to give us the lower price for the worse room and comped us for breakfast during our stay, but hardly the way you want to start a vacation at what purports to be a nice resort.  It's not exactly fun to arrive only to find the…

title: Cant wait to go back
review: Pulled up outside & from that moment loved it. Have always visited the beach & seen this place being built & always wanted to try this place & it did not disappoint.  Room was ready at 12pm, only had 1 large case so managed it ourselves. Felt a bit strange not having to park our car or worry about it for the next few days, only needed it to drive over to CMA. Room was lovely nice & spacious, had Keurig coffee maker with pods (which beats most places these days), 2 TV's (never used either too busy on the beach), next door sounded like they were having a party, but when my head hit the pillow it didn't bother me. Heard the live entertainment from Clearsky Cafe on fri & sat night, but again wasn't a problem & it gave it a great beach atmosphere. Enjoyed sitting on the balcony…

title: Loved everything about the Sandpearl
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted you were able to finally get a chance to stay with us after watching our property being built. From your review, it sounds as though you had a lovely beach getaway and relaxing experience poolside. We appreciate all of your kind words regarding our property and friendly staff. We hope you choose to stay with us again the next time you are in Clearwater.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Terrible customer service
review: We are so sorry to leave today but will go back next year.  We had a wonderful time here in every aspect.  Service at the valet, desk, pool, beach, restaurant, marketplace - all excellent.  Housekeeping is on a terrific system; when you put the Service Room sign on your door handle and slip away, they seemingly arrive immediately to freshen up.  This was great when you leave for breakfast and come back, voila your room is done!  I will say the pool gets crowded but the beach chairs and umbrellas give you a view of one of America's prettiest beaches.  Great location near good casual restaurants.  Great restaurants on property.  We ate almost everything on Tate's menu and liked every item.  Leave extra time coming on the weekend to get across the bridge - not Sandpearl's issue -…

title: Happy
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so delighted to hear that the service provided to you from everyone around the resort was excellent and you were happy with how our housekeeping team serviced your room. It is great to hear you tried everything on Tate's menu and enjoyed the restaurants both on property and nearby along the beach. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!    Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Rain, Rain Go Away!
review: My family and I recently stayed at the resort to celebrate my parents 50th anniversary. The hotel required us to valet park our rental van, at an additional cost of $20 per day. You would think the vehicle would be taken care of. Instead, it was damaged and we were fined by our rental car agency. When I called the Sandpearl, the resort manager rudely claimed there was nothing he could do. He accepted no responsibility and did not even apologize. I would not recommend this resort, and caution anyone staying there about the valet service...or lack of service.

title: The Best of The Best
review: The Sandpearl Resort is the best of the best.  It is located on beautiful Clearwater Beach with beautifully soft sand, great restaurants and many attractions to keep you busy.  The resort itself is located directly on the beautiful white sand and has a zero entry pool if you have little ones and beachfront bar service if you want to sit by the pool or under a cabana on the sand.  It also has an award winning spa - so come and be pampered.  We have stayed at this resort many times.  We just returned after a weeks stay and we were pampered as usual.  We were greated with champagned and given several perks for being a return guest.  We always book a Gulf front suite - and the views are incredible.  The staff are friendly, and always attend to our every need.    For better pricing,…

title: Second Great Stay -  but have one tip...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort in April. I am happy that you have chosen to stay with us many times and that on your most recent visit to the Sandpearl, you were pampered by our staff. I am delighted to hear our staff were friendly and attentive to you throughout your stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are happy to welcome you back time and time again! We look forward to seeing you soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl the Pearl or Clearwater
review: This is a fabulous resort - beautiful, great location, and staff are all about customer service, even when very busy. just returned from my second stay there and i will be going back for sure. One tip, however. If you plan to look out your window, stay away from the "coastal view" rooms!!! Yes, you see the ocean and beach, but you see them over the dumpsters, air conditioning units and roof tops - NOT worth it. Luckily, the awesome front desk staff (Shelly, it think) helped us upgrade to a gulf front King junior suite at a small additional cost, VERY worth it!  Front desk staff were just so helpful and are one of the reasons we will recommend this resort to others and will be going back!!

title: A week in Paradise !
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear you had a pleasant stay at the Sandpearl and that our staff were so helpful and accommodating to you. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to our front desk agent, Shelley, who assisted in moving you to a room you were happy with for the remainder of your stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing resort experience
review: We have just returned from our second visit to the Sandpearl and are trying to book our third next year.   We had three adults and three kids in two connecting rooms overlooking the town which is FAB, great morning sun.  Our experience at the hotel is recommended, its not the cheapest but you pay for quality, the staff are so friendly and the kids loved every moment apart from having to go to bed!  We managed to get the GM to come and judge our sand castle building and this is the only disappointing bit of the trip as he did not vote mine as the best.  Thank you to the Sandpearl and all its staff for another great trip.  David G

title: Fabulous hotel
review: I was so excited to stay at sandpearl resort for a few nights in summer and was not left disappointed. The Hotel is beautiful, staff are extremely helpful and the pool area is fabulous. Not enough words to describe what a must stay resort this is. I can't wait to return this summer.

title: Worth it.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so happy that you were not left disappointed during your stay with us. It is great to hear that our staff were extremely helpful, the pool area was fabulous, and the hotel was beautiful. We do hope that you return in the summer months and we will look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice Hotel, a bit loud if on street view
review: I had never been to the Clearwater area before.  After driving through the area I saw many subpar properties which I know I would not have been happy with.  The Sandpearl is by far the best choice in this area.  Yes it is pricey and yes it has several add on fees, however, it is worth it.  The staff is well-trained, friendly and attentive.  The property is new, clean and well designed.  It is an absolute oasis and you need never leave the property.  Your children will have many activities to choose from and you will be able to join in on the fun or simply relax because they are so happy.  This resort even offers beach service with food, beverages, chairs and umbrellas.  This is a destination resort, so pay the extra money and enjoy.

title: great beach, expensive hotel
review: Dear Guest,  I am delighted to hear that the Sandpearl Resort left you with happy memories of your first visit to Clearwater. It is our pleasure to provide you with friendly and attentive service throughout your stay. I am so glad that our property was an oasis for you and your family. Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your most recent stay with us and look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.   Regards, Lani Wood  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Best Hotel on the gulf
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl during March break 2014, just my Husband and I.  It is a lovely Hotel with lots to offer. I strongly suggest you book through an Internet sight so you can save up to 60%. It's a nice hotel but $500 a night - I don't think so.    Our room had a King size bed and was a street view which meant we heard the ruccus coming from the bar across the road, until about 1:30am. Our room was very comfortable and equipped with a Kuerig machine as well. A gorgeous bathroom that was spacious and very clean.  Our room was not yet ready by the 4pm check in and we waited about 45mins, due to this we were given 2 days worth of free breakfast at the Hotel restaurant. It was Deelish! I strongly suggest eating at the buffet. There are also many options for evening dining…

title: Yeah, it's worth it
review: We just spend a couple of wonderful days at the Sandpearl. Beautiful hotel on the nicest beach I've seen on mainland USA.  Somehow, we ended up with a suite. The desk said it was because I booked via Orbitz. Not sure I buy that. It might be because we were there during a really dead week in late February with chilly weather. In any case, what a great room! We had a view of the marina, full kitchen (not that we used it for anything but keeping the wine cold), separate bedroom, two balconies, and the biggest bathroom I've seen in a long while.  The grounds are not very extensive, but are beautiful with a large heated pool and a really, really great beach. We took our own beverages to the beach, but we noted other guests were getting great service from the beach bar/restaurant. …

title: Best in town
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear our front desk agents were able to provide you with an upgraded suite for your stay. It is great to hear you enjoyed our heated pool, especially in the chilly February weather. We hope, on your next visit to Clearwater, you are able to stay with us again and dine at our wonderful restaurants on property.   We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Top notch resort
review: This was our first trip to Clearwater, a beach town a little tackier than we had hoped with shops and spectacles to match.  Fortunately, that wasn’t the case with the Sandpearl.  It’s no bargain, but is clearly the nicest property in an area that attracts a lot of Spring-breakers and devoted partyers . Among the Sandpearl’s finer points 1) spacious rooms and free wifi throughout the property 2) lovely, comfortable lobby area with game tables and a player piano that is sweet but not cloying  3) Starbucks on site 4) nice spa and fitness club 5) huge, beautiful beach with chair service, umbrellas and cabanas 4) good family programs but not so much that they overtake the resort 5) good shower and great bathrobes 6) soft, thick beach towels and chair covers 7) heated pool 8) truly…

title: Paradise
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your most recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that on your first trip to Clearwater Beach, you felt the Sandpearl Resort was the nicest property to accommodate you. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service and spacious rooms in the resort for our guests' comfort.   In your review, you mentioned that the beds were uncomfortable for you. Please accept my apologies for the discomfort you experienced. We do not normally receive complaints regarding our bedding. I will be sure to bring the cleanliness issue you noted in your review to the attention of my Executive Housekeeper as well.  We greatly appreciate all your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: This is the only resort you should consider staying at on a Clearwater Beach!!
review: My husband and spent four nights in March at the Sandpearl. The resort exceeded my expectations. Our room was ready upon our early arrival, it was clean, spacious and comfortable. Pool area is beautiful, but crowded. Loungers where always occupied, so we opted for the beach. There was drink & food service on the beach was great! Everyone was very friendly and happy to .  We enjoyed  the drinks and entertainment at the lobby bar. It had fun late night crowd with good drinks and live music.  I had a  deep tissues massage at the spa , which was wonderful! (Leslie) I highly recommend using the spa services.  All in all our get away was great. I would definitely return to this resort. ( I have stayed at the Hyatt, which is lovely but can't compare to the Sandpearl)

title: Beautiful resort but the rooms need work
review: I had a 2 night stay here and enjoyed my visit.  The resort is beautiful as is the pool and beach area.  The staff was consistently very nice.  I had a client dinner one night in Caretta's and it was fantastic.  My only disappointment was with my room.  My reservation clearly said Bayview.  On the 3rd floor opposite the Beach, I had no view of the Bay.  I felt the description was misleading, The other unexpected was the noise in the room.  I have never stayed in a hotel were I heard more from other rooms.  Also, you could hear the toilets flush from the other rooms, all the time.    I am unsure I would stay again because the room rate was very high.  The rooms do not measure up to the rest of the Resort.

title: Spring Break 2014...a pearl in an oyster
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am happy that your client dinner in our signature restaurant, Caretta on the Gulf, went well. The fact that our staff were consistently very nice is wonderful to hear.   In your review, you mentioned booking a Bay View room, however you were not able to see the Bay from your room on the third floor. I would recommend, if booking a Bay View room again, requesting a high floor to provide a better viewing of the intercostal, opposite the beach. Perhaps one of our Coastal View rooms would be more accommodating for you. These room are situated on the North side of the resort, priced a bit higher than the Bay View rooms, but do give you a view of the Gulf of Mexico up the coastline of Clearwater Beach.   We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope you return to the Sandpearl Resort on your next visit to Clearwater.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Good but not great
review: After spending seven days in Siesta Key, we drove up to Clearwater for one night to be closer to our flight home from the Tampa airport. We were reluctant about parachuting into spring break party central, but were really impressed with the oasis we found at Sandpearl.  Upon check-in, we were greeted with valet car service ($20/night) and were offered a glass of champagne. Nice start. Our room was a good size - two queens for a family of four - well equipped and very quiet (on the side of the building opposite to the pool, facing both the beach and bay).  We took a long walk down the beach - too much chaotic activity for us - and were more interested in spending time in the quiet paradise of the resort. Beach hammocks, beach loungers (drink service at the ready!) surf side…

title: Don't stay anywhere else in Clearwater but here.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad you were able to decompress and find fun activities around the resort to escape from the spring breakers on Clearwater Beach. I am happy to hear you were pleased with the service and food from our restaurants on property as well. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Don't trust them
review: The Good: lovely Hotel. Great position along the Gulf Cost with good access straight onto the powdery white sand of Clearwater beach. Hotel staff friendly, especially those at the Hotel entrance. The bad: Pool and pool area small and sunbeds in very close proximity so it all feels a tad cramped and overly intimate in a bad way. Beach umbrella rental is 25 dollars a day which seems money grabbing as the hotel also charges a mandatory daily 25 dollar resort fee. Housekeeping was patchy at times. Room was never dusted as far as I could see and twice we ran out of toilet paper! The biggest disappointment was the quality of the bed linen used. In my view one of the joys of going to an expensive hotel is to climb between crisp, smooth bed linen of a night. For this calibre of hotel I…

title: First class all the way!
review: You get what you pay for and this was clear at Sandpearl. $300+ a night and up and this place delivers all the way. Beautiful resort right on the beach. First class service all around from everyone. Will definitely be going back.  -------------------

title: First-Class Relaxation Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay with us. I am glad you found the resort to be beautiful and that the service to you provided by our staff was first class. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Sandpearl Resort!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Very nice
review: My daughter and I enjoyed three nights here last week while vacationing during her college break.  Entered into a beautiful lobby and was pleasantly greeted and then treated to a "free upgrade" to a one-bedroom gulf-front suite vs. the gulf-front king junior suite that we had booked!  I didn't even have to ask for any upgrades !!  We had a full kitchen, dining area and in-room washer/dryer (in the closet in the bathroom), in addition to a HUGE bathroom with 2 separate vanity sinks , a roman tub, and a large walk-in tile shower with glass door.  The separate king bedroom had it's own balcony with furniture (though my daughter complained that the bed was not that comfortable and she had a hard time sleeping, I thought the beds were "okay"), additional balcony with furniture in the…

title: Great Weather.... but don't expect more...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you were happy with the "apartment" style feel to your upgraded room and enjoyed the balcony and view of the beach and tropical pool area. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Michael Wagner, our lead concierge. I am glad our staff were happy to help you in any way possible. It is our pleasure. We greatly appreciate all of your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Top notch resort- right on the beach
review: Common USA beach town.  Not much to the town but I liked this place.  It's on the beach with beautiful white sand.  People were friendly.  Very helpful when I needed something.  Not quite a five star.  It lacked the attention to detail.  The linens and towels were not terribly soft.  Pillows were good.  Front desk staff looked like cleaning ladies - they need classier uniforms.  Everything was close.  The restaurant in the hotel was very good.  They have their own butcher on the premises.  Fresh food.  Great fish.  The only downside was the long trip out there from the airport.  Bad traffic on this two lane road.  If you go, don't leave.

title: Lovely Girls Getaway
review: My sister and I went for a long weekend.  The beach is perfect, the pool is gorgeous.  Plenty of dining options and the rooms were spacious and comfortable.  They even had champagne for us when we arrived!

title: Beautiful resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted that you and your sister enjoyed your girls getaway at the resort and that you were pleased with the spaciousness and comfort of your room throughout your stay. We hope you get another chance to vacation at the Sandpearl soon. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Luxury on a great beach
review: I love this resort. This is my second stay. The view and access to beach are both awesome. No need to cross the street. Room is huge and beautiful balcony view. Pool is awesome with great bar. Food is wonderful also. Front desk staff was very helpful when I made a mistake and got 1 bed instead of 2. Went out of their way. All the staff is very friendly and helpful. Wonderful stay!!

title: Great hotel! Great beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you loved the resort and enjoyed the pool and your room during your stay. I am happy that our staff were able to help you! We hope you return for a third visit! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: wonderful vacation experience
review: Expensive, luxurious, resort hotel on an absolutely beautiful beach.  Fantastic views from the balconies (I think every room has a balcony).  There is no bad side -- rooms on all sides have great views.  Everything about this resort hotel is first class without being so over the top that you feel intimidated. They welcome you with a glass of champagne when checking in. Staff very friendly, if a bit fawning. They will upgrade you if fancier rooms are available.  The only drawbacks are (1) nothing except valet parking, no self parking option; (2) it has an impersonal institutional feel, like a convention hotel, and (3) only a duvet on bed -- no blanket in the room.  Ridiculous, given how many people don't like duvets, especially in Florida's heat.

title: Ultimate in service
review: First time at Sandpearl turned out to be a wonderful stay for our family of 5. The service was impeccable from everyone we came in to contact with. The property is beautiful, and access to the beach can't be beat.We had a room on the side of the hotel, which still gave us great views of the ocean.The car valet was surprisingly fast, with no more than a two minute wait once you called down. The gym had all the equipment needed. Will definitely be back.

title: Still the best on Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and received impeccable service wherever you went. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Perfect!
review: Once again I was lucky enough to stay here - and the Sandpearl remains the best on Clearwater Beach (I'd say the Hyatt is next on my list) - but the Sandpearl easily holds the top spot. A beautiful property inside and out - a feeling of relaxation and 'vacation' will hit you the moment you step into the Resort. An ocean front room is a must if you are able - but it will be fine if you go with another view. The pool area is great - zero entry at one end for the little ones - plenty of space for all. Dining options are good - especially when you can sit at a table on the beach and eat lunch while listening to live music. The spa is wonderful, too. I have been to the Sandpearl with my family (kids 5, 9, 11) as well as for a girls' weekend with friends and had an equally (yet…

title: Beautiful!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. It is great to hear we hold the top spot on your list of resorts in Clearwater Beach. I am delighted you felt relaxed and on vacation during your stay! We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Heinz K. Foertsch
review: I love this hotel.  My wife and I were married there about a year and a half ago but I don't think I did a review.  It's first rate all the way.  From the valet guys out front and the complimentary sparkling wine at check-in to dinner at Caretta, comfortable beds, beautiful views and luxury amenities.  I want to move in.  I have to mention the fine work of Michele Johnson.  She worked with us for our wedding and she saw we were coming back for the weekend and left a cheese tray and some wine for us.  We honeymooned in Argentina and they even brought us wine from Mendoza.  Maybe that was a coincidence but I doubt it.  That's the kind of place it is.  You feel special the entire time.  I work in a high end hotel in the area and I hope we offer that same kind of service....I'm…

title: Not a five star
review: Okay every other establishment on this beach hires kids for the season that's obvious but I feel like a babysitter here, like I have to card the person serving the drinks, parking my car that's one thing but come on I'm paying for the service and professionalism this is not five star I stay at ritz , mandarins allt he time, no n yes its beautiful but no no , seems more like they are not raising th e bar the staff must not hire more professional staff because they are threatens by someone who could teach them more about being professional and at a higher level they got lucky in a day the five star check was made, no way are they five star , and thee keeping and increasing service skills is evident by the youthful staff , we visit yearly and just checked in the view this season…

title: Stayed here after leaving the Hilton Clearwater
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  In your review you mentioned the main concern was the age of the staff.  While our valued associates do range in age from 18 to 70, we hire our team based on their level of friendliness, passion for service and caring for our guests.  Age is not a deciding factor in adding people to our team.  I would be very interested to speak regarding particular issues that occurred so that we may focus on those issues and improve.  If you would like to speak, and find it appropriate, please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.    Again, thank you for your feedback.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Special
review: Originally booked at the adjacent Hilton Clearwater for business meetings and a few extra days of sun. Left the Hilton after one night.  Very small rooms, cleanliness was an issue and overall hotel not up to Hilton standards. Moved to the Sandpearl for 4 nights. What a breath of fresh air. Beautiful hotel, welcoming staff, very nice public spaces and excellent restaurant. What a change. Sure it was more expensive, but a world apart in what we experienced. Would stay here again.  Would never, ever, stay at the Hilton again.

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you were warmly welcomed by our staff and that you found the resort to be a breath of fresh air. It is our pleasure to do what we can to make you feel comfortable at the resort. I am glad you were able to enjoy one of our restaurants on property as well! We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great "Resort" feel inside the US!
review: Visited in December over Xmas.  Have visited this resort many times since it opened being from Minnesota we love the weather. The hotel is beautiful. Everything from the rooms to the outside pool area is spotless. The food at Tates by the pool is very good.  The burgers and the wraps are our favorites. The restaurant/bar in the hotel is very nice. They have live music on Friday and Saturday. There are some great eating places within walking distance. Cooters, all the Frenchy's Palm Pavillion, Clearsky. Crabby Bill's  Hooters all have very good food . The best Crab legs I had were at Hooters. The Beach Shanty is a great breakfast place to eat. Staff is great! The beach in front of hotel is beautiful with white sugary sand. Although fairly expensive Sandpearl is by far best hotel…

title: Wonderful Family Vacation
review: This hotel is very nice and we can't wait to go back.  Paying for the shuttle service from the airport to the hotel was worth it (it was a nice Cadillac Escalade) and worth the $80 round trip for 4.  The kids loved the pool and couldn't spend enough time in the pool.  Having Starbucks on site was nice, but there were many options within walking distance.  There was also fresh fruit available.  There is a restaurant right beside the hotel that had the best breakfast for a great price (can't recall the name of the restaurant).  Can't miss it, it is right on the corner.  There is a liquor store, ice cream shop, and restaurants within walking distance.  While the kids would nap with Dad, I went out on walks and felt very safe in the neighborhood shopping area.  There is great local…

title: A fabulous hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear your children had a wonderful time at the pool and that you and your family enjoyed Tate Island Grill, our poolside restaurant. Our location is convenient to other shops and restaurants and I am glad you were able to explore the area and experience what Clearwater Beach has to offer. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic hotel.
review: We stayed here on a Monday-Friday in February, and were extremely impressed. The facility is beautiful and the staff are the most professional and friendly I have ever encountered in a hotel, and I have stayed in many hotels! Unfortunately, the weather was cold and rainy during our stay - so we never really made it onto the beach. But, we felt lucky to be in such a warm friendly hotel nonetheless. Our room had a beautiful view of the Gulf and the beach, and was beautifully decorated and comfortable. The only suggestion I would have, is that we would have liked some more comfortable pillows, the ones in the room are the kind filled with lumps of foam, which are unpleasant at best.  We were thrilled that there was Starbucks in the lobby for our morning and afternoon caffeine…

title: Casual Luxury
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on  your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and that your encounters with our staff were professional and friendly. I am so glad you felt warm and comfortable at the resort, despite the cold weather outside! I am very happy you were able to relax with your Starbucks coffees from our Marketplace in the mornings as well. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: A Pricey Gem on the Best Beach in America
review: WOW. Clearwater Beach is the most beautiful beach I have seen and I have traveled the world. The sand is baby powder soft and the whitest white. The Sandpearl Hotel is on the beach. No crossing a street. This is a beautiful hotel. Gorgeous public areas. All the amenities you could ask for. Great Spa. Delicious food at Caretta. Our Gulfront room overlooked the beach and the pool. Some activities for the children and sand toys at the pool desk are available for them to use. Watch the sunset ,stay for the fire pit and s'mores to roast. The rooms are large and lovely. I liked the matress in our room. A balcony to sit and enjoy the view. This is a green hotel. How neat is that. Definitely would highly recommend this hotel.

title: stop looking, this is the place!
review: We stayed here in October 2013 for 6 nights, we took one of the suites that overlooked the Gulf Coast as an upgrade. It was well worth it. Complete with kitchen and separate lounge.  The beach is amazing for long walks and the sunsets are incredible. Sitting around a fire on the beach by the bar and watching the sun go down at the end of the day is wonderful. If you are looking for somewhere to enjoy a little luxury in a beautiful setting then this is the place.  The staff are very helpful and the hotel is very well maintained. The dreaded resort fees put a bit of a spoiler on things and the restaurant is a big overpriced but overall I would say this is by far the best hotel we have stayed in on the Florida Gulf Coast and I am fussy! We have re-booked for September 2014. DD UK

title: The best resort on the best beach I have ever seen
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted you were able to watch the beautiful sunsets at our fire pit on the beach. It is wonderful to hear our staff were helpful and you felt the property was well maintained. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in September!  Regards,, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice beach hotel with good facilities
review: In December we came back to Sandpearl in what I hope will be a frequent destination for us. The well kept secret of Clearwater Beach being the best beach town in America was ruined when the USA today survey confirmed what we already knew. Clearwater Beach was ranked #1 overwhelmingly in its survey... it is gorgeous. The sand is like sugar & the beach is amazingly  wide & by walking due North you come to Caledesi Island state park (actually connected to Clearwater by a wide sandbar) & you feel as if you have a private beach (no buildings for miles. Walk South to the pier & you will be within feet of a great marina, restaurants & a more traditional beach scene. Sandpearl resort exceeded every expectation. The lagoon pool is heated huge & has well placed seating benches (in the…

title: treasure on the gulf
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear your experience with us exceeded your expectations. It is our pleasure to enhance your stay in any way and happily serve you. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful but felt nickled and dimed
review: We stayed here for 4 nights and everything worked well. The suite we had asked for was very nice and clean, and could accomodate nicely our 9 year old daughter in the living space. The hotel has its years but it is nicely kept and everything works nicely. The beach is very good and all the facilities at the swimming pool are very nice also.

title: Sandpearl…..everything extra
review: First the good….the rooms, the location, the staff, the food, the view everything was beautiful. You are greeted with a glass of champagne.   Just be mindful of other extra costs, $20 pkg/night, $25/amenities (2 bottles of water/room, towels for pool, workout room usage), tax, tax on tax.

title: Omg
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear you were happy with the rooms, location, staff, food, and view during your visit! We take pride in the service and accommodations we provide for our guests. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back.  Regards,  Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Didn't measure up to expectations
review: Can I just say this is the second time we've stayed here n that's for a reason. Thor customer service is amazing. We were here when the weather was possibly the worst it have ever been in Florida for a long time. Everything we asked them for was no trouble, the room,view ect was amazing.  It's a shame we didn't get to enjoy the beach or pool but it was still the loveliest hotel on the beach. We ate in the main restaurant ever night, the scallops are to die for. Had the whole gym to ourselves.amazing. The only thing I didn't like was the Starbucks coffee. Absolutely disgusting, don't bother it's a waste of money. Oh and it u like bloody Mary's try theirs. Again top notch

title: Love It!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear you returned for a second visit and that you experienced amazing customer service from our staff. I am glad you were pleased with your view from your room! It is great to hear you enjoyed our signature restaurant every night. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Paradise within reach
review: I had read great reviews here in tripadvisor and was looking very forward to stay here.  The medical society was having a conference here. Although location is fine I found hotel understaffed at front desk and in restaurant at lunch time.  It took 40 minutes for my sandwich to arrive.  Also valet parking only was not very convenient and took too much time. Costs of rooms, food, etc was very very expensive. There is also a 20$ daily parking charge besides 25$ resort daily fee.  Also was not even able to get wifi in the conference room ( when I asked about this I was told the convention group did not pay for that but I could use the wifi in the lobby). Good points; beautiful beach and pool.  The concierge was very helpful. He was able to print my boarding pass. The friendly front…

title: Our 5th time visiting.
review: First of all Clearwater Beach is one of the most beautiful beaches in the world.  The hotel has Ana amazing wade in pool with views of the ocean.  The private beach area is incredible.  This resort is perfect for families.  They loan swim toys, beach toys, DVDs and movies and give you a glass of champagne upon check in. Thee are s'more fireside which is on the beach. We love it here.

title: Majestic Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted you enjoyed the views of Clearwater Beach and had an enjoyable time at our pool during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon for more amazing memories!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: classy option for NYE
review: Stayed with the family in July 2013, all I can say is this is a fantastic Hotel, with amazing staff and has a great location on Clearwater beach...  If your looking for a relaxing beach break, this is worth a stay...  We will return!

title: A Very Pleasant Surprise
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am so happy you thought the hotel was fantastic, found our staff to be amazing, and were pleased with our location on the beach. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manger

title: Still one of our favorite places
review: We stayed here for NYE and enjoyed a FANTASTIC meal at the restaurant downstairs.  4 diamonds and well deserved!  The service from Natalie was amazing.  We even got two glasses of a fancy 2004 Veuve Cliquot for FREE with dessert.  After dinner we strolled down a candlelit path to the open beach where the staff had set up a number of campfires with beach chairs, blankets and champagne for the fireworks show.  Everything was prepared and looked after and there was staff crawling around all over the place making sure everything was perfect.  It was!! The room was great, balcony sized for two, amenities and bath were elegant and cozy.  Pricey for Florida and worth every penny.

title: Amazing stay!
review: We stayed in a gulf front room...the service was amazing!  The staff is sooo friendly.  The resort is so clean and perfect. The beach is breathtaking!  Our only complaint is that we didn't plan to stay longer.  We will be back FOR SURE!  Thank you Sandpearl for making our New Year's Eve experience amazing!

title: Planning a return trip...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. It is great to hear our staff were able to make your stay enjoyable and that we provided you with friendly service. I am delighted you found the resort to be perfect! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice but overpriced
review: We loved it here.  We came for a long weekend to celebrate our anniversary between Christmas and New Years Day, and I'm so glad I chose the Sandpearl. The staff is on top of their game, Shelley at the front desk welcomed us warmly and took care of everything we needed in just a few minutes. Our room had a beautiful, unexpected view of the gorgeous beach - waking to that every morning was incredible. The concierge staff (Leticia in particular) did an amazing job helping us with outside activities, dining and even helped my husband order flowers (yep, he's pretty sweet!). Sitting around the fire on the beach at sunset is a must do if you come here.  The grounds are immaculate and the surrounding beach area well-tended. We were fortunate to experience the Christmas Village Sand…

title: Beautiful resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa! We greatly appreciate your feedback. I am delighted you chose to celebrate your anniversary with us. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to LaTesha and Shelley! It is great to hear you enjoyed our Christmas village sand sculpture in the lobby. We hope to have you with us again for future anniversaries and look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: The place to stay in Clearwater Beach!
review: My husband and I stayed at The Sandpearl for 2 nights in December 2013. The staff was pleasant and the room was nice. We reserved Gulf Front expecting to be in the beach front rooms but we actually faced the beach but overlooked the pool. The pool view rooms had a nice view of us on our balcony. We felt we didn't get what we paid for. We did not receive a key to the minibar, the room safe was locked, 1 of the bathrobes was used and dirty, the desk lamp and the hall llight had burned out bulbs. Overall minor issues but I still think the hotel is overpriced.

title: Best spot in CWB
review: Love this resort.  Wife and I stay here when I travel on business and it is 5 star all the way.   The location is perfect right on the beach and right next door to Frenchy's Rockaway.  The staff is very friendly and helpful from the moment they take your car keys.  Complimentary drinks upon arrival, perfect weather and good food & drinks at the pool bar.  What more do you need?  Rooms are always clean.  Kids also love this place.  Took my parents with the kids here and had the suite a few months back and everyone had a blast.  Kids loved the zero entry pool and the pool staff was great with them too.

title: What a lovely place to stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you and your family had a great experience at the pool and that our staff were able to provide five star service anywhere you went. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wonderful hotel resort
review: Very minor hiccup when we arrived - had upgraded to a coastal view room but, when we arrived, we had an overwhelming view of the roof of part of the hotel, then a car park and the beach in the distance.  I asked to be moved and, for an extra $10 per night (should have been $20 - they discounted as we had 2 rooms for 8 nights), we were moved the following day to a gulf view room which was so much better.    The bathrooms are huge and well equipped, the beds are really comfortable, the rooms are a good size, the public areas are exceptionally well kept, the staff are simply lovely, the pool area is spotless and the waiting staff are quick and friendly, the beach is to die for ... I could go on but the awards that the hotel has won, and the other amazing reviews, really say it all!

title: 5 star location and service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort in November. Despite the initial hiccup you experienced, I am happy to hear our staff provided you with friendly service and were able to improve the remainder of your stay. We appreciate the kind words regarding our public areas and the spotless pool area. We are delighted you felt comfortable in your room and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great place for a conference
review: We stayed over the summer and loved it.  They had our room ready when we arrived which was nice since we were traveling with our baby.  The pool was very nice and outside grill had pretty good food. Beaches were nice and clean.   The shops and restaurants around the resort were great.  Very good breakfast food next door!! Highly recommend.  The only thing we didn't like was the high resort fee.

title: Good location, but may not worth the price if it is off season
review: Sandpearl is a nice hotel with a very good location right on the beach, very close to highly rated restaurants in the area. We went there in November (thanksgiving week) hoping that we would still enjoy some nice weather but we were wrong. We couldn't enjoy the beach or the pool as we hoped. The hotel already has a premium price and on top of that, charges $25 a night service fee for beach towels, internet (not so great) and basic things like 2 bottles of water and coffee in the room. Parking also is extra ($20/night) and valet parking only. If you aren't enjoying the beach or the pool, you should consider if this extra cost is worth paying or not.   The hotel is generally clean, but housekeeping isn't great. The first night we stayed there, there was no shampoo (only body wash)…

title: second stay, planning a third
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I appreciate you taking the time to let me know how your stay went.  Please accept my apologies for the negative experience you received from our Housekeeping Department.  I will share your feedback with our Executive Housekeeper.    If you would like to speak personally regarding your stay please contact me at the hotel.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great location, some issues
review: We had a great time, room was clean, service exceptional, and the restaurants were outstanding.  I went with my 9 year old daughter and the pool side service made her fancy drinks which she loved.  They have kid friendly activities and the concierge was very helpful.

title: Great hotel, Excellent Service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear your daughter enjoyed her poolside drinks and the service in the restaurants and around the resort were exceptional! We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great Hotel
review: Attended a conference at the Sandpearl for the third time in four years. The location is lovely, the beach spectacular but there are some deficiencies.  Housekeeping: poor. A medicine bottle from the previous guest left on the floor near the window. Sticky stains found on the rug and upholstery; some kind of product found on the shower tiles; and dirty fingerprints on the doors. Staff coming in at 5:30pm to refresh the room and do nightly turn down, quite early as generally we had not even returned from the beach by then, or were relaxing prior to going for dinner when they came.  Valet: leave extra time to get your car. Twice we called ahead of time to have the car brought around. The first time, they brought the wrong vehicle. The second time the car was not there, only to be…

title: Best hotel in Clearwater
review: Just returned from vacation at the Sandpearl. Hotel is upscale and beautiful. Great pool, two large hot tubs, great service from the staff at pool. Directly on beach with tons of shells. Saw a school of dolphins swim by. You can walk to so many restaurants and shops on Mandalay Avenue. Great location. Highly recommend this hotel. No complaints other that the $25 a day resort fee and the $20 a day valet parking fee.

title: Gorgeous Hotel, Fantabulous Staff, Beautiful View
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so happy to hear you received great service down at the pool! I will be sure to pass along your kind words to our pool staff. We are glad you enjoyed our location, just seconds from nearby restaurants and excellent views to watch the dolphins! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Exceptional Service, Great Location, Outstanding Value
review: We came in Wed prior to Thanksgiving. Valet opened our doors, delivered luggage to our room and at check in we were offered champagne or sparkling apple cider. Our room had two queen beds as requested as this was my mom and I on our first Thanksgiving away from our large family. We wanted special and we got it.
