We had a couple minor issues with the room and the Director of Housekeeping showed up at our door to check it out. We were certainly impressed, she is a wonderful lady and we enjoyed chatting. She sent us a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries to our room and we so enjoyed being spoiled!  We decided to splurge and eat the dining buffet for Thanksgiving.....FORGET THE TURKEY - Oh my my my, sushi, black peppered mackerel , duck in sweet potatoes, grouper…

title: Great hotel right on the beach
review: Dear Guest,  We greatly appreciate the feedback regarding your most recent stay with us. I am happy you enjoyed the food at Caretta on the Gulf. I am glad any issues you may have had were addressed promptly and you were able to continue enjoying your time. It is our pleasure to assist you with anything at any point during your stay. Thank you for the kind words and we hope you return soon for more exceptional food and fun!  Regards,  Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Wow, wish I could have stayed longer!
review: Gorgeous hotel in a wonderful setting and amazing staff !! The room's clean, very comfortable bed, nice bathroom and very well located. The food was great, the service is typical of any top class hotel --comparable with Luxury Collection hotels without dedicated concierge-- but Lorda, Kristin, Michael, Debra, Clyde and all other staff made sure that our experience was perfect, and it was! The only reason I didn't give 5 star is that when we entered the room after checking in, we found a  Starbucks cup in the balcony (from the previous guest?). The white sand, truly heated pool, facilities and phenomenal staff make this our favourite hotel in Clearwater Beach !

title: At last an American hotel that does 5 star
review: We travel all over the US and stay in many supposedly 5 star hotels and truthfully I just thought the Americans did not understand what 5 star meant.  THEN we stayed at the Sandpearl Resort, the hotel is nice, probably one of the better US hotels I have stayed in, clean room, decent facilities, nice buffet breakfast, BUT what sets this hotel apart are the staff.  From the reception staff through to most of the guys working at the pool everybody remembers your name and uses it to address you, they can not do enough to help you, we had a small problem with a maintenance issue in our room on check in and as soon as we told the lady on reception she ensured that maintenance attended the room and fixed the problem, I know this is what you would expect from a 5 star hotel, but so…

title: A Wonderful Stay on our 40th Anniversary!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and experienced exceptional service that exceeded your expectations. We are happy to be at your service and help you in any way possible. It is our pleasure! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards,  Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: The Gulf Room is worth it!!!
review: My wife and I were looking for a very special place to stay for our 40th anniversary, and we found it in the Sandpearl Resort. Nothing is lacking here. The resort is spotless and employees are as friendly and attentive as anywhere you will possibly visit in the world! Elegant but not the least bit "stuffy". The Sandpearl is not inexpensive but you certainly get what you pay for. Attention to detail is present throughout the resort. During our stay the management sent a bottle of wine, cheese, grapes and strawberries dipped in chocolate with a note wishing us a happy anniversary. Don't overlook the fabulous food and service at the Tate Island Grill adjacent to the pool and beach. This is most certainly a resort that is worth spending a little extra money. We look forward to…

title: Another GREAT Florida Oceanfront Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted you chose to share with us the celebration of your 40th Anniversary. It is our pleasure to make you feel special and well taken care of! I am happy to hear our staff were friendly and attentive. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Getting better every time.
review: The Gulf Room has an amazing view that will enhance your stay. The hotel is bright, clean, and provides impeccable service. The hotel has two restaurants, Tate Island Grill and Caretta on the Gulf. The Tate Island Grill food was mediocre at best. If you go there I would recommend sticking with things like French fries. The Caesar salad we ordered had brown edges on the lettuce and the shrimp looked like it had seen better days. Caretta on the Gulf has a lovely atmosphere, but I would not recommend the sushi. The spicy tuna roll was extremely bland. They do use real crab in the California roll so if you absolutely have a sushi craving the California roll may be the way to go.  The grouper was tasty as well as the bread basket. They were very generous with the pretzel rolls and…

title: It's lovely - but needs more consistency
review: We decided to stay here because we took a look around last year whilst staying at the hilton & loved it. Upon check-in ( it was nearly midnight because we were 5hrs delayed) no one was insight when we pulled up in the taxi. No one offered to take our bags, no one opened the hotel door for us , no one showed us to our room. Great start for such a grand hotel. The guy who checked us in was very nice, polite and helpful. He also suggested I talk to the manager tomorrow morning from 8am who would probably be able to upgrade our room ( I didn't have the option to do this when booking with BA) & since it was quiet - quite possibly for free. That was not so, the lady I spoke with the next morning didn't adapt the same kind, polite and helpful attitude - neither did her manager, they…

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort. In your review, you mentioned your experience with our evening valet, greeter, and bell staff to be less than satisfactory. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconveniences you experienced upon arrival. It is certainly not Sandpearl standard to not give such attention to our guests.   Despite these issues, I am delighted to hear you were pleased with the housekeeping services throughout your stay and enjoyed our pool area and fabulous food. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Most wonderful family getaway
review: My husband and I have stayed here two years in a row in mid-September while he attended a conference in Tampa. The rooms and the grounds were very clean both times. The staff is friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the lounge chairs and umbrellas on the beach and hanging out around the pool. We love Tate's Bar and Grill and ate (and drank) there multiple times and the food was always good. Both times we had rooms that were considered gulf or maybe coastal views that were on the side of the building towards Frenchy's. When you face that side you can see the beach, however, when you look down you also see the roof top of the adjacent buildings (which isn't the best view) and you also can hear the trash trucks that came early a few of the mornings. Not a big deal to us since all the…

title: A great stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad our staff were friendly and helpful during your stay. In your review, you mentioned the noise from the trash trucks that disrupted your early mornings. Please accept my sincere apologies regarding this inconvenience. I am very happy to hear the Sandpearl Resort is your favorite place to stay on Clearwater Beach. We hope you return soon and we look forward to welcoming you back!   Regards,  Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Our favorite beach resort
review: It has been a couple years since my family has been able to take off a couple days and just relax. This resort has been everything it promised and more. Worth every penny, I felt like a princess the whole time we were here, and the rest of the family felt just as spoiled ! Place is spectacular, staff is phenomenal and I will not hesitate to return to this paradise...

title: What a Lovely Surprise
review: Did not expect this level of luxury when I had rsvped to a destination wedding invitation recently. Not only was the hotel gorgeous, the spa was wonderful, the yoga class was outside, the beach was clean, spacious and fabulous plus the staff extremely friendly accommodating and helpful. The weekend felt like a vacation retreat with a little wedding in the middle. Loved it.

title: LOVED IT!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am glad you were pleased with the cleanliness of the resort and the friendliness of the staff. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Memories that will last a LIFETIME
review: My husband and I chose the Sand Pearl for our first family vacation. We would be traveling from PA to FL with our brand new 6 month old baby, so we were very nervous. The hotel was very accommodating and supplied us with a portable crib. They also allowed us to hang a door jam bouncer in the room, but because the only door with trim was the main entrance door of our room, much of the time our door was wide open while my husband and I were getting ready for dinner etc, because bouncing in his jumper was our little ones favorite thing to do. The maids got a HUGE kick out of him as his would cue at them when they would walk by. The hotel made sure we had a cabana each day to keep out son out of the sun if needed. The service was awesome! The drinks and food were amazing! This hotel…

title: Wonderful Resort for a Wedding
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay with us. I am pleased that we were able to put your mind at ease during your vacation, as traveling with a new baby can be stressful. We certainly are happy your baby was still able to play in his bouncer and have a blast. We love to see happy guests here! We hope you and your family return soon for more fun-filled memories!   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful resort, but not sure it's worth the price
review: Thank you Sandpearl Resort! This place went above and beyond in making sure that we had the best experience possible. Everything exceeding our expectations. Excellent customer service from the second you get checked-in with complimentary mimosas, and great service from valet and bell staff. Our view from the room was incredible and we were impressed with all of the features heres. Private white-sand beach with kids smores every evening with safe firepit on beach with great decor and atmosphere!  I have never seen my girls so happy and excited in their entire lives and I wanted to share how incredible our stay was. We look forward to bringing the family back to your here for our next family vacation!!!!

title: Gorgeous hotel
review: Perfect location with amazing views! Also, in the middle of all the shops and restaurants. Love that I was offered a mimosa or champagne at check-in! The fitness area was a little disappointing- few cardio machines and weight machines with a handful of free weights. The pool area looked nice as well.

title: R, R & R
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am glad you enjoyed the views and our location from the shops and restaurants nearby. We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: A little taste of luxury
review: Quite simply one of the most beautiful hotels I have stayed in in the whole of Florida! We stayed in a sunset suite and it is well worth it! The staff make the stay even more enjoyable with nothing being too much for them. A particular mention to Kyle at the beach bar who looked after us very well and was there each day with a welcoming smile! The S'mores at night are a treat not to be missed and it goes without saying the sunsets are beautiful. The Spa is lovely also and not too pricey which was a pleasant surprise. All in all a very relaxing and refreshing holiday and will most definitely be using this hotel chain again. A definite on the Bucket List :-) shame we have to leave!

title: Welcome to the Sandpearl - here is a glass of champagne
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am happy to hear you enjoyed s'mores at the firepit and were well taken care of at the pool. I will be sure to pass along the kind words to Kyle. It is our pleasure to ensure you experience a relaxing and refreshing stay! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Superb
review: This is a really nice hotel with lots of thoughtful little touches.  I wouldn't normally stay somewhere this expensive, but it was worth it, especially as everywhere in Clearwater seemed pricey.  Rooms are big and beautifully decorated.  Pool is lovely and the beach is easily accessed. The firepit is a lovely spot to sit after dark.  Good gym.  Great having the coffee shop in the lobby.  We had some noise from the room next door during our first night (possibly wedding guests) and asked reception to sort it out.  They responded very promptly and very effectively.  I hope to stay here again!

title: Best in Clearwater
review: This is my favorite hotel in Florida!   It is great for families :) the rooms are amazing. The beach is beautiful and the service is awesome!  I know you can find better prices in similar resorts near by but it is worth to pay a bit more and stay here. The atmosphere of this hotel is special. This is why I keep coming back here for shirt holidays :)

title: Poor levels of service - Beach club has the place crawling with drunk locals
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind words on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa! I am delighted you find the resort and beach a beautiful and amazing place to stay. I'm so happy to hear it is your favorite in Florida! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing Hotel and Beach -- Condo Location So So Unit 721
review: The property is gorgeous and well maintained.  I found that the upper level of service providers (i.e. the Concierge) were amazing - however that did not trickle down to the those who you see day to day.   For the level of this hotel I expected the same service level I receive at the Four Season, Ritz or Waldorf (which we visit once a year on Marco Island).  It was at  a Marriott level - not even a Hyatt level - which you may want to consider instead for the value of service you receive.   Multiple times I waited down at the activities desk with other guests trying to get towels or one of the coveted $25 umbrellas.  Twice I ended up reaching over the desk and pressing zero asking them to send someone down.  That was after a 10 minute wait each time.   We tried to go to Caretta's…

title: Great Location, Terrible Service
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write your review of your stay at the Sandpearl.  I was happy to hear that you were pleased with our Concierge service and you found our property gorgeous and well maintained.    In your review you mentioned that our staff walked past you on several occasions without noticing you.  I am very sorry that happened.  We normally get great compliments on our staff friendliness and eagerness to serve but it appears that was not the case in your situation.  You also mentioned the quality of our drinks at Tate's Island Grille.  I am sorry you did not find them acceptable.  We use only quality ingredients in our drinks and in our Mojitoes we make our own simple syrup and garnish with pure Sugar Cane sticks and fresh muddled mint.  We normally get great reviews on these.  I am not sure what happened to make this case different.  You also mentioned our Beach Club.  Our Beach Club is a very controlled environment.  We only have 40 members and they are only entitled to bring one guest when they come.  There are never more than 2 or 3 beach club members around at the same time.  We did perhaps have a group in house that could have been celebrating a bit too much.  We do have security around the pool however it appears that they could have done a better job at controlling the environment.  I will share your feedback with our Director of Security.  Again, thank you for taking the time to complete your review.  If you would like to speak personally about your stay and find it appropriate, please feel free to contact me at the hotel.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: extremely nice hotel
review: SEAPEARL RESORT Unit 721  THE GOOD Great location with an amazing pristine beach with beautiful sunsets Exceptional service Beautiful pool Lots of chairs Pool and beachside food and drink service Staff was always friendly and informative  Lots of great food places within walking distance. We ate at Beachcomber (amazing lobster), Palm pavilion (amazing sunset), and the Blue Sky Cafe (great beach music) King size bed was extremely comfortable Inside of Condo was perfect.  Lots of drawer and closet space. You can get as many pool/beach towels as you want without a hassle There is a safe in the room. The fire pit was a nice touch. They even had s'mores night. Wi-if worked well Kitchen was fully stocked with plates, utensils, glasses.  The resort provided dish washing detergent,…

title: Beautiful beach, Wonderful hotel/ resort
review: You definitely get what you pay for. The hotel is pricy, but I would return in a heart beat. The staff is very friendly, the food is excellent, and the rooms are very nice and clean. The white sand beach is just superb, but it is a bit of a walk ... I'd say well worth it though. The pool is well kept and the water temperature was just perfect.

title: Upscale, clean, directly on the beach, ahhhh
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for such positive comments regarding your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the food at our restaurants and were able to relax at the pool. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Business Trip
review: My husband and I chose to stay here for our 10 year anniversary.  We picked the Sandpearl in Clearwater over the other resorts due to the multiple good reviews and tips from other reviewers.  Yes, it did cost more money.  But we felt it was worth it!  First of all, let me note we traveled in September when it was still hot outside but school had begun so the "busy season" was technically over.  The hotel was not extremely crowded and we never had a problem finding a lounge chair on the beach, at the pool, or getting service for food or drinks.  I can see how it could be a problem during the busy season since the hotel is on the small side.  Since it was our anniversary and we booked through a particular travel website, we received an upgrade to a suite on the seventh floor,…

title: Luxury to the max!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your visit to the Sandpearl Resort in September. I am so happy you chose to stay with us to celebrate such a special occasion! I am pleased to hear we were able to help make your 10 year anniversary memorable and we look forward to welcoming you, and hopefully your children, back again soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: The Only Place to Stay in Clearwater
review: Our company hosted an outing at the Sandpearl in August.  We were there for 5 days, held multiple events and dinners, all of them a success.  From the minute you walk in the double doors and are greeted by staff until you check out you will find EVERYONE to be friendly and helpful.  All was outstanding from the facilities to the menus to the service.  The rooms were fantastic, well cared for and clean.  This resort knows how to treat their guests.  Many of our guest brought their children (ranging in age from 6 month - 20 somethings) with as the resort in right on the beach and has activities onsite but near by.

title: Very clean, luxury hotel with updated rooms.
review: Very clean, luxury hotel with updated rooms.  We had a view of the pool and Gulf, which I worried may be loud, but was pleasantly surprised at how quiet the room was with the balcony door closed.  We enjoyed this property so much, that I could have stayed on site our entire trip.  Restaurants were very good and very convenient.  Pool area was beautiful and relaxing.  Service was top notch.

title: Clear winner at Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear our pool area was a relaxing place for you to enjoy the Florida sunshine! I am also happy you were pleased with the quiet room and good view. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: my stay at the sandpearl resort
review: I have stayed in most if the Clearwater Beach gulf front hotels and the Sandpearl is the clear winner when it comes to Location, & service. We loved the old Clearwater Beach Hotel (which was raised to build the Sand-pearl) mainly because of the walk onto the sand location, but Sandpearl has so much more to offer. From the champagne at check in, to the free bike hire, to the beach fire pit and bar service on the beach. It was just delightful to sit around the ( gas) fire pit on a chilly Christmas night and be served warm mulled cider. The Santa in the lobby was a lovely touch and the sand sculptures were just lovely. The reception were staff very helpful no matter what the request nothing was too much trouble. Valet parking was a little expensive but no more than other hotels…

title: Resort fee valet parking
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with positive feedback regarding your stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. As a guest who has been visiting for many years, you choose to return to our resort and I am delighted to hear this. I am so glad you are happy with the service and activities we are pleased to provide to you. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Expensive
review: First things first when we arrived we were greeted by the most charming or people the complementry mommosa was divine the one downfall was that we arrived at 1pm but our room wasent ready tell 4 so we made our way down to the pool the activite employees or pool helpers were amazing the girl at the desk was really nice but the 2 guys were Even more amazing they helped my 85 year old grandma by pushing her in a beach style wheelchair all the way to the water the funny thing was that one of the young men was a security gaurd it really made us feel safe and important the only complaint was the manager of the pool jen was her name she was very rude and because of her nor me or my grandma whent back to the pool for the rest of our stay the rooms were amazing the boat races were the…

title: Tropical Elegance on Clearwater Beach
review: Lynn and I spent a wonderful night at the Sandpearl Resort.  The event was our daughter's wedding on the beach.  We were greeted at the front door by the wonderful staff of this hotel who offered a choice of a champagne or mimosa welcome cocktail.  Our large room on the 6th Floor had 2 double beds a couch, a desk and 2 big screen tvs.  The bathroom was beautiful as well with coral type tiles on the floor.  Beds were comfortable with big fluffy pillows.  Ours was an end room.  From our balcony you could see both the Intracoastal Waterway and the Gulf of Mexico.  The swimming pool was huge and offered easy access for toddlers.  Our granddaughter couldn't get enough of the pool.  Of course Clearwater Beach is one of America's best beaches and it is right out the back door of the…

title: Best in Area
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing such positive feedback regarding your stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa for your daughter's wedding. I am delighted to hear you were happy with the size and comfort of your room, including the view. We enjoy seeing guests of all ages having fun in the pool and I am so glad your granddaughter got her fill of the water!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Expensive Luxury
review: This review will be short and sweet. This was probably one of the top 3 nicest hotels I've ever stayed at. Your gonna pay top dollar for it, but you get what you pay for. We actually got a bit of a deal for staying three nights or more. Beach access and proximity to area restaurants etc... is excellent. The pool is a tropical theme with palms and plenty of space to lounge. The hotel amenities are top notch in my opinion. We had a great stay and will stay there again when we get the chance.   We took our two little ones who are 5 and 3.5. At first it seemed a little stuffy and we didn't see many kids, but the next day at the pool the kid situation and atmosphere became more relaxed. So I will say the hotel is kid friendly, but it's not Disney.  Also be mindful that the area…

title: Perfect
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa in September. I am happy to hear the atmosphere at the pool was relaxing and spacious for you and your family. It is wonderful to hear you would stay at the Sandpearl again and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beachfront bliss
review: Beautiful hotel right on the beach, facilities are great between the pool, lounge chairs, restaurants, and lobby. Enjoyed the champagne upon arrival, helped stomach the $20/night valet charge, at the cost if the room, annoying that this was additional and so steep. Had a catered rehearsal dinner, food and service were top notch. Overall, lovely spot for some R&R.

title: amazing once again
review: I have to say I have been visiting America for a very long time and have stayed at many different hotels but there is not much that can match the Sandpearl. The main thing that I find appealing is the location there is nothing like it. The Rooms are spacious, always clean, well maintained and the little touches of turn down with notes is lovley.  The food is fab whichever venue you eat at and I can honestly say I have never found any member of staff to be unhelpfull. My only gripe is probably the parking options being a disabled driver in many places that have valet parking they give this complimentary and I find the charge a lot on top of the daily room surcharge. Other than that I can not fault this hotel and the position is amazing.

title: Wonderful hotel with a great location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind words regarding your stay at the Sandpearl Resort in September! We greatly appreciate your feedback. I am so glad to hear we are able to provide you with exceptional service and hospitality to stand out from other hotels you have visited in America. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Luxury !!
review: This is the 3rd time I've stayed at the Sandpearl Resort for a business meeting. Each time is great! It's located on the beach and features an outdoor pool, hot tub, bar, and chairs. It also has a big fire pit which is awesome.  The rooms are spacious and very clean. Bottled water & a refrigerator is provided. They also provide a turndown service where they leave you chocolates.   I've been able to get a very good rate because it's been for a business meeting but it's probably a bit expensive otherwise. However, that should be expected due to the location & amenities provided.   Also, at check- in, they provide cider, mimosas or another choice.

title: Amazing!
review: Thank you so much for your positive feedback regarding your stay at the Sandpearl Resort! I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

title: A short trip to the Sandpearl Resort
review: If you wan't a hotel on a Budget...The Sandpearl is not for you ! If you wan't a relaxing stay in a Five star resort....This is your place. Hotel is great, staff super friendly, and they have the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in.Pool area is not massive, but all the same very nice. Pool waiting staff were brilliant, and the cocktails poolside were delicious. The Hotel is right on the Beach, and the sand is like Talcum Powder... We went on a boat ride and saw several Dolphins swimming only Metres from the Beach.... There are taxes on top, running the bill up when you check out, and a Valet fee for parking you car there, but overall you are treated very well indeed. Morgan Freeman was stopping there when we were ! If its good enough for him..It's good enough for me ! Pay…

title: Nice hotel
review: Great hotel  , would recommend. The outside facilities are very nice. The rooms are solid , could use an upgrade on the linen , but overall solid hotel  .   The food was very good, did not experience spa so cannot comment

title: A delight on the Beach
review: Dear Guest,  We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you found our food to be delicious and we hope you return soon to perhaps experience the spa as well during your next visit!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic resort!
review: From the moment you arrive, you feel welcome. The staff is prompt and courteous, always with a smile and a greeting. The public places and rooms are spotless. The rooms are large with all amenities there: a refrigerator with a full assortment of bar items for sale, and another refrigerator for your own use, real wine and water glasses, coffee maker, robes, slippers...We had a furnished balcony overlooking the pool, beach and gulf. We enjoyed beautiful sunsets every evening. The bathrooms are elegantly appointed from a roomy shower to a soothing bathtub with shutters that open to let you enjoy the gulf view while soaking in the bubbles. Again, all the amenities are available in the bathroom. There are enough plugs to power up your personal phones, iPads, or computers and use of a…

title: Enjoyable Vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. It is our pleasure to warmly welcome you to our resort. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the amenities we have to offer you. I am so happy you were able to relax at our pool and experience the gorgeous sunsets from your balcony. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Really wonderful place for the entire family
review: Sand Pearl is a perfect destination for your Florida vacation--beautiful facility, friendly and helpful staff that anticipated and accommodated our needs seamlessly. The location is right on the beach, the pool area is designed for relaxation and soaking up the rays; the five star restaurant was beyond delish! We would recommend this resort to anyone looking for rest and relaxation and that golden Florida tan!

title: Great weekend stay
review: My father, grandfather and I stayed at the Sandpearl for a weekend stay during a fishing trip in mid august. Overall, this is a very nice resort. The staff is friendly and courteous (offering mimosas upon arrival). The grounds are fantastic including a beautiful lounge/lobby, a gift shop, a lovely pool area and a great access point to the beach. Around sundown was very enjoyable sitting outside the resort by the beach and having a drink. The rooms are large and very comfortable. The bathrooms are nice. The beds were comfortable, something much needed after a day spent on the ocean in the elements. I found our stay at the Sandpearl to be very relaxing and worthy of a visit in the future when in Clearwater. An added bonus about the resort is that it's very close to a shopping…

title: Superb first class resort!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your stay in August at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am happy you were able to experience what Clearwater Beach has to offer as well as relax at the resort. We would love to have you again the next time you visit Clearwater to enjoy the shopping and sunshine!   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fabulous Resort
review: I have nothing bad to say about the Sandpearl.  Stayed a week with our two boys (12 and 10) and everyone had a blast.  One bedroom suite was perfect for our family and the boys did not mind the pull out couch at all.  Pool and restaurants are wonderful and service is top notch.  If you need anything, ask and the staff will d everything to accommodate you.  From free beach chairs with waiters on the sand, to a well stocked service center poolside, there are surprises at every turn.  Just a short walk from the pier and surrounded by restaurants of all sorts, the location is fabulous.  Would definitely recommend, and am anxious to return myself!

title: Beautiful and peaceful
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort! I am delighted to hear you and your family had a blast and our staff was accommodating during your stay. It is our pleasure to do whatever we can to make your stay as pleasant as possible. We look forward to welcoming you back and hope you and your family return soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Another great stay at The Pearl!
review: Stayed several days at the Sandpearl for a convention in the month of September.  I have traveled quite a bit and have to say this is one of the nicest hotels we have ever stayed in.  Facilities, service, beach, pool, etc. all fantastic. Lots of shops, etc within walking distance. Loved the turn-down service each night. Restaurant next door has fantastic breakfast and the Brown Boxer across the street is a great place to grab a bite and watch the game. I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Very Good but Definitely Not Perfect
review: We spent a couple nights (8-29-13 & 8-30-13) in a Gulf Front Junior Queen Suite. The room was absolutely amazing. For example an all glass shower with an awesome view of the Gulf of Mexico. This room (469) had a perfect vantage point for the sunset. Also with the junior suite you get a queen size sleeper sofa so our room had 2 queen beds, 1 queen size sleeper sofa, 2 televisions, in room mini bar with items for purchase, roman style soaking tub (with a view of the Gulf of Mexico) and a balcony which again had a spectacular view (on our second night the people next to us were smoking on their balcony so we didn't get to enjoy it). Upon arrival we were escorted to the lobby and had to wait a mere 30 minutes for our room (at 11:30 a.m.). We had lunch at their beachside restaurant,…

title: Avoid Labor Day
review: This 270 room hotel has been open for about four years. We stayed for two weeks from 24 August 2013.  The hotel stands right on the beach, and if you do not know Clearwater Beach you will find it one of the most beautiful stretches you will ever see - a deep strand of powder-fine white sand. Strangely, the sea is not blue, although clear, but emerald green.  However, it's perfect for bathing, the beach shelves gently, and the sea boasted a temperature of 87 degrees F.  The hotel has beds on the beach but parasols come rather expensive at $25 per day.    The building is pleasing architecturally and the standard of finish internally is extremely high with  quality traditional furnishings and an interesting collection of works of art. The public rooms are spacious and the dining…

title: AMAAAAZING!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your stay in August at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted you found the resort's décor, artwork, and building itself to be of high quality and to your liking. It is great to hear that our staff were able to make your arrival and departure smooth and pleasant.   In your review, you mentioned eating at both our signature restaurant and our beachside grill. I am so glad you enjoyed your experiences and received quality service at each outlet. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Bobby and Mark.   We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing place to stay for any occasion
review: The General Manager Eric should be proud of the operations at this hotel. Not only is it beautiful and a in a fabulous setting but has a remarkable staff. From the moment we arrived we felt as though we were in a 5 diamond resort. I noticed it was only 4 diamond by AAA standards, but couldn’t find anything this resort could possibly be missing to not gain the 5th diamond. Upon arrival at valet, they asked for my name and quickly gathered my bags and had them brought to my room before we actually made it to the room. The front desk staff was very polite and anticipating answers before I even asked. I was also greeted by a delicious mimosa which made check in even better.   The room was perfect for the two of us and the furnishings in excellent condition. The closet was spacious…

title: Great Resort But You Get Nickeled And Dimed And A Few Mistakes.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am so happy to hear our staff provided you with efficient service and that you enjoyed your whole experience at the resort. We appreciate the kind words! I am delighted you wish to return to us. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Awesome family vacation!
review: My husband and 2 boys (ages 7 and 1) stayed here for 8 nights. The hotel and room was very clean, the staff very helpful. The beach was right behind the hotel and you could take as many towels are you needed since the room includes $25/day fee for towels, 2 bottles of water/day and bike rentals as available). Parking is valley only and they charge $20/day! The hotel is walking distance from the little downtown area and pier 60; every night they have activities at the pier. At the hotel they also offer activities for kids which we didn't use but it's available for $60/day. They have a fire pit and give you s'more kits to make your own s'mores; they play movies by the pool, have yoga and Zumba classes available ... Also included! We all just really got to unwind and spent some…

title: Best Resort in Clearwater Beach!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa in August. I am happy to hear you and your family were able to spend quality time together at the resort and experienced great service by our staff. We hope you return soon to relax and unwind with us.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great for families
review: Awesome resort!  We stayed in a King size Suite....definitely book a room with the gulf view, you can't beat the sunsets!  Customer Service: Everyone is so friendly, and will do anything to make your stay memorable.  One night my daughter participated in Camp Ridley, and she loved it.  The attendants were so hospitable.  Hotel Room: Our suite was simply amazing!  Huge king bed and bedroom with a private balcony.  The living room had a couch that was a pull-out.  The living room had its own balcony with 2 rocking chairs!  There was a full size kitchen...its bigger than most NYC apartments!  Huge stainless steel appliances, including fridge, dishwasher, microwave, granite counters, even a Keurig coffee maker!  Our bathroom was probably 200sq ft alone, with a standing shower and a…

title: Great location beautiful resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am so happy you found your suite to be amazing and our staff friendly and hospitable. I am glad your daughter enjoyed a day at Camp Ridley! We appreciate the kind words. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Gorgeous and Romantic!
review: We stayed here over the Labor Day weekend and were very impressed. The hotel is right on the beach and has a beautiful pool oceanside. The decor is coastal chic and very pretty. There are lots of activities for children (movies poolside, smores, balloon animals, etc) making it truly a great family experience. The main dining room serves delicious food and the wait staff was professional and outgoing. We started out as a party of two in the bar one night, and as friends kept joining us we increased to ten. The manager and waitstaff scrambled to keep adding tables and chairs with smiles on their faces. If I had to find anything to grade less than excellent. we had to ask housekeeping three times for turndown service and they weren't the quickest at making up the room in the…

title: Family Reunion
review: The hotel is beautiful with a great view.  The check-in went smoothly for our large group (19) However, we were not offered the greating cocktail and overheard the other check in guests  receiving one.  Also, there were not that many lounge chairs available pool side.  Everyone had towels on them, even though they were not there for most of the day.  The rooms  were spacious and very clean and cared for.  Would have liked parking without cost.  Seems when paying for 7 rooms, beach front, they would accomadate 2 rental cars.

title: Fancy and amazing hotel
review: I love Clearwater but had never been to this hotel. The hotel is not only fancy but the service is spectacular. If you stay is not ABSOLUTELY perfect, they will make it up in an unexpected way.  The rooms were gorgeous, the beach was amazing...the drinks and wings were great and unexpensive.  The food in the formal restaurant is delicious and the amount satisfies everyone.

title: A beautiful Resort..........
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the kind words on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear you received spectacular service. It is our pleasure! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent resort on the beach!
review: Just back from a week in Clearwater Beach Fl. I love the area , have been there numerous times and never get tired of it. The Sandpearl is sensational. Beautiful view and the staff is wonderful. We had massages at the Marriott and really enjoyed our time there. Shepards is always so much fun, can't wait for them to complete their renovation..

title: Amazing hotel - such a shame about the 'coastal view'
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort and Spa. From your review, it sounds like you had a fun visit to Clearwater and I am happy to hear you had a pleasant stay with us! We hope you return to the Sandpearl the next time you find yourself in the area.   Regards, Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Fantastic hotel - expensive but worth it
review: This hotel is sensational. Like many other reviewers i booked this hotel having read the reviews about the exorbitant "resort fee" and charges for parking. My wife and I stayed for 3 nights in a basic single suit with no balcony overlooking the bay (not the beach, the beach is the more expensive side).   I would recommend the Sandpearl to anyone but tell them to be aware of the charges. We travelled with an airport rental car so we had to pay for parking.  The resort fee and parking total for 3 nights was $148 including all local taxes and charges. Basically add 50bucks per night to whatever you expect to pay for staying and factor that into your trip. You get what you pay for and this place feels extremely upmarket.  The pool, hotel beach areas and lobby are amazing. Spotlessly…

title: You Get What You Pay For (Class)
review: Yes I've read all the reports about (nickle & dime) regarding this hotel but lets get one thing clear, as my Mother once said you get what you pay for. OK you may find another hotel with slightly better this or that, but taking all thing into consideration, and we have traveled the world, this hotel is very good. Yes it has it's faults, one being the pool which can get a little crowded but just go sit on the fantastic beach. OK you pay for the loungers and shade but this is a public place so get over it, it's still beautiful. I must give a mention to some amazing staff, firstly Bernie and Micheal on the concierge desk, they are excellent and so helpful.Secondly is Bobby the pool waiter. This is amazing, on our first day we were served by Bobby who was so nice he made us feel at…

title: Excellent Resort!
review: I recently stayed at the Sandpearl Resort from Aug 13 - 17 with my family. It was everything we saw in the pictures and MORE! The staff was friendly, we were greeted with a choice of beverage (champagne in our case) upon arrival. The lobby is gorgeous, cool and very inviting after a long drive! The staff is very friendly and helpful! Once headed out to the pool area, prepare to be there for the day/evening/night!!! With Tate Island Grill giving poolside service, it really doesn't get any better! The beach is right ahead of you - it really is paradise! Highly recommend and looking forward to going back!

title: Better than expected
review: Without the chain name of Hilton, Hyatt etc, I had gone with low expectations.  But this hotel is wonderful!  A person is always at the door to greet you, and you are given a complimentary drink upon check-in.  The lobby is peaceful and overlooks the ocean.  The rooms are small for my family of 4, but the beds and bathrooms were luxurious.  Every room has a balcony.  Our room was not ocean facing, but we had an ocean view from our balcony -- which was nice enough.  Unfortunately it also faced the street which had loud music in the evenings. The beach has wonderful soft white sand.  The clientele is slightly different on weekends, then on weekdays, and the hotel seems to have more activities on weekends than on weekdays.  My kids (ages 8 & 10) loved the hotel.

title: Love this place!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort in August. I am delighted you felt comfortable not only in your room, but in the lobby as well. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards,  Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Top notch service and overall great experience
review: We live in Tampa and decided to do a two night getaway at the resort and leave our son at home. If was a great getaway and was like a vacation but we were only 30 minutes from home. The entire staff was great and extremely friendly. We will definitely stay again soon.

title: A lovely holiday!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review on your stay at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your getaway and that our staff here were extremely friendly. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Regards,  Lani Wood Assistant Front Office Manager

title: It deserves a fifth diamond...excellent!
review: We arrived early, 10.30 after transferring from Orlando and received a lovely welcome and this was the start of a fabulous stay. We were rung while at lunch to say our room was ready and the staff were very polite and friendly abut getting us settled. The room was lovely and as on the fourth floor the balcony was, as others have stated, massive.   Our only criticism is that we paid for a partial view room and we should have splashed out and had a gulf view as the view also included a car park and the top of other bars/restaurants as well as the service area for the hotel.  Staff on the Marketplace were very friendly and helpful, my morning coffee was delicious and I would heartily recommend the chocolate croissants.  The bar staff from Tate's that served on the beach were also…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: We stayed for a four day getaway and I am glad we did.  There are other hotels that are "big name" in Clearwater Beach, but the Sandpearl was excellent in every way. The common areas are open, bright and decorated perfectly for a beach resort. Guest rooms are large, beds are very comfortable with excellent quality linens. The bathroom was large and had nice quality toiletries, towels were good quality. The housekeeping staff was in our room every morning when we were at breakfast and the room was perfect by the time we returned. Turndown service every night was a nice touch and they leave the weather forecast for the following day along with chocolates.    The pool is a perfect size and the staff are very helpful, professional and prompt. The practice of other guests putting…

title: Great Resort
review: On our way to take our son back to school at UF we decided to take a side trip to Clearwater.  We absolutely loved the Sandpearl Resort.  The location is perfect directly on the beach, one of only two hotels that are.  The employees were very nice and helpful.  I was disappointed though when I asked if it was possible to get upgraded and was told there were no available upgrades and that we already had a beautiful bay view.  Our view was of a building, not so nice.  It ended up not mattering as we had gorgeous weather every day and didn't spend much time in the room.  I wish she had been honest or upgraded us as the resort didn't seem very busy and we were leaving before the weekend.  Having said that, we had a fabulous time, loved the restaurant by the pool, had lunch and…

title: Great service delivered by genuinely helpful Staff
review: It's not often you receive service and believe the sincerity of the staff delivering it. But in the case of the Sandpearl the staff really want to help and do just that. Combined with a great pool area, beautiful white fine sand beaches and good food, a relaxing end to a holiday.

title: Fantastic Accommodations and Location!
review: This place is a tiny piece of Paradise. Is it on the pricey side? Yes. But I don't mind paying if everything is perfect. And it was. Easy check in and check out, wonderful staff, everyone here goes above and beyond and seems to enjoy their jobs very much. The lobby area is gorgeous. Extremely clean rooms. The housekeeping staff does a great job every day providing all clean linens and towels and even glassware. We ordered room service a few times and the food came very quickly. We even had a few extra requests and they were met each time we placed an order. The pool area is well kept and clean. I used the fitness center as well and loved their equipment. This resort does not disappoint, and although my husband and I went for a couples vacation, it would also be a great place for…

title: Superb resort
review: Just spent a very very relaxing week here with family after staying last three years in Naples. The hotel and general resort are very well maintained and equipped and we could not really fault anything much. The room was spacious and had everything needed and the robes were the best yet.  Plus points:  Location on beach Service Facilities Free wifi Breakfast!  Things to be wary of:  Need bendy straws in the drinks! Extra costs - valet parking $21.40/ night, resort fee $25.00/ night, beach umbrella $25.00/ each. It all adds up to nearly $75.00 per day just to lie on beach!

title: Wonderful Vacation
review: Having just had 9 days in Orlando we were ready to stay and relax in a fabulous resort and that's exactly what we did. We had a 2 bedroom gulf front suite which we were amazed at when we arrived - absolutely stunning room and as for the view WOW.  It's not cheap around the hotel but we expected this with this class of hotel and must say service was always excellent. Ate in both restaurants within the hotel which were great and also had a lovely evening making s'mores around the fire pit and watching movies in the pool both of which my girls loved.  There are also wonderful places to eat just around the hotel so there's  plenty of choice to be had . The only niggle we did have was having to pay for beach umbrellas and cabanas at the beach - I do feel that should be included when…

title: Honeymoon in Heaven @ Sandpearl
review: First of all, allow me to start by saying I am in SHOCK that there are anything but 4 and 5 star reviews. How this is possible, I will NEVER know. All I can imagine is those impossible to please types, or cynics, or cheap people perhaps...  Let's get the cons out of the way, because there are very few. Cost. This is an expensive place You are hit with $20.00 a day valet parking and a $25.00 a day "resort fee" which covers 2 waters, 2 beach towels, and fast internet service (among some other not important things). My advice would be if you are looking for a cheap or value location, look elsewhere...My friend's Uncle always had a saying when we were growing up "You get whatcha pay for in this life; you pay peanuts, you get Monkey's."   If you are looking for a value deal or not to…

title: Lunch Day
review: Went for lunch back in May and the hotel was wonderful, amenities are great and the food was really good. My wife enjoyed a massage at their spa and the service was fantastic. My family loved it walking on the beach.  It's all about the BEACH! The wide stretch of powdery white sand.

title: Favorite spot in Clearwater
review: My family recently returned from a week at the Sandpearl for an end-of-summer getaway.  This was our fourth trip to the resort.  The resort was clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Room service was quick and the menu had enough variety for a week stay The pool was nice, the cabanas are worth renting if you are going to spend the day at the pool. Poolside service was prompt. The beach was beautiful, as always. My wife and daughter told me the Spa provided good service and was appropriately priced for the resort. My son and I used the gym. It had everything needed for a good workout. The concierge was very helpful setting up a fishing charter with one days notice. Everything one might have forgotten(toothpaste, sunscreen, etc.) is only a short distance(1 block) away.…

title: Wow all 5 of us !!!!
review: Super 5 star resort ideal for family's . Mom dad and three boys all in a double queen bed. They rolled in a bed For the toddler. Can't really fault the place - nothing is too much ..... Super beds, lobby, pool area, fireplace each night with marshmallows a hit with the kids. Sand is super fine like powder. Sea clear and nice and warm with tiny waves, dolphins frolicking, rays swimming by etc. The pool is walk in so great for the toddler. My Tweens got a bit bored as there are no water slides etc. but we did excursions to see winter the dolphin, fishing from pier 60 etc. they also showed a movie each night in the pool which the Tweens enjoyed. Pricey but will be back and for me worth the extra $.

title: Perfect family getaway
review: Our family just returned from 5 nights at the Sandpearl and wish we were going to be there for another 5 nights! The property is gorgeous, the pool, the beach and the grounds very nice and the staff was great!   Our kids, 6 and 7 said "we hit the jackpot" with this hotel choice, and my husband and I couldn't agree more. Yes, it is pricey. Everything is extra. Parking, kids club, "resort fee" etc., but at the end of the day, if you go in knowing what is included and what will cost extra, this shouldn't be a surprise. Are there things that could be improved, but all in all I thought it was a great place for a family getaway.   We stayed in the one bedroom suite, ocean view and it was great. There are 2 balconies so my husband and I sat on the balcony with a few cocktails after the…

title: Nice place for a relaxing girls' getaway!
review: My sister and I stayed four nights in August at the Sandpearl. We had a great relaxing getaway!  What we liked and a bit that could be improved -   It's all about the BEACH!  The wide stretch of powdery white sand, the calm, mostly clear water, the antics of the various seabirds, we enjoyed it all, and could enjoy those things anywhere on Clearwater Beach. Staying at the Sandpearl made it easy though, with the lounges and umbrella ($25) and beach service. When it got too hot we walked up to the pool and cooled off in the shade, or up up to our very comfortable room. We liked the sofas and the fire pit along with the beach bar in the evenings.   The ocean water was calm and fairly clear in the mornings. It got stirred up and cloudy with quite a bit of seaweed by afternoon, but it…

title: Amazing location on the beach
review: A very nice family resort if you have kids 7 yr+. If you are a pool person you will find this pool area quit average and a bit boring. If you are a beach person you will love this place. The beach in front of the hotel is amazing. The staff are friendly and service minded. If you want to have breakfast at the hotel and especially the buffet you really must love pancakes, waffles and omeletts because thats it. If you are more into European style breakfast you may be disappointed. During our 14 day stay the espresso machines where out of order 75% of the days :(

title: The most amazing hotel experience ever!!!
review: I stayed here with my husband for a mini vacation in late July early August. From the moment we arrived it was amazing! We were welcomed like celebrities and offered mimosa's and champagne. Our hotel room was upgraded to a corner junior suite with a gulf front view, complimentary! The room service food was the best we have ever had, although costly. We will for sure be back!

title: Great Hotel for the area
review: For some reason, every other hotel in the St. Pete area tries to call itself a "resort." I'm not sure I'm comfortable calling this place a resort, but it is the closest to a resort I've found in the area---and I've stayed in several. Great location, great beach, modern rooms and good food. Cons = Pool was extremely crowded and guests would come down in the morning and reserve the chairs with towels and most would rarely use them. I never counted more than 1/2 of the chairs used at any one time. Then when we wanted to find two chairs next to each other, we would have to wait around for someone to leave (which took forever). Plus when we did find somewhere to sit one day, we sat next to three young girls who told us that they didn't even stay at the hotel. They were locals and…

title: What an overpriced mess!
review: I was so disappointed with our stay here. We stayed for two nights, and choose this resort because of its ratings with triple A and reviews. Definitely below par of other hotels. The carpets throughout the hallways were dirty, linens and towels  were not "plush", the furniture clearly showed wear... small signs of a lower caliber hotel.  My frustration started at check in, where I stood 4 deep in people while staff were running around to make sure everyone had a complimentary glass of champagne rather than add a person to ease check-in.  The attendant then tried to tell me that we received a "complimentary" upgrade to an oceanfront room. I informed her that we had actually booked an oceanfront room, so I was not upgraded but merely given the room I had (pre)paid for. Some points…

title: Magnificent!!
review: This resort spa was absolutely beautiful... It is ideally located and the pool beautiful.. We stayed 4 nights... I loved the pool area which is ideally located by the beach.. The pool personnel were very friendly as were the rest of the hotel employees.. This place is awesome and I would love to stay again.. If you go, useFlorida Free which is like a taxi service whereby the drivers work only for tips.. We used them several times just calling the number given to us by the concierge... We'd ask the driver for a specific activity ( jet skiing). Within ten minutes we were at a wonderful facility ...

title: pleasant surprise!
review: We booked the cheapest room available as I knew we wouldn't be in it much..the view was actually nicer than we expected, 5th floor facing south..could see a sliver of the beach, the boats, the bridge and hear the music from the restaurant below..we loved it. Room was spacious and clean..bathroom too.- Property is charming..beach sand is like flour ...lemon yellow umbrellas billow in the breeze with blue sea and sky as back-drop.. just beautiful! Great location..poolside grill was excellent. Staff was superb from valet to front desk, from waiters to very helpful concierge. Beach chairs/umbrellas cost too much ($26 for 2 chairs, one umbrella)/ pool area gets crowded/walls between rooms are indeed thin..my only complaints. Kids have major activities going on all day making this a…

title: My new favorite place
review: My husband and I spent three nights at the luxurious Sandpearl. We were greeted with a mimosa upon check-in. Our room wasn't ready, which wasn't an issue because we headed right to the pool. The pool is beautiful and very relaxing. However, it is too small. There is not enough room to accommodate the all of the guests and the locals who have a membership to use the pool. If you want a chair, you need to get down to the pool very early. The entire staff was very attentive and friendly. We ordered food and drinks at the pool and had no complaints.  This resort is located right on the beach. There are chairs for guests but umbrellas are rentals. The beach is beautiful. Our room was very spacious and well appointed. The walls are paper thin and we could hear people talking in the…

title: My new favorite place
review: My husband and I spent 3 nights at the luxurious Sandpearl.  We were able to relax the moment we stepped into the lobby. Check-in was quick and easy. The hotel is beautiful and nicely decorated. We enjoyed a complimentary mimosa upon check in. The pool area is beautiful and very relaxing. However, it was too crowded. The pool really isn't big enough to accommodate all of its guests. We also discovered that locals pay a membership to use the facilities, therefore adding to the crowd on the weekend. People reserve their chairs early in the morning. Being that we were on vacation, we didn't want to jump out of bed just to get a spot at the pool.  The resort is right on the beach and beach chairs are provided. Umbrella rentals are extra.  There is a daily $25 resort fee that seemed…

title: Still good, but not our best stay here
review: Have stayed at the Sandpearl a number of times.  It is definitely the nicest hotel in CWB, but this particular stay was not our favorite.  We arrived a bit early to learn the rooms were not ready yet.  No big deal, we just went down to the pool.  When we did get our rooms (which we paid a premium for the gulf coast view), we found the rooms were on the north side of the building, basically overlooking the trash bin/AC area with a sliver of beach.  Usually, we have had rooms overlooking the pool and directly out to the beach.  I can't remember the rooms numbers we've had in the past, but they must have been the even ones.  We were in room 527 this time.  Food is still good.  We tried an Italian place across the street which turned out to be rather expensive ($120 for 4 people, no…

title: Lovely hotel and pool but spoilt by the staff
review: The basic point- hotel is five star, pool is lovely although a little small once everyone gets in during the afternoon. Good location, right on beach and close to a variety of restaurants.  The hotel was let down by the money grabbing nature and staff. Just because people like us can afford to stay in luxury hotels doesn't mean we are stupid. Everything is marked up ridiculously high and the staff have their hand out for the slightest little effort e.g. House keeping forgot milk when refreshing our in room tea and coffee, so when I phoned down for a refill after we returned from our evening out they charged my room for room service and the girl delivering it after a good 20 minutes stood at my door with her hand out for a tip until I told her to go away  This was typical of them

title: Fabulous Resort on Clearwater
review: My husband and I were so impressed with the sandpearl resort. Beautiful property, super clean and wonderful customer service. This resort is comparable to the Ritz-Carlton without the expensive price (resort cost was fair)! We can't wait to go back!!!

title: Mildew
review: This hotel is beautiful and the staff are very accomodating. Hotel was booked solid  and our room was overcome with the look and smell of mildew.  Couldn't even bathe in the tub.  Would recommend that you look at the room before you pay.  Prices were high considering and $20 a day for valet parking because you have to use valet parking.  Expected more from this hotel, especially from the reviews.  The mildew was obviously there more than a day.

title: Definitely a number 1
review: I stayed at the sand pearl for 8 days and it was a truly wonderful resort. The staff tended to our needs every second of the day and the $25 dollar resort fee gives what most other hotels charge for free! Definitely best hotel in the area.

title: Beautiful hotel on the best beach ever!
review: When we arrived at this hotel I was totally wowed by the beautiful lobby area and view of the pool & beach, OMG magnificent!  We received a free glass of champagne on arrival and off we went to our lovely room.  I had requested a gulf view room but we didn't get one.  I didn't pay extra for it though so I knew it was a long shot!  Our bay view was lovely though, I loved seeing what was happening on the street and you could see the harbour and the bay which was so nice.  Absolutely no noise from the street at night.  Our balcony was only to step out onto (no balcony furniture as too small).  The pool area is lovely but it was crowded and you have to go down early to get a bed otherwise they were all gone.  Small pool for the amount of guests but really lovely.  Good service by…

title: A Beautiful place to stay
review: My wife and I spent 4 nights at the beautiful Sandpearl Resort as part of our honeymoon travelling around Florida. We absolutely loved this hotel. The room was beautifully decorated and extremely comfortable. The bed was huge and the bathroom was very roomy also. We made great use of the tea/coffee facilities (taking the to-go cups with us for our morning walks) and looked forward to the chocolates at turndown every evening. I was so greedy and asked for a few extra (which the kind assistant gave to me!) The pool area is very relaxing and well maintained, with plenty of beds. The beds on the beach are also very handy as the pool staff wait around here too. The views of the beach/gulf are really impressive as are the hammocks and chairs around the open fire.  We ate in Caretta on…

title: Disappointing
review: Yes there are lots of nice things about this hotel, but we are seriously unhappy with our room. We have booked in for 10 nights and feel that we have been given the worst room in the hotel. We did complain on arrival, but were told all rooms full!! Why has nobody come back to us since?? We have spent a huge amount of additional money here, ie breakfast, lunch, dinner, valet parking, etc, etc....The problem is the balcony which overlooks the extra fan from the kitchen which blows out fatty fried food smells 24hrs per day and is very noisy so is completely unusable!!!!!!!! Perhaps it's because we're English that we do not complain like the Americans. NOT HAPPY

title: Fabulous Place to Stay
review: We went to the Sandpearl to celebrate my special birthday for 3 days and 2 nights.  Everyone in the hotel seem to go out of their way to make out visit exceptional;  so friendly and kind. They truly made us feel at home.  The view was fabulous of the pool and the Gulf.  Everything was sparkling clean.  I had a massage, and a manicure/pedicure in the spa.  Again it was so nice and the ladies who were on the staff were just wonderful.  The lady in the the shop was juse t terrific.  She could not have been any more kind and gracious to us and sent us a special treat after my birthday dinner.  The entire stay was just perfect.  We will be back.

title: One of my favorite resorts
review: This was my 3rd time staying at the Sandpearl Resort, and it was just as wonderful. Upon check-in, we were upgraded to a suite. What a pleasant surprise! From the front desk, to the valet parking staff, everyone goes above and beyond. I don't know what it is about this resort, but it is always hard to leave.  I would definitely recommend this beautiful resort.

title: Best hotel on the beach!
review: The moment you walk into the lobby you are greeted by beautiful views of the beach and pool. I was concerned that after such a grand entrance I would be disappointed by the room...but the room was just as gorgeous! We stayed in room 503, a gulf front room that looks directly onto the beach. The entire staff was friendly and the grounds were immaculate. I thought there would be a shortage of pool and beach chairs based upon other reviews but found no problem with either. They have an "activities desk" right next to the pool where you grab as many fresh towels as you may need from an attendant before taking a dip in the pool or the ocean, and they have chilled water with various types of fresh fruit each day so you can walk over anytime for refreshment from the heat. Even the…

title: Exceptional Service
review: I have regularly visited the Sandpearl Resort for several years and have always been impressed by the fantastic level of service and the quality of the food and overall experience. I recently had the pleasure of attending a cooking demonstration by Executive Chef Steve Jordan, and also had the fortunate opportunity of meeting Debi Pagan in person that same evening. Although I have seen both in passing, this was a great opportunity to visit with them on a more personal basis.  I must say, these are two very impressive individuals. They love what they do, and their enthusiasm and professionalism are great attributes. I now can see why the Sandpearl is a first class establishment surpassed by none. Great job surrounding yourself with such wonderful people. I look forward to many…

title: Great Family Resort!
review: My husband had business in the Tampa/Clearwater area so I went along just to hang out while he worked. I had to WONDERFUL massages by Kathy in the spa.  I would have gone everyday except for the fact she didn't work every day I was there. :(  The gym had what I needed but I was very small.  At least not many other people were in there working out.  I stayed away from the pool all together as it was FULL of kids.    I was there without mine so I didn't feel like getting splashed by everyone else's.  The beach was great.  Very clean.  There were umbrella's with lounge chairs you could reserve for the day but I just took one of the free one's right next to them.  I ate lunch everyday at Tate's Grill on the beach at the resort.  Food was always great.  Service was A+!! from every…

title: Very Nice
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review of your experience at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am glad to hear that you were able to relax and enjoy the resort during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: GORGEOUS HOTEL with ALL AMENITIES for a VACATION.
review: A little late on my review but stayed for a week and the Sand Pearl and was very impressed. Everyone went out of their way to may you feel welcome. Clean and comfortable room make a stay great. Word of advise get a pool and ocean view facing south as close to ocean front as possible. Food average Pool Bar good Pool Clean. Chairs right oof beach best. Any kind of food and drink within easy walking distance. Really don't need car unless traveling out of the beach area. We spend a lot of time in Marco island at the Marriott. Marriott a little more upscale but need a car. For a great relaxing vacation Sand Pearl is right up there.

title: Thanks Sandpearl
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear that our staff went out of their way to make you feel welcome as the art of hospitality is something we practice everyday here. We appreciate your visit and do hope that when you return to Clearwater Beach you choose to stay with us again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Sandpearl Resort is a gem....
review: The Sand Pearl Hotel is located on  Clearwater Beach, Fl.  It is a 6* Hotel. Professional men trained in the safety and locked procedures of Valet Parking. Upon arrival you are offered a complimentary champagne, mimosa or apple juice. The staff is friendly and know their roles to make certain that each and every guest is treated with the most respect.  The amenities of the hotel are far too many to mention. To give you an idea, massage and spas, full service gym, internet computer lounge, concierge to answer any questions, large pool; kid friendly, 2 jacuzzies, and beautiful yellow plush towels and comfortable yellow lounge chairs with yellow umbrellas. Once you enter your suite you know you are in the best hotel. All white and crisp linen, lots of towels, soaps, bath gel,…

title: Excellent resort!...Absolutely wonderful!...4 out of 5 stars:)
review: I stayed at the Sandpearl for 5 days, 4 nights for the week of my Bday last weekend...The atmosphere is wonderful!...The rooms are immaculate...The beach is amazing!!!...My only complaint is that I wish there was more than one pool because it can get pretty crowded really early in the morning (lol)...My only advice when staying is here is make sure you get a Gulf Front view!!...And as far as the service goes...Well MOST of the staff here is TOP NOTCH...The houseman and housekeepers were so pleasant and meticulous (LOVE the towel doves...Nice touch!)...The concierge was so very helpful when it came to finding good restaurants to recommend...Everyone at the front desk truly gave service with a smile (and the Mimosa that greeted me was awesome btw!)...The only employee I had a…

title: Great Stay!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your birthday week with us and that our staff was there for you to enhance your experience. We appreciate your feedback and do hope that the next time you come to Clearwater Beach, you stay with us again.   Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Not sure about value.
review: We had a super time. We booked through their website and got a better deal than Expedia. They upgraded us to a room with a view of the Gulf of Mexico and the pool. Be prepared for extra charges of resort fees and valet parking. $45 extra a day. There were always clean beach towels and plenty of beach chairs. They also have free boogie boards, but you have to ask to use them. This isn't posted anywhere.

title: What a treat.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am glad you got to enjoy our beautiful pool and beach area and that you had a great stay. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: You get what you pay for
review: What we liked: Clean, great service, tropical appearance, central location  What we didn't like: Paper thin walls (who wants to hear couple in another room having relations, or someone in another room using the bathroom) Room layout of Jr. Suite was pretty bad. (Bed area opens to bathroom... who's idea was this? Late night bathroom use disturbs everyone else in the room) Valet only parking - $$

title: Love Clearwater Love Sandpearl
review: Clearwater is a busy family resort on a wonderful beach and Sandpearl has one of the best locations on the strip. Squeezed between 2 great dinner restaurants on one side and "the best breakfast on the beach" on the other you will have plenty of cheap eating options. Staff are very attentive and the guys on the beach will fix you up with a parasol for a small fee. Yes the carpet is a bit grubby but the decor is generally good with interesting artwork everywhere. The lobby is relaxed with a piano playing itself in the corner. Our family had a great time.

title: Sandpearl - Pros and Cons
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am so glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time spent with us here on the beautiful Clearwater Beach. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Amazing Resort!
review: I recently spent a week at the Sandpearl and here's my take on the resort:  Pros: 1.) Very nice beach with white sand and lovely warm, calm Gulf Waters.          2.) Resort employees were always polite and willing to help.          3.) Lobby is nicely appointed as were the rooms.          4.) Decent food options on resort premises, albeit expensive.          5.) Housekeeping did a great job every day!!  Cons: *1.)  The biggest downfall of this hotel is that there is a serious lack of security.  While we were there multiple families' belongings were stolen from the beach while people were swimming in the Gulf.  Granted, one should not leave valuables on the beach unattended, but these people had their coolers taken as well.    If the hotel wants to bill itself as a "Five Star"…

title: Think twice about storing your luggage at the Bell Stand.
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write you review of your time with us.  I am glad that you were happy with your stay.  I was happy to hear that you were pleased with the aspects you mentioned in your review.  In your review you mentioned safety around our beach and in the local area.  As a long time resident of Clearwater I have to disagree with your evaluation.  While we did have an isolated incident one weekend several weeks ago with guests belongings being taken from our beach, that is the first time of such an offense that I am aware of.  Additionally, we do have security guards on our pool deck on Friday's through Sunday's to patrol the area but they are there to make sure that the people on the pool deck are registered guests.    Clearwater is a very "Family Friendly" town.  We have a very involved Police Department that does a great job of serving our residences and visitors.
