The overall guest experience is a priority for the Police Department and safety and security is a top priority.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write a review.  If you would like to speak personally regarding your experience please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: The best
review: We met a group of friends here for a long weekend. From check in to check out everything was exceptional. The entire staff was friendly and engaged. The surroundings were beautiful and the beach was amazing.

title: SandPearl is Consistently Excellent
review: My wife and I spent the 4th at the beautiful SandPearl on Clearwater Beach. It is not only located on one of the most beautiful stretches of beach in Florida but the Fireworks are shot off by the City of Clearwater very close by making it a fun evening. The hotels 5 star rating is well deserved. The SandPearl is not only beautiful but spotlessly clean with a large pool adjoining the beach. I thought that because it was a holiday weekend, service would be strained as they were booked, but NOT to my surprise, service at the restaurants were excellent. If your looking for a get-a-way on a gorgeous beach, near many fun things to do, this is Nirvana.  I need to mention that April Cole in the reservations dept., was very helpful as my plans changed a few times and she was cheerful…

title: AWESOME!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. We appreciate all of your positive feedback and I will be sure to pass your kind words on to April. Thank you once again and we look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Honeymoon at Sandpearl
review: Great hotel.  Great pool.  Expensive, but nice to get treated well at a hotel for a change.  We got there and they handed my wife and I a glass of champagne and my little guy a little bucket and shovel for the beach that said "sandpearl 2013".  Super nice touch!  Room was nice.  Pay extra for ocean front.  Not ocean view!!!  Zero depth pool with pool service (expensive, but nice).  Right on the beach.  Lots of activities.  Outdoor movies for kids at the pool, fire pits, cabana rentals.  Walking distance to shops and good food.  Tasty grouper sandwiches next door.  LOTS OF BEACH!  nice calm warm water for kids.  Just a nice hotel with excellent staff..

title: Spend the Fourth of July at Sandpearl!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write such an awesome review of The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear that you were treated so well at our resort throughout your stay as hospitality is what we are all about here. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Still nice but not the same as last visit
review: Me and my husband are from New York, but we got married in Naples, Florida and then went to the Sandpearl on our honeymoon.  BIG MISTAKE (for us).  The surrounding area is very similar to Long Beach Long Island/ Seaside Heights, NJ - which some people would enjoy, but its just not at all what we wanted.  The hotel itself was FILLED with families.  The pool was always filled with children, we could never get a seat by the pool, ever!  The beach is HUGE, by the time I got out of the water and back to my chair, the front pieces of my hair were already dry!  Also, its a public beach and the public were all set up right by the water and the hotel set up their chairs as far away from the water as possible.  I didn't understand that one.  The rooms were definitely over priced and so…

title: Sandpearl Resort is heavenly...
review: I stayed here with my family on vacation Memorial Day weekend and was impressed by so many aspects of this facility.    Our room was wonderful with lots of thoughtful little touches.  Right when you first walk in you are greeted by the beach front view from the lobby window along with a glass of champagne.  The rooms are lovely, very clean, well-stocked, and full of amenities.  No detail is overlooked anywhere on the property. From the restaurants to the Spa to the luxuriously-appointed rooms - it's all meticulously executed and maintained.  I highly recommend this hotel, and will definitely go there again.  Whether you’re traveling with friends, family, or on a romantic get-a-way, there are a variety things to do.  You can hang out on the beach and play tennis (rackets and…

title: Excellent Hotel, we loved it
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us with such great feedback regarding your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed so many of the fun things that the Clearwater/St. Petersburg area have to offer. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel....noisy beach
review: We loved this place. It was our first time to Clearwater and we had travelled over from the UK for our Honeymoon. The Valet staff are great and really quick, always really professional and helpful 'Thanks guys'. The lobby is very nice a clearly gives you a 5 star feeling instantly. Really quick check in from some very friendly front of house staff. The room was very well appointed, modern and exceptionally clean. Amazing bathroom and great view on the corner of the intercostal and the beach. The only issue was as the prev review says, the very noisy weed whacker and leaf blowers sometimes get annoying around the pool and beach. Mind you it wasn’t all day, maybe just an hour every now and then, I guess they have to do it at some point.  The beach it’s amazing with white fluffy…

title: Nice resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater Beach. I am delighted to hear you traveled such a long way to visit us, and it is also great to hear such great comments regarding our valet team here at the resort. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you in the future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: NICEST HOTEL AT CLEARWATER BEACH
review: What should have been a great trip turned into a battle to avoid multiple motorized vehicles all over the beachfront. Lovely hotel but being banished to the room in order to get some peace and quiet was not what I had in mind for the price.    Sandpearl should look into decreasing the noise pollution on their beautiful beachfront and get someone to trim the bushes manually rather than using a weed whacker.  This is not the place to stay for peace and quiet!

title: People always make the difference...
review: Very mixed feelings on this one!   Just got back from an amazing trip with my daughter to Clearwater Beach, Florida. Overall, we had an incredible time and I'll have very fond memories of this trip for years to come. It's hard to write a mediocre review when you're in a really good mood! However, this review is about our hotel, not our trip, so here goes….  I did my research. Clearwater Beach is known for Winter the Dolphin and it's beautiful beaches, not for fancy resorts or five star restaurants. With that in mind, my expectations were set appropriately and I was really excited to relax and enjoy a cool little beach town with my daughter.   The town did not disappoint….but unfortunately, the hotel did.  In general….  Location - Excellent…right on the sand and close to the main…

title: Why settle for just any resort?
review: We just had another great experience at The SandPearl Resort. We have stayed in other luxury resorts around the Clearwater area and nothing compares. This place has it all... a great facility with fabulous gulf views, a great pool area, and the most exclusive white sand beach right on the property. We went for one night to celebrate our anniverssary and they surprised us with 8 increadibly tasty stawberries dipped in dark chocolate which were delivered to our room during our siesta time.  Our four course dinner at their Carreta fine-dining restaurant was very impressive but for lunch we had at the pool bar the very best grouper sandwich in the entire State of Florida.  Finally, what makes this boutique hotel great is their employees.  They anticipate your every need and make all…

title: A Florida treasure with the best beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for writing a review of your most recent stay with us at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa on the beautiful Clearwater Beach. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed the resort as much as you did and that you decided to spend your anniversary with us. We hope we provided some treasured memories for you and we look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great Vacation!
review: Attended a wedding at this resort and it was nearly flawless.  The hotel is beautiful, clean, and marvelously designed.  The service was impeccable from the front desk, to the pool security, to the cleaning staff, to the beach waiters.  The beach in front of the hotel was the nicest beach I can recall.  Huge, perfect white sand, and warm water.  They clearly rack the beach regularly as it was too perfect to be natural.  Rooms are clean and comfortable, and there is turn down service (a small perk but when accompanied by chocolates, a very cute note, and the weather forecast for the next day it really makes for a nice touch).  The few less than perfect things were very minor.  We had a little trouble getting our bags brought up by the concierge, the hotel is very cold with the AC…

title: So relaxing!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for writing a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am glad that you were able to visit and attend a beautiful wedding here at the resort on Clearwater Beach. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Relaxing in the Lap of Luxury
review: The Sandpearl Resort spoils vacationers with exceptional service, beautiful rooms, and great amenities.  At check-in you're greeted with  a complimentary Mimosa just to start your vacation off on the right foot.  The Lobby is the hub of the hotel with a small shop, which has a great selection of very nice clothing and jewelry and a nice cafe to buy morning coffee and a breakfast croissant or pastry and any other small item you might need like toiletries or a bag for the beach. The best views from your hotel room are definitely on the Gulf side of the hotel facing the pool or Gulf. I suggest paying a little extra for the view! Great places to eat and tons of shops are right out the doors of the Sandpearl! The Clear Sky is highly recommended for breakfast, lunch and dinner!  The…

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am so happy to hear that you relaxed in luxury with us, and I will be sure to pass your positive feedback on to our pool and beach staff. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: nice five star facility!
review: If you are looking for a 5-star experience on Clearwater Beach, look no further than the Sandpearl Hotel.  This hotel stands on the property of the old Clearwater Beach Hotel and in the lobby area they show some photos from the historical old hotel.  This new hotel is absolutely fabulous with first class service and amenities.  From the welcome glass of champagne upon arrival to the bottle of water provided by the car valet upon departure, customer service is first rate.    The rooms are large and very clean.  A gulf front room gets you a balcony with stunning beach views!  The restaurant provides a very good buffet breakfast and dinner is also very good.  The beach cafe also has very good sandwiches and the best homemade potato chips (my son would just order the chips, they…

title: Would definitely recommend
review: Dear Guest,  We thank you for writing a review of your stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. We appreciate your positive feedback and we are glad that you enjoyed first rate customer service from the arrival to the departure. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you in the future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Perfect Stay
review: If you appreciate great service, comfortable rooms, attention to details, professionally trained staff and a beautiful location, this is the place to stay.  This is one of those resorts where everyone is tuned to catering to the guest.  Very well done!

title: Gorgeous and almost perfect resort hotel!
review: We stayed two nights in this lovely hotel.  The entire facility is beautifully appointed.  One of the things that we really enjoyed was all the real artwork that was on the walls throughout the public spaces.  Our room was very roomy and comfortable, and the view of the pool and the beach beyond was delightful.  Loved the rockers on the balcony.  All the staff we encountered were friendly and very helpful.  The resort is pricy, but for us, it was worth the splurge.

title: Florida Vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us with such positive feedback regarding your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. It is always great to hear that you loved your view and that the rockers on the balcony provided you with a relaxing experience. We appreciate you writing a review and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: An amazing adventure
review: Started our Florida trip off in Clearwater and had a blast at the Sand Pearl Resort.  So nice and clean and we had a gulf view that was outstanding.  The room was so spacious and came with everything we might need, full kitchen, washer/dryer, the bathroom shampoo's and conditioner's was so nice!!!  Loved the balcony, was able to sit out there and relax in the morning's. The bed was extremely comfortable and everything was clean and sparkiling. Very, very nice place, we will be bak next year !!!

title: Another perfect stay at the Sandpearl.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. So good to hear that you enjoyed all the amenities that make your stay at the resort so special. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: ~Wonderful~
review: My husband and I just celebrated our 30th wedding anniversary.  He found out that the traditional gift to give on this anniversary was the pearl.  It seemed fitting that we celebrate at the Sandpearl resort.  We begun our adventure with a sunrise from a beach-front hotel in Daytona to sunset at the Clearwater resort.  I notified the hotel about our stay and they arranged for us to ring the famous Tate bell from the historic hotel on the beach at sunset.  The activities director even video taped and snapped some photos for us.  From the moment we arrived to the Sandpearl we were greeted warmly and graciously with a complimentary upgrade to a beach-front suite and glasses of champagne!  Our room and view was beyond belief with a perfectly appointed suite of living and bedroom…

title: Love this hotel
review: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel a few times and we always enjoy the stay. The rooms are a good size and some have a kitchen. The pool is fantastic and the pool service is also good. They have a great bar on the beach with a pit fire where we enjoy sitting in the evenings while enjoying a drink. Clearwater beach is one of the nicest beaches in the world with sugar like sand.   We enjoy having breakfast at the restaurant across the street as well as eating at the small Frenchies restaurant that is on the other side of the road. Plenty to do within walking distance of the hotel.  We definitely recommend staying at this hotel. It is the best in Clearwater.

title: Nice property but beware of annoying fees and high prices‏
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for writing a review of your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear that your enjoyed a relaxing evening at our very own Tate Island Grill sitting around the fire pit. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Pricey but nice
review: Over this is a nice hotel and the staff very is friendly for the most part. My issues with Sandpearl is the constant nickel and dime routine you run into, and for services and amenities you normal have included, even at hotels of the same or even greater quality. And a note to management, if you read this, please don't try to offer some lame excuse about the resort fee being of high value, its not.  I have stayed at many resorts that do not charge this fee, it would be an easy fix to discontinue it or at least offer parking with the resort fee. It just a B.S. fee to bring in more profit, period.  Anyways, if you plan on driving here understand that you must pay to valet your vehicle ($20 per night), there are no other options! No street parking (all metered) and no other free…

title: Great location but rip off extra costs !
review: Very friendly staff. We were greeted with a glass of champagne on arrival. They did upgrade our room. The restaurant was excellent. Great food and the prices were not that bad. The grounds and rooms were upkept well and is located near the pier and the downtown shopping.

title: Beautiful Resort, But they Nickel and Dime you.....
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for providing us with such positive feedback regarding your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am glad that you enjoyed all of our amenities and the grounds and rooms exceeded your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Loved our visit here!
review: Beautiful hotel including the lobby, pool, rooms, etc. All the service was impeccable (except for a few poolside bartenders, but not because they were bad, only because their service wasn't exceptional as the rest of the staff).  There are lots of kids that stay at this resort, but not so many that you can't enjoy a getaway with adults.  Great beach location, near many restaurants, and amazing staff.  I would definitely visit the Sandpearl again!

title: Great place for adults and kids
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for writing a review of your recent visit to The Sandpearl Resort. It is always great to hear compliments of our staff, I am glad to hear that you loved your visit here. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Property
review: This hotel was great! They cater to kids but the property is very nicely kept and not run down from crazy kids. They gave sand buckets to the kids upon check in and were very friendly everywhere on the property. The concierge were great about arranging things. Our room was nicely appointed with rocking adirondak chairs on the balcony. The view from our room was great as well.

title: Good Vacation, Great Location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us with such positive feedback regarding your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad to hear that you and your kids enjoyed all of the amenities that the resort has to offer. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you in the future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Not 5 Star Service
review: I like this resort because its on the small side. We've stayed here twice and both times we really enjoyed it. Memorial weekend was a bit crazy and over crowded so we just avoided the pool until everyone left the evening of Memorial Day.  Beach is beautiful and there is a jet ski/para sail rental place just off property. It's also a short walk to the pier and marina. My only complaint would be about the room we booked. Gulf front junior suite was basically a hotel room w a sofa bed, we were expecting something a bit bigger. Concierge was very helpful in planning our activities each day and poolside wait staff is always a great perk!

title: declining service
review: I stayed at the Sand Pearl March of 2013.  My ocean view was mainly of a dumpster and when we asked if we could move or pay to upgrade we were told no.  The bellman said this was a common complaint.  My husband had a massage scheduled at noon and we asked if we could have a 1:30 check out and once again we were told no 12:30 was it or we could pay a half of a days rate.  I have stayed at this property 3 previous times and found them very accomadating but not this visit.  Our room was over $500.00 a night and we had higher expectations.  I wrote the hotel Mr Waltz never had the courtesy to respond.

title: One of the best beach destinations in Florida
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to review your March 2013 stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I appreciate your return business but apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay.  As I am sure you are aware March is our prime time of the year and the availability of rooms does become difficult.  This holds true for both upgrades and late check outs.  We do our absolute best to upgrade all guests when it is possible however due to our high occupancy in March guests have already booked the different room types so upgrading is not always available.  The same holds true with late check outs.  As you know, we have many guests that want to check in as early as possible and our check in for new guests is 4pm.  It becomes difficult to allow guests late check outs due to the amount of time that is required to ready the room for the new guests.    In your review you commented that you wrote me.  I apologize but I do not recall receiving the letter.  If you still have it and can either mail or email it to me I would appreciate it.  If you would rather call me directly at the hotel, I would appreciate that as well.    Again, thank you for your time in completing this review.  I truly do appreciate the feedback.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Loved it
review: This hotel exceeded our expectations and is everything you could ask for in a hotel.  Spacious rooms that are well laid out. This is the first hotel that actually had room for all 4 large suitcases for a family of four, without being in the way.  There was also room for all of our toiletries in the bathroom. The service is excellent and will accommodate your every desire. The beds and bedding are very comfortable.   The restaurant here is excellent, and the cafe by the pool is great as well.  They have poolside service for food/drinks as well. There is also a market in the lobby that serves Starbucks, which is a plus!     The beach here is less crowded than most, and they provide loungechairs & umbrellas. The water is beautiful and the sand is powdery soft and white.  There is a…

title: Great location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for providing us with such positive feedback regarding your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed all of the amenities that the hotel has to offer, especially our two restaurants and our award winning spa. I couldn't agree more with your claim that we are one of the best beach destinations in Florida, as there truly is no beach like Clearwater Beach. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Dreamy spot, location, location!
review: I attended a wedding here and we decided to book a room with the wedding party. Beautiful room with granite counters in the bathroom and an AMAZING view. It is pricey but worth it if you are staying for a night or two. The staff could have been friendlier but the valet crew were very sweet. Overall, I recommend this place and would come back for a night next time.

title: Amazing!
review: I recently got married at the Sandpearl. We stayed there for the entire week of the wedding and the staff was absolutely amazing. They were very attentive and made sure we always had everything we needed. They took great care of all of our guests as well. The pool is amazing as are both restaurants. I can't wait to go back for another weekend of relaxation! Definitely worth the money!

title: Incredible resort!
review: Dear Guest,  Congratulations on your wedding, and we are so happy that you chose us as your destination to celebrate your big day. Thank you so much for writing a review, I am glad to hear that our staff was able to be attentive and make sure you had everything you needed throughout your wedding week. Thank you so much for sharing your memories with us, we look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Very nice resort, bring your wallet
review: We absolutely loved the Sandpearl Resort.  The hotel is on the beach with an incredible zero entry pool (for the kids).  Tate's beach restaurant / bar are a great value (great food and even better drinks).  Easy access to the room (quick elevator) and to the pool / beach.  They do have a resort fee, but what high-end resort doesn't.  They have a kids activity center that was awesome for our little ones.  The hotel staff was outstanding.  We loved it and will be staying here again soon.

title: Lovely hotel in beautiful location - shame about level of service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for writing such a positive review of your experience here at The Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad that you enjoyed so many amenities that the resort has to offer, and is even better hearing that our staff was outstanding throughout your stay. We appreciate your feedback, thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Best Resort in Tampa Area
review: Stayed at this hotel for 3 days in May 2013.  Very nice overall.  Parking is valet only, $20 bucks per day.  Elegant and inviting lobby area.  Front desk staff was attentive and helpful.  Exceptionally fast elevator service.  Rooms are well decorated with great views, but pricey.  There is a $25 per day resort fee in addition to the room charges. The lobby business center has two guest computers available at no charge for those who need internet access.  On-site restaurants were a great value.  The outdoor restuarant (Tate's) is casual, with beach and pool views.  Try the pulled-pork nachos!  Caretta's on the Gulf offers indoor/outdoor seating and has a nice menu selection.  Word of caution:  if you sit outdoors, don't leave your table unattended or you may find a seagull has…

title: Quick getaway for my birthday
review: We stayed here in January for my birthday over a long weekend. We loved this hotel and would highly suggest it to anyone!!! We were greeted with the door held open, a smile and champagne!  Service was great....from the moment we arrived till the moment we left! Valet service was very prompt!! Literally ran for your car! The beach was beautiful, we had a great room with a beautiful view over the pool looking out at the ocean! The fire pit was a nice touch too...just wished the flames went a little higher...it was Jan so it was really cool at night and it wasnt warm to sit by as it was just a gas strip inside the pit. We did not eat at the hotel at all as we went offsite the few nights we were there to have our meals. Lots of great local places to eat! We enjoyed going to the…

title: Strictly amateur hour
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review of your birthday weekend spent at The Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad that you were able to enjoy the service we provided as well as visiting our local celebrity, Winter, at the Clearwater Marine Aquarium! Thank you so much for your positive feedback, we look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Did you know?
review: Attended a wedding rehearsal dinner last night ... awful!  Food was disgusting and ridiculously expensive.  For $70/person barbecue, perhaps they could of spared a few cans of sterno, to heat up the hamburgers they cooked yesterday and tossed in a buffet pan.  The so-called "Famous Tate Chicken Wings" were awful.  I suspected they were cooked earlier in the week and they didn't bother to reheat them.  That was entire extent of barbecue.  The hotel hardly had a sign, directing where anything was, including the lobby.   The area of the barbecue wasn't marked off and bared-breasted senior citizens in bathing suits, were continually strolling through the middle of the party.  The entire pool and beach area was wall to wall people ... reminded me of some tiny summer beach "resort" in…

title: Place to relax
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of your recent visit to the Sandpearl Resort.  I was very disappointed to hear about the level of dissatisfaction you had with your time with us.  We normally have an outstanding reputation in regards to all facets of weddings that we have here.  We take much pride in making sure that we create exceptional memories for people on their special days or in this case rehearsal dinners.  In your comment you addressed the price of the event.  Events here are definately not inexpensive.  We believe however that given the normal quality of the food as well as the prime location of the event on our beautiful beach there is a high value.  I am sorry that the food you experienced was not to your liking.  I can confirm that all food is prepared immediately before the event and does not sit around for extended periods of time.  This goes for both the hamburgers and chicken wings.  I will review your comments with our Banquet Manager regarding the food being cold and not enough sternos being used.    I will also share your comments with our Banquet Manager regarding signage, exclusivity and availability of the bartender.  I can tell you that we have at least one designated bartender per event.  If they went missing for a period of time, I am truly sorry.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  I do appreciate the time you took to let me know your thoughts.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Perfect
review: Not sure if they oversold their beach/pool club membership but if you are a guest of the resort on the weekend rest assured it's impossible to get a spot by the pool unless you go down to the pool by 6:00 a.m. to reserve a spot. I had asked on the weekend why there were so many people all of a sudden and was told that they have beach/pool membership that they offer and most of the people there are those club members.  Friday was just right with not that many people at the pool, as for the rest of the weekend forget it.  We were given arm bands so they knew we were actual guests at the resort. Thank goodness the beach is so spacious enough room for all to get a seat even on the busy Saturday and Sunday.   The resort itself is beautiful.  Very spacious public spaces as well as…

title: Easily the best resort on Clearwater Beach
review: By far the best choice on Clearwater Beach - if you can swing the cost - which is getting more and more difficult. One caveat about the resort - it's won awards recently and I fear it's getting 'too big for its britches' and risks pricing itself out of its base of customers - you are great, Sandpearl, but not if your fans can't return! Now for the good - the atmosphere, rooms, pool, restaurants, and rooms combine for the best overall experience on Clearwater Beach. Whether for a girls' weekend, a family trip, a wedding, or a couple's getaway - this place is ideal. The pool area is perfect (with excellent service!), the beachside bar/restaurant is a lovely setting with a good menu. The way the beach is steps from the beach is lovely and unmatched in the area. The rooms are clean,…

title: A fantastic place to vacation
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us with feedback from your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I loved reading about how much you enjoy the pool and beach experience here at the resort, and not to mention our award winning spa. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future. If you have any questions about rates and sales that we offer please do not hesitate to give me a call at the resort the next time you make a reservation.  Best Regards,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Very good, but could easily be better
review: I personally love this place and have stayed here multiple times.  However, I do have issues with their website for booking activities and/or services.  My suggestion - don't use the website - call or visit the concierge directly.  If flying into Tampa airport - I highly recommend the Ambassador Limo Service that can be booked through Sandpearl.

title: Just like the islands but closer.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review and thank you for coming back to visit us here at The Sandpearl Resort. I apologize for the issues with booking activities online, we are currently working to get those issues corrected to better assist you in the future. I am delighted you choose us as your destination when you visit Florida. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Best Regards,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Clean with turn down service!
review: Stayed for one night whilst on vacation in Florida. Overall very good hotel with excellent beachfront location. We arrived early and check in clerk very helpful, happy to check us in but said a room on a higher floor (6th) would be available soon if we were happy to wait and I'm glad we did as the 3rd floor bay view room would have had no view at all. Large rooms but noisy a/c! Concierge booked us a table for dinner in the Coretta restaurant and was able to get us a window table so we could see the sunset.  The food was good but the experience just lacked those finishing touches commensurate with a hotel with luxury aspirations.   Tables vacated by other diners were not immediately cleared or re-set, there is no sommelier to guide you through a good but quite long wine list and…

title: Beautiful
review: Stayed here for 4 nights.  Excellent staff- very friendly.  Great service. Beautiful lobby & pool area.  We were welcomed with mimosas and juice & sandbuckets for the kids.  Walking distance to restaurants and the pier & playground for kids.  Trolley service has a stop nearby, so this was nice for venturing over to the Clearwater Aquarium, etc.  Our room wasn't anything spectacular (street side), but the service was exceptional.

title: Yes, 5 stars if not.........
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for writing a review of The Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater Beach. It is always great to hear that our staff provided such great and friendly service throughout your stay. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Location, Location, Location
review: This is our getaway hotel, 2 hours from home. One night here usually is exactly the ticket this "old" married couple needs to recharge. This time, I made the big mistake to book through Expedia instead of the hotel itself. Hence, we were treated as strangers, having to hand over driving licenses etc.although our names and information were right there on the computer. We had been promised one of top floors and free upgrade subject to availability. Well, instead of the wonderful, large gulf front room that we have been accustomed to, we found ourselves in a tiny room overlooking the street and bars - which stay very open til the sun comes up!!!! Of course, from our 3rd floor, we did not get to see the sunrise either. The bathtub accomodated only someone under four ft., the fridge…

title: Wonderful stay at the Sandpearl Resort
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for providing feedback from your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I sincerely apologize for all the inconveniences you seem to have experienced during your recent stay. Please reach out to me at the resort at your convenience with any other concerns you may have had. We appreciate your feedback and I look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Loved the resort feel
review: This hotel was very nice and in the perfect location.  We rented a car, but didn't end up using it because everything was in walking distance.  They had anything you wanted to do, from volleyball, soccer, snorkeling equipment, outdoor chess game.  Beach was easily accessible from the pool area with chairs available for hotel guests.  Pool was very nice!  Would definitely stay here again...worth the price!!

title: Wish I could give 5 stars....
review: OK, I will start with the good.  Friendliest, most professional staff I have ever seen.  Breathtaking views, amazing pool, beautifully decorated from the front entrance to the ocean.  The turn down service was really a nice touch as well.  Bathrooms are immaculate.  So, what's the problem you may wonder?     Why am I paying a $25 per day resort fee, only to have to rent an umbrella and chair for the same price?  Kinda tacky, especially considering most guests fly there.  I would rather pay 30-35 dollars per day and not have to worry about it.  However, the very tall, older gentlemen helping us at the beach was part of the immaculate service.    Let's discuss dining.  Tate's Island Grill was great for cocktails and easy food.  I was extremely put off by the 18% gratuity,…

title: Great weekend getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am glad to hear that our staff was friendly and professional and that you enjoyed the views, pool, and beautifully decorated resort. The resort fee is a combination of amenities to enhance our guest’s experience, it is a fixed charge that every guest that stays at The Sandpearl Resort pays. If you look into what the fee covers while you stay at the resort, it does hold high value for our guests. I do apologize for your dining experience at Caretta on the Gulf, and I have passed on your concerns with the management staff. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again, if you have any further concerns please do not hesitate to contact me at the resort.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great beach and hotel
review: For a three night stay this resort was excellent! I arrived late, Shelly welcomed me and was extremely helpful. Entire staff was great, room service, pool waiters and Restarauant crew. Rooms beautiful and very comfy. Within walking distance to shops and pier 60. Beach was nice but not what I expected. The only suggestion I have is for the resort to pipe in fragrances in the air conditioning like the do at the Royal Resorts in Mexico. It makes you feel like you are at a spa retreat. Overall I would recommend if you travel with children.

title: Lovely hotel and stay, not sure its 5*
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review The Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater Beach. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your weekend getaway to the beach. I will pass on your kind words to Shelley, we appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Awesome vacation choice!
review: The hotel rooms are amazingly clean considering how much sun screen and sand must go through each of them.  I assume they must steam clean them regularly or something - there were no odors at all and the room looked like we were the first people to ever stay in it.  For tall people, the shower head was nice and high, so no ducking required, and there was a nice flow of water.  The bathroom was much colder than the main room area, which was a bit of a nuisance, but nothing that a hot shower couldn't fix.  The beach was amazing (it IS Florida) and was not especially crowded the week we were there.  Umbrellas on the beach did cost $25/day to rent from the resort and really aren't optional except for the most serious sun worshiper.  Once you paid for the umbrella, though, you had a…

title: Best Hotel in Clearwater
review: My husband and I spent three nights at the Sandpearl in mid-April.  This hotel is, by-far, the nicest hotel on Clearwater Beach.  And, try calling the hotel to book directly -- our rate was substantially lower than what was advertised on a few travel websites.  The beach and pool area are beautiful and relaxing.  We don't have children, but there looked to be good activities for the kids, and they have s'morse roasting on the beach at night.  The restaurants were great - Tate's is casual and right on the beach, with options to sit inside or outside.  Caretta's on the Gulf had wonderful breakfast options (the breakfast potatoes were the best my husband has ever had) and our waiter (I think his name was Mark...thick NY accent!) was awesome.  We also enjoyed a wonderful dinner…

title: 2 teens and 2 parents had a great time in Clearwater Beach.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for providing us with such positive feedback regarding your recent visit to The Sandpearl Resort. We are honored you think so highly of our resort, and I couldn't agree more. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great weekend get away!
review: Feel so lucky to have spent the week at the Sandpearl on Clearwater Beach.  We had big plans for our week and ended up being very happy with long beach walks, visiting the gym and dining on great grilled fish.  The hotel is beautiful and the staff are helpful and friendly.  Gulf view room is nice and a little crowded for 4 but we were hardly in the room.  My complaints are few and small - I just don't think they have all operations running smoothly.  Leaf blowers started at 7:30 a.m. one morning - huge frustration for a group going to bed late.  We asked for turn down service to come back in 1 hour and they never did.  Came back to room at the end of the day and the room had been serviced but there was no shampoo or conditioner.  My travel agent booked this and told them we were…

title: Fun Weekend Getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear that you had such a great time, and I also apologize for us not being aware of your daughter's graduation or we surely would have done something special for her. In the future do not hesitate to contact me at the resort if there is anything I can do prior to your arrival to enhance your stay. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great Long Weekend
review: My husband and I flew to Florida for a weekend "baby moon".  We decided to splurge and stayed at the Sand Pearl.  It was definitely a first rate resort!  It had all the amenities we wanted...fantastic beach, pool, spa, and great dining.  The resort seemed to have activities for all types.  It was very family friendly with kids activities and a nice zero entry pool that was never too deep, but was great for those who were there without kids as well, with a waiter who would bring you drinks on the beach.  We had dinner one night at Caretta and really enjoyed our seafood.  The only complaint I have is that we were in a connecting room.  The sound from our neighbor wasn't all that filtered out, as we could hear her talking or watching TV around 7:30 in the morning.  We were hoping…

title: wow, wow and wow
review: We went to sandpearl on Friday 5th April for 2 nights/3 days for my birthday. From the moment you get to the hotel you know you will be very well looked aftered. The doors are opened for you when you walk in. The receptionist managed to find us a room as soon as we got there  ( 1pm) even though its not offically until 3pm. we were given buckets and spades for free and champayne!.  We made our way to the room, Gulf Front View, Gorgeous room however there was a hugh palm tree completely blocking our view of the beach and gulf. I immediantly rang reception who said they could move us upto the 6th floor at 4pm.   The view on the 6th floor was amazing. The beach was amazing. the water alittle cool but the sand was like powder.  The resort is beautiful and staff are so helpul, nothing…

title: Mixed experiences
review: Dear Guest,  WOW, thank you so much for all of your positive feedback regarding your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your birthday weekend with us here and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: A true pearl
review: We have stayed at this resort many times and as a whole, we love it. The rooms are beautiful, the pool area and beach are spectacular and the bar food is very good. Our first year, the fine dining restaurant had  delicious food but it was very loud. The dining room is open to the bar and the noise was very loud. Also, bar patrons have a habit of drinking and sometimes smoking out on the patio late at night. You can easily hear them in your room.  We have also had housekeeping show up very late in the afternoon to clean our room.  With a few changes, the SandPearl is easily one of my favorite places to stay while in Florida.

title: Sandpearl Resort Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for providing us with feedback from your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I apologize for the inconveniences you experienced at Caretta on the Gulf and will certainly pass on your concerns with the management team. I am delighted that we remain your favorite place to stay in Florida and do look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik  Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Best Hotel & Location
review: Fantastic hotel, great welcome and service throughout our stay. Rooms were a good size and decorated to a very high standard. The lobby was beautiful too, at the poolside you could not ask for better right on the beach which was fantastic too.  Come and stay you will not be dissapointed

title: Amazing vacation!!!!
review: We already booked our rooms again for next year!!! We had a terrific time. The location was great. We were right on the beach. The restaurants were terrific. Located on the main strip for fun shopping.  Heated pool with bar service.  Complete kids activity center.  It was like being in a cruise without the boat.  Thus, it was better.

title: Beautiful hotel but not worth the prices they charge
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for providing us with such positive feedback regarding your most recent visit to The Sandpearl Resort. How great it is to hear that you have already booked your next stay with us, please contact me at the resort and allow me to enhance your next visit in any way that I can. We appreciate your feedback and I look forward to hearing from you!  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Not so much bang for our buck!
review: This was my first trip to Clearwater Beach, and I must say I really like it there.  The beach is spectacular!!  The staff at the Sandpearl could not have been nicer or more accomodating.  The hotel itself is very nice, rooms are on the small side but nice, beds comfortable, nice bathrooms, beautiful spacious lobby.  My one big but is that they charge you for an umbrella on the beach.  At $500+ per night, it is actually insulting that they do not provide enought beach chairs and umbrellas for ALL guests.  Seriously???  And on top of that, they also charge you a $25 resort fee.... This hotel is not in the league of compeitiors such as the Four Seaons or the Ritz but charges same prices.

title: Average stay but great staff!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I was very happy to hear that you really like our special beach.  I am sure you know, but Clearwater  Beach was just named "Florida's Best Beach City" by USA Today.  I was also happy to hear that you thought our team was very nice.  In your review you commented on the charge for the umbrellas on the beach.  While the chairs on the beach are complimentary for all resort guests, we do charge $25 per day for the umbrellas.  The charge is to deter other guests from claiming the umbrellas while they are using the pool area.  Some people would "reserve" umbrellas on the pool and beach and this would leave no umbrellas for other guests.  I hope this clears things up for you.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  I really do appreciate it.

title: Disappointing, average service, high prices
review: We live locally and this stay was supposed to be a nice 24 hour getaway without kids, etc.     I've never been so disappointed in a high end property as I have with this one.                                 Pro:  The hotel is situated on a beautiful stretch of Clearwater beach.  The grounds and room are lovely and nicely appointed.  Cons:  The pool area is about the size of the one in my back yard.  There are hundreds of rooms/guests and probably 100 chairs to use by the pool.  For 500$/night, you would think this wouldn't be an issue.  for over 4 hours we tried to find a spot and either someone was in a chair or a towel was in it and it went unused.  I"m still trying to figure out what I got out of that 25$ resort fee.              The food at Caretta on the Gulf was subpar at…

title: Beautiful resort
review: Beautiful beach, convenient location, great food and drinks at resort restaurants.  We had a 2 room suite and were so thankful for the full kitchen and washer/dryer.  We saved so much money by hitting the Publix just a few mins away.  The only reason I did not give the resort 5 stars is because of some issues at check in and some subpar housekeeping.  I called the resort when we arrived in the area at 1pm,  simply to request a call when the room was ready.  I did not expect an early check in.  Was told it would be ready shortly and we could go ahead and preregister.  So, we swung by the hotel around 1:30, gave my credit card, etc. and was told they should be calling me within an hour to check in.  At 3:45, we wanted to know if it was safe to buy cold items at the grocery store,…

title: Loved everything about it!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your feedback regarding your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your two bedroom suite complete with the full kitchen. Thank you for sharing your concerns with our front desk check in experience as well as with our housekeeping department, we have addressed these issues with our teams. If you have any further concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me at the resort at your convenience. We look forward to seeing you again and we appreciate your feedback.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Nice play, good food, average rooms
review: We just got back from the Sand Pearl and it was amazing. We were there to celebrate my husbands 40th birthday. At check in, they upgraded us to a Suite. The room was beautiful and had two balconies facing the gulf. They also delivered chocolate covered strawberries to our room that afternoon. The perfect place to celebrate and watch a beautiful sunset. Everyone at the hotel was so helpful and friendly. We will definitely be back!!

title: Housekeeping
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear that you chose The Sandpearl for your husband's 40th birthday, it was a pleasure to have you. We hope you make this a tradition and we see you for more birthdays and holidays in the near future. Thank you once again, we appreciate your feedback.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: What a stunning hotel and restaurant
review: Nice hotel with beautiful grounds and good food. For such a pricey place, I expected the rooms to be nicer. Don't get me wrong, they are nice but average. The location is great, right on the beach and walking distance to shops and restaurants. Not sure I would stay there again for $500+ a night and we booked early. The prices went up to $700/ night for the time we were there (3/24-27).  The service was good and the rooms were clean. However, we were not supplied with a "Do Not Disturb" sign (and were not able to get on from housekeeping). That was annoying!

title: Amazing stay!!
review: We have recently returned from a fantastic stay at this beautiful hotel.  It is absolutely lovely and they have thought of everything to ensure you have a great holiday.  The staff are all so nice- they must get really good training and it is obvious they enjoy their work - they all look really smart and make you welcome- nothing is too much trouble.    The rooms are lovely and the beds super-comfy with top quality bed linen.  A fridge for drinks and snacks.  Huge bathroom with loads of towels, robes and toiletries.  Good quality coffee machine (we kept fresh milk in the fridge).  Lights inside the wardrobes and a large safe.  The turndown service provided chocolates, relaxing pillow spray and word of wisdom card - nice little extra touch.    The pool area is beautiful with…

title: most expensive hotel but not the best
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your positive experience here at The Sandpearl Resort. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our amenities and that our staff provided an unforgettable experience. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Stunning property-- but be careful if you don't book through them!
review: stayed here for a few nights last July  had great weather hot like i like it and sunny   for the price i paid which was expensive out of the hotels i went too but got a good deal at just over £120 per night from asda it was the third best hotel i stayed at out of the 6 i stayed in within the 16 days i was in Florida  overall a great hotel but never got a balcony but our friends did who booked at the same place as me , the champagne on arriving was a nice touch and the staff were friendly entertainment at night could be better bit boring around the hotel then , enjoyed table tennis at the hotel could do with upgrading the bats tho  drinks expensive and lots of secret little fees added spend most of the time fishing on the pier which you can hire from the pier( caught a few small…

title: Gorgeous Hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl.  I was glad to hear that you liked several things about our hotel and that  you found our associates friendly.  I am also glad you got the opportunity to do some fishing from the pier.    While you are right, the Sandpearl is definately not a cheap place to stay we feel that we offer a unique experience that can't be matched.  I would definately invite you back to give the Sandpearl another shot.  I am sure you won't be disappointed.  If you would like to speak in person regarding your stay please feel free to reach out to me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great service and sorting out our reservations
review: The property is beyond fabulous-- grounds are on par with that of a luxury hotel. Really enjoyed the location and close proximity to beach.   We booked a bay view king through a third party vendor. When we arrived at the resort we told that the room was not ready-- since we had a prior engagement we simply decided to,check in upon our return. When we went up to our room later that day, we opened the door to a double non- bay room. When we called down to the desk-- the women we spoke with was less than helpful-- so we decided to speak to them in person. We were told that since we booked through a third party that we are just given what they have-- and do not honor specific room requests. After my husband pulled up our reservation the women then found two king bay views. Of course…

title: Luxury Hotel Prices, Motel Atmosphere, Service
review: The Sandpearl hotel is not cheap - we paid almost $500 a night for a three-night stay - but you expect to pay more for a "Luxury Resort Hotel." You are paying for the location, the atmosphere, the amenities, the easy access to fine finding, the pool, the spa, etc. The location was great - right on the Gulf with a beautiful white beach. But that is where I stopped being impressed because it is also RIGHT across the street from a bar with a very loud outdoor patio complete with band and crowds. On both Friday and Sunday nights we could not sleep until after the bar closed, sometime after 2 a.m. That was just one of the unpleasant surprises. Another was the $25 "Amenity Charge" that no one told us about until we checked out. When I inquired about the charge, I was told that it was…

title: Awesome, great and a bit of fantastic rolled in
review: Dear Guest, Thank your for taking the time to write your review of your recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort on Clearwater Beach.  I was happy to hear that you like the location of our resort.  Please accept my apologies for the issues you had with the music from the restaurant across the street.  We have been actively involved with the ownership of that restaurant to monitor their noise level but it sounds like that night it was too loud.  I am very sorry for that.  I am also sorry for the housekeeing issues you experienced while with us.  I will share those comments with our Executive Housekeeper.  Regarding your dinner at Caretta's, we normally get only rave reviews from the food served but it appears that your steak was not to your liking.  Again, I am very sorry.  If you would like to speak in person regarding your stay please do not hesitate to contact me at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Best of Clearwater
review: Me and my wife had a fab time. Well we wasn't husband and wife when we visited but. Got engaged at the sand pearl after taking a 3 day break from the kids in Orlando.  On arrival no one could have been more helpful. The concierge was phenomenal, recommending a quality Japanese on the docks.    Would I return, yes Would I recommend yes  Awesome place, awesome location......... Visiting is a must!!

title: Great Place to Relax
review: Dear Guest,  I think a congratulations is in order, so congratulations on your engagement and marriage! What an honor it is to be a part of that memory. Thank you for writing a review of the resort as we appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you in the future.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: We were pleasantly surprised with the Sandpearl.
review: Just returned from Clearwater Beach, Florida....stayed at the Sandpearl Resort. Best location, cleanest, friendly staff, first rate. We did not rent a car...requested car service for a day into Tampa to International Plaza for shopping. Cheaper than rent car week of Spring Break. As well as Free Rides would pick up at hotel and take us anywhere in Clearwater for tip only. Walked to dinner most nights....whole area nice and clean compared to other beach towns! Great cheap breakfast/lunch right next door at restaurant.

title: A pearl on the beach
review: The Sandpearl Resort is an absolutely wonderful place to spend a few days.  Everything is first rate.  It's right on the beach with a fabulous pool and excellent restaurants.  We particularly enjoy having a meal on the sand at the pool cafe.  With the surf pounding only feet away and the fresh salt air, it makes the food taste even better.  The rooms are large and have excellent views in all directions, although we prefer rooms high up and on the west side.  Sunsets are spectacular!!!  You won't regret making this your vacation destination.

title: Beachfront beauty but pricey in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am glad you enjoyed the amenities we have to offer, especially a relaxing lunch on the beautiful white sand of Clearwater Beach. Thank you once again for your feedback, we look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Very nice
review: We paired cheap baseball spring training tickets with a night at the top end Sandpearl Resort.  It is right on the beach with a very nice beachfront pool.  There is a spa attached but the beach was too big a draw to spend any time inside.  We splurged on a gulf view king bed room with balcony.  Note, gulf view rooms are cheaper but have quite good beach views, definitely not peek-a-boo.  We wanted to hear the surf all night but instead heard only the giant waterfall.  It cascades down right next to the hotel on the beachside and drowns out everything!  In fact, if we had stayed a second night we would have requested a different room.  We were in the middle of the hotel which isn't as high as the two end towers.  If you pay for gulf front and want to hear the ocean ask for rooms…

title: Hugely disappointing -  & make sure you get the right car returned!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am glad you enjoyed our beach front location and that you were able to catch some spring training games while you were here. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Unfulfilled Expectations
review: I rented two rooms for three nights for a few family members. The service was excellent overall and the facilities are top-notch. The valet parking was very efficient. One big failing was when I requested to use the steam room in the spa and was told that I had to book at least a one-hour treatment "because it gets too crowded back there." While I know that many hotels require outsiders to do this, I don't think that it's right to treat guests this way, especially at the rates that I paid. That was the one disappointment of an otherwise excellent stay.

title: Terrible service.
review: We had a terrible experience at the bar/beach and it tainted our whole experience at what otherwise would have been a lovely hotel. The bartender was rude and the waitstaff at the beach bar completely overlooked us. This was very surprising because everyone else we encountered on our trip to Clearwater was extremely friendly and helpful.

title: The Sandpearl is Perfection !
review: Dear Guest, Please accept my apology for the issue you experienced at the beach bar.  I would like to speak with you to get additional information.  If you feel it appropriate please contact me at the hotel so we may discuss it.    Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Amazing stay
review: Just back from 4 nights at The Sandpearl Resort right on Clearwater Beach, Florida, and I almost hate to give this secret out, because the Sandpearl is one of the best vacation experiences I ever had !  The Sandpearl is elegant and exclusive, but manages to remain relaxed and casual at the same time. I've stayed at many upscale hotels that were so pretentious and snooty that I just wanted to hide in my room so I could relax. Not so at Sandpearl, where the staff is friendly and welcoming, and all the gorgeous public areas are comfortable and accessible to all. First, the beach area is totally private and away from the maddening crowds up the beach. There are dunes and hammocks and a big fun fire pit surrounded by big comfy chairs and sofa type seating right on the beach ! There…

title: You will love this hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Wow, thank you so much for all of your kind words and feedback regarding your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed all of the amenities the resort has to offer while you were here. Come back and visit us soon, thank you very much for your feedback, we really do appreciate it.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful Property
review: We had an amazing 4 nights at Sandperl with our two kids.  The rooms are large and very clean.  The entire campus is kept in amazing condition from the pool to the hot tubs to the beaches.  The beaches were clean and the water is beautiful.  The staff is so helpful.  They practically leap at the chance to help you with plans and advice.  The main restaurant is amazing.  We had a wonderful dinner there as a couple and had breakfast there twice as a family.  The breakfast was awesome and free for the kids which was a nice touch.  I didn't have a problem with food/drink cost in the main restaurant.  It's consistent with a high end restaurant.  I think prices were high at the small bar/restaurant and around the pool/hot tub.  The place is very kid friendly without not being adult…

title: Fabulous
review: A really nice place.   The staff were super courteous and helpful.  We especially enjoyed an impromtu discussion with Catherine, the hotel's Ambassador, about the wonderful artwork in the hotel.  It's worth checking out even if you aren't an art lover.    Take a closer look at the Christopher Stills artwork above the front desk and conceirge.    We would definately go back if were were looking for this upscale experience.    We swam in the pool, used the hot tub and my sis had a massage in the spa.  All most enjoyable.   We did not eat in either of the restaurants other than dessert out on the beach one evening.  The rum runners were better than Frenchy's despite Frenchy's claim to be #1 on the beach.  Disappointment - The beach fire pit is boardering on pathetic.  It's a gas…

title: BEST STAY EVER!!!!!!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. It sois so nice to hear that you enjoyed some of the original artwork of Christopher Still that is on display throughout the resort. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future. Thank you once again for writing a review, we appreciate your feedback.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel in great location
review: Ok, so I have stayed at alot of nice hotels. The Sandpearl is unmatched. I am a person that is very hard to please. They accomplished it. The service was wonderful. The room was AWESOME! HUGE BATHROOM. The dining options were wonderful. There will be some reviews from people not liking the rates. To that, I say, You get what you pay for! This is a 4 diamond resort. You will have a 4 Diamond experience! It might not be the most cost effective, but if you are going to Clearwater Beach,FL, there is no other place to stay....PERIOD. When you check in talk to Mrs. Shelley. She is the shining "pearl" of the staff. There is nothing else to say. Enjoy your stay. You will thank me later!

title: The Sandpearl is a precious gem
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort! I am glad to hear that we were able to please you throughout your stay. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit Clearwater Beach!  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Closest Clearwater has to a Ritz!
review: Very luxurious hotel right on Clearwater Beach.  We had a very large room overlooking the ocean with a small balcony and 2 chairs.  The hotel itself had a large and very inviting lobby with many couches and chairs and a chess and checkers table. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. We ate in the restaurant for breakfast which was very good and there is a good lunch restaurant and bar right by beach and pool.  The beach also has a fire pit.  The beach has very fine white sand and is very wide.  The hotel is located right on the main street in Clearwater Beach and within walking distance to many other restaurants.  It is a great place to stay in Clearwater Beach.  This was the first time we were in Clearwater Beach and we thoroughly enjoyed it.

title: Very relaxing, superb location
review: This is a great resort.  Its not quite peak season, so the resort is fairly quiet right now - The pool area is not huge, and the resort itself is medium sized, so I could imagine it being very busy in peak season.  However:  The staff are excellent.  Good greeting, cheerful, helpful staff and plenty of them.  The hotel is clean, and up to date with its decor.  A comfortable feel of a well looked after property.  The location is GREAT!  Easy to reach and find by car from Tampa, the pristine white sand beach is literally seconds away.  Its a big beach too - long and wide, so plenty of room for walking/playing/lazing.  The hotel has a bar on the beach, along with casual and more formal dining options.  Next door and a couple of minutes walk away are two beach bar and grills.  The…

title: The finest!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us regarding your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing few days on our beautiful location here on Clearwater Beach. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Excellent service!!
review: I can't even...I didn't even know that this caliber of lodging, dining, and service existed, anwhere. And I've been alot of places. The staff-remarkable, especially Shelly. Everyone was unrealistically pleasant. They loved being there, and it was obvious that their job was to make you love it to. You're not going to want to leave the lobby. It was breaktakingly beautiful. We were upgraded to a suite, the LARGEST SUITE I'VE EVER STAYED IN PERIOD. High Celings. Turn down service. 24/7 housekeeping. Inviting and well priced Spa. Poolside dining. I don't have enough compliments to do this place justice. My family and I were on the elevator among some other saddened patrons....who were checking out! We were all so sad to be leaving such a blissful place! The breakfast knocked it out…

title: Meets expectations!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your positive feedback regarding your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed so many of the amenities that the resort has to offer. I will be sure to pass on your comments to Shelley, I am delighted to hear that she was able to enhance your experience while you were here. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Sincerely,   Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Great Location - Average Service
review: Very nice property. Wonderful beach and views.  What caught my attention most was the excellent service and nice little touches. From the friendly and accomodating staff to the mimosa upon check in, the nightly chocolate and "pearl of wisdom" cards left on your pillow, it was a return to excellent service missing from so many resorts these days. Expensive regular rates but I was here for a conference and felt the conference rate appropriate for the accommodations and service.

title: Nothing short of fabulous!
review: Just spent a week at the Sandpearl and could not fault a thing.  From the glass of champagne on arrival to the no-wait check-out, nothing was too much trouble.  Great location, wonderful knowledgable staff and fabulous food, we had THE BEST holiday ever!

title: Romantic getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for writing a review of your most recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort! I am delighted to hear that you had the best holiday ever, and it was our pleasure to be a part of the memories you created. We look forward to your return to the resort in the future, and your glass of champagne will be awaiting you! Thank you once again, we appreciate your feedback.  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: good - not great
review: From the moment my husband and I got there, until the time we left. We had a fabulous time. Me, I'm a very picky person and hate to stay anywhere but home. But staying at the resort, there were no room for complaints. The valet parking was great, the customer service was great, one young lady was a little cranky but overall the service was great and the bellman was awesome with his service.. and I love the tub. the view was amazing especially when we got up the next morning. Breakfast was definitely wonderful. I can go on about this Resort. I WOULD RECOMMEND ANYONE TO GO THERE. I will be back for my next romantic getaway. Thanks Sandpearl Resort I was crowned the most amazing wife:) for such a fabulous choice!!

title: It's all good!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your positive feedback regarding your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your romantic getaway at our wonderful resort. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again the next time you getaway to Clearwater Beach!  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Management is lacking. We will never spend another dollar here.
review: Stayed there for a week on combination of business and pleasure.  The facility is nice and during the week, they were constantly painting and updating small sections.   The pool area was lovely.  The staff was friendly and helpful overall.  While the conference was going on, they did a nice job of servicing the meeting rooms but the food was bland.  For the money we paid at the discounted group rate, it was fine.  But, if I had to pay the full price, I would have been disappointed.  The spa is very dark and difficult to get to.  The exercise room is in the spa and has nowhere to stretch and is in desperate need of air circulation

title: A Gem on a Sugar Sand Beach!
review: I've never been a Florida fan. Coming from the Northwest we go to Hawaii for sun and sand but, The Sandpearl Resort at Clearwater Beach could make me reconsider! We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful hotel and property. It's situated on the most gorgeous white sand beach, soft as powdered sugar. As another review mentioned, the only hotel in Clearwater I would stay in. After a long flight it was so nice to be greeted with a mimosa on check-in AND without asking, they upgraded us from a gulf front room to a gulf front Jr. Suite. Score! We had a huge balcony to have coffee in the mornings and lounge on each night as we watched the sunsets.This type of service continued throughout our stay. Relaxing vibe, cute small town, beautiful-clean beach. We had lunch and happy hour next…

title: Family weekend visit
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for providing us with feedback on your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort! I am glad to hear that your stay went so well that we convinced you to reconsider your prior opinion of the beautiful Florida! It is always great to hear such positive feedback regarding the service you received from our staff. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to our own Sushi Chef Vee. Thank you once again for writing a review, we look forward to seeing you back in Florida in the near future!  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: The World Is Your Oyster at Sandpearl Resort
review: This Hotel has got a lot going for it namely its wonderful location and superb staff. We stayed for 3 days as part of a 3 week family holiday in Florida. It is right on the beach and has its own great pool area. The room was beautiful and the Hotel has an air of quality about it. The Sunday brunch was brilliant and the pool food and drinks tremendous.We enjoyed our stay but there were a few niggles that if they had not been there would have made it perfect and our stay longer: 1. Wifi was appalling 2. This is not a cheap Hotel and its annoying to have to pay an extra resort fee per day, an extra fee for use of chairs, umbrellas etc on the beach and compulsory valet parking  3.Coffee machine in room yes but no cream or sugar 4.Although we were residents of the Hotel we could not…

title: I had a near flawless visit
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our wonderful location here on Clearwater Beach and also that you found our staff to be superb. We look forward to being a part of your family vacation for years to come, and thank you once again for your feedback!  Sincerely,  Jason Olinik Assistant Front Office Manager

title: Beautiful hotel right on the beach.
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl from 03.06.13 1nd left early 02.09.13. We booked a Gulf Suite but through Preferred Hotel Group had an upgrade to a Gulf View room..   Check in toook maybe all of 5 minutes. Vrey efficient, very friendly, and we were on our way. Our room on the sixth floor (608) was perfect. Agreat view of the hotel grounds and pool with a perfect view of the beach looking toward Pier 60, or (61?). The balcony was great for glasses of wine and when the weather got too windy and a bit of rain started to be able to sit and still enjoy the view. The room was well equipped. The bed was comfortable, the pillows wonderful. Mini bar and coffee and what you would expect from a resort were all there. The room was refreshed daily.  The bathroom was a nice size and you had plenty…

title: What's not to like!
review: Came here for a board retreat.  Arrived at midnight to soft music playing in my room and beautiful accommodations. Able to get heart night's sleep on a very comfortable bed and quiet surroundings. Woke up to a wonderful view .  Able to enjoy coffee and breakfast sitting on their beautiful beach with the whitest and finest sand I've ever seen.  Great location near clubs, shops, restaurants, walking paths.. Super friendly staff. I used one of the bikes they have available.  Steve, working at the activities desk gave me lots of helpful tips to make the most of the limited time in had. Also really enjoyed all of their good food including dinner at their on site restaurant.  Highly recommend!

title: wonderful surprise
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am glad that you enjoyed the beach and that you took the time to take a bike ride on the beautiful Clearwater Beach. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit Florida.

title: Perfect overnight getaway
review: the Sand Pearl was a terrific surprise. We attended an industry function which is normally held at a convention type hotel. Although this is not a small facility you had the feeling of a well run inn with reasonable priced rooms a very friendly staff and a well laid out property.
