It is located right on the beach with a very nice pool area in the middle of the complex. Our room was very clean, large, and had a huge balcony( we were on the 4th floor). I'm sure our group will return.

title: Favorite Hotel Ever !!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Sandpearl Resort. It is great to hear that although you attended an industry function you still found time to enjoy the property and location. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your return to the resort.

title: A sparkly gem on the Gulf!
review: We just returned home from an overnight getaway from the Sandpearl - which was formerly the Clearwater Beach Hotel during our childhood. The property has totally changed since we stayed there on our wedding night in 1998. For several years, the property has donated auction items to one of my favorite charities and this year's donation topped them all - room, spa credit and dinner for two at Caretta on the Gulf! After being greeted with some complimentary welcome bubbly, we were surprised with our outstanding gulf view junior suite accommodations. Our muscles got worked during our couples massage at the Spa. We then ate tasty appetizers on the beach at Tate Island Grill (the pulled pork nachos were over the top ...) and watched the sun set from our balcony. The day ended with an…

title: Amazing time!  Fabulous place!
review: From the moment we pulled up, to the moment we checked out we were wowed by this hotel.  The staff is amazing and really goes above and beyond to make things perfect.  The gulf front rooms are highly recommended and well worth the extra cost.  From the complementary champagne or mimosa on check-in, to the bell staff giving us a room tour, to the spa, to the restaurants, to the waiters on the beach - EVERY ONE was simply amazing and treated us like they were grateful we were their guests (not a common thing these days!).

title: Very good hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear that our staff went above and beyond to make things perfect for you from check in to check out. We were grateful to have you as a guest, and we look forward to seeing you again. Thank you once again for writing a review, we appreciate your feedback!

title: Great location and amenities
review: The Sandpearl is a very good hotel. The room was clean and the view on our balcony was exceptional. The only problem is we were right in the corner of the hotel and about 30/40 other balconies looked directly on to our balcony which for the money we were paying for the room angered me. We did not sit on the balcony for this reason which was a shame. The hotel itself is great. The swimming pool area and beach bar area is brilliant. The hotel staff are extremely helpful and friendly. We had a wonderful weeks holiday at the Sandpearl.

title: Magnificence!
review: Location is great. We were deciding between here and the Hilton and glad we chose here. More upscale. Great check in with complimentary champagne or mimosas. Not as central as the Hilton but everything is still within walking distance. Downsides were that housekeepers didn't come until after 4 PM and we didn't get the king bed we requested.

title: Family stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear that your choice of staying with us provided you with a more upscale feel than what you have previously experienced here at Clearwater Beach. We hope you make the same choice again when you return to the area, we look forward to having you. Thank you once again for your feedback.

title: Excellent Christmas Day Stay
review: No complaints what so ever this was booked as a special Christmas Family holiday there was seven of us in total we booked with another family and the hotel allocated adjoining rooms automatically. SandPearl is a beautiful hotel on a wonderful stretch of a soft white sand beach. Our only wish is we would have loved to have stayed longer but Orlando was our next destination.  The staff were very attentive and nothing was too much trouble. We were welcomed at reception with a glass of champagne and check in and out was extremely quick. The rooms were extremely comfortable and clean and we received chocolates on arrival in the room and when the beds were turned down on the second evening. The Valet parking was $16 dollars per day and the hotel service charge per room was $25 so…

title: Better service than the Ritz!  Beautiful property and very family friendly!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear that you decided to spend the holidays with us and had such a positive experience. Next time you visit we would love for you to stay longer! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.

title: New Years at the Sandpearl
review: As a Sand Key resident (just several miles from resort) it is hard to justify staying down the street but it is just so wonderful we come back time and time again. Gorgeous lobby/pool/beach/rooms. Lots of stuff for kids- lawn on beachfront with various things set up... Soccer/croquet/beanbag toss/checkers/chess/ping pong. Firepit for evening drinks/s'mores by sunset. White sugar beach with dunes.  Pool is zero entry with no deep end, very lagoon ish. Impeccably maintained everything. Staff is a 10/10, service off the charts. My daughter is addicted to the camp, it was closed on that day so the manager called a staff member in early the next day to open the camp so my daughter wouldn't be disappointed! Classy! Plus I couldn't help being impressed by the fact that I left my iPad…

title: a most attractive property
review: Dear Maggie,  Wow, thank you so much for all of your kind words when taking the time to write a review of The Sandpearl Resort. I always love hearing that, although you live on the beach, you still make the short trip just to stay with us and enjoy the pool and beach area. We can't wait to see you again, and thank you again for your feedback!

title: My Favorite Resort in Clearwater!
review: We stayed two nights @ SandPearl over New Years. We sayed in a gulf front suite. Love the hotel, beach, pool and location.  Had one major problem... our smoke dectector went off in the middle of the night and there was no maintenance person working to fix it. We had to listen to it beep all night and it kept us awake until 7:00am when a maintenance worker started his shift.  It was awful! I find it odd that a hotel in this class would not have someone on staff 24 hours in case something like this goes wrong! We received no apology from management and had to contact them and practically pull teeth to get a discount on our room for being up all night!!! They finally did give us a discount on one night's stay. Besides that it is a lovely hotel.

title: Another great stay!
review: Stayed at Sandpearl  Dec 25-31 had another great stay.  The staff is always friendly and helpful.  The pool area is always clean and very well maintained. Ate at Tates for our noon meal very good. I actually think the food has improved at Tates since we first started visiting Sandpearl. The cuban sandwich is our favorite.  Lots of restaurants in area. The Clearsky across the street is our favorite place for breakfast.  All the Frenchy"s have excellent food. Cooters has all the snowcrab you can eat on Tues And Wednesdays. The beach is beautiful great for a morning walk. Really enjoyed Carettas in the Sandpearl this year to end our evening excellent drinks and the food is very good!  Ordered off the cheaper menu fairly reasonably priced. Rooms are great a little high priced but…

title: Absolutely Loved it!!
review: Dear Dean,  Thank you so much for all of your positive feedback from your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the pool area as well as your lunch and dinner at our very own restaurants; Tate Island Grill and Caretta on the Gulf. It is also great to hear that you enjoyed some of the local dining that makes Clearwater Beach such a great place to visit. We look forward to seeing you the next time you escape Minnesota and head south for the BEACH!

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Beautiful hotel, beautiful grounds and beach area with the white sand gorgeous. Great staff, greet you with champayne, always friendly and smiling.  Very clean which I really look for, they have Kuerig coffee makers in the rooms and the rooms and bathrooms  are spacious. Lobby is beautiful, valets are quick and very helpful. Great for families or couples. I didn't have time to use the spa.  They did ask if we had any suggestions, so I thought about it and I thought it would be nice if the staff at the pool couild set you up with the towels and loungers.  I also thought the pool area could be monitered during the day for cleanliness, like when people leave the area they tend to leave cups and garbage aroung the jacuzzi or pool, but not a big issue, just since they asked. Oh and…

title: Beautiful place that had a couple flaws.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for all of your positive feedback regarding your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort! I am delighted to here that you enjoyed the beautiful hotel, grounds and of course the beauty that is Clearwater Beach! Your feedback is greatly appreciated, we hope to see you again soon, and when we do we will be sure to greet you with a smile and a glass of  champagne!

title: Very good
review: We stayed at the Sand Pearl for 4 nights from the 21st December and we left on Christmas morning!!  The Hotel was lovely and probably one of the best we have ever stayed in - it was very quiet around Clearwater and the resort.  The weather wasnt as good as it might have been and was very windy the day we arrived there had been 3 weddings on the beach and you had too feel a little sorry for them!!  You cant mess with Nature!!   We normally stay at the Hilton but we were very impressed with the SandPearl and would definitely stay there again.  There are loads of bars and restaurants all around the Hotel - apart from the Starbucks coff we didnt eat in the hotel.  We hired bikes one day and went across to Downtown and back along to the Marine Hospital.   By only bugbear is that the…

title: beautiful resort
review: myself and my family stayed at the sand Pearl resort Dec21st to 28th and I must say what a lovely old world style hotel this is.We were lucky the hotel was quiet so were upgraded to a gulf veiw room which was lovely ,very cosy and comfortable. Great turn down service at night when a pillow spray and chocolates were left each evening with the following days weather.Jeremy the front of house manager and Amir his assistant were very professional and helped in every way they could to make our stay as enjoyable as possible we were a little disappointed with the weather which they picked up on and really tried to compensate for this although it was not their fault. Caretta on the Gulf breakfast buffet is gorgeous and good value as children eat free plenty of fresh fruit and delicious…

title: Holiday Vacation Getaway
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am delighted to hear that although you experienced disappointing weather, a rarity in Clearwater Beach, you still enjoyed your time at the resort. It is always great to hear that you enjoyed above average dining experiences at both of our restaurants; Caretta on the Gulf and Tate Island Grill, and will be sure to pass on the positive feedback to our food and beverage teams. Also, thank you for your kind words regarding our front office management team of Amir and Jeremy and I will be sure to share your words with them. Thank you once again for your feedback, we always appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

title: Beautiful but expensive
review: My family and I stayed at the Sanpearl during the Christmas break and it was by far the best hotel I have stayed at in a long time. Everyone was very friendly and eager to ask if we have a question or need assistance. There is a full service Starbucks, sushi bar, fine dining room, casual bar, and outdoor grill. Everything we ate was fantastic. The bar was a fun place to hang out to watch tv and have a drink. We didn't have a need to leave the hotel to often as everything we needed was at the resort. The spa was outstanding, pool area was clean, water warm and wait staff very prompt. The rooms were clean, new looking and the beds were very comfortable. My daughter is a teen so we didn't need any of the child activities but it looks like they had plenty for kids to do.  I…

title: Greg and Raechal's Holiday Visit
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review of your holiday vacation getaway at The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to here such positive feedback about all of our food and beverage outlets as well as positive experiences with the spa and housekeeping, and I will be sure to share it with our teams. We hope to see you again on your next vacation getaway. Thank you once again for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your feedback!

title: Excellent Special Occaison Hotel
review: We just returned from a five night vacation at the Sandpearl. It is a beautiful resort and the staff work hard to make your stay enjoyable. The valet staff is prompt and polite but $20 plus tax/day is pricey (plus the tips each time you need your car). The hotel has a very upscale feel and there is a piano that plays music constantly.    When we arrived, we ate at Tate's Grill which was good but hamburgers cost $12 and up. One day i ate the corn and black bean hummus which was wonderful and was less than $10. The grill is next to the pool and on the beach so it is super convenient. Staff was polite but when busy, there is a wait.     We tried to eat at the main restaurant for dinner and brunch but it was sold out and there were no exceptions so book early. Brunch is $39 and i…

We decided to get a front row seat on the Gulf of Mexico for the end of the world so we picked the Sandpearl. A very nice resort overall with great staff. The Sandpearl is a step or two above the other hotels on Clearwater Beach and the prices reflect it.The artwork and sand sculptures in the lobby are fantastic. We ate at Caretta's for dinner and the service and food was outstanding but pricey. The Valet was great but $20 a day was steep.The daily resort of $25 a day is also steep. The best discovery was Clear Sky restaurant right next door to the Sandpearl. We ate Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner during our stay. Great food,service and value.

title: Mr grumpy at the deskSand
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review of your stay here at The Sandpearl Resort. We appreciate your kind words regarding our staff and resort and delighted to hear that you enjoyed the artwork and the sand sculpture in the lobby. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you in the near future!

title: Just Amazing
review: this was the second time I stayed at this resort.  The resort itself is amazing, however I was less than impressed with the reception we received at check in. On our previous stay we were greeted with glasses of champagne and an excellent staff that was beyond courteous.  This stay, the valet was outstanding, but things went downhill from there. There was no champagne.  We had a brief wait to check in, which is not a negative, that happens.  There was one person staffing the check in desk, still not a problem.  Shortly, a man came out from the back to check us in.  My guess is that he was having a bad day.  With as few words as possible, he checked us in and handed us our room keys and muttered something like, "here ya go."  He didn't give us directions to our room, nor did he…

title: Great place! Walk to the actual ocean further than I thought
review: This resort was great! Our room had a view of the beach, which was cool and relaxing. The service was really great and the rooms were spacey! The beach was also really nice, when we went the water was a bit cloudy because it was rainy, but I found some good shells and had a blast! Pool was great too, with great service. The restaurants at the actual resort were very nice and had good food, and being right there on the beach you couldn't beat it. Right outside there were also cute tourist shops and good restaurants as well. I would highy recommend it, just make sure you plan ahead when it comes to the weather :)

title: Father's Day weekend
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for writing a review of your visit to The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your time at the beach and pool and received excellent service from the staff while enjoying great food and breathtaking views. We appreciate your feedback and hope that we see you the next time you are in Clearwater Beach!

title: Gorgeous
review: This hotel and spa is fabulous! Grandeur and style are the first impression as you enter the lobby. The views are unending! The Sap is beautiful and well equipped! The service is first rate! The rooms are great. The bathrooms are even better! Location is Perfect! They serve frozen grapes to you in the swimming pool!!!

title: I Can't Wait to Return!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review The Sandpearl Resort and Spa. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed the Spa, Rooms, and unending views of the Gulf of Mexico. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your return to the resort the next time you visit Clearwater Beach!

title: " GREAT HOSPITALITY "
review: I just returned from a visit to the Sandpearl in Clearwater and I CANNOT wait to return!!! We have already made plans to make it an annual tradition!  The location is easily accessible from Tampa International Airport, so meeting friends from all over the country was no problem!  The resort is located on the Gulf of Mexico and even in December the sun was warm and though the ocean was a bit chilly, this New England girl didn't care as I could jump into the warm and refreshing pool or hot tub!!!  The staff, from the courteous cabana boys, and door men to the gal who made my Starbucks each morning were friendly and professional. We ate lunch and dinner right at the resort! Delicious food and the wine list was spectacular! Our waiter was charming and accomodating! I am already…

title: Simply Fantastic Time!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your visit to The Sandpearl Resort. Let me start by saying, we can not wait until you return! I am pleased to hear that you received such great service from all of our associates. The food, the coffee and the beach await your next getaway, we look forward to seeing you soon.

title: A Great Week With Friends!!
review: simply the best vacation i've ever had....due to the exemplary service,the food and beverage director Jonathon Pelletier was fabulous ......i would also like to mention kyle,bobby and debbie who also made my stay stellar.....everything i needed was provided for me with a smile ....I simply can't say enough about the 5 star service i was provided with and can't wait to return to one of the best beaches i've ever been too........

title: Excellent Business and Family combo location
review: I recently attended a business meeting at the Sandpearl. Many of the attendees brought family members and everyone I spoke to raved about how their families throughly enjoyed the amenities and the beach while they were in meetings. The beach has to be one of the best in Florida-very wide, clean and unusually soft sand. The meeting facilities are also excellent.  Our group used the large ballroom for general sessions (around 190 attendees) and several of the smaller rooms for breakout sessions. There is a very nice ground level outdoor patio that has a nice view of the water and works well for a business group of up to 200 people. The hotel has a large and very attractive lobby and the guest rooms are generously sized with nice views and a small usable patio.

title: Wonderful beach service staff
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your most recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am pleased to hear that, although you traveled on business, you were still able to enjoy the resort as well as the beautiful Clearwater Beach. Whether it be for work or for vacation, we look forward to your return to The Sandpearl Resort. Thank you for your feedback as we always appreciate it.

title: Beautiful property
review: This is truly the ONLY decent place to stay in Clearwater. It seems like every hotel is about 20 years over due for a makeover. However, the Sand Pearl was truly beautiful. The reason Im writing this review is because of the amazing service we received last week from the beach service guys. They delivered some incredible margaritas and provided excellent, friendly service. Will be back for them alone! And the comfy yellow loungers. :)

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your most recent visit to The Sandpearl Resort. I am pleased to here that our Tate Island Grill servers provided such great service that your were inclined to share your experience. We hope you have a chance to come back and visit us in the near future, the lounge chairs and fresh margaritas await you! Once again, thank you very much for your review, I will be sure to pass on your praises to the team down at Tate Island Grill.

title: Love this resort!
review: My husband just enjoyed a very relaxing weekend at the Sandpearl. What a great location!   We walked to several wonderful restaurants and bars. We enjoyed hanging out at the pool and beach. We were impressed by the service we received. We will definitely make a return visit.

title: Met Expectations
review: I had high hopes for the Sandpearl after hearing my friend gush about it after booking her wedding there and they met but did not exceed those expectations. The food was good - the wedding dinner was really good, the service was as high as I expected. Everyone I interacted with while there had a smile on their face and was pleasant to deal with. The pool/beach area is beautiful.

title: Outstanding resort in a paradise setting
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review from your recent stay at The Sandpearl Resort. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the food and service that you received at the wedding that you attended. I am also glad to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful pool and beach. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

title: This is a great place to spend a vacation!
review: My wife and I spent only one day at this beautiful resort and wish it could've been longer. The service was splendid from the valet to housekeeping and that comes from a hotelier who stayed at this specific property due to the reviews as well as location. This property is a resort ladies and gents, so they do have extra charges for internet and parking which is standard for this type of experience. The turn-down service with spray and chocolates my wife adored and we'll be back in 2013. Incredible views of the Gulf made this venture a perfect stay  In closing, our entire experience was perfect in everyway. The service and amenities were prestine at this resort. Ladies and gents, the Sandpearl is a resort, not just a hotel. There is a difference. Thank you!

title: Great Place for Family Gatherings
review: Dear Guest,   Wow, thank you for taking the time to write a review from your recent stay here at The Sandpearl Resort. I am so pleased to hear that your stay was perfect and you enjoyed the pristine amenities and the service we provided. We look forward to seeing you again for another perfect stay. Once again, thank you for your feedback.

title: A convention hotel that we would choose again
review: We spent 5 days here in November and had a great time.  The hotel is right on the most beautiful white sand beach in Florida.  There are 2 hot tubs, a beautiful outdoor pool, a fire pit, cabanas, beach chairs and umbrellas...everything you could want for for a beach vacation.   The staff is ready and waiting to help you with your every need or want.  From the complimentary glass of champagne when you check-in to the turn down service at night with the delicious chocolates on your pillow. The bell staff was great and the valet parking staff was really helpful to us.  If you want a luxurious and special vacation, this is the place to stay!

title: Not good value
review: Not worth the money, a good location and facility spoiled by complacent staff,  So many hidden charges and additions it's hard to determine the correct cost. There are better hotels closely that would be better value and have a better atmosphere in the evening.

title: Great hotel and location
review: Beautiful hotel right on the ocean. Great restaurants and fun pool. Very convienent to get to and everything around is in walking distance. There is a great restaurant at the pool and on the ocean that has reasonable drinks, burgers, and appetizers.

title: FLAWLESS.
review: Dear BuddysArmy,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. It sounds like you had a great time pool and beachside and enjoyed one of our restaurants Tate Island Grill. We certainly appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Excellent 3 day stay to finish our Florida Holiday
review: From the moment you pull up to the entrance where the concierge welcomes and opens the door for you, this resort teaches other hotels a thing or two about customer service and how to get that 5 star rating.  The champagne and mimosas offered upon check-in fit the elegant, beachy decor, and all the staff go out of their way to ensure that you have a dreamy, relaxing vacation where nothing is a problem.  The rooms are sunny and bright, and even though we had a special rate due to a wedding function, ours had a balcony and a wonderful view of the beach. The beds are comfy, the bathrooms are huge. Robes and slippers await you in the cupboard, so does a tempting 24 hour room service menu ($$$$)  a fully stocked mini-bar ($$$$) - but the best amenity in the room is the empty little…

title: Excellent Resort
review: Dear Scarlett_SA,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so please to hear that you found your stay to be flawless. We certainly appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Fabulous Stay
review: First Time at this beautiful resort in Clearwater Beach.  Since we were only staying one night we arrived early.  We were taken care of by Kirsten at the front desk.  We had a slight problem with our reservation by she handled it wonderfully and with ease.  While checking in we mentioned it was our anniversary and to our surprise that night a plate of chocolate covered strawberrys with the plate decorated and saying Happy Anniversary.  What a special touch and its nice that employees take the time to listen to their guests.  What a first class hotel in everyway.  Cannot wait to go back and this time I will stay longer!

title: Beware
review: Dear Fairster,  It is so great to hear that you and your significant other enjoyed a wonderful anniversary here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad our staff was able to cater to your needs and help create a lasting memory. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Held my Wedding at the Sandpearl 10/11/12
review: While attending a conference at the Sandpearl I had the misfortune of letting the valet park my new car, which is the only option for parking at the Sandpearl. Little did I know I should have inspected my new vehicle before leaving the premises. After arriving home I noticed a nice size ding just behind the drivers side door.  Being a new 2012 car I normally take extra care when parking my vehicle and inspect it frequently. Because of this practice I happen to know the damage did not exist before trusting the Sandpearl to park it. Unfortunately I did not inspect the vehicle before leaving, I just assumed a so called classy hotel would exercise the same care that I would with an expensive new car. I was wrong.  I expect not many people think to inspect their vehicles when leaving…

title: The best on Clearwater Beach!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.  I hope that the rest of your stay with us was great.  If I can help you with anything in the future please do not hesitate to let me know.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Sandpearl is AMAZING...definitely worth the extra money, and especially if you are thinking of having a wedding in the area...it's the perfect location. We had a smaller destination wedding at the Sandpearl (Reception Dinner was held at Caretta's)  and the ceremony was on the beach. Jessica Gillespie our event coordinator was amazing, every detail was handled in the appropriate manner and the day was perfect and beautiful. The Sandpearl Resort in itself is gorgeous, the pool is amazing, the staff is friendly and the food is terrific. Yes, it's on the more expensive side when it comes to resorts (Some of our wedding guests wanted to save $ so they stayed at the Hilton Clearwater Beach) and walked over to the Sandpearl for the events...and it worked out well too..except everything…

title: Beachfront dont get any better
review: Whilst in Orlando doing the Disney and Universal Parks, decided to break it up with a few days in Clearwater, the moment we turned up to the time we left we can only stress what great service, helpfulness of the staff, the rooms again great standard interconnecting rooms with the children, but as well as the bedrooms, both on suite luxury we also had a seperate room between the two which was a lounge, dining room and kitchen, the view onto the private white sandy beach made it even better and at night they lit a fire on the beach to toast marshmellows whereby you could just sit and relax with a few beers. Stayed an extra night but they had to jiggle the rooms as it was full, again they made sure we stayed in the rooms and did not have to move, now thats service!

title: Hotel and Restaurant fantastic
review: Dear Ian D,  WOW! It sounds like you and your family thoroughly enjoyed your time here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so pleased that we were not only able to accommodate you staying another night but that we were able to keep you in the same room. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Very poor customer care
review: After staying here at on at least five separate occasions, the Hotel still repesents superior accomodations, service and ammenities. The Sunday Brunch was outstanding because of the quality and diverstity of the foods, as well as excellent service to our large party of guests.

title: Amazing!
review: Dear Ronald a,  Thank you for sharing your feedback from your stay with us here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad to hear that on five separate occasions you were able to visit with us and had a fantastic time. We certainly appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Incredible beach front hotel
review: This hotel is supposed to be a top hotel but as it doesnt advertise  a star rating on its website bear this in mind,booked a coastal room for 7 nights big mistake arrived 5pm to be told room was not ready(check in is 2pm) asked if coastal room which is what we booked 15 months ago to be told no we dont have any left only bay view,not happy and made that clear was told that if we used that room for 1 night they would upgrade us for the next 6 nights to junior suite,which you cant complain about until you wait around until lunch time next day to change, and be told you are getting the room you already paid for coastal room,oops wrong person to accept that eventualy got 1 bedroom suite but kids had to sleep on sofa bed at first they didnt mind at first but in the end were glad to…

title: Always A Perfect Visit
review: Can't say enough about this beautiful resort.  Beautiful views & exceptionally nice staff, & I mean the entire staff.  Even though the hotel was almost full we were still upgraded to a gulf view which was wonderful for us because in my opinion the view is one of the main reasons to stay there.  This was my 4th visit & I will happily be returning next year!

title: The hotel was great but there were a few issues
review: Dear Luvinthegulf,  Wow! I am so pleased to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay here at the Sandpearl resort. Thank you for your continued business and we look forward to welcoming you back next year.

title: Beautiful beach- make sure you get a view- pros & cons
review: This hotel was beautiful and for the most part, staff were great.  We were not aware of the 18% gratuity added to all of the bills even thought we asked our server on the beach.  Thus, we over-tipped.  The manager was informed and took care of that issue promptly.  The Caretta's was very unorganized as far as seating was concerned; definitely not a four star as expected.  The beach and amenities were very nice.

title: Still an amazing place to stay
review: Dear DianeMack,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thought about your most recent stay. I am pleased to hear that you found the resort to be beautiful and the staff great. I do apologize for any confusion with the billing and I am glad that our pool manager was able to correct it promptly. I apologize for your experience with seating at Caretta on the Gulf and will share your feedback with our food and beverage team. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back the next time you are in the Clearwater Beach area.

title: Love, Love, Love the Sandpearl!
review: This is a very nice location.  I like that it is close to the strip of shops & many restaurants - all walking distance.  Beach sand is like no other.  Like white powder- amazing.  Staff is friendly.  Tate's island grille is casually nice for day time & on the beach.  Reasonable for hotel & beach food.  Our package included free breakfast & the buffet was fantastic.  (Could have ordered entree from menu, but buffet had made to order omelet, waffles, & all the normal items). Fitness center is nice & overlooks pool & beach.  Pool chairs are free, umbrella beach chairs seem to have a rental fee.  We did change rooms THREE times.  Our first room (coast view) looked at rooftops & dumpsters & partial beach, next room (paying another $25) looked straight at others balconies & building-…

title: Very Nice Resort but a few pros and cons
review: We just completed a two night stay as part of a destination wedding event and enjoyed our stay.  First the Pros... 1.The Hotel was very nice and the location, right on the beach, was perfect.   2.You are within walking distance of several restaurants and shops including a CVS just a block away for any last minute items you might need. You really do not need a car if you are staying here especially since parking is $20/day.  3.Rooms were spacious and come with a Keurig coffee maker, a variety of coffees and teas and two free bottles of water per day.  4. They do have a nice Fitness center with Elliptical, treadmills, bikes, circuit training and free weights.  The room is a bit cramped but pretty well equipped Now the  cons... 1.Our reservation, as well as at least one other…

title: excellant
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very  much for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  I am glad that you were happy with the hotel, location, rooms and fitness center.    In your review you had concerns with several things.  You mentioned not being able to get the room type that you requested.  We do our absolute best to grant all requested room types but sometimes with contracted groups specific room types are not available.  I am very sorry for this inconvenience.  We would normally happily upgrade however due to high occupancy that is not always possible.    You also mentioned the heating of the pool.  Our pool is indeed heated but we did experience an issue with our pool during your stay.  As part of our LEED Certification our pool is Geo-Thermal and unfortunately takes a bit longer to repair when problems occur.  Luckily this rarely happens and the pool is currenlty at 82 degrees.  We should have plenty of chairs on the beach that we do not charge for.  If we did not put more chairs out on the beach please accept my sincere apology as we should have.  I will follow up with our Beach and Pool Manager.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write your review of your stay.  If there is anything that I can help you with please do not hesitate to let me know.  Regards, Eric Waltz

title: Amazing hotel great location. few hidden costs
review: The SandPearl is a great hotel, and it stands alone as the best hotel in Clearwater.  It has a Great Pool and is on a Great Beach.  Perfect location in the center of Clearwater.  It is a pricey hotel, but I think you get your money's worth, especially if you stay in one of the suites.

title: One of the best hotels i´ve ever seen
review: Dear Jeff M,  Thank you I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. It sounds like you had a wonderful time here at the Sandpearl Resort and enjoyed the location and amenities. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Nice getaway
review: Great hotel had a wonderful time. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Rooms was spacious and great views. Food was lovely we only at from the Tate grill. The only problem I have is the $20 a day for valet parking and also $25 a day for a resort fee. Which we stayed for 7 days gets quiet costly as I had already spent alot on the holiday. Maybe they should look into these if you are spending more than a few days there. Cause it wasn't nice to get a nice bill at the end. If I hadn't had these it would have been perfect.

title: Sandpearl Resort Clearwater.
review: We booked this hotel after reviewing the positive reviews on trip advisor.  This holiday had been planned for a number of months and we decided that we would spend 9 days in Orlando staying at the Hilton Bonnet Creek (excellent) and 5 days in Clearwater staying at the suggested luxurious Sandpearl!.  As I Prefer members we have stayed in some very nice hotels and expected the same from the Sandpearl.  On arrival we were met by a Receptionist whom was professional however her whole demeanour lacked warmth.  She was what my husband would refer to as a 'jobs worth' .  We were offered our welcome drinks but no bucket and spade for our youngest child (many reviews refer to this).  On walking to our room I commented to my husband that the hallway carpets looked a little worn and could…

title: Would have been perfect!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us.  I was very happy to hear that you were pleased with several areas of  your stay however your comments regarding Housekeeping were concerning.  We take great pride in our housekeeping processes and it appears that we disappointed you during your stay.  For that I am very sorry.  Please rest assured that I have spoken with the Housekeeping team and relayed your message.  If you would like to speak personally regarding  your stay please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel if you feel it appropriate.  Regards Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Great location and clean!
review: We stayed on an ocean front two bedroom suite! The room was super clean and beautifully furnished! The beach was beautiful and the grounds kept very well. We loved the beachfront grill and lazy days in the baby-powder soft white sand.  The negative for our stay -- my earrings that I've had for 10 years were taken from our bathroom during cleaning. I am always good about hiding my valuables either in a safe or a very inconspicous location but this morning, I forgot to put them away before we left our room. The safe was located in our friends room so I didn't bother them to hide them away. That day the cleaning person came and left several things out of sorts (dishes dirty in the sink, towels on the floor in another area) and the earrings missing. I was so sad! The local security…

title: Amazing place to stay
review: Super convenient location!  Easy walk to restaurants and shops and right on the beautiful white sand beach!  Super clean and modern facilities.  Pool is nice but lounge chairs are crowded.  If you don't want to rent an umbrella or cabana on the beach, lounge chairs are limited.  We were there during a non peak time so didn't have any problems finding a chair, but during a busier time, it would be a problem.  Starbucks is on site.  Two bottles of water per day and  K-cup coffee are provided.  I guess this is part of the resort fee? $20 per day valet parking is mandatory.  Overall, a great hotel if you want nice, clean and beachfront!

title: We had a wonderful honeymoon!!!
review: Dear aeglobetrotter,  Thank you for your response to your most recent stay with us here at the Sandpearl Resort. We certainly appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Best Wedding Location Ever!!!!
review: We had our wedding on the beach at the Sandpearl, there is no better place and this place is amazing!!  Michele Johnson, director of catering services, etc., she handled every detail and kept me calm all the way through! The resort is beautiful, clean, amazing service, amazing pool, grounds, you name it! If you are going to have a wedding in Florida, don't do it anywhere but here. It was so beautiful, so well taken care of, I cannot explain it in words!!!! We are going back for our one year anniversary and bringing the whole wedding party with us. Thank you again Michele for everything!!!!!

title: Perfect hotel for a wonderful wedding!!
review: Dear Susan G,  Congratulations! I am so happy we could help create memories for your special day. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back next year.

title: heaven!!!!
review: Our daughter got married there on July 22, 2012. A beach wedding was planned, but Mother Nature had other ideas.  We were moved into the Cove Room and it was transformed into paradise!! The service of this hotel was beyond excellent!! The rooms were beautiful and extremely comfortable.  The entire resort is top notch!! Although we usually vacation in the Caribbean every year, now we plan to go to the Sandpearl instead!!!

title: Continues to get better!
review: Dear KyAlwaysreadytogo,  Wow, what a compliment! I am so pleased we were able to apart of such a wonderful memory for you and your family. Congratulations on your daughter’s marriage and we hope to welcome you and the whole family back again soon.

title: Great Stay
review: this resort , in my opinion is perfection! Beautiful beach, beautiful rooms, and AMAZING spa! It was such a nice feature to have a coed hot tub in the spa so my husband and I could relax together before and after our massages.And you can use it anytime for the rest of the day! We went back after dinner and got  in the hot tub.....we were the only people there!

title: Location, location, location
review: This hotel is immaculate, plush and deserves a high rating. Located right on the beach out of the  hustle yet walkable to the Pier 60 etc. We have stayed 3 or 4 times over the years and continue to be delighted with warm hospitality, & consistent food quality at either of the restaurants. Tate's Beach bar and grill is great for families. It is right on the beach with a firepit, but also serves the pool area. The rooms are always spotless. We prefer the bay view to the north view, but it's all good.

title: An true oasis in a fabulous location
review: Dear Sunseeker22,  I am so pleased to hear that you continue to enjoy your time with us here at the Sandpearl Resort. We certainly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Perfect weekend break!
review: The most stunning private glass dining room was the location for my birthday dinner. London class food with every attention to deal. The interior design of this resort will blow your socks off. Beautiful huge artwork,adorns the reception walls. The beach and pool area , WOW amazing.   The outdoor fire pit drinks watching sunset will remain with me til I die, it was that good.  Pricey but fabulous the kids will love the pizza bar.

title: First Class Hospitality
review: Dear LouHolloway,  Wow! I am so pleased to hear what a wonderful birthday celebration you had while here at the Sandpearl Resort. We appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Sand Pearl best on Clearwater Beach
review: I stayed here with my husband and four year old daughter for one night as a relaxing weekend during our two-week holiday in Orlando.  We needed to get away from the mania and this was the perfect way to recuperate!  We chose the Sandpearl because we wanted luxury, and this is what we got.  We booked an ocean-view suite on the fifth floor which was perfect, especially the view over the white sandy beach below.  Everything was exceptionally clean and the free toiletries were good quality.  All the staff were friendly, efficient and helpful and let us use the resort for two full days, despite us only staying the one night.  The pool area is exceptional – large, clean and plenty of very luxurious loungers, both in and out of the shade.  Pool depth was perfect for our four year old…

title: Wonderful hotel, great service and location
review: I travel extensively throughout the country and this hotel was wonderful. i had a great experience from when i walked in and was greated with a momosa to nighttime turn down service in my room. The food was great, the pool and spa was nicely appointed and the location on a sandy white beach was spectacular. I would definately recommend and in fact plan to bring my family back for a trip in February. I would go as far as, this was the best hotel stay i have ever experienced.  The plantation style beach hotel on beautiful clearwater beach with nearby restuarants and entertainment outside the hotel. Valet parking was free and the quick service was ideal for rushing to airport. The kids center is well equiped and the hotel grounds are immaculately maintained. job well done to your…

title: Relaxing, just what we needed
review: Dear Kbwesler,  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the Sandpearl Resort. We certainly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Great in the beginning, then it went downhill
review: Stayed here for a baby free 40th birthday celebration with my husband in August.  It was a much needed rest and relaxing break.  The pool was nice, the bed was comfortable.  Our only small complaint was there seemed to be some miscommunication between the staff and managment.  Our private beach fire was almost not very private.  The problem was quickly solved by a very nice staff memember.  And watch your bill we were almost charged for a couple extra breakfasts (which were included) and a spa treatment that we didn't have.  They were all fixed at the desk with no problem, but just check.  Otherwise our rating would have been a 5.  Hope to return again very soon.

title: honeymoon
review: Dear SuziAreoff,  I am so pleased that you chose to stay at the Sandpearl resort for 40th birthday celebration! I am glad your trip was a relaxing treat for you and your family. My apologize for the error on  your bill, I am glad we were able to quickly rectify that for you. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Already planning my return!
review: Our stay was pleasant and somewhat comfortable overall, I just wished they treated us better. It's clear that they prefer clients with money and treat everyone else kind of different. I mean, for a stay during the week, off season, you can honestly tell me that there are no better rooms that face the ocean directly?  Initially, we stayed in a bay view room, which was fabulous. Tall ceilings, very clean (a bit of dust under the beds is expected), very spacious, comfy. Pictures starting with the number 22 will reveal my point (ie 224903, 224911, etc.) They are referred to in my description as: bay view room.  We decided that since we were at the beach, we should get an ocean view room for the remaining of our stay. Long story short, they found us a "gulf view room" which basically…

title: best on the beach
review: Only resort in clearwater with the pool on the beach level which is so convenient when you wanna just go for a stroll or go from the gulf to the pool. Other resorts have the pools raised up a level or floor. Room was clean and the view from a 5th floor king jr ste was awesome. The whole staff was great except one male bartender at the tate island grill who made my wife and I wait a little too long to place and order because he was flirting with another female guest. The concierge was exceptional with their advice and service. If I go back I will def stay here. Great restaurants just right outside the front door. A close drive to Dunnedin or taxi ride if your drinking, and really a close ride from the airport and to the Dali Musuem in Saint Petersburg.

title: Spectacular Resort
review: Dear Drock5,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay. I am so pleased to hear that you found our resort to be the best on the beach with a great location and convenient layout. I am glad you enjoyed your junior suite with the fantastic views of the sunset. We certainly appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Beautiful resort!
review: I stayed at the resort for a large meeting.  The resort handled our huge party very well.  The food was fabulous, rooms beautiful and staff was very accommodating.   The only issue that I had is that the room walls are fairly thin and I was able to hear the doors and drawers in the room next to me being opened and closed.   The hotel is centrally located amongst restaurants and shops.    I will be back for both personal and business travel!

title: Perfect location, amazing pool, inconsistent staff
review: Dear Duccessoftravel,  Thank you for your comments about your most recent stay. I am so pleased you had such a wonderful time while attending a meeting here at the Sandpearl resort. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Wow! Does it get any better than this?
review: Stayed at Sandpearl Resort over Labor Day weekend. Lovely resort; excellent restaurants; views are incredible! Grounds and rooms well cared for. Staff extremely courteous and friendly in spite of being very busy! Pool design is great for kids and adults. Rooms are decorated beautifully and were quiet at night. I've stayed in several 'chain' hotels in the area. The Sandpearl outshines them all! I'll definitely be back during the end-of-year holidays!

title: a wonderful way to spend Thanksgiving
review: The Sandpearl logo flows.  Look at it long enough and you'll be thinking about the best sunset ever, the gentle movement of the gulf on a peaceful day, the softness of luxury surrounded by the pleasant harmony of nature.  The Sandpearl offers all this and more.    With the Thanksgiving holiday approaching, I'm reminded of the wonderful Thanksgiving past that I spent at Sandpearl.  I whole-heartedly recommend it as a great way to enjoy the holiday.  The buffet will not disappoint,  dine on the balcony overlooking the Gulf, no cooking, no dishes!  The cabanas accommodate the various needs of a diverse group and it's kid friendly.   In case you haven't visited Clearwater Beach in a few years, the North end of the beach has been mansionized. I give five stars to the architects of…

title: A great getaway
review: Dear Thepinion,   WOW! Thank you for your beautiful description of your most recent stay with us. I am so pleased that you enjoyed the resort and its ambiance. We certainly appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Beach of my dreams
review: I have stayed at several top hotels in the St. Pete- Clearwater Beach area, including the renowned Don Cesar. The Sandpearl has just become my overwhelming favorite.   Our stay began on Labor Day weekend when the hotel was sold out. Even when filled to capacity, the resort felt spacious. The staff was extremely attentive. We had minor maintenance issues (TV not working). It was most impressive how the staff responded and addressed the problem within minutes. If you're considering a stay at the Sandpearl vs. other hotels or destinations, here's what I think you need to know:  The good: 1) The rooms are well-appointed.   2) The property is maintained meticulously: You won't see trash, rust, or weeds here.   3) There are plenty of reasonably-priced restaurants within walking…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear Aloha410,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay. I am so pleased that you found our resort staff to be so friendly and accommodating. I have shared your comments with our management team so we can continue to provide all of our guests with a safe and memorable experience. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Beautiful view and beach
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl for 3 nights in March 2012. Everything was top-notch, rooms clean, staff friendly. Everything about it was expensive, but worth it for a relaxing few days in the sun. The sand at the beach is the softest I have ever felt, and the view from our ocean view room was fantastic. We didn't eat on the property except for lunch served to us at the beach from a fairly limited menu. I hadn't read much good about the restaurants on site, so we ventured off the property for breakfast and dinner, mostly eating at the Clear Sky Cafe which was right next door.  We tried the spa which was also lovely. Would definitely come back even though I think it's a bit overpriced.

title: SandPearl Resort
review: Warm, friendly hotel staff, great views and beautiful beach made a recent stay there high note of the summer. Beautiful spa and terrific Caretta's restaurant made Clearwater an absolute return trip. Can't say enough positives about the spa staff.

title: Service a little haphazard
review: Dear 297PMcL297, I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay and thank you for acknowledging our wonderful staff! I will certainly share your kind words with our management team. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Sandpearl - great hotel
review: My husband and I reside in Tampa and we come to the Sandpearl once or twice a year because we have always had a good experience there.  We went this past Labor Day weekend for a night.  When we arrived the people in front of us all received mimosas upon check-in.  Sadly, we were not offered anything (we were dressed nicely and paying through the nose for this room.)  There were simply not enough staff at the front desk.  We were supposed to be in an ocean view room.  If I craned my neck and looked out over the roof of a building I could in fact see the ocean.  There was someone's hair in the shower (gross.)  We went to the beach.  There are not enough chairs and they charge for the privilege of sitting on one.  I'm sorry but if you are paying this kind of money the chaise…

title: Best in Clearwater
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of the Sandpearl Resort.  Also, thank you for your continued patronage.  Please accept my sincere apologies for the issues you experienced at the Front Desk, room view, housekeeping and pool.  I will share your comments with each of the respective departments.  In your review you commented on paying for pool chairs.  All pool chairs are complimentary as are some of the chairs on the beach.  The only chairs that we charge for are the chairs with umbrellas on the beach and they are rented for $25 per day.  The reason for this charge is due to the limited supply and prevent others from reserving pool chairs as well as beach chairs.  I am sorry if this was not communicated correctly to you.  Again, thank you for the feedback.  I truly appreciate it.  If you would like to speak personally please feel free to contact me directly at the resort.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: First class hotel on a great stretch of beach with beautiful sunset views
review: I love this hotel! Great customer service & gorgeous clean rooms!  Best hotel on Clearwater Beach! Great family hotel & wonderful location.  Grille has awesome food but Caretta's is a bit too pricy for the food served.  This is my kids favorite hotel on Clearwater Beach!

title: short holiday with wife and older kids
review: Second stay, good location and excellent beach/pool! The only negative point I can meniotn is the staff serving the restaurant and pool outside. Seem somewhat aloof and hardly interested in providing good service. Again the only negative point for an otherwise great place!

title: A lovely hotel
review: Dear Maurice_Doppert,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your time here with us. I apologize for your experience with our poolside staff I will certainly address it with the appropriate team members. We hope you chose to stay with us again the next time you are in the Clearwater area.

title: 5* Location with 3* Customer Service
review: We were recommended to book and stay at this Hotel by friends and were not disappointed. The staff were very welcoming and helpful.  We stayed for one night (before flying home from Tampa) in a Gulf View double room.  The room was very clean and comfortable with a great view over the pool and out to the beach and gulf beyond.  It is well located with lots of restaurants nearby.  Although the pool area is quite busy and possibly not large enough for all the guests who wanted to hang out there.  We lost our sunbeds when we poped back to the room for hapf an hour, however the pool staff were fantastic and arranged for sunbeds to be put on the lawn in order that we could have a spot near the pool for the afternoon.

title: Lovely Hotel right on the beach
review: Dear Alfaman159, Thank you for your most recent stay with us at the Sandpearl Resort. It sounds like you and your family had a wonderful time. We appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Best hotel on Clearwater Beach!
review: This hotel is stunning, it is directly on the beach allowing you to walk straight from the pool onto  the gorgeous beach.  On arrival we were given a glass of champagne and juice for the children, in addition the girls were given a bucket and spade which was a lovely idea. Found on a few occasions that the staff were ignorant to the definition of what good customer service is.  The staff around the pool were uninterested and when queried on incorrect drinks were dismissive and unhelpful.  This issue is compounded by the fact that they automatically take an 18% tip on any food or drink you purchase.  The staff are protected by this and therefore don't feel the need for courtesy! The breakfast waiting staff don't get the 18% tip added as standard which resulted in 4 of the staff…

title: Great location on the Gulf
review: This was our second stay at the Sandpearl - family of 4.  We stayed for 3 nights and had booked a coastal view 2 queens with balcony on the S'more Beach Fun Family Package.  This represented good value as it included breakfast for the 4 of us.  As an Iprefer member we were upgraded to a Gulf view with balcony. The view was great!  We ate lunch at Tates by the pool.  Food was great but I would recommend staying inside the bar as the seagulls can be a nuisance. It was raining the afternoon we arrived so we ordered room service - flatbreads, which was prompt and tasty.  Evenings we chose to eat outside of the hotel,  the best of which was Bob Heilman's Beachcomber which is a smart restaurant just outside the hotel with an excellent fillet mignon, top service and the largest wine…

title: We keep coming back - and we have not been disappointed
review: Dear Hironakamura,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about you most recent stay. I am so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed the resort and local area. It sounds like you enjoyed dining in our two restaurants Caretta on Gulf and Tate Island Grill. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Faultless
review: Our fourth visit as a family, and we enjoyed this just as much as the previous ones. Some characteristics of the Sandpearl we continue to appreciate: the one bedroom suites, which are probably the most comfortable and suitable rooms we have stayed in as a family; the beach setting, with easy walking access to shops and restaurants; Caretta for a special dinner; and the universally friendly staff. Sandpearl is how an upmarket resort should be.

title: Sandpearl Resort Clearwater
review: Dear ThirdWrangler,   I am so glad that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed you stay with us. We certainly appreciate your continued business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: save your money
review: This is up there with the best hotels I have stayed in. I know people moaned about the resort fees and valet parking fees but it's worth it because it just makes it all feel so special. I got the drinks on arrival, I got a maid checking we had enough towels every night and the delivery of chocolates which my son loved, I got cold water bottles every time we went out in the car, I got doors opened for me when we went through reception, I got drinks by the pool with a lift of a flag, I got my room extended for a few extra hours at no charge, my son got his fresh strawberries which were not on the menu. Don't take any notice of the bad reviews they are either picky beyond belief or just unlucky. The hotel is walking distance to many restuarants and the pier has lots of market…

title: Great Experience!!
review: Beautiful resort in a great location right on the beach. Great service with very nice rooms and view. It's definitely work the little extra to upgrade to at least a gulf view room. Within walking distance to many cute restaurants and shops.

title: Take the Fun Boats at the Marina for the most fun.
review: Dear Laurie S,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay. I am so glad that you found our resort to provide great service and that you enjoyed our guest rooms and view. We appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Great return visit
review: Family get away, loved the SandPearl. We were pampered. Many guests from Europe. Never had trouble getting a chair at the pool.   Skip bringing all the beach gear w/ you. They will give you towels and the local street in front of the hotel is full of surf shops and other shops that sell boggie boards, snorkel gear and bathing suits, all at great rates.   We ate at Tate's on the beach and loved it. Try Frenchy's across the road for the best grilled grouper sandwich in town. Coffee Culture next to the Lobster Pot is a super spot for bagels and coffee in the morning.  Kimku's Sushi in the pink building by CVS has good sushi. And we made several trips to CVS for bottled waters, sodas and sunscreen. All of these are within a few feet of the SandPearl's front door.   Forget Crabby…

title: Outstanding Service and Amenities
review: Dear Beach G,  Wow, it sounds like you and your family had a fantastic time vacationing here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad to hear you felt pampered during your stay. We certainly strive to help create memories for all of our guest, and from your review it sounds like you have many wonderful memories you and your family will cherish for years to come. We hope you are able to visit with us again soon.

title: The best!
review: Our second visit to the Sandpearl and we were not dissapointed, having stayed at the Hyatt ealier in the year,believe this hotel has the edge - but not cheap. Had a two bed condo on seventh floor for four nights, where we had oodles of space in luxory, with ocean views. Daughter and granddaughter thought it the best hotel we stayed in during our five week stay in USA. Slightly quieter end of Clearwater but still easy walk to restaraunts etc

title: Pearl on the Beach
review: Sand pearl is a great location in Clearwater beach    From the time you pull in to check in and check is all great   I had a jr suite overlooking gulf with balcony outstanding   Meals at sand pearl also very good   If your looking for beach front hotel this is the place not oversize it just right

title: 5th visit. . very good. .Not excellent
review: Dear Wmbrakeman,  Wow, its sounds like you really enjoyed your stay with us here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your junior suite overlooking the gulf. I hope you chose to stay with again the next time you are in the Clearwater area.

title: nice place!
review: We love the Sandpearl. We live 25 minutes away and feel like we are away on vacation. This weekend, the resort was not the same standard that we are used to. Check-in seemed rushed and impersonal.  It took 1/2 hour for our luggage to arrive at our room. Service at Carretta's for the breakfast buffet was poor. There was a very bad odor as we entered the pool area from the beach. Spa treatments were not available which we expected because we didn't book ahead but a charge of 25 dollars per person to use the whirlpool and sauna seemed very expensive. On the positive side, there was an ambassador who held open the front door, offered a mimosa and showed us to the front desk. The bellman was friendly, valet very good and housekeeping was excellent. We were celebrating my birthday and…

title: Best property in Clearwater
review: Dear Carmenpell,  Thank you for your continued business. I apologize the service and standards during your most recent stay were not what you have experienced in your past stays. I am pleased to hear that you found our resort ambassador, bellman, valet and housekeeping team to be wonderful. We do sincerely appreciate your business and I hope we can welcome you back again soon.

title: Beautiful resort on the beach
review: We just got back from the Sandpearl and really enjoyed ourselves.  The staff was great, and the property was fabulous.  We wanted to mention a couple of employees for outstanding service...Steve, the man who took care of us out on the beach, was awesome.  He is very customer focused and really went out of his way to give us exceptional service.  He is the perfect example of customer service at its best!  Thanks Steve.  Our maid service was also excellent.  It is nice to come back to your room, and have romantic music on, blinds pulled, bed turned down and last but not least, chocolate!  For restaurants, we found the best in the area was The Island Way Grill right around the corner from the Sandpearl.  We ate there several times during our week, and it was some of the best…

title: Ok but not quite worth it
review: Stayed 4 nights in 2 bed corner suite. The room was all very nice, good size bedrooms and bathrooms. Lots of cupboard space, comfortable beds but very very noisy air conditioning that came on and off through the night and hard to get a good constant temp throughout the night and in the different rooms. None of us slept well any night (5 of us) and we are not fussy. the room /resort fee included Internet which worked very well in room or around pool. Breakfast was very pleasant and we had vouchers as a family package which gave us breakfast each morning. We ate in tate and main restaurant (where the lamb was just fantastic) but actualy found the food next door in sky cafe to be better quality (excluding lamb). The pool was good but a alot of small kids. Most were well behaved but…

title: Good Spot
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your recent review of your stay at the Sandpearl Resort.  I appreciate it very much.  I was glad to see that you enjoyed your room, pool and service.  I will most definately share your comments with all respective departments.    I was sorry to hear that even though you enjoyed yourself you left fealing that your time spent with us was not worth it.  I would very much like to speak with you regarding your stay and get more information regarding what you are referring to so that we may work on it.  If you find it appropriate please contact me at the resort at your convenience so that we may speak.  Again, thank you.  Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Heaven......
review: Stayed in the Sandpearl for 7 nights in July/Aug. Had a gulf view two bedroomed suite which was excellent as I would expect paying that kind of money. Views were spectacular. Couple of minor issues which if sorted out would upgrade the review to excellent. People were allowed put towels on the sun beds by the pool all day and made no appearance. Need to police this better. Staff in the Caretta restaurant could improve their attitude a bit, starting with the Manager. Would have liked a call from a Manger to see if there was anyting they could do but it did not happen. All in all enjoyed our stay.

title: Very Nice
review: Dear CluckerJones,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your two bedroom suite overlooking the gulf. I apologize you had a poor experienced in our restaurant and I would be happy to discuss with you your experience, please feel free to contact me directly. Overall I am glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back.

title: Disappointed This Time
review: This was our second stay at Sandpearl Resort & I can honestly say it was even better than the first time (which was also amazing nearly 2 yrs ago!) . Katherine the Lobby Ambassador greeted us on arrival.  She was such a welcoming, lovely lady who provided complimentary champagne & got our 2 bedroomed suite sorted out before check in time.  Throughout our stay she was always there & was so kind about/to our 4 children.  Our rooms were the same no as last time 810/812. They were still top notch.  There is nothing negative I can say about this resort, we had seven days of bliss & relaxation I can't wait to go back. Thank you Sandpearl

title: Sandpearl - First Class Resort!!
review: My wife and I along with our two kids (5 and 3yrs old) spent 5 nights at the Sandpearl Resort in Clearwater this past week (July 30 to Aug 4th) and I have to say we had a wonderful experience. I travel 3-4 nights a week for work and generally don't look forward to another hotel but the Sandpearl was top notch. The staff at the various restaurants (Tate's, Starbucks and Caretta) were very friendly and courteous. Both the conceirge desk, and believe it or not the valet guys, came through with great activities and much appreciated restaurant recommendations. The property itself was very well kept and the room we stayed in was clean with all the necessary and extra amenities. The pool was outstanding and the beach is the finest sand I've come across. Traveling with kids, especially…

title: Best beach hotel
review: Dear MikeD,  Wow, I am so pleased to hear that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed your 5 night stay with us! We look forward to being a destination for your and you family for years to come.

title: Best Place To Stay In Clearwater
review: Every time we visit Clearwater Beach we stay here.  Superb standard in the hotel from the foyer through to the rooms. The views are amazing and the location on the beach can't be beat.  Stay here, you wont regret it.  Hopefully visit number six next summer!

title: Excellent Hotel - Family Friendly
review: Dear Falkirkmarkymark,  Thank you for your continued business! I am glad you enjoyed your stay we look forward to welcoming you back for the 6th time next summer!

title: Great Stay
review: We were there for one night and would have loved to stay longer. The hotel was great right on the beach. You have to get to pool early to claim your spot. Catherine the resort ambassador was so pleasant. She greeted us with complimentary drinks upon arrival and engaged in conversation with my son. Dinner at the restaurant is a must. Service was just fair at best but the food was delicious. We were disappointed they cancelled the movie at night when there was no rain. Other than that it was a pleasurable experience and we will be back

title: Wow, thanks everyone here
review: No surprises,resort fee and room taxes high, mandatory valet parking at $20.00 a day, but we knew this going in due to education here. The hotel could be more forth coming with this but the entire stay was wonderful. The staff was the heart of this place s they seemed genuine in their being there to help and happy you were there, not the "dripping in sarcasm" sometimes found in a place like this. If you are local, bring your own beach chair and umbrella, this way you sit at the waters edge and not have to pay the $25.00for the shade. Also, get to the pool early as everyone so why not include your family can place a towel on the chair of your choice. The room was not ready when we arrived at 1300hrs and check in is late at 1600hrs, they called us at 1335hrs that it was okay to…

title: Our first family of 7 vacation
review: Dear Lifeisaj0urney,  Thank you for taking the time to share your most recent experience here at the Sandpearl Resort. It is so wonderful to hear that you found our entire staff to be genuinely helpful and friendly.  We appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Book this hotel!
review: Our family of 7 just returned from a family vacation.  Because we wanted family friendly very few options that met our request.  Sandpearl kept popping up.  They had a 1 room bedroom gulf front suite waiting for us.  It was perfect, clean, spacious, and the view was amazing. It was pretty kid  friendly as well. I was nervous about breakable but our 1 and 2 year did just fine.   They met every requiremnet we requested.  The staff was incredibly friendly.  During our 4 night 5 day stay we never met a crabby staff member who wasn't happy to help.  My husband loved the starbucks coffee house in the lobby, the pool was great, the beach access from our room was so quick and easy. Tate Island Grill was very good, the atmosphere and service was great.  The Caretta grill was very good…

title: Tate Island Grill was superb
review: Dear 21janise21,  I am so pleased to hear that every member of your family of 7 thoroughly enjoyed themselves while staying at the Sandpearl Resort. I will certainly share your compliments of our staff with the rest of our management team. I hope you are able to stay with us again should you find yourself in the Clearwater area.

title: Nice hotel but doesn't live up to price
review: We are predominantly staying in Orlando during our visit to Florida. We booked the Sandpearl for a night to get to the beach for a couple of days, I wish we'd booked for longer. What a fantastic stay, one of, if not the best hotel stay I've ever had outside of Vegas.  Every member of staff we met were extremely helpful and very friendly. Whilst the weather wasn't too great on our first day, that wasn't going to stop us swimming. The beach, the sand, all really exquisite, certainly beats Blackpool back home!  Their attention to detail was sublime, from the chocolates on the bed in the evening, the little card with the weather forecast, to the champagne on arrival. I raved about Miami Beach last week, but this was another level up. Not pretentious in the slightest, the Sandpearl…

title: Go there
review: Beautiful hotel with lovely staff and facilities. Feel privilged just going through the front door. Nothing too much trouble. Pool and beach with staff ensuring you have everything you need. Great cafe next door.

title: Beautiful Hotel Exceptional Service!
review: Dear Ukman50,  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. If sounds like we were able to cater to every need or want. We certainly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Nice Hotel, Look out for costs
review: We recently returned from a one week stay at the Sandpearl, where we had a wonderful time! We arrived at 12 and were handed glasses of champagne, cider for the children, and were shown to our room. The room was spotless, had 2 doubles and a couch, and a lovely view of the Gulf. Throughout our stay we encountered the friendliest employees ever! The service was outstanding and everything was done with a smile. The white sand rivals that of the carribean and the Gulf water was exceptionally warm. The grill had good food at a modest price and Frenchys next door had excellent food served on the beach in a fun casual style. Our boys loved it! The Friday entertainment and poolside movie was also fun for the kids. Although we visited the pier, we didn't care for that end of the beach.…

title: A great week at the Sand Pearl Resort in Clearwater Beach
review: Dear SophieG,   Wow thank you for the glowing recommendation. I am so happy to hear that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed you stay with us at the Sandpearl Resort. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed everything from the moment you arrived until your departure. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Disappointed.
review: This was our first visit to Clearwater.  The Hotel is very beautiful. In a very nice location with a more private beach close to many great restaurants and activities.  Our room was very well cleaned each day.  Housekeeping did a great job.  I have stayed at quite a few very nice hotels at other locations and this hotel is right there with them in terms of decor, room comfort, Lobby, pool etc.  The beach and pool were beautiful. The staff seemed very kind. The valet were very efficient and friendly.    On the downside, there were a few things that I did not like.  1.  We requested a bay view room and tried to upgrade to an oceanview but there were no rooms available for the length of our stay.  I had called a few months earlier and tried to upgrade but they said they were unable…

title: Poor service for a very expensive hotel
review: Rooms not ready at check in, no champagne at check in as promised, over charged credit for things that we didn't order, over charged for parking as well as rude employees to my kids.  Employees mistreated my daughter who was trying to get towels for the pool.  Also, double check to make sure there isn't a corporate event during your stay because they get priority treatment compared to other guests including limit areas where you can go.  One good thing is that they have a good grouper sandwich but it doens't make up for the poor service. Very disappointing for the cost and our family will not be back. Fine a nice little hotel on the other side of the Sand Key bridge and you'll be much happier.  If cost isn't an issue then I would recommend the new Hyatt down the road.

title: The right room is essential
