review: Dear Martyschw,  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your return visit with us; we certainly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

title: Very good with some minor drawbacks
review: This hotel has it all.  The beach is great, very wide and soft sand.  The beach facing units are way better than street facing.  North end of hotel is more quiet than south (nearby restaurant).

title: My favorite place fla!!
review: Dear Floridagator,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Very Nice Facility with Excellent Staff
review: Good things : - The hotel itself is very nice and very well decorated. Lobby is charming and the pool is awesome; - The room was nice and very comfortable - The staff was in general very kind and helpful (we had a glass of champagne when we checked-in and they gave some beach toys to our son) - This part of the clearwater beach is for me, the best : no crowd and not plenty of cabins that ruin the view (Like near the Hyatt)  Minor bad things but, you know, when you pay that price : - We asked for a quiet room but they gave us a room with communicating doors so we were able to hear our neighboors. We had to go back to the front desk to change room. The new one was quiet and nice. - when checking out, one valet guy offered free bottles of water to the customers who were leaving…

title: The height of excellence
review: Even though I arrived late after a delayed flight the service was instantly professional. A valet to park the car,  smiling polite and helpful reception staff offering a glass of champagne. Instantly relaxing. Superb sea view junior suite was beautifully appointed and very comfortable. The next 3 days just got better with professional cheerful and knowledgable staff throughout the hotel. Superb food, a delightfully situated hotel. I cannot think of a better hotel that I have styled at. Already planning the next visit even though it involves a transatlantic flight - this hotel is that good.

title: Great stay
review: Dear BurnoFlat,  Thank you very much for your kind comments. I am pleased to hear that your thoroughly enjoyed your stay and are already planning your next trip to visit us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Could not be better
review: My husband and I traveled to the Sandpearl from Jan 18-22. We were met at the Tampa airport by someone from Ambassador Limousine which I booked online (I highly recommend them). It was 1/2 hr to the hotel. The Sandpearl is gorgeous! We were upgraded through our Travelocity package to a junior suite facing the Gulf. The room was spacious and very clean.I also asked that it be on the left side of the resort away from Frenchy's restaurant so it wouldn't be too noisy as other trip advisor users have mentioned.There was a refrigerator in the room which was helpful. On Wed when we arrived, we had lunch at the Clear Sky next door to the resort-good drinks/food-bar quality food. We stocked up on beer/soda etc at CVS which is a block away. We had room service that night which was very…

title: Best hotel stay ever!
review: Dear Benny521,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so pleased to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your time here. I am glad that you found our gulf front junior suite to be spacious and very clean. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Better every visit
review: I have eaten at their beach side cafe and always had a good meal. Locals go for the weekend and enjoy this beautiful resort right on Clearwater Beach. The entire facility is fantastic (but a bit pricey). However, if you are looking for an upscale hotel on the beach, the Sandpearl is a place to consider!

title: Best Hotel in Clearwater
review: We love this hotel!! After a hectic Christmas in Orlando we headed down to Clearwater for some pampering and relaxation.... Our stay at the Sandpearl Resort hotel was simply amazing. My wife celebrated her 40th Birthday here on 4th january 2012. On our arrival the staff were very attentive and this continued throughout our stay. They went above and beyond to make my wife's day extra special this includes her time in the Spa, Poolside Grill and Restaurant at night - great service , fine dining - the food was simply exquisite. The chocolate strawberries sent to the room was a gorgeous gesture and fully enjoyed by the kids!!  I only wish our stay was longer, we will definitely be returning...Thank You Sandpearl.......

title: Awesome!
review: Dear Fabulous40_12,  Thank you for sharing the experience you and your family had here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so thrilled that we could help create lasting memories for your wife’s birthday celebration. Thank you again and we look forward to your return visit.

title: Our Family's favorite resort
review: This hotel is beautiful!. The pool, the beach, the rooms. Tate's Grill was delicious, we didn't try the other restaurant. I found the fitness center to be really nice sized. The Ambassador met us with champagne! She and the staff at the front desk couldn't have been nicer, or more accommodating. We had a gorgeous Jr suite overlooking the gulf. Awesome bathtub, placed where you can watch TV and the ocean at the same time! They had outside movies for the kids one nite at the pool on a blown up screen. Service on the beach, or at the pool. Love, love, loved it!!!!

title: Favorite Hotel in the Tampa Area!
review: Dear MicheleG14466,  I am so glad that you loved our resort! I am pleased to hear you found our staff to be friendly and accommodating. It sounds like  you really enjoyed your gulf front junior suite and the amenities our rooms offer. We hope you and your family have the opportunity to visit with us again soon.

title: Beautiful resort, nice rooms, excellent pool.
review: We've been to many resorts over the years and this is the only one that we've come back to repeatedly. The rooms are spacious and beautifully decorated, the pool is gorgeous, and Caretta on the Gulf, the resort's restaurant is excellent (albeit pricey) whether for drinks and an appetizer on the outdoor balcony overlooking the water, or for a full dinner. Lots of fun things to do with kids, outdoor checkers/chess game, bean toss and ping pong table. Plus the pool concierge has board games available to borrow. Hotel lobby has very comfortable sofas that you could spend hours reading in along with game tables for checkers and chess. Don't miss sunset and smores at the firepit.

title: Great, place to stay
review: His hotel is absolutely amazing.  You can walk right out to the beach and then go swimming in the pool.  We bought chairs at the local grocery store and brought them down to the beach each day.  The chairs you can use from the hotel (or you can rent an umbrella) are not allowed to be used right at the edge of the water.  We actually saw 2 dolphins swimming while our children were making sandcastles on the beach.  The kids got to watch a movie in the pool which they really liked.  The elevators are super fast but there is not a great variety of foods available down by the pool.  Our kids loved the chocolates on their beds each night and the room was well cleaned each day.  Only a few negatives- the restaurant across the street is really loud.  Even on the 7th floor we had to run…

title: Lovely and calming place on the beach
review: Dear Alicia1129,  Thank you for taking the time to share your most recent experience with us. I am glad to hear that you and your children enjoyed the resort. It is always a treat to see dolphins swimming around while basking in the beautiful Florida sun. I do apologize that music from across the street dampened your experience. We do not receive many noise complaints and would address it with the local businesses if their music volume became too loud. Our valet charge is a nightly charge and you are able to access your vehicle as much as you like, our staff are very willing to assist with any items that are left in vehicles, no need to feel silly. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

title: Perfect couple of days
review: This was our 2nd time to the Sandpearl. The first was shortly after they opened about 5 years ago. Coming back this year was just as wonderful, though the rooms are starting to show a little 'wear'. We stayed on the 3rd floor in what I believe was a 'handicap accessible' room. It was very large and open. Our room looked out onto the pool area, though I believe we were directly over the spa since most of our view was blocked somewhat by the roof of the floor below. My only complaints regarding the room were that the patio door was extremely hard to open & close and the vanity mirror on the bathroom mirror (the kind that swings out on an 'arm') was broken and was on the verge of falling apart. My husband & I both had massages at the spa and I had a manicure...the perfect way to…

title: A Stay at the Sandpearl....Be Sure It's on Your "Bucket List"
review: Dear hazel13cleveland, I am so pleased that you and your husband enjoyed ringing in the New Year with us at the Sandpearl Resort. I apologize you had some difficulties with your balcony door I will certainly inform our engineering department about the door and the mirror. I am glad you enjoyed your spa services I will pass along your compliments to Kim. Thank you again and Happy New Year!

title: Fine place to stay
review: We needed a couple of relaxing days from disney and this is it.The whole experience was perfect .Probably the best of many 5 star hotels we have stayed.The room was spotless and the bed superb.Thankyou to all the great staff.

title: Second stay was just as good as the first.
review: This is our second trip to the Sand Pearl from Orlando. This place is wonderful. The rooms are excellent and the service is perfect. Both times we were upgraded to a better room. Im never this lucky. The rooms are very clean. Even the remote for the TV had its own plastic bag. (a good touch, think about it). Me and my girl friend went to the spa. Very nice as well. Dennis was Johnny on the spot with the margarita's while we were laying out on the beach. This is my new favorite for a weekender to Clearwater beach.

title: As good as advertised...
review: Dear DrCarlOrlando,  Welcome back! I am so glad to hear that we were able to upgrade your room for you on your return visit. We certainly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

title: Beautiful Hotel right on the Beach!
review: We spent the Christmas holiday at the Sandpearl Resort and can’t boast enough about our experience.  As most of the previous reviews have stated, the location, facility (lobby, room, pool, spa, work out area), and staff at the Sand Pearl are exceptional. The resort is spotless.    We brought our 5-year-old daughter along and she was treated like a princess. Santa and Mrs. Claus were there too (free gift pictures provided by the resort). Santa did appear slightly Asian, which caused some general confusion by my daughter, but after a little explaining, she was all-in.  He even made his way down to the pool one day—we’re just glad he didn’t remove his red suit or this review might not have been so flattering.  In regard to dining, we visited a number of restaurants during our stay…

title: Fabulous ... as always
review: Dear Chicago Tommyboy,  Thank you very much for you extensive review. I am so glad that you and your family enjoyed the resort as well as the amenities we offer. It sounds like you really enjoyed your time here, we certainly appreciate your business and hope you are able to visit with us again soon.

title: Superb
review: We spent 4 days here after 10 days in Orlando and enjoyed the rest and relaxation in this beautiful hotel.  The hotel is located right on the beach, with stunning views and a beautiful pool area.  Lots of comfy sun loungers available, with staff to take your food/drink orders without having to leave your 'seat'.  Some of the staff were a bit 'over the top' in trying to please. But as per typical USA, service couldn't be faulted. The rooms are really spacious and comfortable and the bathrooms are a great size.  Perfect getaway for couples, with the most beautiful white sandy beach I've ever seen.  The bar/grille was good however, the hotel was really dead in the evenings and we had to venture further afield for any sort of 'life'.  There isn't a great selection of places to eat…

title: Everything about the SandPearl resort is exquisite!
review: We were always greeted by bellmen and valet staff every time we left or returned to the resort.  Yes, valet parking is $20 per day, but well worth it.  They are prompt and courteous and your car is available without waiting when you need it.  Check in and Checkout was fast and error free.  We stayed in a king suite room 848.  Excellent view of the beach and property, 2 balconies, huge bathroom, big comfortable bed, and a wonderful kitchen with stainless steel kitchenaid products.  Breakfast on the patio at Caretta on the Gulf was awesome; Great views of the gulf with exceptional food.  The spa was small, but still very eloquent and the staff was very accommodating and customer oriented.   You must try the nachos at Tate Island Grill.  We spent a lot of time at the pool, beach,…

title: Best hotel on the gulf
review: I have stayed here several times and everytime had a wonderful stay. The staff is friendly and accommodating, especially kiersten at the front desk. The rooms reasonably priced for what they have to offer- comfort, luxury, and a beautiful view. Plus what's not to love about a resort that greets you with a glass of champagne upon check in

title: Beautiful hotel, but not for families
review: Dear Ashleybenny,  Thank you for your kind words, I will certainly pass along your compliments of Kirsten. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we hope you are able to visit with us again soon.

title: Fabulous Anniversary Weekend!!
review: A beautiful hotel in a stunning location, the beach had the finest white sand I had ever seen. I didn't however feel that this hotel was for families. The children's club was not running whilst we were there, and there were daily conferences taking place. It felt a bit 'stuffy' and although it would be a wonderful place for couples (great gym) I didn't feel it was the best place to be with children and would not return.

title: Wow!  Awesome!
review: Dear GMLee,  I apologize that you feel our resort was not family friendly, this time of year we do have more business travelers than families however we do lend out a variety of children’s games and there are a variety of children activities within a short walking distance of the resort. The Sandpearl Resort strives to accommodate all types of travelers. I do encourage you to return to our resort possibly in the summer months when children are out of school and the resort is filled with more families.

title: You derserve the Sandpearl
review: Fantastic experience I wanted to keep it our secret but great things should be shared. We were to stay at a 4 star down the street but after seeing the set up and location we got back into our car and found THE SAND PEARL. It was our wedding anniversary so we wanted to escape for a few days before visiting with family. We ended up staying an extra night and if I had my way we would still be there.  The service was outstanding. First impression was a friendly valet named Ken who directed us inside to Tyler at the front desk. This guy was nice, helpful, and informative and took care of us from the second we entered the building. He made us feel so welcomed. The lobby and facilities are outstanding. The entire staff goes out of their way to give a warm relaxing feeling to the…

title: Fantastic Resort
review: Dear Kathy L,   WOW! I am so glad that your and your husband enjoyed celebrating your wedding anniversary here at the Sandpearl Resort. Thank you for taking the time to mention the staff members that assisted in making your vacation memorable. I will certainly share your kind words with them. We hope you are able to visit with us again soon.

title: Very Nice Hotel
review: We stayed at the Sandpearl Resort for 3 nights at the beginning of December. This resort is beautiful, clean and new. The rooms are big and the bathrooms are spacious. I just cannot say enough about how nice our stay was at the resort. The staff are so friendly and helpful, the main doors are always held for you and we received champagne upon our arrival. The pool was warm and clean.  We had no problem finding a nice spot to sit at the pool or the beach each day. The pool wait staff are very attentive and friendly. The spa was beautiful and worth every penny. The beach is big and clean and you can walk for miles. There are plenty of restaurants and shops within walking distance of the resort. The only negatives that I can say about our stay were: Tates Grill  - we had dinner…

title: Beautiful Resort!!!!
review: This is the third Preferred Hotel Group property I have stayed in recently.  This holds up to the quality of Preferred Properties, although the Trump Tower in Las Vegas we nicer. Beautiful Rooms... the Beach is HUGE... Great looking pool, nice lobby, turn down service.  all in all.. very very good.

title: Wow Wow Wow
review: Amorace,   Thank you for your kind words. It sounds like you really enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Love the Sandpearl
review: This was our 2nd time staying at the Sandpearl.  The location is exceptional and the accomodations are quite nice.  I did notice that it is looking just a bit worn and the staff have lost a bit of their hospitality edge we previously experienced.  Also not too thriled with Dasani in the rooms for water - yuck - it screams cheap and this is not a cheap resort.  Some advice - I noticed quite a few guests commenting on the additional charges such as resort fees, valet, etc.  You may want to include those and just raise the price.

title: Best beach and location on Gulf Coast
review: Dear Gators17,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your stay. I apologize if you felt as though our staff was not up to par during your last visit. It is the goal of all of our staff to create an exceptional experience for all of our guests. Our resort fee is a standard fee that includes an array of amenities convenient in one single charge. Our valet charge is not included with the rate as some of our guests do not have vehicles during their stay.

title: Class act!
review: This is a great hotel on a fantastic beach.   Clearwater is completely self contained, and the location makes it that you don't need a car to get to anything.   If you love long walks on the beach, you can hike to Caladesi Park which is like being in the Caribbean.  Try to get ocean exposure, or the North side so you can see the sunsets.  There is a great pool, but it gets somewhat crowded and there is no area to swim laps.  The restaurant was a disappointment in terms of slow service and somewhat formal considering the location, but there is a lot around the hotel.  The spa is really really great.   Really great.   Looking forward to going back.

title: Excellent hotel/excellent beach
review: Dear Mimibee,   I am glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. Clearwater beach does have many shops and restaurants just steps from the resort.   I do apologize that you received slow service in our main dining room, I will certainly pass along your comments to our food and beverage team. It sounds as though you enjoyed your time spent at the spa, we hope you are able to return soon.

title: Nice luxury gem in Clearwater
review: I told just one person it my wife's birthday and the whole staff responded in many memorable ways. First, the suite was huge and more importantly extremely comfortable. Let's not forget the fabulous view from our top floor corner suite. We enjoyed the beach, warm pool and hot tub. A big jacuzzi tub and shower in our room. Left the balcony door opened and listened to the wind and surf. The location was beautiful but the staff made it an occasion we will never forget!!! A BIG thanks to all.

title: Expensive but worth every penny!
review: Spent 4 great days here in October. This was our second visit and will not be the last. We had a fantastic room with balcony looking out to sea. You are literally on the beach. Hotel is very clean and very well managed. Pool area second to none. Good choice of bars and restaurants nearby. It's not cheap but then the best rarely is.

title: Great Weekend Escape
review: Dear Chris3186346,   I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. It sounds like you really enjoyed the resort as well as the local area. We appreciate your business and look hope you have the opportunity to return soon.

title: Nice and quiet part of Clearwater - best around!
review: I went for the weekend to attend my cousin's wedding.  The hotel was very nice.  The rooms were very clean and we had a balcony overlooking the pool/ocean.  My cousin got married on the beach and then had a reception in one of the banquet rooms.  The food at the reception was amazing.  By far the best banquet food I have ever had.  I know the hotel had food by the pool and room service but I didn't use any of those services.  I really liked that there were several good restaurants and some shops within walking distance of the hotel.  Great Location, Great Service, Great Trip.

title: Far surpassed my expectations, amazing resort!
review: Dear AmandaW,   I am so pleased that you had such a wonderful time here at the Sandpearl Resort at your cousin’s wedding. It sounds like you really enjoyed your room and the local area. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: been to many 5 star hotels and resort and this ranks on my Top List.
review: I took my wife and two daughters (9 and 15) away for a long weekend and the Sandpearl Resort exceeded our expectations.  From the moment you arrive to the last trip out the door, you are treated like royalty.  The staff was friendly, the rooms immaculate, food was great, but the beach and this resorts location, to the quiet northern end of Clearwater Beach, is the best.  And the pool is even better.    We are already planning a return.  I would recomend to anyone looking for a family vacation to a romantic weekend.

title: “Absolutely Awesome but need to get rid of the resort fees
review: really is a great hotel in a great area  drinks a little bit pricey but everythink else is really nice the hotel needs to drop the parking fees and the highly priced resort fees (hopefully the hotel will take note)

title: Third times a charm!
review: Dear Viewsonic321,   Thank you for your feedback in regards to your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl  Resort. I am glad you enjoyed the resort as well as the Clearwater Beach area. Are parking fees are competitively priced compared to other resorts on the beach, as is our resort fee. I will certainly pass along your comments. Thank you again.

title: 5 Star Pricing but 2 Star Service
review: My husband and I just returned home after a 7 night stay at the beautiful Sandpearl Resort.  We discovered this gem in 2009 and have made a point to return each year since.   The hotel decor inside and out is beautiful.  Deciding whether to sit by the beautiful pool or on the beach was the decision of the day.  Staff at the activity counter always helpful with a warm towel ready and the fresh fruit favored water always filled. The food experience at the Sandpearl is wonderful, whether you want something casual at Tate's Island Grill by the pool (must try the Carribbean Grilled Grouper), the Caretta on the Gulf has a beautiful lounge(best Caretta Club and organic spinach salad) and restaurant.  The weekend buffet breakfast at Caretta has a terrific selection.We didn't even need a…

title: Florida West Coast Luxury
review: Dear Goodtimesmarkham,   It sounds as though you had an excellent time here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad that you found our staff so pleasant and helpful. I will certainly share your kind words with our entire staff. We appreciate your business and look forward to your next return visit!

title: Soooooo Beautiful and the Service is amazing!
review: Shocked.....I am shocked and dismayed at the poor service for such a reportedly high end property. We stayed as group for a company incentive reward. Check-in was miserable, even though there was an adorable woman passing out champagne to incoming guests. We got there around 11:30 AM and were told our room was not ready yet. No problem, we went for lunch. When we came back around 1:30, we were again told the room was not ready. I had asked the front desk person what we were supposed to do as we wanted to enjoy the lovely weather pool and beach side. She told us there was nothing she could do and told us to our bags from the bellman, get our suits and change in the bathroom. So here we are in a lovely resort in the middle of the lobby unpacking our stuff to find our bathing…

title: Nice Location -- But.......Service?
review: Having been a customer of the Sandpearl for the past three years, I have to admit that I was shocked and stunned about my recent experiences with their perception of customer service.    I travel frequently and only write up a few of the hotels that I stay in, and if you look at my record, these reviews are for the most part quite positive.    I have never run into a front desk manager of a hotel that had such an amazingly poor view of what customer service was, and after having stayed here for three years running I can only state for a fact that I will never be back.  What you do, is up to you.    The Good:  The Sandpearl is located on a wonderful stretch of beach with fantastic white sand and great views of the sunset over the water.   If you happen to be lucky enough to have…

title: The Sandpearl - "A reminder that I live in paradise"
review: My BF and I live in Tampa, FL. It is 40 minutes door to door from our house to the resort. Last week we both happened to have the same days off and decided to take a  one night "stay-cation"  to relax and spend some time together. I had previously eaten at the resort's Caretta on the Gulf  for a work function and decided then, upon seeing it, that I definitely wanted to come back for a visit. I was not disappointed. We checked in on a Monday evening where we were greeted with complimentary champagne in a very beautiful and serene lobby. Our room was a beautiful ocean front room. On the smaller side but immaculately cleaned (which to me is priceless) and nicely appointed with a roomy bathroom, comfy bed and great view of the ocean. We dropped off our things and went down to…

title: Best 5 star resort in Tampa Bay-One of a kind Beachy Elegance
review: Dear Cici14,   It is so easy to get caught up in the day to day, I am so glad that you and your boyfriend were able to “stopped to smell the roses” here at the Sandpearl Resort. It sounds like your you really enjoyed Caretta on the Gulf, our signature restaurant. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: SANDPEARL HOTEL CLEARWATER   ***** STARS
review: I have visited many 5 star resorts. Rarely, do you find a blend of relaxing, peaceful elegance without pretentiousness.   The decor and artwork are one of a kind in Tampa Bay. We did not budge from the pool area for 2 days. There is a fine dining restaurant with bar. Also, there is the casual beach bar restaurant. Food is delicious.  The staff is always available, professional but NOT in your face.  The rooms are beautiful and comfortable and have earned their rating.  We live locally and go to the Sand Pearl to decompress on a regular basis.  A special "Thank You" to April Cole in reservations for going beyond, helping with our reservations.  We will continue to visit the Sand Pearl, Tampa Bays Best Secret.

title: Upscale luxury on Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Susan d,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about our Resort. Our staff truly prides themselves on providing all of our guests with exceptional service. I am glad that the Sandpearl Resort is an escape from the hustle and bustle and allows you and your family time to relax and unwind.

title: Great family resort, but a lot of extra costs
review: We wanted a relaxed week on the beach with our small children (2 and 4 years old) and that's exactly what we got. I just love this resort! I'ts simply beautiful and we had the most wonderful beach and pool view from our room.  The classy lobby has an "autoplaying" piano, which to me seemed a little silly, but it might just be a cultural thing - we're from Sweden.   The room was really nice and clean. We loved to wake up to the wonderful view (from the bed!) and we enjoyed the balcony a lot. Though, I was somewhat surprised when cotton pads and such weren't loaded when they were finished and also when we asked for two additional water bottles one night and got the answer that there's only two included in each room - for the price we paid to stay there for almost a week, it…

title: Fine sugar beaches
review: Dear Mrs. Hagman,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed the resort and the amenities we offer. In reference to your comment about breakfast, we do offer some packages that include breakfast, should you wish to have this included in a future stay. Our resort fee is standard and includes many items including wired and wireless internet access, in room coffee, bottled water, towel service, and shoe shine, as well as 24 access to our business and fitness centers. We appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Best Honeymoon At The Sandpearl!!!
review: The Sandpearl resort is located on one of the finest, widest, sand like sugar beaches this side of the Gulf....sweet heaven.  Beach loungers, Adirondack chairs and a fire pit make for utter beach comfort.  We had the added benefit of the best seats in the house for the end of summer boat show on Sunday.  A gorgeously landscaped pool area, with cabanas, hot tubs ans a beach side grill completes the picture.  I understand that there are many other ammenties, full service spa, nice restaurant, and free bicycles, as well as family movie nights and s'mores out by the fire pit, but we didn't have time for everything.  There were day trips as well, but you had to sign up a day ahead of time to participate, so we didn't take advantage of any of them either. We did take advantage of our…

title: Great experience all around
review: Dear Cbindermac,   Thank you for taking the time to comment on your most recent stay, I am so pleased to hear you had such a wonderful time. I hope your next trip will allow you the time to explore this area further. Hope to see you soon!

title: Good but our room was showing signs of age!
review: I had to find the time in my busy schedule to write this review.  We were just blown away by the Sandpearl and I think it's important to share our experience with others who are looking for a wonderful resort to spend your vacation.   Let me start by saying that our first part of our honeymoon was a 7D/6N Carnival Legend cruise to the "Exotic Western Caribbean".  I place that in quotations as I feel that the "Exotic Caribbean" we were dreaming of lies right in Clearwater Beach at the Sandpearl!  We paid over $300/Night for a Vista Suite on Carnival to make our honeymoon wonderful.  We were less than impressed and I've been cruising for about 15 years.  Sadly, we only had 4D/3N at the Sandpearl. Here's what made it amazing... We stepped out of our $80 cab ride (from the Port of…

title: Top notch hotel, with great staff
review: My wife and I went to the Sandpearl for a short honeymoon get-away weekend. The hotel is quite nice, and has a spacious meeting area in the lobby (with a Grand piano playing music) with a great view of the pool and Gulf beach.  At check-in, we were offered a glass of Prosecco.  They offer an on-site spa, and have a great restaurant as well (Caretta).  The staff was extremely pleasant during our stay, and couldn't do enough to please us.  Furnishings were clean and relatively new.  In addition, the resort is within walking distance of several nice restaurants, and is a brief walk to Pier 60 and it's weekend activities.  Overall, we'd have to say that the Sandpearl is certainly one of the best (if not the best) hotel for the money on Clearwater Beach.

title: Sandpearl Delivers Again
review: Dear MarkTampaBay,    I am glad our staff at the Sandpearl Resort we able to create a memorable honeymoon weekend for you and your wife. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

title: Exceptional Resort
review: This is our third visit to the Sandpearl and it was as wonderful as we remembered!  There have been some changes we were disappointed with, but overall it was a great stay.  We stayed four days this time, and love coming in late September when it's typically quiet there.  They were in the midst of replacing carpet in a lot of the rooms so everything looked fresh.  We stayed on the south side which gives you a view of the beach and the bay...it also overlooks the roof of part of the hotel.  This is our second time on this side and we realized the noise was much louder from the fans on the roof on higher floors.  We couldn't hear the ocean at all over all the noise, if you choose to stay on this side request the fourth floor.  The balconies are much bigger and it's quieter.    The…

title: Luxury by the beach
review: Dear Minnow1982,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay. I am so pleased that you and your family enjoyed your stay. I will certainly pass on your comments in regards to our pool side chairs. We look forward to seeing again soon.

title: Relaxing getaway
review: The Sandpearl is an exceptional resort with very high standards.  The resort is extremely well maintained and the rooms are EXTREMELY clean.  The spa and fitness center are fantastic, and the restaurants at the resort are very good.  While the property itself is immaculate and offers breathtaking views, it's the friendly, professional and attentive staff that puts this resort over the top.  Everyone, and I mean everyone, goes out of their way to ensure all needs are met.  The staff at the Sandpearl are genuinely committed to providing outstanding service.  We will definitely return to the Sandpearl, and I highly recommend this resort to anyone visiting Clearwater Beach.

title: One week to the Sandpearl!
review: We have stayed at the Sandpearl twice in the past 3 years and this will be our third stay.  We have never been disappointed and can't imagine it will be anything less than fantastic!  From the time we check in and get a refreshing drink to the time we checkout has always been paradise.  Hopefully with our IPrefer card there will be a room upgrade available!  Based on the reviews it seems that some things have changed but I hope not! See you next Thursday Sandpearl!  I'll be writing a review after we get back!

title: Much better 2 years ago !
review: Dear Sandybeach1968,   Thank you for your continued patronage. We look forward to your arrival!

title: A True Diamond in the Rough!
review: Came back because of such a good time 2 years ago at this resort, only to find it has been bought by a team of investors and about 30 of the staff have been sacked, for financial reasons.  The reception room had gone and replaced with a tacky expensive clothes shop.  The level of service has dropped and the morale of the staff is so obviously effected.  We did not like the junior suite we had been given so the next day I went down to reception and asked to be moved, the next room was excellent.  The next day I passed by reception and made a point of thanking the man who changed my room, I said 'thanks for that room, its really nice, you moved me yesterday' he replied, oh did I?  and that just about reflects the interest in the staff.  After 5 days of having my car brought round…

title: Wonderful Time
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay.  It gives me valuable feedback that I can share with our team as well as correct any misunderstandings.  In your response you mentioned that the hotel was bought by a team of investors.  This is not accurate.  A large portion of the ownership remains the same since day one.  There are new owners involved, however they are not a team of investors.  They are a very highly respected management company that own and operate many top end resorts throughout the United States and Canada.  We have moved our retail shop into the lobby of the hotel.  This has been highly received by our guests as they no longer need to leave the hotel to purchase items.  We offer high end name brands such as Tommy Bahama, Nat Nast, Vera Bradley, Brighton and more.    You also mentioned that non-guests were walking in and out of the pool.  We do several things to guarantee that only guests utilize our pool.  When issuing towels we verify guests name and room number to make sure they are registered guests.  If a guest has a towel that is not one of ours we address the guest and ask for their room information.  If they can not provide we politely ask them to leave.  We also do not permit anyone to bring items such as beer or coolers into our pool area.  We do our very best to police these issues.  If these issues happened during your stay with us I am very sorry.  I will address each item with the team.  Again, I thank you for taking the time to write your review.  At your convenience and if you feel it appropriate I would like to speak personally regarding your stay.  You may contact me at the hotel.  I would love to have you come back to the Sandpearl during your next visit to Clearwater Beach.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: We'll be back!
review: We went to Tampa for business and had the weekend to find a nice hotel to spend the weekend.  I drove to Clearwater Beach  looking for a place to hang our hat while my husband had meetings.   Wow, I could not believe how worn the area looked and thought maybe we made a mistake to stay here for the weekend.  Thank goodness I stumbled across  the SandPearl.  They had one room left and it was fantastic!  High ceilings, a great view of the ocean, terrific sunsets from the bar by the pool.  The pool was beautiful and the beach in front of the property was very nice.  They had the best Italian dinner place just down the street.  If you stay in or very near the hotel you will be happy, if you walk to far you might get a little scared and nervous!!! Thank goodness for this little…

title: Love this hotel....
review: This hotel is great, the staff is awesome and so nice. Beautiful beach and not too crowded. Pool was great, The rooms were amazing, The bar on the beach has great drinks and really good food, the bartenders were fun and had great suggestions on things to do in the area.

title: Pool great for kids
review: Dear ChicagoNikola,   Thank you for your feedback from your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. Our staff prides ourselves on providing our guest with great experiences; I am so please that your and your friends enjoyed our resort.

title: Service is Great, but why the charges?
review: We wanted to try out Florida instead of continuing to plunk down money for Hawaii.  Relatively, for the same quality of hotel, Sandpearl is cheaper.  The grounds were clean, the pool was great...atleast during the time we were there, there were always lounge chairs available.  There were no snobby people who look down at us bringing kids as pretty much every one visiting had kids along.  Maybe it's during this time of the year (end of August), but most of the people we met were Europeans.  The mix is also mostly Caucasians; we finally saw another Asian family there at the end of the week.  Being from California, this is a mild culture shock.   The pool attendants/wait staff were incredibly good.  We had a tab running every day and the servers went out of their way to accomodate…

title: There is no question we would return.  On the same level as a Ritz without the "stuffiness".
review: Dear TheC,  Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your stay with us. I am so please you and your family enjoyed the pool and beach area. I will certainly share your recommendations on a sand bar in our pool however our pool is a zero entry which allows one to ease into the pool gradually. We appreciate your business and hope we are able to welcome you back again soon.

title: A True "Pearl"
review: We just arrived home from a weekend stay.  They had great pool side and beach side service.  The drinks are large, but not cheap.  However, when you get the bill, there is an 18% service charge on the bill.  The beach is beautiful and well groomed, but if you want a chair and an unbrella, you have to cough $25. A woman walked around asking is we wanted to do water aerobics for 1/2 hour.  The charge was $15 for a half hour.  It was a jammed Labor Day weekend, but the women's bathroom smelled awful by the mid-afternoon.  The pool was o.k..  Unless you take a cab, which is highly unlikely, they make you pay a $20 daily valet fee.  Then, you get the $25/day resort fee.  The pool was o.k., not great, and the towels were very nice, but if we get charged an extra $25 resort fee on top…

title: This resort is paradise................
review: We stayd at this hotel to celebrate my 50th birthday. We were greeted with a glass of champagne and made to feel so special from the moment we arrived at this hotel.  We stayed in a junior suite on the 6th floor, the room was amazing and the view from the balcony over the gulf was breath taking. the staff could not do enough for us. This is an excellent hotel and would highly recommend if you ever visit clearwater that you choose this wonderful hotel.

title: very nice stay but top dollar
review: Dear ChrisandIan174,   Happy Birthday! Thank you for your wonderful comments about your stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so glad you enjoyed your junior suite! We look forward to welcoming you back again next year.

title: Fabulous!- even if Im out of a pair of shoes.
review: We just returned from a three-night getaway (we're locals).  I booked a package with breakfast for two each day and a $25 resort credit per night -- more about that in a bit.  Everything is just as lovely and clean as all the other reviews mention and the staff is wonderful but you have to keep prompting them.  I'm an "I Prefer" member but had to ask for my "complimentary" upgrade.  We got a room that had a connecting door which was fine until a crying baby showed up the second night.  I should have asked for the room they were going to give me AFTER the room they were going to give me.  After a long night, went to the desk and were immediately moved -- a junior gulfront suite!  It was gorgeous!   We ate at Tate Grille and Carretta's.  Food was very good.  Kids were running…

title: Fees, Fees, Fees
review: Dear SLM941,   Thank you for being a member of the I Prefer program. I apologize for the problems you encounter with your membership and the resort credit. All of our guests that book packages are reviewed carefully to ensure that proper billing takes place. Please know that we strive for excellence and I sincerely apologize for the error in billing at check out and I am glad that we were able to resolve it for you. I do hope you enjoyed the gulf front junior suite and hope that you are able to visit with us again soon.

title: Beautiful Clearwater Beach Resort
review: Clearwater Beach is a favorite get away of mine from Orlando. Its a short trip, the beaches are amazing white sugar sand. The water is Caribbean clean, and there is always lots to do in Tampa/Clearwater. The only problem is unless you are staying in a hotel there parking is big time impossible. This rules out a day trip.     Usually we stay at the Hilton. Its nice, but its seems they always screw up the reservations some how. They have always made good, but they do need to overhaul their corporate reservation center. The Sand Pearl is just North of the Hilton. It is a BIG step up. This place is sweet. Our room had the smell of brand new carpet and was squeaky clean. Everything looked as if it were new. The bed was excellent, sheets were like 300 threat count. The service was…

title: Beautiful gem in Clearwater
review: I stayed here on a short business trip. The hotel is beautiful with nice public areas and well appointed rooms. Service from check in to check out was exceptional. Be aware that there is a $25 per day resort fee.  Rooms: Well appointed with comfortable bed, flat screen TV, nice bathrooms (Dental floss as amenity, nice touch), "Pod" type coffee maker, nice balcony, and beautiful Gulf view!  Pool: Was not huge, but very nice, lush and comfortable. Comfortable chairs and many have adjustable covers on them. The coolest thing was the fact that you have a flag on your chair that you can put up when you want service. Why doesn't every resort do that! It just makes so much sense. Put your flag up and 2 minutes later someone is asking you what you need. I had great drinks and good food…

title: A wonderful holiday
review: Dear Brianm99,   Thank you for sharing your thoughts about your stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad that you enjoyed the amenities we offer, and enjoyed your dining experience; I will pass along to our manager Brian your kinds words. I apologize that you experienced problems with your internet; we do have a technical support line to assist with any internet connection issues that should arise. I am also sorry you were not satisfied with the quality of your shoe shine, our bellmen do shine the shoes by hand, utilizing a brush and shoe polish.

title: Check your Bill
review: ten days at sandpearl visiting from England and we had a fabulous time! From arrival with glass of bubbly to concierges and all stAff around hotel in particular the Starbucks ladies and amenities staff we were very much looked after location amazing straight onto private beach and considering aug not too packed  very relaxed time had by all thank u ! Would definetly go again  if I were to say anything negative it would be cost of valet parking and can be costly when u also tipping on top but costs are upfront and visible

title: Great Resort
review: Dear Janetmcauley,   WOW! Ten days, it sounds like you were able to thoroughly enjoy the resort and the amenities we offer. Thank you for your kind words, I will certainly share them with our staff.

title: Room with a view + top service!
review: The place was very nice and most of the staff was very friendly, BUT one night we ordered room service which totaled $73 I believe. When the lady came up to deliver it, I asked if I could pay cash. I gave her $80 which I thought was generous since there was already a delivery charge and tip included in the bill. When we checked the receipt after our stay we noticed a $90 room service charge. After we inquired with the hotel we found out that not only had we still been charged the room service on our bill (which otherwise could have been a mix-up), but the server (I believe her name was Julie) had written in her own tip and signed our bill for $90 to the room! I presume she pocketed the cash. I would expect much more from a place like this than to hire thieves. Very disappointing.

title: Best Spot on Clearwater Beach
review: This Hotel is wonderful in every way  The front desk staff were extremely helpful. The beach and pool areas are beautiful.

title: Great location and beach, hotel pool too crowded for swimming, nice spa
review: Dear Channelkatz,   Thank you for the compliments on our front office staff and ambiance of our pool and beach area, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Great Hotel!
review: Being there for 25th company anniversary this was a great place to be, unfortunately too little time to enjoy the holiday location. The hotel was clean and still not too big/too much concrete to be impersonal like the Hilton`s of this world. The restaurant was excellent, spa, too.

title: Dont Miss out on the Sushi
review: Dear MattBavaria,  Congratulations on your company’s 25th anniversary! I am so glad that you found the Sandpearl Resort to be a naturally refined destination. We hope to see you again next year or possibly earlier for a vacation of your own.

title: AMAZING AND BEAUTIFUL!!!!
review: My husband and I met my cousin and her husband for the weekend at the Sandpearl.  It was a very nice resort.  The views were gorgeous and the pool area was luxurious.  One evening we had dinner at Caretta's on the Gulf, which was amazing.  3 of us had the halibut with corn and couscous.  It was an outstanding dish.  My husband and I live in Naples, and we have not had a better fish entree anywhere else in FL.  Overall, this place is a great.  My only complaint would be all the fees that are not included in the initial price...  Like a "resort fee".

title: Beautiful resort, beautiful location!
review: My husband and I visited this hotel for a quick, short trip to Clearwater in Feb 2011. The hotel was beautifully appointed and our water-front room was beautiful. The weather was chilly at that time of the year and was too cold to use the pool or the poolside facilities. We did visit the pool bar and was pretty good. We actually went to the local superTarget and got food and beer for our room (small fridge in there came in very handy!), which was much cheaper than the beer offered on tap by the hotel. The hotel is in a great spot close to shops and restaurants. The staff was very nice and polite. The only way to park was valet (which I totally hate) but I have to admit it was really nice and convenient. I would HIGHLY recommend this hotel. Very beautiful and dream of returning…

title: WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE
review: Dear ONURx,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences on your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. We are glad you and your husband enjoyed the resort and the local area. We hope that your dreams of returning to the resort will soon come true!

title: Can't really ask for more!
review: We just got back from a wonderful experience here at Sandpearl.  The support staff was the best I have seen.  After a long day at pool as we were leaving our 8 yr old boy told staff that he had lost some of his toys, by surprise staff payed close attention and at end of conversation he told him that he would look everywhere for his toys.  After a wonderful meal at Frenches (across street) we went back to room and there was toys sitting on our bed with 2 chocolates.  To be super critical the only things I could have to warn about is that Tate's is under staffed, there did not seem to be assigned areas for waiters in restaurant. TIP: If you are like us we have had bad experiences with leaving open credit cards at front desk, therefor we have been using prepaid cards if you do this…

title: Even better second time around
review: Right on the beach, walking distance to Pier 60, but far enough that the beach was not crowded. Rooms were large and clean. Bathroom was big! Beds were comfortable. The view from our room was not great (maybe because we booked through Allegiant), but we spend most of our time outdoors, so it wasn't a big negative. Service was great, people were nice, pleasant and helpful. There were drinking stations for cold water (with cucumber or lemon) close to the beach and pool. Be warned that there are resort fees, fees for renting beach umbrellas and valet parking. There's a self-park lot, but we were dissuaded from using it because they said it was 4 blocks away and full. The spa was really relaxing and high-end. We'd stay in this resort again if we were to go back to Clearwater!

title: Wow!!!  Great experience at Sandpearl!
review: Dear Filimaui,   I am pleased you found our resort staff to be pleasant and helpful. Our staff prides themselves on going the extra mile for our guest, it is important to us that each an every guest enjoys their stay. I am glad you enjoyed our lemon and cucumber water stations near our pool and beach area. We hope you are able to return to Clearwater Beach soon.

title: A Real Life "Happily Ever After" Wedding....
review: Planning a destination wedding is NEVER easy and never having stayed or seen the Sandpearl personally we chose the resort merely from online reviews, vendor reviews, and pervious visits to the Clearwater Beach area.  We worked with Debbie Glancy in the catering and events department and she was the absolute greatest. She made everything about planning the whole event effortless and fun.  We were so excited to see the resort and upon our arrival were truly surprised by the level of class and sophistication that the Sandpearl provided to us and our guests for the whole stay. Everything from the moment we arrived was PERFECT and beyond our imagination. We were never stressed and every member of the Sandpearl staff was attentive and more than willing to help us with anything. I…

title: Amazing Place, but beware pool area room charges
review: Dear LiveToTravelAlways11,   Congratulations on your wedding! Thank you for choosing to celebrate such a special day here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am pleased to hear that Debbie Glancy and her team helped to make all your dreams come true. We wish you years of health, happiness, and love.

title: Excellent hotel great location but minor niggles
review: Splurged for the Mandalay Suite and were not dissapointed!  Had a side room so a view of both the bay and the Gulf from our 2 balconies.  Room was impeccably clean and well appointed.  In-room washer/dryer was a great bonus that we did not expect.  The full stainless kitchen had everything you would need.  Staff was extremely polite from clothing store to coffee shop and beyond.  They were out of their signature "Coconut cups" at the pool bar.  On our last night we asked again but they were still out.  Later that night, a server showed up at our room and gave us 2 because their shipment had finally arrived.  A very nice gesture.  One "BEWARE" which is very significant to me and causes 4 stars instead of 5 (should almost be 3 stars!).  Drinks purchased while standing at the pool…

title: A beautiful hotel
review: This was our second stay at the Sandpearl and the hotel and the location are still as great a ever.   After a two hour drive from Orlando, we were offered two glasses of sparkling wine at reception and were upgraded to a larger room with a sofa and a nice balcony for no additional charge, a nice touch. The hotel lobby and rooms are still as we remembered them and are not showing any signs of ware and tear after two years. The breakfast buffet is really good and children eat for free so is much better value than the cafe opposite the hotel, would definitely recommend. The hotel pool is wonderful and the staff attentive. Food offered by the pool is good value and sandwiches are big enough to be shared. The beach is brilliant White sand and really quiet first thing in the morning.…

title: Nice, but not great
review: Dear Woodm1,  Thank you for sharing your thought in regards to your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. I am glad you found the property to be in mint condition. We have done a bit of remodeling of our lobby area and we now offer Collections, our boutique shop, just off the main entrance of the resort. I apologize for the smoking that occurred during your stay, we do have a designated smoking area beyond our boardwalk. I will share your thoughts with our security team to enforce smoking in our designated area only. Thank you again for sharing your thoughts.

title: One for the memory books!!!!
review: We just returned yesterday from a five day stay at the Sandpearl Resort and all I can say is “AMAZING”!  From the first minute we arrived until the very end of our stay, we were pampered and treated extremely well.  Kathryn made us feel welcome when we first arrived and gave us so much of her time and attention.  Thank you, thank you, thank you for making us feel so special!  We had nothing but great service during our entire stay.  A big thanks also to Jason, one of the pool wait staff.  You were so attentive to our refreshment needs.  You went out of your way to give the best possible customer service and were always such a friendly face to see each day.  The valet and door service was phenomenal and every Sandpearl staff member that we came in contact with was so very…

title: Fantastic Location! Top Notch Service.
review: Dear Linda and Family,   I am so pleased to hear that from beginning to end, your stay at the Sandpearl Resort was amazing! Thank you for recognizing several of our staff members by name, I will certainly share your comments with our team. We hope the Sandpearl Resort will continue to be a special place in your hearts.

title: Oasis for the weary
review: We came to the Sandpearl for a short 6 day stay, and although it rained one day for the entire day and half of the next, we had gorgeous weather after that.  Check in was lightning fast and valet service was almost always very quick to serve us.  I complemented the manager on the incredible staff.  Our waitress at the Tate Grill remembered my son's name and our waiters at the beach always greeted us by name, thanks Leah, Tia and Jason!  Jana at the grill was fantastic too.  We have stayed at many high end properties in both the US and outside of the states, and this was every bit if not nicer than them all.  You have to understand that you will get charged for the beach umbrellas, but the chairs themselves are free!  I didn't know this until our last day.  There are plenty of…

title: One of THE BEST hotels I've EVER stayed at!
review: Dear Dallasmom2,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your most recent stay here at the Sandpearl Resort. We are so pleased that you found our staff to be fantastic! I will certainly share your kind words with our team. We hope to see you and your family again soon.

title: The Positive Reviews are RIGHT
review: We had been in St. Petersburg and decided to leave the hotel we had been staying in due to the lack of attention that had been paid to it in recent months.  We were on the cusp of spring break and loathed the idea of spending time at the beach with the college crowd.  We headed to Clearwater in search of a welcoming place that provided the sort of luxury that was lacking at the last place and OMG...we certainly found it at Sandpearl!  This place is INCREDIBLE!  I was seeking a place that would pamper me as I had been taking care of an ill relative and this place was the oasis I was seeking.  We came without a reservation and the manager took us on a tour where we were able to personally select the sort of room we wanted.  It was the end of spring break and less busy than I…

title: We loved it and didn't want to leave
review: From the moment we arrived we loved the Sandpearl. Everyone was so friendly and helpful. Fantastic service, great pool and the room was gorgeous - the entire hotel was spotless. I would recommend the Sandpearl to anyone thinking of going to Clearwater - This is the first time I have written a review on Tripadvisor - but I loved it so much I thought I thought I'd better let you know!

title: Top Notch, But Full of Children
review: Dear MrsCawood,   Thank you for taking the time to write your first response on Trip Advisor about your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. We are so pleased you found our staff so friendly and helpful, our staff strives to ensure all of our guests have a wonderful stay! We hope to welcome you back again soon.

title: Still lux, but slipping
review: Very nice stay.  Excellent hotel, excellent food & service in the restaurants.  As always, the beach is superb (although it is pretty much just as nice a beach in the lower rent districts several miles south).  Just be aware that it is a family hotel/resort with many children, especially in the pool on weekends.  These are generally upscale families who watch over their children with an eagle eye, but the kids ae there.  We are empty nesters and had an undisturbed stay in a room towards the end of the hall on an upper floor. We didn't mind the families down at the pool since we knew what to expect. Everyone knows this resort isn't cheap, but be prepared; the umbrellas (each with two beach chairs) that the resort sets out are (IIRC) $25/day.  Okay if you'e there all day but since…

title: Best Place We've Ever Stayed
review: Dear Exceptional999,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences you had here at the Sandpearl Resort. The Sandpearl Resort was rated by Travel & Leisure World’s Best Awards number 23 for “America’s Best Family Hotels 2010”. As a family friendly resort we do see an increase of children on property during summer months and holidays. Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

title: Outstanding Resort
review: My partner and I stayed here for a weekend getaway, which was our third visit to the Sandpearl. Although still one of the top resorts on Clearwater Beach, this visit was a bit of a letdown. The gulf-facing king room we had was starting to show some wear (towel bar in the bathroom was loose, the in-room fridge was barely cool, some spots on the wall had be retouched, but the paint color was a smidgen off, etc), and the bed could have been a bit more comfortable. There was a wedding being held that weekend, and on Saturday the hotel was essentially overrun by a bunch of drunk thirtysomethings (in the elevator, at the pool, etc.), one of whom we noted had passed out by the pool in his suit. The bar at Carretta's (hotel restaurant) which we remembered served excellent drinks with…

title: If you're expecting 4 or 5 stars, stay elsewhere..
review: We stayed at week in a 1 bedroom suite over the last week of April (Easter weekend). Overall, we were impressed with the hotel's ambiance, amenities, location and grandeur! The room was spacious and suited well for our needs. However, things turned a bit sour towards the end of our trip. Two nights prior to our departure, we received a letter under our door indicating that aerial photos were to be taken of the property and that the pool would be closed from the peak hours of noon to 3 pm. This being a family holiday with two small children, we found this to be quite disturbing since no one had advised us of this at the time of booking, in addition, the only location that our kids could swim was the ocean, which supported a red flag on most days of our stay. It was also very hot…

title: Beautiful resort so relaxing !
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write the review of the Sandpearl Resort.  While I appreciate the positive aspects of the resort that you mentioned I was disappointed to learn that you were not happy with our resolution to the issue you encountered during our aerial photo shoot.  For that I am very sorry.    We scheduled the event during the slowest week of the year up to that date.  We also tried to communicate to all of our guests what exactly was going to occur during the photo shoot by distrubuting letters under all guestroom doors on two different occasions leading up to the day of the shoot.  To limit the impact of having our pool unavailable from 1:00 to 2:30 we offered a complimentary bbq buffet on the adjacent beach along with complimentary beer and wine.  In the event that guests wanted a pool rather than joining us for the bbq we made accomodations with the Condo buidling next to us for our guests to use their pool.  Only 1 or 2 families ended up using that pool.   As you can imagine it is very difficult to schedule an event like this without it having an effect on guests.  It is however very necessary for our business to stay competitive and provide modern and up to date pictures of our property for marketing and internet needs.  We will take your comments into consideration for future events should it be necessary.  If you would like to speak personally regarding this experience and feel it appropriate, please call me at the hotel.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Definitely not a good resort if you want a quiet getaway.
review: We stayed here in October 2009! But only recently looking for our next holiday I noticed how helpful these posts are so here goes ... Our experience at the sand pear was amazing !  The hotel is beautiful we walked in it was like a breath of fresh air, our room wasn't ready so we sat out and relaxed a while in the lobby and outside taking in all the beauty this hotel has. It was very luxurious.. Once we got our room it was amazing the bed was huge !!! It had a docking station for your iPod or I phone which my man loved lol! The room was not facing the ocean but it still was fabulous .... I found out I was pregnant here and it was just the perfect place to come back to to relax and catch up on sleep. I have no faults with this hotel it was just a fantastic place and so relaxing !…

title: Great resort on a great beach
review: Dear Ktyorkuk,   Thank you for such an amazing review. We are pleased that you enjoyed the room and its' amenities. Watching the sunset from our fire pit is very relaxing. Congratulation on your new addition to the family! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

title: Great place to enjoy a relaxing vacation
review: I booked the Sandpearl thinking it would be a quiet, relaxing weekend to spend with my husband to celebrate our 10 year anniversary. Unfortunately, that wasn't the case. Although the reservation staff assured me that this would be an ideal location for a romantic getaway, we were sadly disappointed. For starters, they put us in a room overlooking the air conditioners at Frenchy's restaurant. Not only was the view terrible, it was LOUD! So much for a quiet evening on the balcony. After much negotiation(talking them down from $100 extra a night), they moved us at no charge. Relaxing by the pool was a joke. Although signs were posted stating the pool closes at 10 p.m., many unruly children (unattended) were chaotically screaming and playing at the pool.   We spent a few hundred…

title: A piece of heaven
review: Just left the sandpearl after a 5 day stay for our one year wedding anniversary,we went here for our honeymoon and were hoping to relive the great memories we had staying here and It didn't dissappoint.When you go away you want to be made feel special and the staff are the nicest people you will ever meet,opening doors for you asking how you are or if you need directions it makes this hotel great the personal touch is what I call it you know that they want to make sure you are enjoying your stay with them and that you will comeback.The valet jb,christina at caretta on the gulf were amazing and jess in the Tate grill who spoiled my wife and I and couldnt do enough for us and when we mentioned that we never had a peanut butter and jelly sandwich as being from Ireland it's not…

title: Beautiful resort; service lacking
review: Dear Irishonholiday,   Thank you for taking the time to share some experiences you had while staying with us at the Sandpearl Resort. I am so please we were able to make your one year wedding anniversary so memorable. Thank you for acknowledging several of our associates that assisted in making your vacation so wonderful. We hope to welcome you back next year for another “piece of heaven”.

title: Amazing stay at the Sandpearl Resort
review: This was our first visit to the Sandpearl and the facility did not disappoint. The pool area, lobby, and rooms were clean and beautifully furnished--just what you'd expect from a resort at this pricepoint.   The service was somewhat disappointing and did not live up to the quality of the resort. The valet and the waiters at the poolside restaurant were slow and failed to acknowledge that I was waiting. I understand that there are busy times, but out of courtesy would like them to say that they will be with me in s moment--not treat me like I'm invisible.   The pool area is very slick. I almost fell while walking carefully. While we were there a woman carrying a baby fell. The baby cried, but wasn't hurt. It appeared that the woman's arm was broken.

title: We will definitely be back!
review: My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights after staying 3 nights in Disney and we both wished we had stayed the entire trip. This was our first stay in Clearwater and it won't be our last. Everything about this resort was amazing !!!! The location was perfect. You can walk to some many shops and restaurants. The beach and pool area were beautiful. We have been to a many places in Florida and Clearwater beach is the Best beach !!! Our room was very spacious with beautiful views of the gulf. We had lunch everyday at Tate Grill at the resort because it was so good. The food and service were both amazing. We loved getting drinks and food served to us at the beach. Everyone that works at this hotel was very friendly and helpful. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. I can't wait to…

title: Love unit 868 gulf front view!
review: We just returned from a week at the Sandpearl Resort  with our daughter, son-in-law and two grandsons ages 9 and 11 and everyone agreed that it was one of the best vacations we have ever taken!    We have traveled to Grand Cayman three times and stayed at the Ritz Carlton twice and I have to say that this was as good or even better than the Ritz.  The property is beautif and everyone was extremely friendly.  The concierge Erald was awesome and extremely helpful with dinner reservations and booking the Tradewinds sail excusion for us.   The sailboat only holds six people along with the captain, so our family had the benefit of a private sail.  Chris who was the captain was terrific.  Our grandsons were able to help with the masts and my husband even got to drive the sailboat.  …

title: Great Place -- But Beware the Extras
review: This review will be like most of the others.  The Sandpearl is a great resort, nice rooms, great pool and spectacular wide, soft sandy beach.  The staff were great - attentive but not obtrusive.  The view from the room across the pool and beach out to the gulf was equally wonderful.  But, no matter what you paid for the room, there are lots of extras.  Valet parking - $20/day with no  self-parking available.  Resort fee -- $25/day.  Want an umbrella and chairs at the beach -- another $25/day.  Resort fee includes 1 bicycle complementary, but if you want to ride as a couple -- another $25.  It jacks up the price significantly.  My suggestion is to eliminate some of these extras or build them into the resort fee.  Nonetheless, if I will be back in Clearwater, I will stay at the…

title: Highly recommend
review: Dear Marge11,   Thank you for taking the time to post your thoughts about our resort. It sounds like you really enjoyed the resort. I understand how the extra charges can add up for you stay but they include lots of amenities; wired and wireless internet, access to our 24 hour business center and fitness center, in room coffee, 2 bottles of water daily, local phone calls, pool and beach towel service and nightly shoe shine. We have two options for parking valet is twenty dollar per evening, or we offer a complimentary parking area that is a few blocks from the resort. I am glad that overall you enjoyed our resort and look forward to your return visit.

title: Outstanding in every respect...
review: Had a great time at this resort. Stayed 2 nights.  Great location.  Kids enjoyed the zero entry pool and so did I. Nice beach. Great service.  Will be back.

title: great location, could do better with the little details
review: I am glad you and your family enjoyed staying here at the Sandpearl Resort. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

title: Absolutely Awesome
review: Fabulous location and rooms ~ it does what it says on the tin ~ luxury resort for sure with exceptional customer service.  Be prepared to pay for extras though that are not covered in the daily $15 resort fee ~ parking and sunbeds and parasols on teh beach are extra and expensive considering what you pay...  Ill be returning for sure ~ lovely Blue Sky Cafe next door with great value & quality  food and some form of nightly entertainment.

title: The Devil is in the Details
review: This was our second visit to the Sandpearl. A few things have changed somewhat. The place has become a haven for families with small children, so if you are looking to relax at the pool, that probably isn't going to happen. The  staff was great, very pleasant and friendly.  We found the food at Tate's and Caretta's to be very good.  Beach,and location are wonderful. However, they are just missing the mark if they want to be considered a 4 star resort and far off if 5 star is the goal.   The place just isn't that clean.  We had a Gulf Front Suite (fantastic size and view) and there were  dirty fingerprints and smudges over every glass surface, granite counter, door and mirror.  Our suite was never serviced before 4:30 pm.  On one occasion, the cleaning people left  a dirty,…

title: Relaxation at its best!
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review regarding your most recent stay at the Sandpearl.  While I was thrilled to hear your comments on the our friendly and pleasant staff some of the other comments were very concerning to me.  We have always considered ourselves a very family friendly resort.  In 2010 Travel and Leisure recognized us as one of the top Family Friendly Resorts in the country.  There are certain times of the years that there will be more kids around the resort than at other times.  The team at the Sandpearl does their best to have plenty of activities to keep the kids happy so the pool area is relaxing and enjoyable for all.  I am very sorry to hear about the Housekeeping issues you encountered during your stay at our hotel.  Cleanliness is my TOP priority.  I will share your comments with our Housekeeping Team in order to continue to improve.  During your next stay, if you would like your room serviced at a certain time of the day, please feel free to call the Front Desk and we will have your room serviced during your requested time.  Unfortunately, the steam room was not operational for 2 days this month due to a maintenance issue.  Please accept my sincere aplology for this inconvenience.    Again, thank you for taking the time to write a review.  If you feel it appropriate and would like to discuss your stay please feel free to contact me at the hotel at your convenience.  Regards, Eric Waltz General Manager

title: Absolutely Beautiful- Wished we were sleeping here...
review: My husband and I just got back from a long weekend at the Sandpearl Resort.  We went there celebrating an anniversary and were pleasantly surprised to get bumped up from a Junior Suite to a one bedroom suite on the top floor.  What a view from our two balconies!  We did not request the upgrade, but it was an "off" weekend.  I would not expect that during a busy time.  Service was great and the staff overall was very friendly.  Shout out to Jessica at the front desk, Mark the Bell Hop  and Greg at Tate's for oustanding service!  Food at both Tate's and Caretta's was good.  We requested a table by the window at Caretta's for a sunset view and got the best table in the house!  Again, it was not overly crowded.  The prices at Caretta's, while expensive, were not out of the ordinary…

title: We didn't want to leave!
review: Dear Wannagetaway11,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts of our resort. We are thrilled you found our staff to be so helpful and I will be sure to share your “shout out” with the staff that made your stay memorable. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

title: A Week in Heaven
review: I am not one who usually takes the time to write reviews, but I felt compelled to express the splendor of this amazing resort.  This review is a little different because we didn't actually sleep here, just used the facilities.   My friend and our two four year olds were actually staying at the Hyatt down the street.  Our kids were in the Camp Hyatt for the day and we decided we wanted to go to the spa.  We contacted Hyatt's spa, but they were totally booked, so we took to the internet to find a nearby alternative.  We decided to go to the Sandpearl and take advantage of their spa sampler which included a facial, massage, manicure and pedicure.   We pulled up to the Sandpearl and immediately felt a twinge of jealousy... we wished we were staying at this resort instead of the…

title: A beautiful oasis
review: This was our first stay at the Sandpearl Resort. The staff was extremely pleasant and helpful, even the maintenance folks and housekeeping staff were pleasant and accommodating. The hotel is located on the northern area of Clearwater beach, but there are plenty of shops and restaurants just a very short stroll away. The hotel lobby is bright and spacious, with beautiful art works everywhere. Elevators are quick to arrive and deliver you to your floor.Our room was clean and quiet, we did not experience any issues with thin walls or adjoining room noise described in some other comments. We had a 5th floor suite facing the gulf with excellent views off the balcony, and a spacious room and bathroom with a tub and huge shower stall The resort is full service and does have some extra…

title: Always Enjoyable
review: Dear Psylvestre,   Thank you for taking the time to comment about your recent stay here at the Sandpearl resort. We are so glad you found our entire staff to be pleasant and accommodating. Thank you for sharing your concerns in regards to beach food and beverage service I will certainly share that with our management team. We are thrilled you found our resort to be a beautiful oasis.

title: The best hotel on Clearwater Beach
review: This is the second time I have visited the resort for a Conference.  They do a fantastic job with the A/V set up and breakfast/lunch/dinner.  It is always a pleasure to get a couple hours by the pool for drinks and sun.  Would love to come here for pleasure sometime to truly enjoy all that it has to offer.  It is a rather expensive hotel though.  Lots of fees (resort fee, parking fee, etc.)

title: Can't wait to go back!
review: Dear The_Lockwoods_1004,   We appreciate your feedback in regards to your most recent stay at the Sandpearl Resort. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay here while attending a conference. We hope that you and your family are able to vacation with us at the Sandpearl Resort.

title: The BEST in Clearwater Beach!
review: I have recently returned from an excellent stay at the Sandpearl Resort on Clearwater Beach. I cannot praise this hotel enough. It is not cheap but it was worth every penny.
